drinks.name: A Furlong Too Late
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 4 oz Ginger beer
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the rum and ginger beer into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: A Night In Old Mandalay
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Añejo rum
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 3 oz Ginger ale
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the light rum, añejo rum, orange juice, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: A. J.
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Applejack
  • 1 oz Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Abbey Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
  • Juice of 1/4 Orange
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except for the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Abilene
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 2 oz Peach nectar
  • 3 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Acapulco
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 1/2 tsp Triple sec
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 1 Egg white
  • 1 Mint sprig
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

drinks.name: Adam
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Adonis Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz dry Sherry
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Affair
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass. Top with club soda and serve.

drinks.name: Affinity
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 2 dashes Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: After Dinner Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • Juice of 1 Lime
  • 1 Lime wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

drinks.name: After Supper Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1/2 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Alabama Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients (except for lemon juice) over ice in a highball glass. Stir, add a dash of lemon juice, and serve.

drinks.name: Alaska Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 dashes Orange bitters
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Yellow Chartreuse
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: Alexander
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Light cream
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Alexander #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Light cream
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Brandy Alexander
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Light cream
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Alexander's Big Brother
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Heavy cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Alexander's Sister
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz Heavy cream
  • 1/8 tsp grated Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, creme de menthe, and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: Alfie Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Lemon vodka
  • 1 dash Triple sec
  • 1 tblsp Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Algonquin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blended whiskey
  • 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Allegheny
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Bourbon
  • 1 1/2 tsp Blackberry brandy
  • 1 1/2 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Allies Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 tsp Kummel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Almeria
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Almond Joy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Amaretto And Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 1/2 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Amaretto Mist
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 Lime wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour amaretto in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Add the wedge of lime and serve. (A wedge of lemon may be substituted for lime, if preferred.)

drinks.name: Amaretto Rose
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

drinks.name: Amaretto Stinger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz White Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Amaretto Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz hot Tea
  • 2 oz Amaretto
  • Chilled Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour hot tea into a pousse-cafe glass, using a spoon in glass to prevent cracking. Add amaretto, but do not stir. Top with chilled whipped cream and serve.

drinks.name: Ambrosia
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Applejack
  • 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 dash Triple sec
  • Juice of 1 Lemon
  • Chilled Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except champagne). Pour contents into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne, stir lightly, and serve.

drinks.name: Amer Picon Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 1/2 oz Amer Picon
  • Juice of 1 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: American Beauty
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/4 tsp White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Tawny port
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, vermouth, creme de menthe, orange juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Pouring slowly and carefully, float the port on top.

drinks.name: Andalusia
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 1/2 oz dry Sherry
  • 1/2 oz Brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Angel Face
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1/2 oz Apple brandy
  • 1 oz Gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Angel's Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/4 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/4 oz Brandy
  • 1/4 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients carefully, in order given, into a pousse-cafe glass so that they do not mix.

drinks.name: Angel's Wing
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 tblsp Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients carefully, in order given, into a pousse-cafe glass so that they do not mix. Serve without mixing.

drinks.name: Angler's Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 3 dashes Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice, pour contents into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

drinks.name: Ante
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Apple brandy
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Dubonnet Rouge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Antoine Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dubonnet Blanc
  • 1 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: Float vermouth on top of chilled Dubonnet in a red wine glass and serve.

drinks.name: Apple Blow Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Apple brandy
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Egg white
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Apple Brandy Highball
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Apple brandy
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour apple brandy over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add a twist of lemon peel on top and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

drinks.name: Apple Brandy Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Apple brandy
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1/2 slice Lemon
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake apple brandy, powdered sugar, and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with a half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Apple Colada
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Apple schnapps
  • 1 oz Cream of coconut
  • 1 oz Half-and-half
  • 1 slice Apple
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend schnapps, cream of coconut, half-and-half, and 2 cups of crushed ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour contents into a collins glass. Decorate with an apple slice and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Apple Pie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 tsp Applejack
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Apple Rum Rickey
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Light rum
  • 3/4 oz Applejack
  • 1/4 Lime
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour applejack and rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Squeeze lime and drop in glass. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Applecar
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Applejack
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Appled Rum Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz AÃ±ejo rum
  • 1/2 oz Applejack
  • 2 tsp Lime juice
  • 2 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, applejack, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda.

drinks.name: Apricot Anise Collins
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 tsp Anisette
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake gin, brandy, anisette, and lemon juice with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir lightly. Decorate with the slice of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: Apricot Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
  • Juice of 1/4 Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Apricot Lady
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 tsp Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 Egg white
  • 1 Orange slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, apricot brandy, triple sec, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the orange slice.

drinks.name: Arcadia
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/2 oz Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Archbishop
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Green Ginger Wine
  • 1 tsp Benedictine
  • 1 Lime wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

drinks.name: Arise My Love
drinks.ingredients:
• Chilled Champagne
  • 1 tsp Green Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put creme de menthe into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne and serve.

drinks.name: Arthur Tompkins
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 2 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Grand Marnier, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Artillery
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 tsp Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: B And B
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz Benedictine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Float brandy on top of Benedictine in a cordial glass without mixing and serve.

drinks.name: Babbie's Special Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 tsp Gin
  • 1 tblsp Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Bacardi Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 3/4 oz Bacardi Light rum
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • 1/2 tsp Sugar syrup
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bahama Mama
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Coffee liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Coconut liqueur
  • 1/4 oz 151 proof rum
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients and pour over cracked ice in a collins glass. Decorate with a strawberry or cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Balmoral
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Baltimore Bracer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Anisette
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Baltimore Eggnog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jamaican Rum
  • 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Madeira
  • 1 whole Egg
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 3/4 cup Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Banana Cow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1 1/2 oz Cream
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1 slice Banana
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake rum, creme de banana, cream, and grenadine with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the banana slice, sprinkle nutmeg on top, and serve.

drinks.name: Banana Daiquiri
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 tblsp Triple sec
  • 1 Banana
  • 1 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Banana Punch #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 tsp Apricot brandy
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1/2 Banana in slices
  • Carbonated water
  • 2 Mint sprigs
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour brandy, vodka, and juice of lime into a collins glass over crushed ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with banana slices and mint sprigs and serve.

drinks.name: Banana Rum Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Barbary Coast
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Baron Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 tsp Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 tsp Triple sec
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 Lemon wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the lemon wedge and serve.

drinks.name: Barrier Breaker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 2 tsp Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 4 oz cold Coffee
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all of the ingreedients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

drinks.name: Barton Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Applejack
  • 1/4 oz Gin
  • 1/4 oz Scotch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

drinks.name: Basic Bill
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz AÃ±ejo rum
  • 1/2 oz Dubonnet Rouge
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Batida Abacaxi
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Cachaca
  • 4 oz Pineapple (fresh), chunks
  • 1/2 tsp granulated Sugar
  • 1 cup crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender. Blend well. Pour into a wine glass.

drinks.name: Batida Mango
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Cachaca
  • 4 oz Mango, fresh, chopped
  • 2 tsp granulated Sugar
  • 1 cup crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender. Blend well. Pour into a wine glass.

drinks.name: Batida Morango
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Cachaca
  • 5 very ripe Strawberries
  • 1/2 tsp granulated Sugar
  • 1 cup crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender. Blend well. Pour into a wine glass.

drinks.name: Beachcomber
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 Lime wedge
  • 2 oz Light rum
  • 1 tsp Maraschino liqueur
  • 1 tsp Cherry brandy
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place sugar in a saucer. Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge and dip glass into sugar to coat rim thoroughly, reserve lime. In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine rum, maraschino liqueur, cherry brandy, and lime juice. Shake well.

drinks.name: Beadlestone Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Scotch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Beal's Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Scotch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Beauty Spot Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Orange juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a dash of grenadine in a cocktail glass. Shake remaining ingredients with ice, strain into glass over grenadine, and serve.

drinks.name: Bee Stinger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 1/2 oz White Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Belles Of St. Mary's
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Apricot brandy
  • 2 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bengal
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz Maraschino liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bennett Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 2 dashes Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Bentley
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Calvados
  • 1 oz Dubonnet Rouge
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir Calvados and Dubonnet with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Bermuda Highball
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Brandy
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • Carbonated water
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour brandy, gin, and dry vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

drinks.name: Bermuda Rose
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 tsp Apricot brandy
  • 1 1/4 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Bernardo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 tsp Lemon juice
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, lemon juice, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Betsy Ross
drinks.ingredients:
• crushed Ice
  • 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 1/2 oz Tawny port
  • 1/2 tsp Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Between The Sheets
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Biffy Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 tblsp Swedish Punsch
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Bijou Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Green Chartreuse
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

drinks.name: Bikini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Milk
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake rum, vodka, milk, sugar, and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with a twist of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: Billy Taylor
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin and juice of lime into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Bishop
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1/4 Lemon
  • Juice of 1/4 Orange
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • Red wine (Burgundy)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake juice of lemon, juice of orange, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add two ice cubes, fill with burgundy, and stir well. Decorate with various fruits and serve.

drinks.name: Bitch-On-Wheels
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 tsp Pernod
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Black Baltimore
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Black Sambuca
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Black Devil
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 2 oz Light rum
  • 1 black Olive
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir rum and vermouth with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the black olive and serve.

drinks.name: Black Hawk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Blended whiskey
  • 1 1/4 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir blended whiskey and sloe gin with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Blackjack #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Black Maria
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Coffee brandy
  • 2 oz Light rum
  • 4 oz strong, black Coffee
  • 2 tsp Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and stir all ingredients in a brandy snifter. Add cracked ice and serve.

drinks.name: Black Monday
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Black Sambuca (Opal)
  • 1 tsp Cherry brandy
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Black Pagoda
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 2 tsp Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Black Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Coffee liqueur
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

drinks.name: Black Stripe Cold
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Molasses
  • 1 tsp Honey
  • 1 oz boiling Water
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a mixing glass and stir well to dissolve the honey and molasses. Pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

drinks.name: Black Velvet
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz chilled Stout
  • 5 oz chilled Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour stout into a champagne flute. Add champagne carefully, so it does not mix with stout, and serve.

drinks.name: Blackjack #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Kirschwasser
  • 1 oz Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

drinks.name: Blackthorn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir sloe gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Blarney Stone Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Irish whiskey
  • 1/2 tsp Anis
  • 1/2 tsp Triple sec
  • 1/4 tsp Maraschino liqueur
  • Twist of Orange peel
  • 1 Olive
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Irish whiskey, anis, triple sec, and maraschino with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel, top with the olive, and serve.

drinks.name: Blimey
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake wel. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Blinder
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 5 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the scotch and grapefruit juice into a highball glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink.

drinks.name: Bloodhound Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 3 crushed Strawberries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except strawberries) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the 3 crushed strawberries and serve.

drinks.name: Bloody Bull
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 glass Tomato juice
  • 1/2 glass Beef bouillon
  • 1 slice Lime
  • 1 Lemon wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka, tomato juice, and beef bouillon over ice in a highball glass and stir. Add the slice of lime and the wedge of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: Bloody Maria
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 2 oz Tomato juice
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
  • 1 dash Celery salt
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: Bloody Mary
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Tomato juice
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp Worcestershire sauce
  • 2-3 drops Tabasco sauce
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

drinks.name: Blue Cowboy
drinks.ingredients:
• crushed Ice
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine both of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Blue Devil Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tblsp Maraschino liqueur
  • 1/2 tsp Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Blue Hawaiian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Cream of coconut
  • 1 slice Pineapple
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend light rum, blue curacao, pineapple juice, and cream of coconut with one cup ice in an electric blender at high speed. Pour contents into a highball glass. Decorate with the slice of pineapple and a cherry.

drinks.name: Blue Lagoon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • Lemonade
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and curacao over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Blue Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • Coarse Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice. Dip rim in coarse salt. Shake tequila, blue curacao, and lime juice with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Blue Mountain
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz AÃ±ejo rum
  • 1/2 oz Tia maria
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass alomst filled with ice cubes.

drinks.name: Bluebird
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin, triple sec, Curacao, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

drinks.name: Bobby Burns Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1 1/4 tsp Benedictine
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Bolero
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Apple brandy
  • 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/4 tsp Sweet Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients well with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

drinks.name: Bombay Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 tsp Triple sec
  • 1/4 tsp Anis
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Boomerang
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 1/2 tsp Maraschino liqueur
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, bitters, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

drinks.name: Border Crossing
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 2 tsp Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 4 oz Coca-Cola
  • 1 Lime wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the tequila, lime juice, lemon juice, and cola into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lime wedge.

drinks.name: Bosom Caresser
drinks.ingredients:
• crushed Ice
  • 1 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Madeira
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Boston Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Boston Sidecar
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Light rum
  • 3/4 oz Brandy
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Boston Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blended whiskey
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Egg white
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake juice of lemon, powdered sugar, blended whiskey, and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Bourble
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bourbon and Branch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 4 oz bottled Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the bourbon and water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes.

drinks.name: Bourbon Black Hawk
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon and sloe gin. Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

drinks.name: Bourbon Black Hawk #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, sloe gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

drinks.name: Bourbon Cobbler #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 3 oz Club soda
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 Orange slice
  • 1 Lemon slice
  • 2 1/2 oz blended Bourbon
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the bourbon and stir well. Garnish with the cherry, orange and lemon slices.

drinks.name: Bourbon Cobbler #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 3 oz Club soda
  • 2 oz Bourbon
  • Pineapple wedge
  • Strawberries
  • Lime wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a large wine glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Almost will the glass with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Garnish with starwberry, lime and pineapple wedges.

drinks.name: Bourbon Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 4 oz Lemon-lime soda
  • 1 Lemon wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the bourbon and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Bourbon County Cowboy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bourbon Daisy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 Orange slice
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, grenadine, and sugar. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinks.name: Bourbon Fix
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 2 tsp Water
  • 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 Lemon slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the bourbon. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

drinks.name: Bourbon Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1 Egg
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1/2 oz Light cream
  • 1/8 tsp grated Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: Bourbon Highball
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour bourbon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

drinks.name: Bourbon Milk Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 3 oz Half-and-half
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1/4 tsp Vanilla extract
  • 1/4 tsp grated Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, half-and half, sugar, and vanilla extract. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: Bourbon Milk Punch #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 2 oz Bourbon
  • 5 oz Milk
  • 1/4 tsp ground Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a highball glass, dissolve the sugar in the bourbon by stirring with a teaspoon. Add 6 ice cubes and the milk. Stir well. Garnish with the cinnamon.

drinks.name: Bourbon Milk Punch #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 5 oz Milk
  • 1/4 tsp grated Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, creme de cacao, and milk. Shake well. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: Classic Old-Fashioned
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 dashes Bitters
  • 1 tsp Water
  • 1 Sugar cube
  • 3 oz Bourbon
  • 1 Orange slice
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

drinks.name: Bourbon Sling
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 2 tsp Water
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and bourbon. Shake well. Strain well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Bourbon Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 Orange slice
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a whiskey sour glass, garnish with the orange slice and cherry.

drinks.name: Bourbon Swizzle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • crushed Ice
  • 3 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, bourbon, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice. Stir until glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

drinks.name: Boxcar
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinks.name: Brainstorm
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Benedictine
  • 1 tsp Sweet Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Brandied Egg Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Egg
  • 2 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, crack the egg and add the rest of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Brandied Madeira
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Madeira
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Brandy Alexander #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Half-and-half
  • 1/4 tsp grated Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, creme de cacao, and half-and-half. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: Brandy Alexander #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Heavy cream
  • 1/4 tsp grated Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, creme de cacao, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: Brandy And Soda
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • 5 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the brandy and club soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Brandy Blazer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp granulated Sugar
  • 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 slice Orange
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in brandy. Add the orange slice. Tilt the glass and carefully ignite the drink with a match. Stir with a long spoon until the flame is extinguished. Strain into a punch cup and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Brandy Cobbler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 3 oz Club soda
  • 1 Lemon slice
  • 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 Orange slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the brandy. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

drinks.name: Brandy Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • 1/4 tsp Sugar syrup
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Brandy Collins
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 slice Orange
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake juice of lemon, brandy, and powdered sugar with cracked ice and strain into a collins glass. Add ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and top with a cherry. Serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Brandy Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • 4 oz Lemon-lime soda
  • 1 Lemon wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the brandy and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Brandy Daisy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 Orange slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

drinks.name: Brandy Fix
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Brandy
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 tsp Water
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine juice of lemon, powdered sugar, and water in a highball glass. Stir, fill with shaved ice, and add brandy. Stir again, add the lemon slice, and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Brandy Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 4 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well.

drinks.name: Brandy Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 whole Egg
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1/2 oz Light cream
  • 1/8 tsp grated Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: Brandy Highball
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour brandy into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, add the twist of lemon peel, stir gently, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

drinks.name: Brandy Milk Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 cup Milk
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake brandy, milk, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Brandy Sangaree
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 tsp Water
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 tblsp Port
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in 1 tsp. water. Add brandy and pour into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Float port on top, sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, and serve.

drinks.name: Brandy Sling
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 2 tsp Water

drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and brandy. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Brandy Smash
drinks.ingredients:

drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the mint sprigs lightly with the sugar and club soda. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Add the brandy. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinks.name: Brandy Sour
drinks.ingredients:

drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake brandy, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the lemon slice, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Brandy Swizzle
drinks.ingredients:

drinks.name: Brandy Toddy
drinks.ingredients:

drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in 1 tsp. water in an old-fashioned glass. Add brandy and one ice cube and stir. Add twist of lemon peel on top and serve.

drinks.name: Brandy Vermouth Cocktail

drinks.name: Brantini
drinks.ingredients:

drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Brave Bull

  • 3/4 oz Gin

drinks.name: Climax

drinks.name: Clove Cocktail

  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin

drinks.name: Clover Club Cocktail

  • 2 tsp Grenadine

drinks.name: Clover Leaf Cocktail

  • 2 tsp Grenadine
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon

drinks.name: Coffee Flip

drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Coffee Grasshopper
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Coffee brandy

drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

drinks.name: Coffee Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Coffee brandy
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour cognac into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

drinks.name: Colonial Cocktail
