drinks.name: English Highball
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Brandy
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour brandy, gin, and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

drinks.name: English Rose Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1/4 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim of glass in powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into sugar-rimmed glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Entwistle's Error
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 4 oz Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Ethel Duffy Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 3/4 oz Apricot brandy
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: European
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz cream Sherry
  • 1/2 oz Dubonnet Rouge
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 tsp Grand Marnier
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sherry, Dubonnet, vermouth, and Grand Marnier. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry.

drinks.name: Everybody's Irish Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Irish whiskey
  • 1 tsp Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 tsp Green Chartreuse
  • 1 green Olive
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except green olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the green olive and serve.

drinks.name: Executive Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gold tequila
  • 4 oz fresh Orange juice
  • 2 tsp Creme de Cassis
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the tequila and the orange juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the center of the drink.

drinks.name: Eye-Opener
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 tsp Pernod
  • 1 tsp white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 Egg yolk
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinks.name: Fairy Belle Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Fallen Angel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 tsp White Creme de Menthe
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Fancy Bourbon
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 tsp Triple sec
  • 1/4 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, triple sec, sugar, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a coktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Fancy Brandy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • 1/4 tsp Triple sec
  • 1/4 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Fancy Gin
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/4 tsp Triple sec
  • 1/4 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Fancy Scotch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 tsp Triple sec
  • 1/4 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the scotch, triple sec, sugar, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Fancy Whiskey
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blended whiskey
  • 1/4 tsp Triple sec
  • 1/4 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Fantasio Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 tsp White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 tsp Maraschino liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Farmer Giles
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, dry vermouth, sweet vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Farmer's Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Fastlap
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Pernod
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Fat Face
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinks.name: Favorite Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Apricot brandy
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 1/4 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Fifth Avenue
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 tblsp Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a parfait glass (in order given) so that each ingredient floats on preceding one. Serve without mixing.

drinks.name: Fifty-Fifty
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 cocktail Olive
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the olive.

drinks.name: Fifty-fifty Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Fino Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Gin or Vodka
  • 1 1/2 tsp Fino Sherry
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glas half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin or vodka and the sherry. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Fireman's Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 2 oz Club soda
  • 1 Orange slice
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lime juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda. Stir well. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinks.name: Flamingo Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Fleet Street
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 tsp Dry Vermouth
  • 1 tsp Triple sec
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Flirting With The Sandpiper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 2 dashes Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Florida
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 tsp Kirschwasser
  • 1 1/2 tsp Triple sec
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Flying Dutchman
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and triple sec. Stir well.

drinks.name: Flying Scotchman
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Scotch
  • 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1/4 tsp Sugar syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Fog Cutter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 3 tblsp Lemon juice
  • 1 1/2 tsp Orgeat syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Top with a teaspoon of sweet sherry and serve.

drinks.name: Fontainebleau Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Anisette
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Fort Lauderdale
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • Juice of 1/4 Orange
  • Juice of 1/4 Lime
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

drinks.name: Fox And Hounds
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 oz Pernod
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Fox River Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blended whiskey
  • 1 tblsp Creme de Cacao
  • 4 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Foxy Lady
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Frankenjack Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 tsp Triple sec
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Freddy Fudpucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pouring slowly and carefully over the back of a teaspoon, float the Galliano on top of the drink.

drinks.name: Free Silver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 tblsp Milk
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: French '75'
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 4 oz Chilled Champagne
  • 1 Orange slice
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass. Top with the Champagne. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinks.name: French 125
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 oz Brandy
  • Chilled Champagne
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour brandy and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled champagne and stir lightly. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: French Connection
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Cognac
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a old-fashioned glass over ice, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Frisco Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blended whiskey
  • 1/2 oz Benedictine
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except slices of lemon and lime) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.

drinks.name: Froth Blower Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Frozen Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Applejack
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 1/2 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

drinks.name: Frozen Berkeley
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 tblsp Passion fruit syrup
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

drinks.name: Frozen Brandy And Rum
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

drinks.name: Frozen Daiquiri
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 tblsp Triple sec
  • 1 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 1 Cherry
  • 1 cup crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Frozen Margarita #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 tsp coarse Salt
  • 1 Lime wedge
  • 3 oz white Tequila
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 cup crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place salt in a saucer. Rub rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge and dip glass into salt to coat rim thoroughly, reserve lime. Pour tequila, triple sec, lime juice, and crushed ice into a blender. Blend well at high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Frozen Matador
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
  • 1 stick Pineapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, add the pineapple stick, and serve.

drinks.name: Frozen Mint Daiquiri
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
  • 6 Mint leaves
  • 1 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

drinks.name: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 4 chunks Pineapple
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
  • 1/2 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

drinks.name: Gareth Glowworm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Heavy cream
  • 1 tsp Cherry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the cherry brandy into the center of the drink.

drinks.name: Gates Of Hell
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 2 tsp Lemon juice
  • 2 tsp Lime juice
  • crushed Ice
  • 1 tsp Cherry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the tequila, lemon juice, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Drizzle the cherry brandy over the top.

drinks.name: Gauguin
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 1 tblsp Passion fruit syrup
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients (except cherry) with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass, add the cherry on top, and serve.

drinks.name: Gent Of The Jury
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 tsp Dry Vermouth
  • 3 Cocktail onion
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the onions.

drinks.name: Gentleman's Club
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

drinks.name: Gilroy Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Cherry brandy
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 1 tblsp Dry Vermouth
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Gimlet
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice cordial (Rose's)
  • 1 Lime wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the gin and lime cordial into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lime wedge.

drinks.name: Gin And Bitter Lemon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 4 oz Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the tonic water.

drinks.name: Gin And It
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir gin and vermouth in a cocktail glass. (No ice is used in this drink.)

drinks.name: Gin And Pink
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 5 oz Tonic water
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, gonic, and bitters. Stir well and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Gin And Sin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Gin And Tonic
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 5 oz Tonic water
  • 1 Lime wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

drinks.name: Gin Buck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin and juice of lemon into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Cobbler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 3 oz Club soda
  • 1 Lemon slice
  • 2 oz Gin
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 Orange slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the gin. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

drinks.name: Gin Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • Carbonated water
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Orange spiral
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.

drinks.name: Gin Daisy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 Orange slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the wine, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

drinks.name: Gin Fix
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 2 tsp Water
  • 2 oz Gin
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 Lemon slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the gin. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

drinks.name: Gin Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake gin, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Highball
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Milk Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 cup Milk
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Rickey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour juice of lime and gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Sangaree
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 tblsp Port
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 tsp Water
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water and add gin. Pour into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Float port on top, sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Sling
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 tsp Water
  • Twist of Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Smash
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Carbonated water
  • 1 cube Sugar
  • 4 Mint sprigs
  • 1 slice Orange
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir, add the orange slice and the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 Orange slice
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinks.name: Gin Squirt
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 tblsp Powdered sugar
  • 3 chunks Pineapple
  • 2 Strawberries
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with the pineapple chunks and the strawberries and serve.

drinks.name: Gin Swizzle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 2 oz Gin
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 3 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, gin, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a colling glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

drinks.name: Gin Toddy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 2 tsp Water
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, add the twist of lemon peel, and serve.

drinks.name: Gin-Cassis Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 4 oz Club soda
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cassis
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the center of the drink.

drinks.name: Godchild
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Heavy cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

drinks.name: Godfather
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve. (Bourbon may be substituted for scotch, if preferred.)

drinks.name: Godmother
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

drinks.name: Golden Bronx
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Dry Vermouth
  • 1 tsp Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 Egg yolk
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinks.name: Golden Cadillac
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Galliano
  • 2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at low speed for ten seconds. Strain into a champagne flute and serve.

drinks.name: Golden Daze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Peach brandy
  • 1 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Golden Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1/2 tblsp Sugar
  • 1 Egg yolk
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and serve.

drinks.name: Golden Slipper
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 3/4 oz Yellow Chartreuse
  • 1 unbroken Egg yolk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir brandy and chartreuse with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float unbroken egg yolk on top and serve.

drinks.name: Grand Master
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 3 oz Club soda
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Scotch, schnapps, and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Grapefruit Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 tsp Maraschino liqueur
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

drinks.name: Grapefruit Nog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 cup Grapefruit juice
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tblsp Honey
  • 1 whole Egg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes and serve.

drinks.name: Grass Skirt
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 Pineapple, slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the pineapple slice.

drinks.name: Grasshopper
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 3/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 3/4 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Green Demon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Lemonade
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vodka, rum, and liqueur and pour over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, add the cherry on top, and serve.

drinks.name: Green Devil
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
  • Mint leaves
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake gin, creme de menthe, and lime juice with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Decorate with mint leaves and serve.

drinks.name: Green Dragon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kummel
  • 1/2 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 4 dashes Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Green Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Green Creme de Menthe
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Egg white
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Green Opal
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Anisette
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Anis
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Greenback
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

drinks.name: Greenham's Grotto
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Brandy
  • 2 tsp Orgeat syrup
  • 2 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Greyhound
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 5 oz Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

drinks.name: Grog
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Dark rum
  • 3 oz Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the rum and the water into an old-fashioned glass with no ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Gypsy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

drinks.name: Gypsy Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

drinks.name: H.P.W. Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 tsp Dry Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 tsp Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Twist of Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

drinks.name: Haidin-Haidin
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Hair Raiser
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz 100 proof Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Rock and rye
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Harlem Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 tsp Maraschino liqueur
  • 2 chunks Pineapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake gin, pineapple juice, and maraschino with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with pineapple chunks and serve.

drinks.name: Harvard Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• Carbonated water
  • 2 oz Apple brandy
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Orange spiral
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Add powdered sugar and stir. Add ice cubes and apple brandy. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the spiral of orange so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

drinks.name: Harvey Wallbanger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and orange juice into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir. Float Galliano on top and serve.

drinks.name: Hasty Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/4 tsp Anis
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Hat Trick #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the dark rum, light rum, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Hat Trick #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Havana Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Hawaiian Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 tblsp Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Headless Horseman
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 3 dashes Bitters
  • Ginger ale
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put vodka and bitters into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with ginger ale, and stir. Add the orange slice and serve.

drinks.name: Highland Fling Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 2 dashes Orange bitters
  • 1 Olive
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

drinks.name: Highland Sling
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 2 tsp Water
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 2 oz Scotch
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and Scotch. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Hokkaido Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Sake
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Hole-In-One
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 3/4 oz Scotch
  • 3/4 oz Vermouth
  • 1/4 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Honeymoon Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Apple brandy
  • 3/4 oz Benedictine
  • 1 tsp Triple sec
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Honolulu Cocktail No. 2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Benedictine
  • 3/4 oz Maraschino liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Hoots Mon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Lillet
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Hop Toad
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Apricot brandy
  • 3/4 oz Light rum
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Hornpipe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 2 tsp Cherry brandy
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Horse And Jockey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz AÃ±ejo rum
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Hudson Bay
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 tsp 151 proof rum
  • 1 tblsp Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 tsp Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Hummer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Coffee liqueur
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

drinks.name: Hurricane
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Dark rum
  • 1 tblsp Passion fruit syrup
  • 2 tsp Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Ice-Cream Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Maraschino liqueur
  • 1 scoop Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 whole Egg
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a coupette glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Ice Palace
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/4 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange and a cherry (if desired) and serve.

drinks.name: Ideal Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1/4 tsp Maraschino liqueur
  • 1/2 tsp Grapefruit juice
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

drinks.name: Iguana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/4 oz Coffee liqueur
  • 1 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1/2 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the lime slice and serve.

drinks.name: Immaculata
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Imperial Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Blended whiskey
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Irish Rickey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Irish whiskey
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1 wedge Lime
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Irish whiskey and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

drinks.name: Irish Spring
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish whiskey
  • 1/2 oz Peach brandy
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 slice Orange
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients (except orange slice and cherry) into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange, add the cherry on top, and serve.

drinks.name: Italian Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Cream
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

drinks.name: Italian Heather
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1 oz Galliano
  • crushed Ice
  • 1 Lime wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the scotch and Galliano into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

drinks.name: Italian Sombrero
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 3 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake amaretto and cream well, pour into a champagne flute, and serve.

drinks.name: J. R.'s Godchild
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the boubon, amaretto, and milk. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: J. R.'s Godfather
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine both of the ingredients. Stir to mix the flavors.

drinks.name: Jack-In-The-Box
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Apple brandy
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Jade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 tsp Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/2 tsp Triple sec
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.

drinks.name: Jamaica Glow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Jamaican Rum
  • 1 tblsp Red wine (Claret)
  • 1 tblsp Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Jamaica Hop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Coffee brandy
  • 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Jamaican Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 oz Half-and-half
  • 1 Banana in slices
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients (except sliced banana) in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a large brandy snifter and add sliced banana. Sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, top with a whole strawberry, and serve.

drinks.name: James The Second Comes First
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Tawny port
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Bitters

  • 1/2 tsp Triple sec
