  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/4 tsp Anis
  • 1/4 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Pina Colada #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Light rum
  • 3 tblsp Coconut milk
  • 3 tblsp Pineapple, Crushed
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients into an electric blender with 2 cups of crushed ice. Blend at a high speed for a short length of time. Strain into a collins glass and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Pineapple Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz White wine
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • Carbonated water
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Orange spiral
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put white wine, pineapple juice, powdered sugar, and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir again. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so the end dangles over rim of glass.

drinks.name: Ping-Pong Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Sloe gin
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Pink Cream Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 oz Light cream
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 4 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, sugar, cream, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well.

drinks.name: Pink Gin
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 dashes Bitters
  • 2 oz Gin (Plymouth)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

drinks.name: Pink Lady
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 tsp Light cream
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Pink Pussycat
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 tsp Cherry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and pineapple juice. Stir well. Drop the cherry brandy into the center of the drink.

drinks.name: Pink Squirrel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Creme de Noyaux
  • 1 tblsp white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 tblsp Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Piper At Arms
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Piper At The Gates Of Dawn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Maraschino liqueur
  • 1 oz Heavy cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Kahlua, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pour the cream over the back of a teaspoon so that it floats on top of the drink.

drinks.name: Pistachio Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Pistachio liqueur
  • 1 oz Brandy
  • 5 oz Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

drinks.name: Plaza Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 1 stick Pineapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the stick of pineapple and serve.

drinks.name: Polo Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
  • 1 tblsp Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Polonaise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 tblsp Blackberry brandy
  • 1/2 oz dry Sherry
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

drinks.name: Polynesian Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Cherry brandy
  • Juice of 1 Lime
  • Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime and dip into powdered sugar. Shake vodka, cherry brandy, and juice of lime with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Poop Deck Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 tblsp Blackberry brandy
  • 1 oz Port
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Poppy Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Port And Starboard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tblsp Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Green Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine. Serve without mixing.

drinks.name: Port Wine Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Port
  • 1/2 tsp Brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Port Wine Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Port
  • 2 tsp Light cream
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 whole Egg
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Prairie Chicken
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 whole Egg
  • Salt
  • Black pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Open egg without breaking the yolk and put into a red wine glass. Pour gin on top of egg, add salt and pepper to taste, and serve.

drinks.name: Preakness Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blended whiskey
  • 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 tsp Benedictine
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Presbyterian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blended whiskey
  • Coca-Cola
  • Ginger ale
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour blended whiskey into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of cola and ginger ale and stir well. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: Prince's Smile
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Apple brandy
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1/4 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Princeton Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Puerto Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Applejack
  • 3/4 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Orgeat syrup
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lime and serve.

drinks.name: Puffer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the rum, orange juice, and grapefruit juice into a highball glass almost fillled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink.

drinks.name: Purple Mask
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Grape juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Quaker's Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Light rum
  • 3/4 oz Brandy
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
  • 2 tsp Raspberry syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Quarter Deck Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 Light rum
  • 1/3 oz cream Sherry
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Queen Bee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Coffee brandy
  • 1 1/2 oz Lime vodka
  • 1/2 oz cream Sherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Queen Charlotte
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Red wine
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • Lemon-lime soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Queen Elizabeth
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 tsp Benedictine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Quentin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Light cream
  • 1/8 tsp grated Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: Ragged Company
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 tsp Benedictine
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, vermouth, Benedictine, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Raspberry Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 tblsp raspberry Yoghurt
  • 1 1/2 tblsp raspberry Ice-cream
  • 1 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Heavy cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

drinks.name: Rattlesnake Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blended whiskey
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1/4 tsp Anis
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Rebel Yell
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 Egg white
  • 1 Orange slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, Cointreau, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the orange slice.

drinks.name: Red Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz 100 proof Vodka
  • 1 oz Apple juice
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Red Cloud
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Red Gin
drinks.ingredients:
• crushed Ice
  • 2 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Cherry Heering
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin and Cherry Heering. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the cherry.

drinks.name: Red Raider
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Bourbon
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Red Ruby
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Redcoat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Reform Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz dry Sherry
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Remsen Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • Carbonated water
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Orange spiral
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water into a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes and gin, fill with carbonated water, and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the spiral of orange so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

drinks.name: Resolute Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Riley's Sparrow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Ritz Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• Chilled Champagne
  • 1 dash Blue Curacao
  • 1 dash Amaretto
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill champagne flute with chilled champagne. Add blue curacao, amaretto, and lemon juice. Stir, add the twist of lemon, and serve.

drinks.name: Rob Roy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Robin's Nest
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Robson Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jamaican Rum
  • 1 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • 2 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 tblsp Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Rock And Rye Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rock and rye
  • 1 oz White port
  • 1 1/2 tsp Dry Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Rococo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cherry vodka
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Rolls-Royce
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 tsp Benedictine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Root Beer Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 4 oz Root beer
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the root beer. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry.

drinks.name: Root Beer Float
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 1/2 oz Light cream
  • Coca-Cola
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka, galliano, and light cream into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and stir well. Fill with cola, stir lightly, top with whipped cream, and serve.

drinks.name: Rory O'more
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Irish whiskey
  • 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Rose Cocktail (English)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1/2 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip into powdered sugar. Shake vermouth, gin, brandy, lemon juice, and grenadine with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Rose Cocktail (French)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Roselyn Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Rouge Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and Chambord. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Royal Clover Club Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
  • 1 Egg yolk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Royal Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 whole Egg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Royal Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 whole Egg
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

drinks.name: Royal Gin Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 whole Egg
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Royal Smile Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Apple brandy
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Royalty Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp Blue Curacao
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 whole Egg
  • 3 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, Curacao, sugar, and egg. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir well.

drinks.name: Ruby Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Egg white
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Ruby In The Rough
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1 tsp Sweet Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Rum Cobbler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 3 oz Club soda
  • 1 Lemon slice
  • 2 oz Dark rum
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 Orange slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

drinks.name: Rum Collins
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • Juice of 1 Lime
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake rum, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Rum Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz light or dark Rum
  • 4 oz Lemon-lime soda
  • 1 Lemon wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Rum Daisy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 Orange slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

drinks.name: Rum Dubonnet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 tsp Dubonnet Rouge
  • 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Rum Eggnog
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz light or dark Rum
  • 6 oz Milk
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 whole Egg
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Rum Fix
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Light rum
  • Juice of 1 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 tsp Water
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir juice of lemon, powdered sugar, and water in a highball glass. Fill glass with ice, add rum, and stir. Add the slice of lemon and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Rum Gimlet
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice cordial (Rose's)
  • 1 Lime wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the rum and Rose's lime juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lime wedge.

drinks.name: Rum Highball
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz light or dark Rum
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Rum Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 1/2 tsp Dry Vermouth
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktial glass. Garnish with the lemon twist or an olive.

drinks.name: Rum Milk Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 1 cup Milk
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Rum Old-fashioned
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 tsp 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 tsp Water
  • Twist of Lime peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

drinks.name: Rum Screwdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 5 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Rum Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 Orange slice
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

drinks.name: Rum Swizzle
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz light or dark Rum
  • Carbonated water
  • Juice of 1 Lime
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of 2 oz. carbonated water and juice of lime in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and stir. Add bitters and rum. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve with a swizzle stick.

drinks.name: Rum Toddy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz light or dark Rum
  • 2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
  • 2 tsp Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and one ice cube and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Russian Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Rusty Nail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Drambuie
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Rye Whiskey Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rye whiskey
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Saketini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Gin or Vodka
  • 1 1/2 tsp Sake
  • 1 cocktail Olive
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin or vodka with the sake. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the olive.

drinks.name: Salty Dog
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/4 tsp Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

drinks.name: San Francisco Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 3/4 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

drinks.name: Sand-Grown-Un
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktial glass.

drinks.name: Sand-Martin Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Green Chartreuse
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Sandra Buys A Dog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz AÃ±ejo rum
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 dash Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Santiago Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/4 tsp Grenadine
  • Juice of 1 Lime
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Saratoga Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 tsp Pineapple juice
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp Maraschino liqueur
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Saucy Sue Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Apple brandy
  • 1/2 tsp Apricot brandy
  • 1/2 tsp Pernod
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Savannah
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 dash white Creme de Cacao
  • Juice of 1/2 Orange
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Saxon Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 3/4 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • Twist of Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

drinks.name: Sazerac
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp Ricard
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 2 dashes Peychaud bitters
  • 1 tsp Water
  • 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Ricard into a glass and swirl around to coat glass, discard any excess. Place the sugar, Peychaud bitters, and water int othe glass and muddle with the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the bourbon over the ice cubes.

drinks.name: Scooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Scotch And Water
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 5 oz Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Scotch and the water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Scotch Bird Flyer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Light cream
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Egg yolk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

drinks.name: Scotch Bishop Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 tsp Triple sec
  • 1 tblsp Orange juice
  • 1/4 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Scotch Cobbler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 4 dashes Brandy
  • 4 dashes Curacao
  • 1 slice Orange
  • 1 Mint sprig
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour scotch, brandy, and curacao over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add the orange slice, top with the mint sprig, and serve.

drinks.name: Scotch Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 3 dashes White Creme de Menthe
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour scotch and creme de menthe over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Scotch Daisy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 Orange slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

drinks.name: Scotch Fix
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 2 tsp Water
  • 2 oz Scotch
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the Scotch. Stir well and garnish with the cherry and the lemon slice.

drinks.name: Scotch Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 1 Egg
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1/2 oz Light cream
  • 1/8 tsp grated Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

drinks.name: Scotch Highball
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour scotch in a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Scotch Holiday Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

drinks.name: Scotch Mist
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • crushed Ice
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pack a collins glass with crushed ice. Pour in scotch. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Scotch Old-Fashioned
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 dashes Bitters
  • 3 oz Scotch
  • 1 tsp Water
  • 1 Sugar cube
  • 1 Orange slice
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the scotch. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

drinks.name: Scotch Rickey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • Carbonated water
  • Lime peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour scotch and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lime peel/rind and serve.

drinks.name: Scotch Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1/2 slice Lemon
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Screaming Banana Banshee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 1/2 oz Cream
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

drinks.name: Screwdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put 3 ice cubes into a highball glass. Pour in vodka. Fill balance of glass with orange juice, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Seaboard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blended whiskey
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 3 Mint leaves
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except mint leaves) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Decorate with mint leaves and serve.

drinks.name: Secret Place
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
  • 2 tsp Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 4 oz cold Coffee
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all of the ingredients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

drinks.name: Sensation Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Maraschino liqueur
  • 2 Mint sprigs
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except mint sprigs) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprigs of mint and serve.

drinks.name: September Morning
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 tsp Cherry brandy
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Serpentine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, brandy, vermouth, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Seventh Heaven Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 2 tsp Grapefruit juice
  • 1 tblsp Maraschino liqueur
  • 1 Mint sprig
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except mint sprig) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

drinks.name: Sevilla Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Port
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 whole Egg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a whiskey sour glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Sevilla Cocktail #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Tawny port
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 Egg
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinks.name: Shady Lady
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 4 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 slice Lime
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour melon liqueur, tequila, and grapefruit juice over ice in a highball glass and stir. Add the slice of lime, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Shalom
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz 100 proof Vodka
  • 1 oz Madeira
  • 1 tblsp Orange juice
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

drinks.name: Shamrock
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Irish whiskey
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 tsp Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 Olive
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

drinks.name: Shanghai Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jamaican Light rum
  • 1 tsp Anisette
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Sherry Eggnog
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz cream Sherry
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 whole Egg
  • Milk
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Sherry Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz cream Sherry
  • 2 tsp Light cream
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 whole Egg
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Sherry Milk Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz cream Sherry
  • 1 pint Milk
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Shriner Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 tsp Sugar syrup
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Sidecar
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Cognac
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Sidecar Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Silent Broadsider
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Anisette
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Silk Stockings
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1 1/2 oz Light cream
  • Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except cinnamon) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on top and serve.

drinks.name: Silver Bronx
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

drinks.name: Silver Bullet #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 tsp Scotch
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixng glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and Scotch. Stir well. Strain into a shot glass. Carnish with the lemon twist.

drinks.name: Silver Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/4 tsp Sugar syrup
  • 1/2 tsp Maraschino liqueur
  • 2 dashes Orange bitters
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Silver King Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 2 dashes Orange bitters
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Silver Stallion Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 scoop Vanilla ice-cream
  • 2 oz Gin
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake gin and vanilla ice-cream with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Singapore Sling
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour grenadine, gin, and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with carbonated water and top with cherry brandy. Add the cherry on top and serve.

drinks.name: Sir Walter Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Brandy
  • 3/4 oz Rum
  • 1 tsp Triple sec
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Sister Starseeker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 4 oz Tonic water
  • 1 Lemon wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the rum, lemon juice, grenadine, and tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Sitarski
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 2 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

drinks.name: Skip And Go Naked
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • Chilled Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled beer, stir lightly, and serve.

drinks.name: Sloe Gin Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/4 tsp Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Sloe Gin Collins
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Sloe gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • 1 slice Orange
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake sloe gin and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Add slices of lemon and orange, top with the cherry, and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Sloe Gin Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tblsp Sloe gin
  • 2 tsp Light cream
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 whole Egg
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Sloe Gin Rickey
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Sloe gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour sloe gin and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Drop the wedge of lime in glass and serve.

drinks.name: Sloe Vermouth
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Sloeberry Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 dash Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Sloppy Joe's Cocktail No. 1
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Light rum
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/4 tsp Triple sec
  • 1/4 tsp Grenadine
  • Juice of 1 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Sloppy Joe's Cocktail No. 2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Brandy
  • 1/4 tsp Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz Port
  • 3/4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/4 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Slow Comfortable Screw
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour sloe gin and Southern Comfort into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice, stir well, and serve.

drinks.name: Slow Screw
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sloe gin
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour sloe gin into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice, stir well, and serve.

drinks.name: Sly Goes To Havana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 tsp white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 tsp Green Chartreuse
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old fashioned glass alomst filed with crushed ice.

drinks.name: Smart Christine
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Benedictine
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Benedictine, and orange juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the cherry.

drinks.name: Smile Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Smiler Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1/4 tsp Orange juice
  • 1 dash Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Smith And Kearns
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Light cream
  • Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Kahlua and light cream into a highball glass filled with ice and stir well. Fill with carbonated water, stir lightly, and serve.

drinks.name: Snyder
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Sol Y Sombra
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 1/2 oz Anisette
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve. (The English translation of the name of this drink is 'Sun and Shade', and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why. Thanks, Kirby.)

drinks.name: Sombrero
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Coffee brandy
  • 1 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour brandy into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Float cream on top and serve.

drinks.name: Son Of Adam
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Sonny Gets Kissed
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 2 tsp Lime juice
  • 2 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp superfine Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Soother Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Apple brandy
  • 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Soul Kiss Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 3/4 oz Bourbon
  • 1 1/2 tsp Dubonnet Rouge
  • 1 1/2 tsp Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: South Of The Border
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 3/4 oz Coffee brandy
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime slice) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lime and serve.

drinks.name: Southern Belle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 Benedictine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the brandy into a pousse cafe glass. Tilt the glass to a 45-degree angle and slowly pour the creme de cacao down the side of the glass so that it floats on the brandy. Repeat this precedure with the Benedictine.

drinks.name: Southern Bride

drinks.name: Soviet

  • 1 1/2 oz Apple brandy

drinks.name: Sphinx Cocktail

drinks.name: Straight Law Cocktail

drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients (except mint sprig) with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass, add the sprig of mint, and serve.

drinks.name: Strawberry Fields Forever

drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 Cherry
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vodka, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Decorate with slices of orange, lemon, and top with the cherry. Serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Vodka Gimlet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Lime juice cordial
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Vodka Grasshopper
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 3/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 3/4 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Vodka Salty Dog
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 tsp Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir well, and serve.

drinks.name: Vodka Sling
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 tsp Water
  • Twist of Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add vodka. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

drinks.name: Vodka Stinger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Waikiki Beachcomber
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 1 tblsp Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Wallick Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 tsp Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Ward Eight
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blended whiskey
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 slice Orange
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a red wine glass filled with cracked ice. Add the orange slice, top with the cherry, and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Warsaw Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Washington Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 3/4 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 tsp Sugar syrup
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Watermelon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Strawberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a collins glass over ice cubes, and serve.

drinks.name: Webster Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 tsp Apricot brandy
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Gin
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Wedding Belle Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Dubonnet Rouge
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 tsp Cherry brandy
  • 1 1/2 tsp Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Weep-No-More Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Dubonnet Rouge
  • 3/4 oz Brandy
  • 1/4 tsp Maraschino liqueur
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Wembly Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/4 tsp Apricot brandy
  • 1/2 tsp Apple brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Western Rose
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1/4 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: What The Hell
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

drinks.name: Whip Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 tsp Triple sec
  • 1/4 tsp Anis
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Whiskey Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blended whiskey
  • 1 tsp Sugar syrup
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Whiskey Collins
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blended whiskey
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 Cherry
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Decorate with slices of orange, lemon, and top with the cherry. Serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Whiskey Eggnog
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blended whiskey
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 whole Egg
  • 5 oz Milk
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinke nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Whiskey Fix
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Blended whiskey
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add blended whiskey and stir. Add the slice of lemon and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Whiskey Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blended whiskey
  • 2 tsp Light cream
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 whole Egg
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Whiskey Highball
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blended whiskey
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour blended whiskey into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

drinks.name: Whiskey Milk Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blended whiskey
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 8 oz Milk
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

drinks.name: Whiskey Rickey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blended whiskey
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • Carbonated water
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour blended whiskey and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Drop the wedge of lime in glass and serve.

drinks.name: Whiskey Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blended whiskey
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Cherry
  • 1/2 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Whisky Mac
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1 oz Green Ginger Wine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

drinks.name: White Heart
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Sambuca
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: White Lady
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 Egg white
  • 1 oz Light cream
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filler with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: White Lily Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Light rum
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1/4 tsp Anisette
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: White Lion Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: White Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Coffee liqueur
  • Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

drinks.name: White Way Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz White Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Why Not?
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Widow Woods' Nightcap
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 4 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Xanthia Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Cherry brandy
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Yellow Chartreuse
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Xeres Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz dry Sherry
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Yale Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Blue Curacao
  • 1 dash Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Yellow Rattler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 tblsp Orange juice
  • 1 Cocktail onion
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except cocktail onion) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cocktail onion and serve.

drinks.name: Yellow Strawberry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 4 oz Strawberries
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 slice Banana
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except banana slice) with ice and strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass. Garnish with the banana slice and serve.

drinks.name: Yolanda
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Anisette
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • Twist of Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

drinks.name: Zombie #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Almond
  • 1 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except 151 proof rum) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Float the 151 proof rum on top, add a cherry (if desired), and serve.

drinks.name: Afterglow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Grenadine
  • 4 parts Orange juice
  • 4 parts Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix. Serve over ice.

drinks.name: Alice Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Grenadine syrup
  • 1 cl Orange juice
  • 2 cl Pineapple juice
  • 4 cl Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well, strain into a large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Apple Karate
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups Apple juice (or cider)
  • 1 large Carrot, peeled and chopped
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Berry-Berry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Berries
  • 1 cup Milk
  • 1 tblsp Honey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Black & Blue Berries
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 cup Blueberries
  • 1/3 cup Blackberries
  • 1 cup Soda water
  • 2 tblsp Honey
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Bobby Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Orange juice
  • 1 cl Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar syrup
  • 6 cl Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bora Bora
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 cl Pineapple juice
  • 6 cl Passion fruit juice
  • 1 cl Lemon juice
  • 1 cl Grenadine syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

drinks.name: Cranberry Juice Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 lb Cranberries
  • 5 cups Water
  • Salt
  • 2-3 Orange slices
  • 1/2 cup Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Wash the cranberries and put them into a nonreactive saucepan with the water, a pinch of salt and if you wish, the orange slices. Cook over medium heat until all the berries burst -- about 10 minutes. Pour the fruit and liquid into a cheesecloth-lined sieve. Strain the juice to the saucepan, add the sugar and boil for two or three minutes. Taste and add more sugar if it is needed. Cool and chill the juice before serving.

drinks.name: End Wrench
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Tonic water
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice. Tastes remarkably like a screwdriver.

drinks.name: Grapefruit and Orange Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Orange juice
  • 6 cl Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and stir with ice in a mixing glass, strain off into a large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Grapefruit Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Grenadine syrup
  • 6 cl Grapefruit juice
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler, add grenadine syrup and grapefruit juice, top up with soda water. Stir a little and serve with a drinking straw.

drinks.name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 lb Brown sugar
  • 1/2 lb salted Butter
  • 1 tsp ground Nutmeg
  • 1 tsp ground Cinnamon
  • 1 tsp ground Cloves
  • 1 tsp ground white Cardamom
  • 1 tsp Vanilla extract
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients in a food processer or mixer and store in the fridge or freezer. To make a drink add a shot of good dark rum along with 1 or 2 tbl spoons of batter to a mug of very hot water. Serve in irish coffee cup.

drinks.name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 cup Brown sugar
  • 1/2 cup white Sugar
  • 1/2 lb Butter
  • 1 pint good quality Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients in a food processer or mixer and store in the fridge or freezer. To make a drink add a shot of good dark rum along with 1 or 2 tbl spoons of batter to a mug of very hot water. Serve in irish coffee cup.

drinks.name: Hot Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1 Lemon
  • 2 tblsp Maple syrup
  • Cayenne pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Squeeze the juice of the lemon into a 10-oz. glass. Add maple syrup and a dash of cayenne pepper. Fill with ice water. Stir. Drink.

drinks.name: Kanaan
drinks.ingredients:
• 15 cl Milk
  • 1 raw Egg
  • 2 tsp Honey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Prepare in a blender with a little ice, serve in a highball glass.

drinks.name: Lemon Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Orange juice
  • 6 cl Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir orange juice and lemon juice with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Lemon Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Egg yolk
  • 2 tsp Sugar syrup
  • 4 cl Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put several ice cubes in a shaker, add egg yolk, sugar syrup and lemon juice. Shake very well and strain into a highball glass. Serve with a drinking straw.

drinks.name: Lemon Squash
drinks.ingredients:
• 9 cl Lemon juice
  • 3 tsp Sugar syrup
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix lemon juice with sugar syrup in a highball glass, stir well and fill up with soda water. Serve with drinking straw.

drinks.name: Honey Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups Soda water (or plain water)
  • 1/2 cup Lemon juice
  • 2 tblsp Honey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Lucky Driver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Coconut liqueur (or coconut concentrate)
  • 2 cl Lemon juice
  • 5 cl Pineapple juice
  • 5 cl Grapefruit juice
  • 5 cl Orange juice
  • 15 cl Sugar syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass with 2-3 ice cubes. Garnish with one orange slice, and one lemon slice. Use only fresh squeezed juice for best result!

drinks.name: Mint Julep #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 medium-size Mint leaves
  • 1.5 tblsp Sugar syrup
  • 1.5 oz Bourbon
  • 1/4 tsp Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: In electric blender, blend on high for a few seconds, until leaves are reduced. Strain into silver tumbler packed with shaved ice, add more Bourbon to saturate the ice, garnish with a sprig of mint.

drinks.name: Grenadine Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Grenadine
  • 4 parts Orange juice
  • 4 parts Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: The proportions are approximate, vary according to taste. Mix together, serve with lots of ice.

drinks.name: Orangatang
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Orange juice
  • 1 cup Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Orange Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Lemon juice
  • 6 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir lemon juice and orange juice in a mixing glass, strain into a large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Orange Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 9 cl Orange juice
  • 2 tsp Sugar syrup
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put several ice cubes in a large tumbler, add sugar syrup and orange juice, top up with ginger ale. Stir.

drinks.name: Orange Smile
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Egg
  • 2 tsp Grenadine syrup
  • 10 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake egg, grenadine syrup, orange juice, and several ice cubes well. Strain into a small tumbler, serve with a drinking straw.

drinks.name: Orange Squash
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Lemon juice
  • 10 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put one ice cube in a large tumbler, add lemon juice and orange juice. Stir well. Serve sugar and cold water on the side, so the guest can modify the taste, and a drinking straw and a spoon.

drinks.name: Orange Velvet
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Cream
  • 2 cl Pineapple juice
  • 5 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake cream, pineapple juice and orange juice with some ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Orangeade
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Lemon juice
  • 15 cl Orange juice
  • 2-3 cl Sugar syrup
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or highball glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well. Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw.

drinks.name: Orgeat Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Lemon juice
  • 5 cl Orgeat syrup (Almond milk syrup)
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix lemon juice and orgeat syrup in a tumbler with 2-3 small ice cubes. Fill up with soda water and stir.

drinks.name: Parisette
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp Grenadine syrup
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour grenadine syrup over some ice cubes in a large tumbler. Stir. Fill up with cold milk. Stir again, serve with a drinking straw.

drinks.name: Pineapple Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Orange juice
  • 15 cl Pineapple juice
  • 3 cl Sugar syrup
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix juice and sugar syrup in a large tumbler with several ice cubes. Stir well and top up with cold Soda Water. Serve with a drinking straw.

drinks.name: Pineapple Power
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 can Pineapple, slices with juice
  • 2 cups Water
  • 1 tblsp Honey
  • 1/4 tsp Ginger
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Pussy Foot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Grenadine syrup
  • 4 cl Pineapple juice
  • 4 cl Orange juice
  • 4 cl Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or blend briefly, strain into a highball glass. Garnish with fresh fruit, cherry, and a drinking straw.

drinks.name: Rail Splitter
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 tsp Sugar syrup
  • Lemon juice
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Rose de Mai Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Pineapple juice
  • 1-2 tsp Raspberry syrup
  • 6-7 cl Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake very well pineapple juice, raspberry fruit-syrup and cream with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: St. Clement's
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part fresh Orange juice
  • 1 part Bitter lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice, serve. 'Oranges and lemons say the bells of St. Clement's'

drinks.name: Rhubarb Syrup
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 lb Rhubarb
  • 1 cup Water
  • 2 cups Sugar
  • 2 tblsp Rosewater
drinks.mixinginstructions: Remove strings from rhubarb, wash, and cut into 1/2' pieces. Wrap rhubarb in cheesecloth and tie shut. Bring sugar and water to boil. Put cheesecloth in the syrup and simmer over medium heat for 30 minutes or until it thickens. Remove cheesecloth, squeeze it to get the juice out. Pour syrup into a clean, dry bottle and cork tightly. To mix add 1 part syrup to 3 parts water and add 2 ice cubes per person. Serve well chilled.

drinks.name: Shirley Temple
drinks.ingredients:
• 20 cl Ginger ale
  • 3 cl Grenadine syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in a highball glass. Add ginger ale over ice and sprinkle grenadine syrup over it. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

drinks.name: Tomato Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 tsp Worcestershire sauce
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 10 cl Tomato juice
  • Salt
  • Black pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir in a mixing glass Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, tomato juice, and a little salt and pepper over ice cubes. Strain off into a large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Grape Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 cl cold Milk
  • 5 cl red Grape juice
  • 1 Egg yolk
  • 2 tsp Raspberry syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or blend very well, serve icecold in a burgundy glass. If you wish to garnish, use grapes.

drinks.name: Rail Splitter
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 tsp Sugar syrup
  • Lemon juice
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Rose de Mai Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Pineapple juice
  • 1-2 tsp Raspberry syrup
  • 6-7 cl Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake very well pineapple juice, raspberry fruit-syrup and cream with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: St. Clement's
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part fresh Orange juice
  • 1 part Bitter lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice, serve. 'Oranges and lemons say the bells of St. Clement's'

drinks.name: Rhubarb Syrup
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 lb Rhubarb
  • 1 cup Water
  • 2 cups Sugar
  • 2 tblsp Rosewater
drinks.mixinginstructions: Remove strings from rhubarb, wash, and cut into 1/2' pieces. Wrap rhubarb in cheesecloth and tie shut. Bring sugar and water to boil. Put cheesecloth in the syrup and simmer over medium heat for 30 minutes or until it thickens. Remove cheesecloth, squeeze it to get the juice out. Pour syrup into a clean, dry bottle and cork tightly. To mix add 1 part syrup to 3 parts water and add 2 ice cubes per person. Serve well chilled.

drinks.name: Shirley Temple
drinks.ingredients:
• 20 cl Ginger ale
  • 3 cl Grenadine syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in a highball glass. Add ginger ale over ice and sprinkle grenadine syrup over it. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

drinks.name: Tomato Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 tsp Worcestershire sauce
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 10 cl Tomato juice
  • Salt
  • Black pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir in a mixing glass Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, tomato juice, and a little salt and pepper over ice cubes. Strain off into a large cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Grape Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 cl cold Milk
  • 5 cl red Grape juice
  • 1 Egg yolk
  • 2 tsp Raspberry syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or blend very well, serve icecold in a burgundy glass. If you wish to garnish, use grapes.

drinks.name: Banana Strawberry Shake Daiquiri-type
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 lb frozen Strawberries
  • 1 frozen Banana
  • 2 cups fresh Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

drinks.name: Cool Cow
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups Milk
  • 1/2 tsp Almond flavoring / extract
  • 4 tsp Honey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Crazy Cow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Apple juice
  • 1 cup Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Dutch Treat
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups Milk
  • 2 tblsp carob or Cocoa powder
  • 1/2 tsp Vanilla extract
  • 2 tblsp Honey
  • 1/2 tsp Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Earth Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 cup Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 cup crushed Pineapple
  • 1 large Carrot, peeled and chopped
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Egg Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 tblsp Chocolate syrup
  • 6 oz whole Milk
  • 6 oz Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix syrup and milk in a fountain glass. Add soda water, serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Fruit Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 can frozen Apple juice concentrate
  • 1 cup Strawberries, sliced
  • 2 tblsp Sugar
  • 1 Lemon
  • 1 Apple
  • 1 L Soda water
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Toss strawberries with sugar, and let sit overnight in refrigerator. Cut lemon, reserve two slices. Juice the rest. Mix together the lemon juice, strawberries, apple juice, and soda water. Add slices of lemon (decor, really). In glasses, put ice cubes, and a slice of apple. Pour drink in, and serve.

drinks.name: Fruit Flip-Flop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Yoghurt
  • 1 cup Fruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Fruit Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup fruit Yoghurt
  • 1 Banana
  • 4 oz frozen Orange juice
  • 1/2 piece textural Fruit (apple, pear, pineapple)
  • 6 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend til smooth.

drinks.name: Grapple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Grape juice
  • 1 cup Apple cider (or apple juice)
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1/4 tsp Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Great Grapes
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Grape juice
  • 1 cup Soda water
  • 1 tblsp Honey
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

drinks.name: Hot Cider
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-2 Orange
  • A few whole Cloves
  • Apple cider
  • Cinnamon sticks
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stud the oranges with cloves. (Push the pointy end into them until the flower part is flush with the peel.) I use about 10 per orange. You may want to peel the top layer of skin off the orange if you don't want to ingest the dyes they put on them to make them orange. Put the cider into a large saucepan, and add the oranges and some cinnamon sticks (one or two will do). Heat for hours (you can just leave it on all day for a party). It gets better with age. Just pour in more cider when it starts getting low.

drinks.name: Hot Mulled Cider #1
drinks.ingredients:
• Apple cider
  • 1-2 Orange, washed
  • whole Cloves
  • Cinnamon sticks
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dump cider, cinnamon sticks and a couple of teaspoons of nutmeg into a pot over very low heat. Slice oranges (after washing them well!!), and stick whole cloves into the rind, then float in cider as it warms. That's it. Drink when it gets warm. You can dump more cider into it up to a point when the spices get old - then just start again with a new set of spices, and a new orange.

drinks.name: Hot Spiced Cider #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 gal good Apple cider
  • 1 Allspice
  • 1 Clove
  • 1 Cinnamon stick
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add allspice, clove and cinnamon stick to the apple cider and let simmer for 1 hour (or longer). This may not look like much spice, but it really does make a pleasantly spicey cider.

drinks.name: Jungle Juice #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Banana, broken into chunks
  • 2 cups Orange juice
  • 1 dash Ginger
