drinks.mixinginstructions: Allow strawberries to thaw for a couple of hours in fridge. Prepare lemonade and chill. Combine all just before serving and mix until sherbet is dissolved. Place ice ring in to keep punch cold.

drinks.name: Strawberry Punch #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 gal Sherbet, strawberry
  • 2 L 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the sherbet in a bowl and pour the 7-up over the sherbet. Stir until the sherbet is melted. This makes a pretty pink punch. You can use diet soda for a punch that is less sweet.

drinks.name: Sunny Holiday Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 46 oz chilled Pineapple juice
  • 28 oz Club soda (or mineral water), chilled
  • 6 oz frozen Orange juice concentrate, thawed
  • 1 Lemon or lime, thinly sliced
  • 2 cups Berries, fresh or frozen
  • 1 bottle Champagne (or 7-Up), chilled
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

drinks.name: Syllabub
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups White wine
  • 3 cups Milk
  • 5 tblsp grated Lemon peel (rind)
  • 2 cups Light cream
  • 1/3 cup Lemon juice
  • 4 Egg whites
  • 1-1/2 cup Sugar
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine wine, lemon rind, and juice. Stir in 1 cup of the sugar and let stand until sugar dissolves. Combine milk and cream, add wine mixture, and beat with a rotary beater until frothy. Beat egg whites until stiff, add remaining 1/2 cup sugar, a little at a time, beating constantly until whites stand in peaks. Pour wine mixture into punch bowl, top with puffs of egg white, and sprinkle whites with nutmeg.

drinks.name: Tea Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts cold aromatic Tea
  • 2 parts Apple juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and serve with ice.

drinks.name: Tom and Jerry Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 separated Egg
  • 3 tblsp Powdered sugar
  • 1/2 tsp ground Allspice
  • 1/2 tsp ground Cinnamon
  • 1/2 tsp ground Cloves
  • Brandy
  • Dark rum
  • Hot Coffee (or water or milk)
  • Grated Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Beat egg whites to a stiff froth. Separately beat egg yolks until light in color, gradually add the powdered sugar and spices. Fold yolk mixture into whites. Divide mixture between four 8 oz. mugs. Add 1/2 shot brandy and 1 shot rum to each mug, fill with hot beverage. Stir well and top with nutmeg.

drinks.name: Truck Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 L Bourbon
  • 1 fifth Apple schnapps
  • 1/2 fifth Cinnamon schnapps
  • 2 L Squirt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Give yourself a break, use ice.

drinks.name: Wassail #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 gal Apple juice (or cider)
  • 2 Orange
  • 2 Lemon
  • 1 Lime
  • 1 tblsp Cloves
  • 1 tblsp Allspice
  • 2 sticks Cinnamon
  • 1 qt Water
  • 1 cup Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Heat the water to boiling. Cut the lemons and oranges (and lime if using) in half and squeeze the juice into a separate bowl to save, throw the skins and pulp into the boiling water. Add spices and simmer for one hour. Remove the cinnamon sticks and a few cloves and allspice and save to one side. Using a slotted spoon or strainer remove the citrus peels and pulp and the remaining spices. Return the cinnamon sticks and saved spices to the water. Add the apple juice or cider and return to heat. When boiling remove from heat and add the citrus juice and sugar. Simmer very lightly for another 10 minutes and serve. Delicious!

drinks.name: Wassail #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 gal Apple cider
  • 8 sticks Cinnamon
  • 1 Lemon, washed and sliced
  • 1 Orange, washed and sliced
  • 1 tblsp whole Cloves
  • 1 tblsp Allspice
  • 1 gal White wine
  • 2 cups Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Simmer the nonalcoholic ingredients together for 1-2 hours, then add the wine and rum about 10 minutes before serving (hot).

drinks.name: Wine Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz white or Red wine, with or without alcohol
  • 5 oz Lemon-lime soda
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix wine and soft drink. Pour into glass. Add ice.

drinks.name: Wine Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Red wine
  • 2 Lemon, sliced
  • 1 cup Orange juice
  • 3 Orange, sliced
  • 1 cup Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all of the ingredients and pour over a block of ice.

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice, dip rim in salt. Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

drinks.name: Polarbear #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Lime juice
  • 2 parts 7-Up (or sprite)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take one part vodka into the glass, pour one part lime in the same glass. Then you take two parts of 7-up or sprite. Mix this together with a straw or something like that. Ice is recommended.

drinks.name: Izayoi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Lemon liqueur
  • 2/3 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1/6 oz Vodka
  • 1/6 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/6 oz Grenadine syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve. (Name mean: 16th moon in Japanese)

drinks.name: Bruce's Puce
drinks.ingredients:
• Grenadine
  • Kahlua
  • Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a regular-sized shot glass, layer, with a spoon or cherry, the grenadine , the Kahlua , then the Bailey's Irish cream in equal portions. It goes down really smooth ,and you don't even need a chaser. It tastes just like chocolate milk.(Really!)

drinks.name: Brave Bull Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Tabasco into bottom of shot glass and fill with tequila.

drinks.name: Fahrenheit 5000
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Firewater
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Peppar
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Cover bottom of shot glass with Tabasco Sauce and then fill with half Firewater and half Absolut Peppar.

drinks.name: Popped cherry
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Cherry liqueur
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice
  • 4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!

drinks.name: Gorilla Snot #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Gill Port
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Measure the port into a brandy glass, the pour the Bailey's in. As the Bailey's enters the port it will solidify, forming a glob.

drinks.name: The Incredible Hulk
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 tblsp Sugar
  • 2 L Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 2 oz of Captain Morgan to glass. Add sugar. Add Mountain Dew till mix turns green.

drinks.name: Alabama Riot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 8 oz Fruit punch
  • 1 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour fruit punch and ice into a glass, add southern comfort, peppermint schnapps and vodka. Stir. Finish with lime juice.

drinks.name: Reggae Ambassador
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Absolut Citron
  • 2 parts Pineapple-orange-banana juice (Dole)
  • Sugar
  • Strawberries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a blender 1/2 full (or 1/2 empty) with ice. Fill 1/4 of the blender with vodka. Fill 1/2 with pine-orange-banana fruit juice. Fill the rest with fresh strawberries, and about 4 tsp. sugar. Blend, serve with an orange slice.

drinks.name: Mind Eraser
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a rocks glass pour vodka, the Kahlua and then the tonic water. Serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Pamela
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • Tonic water
  • Cucumber slices
drinks.mixinginstructions: Simply make a standard vodka and tonic and garnish liberally with sliced cucumbers. sounds funny, but makes a great hot weather drink.

drinks.name: Atomic Lokade
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Lemonade
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • Sugar
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker, place lemonade, vodka, blue Curacao, and triple sec together. Shake with ice and strain into glass. Add sugar to taste

drinks.name: Mexican Mouthwash
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 3/4 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into shaker chill, and gently swirl together.

drinks.name: Pecker Head
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Southern Comfort
  • 1/3 Amaretto
  • 1/3 Pineapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a strainer add all three ingredients. Fill half full of ice. Shake well. Strain into a double shot glass.

drinks.name: Colorado Bulldog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • Milk
  • 1 splash Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker mix Vodka, Kahlua, and milk. Pour into a rocks glass and add a splash of Coca-Cola

drinks.name: Carribean pineapple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Malibu rum
  • 3 parts Pineapple juice
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a lowball glass and serve over ice

drinks.name: Bullfrog
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 shots Vodka
  • 1 qt Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well (preferably in a closed container). Stir (preferably with a spoon in an opened container)

drinks.name: Cucaracha
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 Tequila
  • 1/3 Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a low glass put Tequila first, than Kahlua. Flame the coktail. Two people had to drink in the same glass with two plastic-pipe. The goal is to drink before the plastic-pipe melt down.

drinks.name: Hillinator
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 oz Firewater
  • 8 oz Mountain Dew
  • 4 tblsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Captain Morgan, Mountain Dew, and sugar in one class. Pour the fire water into a shot glass. Take the shot, then follow it with the mixed drink. Make sure to drink the mixed drink quickly

drinks.name: Tequila Mockingbird
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill tall rocks glass or tumbler with ice. Add tequila and triple sec, followed by O.J. and cranberry. Add blue curacao. DO NOT MIX. Garnish with lemon or cherry if desired.

drinks.name: Green Lantern
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/3 Orange juice (Real)
  • 1/3 7-Up (Sprite)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all together in order, shake once and pour into glass.

drinks.name: Irish Coffee #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Coffee
  • 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 oz Half-and-half
  • 1 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix cofee and chilled Irish Cream and half & half. Add sugar and stir. Serve hot in an Irish coffee cup.

drinks.name: B-52 #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Kahlua
  • 1/3 shot Amaretto
  • 1/3 shot Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the Kahlua, Amaretto, and Irish Cream into a shot glass in that order. After drinking, notice the Vapor Trails.

drinks.name: Wahoo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot 151 proof rum
  • 1 shot Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Over ice add 151 and amaretto. Top off with pineapple juice.

drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Ice 101
  • 1 part Firewater
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal proprtions of each in one shot glass.

drinks.name: Chocolate Paradise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 3 oz Chocolate milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Simply pour over ice into a tall glass.

drinks.name: Creamy punani
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Kahlua
  • 3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 oz Amaretto
  • Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill blender about 3/4 with ice-cream (not solid). Add 2 oz of amaretto and kahlua and 3 oz of bailey's. Blend. Drink.

drinks.name: The Shearer Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/5 Bacardi Limon
  • Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix fifth of a gallon of bacardi to a splash of cranberry juice Enjoy!

drinks.name: Amy's Tattoo
drinks.ingredients:
• 0.5 oz Dark rum
  • 0.5 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all in tall glass.

drinks.name: Malibu juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Malibu rum
  • Pineapple-orange-banana juice (Dole)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put 3 shots of the rum in a glass, fill the rest of the cup with the juice.

drinks.name: Bailey's Banana Colada (bbc)
drinks.ingredients:
• Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 Banana
  • Banana liqueur
  • Ice
  • Pina colada mix
  • Dark rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put banana and liquer into blender until it is a thick paste then add bailey's to taste and pina colada mix and rum. Blend well then add ice blend untill smooth and enjoy!

drinks.name: Russian Roulette
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Sambuca
  • Orange slices
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill two or more shooter 1 oz. shooter glasses with the kahlua and vodka and place a slice of orange on the top of each glass. Put the Sambuca in a wine glass and light. Pour the lit Sambuca on the shooters below and let burn for a short time in front of your bedazzled guests. Blow out the fire and instruct the drinkers of the shooters to drink out of the glass first and chew the Sambuca-soaked orange slice last.

drinks.name: Diesel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint Lager
  • 1/2 pint Cider
  • 1 dash Blackcurrant cordial
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the lager first then add the blackcurrant cordial. Top up with the cider. The colour sholud be very dark approaching the colour of Guiness.

drinks.name: Reptile
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Early Times straight Kentucky Whiskey
  • 1 part Mountain Dew
  • 1 1/2 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make sure all ingredients are chilled. Add in order: ET, OJ, Dew. Stir lightly. Like most OJ drinks, the alcohol is hard to taste. A padded bar is recomended.

drinks.name: Dogg piss
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Vodka
  • 12 oz Beer
  • 4 oz Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dump the ingredients into a container and stir it. It's very simple and very delicious.

drinks.name: Harsh
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingrediants and serve

drinks.name: Yo mama cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Orange vodka (Stoli)
  • Soda water
  • 1 splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Vodka in highball over ice, add soda, top of with splash of OJ (just a splash)

drinks.name: La Mamila
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 L Tequila arenitas (specially)
  • 5 Caguamas tecate Beer
  • 4 Lemon
  • 32 oz Clamato juice
  • 2 dashes Tabasco sauce
  • 2 pinches Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: First empty the beers then mix the lemons, tabasco and the salt then empty the tequila and then the clamato, swirl everytihng. This drinking by four people is a baby boom 'Try it if you are not a baby'.

drinks.name: Fruit Tingle
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Blue Curacao
  • 30 ml Raspberry cordial
  • Lemonade
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Curacao over ice in a tumbler. Add Raspberry cordial and Lemonade at the same time so that the combined effect mixes the drink. Consume!!! The drink is meant to taste like the lollies called Fruit Tingles, and it succeeds very well in this..

drinks.name: Blue iguana
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 12 oz Tang
  • 1/2 oz Vodka,everclear,rum,757
drinks.mixinginstructions: Bend smooth. Serve in a frozen mug.

drinks.name: Red Death #2
drinks.ingredients:
• Absolut Vodka
  • Southern Comfort
  • Amaretto
  • Sloe gin
  • Triple sec
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all the ingedients in mixing glass with ice. Shake and strain into shot glass(es).

drinks.name: Is Paris Burning
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Cognac
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stirred, not shaken. Rocks acceptable. Fresh raspberry optional.

drinks.name: Motor Oil
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Jager into triple shot glass. Add Perpermint schnaups then Goldshlager. Top with Malibu.

drinks.name: Vulcan Mind Meld
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Ouzo
  • 1 part 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into glass (usually a double shot glass.) Drink quickly.

drinks.name: Jack & Coke
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 10 oz Coca-Cola
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour jack daniels into large glass filled with ice. Pour Coca-Cola into glass. Stir lightly.

drinks.name: Seven and Seven
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Seagram 7
  • 6 oz 7-Up
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put a few cubes of ice inside glass. Pour shot of Seagram 7 into the glass, then Pour 7-UP into glass. Shake or stir briskly.

drinks.name: Cement Mixer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 jigger Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take shot of Bailey's. With Bailey's in your mouth take shot of lime juice. Mix rapidly in mouth by shaking head vigorously. Swallow before it congeals totally.

drinks.name: Reptile (Orginal)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Early Times straight Kentucky Whiskey
  • 1 1/2 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Mountain Dew
  • crushed Grapes
drinks.mixinginstructions: This is the drink the Reptile is based on, created by Joe Schaftall. Shake indredents with cruched ice untill outside of shaker is cold enough to have water droplets on the outside. Strain into highball glass.

drinks.name: Mona-Lisa
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Absolut Vodka
  • 1 part Lemon soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients and poor into a highball glass. Dance while drinking to the song 'Mona-Lisa' with Rob'n'Raz. Oh! boy will you get drunk!

drinks.name: Afternoon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Kahlua
  • 1 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 1/2 Frangelico
  • 4 cl hot Coffee
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build into a suiting glass, with no ice. Cream on top if wanted. Served directly.

drinks.name: Blow Job #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Amaretto
  • Whipping cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Amaretto into shot glass, top with whip cream. Drink with hands behind back in one smooth motion

drinks.name: Prairie Fire #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz 151 proof rum
  • Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot class with rum, Float Tabasco Sauce on top, Drink

drinks.name: Gray Hound
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Drambuie
  • 1 part Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put a small measure of each ingredient into a shot glass, not completely filling it. Lick the palm of your hand and ignite the drink. Immediately put your hand over the glass. The flames will go out and there will be a vacuum holding the glass to your hand. Take the glass and hand up to your mouth. Take off your hand and deeply inhale the fumes and then knock the drink back.

drinks.name: Nutty Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Frangelico
  • 1 part Coffee liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve well mixed over ice. Yo can add 1 part milk if desired.

drinks.name: Power screwdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • Orange juice
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make a plain old screwdriver, but add Coca-Cola.

drinks.name: Jolly Jumper
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Whisky
  • 4 cl Vodka
  • 4 cl Gin
  • 4 cl Passoa
  • Orange juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just put it together, fill with orange juice, add ice and drink it.

drinks.name: Mudslide #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with cracked ice in a shaker. Serve in a chilled highball glass

drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 dash Coca-Cola
  • Twist of Lemon peel (or lime)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all contents in a highball glass and sitr gently. Add dash of Coca-Cola for the coloring and garnish with lemon or lime twist.

drinks.name: Midori Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• Midori melon liqueur
  • Orange juice
  • Grenadine syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix one part of Midori (or equivalent melon liqueor) with one part of Orange Juice. Add a slash of Granadine Syrup.

drinks.name: Long Island Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 3 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 3 oz Sour mix
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake after poured, add a cherry and slice of orange

drinks.name: Stevie Ray Vaughn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 5 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients over ice. Strain into shot glasses.

drinks.name: Romulan Ale
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz White rum
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • Sprite (or 7-Up)
  • 6 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together. Pour into a tall, narrow glass. Add a grain of salt.

drinks.name: Malibu Bay Breeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Kool-Aid Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 shot Sloe gin
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into a large glass with ice and stir. Add a little cranberry juice to taste.

drinks.name: National Aquarium
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • 1 splash Lemon-lime soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice. Shake well. Serve on the rocks.

drinks.name: Damned if you do
drinks.ingredients:
• 0.75 oz Whiskey (Black Velvet recommended)
  • 0.25 oz Hot Damn
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into shot glass. Put in mouth. Repeat as deemed necessary.

drinks.name: Long vodka
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Vodka
  • 1/2 Lime
  • 4 dashes Angostura bitters
  • 1 dl Schweppes Tonic water
  • 4 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and Angostura, coating the inside of the glass. Por the vodka onto this, add 1 slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and voila you have a Long Vodka

drinks.name: Quick F**K
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first. Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream

drinks.name: Owen's Grandmother's Revenge
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Whiskey
  • 12 oz Beer
  • 12 oz frozen Lemonade concentrate
  • 1 cup crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients and mix in blender.

drinks.name: Flaming Dr. Pepper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Dr. Pepper
  • 1 oz Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Amaretto, Bacardi, and vodka. Mix in the Dr. Pepper and beer

drinks.name: New York Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
  • 2 oz sweetened Lemon juice
  • 1 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Lemon and sugar the rim. Stir and Strain.

drinks.name: Caipirissima
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 Lime
  • 2 tblsp Sugar
  • 2-3 oz White rum
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Same as Caipirinha but instead of cachaca you add WHITE RUM. It's great!!!!!!!!

drinks.name: Captain Do
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 20 oz Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put shot in then add Soda

drinks.name: Southampton Slam
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/2 oz Anisette
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve in rocks glass - no ice - Pour both liquors, fill with club soda, roll once Serve with straw

drinks.name: Piscola
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Pisco
  • Coca-Cola
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: It's basiclly the same as the Cuba Libre but instead of Rum it has Pisco. You can use not only Coca-Cola, instead you can add almost any kind of other soda drinks (sprite, fanta, etc.)

drinks.name: Pisco Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Pisco
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1-2 tblsp Sugar
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Mogul Masher
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 package Cocoa powder
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Rumple Minze
  • 8 oz hot Water
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix hot chocolate according to instructions in a 12 oz. glass or larger and add liquors...top with whipped cream...beware!!!!! These sneak up on you!!!!

drinks.name: Prairie Fire #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gold tequila
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass and serve.

drinks.name: Chocolate Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice then pour into martini glass

drinks.name: Big Red
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass

drinks.name: Freight Train
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass

drinks.name: Sicilian Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass Take as a beer chaser when arriving late at the bar

drinks.name: Mister Wu
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Bourbon
  • 3 oz Lemon-lime soda
  • 1 dash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour two ounces of whiskey and ounce of vodka on ice into a regular glass. Add three ounces of lemon-lime soda and a dash of orange juice. Serve and enjoy

drinks.name: Snakebite #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Yukon Jack liqueur
  • 1 dash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour two ounces of Yukon Jack over ice; add a dash of lime juice; enjoy

drinks.name: The Shanaynay
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 12 oz Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the water and rum, add powdered lemonade mix to taste. Stir and enjoy!

drinks.name: The Saint Lawrence
drinks.ingredients:
• 16 oz Genny 12 horse Ale
  • 16 oz Mad Dog 20/20 (any flavor)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir, pour into plastic cup and chug!!!!

drinks.name: Patmcpacke
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Kool-Aid
drinks.mixinginstructions: Throw em all together and stir

drinks.name: Superb Cosmopolitan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Vodka (Ketel One)
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1/4 oz fresh Lime juice
  • 4 splashes Cranberry juice
  • Float 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir the first four ingredients with ice. Strain into a frosted cocktail glass. Float Chambord on top and add a twist of lemon.

drinks.name: H-Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Beer
  • 6 oz Water
  • 1/8 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dump out six ounces of beer, add vodka, fill up the rest of the beer can with water, mix and let settle

drinks.name: Bearded Boy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/16 oz Grain alcohol
  • 1 oz Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients and stir for 5 minutes, allowing alcohol to settle.

drinks.name: Instant Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 3 oz Everclear
  • 3 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 5 oz Water
  • 1 dash Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put in all alcohol first and water last, then salt

drinks.name: Flaming Huscroft
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blackened Voodoo Beer
  • 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/4 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/4 oz Everclear
  • 1/2 oz Rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 4 oz Soda water
  • 1 oz Mountain Dew
  • 24 oz Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Throw all in a glass, light it: When flame goes down, chug but make sure you have a chaser, or your in trouble.

drinks.name: Blood Clot #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 shot Grenadine
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Drop shot glass of s.c. into lowball glass mixed with 7-UP and grenadine. Slam it!!!

drinks.name: Eat Hot Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz 151 proof rum
  • 10 drops Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a double shot glass.

drinks.name: Tuve Nightmare
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 L White wine and/or cider
  • 3 L Ginger ale
  • 1.5 L Sprite, 7-UP etc
  • 0.5 L Pisang Ambon
  • 0.75-1.5 L Vodka
  • Lots of Cucumber, sliced
  • Lime, sliced
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Vodka with the cider or the wine. Drop the fruit from a height of at least 3 feet. Pour the sprite and the Ginger Ale with the rest Carefully pour the Pisang Ambon into the punch. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Moscow Mule
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Lime juice
  • 8 oz Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a highball glass with ice and enjoy.

drinks.name: Oatmeal Cookie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Goldschlager (or Hotdam)
  • 1 jigger Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 jigger Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: With ice, shake/stir and serve in shot glasses. The original drink called for the Goldslager but I actually like it with HotDam better..

drinks.name: Cowboy Cocksucker
drinks.ingredients:
• Butterscotch schnapps
  • Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend in shot glass. Serve.

drinks.name: Liquid Cocaine #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 shot Grand Marnier
  • 1/4 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1/4 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/4 shot Amaretto
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine 4 alchohols and pineapple juice in cocktail mixer with ice. Shake well. Strain into shot glass. Enjoy. It'll get you flyin'!

drinks.name: Kish Wacker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the ingredients in the blender with ice. Tastes like a chocolate shake. *Can add Bailey's to taste.

drinks.name: Shimmers
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Aquavit, Simer's
  • 4 cl St. Hallvard
drinks.mixinginstructions: Served on the rocks. Pour the St. Hallvard first, then the aquavit. Add a lemon twist.

drinks.name: Sip and go naked
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Gin
  • 12 oz Lemonade concentrate
  • 24 oz Beer
  • 24 oz Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingrediants together in a pitcher. Tastes and smells non-alcoholic, but packs a wallop.

drinks.name: The Fuzzy Pissbomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Peachtree schnapps
  • 3 shots Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all inggredients in rocks glass(with silver polka dots on it if ya got one) Stir. Watch it fizz for thirty seconds Drink it fast

drinks.name: Piggelin #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Gin
  • 3 cl Midori melon liqueur (or Pisang Ambon)
  • 7-Up (or Sprite)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it all in a glass 1/4 full of ice...

drinks.name: Piggelin #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka
  • 3 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • 'Mer' non carbonated Orange softdrink
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it in a glass 1/4 full of ice...

drinks.name: Wobbler
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Kurant
  • Grape juice
  • Schweppes Russchian
  • Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka in a glass 1/4-full off ice. Fill 2/3's of the glass with grape juice. Fill it up with the russian water. Ad just a little of grenadine.

drinks.name: South Bank
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part White rum
  • 1 part Gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the spirits with ice and strain into a Highball. Fill with Grape Tonic and stir gently. Serve with a Lemon Slice on the Rim and a Straw. If you find the Grape Tonic too sweet, add a splash or two of Lemon Juice or Sour Mix. A Sour Bank is made in an Old Fashioned with two ice cubes and Grape Fruit Juice instead. A Southern Bank is a South Bank which has been added 1 part Southern Comfort.

drinks.name: Dreamsicle #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3 1/2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a lowball glass combine the two and stir.

drinks.name: Midori Sour Ultra
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3/4 oz freshly squeezed Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 2 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 tblsp Maraschino cherry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in boston shaker with cracked ice. In a highball glass or champagne flute (optional), fill glass three quarters full with ice. Pour one tablespoon of cherry juice in glass before pouring in mixed ingredients. Garnish with two maraschino cherries and lemon wedge. Drink through a straw.

drinks.name: Black & Tan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bass pale Ale
  • 1 part Guinness stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill pint glass half full with Bass. Next pour Guiness over a spoon slowly until glass is full. If done correctly the Guiness will stay on top and the Bass on bottom hence the name Black & Tan.

drinks.name: Peltikatto
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Koskenkorva Vodka
  • 2 cl Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Squeeze juice from a fresh lemon. Mix with Koskenkorva.

drinks.name: Maria's Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Southern Comfort
  • 1 cl Safari
  • 0.5 cl Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a drinkmixer with ice cubes. Pour in a highball glass and fill up with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Trial of the Century
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Santa Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Grenadine
  • 1/3 Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/3 Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Taste like a candycane layer these in the order listed to get a red green and white(clear) shot.

drinks.name: Go Girl!
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 cup Club soda
  • 2 tblsp Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it all together on ice, what else?

drinks.name: Donnington Brainstorm
drinks.ingredients:
• 500 ml Blue label Smirnoff Vodka
  • 500 ml Red Label Thunderbird
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix well the Thunderbird with the Vodka and pour into an empty litre coke/lemonade bottle. The exact ratio of vodka:thunderbird can be altered to the creator's taste. Fridge for at least 12 hours. Donnington Brainstorm is best at temperatures between 2-4 degrees centigrade. If the drink is too cold it will tend to be too bitter; if it is too warm, it will tend to be too sweet. At just the right temperature, it should be light, refreshing, slightly peary and the alcohol taste minimal. Drink (with friends) VERY CAREFULLY.....

drinks.name: Green Hell
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz green Kool-Aid
  • 1 shot Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both into glass and keep away from open flames!!

drinks.name: Alexandra
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Tia maria
  • 1/4 Cream
  • 1/4 Rum
  • 1/4 Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a shaker, add some ice and shake very well

drinks.name: Gingerbread Man
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Kahlua
  • 1/3 Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in sequence.

drinks.name: Love Juice (LJ)
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 2 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Apple juice
  • 6 1/2 oz Squirt (or any other citrus soda)
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add rum, followed by other ingredients, mix well. Serve on the rocks with an orange slice in a Collins Glass (approx. 14 oz.).

drinks.name: Kevin's special blend
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rye whiskey (Crown Royal or Gibson's finest)
  • 1 1/2 tsp Iced tea mix
  • 12 oz cold Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put iced tea mix into glass and fill about half full of water.Add 2 ounces of rye, then fill remainder of glass with water.Stir.Add ice cubes.The colder this drink is...the better.

drinks.name: Pirate's Float
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1.5 oz Root beer schnapps
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in glass with ice. Add cola to taste. Serve on the rocks.

drinks.name: Flaming Dr. Pepper #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 shot Amaretto
  • 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 glass Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the shot glass about 3/4 full with Amaretto and top it off with enough 151 to make it burn. Put the shot glass in another glass and fill the new glass with beer (right up to the level of the shot glass). Light the Amaretto/151 and let it burn awhile. Blow it out (or leave it burning if you're brave) and slam it. Tastes just like Dr. Pepper.

drinks.name: Screaming Nazi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredents with ice and shake.

drinks.name: Captain Louie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1/2 shot Kahlua
  • 2 drops Vanilla extract
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in order: rum, drop, Kaula, drop

drinks.name: Horny Mohican
drinks.ingredients:
• 20 ml Banana liqueur
  • 20 ml Bailey's irish cream
  • 20 ml Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Free pour each ingredient into a test tube or shot glass

drinks.name: Bloody Caesar
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • Celery salt
  • 1 dash Worcestershire sauce
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
  • Clamato juice
  • Salt
  • Black pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rim tall glass with celery salt, fill with ice and ingredients. Garnish with a celery stick, straw, and lime.

drinks.name: Iron Butterfly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 shot Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka over ice, add kahlua and irish cream. Stir add 1 to 3 filbert nut(s).

drinks.name: B-52 #2
drinks.ingredients:
• Kahlua
  • Bailey's irish cream
  • Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer equal parts in the order given. This is the ONLY way to make a B-52

drinks.name: Cherry Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 3/4 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve as a shot or on the rocks.

drinks.name: Small Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve as a shot or on the rocks.

drinks.name: Toasted Almond
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake, strain into highball glass.

drinks.name: Chocolate Milk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Chocolate liqueur (Droste)
  • 1/2 shot Milk
  • 1 dash Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the milk in the bottom, pour the Liquer on top and add the dash of amaretto. Do not mix. SLAM IT!

drinks.name: Fu-Cha
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Taboo, gin or Tia Maria
  • 1 crate Hoopers Hooch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put in large container (fu-cha bottle) with ice and shake vigorously. Drink rapidly. Buckets on hand would be advisable.

drinks.name: B-53
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Kahlua
  • 1/3 shot Sambuca
  • 1/3 shot Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the Kahlua, Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glas in that order. Better than B-52

drinks.name: Strip and Go Naked
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 packages Beer
  • 12 oz Lemonade concentrate
  • 12 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a LARGE pitcher, pour in 3 cans of beer, then the vodka and lemonade, then the last 3 beers. Mix gently and pour into a tall glass over ice. It sounds horrible, but the beer taste is hidden. It tastes like lemonade!

drinks.name: Shark's tooth
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Dark rum
  • 0.25 oz Lime juice
  • 0.25 oz Lemon juice
  • 0.25 oz Grenadine
  • 1 splash Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rum, lemon juice, lime juice, and grenadine in a short collins glass. Shake or stir, then add splash of soda.

drinks.name: Brain Tumor
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • Bailey's irish cream
  • Grenadine
  • Cherry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour the peach schnapps into the shot glass, almost to the top. Slowly, and gently layer the Bailey's in on the side of the glass, to almost full. Add a touch of grenidine,down the middle and a touch of cherry brandy down the middle.

drinks.name: Spearmint Lifesaver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 2 cups Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix 'em, garnish with a slice of lime (optional).

drinks.name: Duck Fart
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Kahlua
  • 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3/4 oz Canadian whisky (Canadian Club)
drinks.mixinginstructions: layered- bottom to top Kahlua, Bailey's, Canadian Club

drinks.name: Chocolate Monk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Frangelico
  • 1/3 Kahlua
  • 1/3 Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shaken with ice.

drinks.name: Rum Runner by Charles
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz White rum
  • 1/4 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Blackberry brandy
  • Grenadine
  • Sweet and sour, mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients in a cocktail shaker, filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bob's Moscow Mule
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 8 oz Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Using a chilled cooper mug,fill with ice. Pour ingredients over ice. Garnish with sprig of fresh mint.

drinks.name: Caribbean Screwdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Obviously this is not a drink for a small glass. Shake with ice. Strain the mixture into a tall glass. Garnish with a cherry if you feel so inclined.

drinks.name: Chocolate Toasted Almond
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Kahlua (or any coffee liquour)
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 8 oz Milk (or milk & half-and-half)
  • 2 tblsp Chocolate syrup
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all together, serve in a Collins glass over ice.

drinks.name: Flaming D-
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • 1/2 shot Whiskey
  • 8 oz Beer
  • 1 dash Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Amaretto and Whiskey in a shot glass. Top shot with Everclear. Light shot on fire Drop in glass of beer Chug!!!

drinks.name: Yellow Bird
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 0.5 oz Galliano
  • 0.5 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all the alcoholic ingredients in a highball glass, Stir Sour mix in a mixer and fill the glass.

drinks.name: Dew-Driver
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka (cheaper the better)
  • Ice
  • Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice add Vodka and Mountain Dew...If drinking the Dew-Driver the way God intended (out of a Big Gulp cup) adjust ingredients appropriately...Remember to say 'I only had 2 drinks!' whern retching later in the evening.

drinks.name: D.O.A.
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Barenjager
  • 3/4 oz Rumple Minze
  • 3/4 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liqour in order listed and layer. Serve and shoot

drinks.name: Mount Red
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • Cranberry juice
  • Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ice tall glass, follow ingredients. Top off with cranberry juice. Garnish with lime.

drinks.name: Luxor Boom-Boom
drinks.ingredients:
• 35 cl Passoa
  • 35 cl Light rum
  • 35 cl Vodka
  • 20 cl Apricot brandy
  • 35 cl Creme de Banane
  • Orange juice (Jus d'Orange)
  • Apple juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a shaker and put in the alcoholic ingredients first with the ice. Fill up the space that's free for 1/3 up with apple juice and for 2/3 with jus d'orange. Shake it real good and enjoy the most popular cocktail of Luxor Plaza. (a disco in Deventer - the Netherlands)

drinks.name: Estonian Forest-fire
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz chilled Vodka (Absolut or Stoli)
  • 12 drops Tabasco sauce
  • 1 slice Kiwi (chaser)
drinks.mixinginstructions: you should never drink one of these.

drinks.name: Harvey Cowpuncher
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 4 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Same as Harvey Wallbanger. (Yes, it is MILK!! Believe it or not, it doesn't taste that bad) Say hello to Jan Henning, will you?

drinks.name: Kamel Drivare
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sambuca
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Sambuca into a shotglass, then layer the Bailey's over by pouring it over the back of a spoon.

drinks.name: Incredible Hulk #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Hpnotiq
  • 2 oz Cognac (Hennessy)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer over ice and stir for transformation.

drinks.name: Slacker's Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Root beer schnapps
  • 1 glass Root beer
  • 1 scoop Ice-cream on top
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 1 oz. vodka in a glass, then add 1 oz. of Root-beer snapes mix with Root-beer add one scoop of ice-cream at top of the glass.Enjoy.

drinks.name: Ragnar #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Kurant
  • Lime
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the liquor in a tall glass, add a few drops of lime. Fill up the glass with 7-up so it suits you.

drinks.name: Hangover
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Johnnie Walker
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the ingredients in a big glass and your done. Shake it don't stir.

drinks.name: Ha Ha Tonka
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: use 16 oz. cup, fill ice, pour in alcohol, then top with orange juice, for weaker, add more OJ.

drinks.name: Snake Bite (UK)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint Lager
  • 1/2 pint sweet or dry Cider
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass. Drink. Fall over.

drinks.name: Screaming Blue Messiah
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Puerto Rican Monkey Fuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/8 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Kahlua and Creme de Banana in a shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass. Float the 151 on top.

drinks.name: Bob Marley
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in a 2 oz shot glass or pony glass

drinks.name: Southern Pink Flamingo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a shaker half filled with ice. Strain into a pony glass

drinks.name: Booger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 drop Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: After the first 1/2 oz drop just a tiny bit of Bailey's on top.

drinks.name: Meister Mind Meld
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Coca-Cola
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 Ice cube
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Coca-Cola into a highball glass. Then add the Amaretto. Finish off with one ice cube so the carbination does not leave the beverage

drinks.name: Mint Russki, or Spearmint Ivan
drinks.ingredients:
• 2-3 shots frozen Vodka
  • 3-6 fresh Mint leaves
drinks.mixinginstructions: 1. Place 3 to 6 twisted or crushed fresh mint leaves into a medium sized cocktail glass 2. Add 2 to 3 shots of your favorite frozen vodka 3. Add ice if desired 4. Stir lightly

drinks.name: Brainteaser
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml white Sambuca
  • 30 ml Erin Cream
  • 5 ml Advocaat
drinks.mixinginstructions: layered erin first, then sambuca and then avocart(should sit in middle of other two. To drink: use a straw to suck up avocart then shot the rest and then suck fumes up through straw.

drinks.name: Cartwheel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tuaca
  • 1 oz Bitters
  • 1 slice Lime
  • Some Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour shot of Tuaca. Thoroughly drench the lime in bitters, then coat in powdered sugar. Drink shot, bite into lime, experience a veritable explosion of flavor.

drinks.name: Cough Medicine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 part Vodka (Skyy)
  • 1/3 part Southern Comfort
  • 1/3 part Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix as a shot.

drinks.name: Brain Hemmorage
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 tsp Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: This is a great drink to serve on Halloween. First, pour the peach schnapps. Then, slowly pour the Irish Cream. Do not mix! The Creme will clump together and settle at the bottom of the schnapps. It will have the appearance of an internal organ!! Pour the grenadine over the Creme for a completely disgusting looking, yet thoroughly tasty party drink!

drinks.name: Extraterrestrial
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Irish cream
  • 1 jigger Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 jigger Stoli Vodka
  • Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the jigger of Midori first. Then, very gingerly, slowly pour the Irish Cream on top of the Midori. If done properly, the Irish Cream will sit on top of the Midori without mixing. Repeat the procedure with the Stoli over the Irish Cream. This will give you a very attractive three layer drink. Optional - add a teaspoon or so of Bacardi 151 on the top of the drink. Then, light the 151 and let burn for 5-10 seconds. Put out with a napkin. Shoot the drink and enjoy!

drinks.name: Ragnar #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Kurant
  • 2-4 cl Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Kurant into a highball glass full of ice. Add some Rose's lime (how much depends on individual taste). Fill up with Sprite.

drinks.name: Russian funk
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 dashes Russian Vodka
  • 1 dash Lime juice
  • 1/2 tsp Sugar
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend vodka, lime and sugar, top with soda water, serve in a higball glass.

drinks.name: Porch Climber
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 case Molson Canadian Beer
  • 2 cans Pink lemonade concentrate
  • 26 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 26 oz Canadian whisky (Canadian Club)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all over ice in large cooler. Then climmb the pporchs.

drinks.name: Eskimo Joe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/4 Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/4 Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1/4 Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Bailey's First ,milk, Creme de Menthe and Cinnamon Schnapps.

drinks.name: Atlantic Sun
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Smirnoff Vodka
  • 2 cl Southern Comfort
  • 2 cl Passion fruit syrup (Monin)
  • 6 cl Sweet and sour, mix
  • 1 dash Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all the ingredients, top the drink with soda. Garnish with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Mike Samm's Purple Passionate Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec (op. Triple Cognac)
  • 2 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash sweetened Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients into a mixing tin with ice. Place mixing glass on top. Shake vigorously. Spin tin & glass on the palm of hand. Throw behind your back and catch with opposite hand. Repeat in various ways until your customers or guests are mystified. Serve in collins with out a garnish.

drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.ingredients:
• 2-3 oz Light rum
  • Juice of 1 Lime (1 oz)
  • 2 tsp Sugar
  • 2-4 Mint sprigs
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Lightly muddle the mint and sugar with a splash of soda water in a mixing glass until the sugar dissolve and you smell the mint. Squeeze the lime into the glass, add rum and shake with ice. Strain over cracked ice in a highball glass. Top with soda water, garnish with mint sprig and serve.

drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill 12 oz. glass with ice. Add all the alcohol and sour mix. Top off glass with Coca-Cola to taste then watch out.

drinks.name: Fjellbekk (Mountain Stream)
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Aquavit (LÃ¸itens Linje)
  • 3/4 oz Lime juice
  • Sprite (or 7-UP)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything in a glass with ice.

drinks.name: Cowboy Roy
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Rum
  • 12 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into glass and mix.

drinks.name: Lynchburg Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Jack Daniels
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Sweet and sour, mix
  • 4 parts Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients into a punch bowl.

drinks.name: Jellyfish
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • A little Bailey's irish cream
  • Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: 1. Pour the Creme de Cacao and Amaretto into a shot glass. 2. Float enough Bailey's on top to cover the shot. 3. Drop a few drops of grenadine into the shot. It looks just like a jellyfish!

drinks.name: Cranberry Zamboni
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Cranberry vodka or schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Wild Spirit liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients to shaker with ice, shake, strain, and serve.

drinks.name: Hawaiin Punch from Hell
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 1 splash 7-Up
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all over ice -- shake and strain into a large shot glass.

drinks.name: Bingo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Hammer Vodka
  • 2 cl Mandarine Napoleon
  • 2 cl apricot Fruit syrup (Monin)
  • Soda water (Farris, Perrier)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in highball glass with lots of ice Garnish with slice of orange and cocktail cherry.

drinks.name: Beetlejuice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • Sour mix
  • Pineapple spear
  • Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a tall mixing glass with ice pour the vodka on the bottom. Then fill the glass 3/4 full with sour mix. Pour in the rest of the ingredients one at a time. Garnish with pineapple spear and cherry

drinks.name: Three Wise Men #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice in a shaker. Shake well. Strain. would be very smart to split this drink at least 2 ways...maybe three.

drinks.name: Surputte
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1/4 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/4 oz fresh Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add some 7-UP and ice A slice of Lime on the edge

drinks.name: Galapagos
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 ml Angostura bitters
  • 50 ml Pineapple juice
  • 50 ml PiÃ±a Colada
  • 30 ml green Melon liqueur
  • 30 ml Lemon vodka
  • 20 ml Strega
  • 50 ml Whipped cream
  • Cherries
  • Pineapple pieces
  • Coconut bits
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the liquid ingredients first. Then at the very last add whipped cream and on the top of this add the different fruit parts.

drinks.name: Surfer on Acid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/3 oz Malibu rum
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and shake well with ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Vodkalenius
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 tblsp Lingonberry jam
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingrediences with ice cubes and drink in a real Grogg-glass to get the wanted and expected effect. Let the lingonberry jam chill before mixing and make sure the vodka is below freezing to get a real lingonberry taste. One can us a straw if needed.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Astronaut
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 tsp Tang mix, powdered
  • 1/2 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 shot Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Self explanatory.

drinks.name: Mai Tai, Michael's Ultimate
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1/6 Lime
  • 1-1/2 oz very Dark rum
  • 1-1/2 oz Light rum
  • 3/4 oz Orange liqueur (triple sec)
  • Juice of 1/4 Orange
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • Sugar to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Squeeze lime wedge in tall glass with ice. Add other ingredients. Sugar is optional.

drinks.name: Fire Engine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 4 parts red Carbonated soft drink
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour it in a highball glass. Should be severed Cold. Also use Ice if preffered.

drinks.name: Fire Engine With Alarm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 4 parts red Carbonated soft drink
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour it in a highball glass. Should be severed Cold. Also use Ice if preffered. Realy the same as an Fire Engine.

drinks.name: Mikey Mike
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in a tumbler and shake thoroughly. Pour over ice into a 10 oz. glass and enjoy.

drinks.name: Dambuster
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Ginger ale
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a Highball glass with ice, pour three shots of Rum (preferably Bacardi) one shot of Kahlua, a shot of ginger ale and fill the rest of the glass with milk, (Homo or 2%, never SKIM!) Stir. That's It! Enjoy

drinks.name: Urban Violence
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Tropicana (strawberry/orange/banana)
  • 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 3/4 shot Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put some ice in your favorite glass. Add liquor. Fill up remainder with strawberry/orange/banana and stir. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Finlandia Vodka
  • 1 cl Gin
  • 1 cl Tequila
  • 1 cl Light rum
  • 1 cl Cointreau
  • 8 cl Lemon juice or lime juice
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a Collins glass with crushed ice. Pour the spirits and the juice over the ice. Add cola until the drink becomes tea coloured.

drinks.name: Pink Panther #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 6 oz strawberry-kiwi Crystal light
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Crystal Light then add your favorite brand of Vodka. Pour over ice. Serve.--A nice strong party punch with almost no taste of alcohol!

drinks.name: Rattlesnake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 Kahlua
  • 1 Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Kahlua, Creme de Cacao & Bailey's. Can be made in Shot glass, test tube, or tumbler - I sometimes use a wine glass.

drinks.name: Veterinary
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part pure Grain alcohol (96%)
  • 2 parts Lime juice
  • 3 parts Sprite (or 7-UP)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour alcohol over ice cubes in tall glass. Add lime juice and Sprite / 7-UP. Stir well.

drinks.name: Tootsie Roll
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Tia maria
  • 1/3 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1/3 oz Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: Because of the darkness of this particular shooter, layering is not necessary.

drinks.name: Squished Smurf
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2-3 drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer peach schnapps, then Bailey's. Slowly dribble blue curacao over top so that it curtles around the Bailey's. Drip Grenadine in different areas of the shooter glass so that it swirls around the already 'disgusting' mixture.

drinks.name: Burning Cherry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz George Dickel
  • 1/3 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/3 oz Jim Beam
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the George Dickel, Jack Daniels, and Jim Beam into a 2 ounce shot glass. Splash in the grenadine. Give a quick stir-spin with a straw or stir rod. Slam fast and hard. Exhale.

drinks.name: Michelada
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Beer
  • Juice of 1 Lemon
  • 2 dashes Worcestershire sauce
  • 1 dash Soy sauce
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
  • 1 pinch Black pepper
  • Salt to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in a tall high glass with lots of ice. Add beer at the end. Mix and enjoy.

drinks.name: Eskimo Joe's drink
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Pineapple
  • 1 Lemon
  • 1 green Apple
  • 1 Orange
  • 1 handful Ice
  • 500 ml raspberry Yoghurt
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 8 oz Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Using blender, add rum, fruits, ice, juice, yoghurt. make sure the orange is peeled and seeds taken out. Cut seeds out of apple. Now blend for 1 minute and your ready for the eskimo.

drinks.name: Brain Hemorage
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz clear Schnapps of your choice
  • 2 tsp Irish cream
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour schnapps into a large shot glass (the measurements may be off a bit, you can experiment). Slowly pour irish cream into schnapps so that it basically forms a 'brain' in 'formaldihide'. Finally, dribble the grenadine (dribbling onto a spoon then into the schnapps helps) directly into the center of the irish cream mass . As the grenadine amount slowly increases it will eventually burst through the irish cream creating a 'hemoraging' 'brain'.

drinks.name: Snitchee's Cider
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Spiced rum
  • 8 oz Apple cider (Martinelli's)
  • 1 Cinnamon stick (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Used crushed ice. Can be made in anysizefrom punchbowl to personal serving.

drinks.name: Caribbean Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 6/18 Dark rum (well aged)
  • 3/18 Amaretto
  • 3/18 Kahlua
  • 6/18 Cream
  • Cinnamon
  • Brown sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dip the rim of a cocktail glass in KahlÃ¹a, then in brown sugar. Shake the spirits and cream with ice, strain into the frosted glass and sprinkle cinnamon on top. This drink is created by Sami Taalas (Sheraton MalmÃ¶, Sweden) Caribbean Kiss won Trois RiviÃ¨res After Dinner Cocktail Competition Swedish Championship 1994

drinks.name: Green Goblin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint hard Cider
  • 1/2 pint Lager
  • 1 shot Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Cider First, Lager then Curacao

drinks.name: Oreo Mudslide
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 Oreo cookie
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend Vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's, ice-cream and the Oreo well in a blender. Pour into a large frosted glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

drinks.name: ABC
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Amaretto
  • 1/3 Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 Cognac
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layered in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Marvellaid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 3/4 oz Orange vodka (Stoli)
  • 1 3/4 oz Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill martini glass. Mix equal parts stoli and Cointreau. Chill and strain. Garnish with orange slice.

drinks.name: Bite of the Iguana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 3/4 oz Orange juice
  • 1 3/4 oz Sour mix
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients and shake. Strain and pour into shotglass. Share with a friend.

drinks.name: Combustible Edison
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Campari
  • 1 oz fresh Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker full of cracked ice, combine Campari and lemon juice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Heat brandy in a chaffing dish. When warm, ignite the brandy and pour in a flaming stream into the cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Planter's Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Dark rum
  • 1/2 part Orgeat syrup
  • 2 parts Orange juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingrdients. Serve over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with lime wedge and maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Something Peachie #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka or rum
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 3 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: serve in a tall glass over ice garnish with a cherry and orange

drinks.name: Cheapo student bevvy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Cider (White lightning)
  • 25 cl cheap Gin
  • 1 dash Blackcurrant squash
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a pint glass. Down very quickly.

drinks.name: Velvet Hammer #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tblsp Creme de Cacao
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 2 tblsp Cream
  • 1/2 Banana
  • Sugar to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in blender with ice. Puree until smooth.

drinks.name: Red Eye
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 glass Beer
  • 1 oz Vodka (optional)
  • Tomato juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill glass 1/2 to 3/4 full with beer add vodka if wanted top with tomato juice

drinks.name: Prarie Dog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz 151 proof rum
  • 2-3 dashes Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: build contents into a shot glass guaranteed night-ender for 21st birthday outings! (invented @ 901 Club, Los Angeles)

drinks.name: Ariel's Frappe Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Acerola pulp
  • 1 1/2 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients in blender and serve in Highball glass. Decorate with a Marashino chery and a grapefruit slice

drinks.name: Doh
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Smirnoff Vodka
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • Tahiti Treat or Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just throw them all together add some ice and drink. If you can't get Tahiti Treat use pineapple juice

drinks.name: Napalm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Aftershock
  • 1/2 oz Cinnamon schnapps (Fire and Ice)
  • 1 splash 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into shot glass putting the 151 in last. Light the 151 and Bombs away!!! (Be sure to blow it out before drinking)

drinks.name: Cape Codder
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Vodka and Cranberry Juice into a High Ball glass over ice. Stir well, add the wedge of lime, and serve.

drinks.name: Peppermint Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1.5 oz Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice. Serve cold. [Our studies show this drink to taste quite foul at the beginning of the evening but rather refreshing after several other drinks have been consumed.]

drinks.name: Sizzler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Lemonade
  • 1 oz Beer (Red Dog)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all to gether until fizzing.

drinks.name: Falix
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/5 shot Dark rum
  • 2/5 shot Margarita mix, Strawberry
  • 1/5 shot Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Baccardi into the shot glass. Add the Margarita mix. Top it with lemon juice and shoot it.

drinks.name: Pink Panty Pulldowns
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 L Sprite
  • 2 cups Pink lemonade
  • 2 cups Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well

drinks.name: Yukon Cornelius
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1/4 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shot glass pour the Yukon Jack to just below the rim. Add Goldschlager, filling the glass to full. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Ice Pick #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 6 oz Iced tea
  • Lemon juice to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.

drinks.name: Frothy Redhead
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1/2 glass Club soda (or Sprite)
  • 1/2 glass Red wine
  • Granulated Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add in said order. Do not shake, soda will mix. Garnish with 2-3 grapes and sprinkle with sugar. Named after a friend who demanded a new drink.

drinks.name: Mojito #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 fresh Mint sprigs
  • 2 tsp Sugar
  • 3 tblsp fresh Lemon juice (or lime)
  • 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • Chilled Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a tall thin glass, crush part of the mint with a fork to coat the inside. Add the sugar and lemon juice and stir thoroughly. Top with ice. Add rum and mix. Top off with the club soda (or seltzer). Add a lemon slice and the remaining mint. Serves one.

drinks.name: Something Peachie #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka or light rum
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 3 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve in a tall glass over ice. Garnich with a cherry and orange slice

drinks.name: MaÃ¨ek
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Johnnie Walker
  • 2 cl Campari
  • 1 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix this and add orange peel.

drinks.name: Boilermaker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Whiskey
  • 10 oz Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass with whiskey. Drop full shot glass into mug o' beer. Drink immediately, enjoy.

drinks.name: Ice Pick #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3 1/2 oz Iced tea, pre-sweetened
drinks.mixinginstructions: In large ice filled glass, pour vodka, then tea. Add a lemon wedge for garnish. Surprisingly refreshing.

drinks.name: Mad Cow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Cream
  • 1 part 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a shaker 1/4 filled with ice and pour into liberal shot glasses.

drinks.name: Hard Core
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 shot Everclear, 190 proof
  • 3/4 shot Triple sec
  • 3/4 shot Amaretto
  • Pepsi Cola
  • 1 Orange wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all into a tall glass or wine goblet. Add the Cola last. Hang orange on rim of glass. Taste good but is super strong.

drinks.name: Williams Explosion
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 1/2 conserved Pear
  • 4 cl conserved Pear juice
  • Pear soft drink
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend pear half, vodka and pear juice well (until the pear is drinkable) Pour in a high glass, over ice and fill with soft drink

drinks.name: Godhead
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 shot Rum
  • 1/4 shot Vodka
  • 1/4 shot Raspberry liqueur or Creme de Cassis
  • 1 dash Lime juice
  • 1 dash 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Rum, Vodka, Raspberry Liqueur and Lime Juice a strainer glass. Chill with ice and strain into your shot glass. Float 151 Rum on top of shot. Throw down or ignite and throw down. (Igniting the 151 Rum will lower the alcoholic content.)

drinks.name: Slippery Nipple #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 0.5 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 0.5 oz Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve as is

drinks.name: Sex on the Beach #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 3 cl Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: For the shooter you mix all ingredients together over ice. For the shot you decrease the Pineapple Juice to 1 ct. Chill and then strain.

drinks.name: Boozy Maria
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Peach schnapps
  • 1 glass 7-Up

drinks.name: Alien Urine Sample
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Creme de Banane
  • Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash Club soda
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Hand shake or blend with ice the liquer with the sour. Strain the drink from the ice into a pounder glass. Float Blue Curacao before serving

drinks.name: Robitussin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Cherry vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Root beer schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stirred, best without the rocks. Tastes just like the real thing

drinks.name: Blueberry Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
  • Tea (orange pekoe)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix amaretto and grand marnier in a brandy snifter or glass. Add hot tea to taste.

drinks.name: Liquid cocaine 8 ball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 shot Rum
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it and wait for the effects. Its called a liquid cocaine. Because it's expensive and once you try it your hooked.

drinks.name: Killer Kool-Aid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice cocktail
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a cocktail glass with ice. Layer ingredients. Do not stir.

drinks.name: All American
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bourbon
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve with two ice-cubes. You can vary the amount of Coca-Cola, all after how soft you want the drink to be.

drinks.name: Peach 200
drinks.ingredients:
• 2-3 oz Koskenkorva Peach Vodka
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor the Koskenkorva Peach in a glas, fill up with Coca-Cola and stir. To be served cold, but without ice.

drinks.name: Mexican Virgin
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 3 oz cherry Cider
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into an 8 oz. glass and stir. Then pour into another 8 oz. glass over ice.

drinks.name: Liquid Cocaine #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Rumple Minze
  • 1/3 JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/3 Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill over ice and pour.

drinks.name: Key Largo Kooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Key Largo schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix juices and alcohol in mixing tin, flash blend, and pour over ice in a 23 oz. squall glass and float Bacardi 151 rum. Garnish with an orange flag and umbrella.

drinks.name: Mudslide #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Vodka
  • 1/3 Kahlua
  • 1/3 Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: measure all ingredients into a shot glass and drink

drinks.name: Mike Tyson
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Tia maria
  • 2 cl JÃ¤germeister
  • 2 cl Pernod
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it and serve with ice

drinks.name: Green Cow
drinks.ingredients:
• Pisang Ambon
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend the two ingredients together. Use about half of each.

drinks.name: Brutal Hammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Red wine, french
  • 7 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put them in a glass; Pray to God; Then slam it!!!

drinks.name: Rangers Rocker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz White wine
  • 1 oz Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into mason jar; Stir; Sit down; Drink.

drinks.name: Purple Hooter #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/3 oz 7-Up
  • 1/3 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just shoot the damn thing!

drinks.name: Scarlet Fever
drinks.ingredients:
• 12-14 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 12-14 oz White rum
  • 6-8 oz dry Gin (London's)
  • 6 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix together and shake, pour into a draft glass add 3 ice cubes and garnish with a lemon wheel on the side.

drinks.name: Red Death (MAC style)
drinks.ingredients:
• 80 oz White wine
  • 120 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 60 oz dry Gin (Gordon's)
  • 2 pint White rum
  • 2 packages Candy, red halls centers, melted
  • 5 packages Raspberry juice
  • 16 L Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix together in large container....stir in the alcohol from atart of list till the halls....for melted halls centers do the following...: use a needle and thread and put it through each halls..tie a knot after each one...place in 1 to 2 litres of boiling..and i mean boiling hot water until all are melted pour into bowl and mix in the water and raspberry juice. have fun should serve 10 to 20 people at 1 litre each we use this for our residence house drink ..it is safe and actually very tastey..try it and see.

drinks.name: Stop Light
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Vodka
  • 1 splash Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Line up three shot glasses. Pour 1 shot of vodka into each glass. Add a splash of midori to one, a splash of orange juice to another and a splash of cranberry juice to the third. Drink them down Red, Yellow, Green. It's a stop light!

drinks.name: GSM
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Gin
  • 16 cl skimmed Milk
  • 1 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir it all together

drinks.name: The Crying Game
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/5 Jack Daniels
  • 1/5 Lime vodka
  • 1/5 Kahlua
  • 1/5 Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/5 Grenadine
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 5 oz Tomato juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix JD and Vodka together with Kahlua. Heat over medium flame Bailey's, Tequila, and Rum. Mix all together with tomato juice and top with grenadine. Garnish with a stalk of celery and green onion. Enjoy!!!

drinks.name: Bushwacker #2
drinks.ingredients:
• Mostly Bailey's irish cream
  • Healthy splash Amaretto
  • Healthy splash Kahlua
  • Small splash Vodka
  • Small splash Grand Marnier
  • Sprinkling Nutmeg
  • Lots Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill blender 3/4 with ice (small cubes best). Add a small splash of vodka, a small splash of Grand Marnier. Add a healthy serving of kahlua and a little less healthy splash of amarreto. Fill the blender with Bailey's until liquid is 1/2 inch from top of icecubes. Mix until smooth. Pour in hurricane glass and sprinkle some nutmeg on top! (Sorry about the vagueness. I learned this recipe while bartending in the Virgin Islands -- St. Thomas before it was demolished by Marylin. The drink is kick ass! The consistency should be like a milk shake, except without the milk. Also, this drink may be a bit expensive here (liquor is EXTREMELY cheap in the Caribbean)).

drinks.name: Dead Nazi
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz Rumple Minze
  • 2/3 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour rumple minze(should be pre chilled) into shot glass add jager(should also be pre chilled), serve

drinks.name: Green Monster
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Vodka
  • 1 small Pickled pepper
  • 4 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Into an old fashion glass, pour vodka over ice. Add pickled pepper, and stir around with its stem. Devour pepper after draining drink.

drinks.name: Scorpion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Light rum
  • 1 part Dark rum
  • 1 part Brandy
  • 1 part Orgeat syrup
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part fresh Lime juice
  • 2 dashes Sugar syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a 12 oz wine glass with ice, add a lime wedge and transfer into shaker. Add ingredients, shake and pour back into glass. Garnish stirrer, straw, cherry-pineapple, parasol, and mint.

drinks.name: Friar Tuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Frangelico
  • 1 part Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 2 parts Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and pour into a v-shape, and garnish with cinammon.

drinks.name: Tequila Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 measures Tequila
  • Orange juice
  • 2 dashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila in a highball glass with ice, and top with orange juice. Stir. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink. Garnish stirrer, straw and cherry-orange.

drinks.name: Brown cow
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 measures Kahlua
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a champagne flute with ice, add kahlua and top with milk. Stir. Garnish stirrer, nutmeg.

drinks.name: Screaming Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour first vodka, then Bailey's, then Kahlua into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir. Caution: use only high quality vodka. Cheap vodka can cause the Bailey's to curdle. Test your brand of vodka by mixing 1 Tsp each of vodka and Bailey's first.

drinks.name: Poor Man's Mommosa
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Beer
  • 4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Beer into a highball glass, add orange juice til desired color

drinks.name: Dark Nightmare
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Kahlua
  • 1/8 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/8 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix milk last. Stir. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Keremiki
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/3 oz Goldschlager
