  • 1/3 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and shoot.

drinks.name: AlbysjÃ¶n
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Stefanoffs Vodka
  • 1 oz Fanta
  • 0.5 oz Sprite
  • 0.5 oz Kiwi juice , concentrate
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka in glass then the rest, stir well. By the way for best results add Kiwi juice concentrate last

drinks.name: Danny Q's Aruba Rum Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dark rum (Mayer's)
  • 1 oz Barbados Rum
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • Orange juice
  • Pineapple juice
  • Sour mix
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a hurricane glass with ice. Shake Vigrously Serve with a cherry and orange slice for garinsh.

drinks.name: Hina Blast
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Red wine
  • 1 oz Coca-Cola
  • 4 oz Tequila
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 tblsp Banana, chopped
  • 1 cup Raisins
  • 6 oz Champagne (Dom Perignon)
  • 1/4 tsp Hot red pepper flakes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Heat vine, add raisines and boiled. Mix Coca-Cola, tequila, orange juice and add to boiled vine with raisines. Toss bananas with hot red pepper flakes. Pour Don Perignon over bananas. Mix everything thougether and store in a glass jar. Put in a fridge for 8 hours. Served chilled with fresh cherries. Enjoy !!!

drinks.name: Jamaican Beer
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 parts blond Beer
  • 3 parts Dry Vermouth
  • 3 parts Sweet Vermouth
  • 3 parts dry Gin
  • 3 parts Whisky
  • 1 drop Red Vodka
  • 1 drop Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: first of all pour in a glass vermouth,gin,whisky. next add the beer and last curacao and vodka's drops

drinks.name: Beeaauu's Rum and Coke
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Barbados Rum
  • 2 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 6 oz Coca-Cola
  • 1/2 oz fresh Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a tall glass with ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Smooth Operator
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Frangelico
  • 15 ml Kahlua
  • 15 ml Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 Banana
  • 60 ml Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with a scoop of ice

drinks.name: Pjolter Bay
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Apricot brandy
  • 2 cl Gin
  • 1 cl Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Have it all in a shaker, add 50/50 Fanta orange/Lemon mix. Sahake. Serv in highball glass. garnish with lemon an cherry.

drinks.name: Graveyard (light)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 or 1/2 pint Triple sec
  • 1 or 1/2 pint Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 or 1/2 pint Vodka
  • 1 or 1/2 pint Gin
  • 1 or 1/2 pint Tequila
  • Beer
  • Stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the 5 whites in equal amounts in a beer mug. fill up the rest of the space with half beer and half stout.

drinks.name: Graveyard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 or 1/2 pint Triple sec
  • 1 or 1/2 pint Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 or 1/2 pint Vodka
  • 1 or 1/2 pint Gin
  • 1 or 1/2 pint Tequila
  • 1 or 1/2 pint Bourbon
  • 1 or 1/2 pint Scotch
  • Beer
  • Stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the 5 whites and 2 whiskies in a beer mug in equal amounts. Top up the rest of the mug with half beer and half stout.

drinks.name: The Constable Shuffle
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Peach schnapps
  • 1 shot Galliano
  • 1/2 bottle West Coast Cooler
  • 1/2 pint Cider (Bulmers)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put everything into a pint glass with one Ice Cube. Serve with Wheelchair.

drinks.name: King of Denmark
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 parts Pernod
  • 3 parts Blackcurrant cordial (Ribena)
  • 8-10 parts Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir the Pernod&Black, add several big icecubes.

drinks.name: Frozen Mudslide
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 6 oz Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend alcohol with ice-cream. Serve in frosted glass.

drinks.name: Pain Killer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 glass Rum (Pusser)
  • 1/4 glass Cream of coconut
  • 1/3 glass Pineapple juice
  • Healthy splash Orange juice
  • Sprinkle Nutmeg
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • Lots Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill cup with ice. Pour Pusser's Rum to fill about 1/4 of the glass. Fill with an equal amount of Cream of Coconut (Coco Lopez is good. Add some pineapple juice and a good splash of orange juice. Shake well. Add cherry and sprinkly nutmeg. Grab a staw and get ready! This was originally made in the Britsh Virgin Islands -- Pussers is the official rum of the Royal British Navy. Alter the amount of rum to your taste. Sorry about the inexact measurements -- that's the way we do it down in de islans mon!

drinks.name: Green Frog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Pisang Ambon
  • 2 parts Sprite
  • Some drop Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a highball glass with 1 part Pisang Ambon. Pour 2 parts sprite in glas. then add some lime. Remember some ice-cubes. Drink with straw.

drinks.name: Brendan's PUnch of happiness
drinks.ingredients:
• 750 ml White rum
  • 250 ml Vodka
  • 1 gal hic berry Fruit punch (pre-made, not fr.con.)
drinks.mixinginstructions: POur ingredients into large pot, stir, serve as punch disappears continue to add more rum..

drinks.name: Liquid Asphault
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Sambuca, Chilled
  • 3/4 oz JÃ¤germeister, Chilled
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just layer chilled JÃ¤germeister on top of sambuca

drinks.name: Russian Brunch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 1/2 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix vodka and o.j. in blender with ice. add champaine and stir in.

drinks.name: StumbleFuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/3 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/3 oz Aftershock
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all three in a shooter! Slight burn on the way down is normal, just enjoy it.

drinks.name: Christer Petterson
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and serv with crushed ice

drinks.name: Felix's feast
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Chocolate milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the milk and the Bailys, add some ice, and drink it in a whiskeyglass.

drinks.name: Watermelon Crawl
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Southern Comfort
  • 1.5 oz Amaretto
  • 1/3 Watermelon schnapps
  • Orange juice
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a 16 oz pint glass with ice, pour the above in. Garnish with cherries.

drinks.name: Flander's Flake-Out
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 glass Sambuca
  • 3/4 glass Sarsaparilla
drinks.mixinginstructions: Bang 'em both in.

drinks.name: Sneaky Pete
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Rye whiskey
  • 4 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Kahlua on the bottom over ice. Then add milk Then add Rye. Stir before drinking.

drinks.name: Tidal Wave
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Smirnoff Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin, vodka, rum and peach schnapps over ice in a collins glass. Add orange and pineapple juices, a dash of grenadine, and float 151 rum on top. Garnish with a piece of fresh cut pineapple. The wave will sweep you away!!!!!

drinks.name: Brown Pelican
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Apple cider
  • 2 1/2 oz Ginger beer
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in a mixing glass, stir gently and pour over ice cubes in a highball glass

drinks.name: Apple Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part 7-Up (or sprite)
  • 1 part Apple schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour into a shot glass and present to consumer, they are expected to cover the top of the shotglass with thier palm, raise the glass, slam it on the bar and the swallow quickly.

drinks.name: Pussy Paws
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
  • 2 parts Club soda
  • Twist of Lime peel
  • 1/2 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir Cranberry, amaretto, sour mix. Pour into a frosted highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with club soda; add twist of lime. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

drinks.name: Manhattan Sweet #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 3 oz Bourbon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve on the rocks

drinks.name: Texas Rose
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Rum
  • 2 jiggers Orange juice
  • 1 jigger Creme de Banane
  • 1 jigger Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients and pour over ice. Wonderful smooth tasting drink. But watch out it will knock your socks off!

drinks.name: Frozen Margarita #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Limeade
  • 4 oz Tequila
  • 1/3 can Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: In blender add the can of limeaide. Using the empty can measure the tequila and the triple sec and add to the blender. Blend, adding ice cubes until the drink becomes slushy and holds in peaks. Serves: 4

drinks.name: The Big Johnson
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Vodka
  • 1 bottle Jack Daniels
  • 3/4 can 7-Up, sprite, etc.
  • 1 dash Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Lime Juice, then Vodka, then JD and 7-UP. Optional Grenadine dash last--pour around side of glass for effect. Serve on ice.

drinks.name: Cynar Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sweet Vermouth (Martini Bianco)
  • 1 oz Cynar
  • 1 wedge Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice cubes in a cordial glass. Stir and squeeze in an orange wedge. Serve.

drinks.name: Fire in Heaven
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill up shot glass with 151 proof Rum. Then add a dash of Tabasco into the glass. Allow a few seconds to settle. Drink fast and stand back.

drinks.name: Lil' Johnson
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Vodka
  • 1/4 Jack Daniels
  • 1/4 Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix them up however you want.

drinks.name: Obadoba
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 gal Milk
  • 10 tsp sweetened Cocoa powder (O'Boy)
  • 1 dl Whipped cream
  • As much as you wish Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the o'boy n' the salt in a tall glass, add the heated milk. Put some whipped cream at the top and serve.

drinks.name: Bacardi Gold & Cola
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Gold rum (Bacardi)
  • 16 cl Coca-Cola
  • 1 Lemon slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a tall glass completely with ice cubes. Mix the ingredients into the glass and serve with a slice of lemon put on the glass. It is a very simple drink, but never the less it is very deliscious - especially in the summertime.

drinks.name: Titty Twister-Rita
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 3 parts Tropicana (orange/passion)
  • 1 part Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 part Sweet and sour
  • 3 parts Daiquiri mix
  • 4 cups crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour ingredients into blender over crushed ice blend until you see the top of the mix stop moving pour into margarita glass and garnish with a lemon or lime slice... (by the way, this makes 1 to 2 servings only) hope ya enjoy it...

drinks.name: Pink Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 2 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Shake Can be made as an up cocktail or on the rocks

drinks.name: Georgian Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Tequila
  • 1/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Strawberry liqueur
  • 3 oz Sweet and sour, mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and blend all four ingredients and serve in a highball glass with a lime garnish.

drinks.name: PrÃ¦riebÃ¥l (Norwegian version of Prairie Fire)
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Tequila
  • 4 cl Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequlia in a double shot glass. Then pour Tabasco in the same glass.

drinks.name: Jamaican Dust
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all three ingredients in a strainer with ice, serve chilled

drinks.name: The Beavis
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Everclear
  • 1 oz Purple passion
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Cider (White lightning)
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Plum Wine
  • 1 oz Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all the shit together, and hope it don't explode! Drink as fast as you can, with no food, and say your prayers.

drinks.name: Roswell
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Lime liqueur (KeKe)
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • Top with 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Top with a splash of grenadine.

drinks.name: North Polar
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Gin or Vodka
  • 1 part Cointreau
  • 1 part Campari
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and server over ice with a slice of orange

drinks.name: STP (the motor oil of course)
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 oz Scotch
  • 5 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Maple syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add whiskyand vodka to glass of ice. Stir in maple syrup. Wait 2 minutes and enjoy.

drinks.name: Cramit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill and stir, they love the name.

drinks.name: Utar
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Light rum
  • 1 part Dark rum
  • 1 part Lemonade
  • 1 part Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 part Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix in glass and chug

drinks.name: Gorilla Fart #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Wild Turkey
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in shot glass. Take a sniff and shoot!

drinks.name: Patsy mix
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 2 oz pear Cider (Babycham)
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Brandy and Babycham on ice

drinks.name: Amaretto Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 3 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

drinks.name: Ground Zero
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Bourbon
  • 1/4 Peppermint schnapps
  • 1/4 Vodka
  • 1/4 Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just god damn mix em! :)

drinks.name: Hawaiian Screw
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • Orange juice
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour over ice in regular glass. Add pineapple and orange juice to taste. Sort of like a regular screwdriver except with a tropical twist! Can also use orange-strawberry juice or any kind of funky fruit combination!

drinks.name: Blue PolarBear
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part chilled blue Peppermint schnapps
  • dash crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake schnapps and vodka together until well-mixed. Add crushed ice, shake lightly, then pour to shot glasses.

drinks.name: Silver Bullet #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1 or 2 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour scotch in iced glass and coat sides empty scotch out pour in vodka

drinks.name: Rocky Mountain Mother Fucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Yukon Jack
  • 2 counts Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in shaker over ice and chill. Strain and pour in shot glass.

drinks.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour and drink. No chill.

drinks.name: Screaming Viking
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • 1 Celery stalk
  • 1 Cucumber spear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir liquids with ice then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with celery and cucumber. Serve immediately.

drinks.name: Wong Tong Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 2 oz Lemonade
  • 2 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquids into a strainer glass with 4-6 ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with cherries.

drinks.name: Vincent Vega
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Absolut Citron
  • 3/4 Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice cubes to a glass. Mix the ingredients.

drinks.name: Cuba Libra
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-2 shot Dark rum
  • Squeeze Lime, fresh
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill tall glass with ice cubes. Add rum. Rub cut edge of lime on rim of glass then squeeze juice into glass. Fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with lime slice. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Russian Boilermaker
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Beer
  • 1 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour cold beer into a large glass, and drop whole shot glass full of vodka into beer. Guzzle as fast as you can, and let out a roar, a REAL man.

drinks.name: Wild Ass Indian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 gal Vodka
  • 1 gal Rum
  • 1 gal Scotch
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake

drinks.name: An Arif
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Rum (Banker's club)
  • 0.5 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2.5 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2.5 oz Ginger ale
  • 1 tblsp fresh Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine everything together in order it is listed, you may add Kool-Aid mix if desired, but make sure to add the lemon juice last. It is called an Arif because it will tend to block your nuts from getting off if you have too many of these.

drinks.name: Kiltlifter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Scotch, single malt
  • 1.0 oz Drambuie, Glayva or Lochanora
  • 2.5 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake gently and pour over ice in old fashioned glass.

drinks.name: French Sailor
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cointreau
  • 1 part Absolut Citron
  • 1 cube Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix 1 part warm Cointreau and 1 part Vodka into a tumbler with a cube of sugar. Stir until sugar is disolved.

drinks.name: D+d lay
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 10 oz Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: 'shaken not stirred'

drinks.name: Mellon Collie and The Infinite Gladness
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Light rum
  • 30 ml Midori melon liqueur
  • 15 ml Malibu rum
  • 15 ml Chocolate syrup
  • 60 ml Fresh Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients and shake with ice. Serve in 140ml martini glass. Garnish with strawberries marinated in Cointreau and Monin Passionfruit syrup and a pineapple leaf.

drinks.name: Kermit The Frog Piss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • Top with 7-Up

drinks.name: Gorilla's Puke
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Wild Turkey, 101 proof
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in normal shot glass. Can be lit and shot through straw.

drinks.name: Black Martini #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz Gin
  • 1/3 oz Black Sambuca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor ingredients over ice. Shake gently. Strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Slippery Dick
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3-4 oz Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour over ice in rock glass

drinks.name: Jelly Bean
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 1 oz Anis
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix equal parts in pony glass-tastes just like a jelly bean!

drinks.name: Dirty Girl Scout
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the vodka, Kahlua and Bailey's and pour over ice. Pour the Creme de menthe down the center of the glass. Looks gross, but tastes delicious!

drinks.name: Spunky Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Kahlua
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1/2 cup Half-and-half
  • 6 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add above ingrediants in a blender. Blend on high until the ice is crushed. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Swamp Water
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Lime vodka
  • 1 shot Apricot brandy
  • Sweet and sour
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: in a glass 1/2 full of ice,mix one shot lime vodka, one shot apricot brandy and fill the rest with half sweet and sour and half 7-up. (sorry no fancy glass, we usually get it in the standard plastic cups!!)

drinks.name: Patti's Blow Job
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in order in shot glass. Drink without using your hands!!

drinks.name: Bahama Todd
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Spiced rum
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 5 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add light rum, dark rum, spiced rum, and malibu rum to ice filled glass. Mix in pineapple juice and blue curacao. Float 151 rum on top.

drinks.name: Camen Miranda
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rum
  • 3 oz Coca-Cola
  • 4 oz Pineapple-orange-banana juice
  • wedge Lime
  • Add to taste Club soda or tonic
drinks.mixinginstructions: Squeeze lime wedge over ice Pour rum, juice, & cola Stir lightly Add club soda or tonic to taste

drinks.name: Cold Shower
drinks.ingredients:
• Green Creme de Menthe
  • Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use about 1:4 of creme de menthe to club soda, and stir.

drinks.name: Broken down golf cart
drinks.ingredients:
• 0.5 oz Amaretto
  • 0.5 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • dash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shaken and strained through ice !!! Mmmmm.....

drinks.name: Orange Climax
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix one after the other then shake and top with whip cream

drinks.name: Grape ape
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Razzmatazz
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 splash Sprite
  • Fill Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: tall, tall glass

drinks.name: Wet Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/4 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients except Chambord. Chill and strain mixture into a martini glass. Float Chambord to the bottom of the glass.

drinks.name: JimPop's Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • 3/4 oz Grand Marnier
  • Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Lightly rub the rim of a cocktail glass with some lime juice, dip glass rim in the salt. Mix all ingredients with ice, strain into fresh ice in the salt-rimmed glass, and enjoy!

drinks.name: Fishbone
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • 1 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice add liquor, orange juice, and sour mix. shake well add 1 oz of 7 up to the top.

drinks.name: Three Wise Men
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Jack Daniels
  • 1/3 shot Jim Beam
  • 1/3 shot Johnnie Walker
drinks.mixinginstructions: layer in a shot glass, Jimmy, Jack, then Johnnie

drinks.name: Loud-Mouth
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Southern Comfort 100 Prf.
  • 1 part Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: This is a Winter drink which can only be consumed outdoors preferbly in an alpine environment. It is should be consumed in small swigs from a French Canteen type of devide and only after a epic day of skiing...Why yes it's strong but you'll be the better for it.

drinks.name: After Five
drinks.ingredients:
• Peppermint schnapps
  • Kahlua
  • Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: 1. Pour Kahlua into shot glass to about 1/2 full. 2. Using a spoon(inverted), slowly pour in the Peppermint Schnapps until glass is about 3/4 full. Done correctly, the Schnapps will flow under the Kahlua for a clear layer. 3. Again using a spoon, but this time right side up, slowly top off the glass with a layer of Bailey's. Be careful to place the spoon right at the top of the Kahlua layer and to raise it as the glass fills up. Done correctly, this will provide a layer of Bailey's floating over the Kahlua. 4. Toss it down all at once for something like a Peppermint Pattie, WITH A BANG!!! NOTE: Best if all ingredients are chilled

drinks.name: Andrea's Colada Collision
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 3 oz Cream of coconut (La Prererida is good)
  • 6 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 frozen ripe Banana
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill blender about 1/4 full with ice. Add all ingredients to blender. Blend to a smooth consistency. Serve in either a hurricane glass or a tall glass or goblet. Garnish with a pineapple spear is optional.

drinks.name: Urine
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • 3 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and serve warm

drinks.name: Harlee's Planters Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz Dark rum
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: measure light and dark rum into glass, add juices, grenadine...shake well, top with 151 rum... garnish with cherry and orange slice.

drinks.name: Don's Bloody Mary
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Vodka
  • Clamato juice
  • 1 dash Worcestershire sauce
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
  • 1/8 tsp Horseradish
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put 4 or 5 ice cubes in a large old-fashioned glass and fill 3/4 full with Clamato juice. (Clamato may be mixed 1/2 and 1/2 with any other favorite tomato or veggie juice). Add the vodka, Worcestershire, Tabasco, and Horseradish and stir thoroughly with a spoon or swizzle. Twist the lime slice over the glass edge and stick a scallion in as a casual stirrer and delicious finish to the drink.

drinks.name: Brandy Manhattan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp Maraschino cherry juice
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 splash Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill rocks glass with ice. Add Cherry juice and cherry, then bitters. Add brandy, then sweet vermouth. Add water, stir.

drinks.name: Pink Elephant Ears
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 pint Vodka
  • 2 cans Pink lemonade concentrate
  • 1 Lime, sliced
  • Lots Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix pink lemonade per instructions on can. Add vodka, slices of lime, and ice. Mix well. Enjoy on a hot summer day on the boat!

drinks.name: Banshe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Irish whiskey
  • 1 shot Irish Mist
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over chrusted ice. Lightly stir.

drinks.name: Southern Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Southern Comfort
  • 1 cl Grenadine
  • 1 cl Lemon juice (fresh)
  • 2 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into Cocktail glasses.

drinks.name: Midnight Manx
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • dash Goldschlager
  • 2 oz Heavy cream
  • 2 oz Hazlenut Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a mixer with ice and add Baileys, Kahlua, Goldshlager, and cream. Shake for 5 seconds and Strain into a double rocks glass filled with ice. Add chilled coffee Stir and enjoy!

drinks.name: Eye of the Storm
drinks.ingredients:
• 7 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 10 oz Coca-Cola
  • 1 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add lime juice, then THE CAPTAIN, then the Coca-Cola. Stir gently so you don't kill the carbonation. Enjoyed most after several weaker drinks.

drinks.name: Nazi Helmet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 shot Rumple Minze

drinks.name: Whoomp
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Everclear
  • 1 bottle Dark rum
  • 1 bottle Jim Beam
  • 1 bottle 100 proof Vodka
  • 1 bottle Peach schnapps
  • 1 bottle Jack Daniels
  • 2 cans frozen Fruit juice (your choice)
  • 1 can Fruit punch (Hi C)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all the shit into one large cooler or what ever you have that will hold it add one block of ice and mix then consume till it whomps you in the ASS

drinks.name: Wisconsin Lunchbucket
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 glass Beer
  • 1/4 glass Orange juice
  • 1 shot Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a beer mug large enough to hold a shot glass, mix beer and O.J. Drop in shot of Amaretto (depth charge) and slam.

drinks.name: Jamaican Dust-Buster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Rum
  • 2 parts Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix ingredients in a glass and knock off those dust-bunnies

drinks.name: Kir Royale
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Creme de Cassis
  • 5 parts Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Creme de cassis in glass, gently pour champagne on top

drinks.name: Manhattan
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 2 1/2 oz Blended Bourbon
  • dash Angostura bitters
  • 2 or 3 Ice cubes
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 twist of Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the vermouth, whiskey, bitters and ice in a mixing glass. Stir gently, don't bruise the spirits and cloud the drink. Place the cherry in a chilled cocktail glass and strain the whiskey mixture over the cherry. Rub the cut edge of the orange peel over the rim of the glass and twist it over the drink to release the oils but don't drop it in.

drinks.name: Lash
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Vodka
  • 1,5 oz Amaretto
  • Full glass Ice
  • Remainder Sprite or 7-up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill tall glass with ice. add Vodka and Amaretto. Fill remainder of glass with Sprite or 7up

drinks.name: The Extinguisher
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/4 oz Tia maria
  • 1/4 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • Top draft Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all alchohol in 12 Oz. glass with ice. Add Sour Mix. Splash Cranberry Juice. Enough to form a layer of red at the top of the glass. Top with foam from draft beer tap.

drinks.name: The James Robert Dean
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 L Vodka
  • 5 L Dark rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1/2 L Pepsi Cola
  • 10 L Gin
  • 3 L Orangina Orange soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Makes huge punch.

drinks.name: Jackhammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve over ice- Warning,Deadly!

drinks.name: Midori Sour - Frozen
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 6 - 8 oz Sour mix
  • 1/2 tsp Sugar
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all indredients in a blender with enough ice to freeze. Serve in a tall glass with a lime twist garnish

drinks.name: Flaming Dr. Pepper (alternative)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 6 oz Lager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Amaretto in bottom of shot glass, top with Rum. Pour Beer into glass. Light shot, pick up shot by the sides and drop entire shot glass (bottom first) into beer. When bottom of shot glass hits bottom of beer glass chug (the beer will put out the flame).

drinks.name: Flaming Jesse or Tropical SunShine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 4-6 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake, strain into a collin's glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

drinks.name: Hurricane Hugo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 splash Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 splash Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients over ice in large Shaker. Add more juice to taste for the lightweights. Shake well and strain into shot glass. This recipe may be doubled or quadrupled. We strongly encourage this. Enjoy!!

drinks.name: L&C
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Pineapple chunks in juice
  • 3 oz Finlandia Pineapple vodka
  • 2 oz Malibu rum
  • To fill blender Ice
  • Garnish Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put pineapple in the blender and blend (duh) till smooth. Add vodka, rum, and enough ice to raise the level to five cups. Blend until the ice gets all smashed up. Pour into tall glasses; garnish with the cherry. Drink until YOU get all smashed up.

drinks.name: Pineberry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Finlandia Cranberry vodka
  • 1 shot Finlandia Pineapple vodka
  • wedge fresh Lemon
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodkas in a cocktail shaker over ice. Strain into shot glasses. Squeeze juice from the lemon wedge into each glass.

drinks.name: Nutty Irishman
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Frangelico
  • 1 part Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve over ice

drinks.name: Greazy Deigo
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Zima
  • 2 shots Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • Mango Kool-Aid
drinks.mixinginstructions: Empty zima into glass. Then add the 2 shots of 151 rum. next add the Kool-Aid. Mix until a light froth is achieved...and enjoy

drinks.name: Harley Davidson #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Topper JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing tin add bailys and midori over ice stir and strain into 4oz bucket and top with JÃ¤germeister

drinks.name: Carmel Coke
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Butterscotch schnapps
  • 6 oz Coca-Cola
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a rocker glsa with ice add the Coca-Cola then the schnapps

drinks.name: Modified Duck Fart
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Crown Royal
  • 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3/4 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer liquors in order listed from top to bottom in shot glass. Drink all at once.

drinks.name: Vit Ryss
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Kahlua
  • 14 cl Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything in a highballglas and add some ice.

drinks.name: Windex
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut or Stoli)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Five dollar shake
drinks.ingredients:
• 50 ml Midori melon liqueur
  • 50 ml Peach schnapps
  • 330 ml Hoopers Hooch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into pint glass.

drinks.name: Neon Ghost
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka shot, Hot n'sweet (white)
  • 3 cl Pisang Ambon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake it with ice, and serve it in a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Buttery Nipple #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/2 shot Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Butterscotch Schnapps halfway in shot glass. Pour Cream Whiskey down the side of the glass to fill the shot the rest of the way . Object is to float the Irish Cream on the Schnapps

drinks.name: Gold Driver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 thing Orange juice
  • 1 Lime (fresh)
  • Some Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a short glass with ice. Pour the Cuervo into glass until about half full (more if you like it like I do). Top off with the Orange Juice. Squeeze a slice of lime into the drink. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Iron Hindu
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Cognac
  • 1 1/2 oz Vanilla schnapps
  • 1 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 5 1/2 oz Apricot nectar
  • 2 oz Heavy cream
  • Ground green Cardamom
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with plenty of ice, pour into Hurricaine glasses. Grind a moderate amount of green cardomom on top. (This is extremely important, and gives the drink it's characteristic purfume.) Garnish with fruit, a frilly umbrella, etc.

drinks.name: Strawberry Storm
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Kahlua
  • 45 ml Strawberry liqueur
  • 90 ml Pineapple juice
  • Float 30-45 ml Cream on top
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredience together except cream. Float cream on top. Garnish with pineapple spear and cherry.

drinks.name: Aranov
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 L Vodka (Aslanov)
  • 1/3 L Orange juice with fruitpulp
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Vodka and Juice in a any kind of bottle.

drinks.name: Grateful Dead #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • Razzmatazz or Chambourd
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Collins Class with Ice. Add all the white alcohol. Add the sour mix. Top off glass with Razzmatazz or Chambourd. Then shake to mix contents. A fruity version of a Long Island Iced Tea

drinks.name: Lemon Drop #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Absolut Citron
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • 1 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: to consume: place sugar on lemon, place in mouth and take shot, then bite down on lemon -enjoy sweet/tart flavor as vodka goes down! YummY!

drinks.name: Sex under the bleachers with a KU cheerleader
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 3 pinches Sugar
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • 1 Kiwi
  • 1 tsp blue Food coloring
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix alcoholic ingredients and kiwi in blender, then add the food coloring and stir. Pour into glass and top with cherry.

drinks.name: Chocolate Raspberry Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve on ice or blend for a milk shake effect.

drinks.name: Pineapple Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill 12 oz. glass with ice. Add all the alcohol and sour mix. Top off glass with pineapple juice to taste then watch out.

drinks.name: 3 Wise Men
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/3 oz Johnnie Walker
  • 1/3 oz Jim Beam
drinks.mixinginstructions: put them them in a glass... and slam it to tha head.

drinks.name: Mountain Dew #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 glass Beer (draught)
  • 1/2 glass 7-Up
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill half beer glass with beer. Fill other half with 7-UP soda (If you have the patience, pour a little of one, then a little of the other, until the glass is full). Fill a shot glass with Melon liqueur. Drop entire shot glass into glass of beer. Immediately drink entire pint of beer with shot glass still inside (do not swallow the shot glass).

drinks.name: The Breakfast Drink
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Vodka
  • 1 cup Peachtree schnapps
  • 1 gal Orange juice
  • 1/2 cup Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 3 bottles Collins mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: The amount of ingredients can vary depending upon the size of the punch bowl,

drinks.name: Irish Cream, Home Made
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 can sweetened Condensed milk
  • 1 cup Cream
  • 3 Egg
  • 1 tblsp Chocolate syrup
  • 1 cup Rye whiskey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together in a blender or mix in a bowl with a whisk until fully blended.

drinks.name: Rolf's Scandinavian Glogg
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 whole Cardamom pods
  • 1/4 cup Cinnamon sticks, broken
  • 25 whole Cloves
  • Peel of 1 Orange
  • 2 qt Port
  • 2 qt Red wine
  • 1 1/2 cup Raisins
  • 1 cup blanched Almond
  • 2 cups Sugar
  • 4/5 qt Brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: take seeds out of cardamom pods, put the seeds and the rest of the spices (1-4) in cheesecloth bag. combine 1qt port, 1qt red wine, raisins and spice bag, simmer for 15-20 minutes. add remaining port, red wine and almonds, heat through (but not hot enough to evaporate remaining alcohol). In another pan, mix sugar with 1/3 of the brandy, light brandy on fire and melt sugar. When sugar is melted add remaining brandy. Then combine with the wine/port mixture. Drink!!!

drinks.name: Lloyd Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/3 oz Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into shot glass and shoot it back.

drinks.name: Canadian Funky Electric Cider
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Canadian whisky (Crown Royal)
  • 2 1/2 oz Canadian Apple cider
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place 3/4 oz. of whiskey in an old-fashioned glass. Add 2.5 oz. of optinally warmed Canadian Apple Cider. If served cold, crushed ice is optional.

drinks.name: The Boiling Panther
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • Fill glass Dr. Pepper or Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor shots into glass. Fill with Dr. Pepper or Mt. Dew and mix. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Jersey Devil
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 gal Cranberry juice
  • 2 qt Apple cider or apple juice
  • 1 qt Applejack
  • 1 Apple, sliced
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put cranberry juice in punch bowl. Add apple cider/juice and apple juice brandy to taste. Slice apple in 3/16th

drinks.name: Fat Hooker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • Fill with Orange juice or pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour first three ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange or pinapple juice, stir well, and serve.

drinks.name: Galliano Hotshot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Galliano
  • 2 parts hot Coffee
  • 1 part Heavy cream
  • 1 pinch Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Galliano, then hot coffee, then cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of nutmeg.

drinks.name: Blue Blazer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Whisky
  • 6 oz Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: boil water and whisky in seprate glasses, ignite whisky, slowly mix whisky and water 4-6 times

drinks.name: Tanqueray and Tonic
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1/3 Tonic water
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice to glass. Fill 2/3 of the way up with Tanqueray Gin, and the remaining 1/3 with tonic water. Add lime.

drinks.name: Grateful Dead #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Rum
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 2 parts Sour mix
  • 1 splash Sprite or 7-up
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill glass with ice. Add each liquor, then pour sour mix to top. stir. splash of 7up or sprite.

drinks.name: Butterfinger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 parts Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill glass with ice. pour butterscotch scnapps and bailey's into glass. fill with milk. shake. serve with sip straw.

drinks.name: Dead green frog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/5 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/5 oz Kahlua
  • 1/5 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/5 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/5 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill on ice and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Hot Damn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Whiskey
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake all ingredients adding less or more orange juice for you preferance of taste. serve in shot glass.

drinks.name: Bloody Brain
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • A float of Bailey's irish cream
  • Several drop Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour schapps into cordial glass then gently float Bailey's on top. Drip grenadine into glass. It is very important to drip the grenadine one drop at a time for maximum effect.

drinks.name: Fart In the Ocean
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila, almond flavored
  • 4 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add tequila and chilled 7-UP to glass, drop in one sweet prune in each glass. Add ice if you wish.

drinks.name: Miami Vice
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • frozen Pina colada mix
  • frozen Daiquiri mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: First: Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice(set aside). Second: Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice. Third: While frozen, add pina colda mix then daiquiri mix in glass (Making sure they do not get mixed together).

drinks.name: AT&T
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 4 oz Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Vodka and Gin over ice, add Tonic and Stir

drinks.name: 69 Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz dry Gin (Gordon's)
  • 4 oz 7-Up
  • 0.75 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 2 oz. gin. Add 4 oz. 7-up. Add Lemon Juice for flavor. If you are weak, top up glass with more 7-Up.

drinks.name: Machine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the orange juice in the glass so it fills it about 1/3. Then take a napkin and put it over the glass pushing it down toward the juice. Push napkin down as far as it can go without touching the juice. Next pour the vodka very slowly so it dribbles on top of the juice. This will create a layer of vodka that lays on top of the juice because of the different densities of the liquids.

drinks.name: Golden Eye
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Goldschlager
  • Nuts
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour 1 oz of goldshlager shapps then pour in the baileys. This is a layered drink with the baileys on the bottom. Garnish with a nut in the middle of the drink.

drinks.name: Joe Cocker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Crown Royal
  • 1 part Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all into a Shot Glass

drinks.name: Nuts and Berries #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Frangelico
  • Add 3 oz Milk or half and half
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a ice filled mixing cup add all ingredients and shake well, pour into cocktail glass, garnish with berries in season

drinks.name: John's Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Benedictine
  • 1 slice Orange
  • Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour very cold tequila with Benedictine in a shot glass.You serve it with a slice of orange that has cinnamon on it nad kalo methisi(that was Greek)

drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Gold tequila
  • 3/4 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 3/4 oz Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 2 oz Pepsi Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all liquors and sweet and sour and top off with Pepsi Cola. Stir and Serve with a Lemon wheel.

drinks.name: South Side
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-2 oz Vodka and/or white rum
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Lime juice or lemon-lime juice
  • Ice
  • Some Mint leaves
  • 1-2 oz Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to blender including one mint leaf as it will be blended up and leave little specks at top of drink. After drink is complete add other whole mint leaves. A lime wedge can also be added. Amount of soda water should fluxuate according to how strong the lemon-lime solution is.

drinks.name: Cherry Martinsen
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Cherry brandy
  • 8 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in the brandy and then the coke, biatch. Hold up the glass and say dude. Enjoy dude.

drinks.name: Pink Police
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Beer (any beer will do)
  • 12 oz frozen Pink lemonade concentrate
  • 12 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a pitcher add one can of beer. Next add one can of frozen pink lemonade. Note: do not mix the lemonade with water. Finally use the empty lemonade container to measure and add the vodka. Stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: French Pirate
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Orange Curacao
  • 1 oz Dark rum
  • Fill glass Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Orange curacao into champagne flute, add Dark rum, top off with Champagne, I recommend Brut

drinks.name: Muppet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 part Tequila
  • 1/2 part 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: With the shot glass you pour half a glass with Tequila and the other half with 7-up. Take the glass already filled with both drinks, take it with palm holding the top of the glass (so the liquid would not come out) and you hit to the table so it will stirr, and you drink the whole.

drinks.name: Bushwacker #3
drinks.ingredients:
• Light rum
  • Dark rum
  • Kahlua
  • Half-and-half
  • Cream of coconut (Coco Lopez)
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all contents in a blender and blend until smooth. Ice-cream can be substituted for the half-and-half

drinks.name: Four Horsemen
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 3/4 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 3/4 oz Rumple Minze
  • 3/4 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour contents in shaker over ice and shake well. Pour into glass. This is a big shooter so you have to use a small rocks glass.

drinks.name: Dublin Doubler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Irish whiskey
  • 1 1/2 oz Irish cream
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix irish whiskey, irish cream, and ice cubes. Shake to chill. Serve with or without the ice, it is very good either way.

drinks.name: Irish Coffee (Simple)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Irish whiskey
  • 8 oz Coffee
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 1 tblsp Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with sugar in the empty glass. Next pour in the whiskey, followed by the coffee. Stir till sugar is disolved, let mixture settle. Float whipped cream on top. Curl up in front of the fireplace with J. Joyce and enjoy!

drinks.name: Kahlua Fudge Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• 2-4 oz Kahlua
  • 3 scoops fudge Ice-cream
  • 3 oz Milk
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just like making a milk shake, but add the Kahlua. This drink is very rich, but it tastes great. We invented it one summer day!!

drinks.name: Afterburner #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 oz Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour 1 shot a vodka pour 1/2 shot of Tobasco sauce in seperate shot glass (take vodka shot immediately followed by the Tobasco shot) ***amount can be changed to liking

drinks.name: Partymeister
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Malibu rum
  • Rose's sweetened lime juice to taste
  • Fill up with Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 2 cl of gin (no special gin required) in a glass. Add 2 cl of Malibu. On top of that, enough of Rose'e lime juice to match the taste of Malibu. Fill up with lemonade. Add some ice and a straw.

drinks.name: Mocha Mint Irish Cream Cappuccino
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tblsp Chocolate syrup
  • 1 tsp White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 tsp Creme de Cacao
  • 1 shot Irish cream
  • Espresso
  • Top with steamed Milk
  • Garnish with Whipped cream (or lime slice)
drinks.mixinginstructions: By adding the steamed milk last, the ingredients mix well. Make sure to stir all of the chocolate from the bottom of glass.

drinks.name: Ersh
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take 1 part Vodka and shake well with 1 part of Best beer you know.

drinks.name: Ekatherina Andreevna
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Stoli Vodka
  • 1/4 Bourbon
  • 1/2 Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Always put ice in glass first to cool the mixers when they are poured.

drinks.name: Crack Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Vodka
  • 8 cans Beer
  • 2 cans frozen Lime juice concentrate
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a large container, fill half way with ice. Pour in all contents and mix well. You are ready to serve.

drinks.name: Screaming Orgasm II
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 shot Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir together and serve over ice

drinks.name: Sex on the Beach #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Apple schnapps
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 1/2 oz 7-Up
  • tblsp Grenadine syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher of ice to chill, adding just enough grenadine to color pink. Add more or less OJ and 7-up to achieve desired strength. Strain into bottle to serve as shooters or serve the whole pitcher with a number of straws for a group to slurp down at the same time!!

drinks.name: Burning Nazi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Keep bottles chilled or mix over ice and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Spicey Scot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Spiced rum
  • 3 oz Hot chocolate
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add equal parts of liqeuer to hot chocolate or cocoa and top with whipped cream and shave chocolate, cinnamon or nutmeg.

drinks.name: Apple Pie Shot #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Apple juice
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • A dash of Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour one shot of Apple Juice and another of Vodka. Sprinkle cimmamon on the tougue and pour both shots into your mouth. Without drinking, shake your head until cimmamon is dissovled and drink. (Repeat if nessesary....or unconscious on the floor.)

drinks.name: Fuzzy Navel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Peach schnapps
  • 1/3 Orange juice
  • 1/3 Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients into glass, top with ice.

drinks.name: Chocolate Chip
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Irish cream
  • 1 1/2 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Half fill shaker with ice. Add liquers and top with milk. Shake and pour over ice.

drinks.name: Tequillya
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz White rum
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Margarita mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients together into glass, over ice. Mix well. Serve with lime and salted glass if desired.

drinks.name: Whiskey Sour Old-Fashioned
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Whiskey
  • 5 oz Sour mix
  • 1 tblsp Maraschino cherry juice
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Whiskey, Bitters, and Cherry Juice in a ice-filled cocktail class, and fill the remaining class with sour. Garnish with olives or mushrooms and use a stir stick to mix and your mouth and taste buds to enjoy.

drinks.name: Toolkit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Creme de Cacao
  • 1 part Irish cream
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients and pour into shot glasses. Slam it!!

drinks.name: Big Red Hooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila and amaretto over ice into collins glass. Fill with pineapple juice and top with grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Catalina Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 4 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into chilled cocktail or margarita glass.

drinks.name: Sloe Tequila
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients with a half-cup of crushed ice in blender. Blend at low speed and pour into old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes and twist of cucumber peel.

drinks.name: Tijuana Taxi
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gold tequila
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Tropical fruit schnapps
  • Lemon-lime soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila, curacao, and schnapps over ice into large highball glass. Fill with lemon-lime soda and garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

drinks.name: Wild Thing
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Club soda
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice into old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

drinks.name: Fraustadt
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 2 cl Cointreau
  • 2 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • Fill with Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the Boston shaker with all the ingridiens and a lot of icecubes, then shake untill your hands goes into hypothermia. Pour up in a highball glas and put a lemonslice on the edge.

drinks.name: Mudwrestle
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tia maria
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix in shaker, serve over lots of ice

drinks.name: Blue Tahoe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • 1 slice Orange
  • 4-5 Ice cubes
  • 1 Cherry
  • Mint leaves
  • Fill with Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in together followed by the champagne last

drinks.name: Pineapple Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Optional splash of 7up or Sprite can be added... Shake Until condensation forms on outside of shaker Strain into shot glasses

drinks.name: Fin N' Tonic
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 oz Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix ingredients and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Kurant
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Kurant
  • Fill with Schweppes Russchian
  • Some Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put some icecubes into a highball glass. Pour Absolut Kurant in the glass and fill up with Russian. Add a straw. Drink.

drinks.name: '57 Chevy with a White License Plate
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice 2.add white creme de cacao and vodka 3.stir

drinks.name: Beelzebub
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Cointreau
  • 1 bottle Vodka
  • 3 tblsp Chili sauce, hot
drinks.mixinginstructions: Usually you mix the Cointreau with the hot chili sauce before you start to mix the drink. It needs to mix well. Then you pour the right amount into a shot glass, and add the vodka.(50/50)(The amount of chili sauce can be altered to find the mix that will grow hair on your chest)

drinks.name: Desert Water
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tabasco sauce
  • Fill with 1 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a spoon when You pour the Tequila into the glass, so it doesn't mix with the Tabasco

drinks.name: Cape Cod Crush
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
  • Blend with Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend the Southern Comfort, cranberry juice, and ice in a blender. Pour and serve.

drinks.name: Sweet Flower
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Peach liqueur
  • 1/2 Orange juice
  • 1/6 Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: 1. Shake all ingredients. 2. pour into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Sweet Temptation
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 cl Triple sec, blue
  • 1/2 cl Peachtree schnapps
  • Add 11-13 cl Sprite or 7-up
  • Fizz on top 2-4 cl Sour mix (lime mix)
  • Ice cubes
  • 1 slice Lime on top
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a Higball glass 2/3 with ice cubes. build the alcoholic and the sprite into the glass. The sour mix on top as a fizz.(shaken/mixed). Served with straw and a slice of citrus on top.

drinks.name: Violent fuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • Fill 1/2 Sour mix
  • Fill 1/2 Orange juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice, add 1oz. curaco 1/2oz sloe gin fill 1/2 sour mix, 1/2 oj blend for 2 secs, garnish with cherry

drinks.name: Fuzzy Chartreuse
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Midori melon liqueur
  • Ginger ale
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Glass half full with crushed ice Add Midori Then fill glass the rest of the way full with Ginger Ale This should result in a Chartreuse colored drink. Add more Midori to your taste.

drinks.name: Chapman
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Pisang Ambon
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take the pisang ambon in the glas, and then the milk. Then shake it... Enjoy...!

drinks.name: Bloody O.J.
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bourbon
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Tomato juice
  • 1 dash Soda water
  • 2 cubes crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the ingredients in a glass, stir.

drinks.name: Dead Dog Vomit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz 151 proof rum
  • Layer 1 oz Tequila
  • Layer 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a high-ball glass add 0ne shot of 151 rum and then layer each if the other ingredents on top.

drinks.name: Stabilizer
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 3/4 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill the Rumple Minze until VERY cold. Then pour over the 151 in a shot glass. They will not layer, so don't try it. Then drink the shot quickly...don't waste time smelling the shot or sipping it...just drink it. The sit back and enjoy!

drinks.name: Mother's Milk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake over ice, strain. Serves two.

drinks.name: The Triple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 shot Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Straight out of the freezer, pour into a double shot glass the vodka, then JÃ¤germeister, then Goldschlager.

drinks.name: Sinfonian
drinks.ingredients:
• Kahlua
  • Grenadine
  • Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: In the Shot Glass, layer equal parts of each Liquer, the Grenadine on the bottom, the Kahlua in the middle, and the Grand Marnier on top. This creates red, Black, and Gold Layers.

drinks.name: Dickhead's Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 4 oz Chocolate milk
  • 1 pinch Cinnamon
  • 1 splash Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix liquor and chocolate milk in a higball glass, then top with whipped cream and cinnamon.

drinks.name: Kilted Black Leprechaun
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part Drambuie
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer ingredients in the glass, in the following order: Baileys first, Malibu next, Drambuie last Serve with a smile (to placate the Leprechauns), wearing no underwear (och!), and thinking of sex (mon). Glug. Whee!

drinks.name: Irish Monk #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Frangelico
  • 1 part Brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into the shot glass in the following order: - Baileys first, - Frangelico next, - Brandy on top.

drinks.name: Zippy's Revenge
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Rum
  • 4 oz Grape Kool-Aid
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and ammaretto. shake well to disolve the sugar in the Kool-Aid... serve cold

drinks.name: Sangrita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 oz Clamato juice
  • A few drops of Tabasco sauce
  • A dash of Worcestershire sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill one shooter with Tequila. Take a second shot glass and fill it with clamato. Then add a couple drops of tabasco and worchestershire sauce. Shoot the tequila and chase it with the second shot. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Coco Cognac
drinks.ingredients:
• 28 ml Cognac
  • 14 ml Tia maria
  • 56 ml Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the ingredients in a shaker with ice cubes, shake, and pour in a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Belgian Blue
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 1 cl Coconut liqueur or coconut milk
  • 1 cl Blue Curacao
  • Fill with Sprite or 7-up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour all ingredients in the glass and stir...

drinks.name: B-52 #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Kahlua
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the three ingredients in that order. And, I am terrible sorry, this is the only way to make a B-52 the right way.

drinks.name: Black and White
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Kahlua
  • 3 cl Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir the ingredients with and and pour into a well-chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Pure White Evil
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Everclear, 190 proof
  • 2 oz Rum
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 5 oz Whisky
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
  • 1 wedge Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix toghter, light, drink, wake up in bed.

drinks.name: Evil Slider
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Vodka
  • 5 oz Iced tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix well

drinks.name: Screaming Orgasm (San Francisco Style)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Triple sec or other Orange Liquer
  • 0.5 oz Cognac
drinks.mixinginstructions: Simply mix then add ice.

drinks.name: Gladiator
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix 1/2 oz Amaretto with 1/2 oz Southern Comfort. Drop into glass of 2 oz orange juice mixed with 2 oz 7-up.

drinks.name: Hard Green Bricaki
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 dash Lime juice
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice and add liquors. Add a dash of lime juice. Fill to top with pineapple juice. Shake well and serve. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry.

drinks.name: Red Snapper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Crown Royal
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 shot Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: One shot each, shake n shoot

drinks.name: Shamrocks
drinks.ingredients:
• Blue Curacao
  • Vodka
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts Curacao and Vodka and and O.J for a Light Green color. Erin Go Bragh!!

drinks.name: Russian Qualude
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 shot Irish cream
  • 1 shot Frangelico
  • Top off 1 oz Cream or Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour alchol over ice, top with milk, stir and serve

drinks.name: Triple Asp
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 2 cl Absolut Citron
  • 2 cl Absolut Kurant
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor the ingredients in a glass. Ice if preffered. Drink it on a hot summer-night.

drinks.name: Jamaica Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Coffee liqueur
  • 1 shot Jamaican Light rum
  • Ice cubes
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a tumbler with ice cubes. Add a shot of Tia Maria and a shot of Jamaican light rum. Fill the tumbler with milk. Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

drinks.name: PEZ
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 part Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 part Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix all three ingredients together over ice in tumbler. shake well. for shot, strain ice. for drink, retain ice. adjust sour mix ratio to taste.

drinks.name: Robyn
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Vodka
  • Schweppes Russchian
  • 1 drop Lime juice
  • Fill with fruit flavored Carbonated soft drink
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka into a highballglass, add russian 'til the glass is a little more than half-full, fill up with fruitsoda and top it with a drop of lime juice.

drinks.name: White Spider #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz White Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over lots of ice.

drinks.name: Copenheering
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Cherry Heering
  • 3 cl Vodka
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Cherry Heering and vodka and pour into a ice cold glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Squashed Frog
drinks.ingredients:
• 15 ml Midori melon liqueur
  • 10 ml Advocaat
  • 10 ml Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 dashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Midori then Advocaat in glass. Add a few dashes of grenadine and then float Bailey's on top.

drinks.name: Absolut Summertime
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 3/4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1/2 oz Sprite or 7-up
  • 3 oz Soda water
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients except lemon to shaker filled with ice. Cover and shake vigorously. Strain contents into ice filled collins glass. Garnish with lemon.

drinks.name: The Jack Hammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both shots into one shot glass, straight up!

drinks.name: Paralyzer #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 4 oz Light cream
  • 4 1/2 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Built in a 8-10 oz zombie or collins glass,over ice .First add the tequila, vodka & kahlua.fill glass 1/2 full with coke,then top with light cream or milk.There is no garnish. but stir gently with straw.

drinks.name: Pink Panther #2
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • Lime
  • Fill with Grape soda, pink (Fanta)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all the ingredients into the glass, and stir for a moment.

drinks.name: Red Alert
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-1/2 oz Tequila (white)
  • 1-1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 oz Sloe gin
  • Fill with Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients together and serve

drinks.name: The Terminator
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in your favorite shot glass and enjoy. Ahh... so smoothe!

drinks.name: San Juan Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 3 oz Sour mix
  • Top with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake liquor and sour mix. Garnish with lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Smooth Sailin'
drinks.ingredients:
• 32 oz Cranberry juice cocktail
  • 28 oz Ginger ale
  • 12 oz Lemonade
  • 1-1/2 cup Bourbon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a medium-sized bowl. Freeze in small airtight containers. To serve, remove from freezer and let thaw about 10 minutes. Scrape or scoop into stemmed glasses. Serve with straws, if desired. Makes 14 six-ounce drinks.

drinks.name: Buzzer's red cream soda
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz Gin
  • 4 oz Vodka
  • 5 oz Yukon Jack
  • 3 oz Triple sec
  • 3 oz Grenadine
  • 1 cup Lemonade
  • 2 handfuls crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place crushed ice in blender (at least 5 cup size) Add other ingredients in order given (alcohol first) Blend until ice crystals are thoroughly mixed and drink turns red.

drinks.name: Formula 3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White rum
  • 1 oz amber Rum
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 7 oz Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the 2 rums and vodka together in a beer mug. Then add the other 2 ingredients to it. Then top off the beer mug with lemonade.

drinks.name: Leg spreader
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in glass and enjoy

drinks.name: Gorilla Milk
drinks.ingredients:
• Fill glass with Ice cubes
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve.

drinks.name: Golden Miller
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Grand Marnier or Triple Sec
  • 1 part Creme de Cacao
  • 1 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix above ingred. together with LOTS of crushed ice. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients in mixing glass half filled with ice, shake and strain into chilled Martini glass.

drinks.name: Strawberry Surprise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 glass Ice
  • 1 shot Light rum
  • 1 shot Strawberry syrup
  • 1 shot Pina colada mix
  • 1 can Sprite (Or 7-UP)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice and shots in a hurricane or other tall glass. Add 1/2 of the sprite. Shake Well Add rest of sprite. Finished ingredient should look similar to pink lemonade. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Rensselaer Slam
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part hot Coffee
  • 3 parts Irish cream
  • 1 part Coffee brandy
  • 1 part Rum or vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix liquor with hot coffee.

drinks.name: Firetruck
drinks.ingredients:
• 2-4 cl JÃ¤germeister
  • 2-4 cl Ginger ale or Red Soda Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve in a Shotglass, and toss it straight down.

drinks.name: Brevann (Springwater)
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Banana liqueur
  • 20 cl Sour mix
  • 5 cl 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Everything goes in a highballglass with ice. Pour Seven Up or Sprite on the top Garnish with lemon and some other fresh fruit. Drink with a straw

drinks.name: Carrot Cake #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp Goldschlager
  • 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 oz Coffee liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Place a tsp. (float) of Goldschlager in glass. Fill rest of glass with Irish Creme and Coffee Liqueur. Shake. Pour into shot glasses.

drinks.name: Dit Kicker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 glass Fruit punch
  • 3 shots Vodka
  • 2 shots Peach schnapps
  • 3 splashes Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the fruit punch into a glass. Add the Vodka and Schnapps. The correct amount of lemon juice all depends on personal preference. A couple of splashes is a good mix to start with.

drinks.name: Slimer
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 1/5 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 20 oz Surge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add liquer first. Use a glass beverage container to highlight the the green color.

drinks.name: Football
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Fernet Branca
  • 1 splash Cream (whipped)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with Fernet Branca and drop a splash of cream in. You can always use also foamed cream.

drinks.name: Reynolds Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Grapefruit juice
  • Add 4-5 cubes Ice
  • Fill 4-5 oz Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a tall glass pour a generous shot or two of gin and a roughly equal amount of grapefruit juice add plenty of ice fill with tonic (preferably diet) lime twist is optional

drinks.name: Carrot Cake #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Cinnamon schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mixing cup up with ice Add ingredients Shake and strain

drinks.name: Woody Woodpecker
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Cachaca
  • 15 cl Orange juice
  • 1 cl Galliano
  • 3 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Cachaca and juice with ice. Fill it in the glas. Add Galiano.

drinks.name: Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vermouth
  • 16 cl Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve without ice. At least the juice shold have room temperature.

drinks.name: Pitbull on Crack #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Jim Beam
  • 1 part Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: chill and serve

drinks.name: Bullshot
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Beef bouillon, strong, cold
  • 3-4 Ice cubes
  • Salt
  • Black pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the ice, vodka and beef boullion in a mixing glass, add salt and pepper to taste. Stir. Strain into a chilled wineglass.

drinks.name: Salty Dog #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz fresh Grapefruit juice
  • 4 oz Vodka
  • pinch Powdered sugar (caster sugar)
  • 4-6 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the grapefruit juice, vidka sugar and 4 or 5 ice cubes in a mixing glass, and stir gently with a bar spoon to dissolve the sugar and combine the ingredients. Strain into a chilled wineglass. Add 1 ice cube to the wineglass if desired.

drinks.name: Fiery Balls of Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/3 shot Everclear
  • 1/3 shot Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the shit in the shot glass. Light on fire, pray for your life and down it.

drinks.name: Vodka Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 Olive
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the vodka and vermouth together with a number of ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive and serve.

drinks.name: KiBa
drinks.ingredients:
• 100 ml Cherry juice
  • 100 ml Banana juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes and serve.

drinks.name: Passion Chi-Chi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1.5 oz Passion fruit juice
  • 1 oz Coconut milk
  • 2 tblsp Sugar
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together in a mixer, and then put them in a glass with all ice.

drinks.name: Volga Boatman
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1/2 Orange
  • 3 oz Vodka
  • 1 tsp Kirschwasser
  • 3-4 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the orange juice, vodka and kirsch in a mixing glass and add the ice cubes. Place a shaker on top of the glass and, grasping them firmly together with both hands, shake vigorously. Remove the shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Shark Bite
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 3/4 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 3 drops Grenadine as garnish
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add the spiced rum, light rum, sour, and blue curacco. Shake the ingredients well. Strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with three drops of grenadine.

drinks.name: Honolulu Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pack a tall glass with crushed ice, add lime juice and southern comfort. Fill with pineapple juice and stir.

drinks.name: Pepper Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 cup Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: add southern comfort to glass with ice. fill with dr. pepper pop.

drinks.name: Cafe Savoy
drinks.ingredients:
• Coffee
  • Milk (optional)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mug almost to top with coffee.Add milk, triple sec and brandy. Stir.

drinks.name: Pearl Harbour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 5 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Straight with ice.

drinks.name: Fireball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the cinnamon schnapps in shot glass and add the dash of Tabasco Sauce. Then shoot.

drinks.name: Italian Ice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • 2 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Well - Do not stir. Best if served with crushed ice.

drinks.name: Barcardi Volcano
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1/2 glass Coca-Cola
  • 1/2 glass Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 jigger Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the juice of 1/2 Lime in glass, then pour in cola and barcardi dark. Top up with Everclear. Light. Figure out how to drink it!

drinks.name: Hot Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl hot Coffee
  • 2 cl Galliano
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the hot coffee in the shot glass and gently add the Galliano, so it floats on the coffee. Then add some lightly whipped cream over it.

drinks.name: Irish Coffee #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 Orange peel strips
  • 4 Lemon peel strips
  • 16 whole Cloves
  • 1 stick Cinnamon
  • 2 tsp Sugar
  • 1/4 pint Irish whiskey
  • 3/4 pint strong and hot Coffee
  • Powdered sugar (caster sugar)
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stud the strips of orange and lemon peel with 2 cloves each and place them in a frying pan or chafing dish with the stick of cinnamon and the 2 teaspoons of sugar. Place over moderate heat, stirring occationally with a wooden spoon, until the sugar has melted. Pour the Irish Whiskey into the pan and light a match to the liquid. (Be sure to step back since the flame will flare up instantly.) Shake the pan to and fro slowly until the flame dies out. Pour in the hot coffee all at once and let it come to a simmer. Remove from the heat. Rub the cut edge of a strip of lemon peel around the inside of each the irish coffee cup and dip it into a dish of caster sugar so that the sugar adheres to the inside rim. Pour in the coffee, trying not to disturb the sugar. Top each serving with a dollop of whipped cream.

drinks.name: Snowball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Advocaat
  • 8-10 oz cold Lemonade
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

drinks.name: Cokaretto
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Amaretto
  • 8-12 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill tall glass with ice. Pour Coca-Cola into glass. Add amaretto and stir. Drink with straw.

drinks.name: Tripple Pleasure
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Yukon Jack
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: dump it in a glass of ice and enjoy

drinks.name: Robot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint Jack Daniels
  • 1/8 pint Absolut Vodka
  • 2 drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix well, add ice last. Serves two normal people or one alcoholic.

drinks.name: Green Orange
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Pisang Ambon
  • Add 2 parts Orange juice
