drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Pisang Ambon into a glass, of the approx. size 1 dl. Slowly pour the OJ into the liquor. No stirring... Enjoy !

drinks.name: Kalimocho
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Red wine, cheap wine will do
  • 75 cl Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Drink (or throw away) one half of a 1.5 ltr. bottle of Coke. Then simply pour the wine into the bottle, slowly, so that it gets full. Do not shake the bottle, but simply turn it over a couple of times.

drinks.name: Charlie Shaker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Charleston Follies
  • 2 cl Aquavit
  • 1 cl Lime juice
  • 3 cl indian Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add aquavite and Charleston Follies and stir it with ice. Add lime and tonic water. Fresh up with slice of lemon and red cocktail berry.

drinks.name: Mocha-Berry
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Coffee
  • 2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 2 tblsp Cocoa powder
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Tahitian Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add 1/2 oz of each liquor. Fill with 3 oz of each juice. Shake. Serve in a Hurricane or Collins glass. Garnish with fruit slices (if you have the patience). Enjoy!

drinks.name: C*m Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend liquors in shot glass. Top with whipped cream. Serve.

drinks.name: Navel Caribbean Love
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Malibu rum
  • 5 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 3 oz of Malibu into the Hurricane glass. Slowly pour in the Orange juice, and VOILA!

drinks.name: Clam Eye
drinks.ingredients:
• 7 oz Clamato juice (preferably Motts)
  • 1 bottle Beer (preferably canadian)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Clamato (keep at room temperature). Pour Clamato into Pilsner glass or oversized beer mug. Pour beer generously down the inside of the glass until full. Be careful of foaming head. Add celery salt, tobasco sauce, and/or worchestershire sauce for flavouring.

drinks.name: Afterburner #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Aftershock
  • 1/2 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour both ingredients and let them mix some(you can stir it some to help it out)

drinks.name: Midori Splice
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Midori melon liqueur
  • 30 ml Malibu rum
  • Top with Pineapple juice
  • Float 30 ml Cream (or half-and-half)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build all ingredients over ice in a tall glass. Float fresh cream last.

drinks.name: Somebird
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Galliano
  • 1 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 1 cl Banana liqueur
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • Fill up Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in random order and shake on ice.

drinks.name: Dr. Pepper #1
drinks.ingredients:
• Half mug Beer
  • Half mug Coca-Cola
  • 1 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place half a beer into a beer mug. Add to this half a can of coke. Pour an ounce of amaretto into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the mug and CHUG immediately!!!

drinks.name: Gumbys' Ruby Red
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz White rum
  • 3 oz ruby red Grapefruit juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • Fill up Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Rum, grapefruit juice and pineapple juice. Stir well and add ice cubes to the top for a delicious drink.

drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 part Kahlua
  • 1/3 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 part Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour kaluha, then Baileys, then Frangelico not chilled and not layered -- SERVE!!!

drinks.name: Southern Doctor
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Southern Comfort in mason jar, fill with Dr. Pepper, chill with ice, and throw a party!

drinks.name: Strawberry Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass and slam. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Pisang Garuda
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 4 cl White rum
  • Fill with Bitter lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice cubes. Garnish: Slice of orange. Two straws.

drinks.name: Green Dinosaur #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Rum
  • 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • 2 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all and stir. Serve in highball glass over ice

drinks.name: Comfort Driver
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Southern Comfort
  • Orange juice
  • 3 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour orange juice over 3 cubes ice in a highball glass add Southern Comfort and stir lightly

drinks.name: Chocolate Covered Cherry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 0.5 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Chocolate milk
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well, strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Buffalo Sweat
drinks.ingredients:
• 4/5 oz Bourbon
  • 1/5 oz Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir in a shotglass. Drink quickly.

drinks.name: All Night Long
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all together in hurricane glass. Shake well. Garnish-orange flag

drinks.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster
drinks.ingredients:
• 35 cl Tia maria
  • 35 cl Vodka
  • 17.5 cl Cherry brandy
  • 1 dash Lime juice
  • 1/2 glass 7-Up
  • 1/2 glass dry Cider
  • About 4 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a pintglass (= approx. 0.5 litres) Put the Tia Maria, the vodka and the cherry brandy together. Add a dash of lime juice. Fill the rest of the glass up with (50% - 50%) with dry cider and 7 -up Add ice cubes.

drinks.name: Bay Breeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Stoli Vodka
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: First, add cubed ice, then add the three parts stoli, then add the pineapple juice and last but not least, add the cranberry juice for color.

drinks.name: Water (the original)
drinks.ingredients: • Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Funny how the program wouldn't let me post this without adding mixing instructions. There are so many ways to get hold of it. You can draw it, pour it, dig for it or simply dig it, you can get it from a well, a tap, a source, a fountain, a stream, you can drink it straight up, out of your hand, from a glass, a bottle, a jar and a container. Soft water may have the disadvantage of containing only minute quantities of magnesium, whereas hard water might be bad for your favourite sweat-shirt... But all in all, NO WATER - NO LIFE. So get a life, care for your water.

drinks.name: Lemon Drop #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Absolut Citron
  • 1/2 shot Sweet and sour
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • 1/2 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts Absolut Citron and sweet & sour over ice then strain into a shot glass. Sprinkle sugar on lemon slice. Drink shot, then suck the lemon!

drinks.name: Bourbon and sprite
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Bourbon (Henry McKenna bourbon)
  • 7 oz Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the bourbon into the highball or whiskey sour glass with some ice. cubes preferred then mix the rest of glass with Sprite or Seven up.

drinks.name: Thunder king
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Whiskey
  • 10 ml Coffee
  • 5 ml Milk
  • 2 ml Absolut Citron
  • 4 parts Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix it and shake it..

drinks.name: Bongs Anfield Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 cl Coffee (Cappuchino)
  • 1 cl Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just Mix it together, with the most alcoholic drinks in the end.... Good luck!!!!

drinks.name: Addison Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker. Fill half full with ice and shake well. Strain into glass with ice and garnish with a cherry and orange wedge.

drinks.name: Party Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 measure Lemon vodka
  • 2 measures Schweppes Russchian
  • 4 measures Schweppes Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix them together, softs first, then the vodka. Serve ice cold.

drinks.name: Ozone
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Amaretto
  • Splash Beer
  • 3 oz Sweet and sour
  • Splash Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice Add Amaretto Add splash beer Add sweet & sour Top with sprite Stir lightly

drinks.name: Cranberry Blast
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Cranberry juice
  • 1.5 shot Peach schnapps
  • 0.5 shot Dark rum
  • 0.5 shot Vodka
  • 0.5 shot Scotch
  • 0.5 shot Orange juice
  • 1 splash Lemon juice
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over cubed or crushed ice stir well and serve!

drinks.name: Wiggle Worm
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 jiggers Vodka
  • 0.5 cup Tropicana strawberry/orange/banana
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 2 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Well. Put Vodka in first. Put cherry in last. Add ice if needed.

drinks.name: California Root Beer
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Kahlua
  • 3/4 oz Galliano
  • Fill with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Kahlua and Galliano in highball glass fill with soda

drinks.name: Nikki Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Sloe gin
  • 1 shot Rum
  • 5 cubes Ice
  • 1 shot Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor all ingredients over ICE and STIR don't Shake....

drinks.name: Malibu Dreams
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Malibu rum (or Bacardi)
  • 1 splash Grenadine syrup
  • Fill with 7-Up (or any lemon-lime soda)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Malibu and Grenadine together. Fill with soda.

drinks.name: Blackbeard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 oz Root beer schnapps
  • Fill with Pepsi Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Captain Morgan's, and root beer schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with Coke or Pepsi and serve.

drinks.name: Backdraft
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Drambuie
  • 1.5 oz Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour equal amounts into Brandy Snifter and light.

drinks.name: Jo-Jo Cool-Aid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Southern Coffort and Amaretto. Fill the rest of the glass with cranberry juice

drinks.name: The Whammie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Peach brandy
  • 1 oz Creme de Cassis
  • 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1 oz Raspberry liqueur
  • Fill with equal part Orange juice
  • And Pineapple juice
  • Add Grenadine until drink is pink
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a 20 ounce glass with ice. Add the 7 shots. Finish off with with orange and pineapple juice. Add Grenadine until it turns pink. Top with Cherries.

drinks.name: Lysekil's groggen
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 cl Vodka
  • 10 cl Orange juice
  • 12 cl Schweppes Russchian
drinks.mixinginstructions: First you take vodka then you take O j then ster then you fill it up with russian and ice cubes

drinks.name: Hot Dick #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Grand Marnier
  • 2 shots Bailey's irish cream
  • Add 4 oz hot Coffee, or enough to fill mug
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquors into large irish coffee mug. Add enough strong hot coffee to fill mug. Top with whipped cream if desired, garnish with chocolate sprinkles or butterscotch sprinkles if desired.

drinks.name: BAV(BAW)
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl Advocaat
  • 2 cl Vodka or whiskey
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or stir and enjoy

drinks.name: Amaretto Stone Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Sour mix
  • 1 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and Serve over ice

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1/4 oz Lime juice
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec or Cointreau
  • 1/4 cup Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Quickly shake and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

drinks.name: Frozen Mudslide #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rum
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Irish cream
  • 2 cups Vanilla ice-cream (add till desired texture)
  • 1 oz Chocolate syrup (Hershey's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all liquid ingrediance into mixer. Add vanilla icecream and mix. Add more icecream till desired texture.

drinks.name: Tropical Storm Jack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1 oz Coconut rum
  • 1/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all in hi-ball glass and shake garnish with lime

drinks.name: Rum a'la Olof
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl blended Rum
  • 20 ml Lemon juice
  • 50 ml Whipped cream
  • 5 ml hot Coffee
  • 5 gr Cocoa powder
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poure the rum and the lemon-juice in the bowl, and mix it. Then you take the cocoa-powder and the hot coffee and mix it with the other stuff in the bowl. After that you poure your mixture in a shot-glass. The whipped cream you put on the top of the glass. Ready to be served!

drinks.name: Bailey's Hot Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • Very little granulated Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: - Put Irish Cream in large glass and microwave on HIGH power for half a minute or so. - While that's going, rim the shot glasses with sugar - Pour heated Bailey's into shot glasses and serve immediately

drinks.name: Light and Dark
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 1/2 oz Dark rum (Myers)
  • 1 oz crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add sour mix and shake in whiskey sour rock glass or 10 oz. goblet. Garnish with lime wedge

drinks.name: Pink Elephants On Parade
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Pink lemonade
  • 2 tblsp Sugar
  • 0.5 oz Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix, drink fast, shudder

drinks.name: White Spider #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sour mix
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau (or triple sec)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Brown Cow from Hell
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 or 3 oz Kahlua
  • Full glass of Milk
  • A few squirt Chocolate syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients until no chocolate residue is left on bottom of glass. Serve chilled. Enjoy!!

drinks.name: Apple Pie Shot #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 shot Vodka
  • Fill with Apple juice
  • dash Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: bang glass on table and immediately take shot

drinks.name: Stardust
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1/2 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shaker cup with ice. Pour in all ingredients. Shake and strain into shooter glass of preference.

drinks.name: Kahlua and Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• Kahlua
  • 1 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Kahlua in a glass over ice and 1 ounce cream and shake.

drinks.name: Top Shelf Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 2 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mixing glass with ice Pour in all ingredients Shake well Pour into salt rimmed glass Add lime wedge or wheel

drinks.name: Blue Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 qt Water
  • 1 package Strawberry Kool-Aid
  • 2 shots Blue Curacao to taste
  • 3 shots Vodka to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix into punch bowl and make sure that the koolaid is already pre measurable with sugar already added. Be careful, hard to taste alcohol so intoxication sets in quickly!

drinks.name: Jeweler's Hammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 4 oz White grape juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: This drink is sooo good you will probably want to add 2 oz. of Vodka to 8 oz. of white grape juice. Add more or less Vodka to taste and pour over ice. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Derailer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups Rum
  • 2 cups Gin
  • 2 cups Vodka
  • 2 cups Amaretto
  • 1 cup Triple sec
  • 2 cups Peach schnapps
  • 1 cup Grenadine
  • 1 gal Cranberry juice
  • 1 can Grapefruit juice
  • 2 cups Sloe gin
  • 1 bottle Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: This is the punch we serve at our annual Halloween party. We use a big, black, plastic cauldron to mix this punch in. You can use any LARGE vat to concoct this wonderful drink. Add all alcohols first, then add juices. Add the Sprite just before serving. If you want... do as we do, and drop in chunks of dry-ice to create a bubbling, smoking cauldron of pure Halloweeen evil! It's safe to drink, and does not really change the taste all that much! YAHOO! GET DERAILED!

drinks.name: Lemon Drop #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • Mix with 2 oz Margarita mix (or sweet & sour)
  • Add 2 tblsp Triple sec
  • Juice of 1 Lemon
  • 2 packages Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour over cracked ice, and strain into a cocktail glass with sugar around its rim.

drinks.name: Antifreeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: chill with ice cubes in shaker. Pour into rocks glass or split into two shots

drinks.name: Warp Core Breach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put 1/2 ounce of Goldschlager in 1 1/2 ounce shot glass. Then put Tequila on top followed by Jack Daniels. Down it and party till she's cute.

drinks.name: Shogun
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in blender and garnish with orange slice

drinks.name: Christmas Cheer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Eggnog
  • 1/2 shot Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: stir it up and shoot it down. HO! HO! HO! Tastes like christmas with a pine tree twist.

drinks.name: Amoco Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Everclear
  • 1 drop Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Bacardi 151 in, then the Everclear. Just put a drop of Kahlua right in the middle. Don't smell it, and take it. It should start your engines!

drinks.name: Blind Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3/4 oz Godiva liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • Milk to fill
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add all liquers. Add milk. shake.

drinks.name: Tummy Blower
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/5 glass Bailey's irish cream
  • 2/5 glass 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just Mix together and drink fast !!

drinks.name: Absolut Sex
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Sprite or 7-up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Absolut Kurant, Midori, and Cranberry juice in shaker with ice: Strain into rocks glass: Splash of seven on top.Absolut Sex.

drinks.name: Alien Secretion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix all in equal portions. Its good!

drinks.name: Aztec Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 can Lemonade concentrate
  • 5 oz Vodka
  • 7 oz Rum
  • About 1 bottle Ginger ale and Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher. Mix thoroughly and pour into whatever is available, the bigger the better! This drink packs a big punch, so don't over do it.

drinks.name: Lemon Drop #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Absolut Vodka
  • 1 1/2 shot Cointreau
  • Juice of 1 wedge Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vodka, Cointreau and juice of a lemon wedge well with plenty of ice. Strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon zest.

drinks.name: Apfel Orange
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Apfelkorn
  • 1 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Orange juice
  • 2 cl Sprite or 7-up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the ingredients, add a couple of ice cubes. Put a slice of orange or lemon (any fruit will do!) on the rim of the glass.

drinks.name: Vaina
drinks.ingredients:
• 60 ml Sherry or Oporto
  • 30 ml Chocolate liqueur
  • 30 ml Cognac or Brandy
  • 2 - 3 tblsp Powdered sugar
  • 1 Egg yolk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake it well. Serve in a red wine glass and add in the top a bit of powdered cinnamon .

drinks.name: Absolut limousine
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 Absolut Citron
  • 1/3 Lime juice
  • Fill with Ice and lime wedges
  • Top it up with Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Absolut into a glass. Add Lime juice. Add Ice and lime wedges.

drinks.name: Absolut Evergreen
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 part Absolut Citron
  • 1/3 part Pisang Ambon
  • Ice cubes
  • Top up with Bitter lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix, pour over ice and top up with Bitter Lemon.

drinks.name: Smeraldo
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/10 oz dry Gin
  • 3/10 oz tropical Fruit juice
  • 2/10 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/10 oz Cointreau
  • 1/10 oz Peach nectar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all in a Shacker with Ice, shake it for a while and serve in a cold Cocktail glass

drinks.name: Lunch Box
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 bottle Beer
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a pint glass almost full with beer. Then fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of Amaretto and drop it in.

drinks.name: Starla's Waver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tblsp Milk
  • 3 shots Kahlua
  • 5 shots Absolut Vodka
  • 1 tblsp Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Get a large glass, (any glass but it must be large) Start from the top of the list and work your way down stirring each time you add an ingredient. When you've finished you need not do anything else just drink it.

drinks.name: Status Quo
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 cl dry Gin (Gordon's)
  • 5 cl Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 4 cl Cherry Heering
  • 20 cl Apple juice
  • 5 cl Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything together and add some crunched ice and olives!

drinks.name: JTDelight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 shot Tropical fruit schnapps
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put in the Vokda first then the Tropical Schnapps then add the OJ and the Cranberry Juice.

drinks.name: Sacrilicious
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 1/3 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: chill and strain into a shot glass

drinks.name: Pinky Colinky Dinky
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 crushed Ice
  • 1 part Light rum
  • 1 part Sweet and sour
  • 1 part Maraschino liqueur

drinks.name: Secret Blue
drinks.ingredients:
• 45 ml Vodka
  • 20 ml Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • Soda water to taste
  • 15 ml Blue Curacao
  • 1 tsp Green Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredient vodka, lime and sugar with shaker. Add soda. Pour into Beer-pilsner with Ice. Drop curacao and creme de menthe. Decorate with cut-lime and cherry.

drinks.name: Super Sangria
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 L sweet Red wine
  • 3/4 L Sherry
  • 1/4 L Watermelon schnapps
  • 1/4 L Blackcurrant schnapps
  • 1/4 L Grapefruit schnapps
  • 1/4 L Brandy
  • 1 L Fruit juice (preferrably a Sangria fruit juice mix)
  • 1/2 L Lemon-lime soda
  • 1 bag Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the ingredients besides the ice in a large pitcher (or several smaller). Once thoroughly mixed, add the ice and serve in wine glasses.

drinks.name: Traffic Light Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Gold tequila
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Into pilsner glass filled with ice cubes, first pour the melon liqueur, then the tequila, to create a green layer. Add sour mix. Slowly pour orange juice against side of glass to create the yellow layer. Add a few more ice cubes, if needed. Carefully float the sloe gin on top for the red layer. Garnish with a cherry and lemon and lime wheels. Stir just before drinking.

drinks.name: Snakebite (Aus)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 measure Green Chartreuse
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Chartreuse into shot glass, and dash the Tabasco in. More Tabasco for a more venomous bite!

drinks.name: Shut the hell up
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 part Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 part Crown Royal
  • 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 part Everclear
  • 2 splashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Jager at bottom of glass. Mix Crown, Everclear, & 151 separately to layer on top of the Jager. Splash the Grenadine. Attempt to shoot & SHUT THE HELL UP.

drinks.name: Root Beer Barrel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Root beer schnapps
  • Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass with schnapps. Fill tumbler about 3/4 full of beer. Place filled shot glass upright in filled tumbler. Beer should be just short of covering top of shot glass. Just before drinking, cover entire drink with hand and slam on table or bar. Drink all at once.

drinks.name: Smarty
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 1/2 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ing. over ice, strain and serve! Tastes like a sweet tart!

drinks.name: Sex under the boardwalk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass.

drinks.name: The Lunchbox
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill & strain.

drinks.name: The Roni
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Rum
  • 1 part Coca-Cola
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the shit in a beer mug, mix, and enjoy.

drinks.name: Green wave
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Coconut rum
  • 3/4 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • Fill with 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Sour mix
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour alchol into glass and fill with equal parts of juices and sour mix add ice and enjoy!

drinks.name: Milky Way
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl dry Gin (Beefeater)
  • 3 cl Amaretto di saronno (ILLVA Saronno S.p.a.)
  • 1 cl Strawberry liqueur (Greizer)
  • 1.5 cl Strawberry syrup (Monin)
  • Fill up 3 cl fresh Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Garnish with cut apple, lemon, pineapple-leaves.

drinks.name: Cardicas
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Rum (Bacardi superior)
  • 1 cl Cointreau
  • 1 cl White port
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir. No garnish.

drinks.name: Pucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Whiskey
  • 1 part Grapefruit juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour whiskey generously over ice, add grapefruit juice (preferably unsweetened).

drinks.name: The Liver Transplant
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Vodka
  • 1.5 oz Rum
  • 1.5 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1.5 oz Amaretto
  • 1.5 oz Creme de Almond
  • 1.5 oz Raspberry liqueur
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Sour mix (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Over Ice. Stir, dont shake.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Ethan
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 dashes Lime juice
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 5 drops green Food coloring
  • 2.5 oz Vodka
  • 2.5 oz Green Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients except lime in a cocktail shaker, then shake, and pour into glass. Add lime.

drinks.name: What She's Having
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Absolut Citron (or regular vodka)
  • 4 parts Orange juice
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 splash Grenadine for coloring
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Vodka, then fill with the orange juice. Add the amaretto which should mostly sink to the bottom. Splash in some grenadine to cloud the center of the drink. Serve without mixing or stirring.

drinks.name: Feel like holiday
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Vodka
  • 1 cl Grenadine
  • 10 cl Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir Vodka and Grenadine with ice. Fill in Champagne-flute without the ice. Fill up with champagne.

drinks.name: SD Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Water
  • Juice of 1 Lemon
  • 5 cubes Ice
  • 3 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make fresh homemade lemonade by mixing the juice of one lemon and 8 oz. (one glass) of water. Be sure not to add sugar. Add the vodka and stir then put in the ice.

drinks.name: Satin Angel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Frangelico over ice
  • Fill 3/4 Cream
  • Add 1 splash Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix all ingredients in glass and enjoy!!

drinks.name: Jenny's Concoction
drinks.ingredients:
• 0.5 oz Vodka
  • 0.5 oz Anisette
  • 0,5 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka and anisette into the glass and top it off with orange juice.

drinks.name: Rafu Eighteen
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl 120 proof Vodka
  • 4 cl Pisang Ambon
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • And Sprite
  • Juice of 1 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill vodka and Pisang in the glas. If you tihnk it's to strong you may fill in with more pisang. Fill then with orange juice and sprite, about half of each till the glas is filled. Take then a twist or two of lemon.

drinks.name: Nuts and Berries #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1.5 oz Frangelico
  • 1.5 oz Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients to a tumbler with ice. Shake well. Pour into snifter, ice included.

drinks.name: Coppertone Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Creme de Banane
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • Float Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Creme de Banana, Malibu Rum, Pineapple Juice & ice in mixing tin. Shake or flash blend. Strain over ice and float Midori. Garnish with watermelon wedge.

drinks.name: Fatkid on the Rocks
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 oz Smirnoff Vodka
  • 1 oz Water
  • 2 parts Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the ice cubes in first then add the shots in the order that they're listed.

drinks.name: Sweet-tart Lollipop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 shot Raspberry schnapps
  • 1/4 shot Lime vodka
  • 1/4 shot Amaretto
  • 1/4 shot Bacardi Limon
  • 1/4 shot Peach schnapps
  • Fill glass sweet Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a collins glass over ice (if a 32 oz. glass is available double all the ingredients), mix in a shaker and serve with a cherry. Should taste like the old chalky lollipops that cam on a hard plastic stem!!!!

drinks.name: Kool-Aid Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Grape Kool-Aid
  • 1/2 oz Vodka or rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill half the shot glass with the kool-aid first. Then put a paper towel over the top of the glass and slowly pour in the vodka. If you do it right, you should be able to see that the two liquids are separated, with the vodka on top. Now slam it! The last thing you'll taste is the kool-aid.

drinks.name: Liquid Heroine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1.5 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Rumple Minze and JÃ¤germeister in an iced shaker and strain into shot glass

drinks.name: Oil Slick #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 15 ml Black Sambuca
  • 15 ml White Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place The Creme de menthe in a shot glass, using a tea spoon carefully float the Black Sambuca on top.

drinks.name: Scope
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 glass Ginger ale, Tonic or Soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put double of Creme de Menthe in a 10-12 oz (300-350ml) glass and fill to top with Ginger Ale, Tonic, or Soda Water.

drinks.name: Gin Blossam
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 2 cups Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass about two thirds full of Sprite. Pour in the Schnapps, then gin. Put ice in glass to cool.

drinks.name: Kurant Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Kurant
  • Turkish apple Tea
  • Sugar (if needed)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Absolut Kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add the not too hot(!) apple tea and, if you like, some sugar. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Superfly
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Gin
  • 6 cl Lime juice
  • 30 cl Ginger ale
  • 4-5 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ice first, then the Gin (use high quality like Beefeeter). Then pour on the lime juice (use a sweet brand like Hearts) and the fill upp the class with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Peach Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • dash Grenadine for color
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila, peach schnapps, and sweet & sour over ice. Add grenadine and stir slightly. The drink should fade from yellow to red. You can also put ingredients in a blender with ice for a frozen version.

drinks.name: Ultimate Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • Juice of 1/4 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila, Cointreau, and sweet & sour over crushed ice. Add lime juice. Can be made frozen by putting in a blender with 3 cups ice.

drinks.name: Oil Slick #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 15 ml Black Sambuca
  • 15 ml White Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place The Creme de menthe in a shot glass, using a tea spoon carefully float the Black Sambuca on top.

drinks.name: Scope
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 glass Ginger ale, Tonic or Soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put double of Creme de Menthe in a 10-12 oz (300-350ml) glass and fill to top with Ginger Ale, Tonic, or Soda Water.

drinks.name: Gin Blossam
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 2 cups Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass about two thirds full of Sprite. Pour in the Schnapps, then gin. Put ice in glass to cool.

drinks.name: Kurant Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Kurant
  • Turkish apple Tea
  • Sugar (if needed)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Absolut Kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add the not too hot(!) apple tea and, if you like, some sugar. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Superfly
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Gin
  • 6 cl Lime juice
  • 30 cl Ginger ale
  • 4-5 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ice first, then the Gin (use high quality like Beefeeter). Then pour on the lime juice (use a sweet brand like Hearts) and the fill upp the class with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Peach Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • dash Grenadine for color
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila, peach schnapps, and sweet & sour over ice. Add grenadine and stir slightly. The drink should fade from yellow to red. You can also put ingredients in a blender with ice for a frozen version.

drinks.name: Ultimate Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • Juice of 1/4 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila, Cointreau, and sweet & sour over crushed ice. Add lime juice. Can be made frozen by putting in a blender with 3 cups ice.

drinks.name: Dick Deming Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 0.5 oz White wine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix. Pretend it's a martini. Plastic glasses are the best for this beast.

drinks.name: Die ruhige Sturm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 gal Coca-Cola
  • 1/2 gal JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the 2 half gallons of each in a large enough container, chill in the freezer for a maximum of 1 hour.

drinks.name: Darkwood Sling
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cherry Heering
  • 1 part Soda water or tonic water
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use, but I prefere Heering. Add one share of the liqueur. Then you add one share of Soda. For a sour sling use Tonic (most people prefer the drink without Tonic). Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes.

drinks.name: Soft Serbian
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Smirnoff Vodka
  • 1 cl Pernod
  • 1 cl Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • Fill half 12 cl Orange juice
  • Fill rest 12 cl Tonic water
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix alcohol, then juice and tonic water. Add crushed ice and drink.

drinks.name: Headcrush
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Tequila
  • 2 cl Tabasco sauce
  • On top Whipped cream
  • Little Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with Tequila then add Tabasco sauce carfully, put on a top with whipped cream and add some salt on it.

drinks.name: Brass Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Basically, toss the Rum & Vodka together and stir gently. Next, pour in the orange juice . Shake well. Pour over ice.

drinks.name: Tina Baker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill with 1/2 Orange juice
  • Fill with 1/2 7-Up or Sprite
  • Add a dash of Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1/1/2 oz. of peach scnapps. Then fill the glass about 1/2 full with o.j. Next fill the rest of the glass with 7-up or Sprite. Top the drink off with a dash of grenadine. Garnish with a flag.

drinks.name: Big Bull
drinks.ingredients:
• Part 1 Tequila
  • Part 2 Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix tequila and kahlua in a whiskey glass and serve with lotsa ice...

drinks.name: Buzz Inducer
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Root beer (IBC prefered)
  • 2 shots Yukon Jack
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the two shots into frosty beer mug. Add IBC Root Beer into glass. Ice cubes are optional.

drinks.name: Dephaekt
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Kurant
  • 1,5 cl Orgeat syrup
  • 1 cl Frangelico
  • Fill with 2/3 Cranberry juice
  • Fill with 1/3 Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend the Absolut kurant, Oregat and Frangelico in a mixer. Pour in highball glass, add 2 icecubes, fill with the cranberryjuice and sprite. Put a slice of lemon on the edge of the glass. Optional to add a dash of lime for an even fresher taste.

drinks.name: Bambi's Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • Half fill Coca-Cola
  • Half fill 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in glass Pour in vodka Add splash of Sour Mix Half fill with cola Half fill with 7-Up Roll drink to remove fizz Drink!

drinks.name: YoYo Blow Out
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Light rum
  • 2 parts Sour mix
  • 1 part crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Throw it all together and have fun. Adjust sour mix for a stiffer or weaker drink.

drinks.name: Pyro
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Firewater
  • 1 splash Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix as normal, pour in shot glass, and set on fire. Put it out any way you want.

drinks.name: Prince of Norway
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz part Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1/4 oz Lime juice
  • fill Sprite
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with Icecubes, pour all ingrediences into glass. Garnish with orange slice.

drinks.name: Inferno
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Absolut Peppar
  • 1 part Everclear, 190 proof
  • 6 drops Tabasco sauce
  • 1 pinch Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the tabasco sauce in the bottom of a shot glass, pour equal parts Absolut Peppar and Everclear 190 then add salt. Set on fire and serve.

drinks.name: Bailey's Dream Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend ingredients for 30 seconds. Definitely refreshing for a hot summer's day !

drinks.name: Dirty Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 6 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: blend ice and ice-cream in the blender until smooth. add liquers and continue blending until smooth. if needed add more ice-cream to acheive milk shake type consistency.

drinks.name: Gremlin
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Crown Royal
  • 3 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 2 cups Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Into a mason jar filled with cracked ice, pour 6 oz Canadian Whisky and 3 oz Sweetened lime juice. Stir with a fork.

drinks.name: Carmina Burana
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Smirnoff Vodka
  • 2 pieces Candy Sharp's Original Blackcurrant Menthol
drinks.mixinginstructions: Crush the two pieces of candy until they are pulverised. Pour the vodka into the shot glass before adding the powder. Stir it until the candy has dissolved in the liquor.

drinks.name: Charlie Coke
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 bottle Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 1.5 oz. Absolut Vodka to 10 oz. cocktail glass filled with ice, top off with Coka-Cola.

drinks.name: Cape Breton Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• Bacardi Limon
  • Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in the lemonade with the Bacardi Limon. If it is a good lemonade you're using you can mix as much as half & half and not be able to taste the rum.

drinks.name: Monkey Spam
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 15 cl Fanta
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Irish Cream into a highballglass. Pour the Fanta over it and watch as it explodes

drinks.name: Coon Dawg Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/5 part Everclear
  • 4/5 part Fruit punch
  • As many wedge Fruit as you like
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put in punch first, then add everclear. For added flavor, soak the fruit wedges in everclear about an hour ahead of time. Fruit wedges make excellent snack. Best served in ice chest or jantorial trash can for mass comsumption.

drinks.name: Cactus Bowl
drinks.ingredients:
• 9 oz Pineapple juice
  • 6 oz Lime juice
  • 3 oz Light rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Spiced rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients with ice. Serve in Margarita glass on rocks.

drinks.name: Japanese Slipper #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Midori melon liqueur
  • 30 ml Vodka
  • 30 ml Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice in cocktail shaker. Strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: The Green One
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Creme de Banane
  • 3 cl Blue Curacao
  • 6 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake with ice. pour into glass.

drinks.name: Flaming Dragon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Green Chartreuse
  • 1 oz 151 proof rum (Bacardi)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together in a double shot glass. Light on fire. Let the flames warm the concoction about 20 secs. Blow out fire. Swallow quickly. Be careful as the glass may be hot. Now lay on the ground, put your claws in the air, and 'wrestle with the dragon'.

drinks.name: Hunka Hunka Burnin Luv
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Vodka
  • 6 oz Water
  • 2 tblsp Kool-Aid
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass (larger than 12 oz.). Put a lid over the glass. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds.

drinks.name: Bull's sweat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Sloe gin
  • 1 part Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: just mix, shake and pour.

drinks.name: Bumble Bee #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 oz Kahlua
  • 1/3 oz Sambuca
drinks.mixinginstructions: This is a layered shot. First pour the Bailey's into the shot glass. Then take an upside down spoon and touch it to the inside wall of the glass. Carefully add the Kahlua. Repeat this process for the Sambuca. If done properly, the alcohol will stay separated and resemble a bumble bee. Enjoy!!!

drinks.name: BonBon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake & Strain.

drinks.name: Bali Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 20 cl White rum (Bacardi)
  • 20 cl Bacardi Black rum
  • 20 cl Creme de Banane
  • 20 cl Passoa
  • 10 cl Coconut liqueur
  • 10 cl Grenadine
  • 200 cl Orange juice or tropical fruit mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in shaker together with some ice-cubes. Shake well. Serve with piece of banana on top of the glass.

drinks.name: Lime Time
drinks.ingredients:
• 33 cl Beer
  • 5 cl Lime juice
  • 5 cl Hoopers Hooch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the beer into the pint glass. Add the lime juice and the Hooch. Stir with a spoon or something like that. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Galliano Hotshot #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Galliano
  • 2 cl hot Coffee
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 2 cl Galliano into a shot glass, float 2cl hot filter coffee over it and top with lightly thickened cream as to create three layers.

drinks.name: Captain Pepper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 6 oz Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix. Then drink. Repeat as necessary.

drinks.name: Bailey's Comet #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • splash Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: layer in order given, splash 151 on top light on fire, sprinkle cinnamon on top to produce sparks instead of just a flame

drinks.name: Watermelon Shooter #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/4 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker full of ice. Strain into glass.

drinks.name: Bartender's Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Cuervo premium or Gold tequila
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3 oz Sweet and sour (FRESH lemon juice with equal parts simple syrup)
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • Float Grand Marnier
  • Splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake tequila, triple sec, sweet & sour, cranberry juice, and lime juice in a pint glass. Rim another pint glass with salt and transfer contents. Float the Gran Marnier, garnish with a lime and straw, and serve.

drinks.name: Pulp Vega
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Smirnoff Vodka
  • 7 cl Tropicana
  • 3 cl strawberry-kiwi Crystal light
  • 1 handful Cherry
  • 2 cl Margarita mix, strawberry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Crush the cherries in the glass and mix it with the other ingrediences

drinks.name: Platina Blonde
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Tequila
  • 2 cl Heavy cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor Tequila in a glass, fill in with cream, stir.

drinks.name: A.D.M. (After Dinner Mint)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 3/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Stoli)
  • Fill with Hot chocolate
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake vigorously

drinks.name: Twinkle My Lights
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix in shaker over ice...strain into glass(es)

drinks.name: A Splash of Nash
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 oz Soda water
  • 0.5 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 0.5 oz Creme de Banane
drinks.mixinginstructions: Drop shot glass with banana & melon liquers into a 9 oz hi- ball glass containing soda water and cranberry juice. Drink in one shot.

drinks.name: Screaming White Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl Kahlua (or other coffe liquer)
  • 2 cl White rum
  • Add a bit Cointreau
  • A dash Milk (cold)
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill up the shaker with ice and put the ingredience in it. Shake it until it gets frosty on the outside. Before you start shaking,put icecubes in the glass and fill it up with water so the glass is cold when you have shaked the drink. Take the icecubes and water out of the glass,and fill the glass again vith icecubes and pour the drink in the glass.

drinks.name: Spider's Web
drinks.ingredients:
• About 4 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 drop Strawberry juice
  • Top with Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: put alchohol in shot glass, drop strawberry into glass, then try and make cream float on top.

drinks.name: Illusion
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Malibu rum
  • 30 ml Midori melon liqueur
  • 30 ml Vodka
  • 15 ml Cointreau
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour all spirits in the shaker ... & top with a splash of pineapple juice

drinks.name: Earthquake #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 50 ml Vodka
  • 50 ml Gin
  • 25 ml White Creme de Menthe
  • Lots of Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka, gin and creme-de-menthe over lots of ice.

drinks.name: Pink Panther Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 dl Milk
  • 1 dl Raspberry jam
  • 3-4 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in a blender. Mix until smooth. Garnish with fresh of frozen berries.

drinks.name: Sun Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 dl Milk
  • 2-3 tblsp Orange juice concentrate
  • 2 tblsp Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in blender until smooth. Garnish with slice of orange.

drinks.name: Amaretto Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Amaretto
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 1/4 cl Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together the amaretto and orange juice. Pour into glass and then add the grenadine untill you see the sunrise.

drinks.name: Matty's Magic Mixture
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • 3 oz Orange juice optional
  • fill Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: combine ingredients in mug and stir until fizzy

drinks.name: My Antonella
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 3 oz Tonic water
  • 1 wedge Lime
  • 2 Olive, italian green
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a highball glass, combine Gin and Chambord over ice. Stir. Add two Italian green olives and fill with tonic water. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Arizona Stingers
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Absolut Vodka
  • 12 oz lemon Iced tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place ice cubes in the hurricane glass . Add the 2 HEAPING shots of Absolute Vodka (Note: You can add as many shots of Absolute as you want!) Fill the rest of glass with the Arizona Icetea with lemon. Stir to mix using a spoon. Drink up and enjoy!!!!!!!

drinks.name: Orange Push-up
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 0.5 oz Grenadine
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 1 splash Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!

drinks.name: 151 Florida Bushwacker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • 3 oz Milk
  • 1 oz Coconut liqueur
  • 1 cup Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients. Blend until smooth. Garnish with chocolate shavings if desired.

drinks.name: Beam Me Up Scottie Mac
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill rum. Then layer. Creme de Banana first, then Bailey's and float rum on top.

drinks.name: Watermelon Shooter #3
drinks.ingredients:
• Pineapple juice (Dole)
  • Jack Daniels
  • Ice
  • Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a large juice or water pitcher filled with ice cubes, pour equal parts pineapple juice and Jack Daniels. Stir, then add a splash of grenadine to give the mixture a pink, almost watermelon, tint. Stir until well chilled. Pour into shot glass, straining ice, and enjoy.

drinks.name: Zizi Coin-coin
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Cointreau
  • 2 cl Lemon juice
  • Ice cubes
  • 1 slice Lemon or lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 5cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.

drinks.name: Banana Cream Pi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: This drink can be mixed with ice added, or put into a blender with ice, to be crushed. I like it on ice.

drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli Vanil)
  • 1 splash Grand Marnier
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill glass with crushed ice. Add vodka. Add a splash of grand-marnier. Fill with o.j.

drinks.name: Sex On Acid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry liqueur, black
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/4 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain. Serve as a shooter.

drinks.name: Tequila Surprise
drinks.ingredients:
• full glass Tequila
  • About 8 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.

drinks.name: Gary's Poison
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 5 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 0.25 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Rum and then triple sec. Next pour in OJ and Pinapple. Grab that Gary.

drinks.name: Laser Beam
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 7 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: combine all liquor in full glass of ice. shake well. garnish with orange and cherry

drinks.name: Cream Soda
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1oz of Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.

drinks.name: ACID
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Wild Turkey, 101 proof
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor in the 151 first followed by the 101 served with a Coke or Dr Pepper chaser.

drinks.name: Agent Orange
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1 oz Jim Beam
  • 1 oz Apple schnapps
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Hurricane glass filled with ice add ingredients shake cherry and orange garnish

drinks.name: Grape Crush
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Vodka
  • 1/3 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass

drinks.name: Alien Secretion #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/4 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass

drinks.name: Southern Blues
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Blueberry schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass

drinks.name: Darth Vader
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz white Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • fill JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Collins glass filled with ice add ingredients up to sour mix shake fill with JÃ¤germeister

drinks.name: Arctic Fish
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 part Vodka
  • 1/3 part Grape soda, Surge
  • 1/3 part Orange juice
  • lots Ice cubes
  • 1 dash Candy fish
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice and fish, add vodka, grape soda and orange juice. DO NOT STIR!!!!! Serve well chilled.

drinks.name: Alligator
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass half way with ice. Add o.j. and Midori and give a little stir.

drinks.name: Crocodile
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Bacardi Limon
  • Sprite or 7-Up
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add a few cubes of ice to glass and then add Midori and Bacardi. Fill the rest of the way with the soda and give a little stir.

drinks.name: Sweet Heart
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Parfait d'Amour (Bols)
  • 1.5 cl Amaretto di Saronno (ILLVA Saronno)
  • 1.5 cl Vanilla syrup (Monin)
  • 1.5 cl fresh Cream
  • 0.5 cl red Curacao (Marie Brizard)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Garnish with cinamon-powder, cherry, mint, lemon-peel

drinks.name: Gege
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Rum (Ron Bacardi Superior)
  • 1 cl Creme de Banane
  • 1 cl fresh Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Garnish with red cherry

drinks.name: Finn Roses
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Bourbon (Four Roses)
  • 1 cl Apricot brandy (Bols)
  • 2 cl Dry Vermouth (Cinzano)
drinks.mixinginstructions: stir

drinks.name: Lady Scarlett
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl dry Gin (Gilbey's)
  • 2 cl Cointreau
  • 1 cl Dry Vermouth (Cinzano)
  • 1 cl Lime juice
  • 1 cl Monin bitter 'Sans Alcool'
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Garnish with cherry, lemon-peel

drinks.name: Scanex
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka (Wyborowa)
  • 2 cl Cranberry liqueur (Chymos)
  • 2 cl Lemon juice
  • 1 cl Grenadine
  • 1 cl Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake.

drinks.name: Yaka
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Absolut Vodka
  • 1 fifth Everclear
  • 1 bag Lemonade
  • 7 slices Lemon
  • 2 qt Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the water and lemonade mix, following the directions on the lemonade mix. Add everclear and absolute vodka. Then add the lemon slices and shake to mix. serve cold

drinks.name: Passcack Valley Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put in iced shaker and mix well, strain in to a Highball glass

drinks.name: Grim Reaper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Kahlua and 151 in glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over ice to give ice red tint.

drinks.name: Grateful Dead
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Light rum
  • 1 part Gin
  • 1 part Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake ingredients and pour over ice...

drinks.name: Sweets to the Sweet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 glass Absolut Citron
  • 1/2 glass Zima
  • 2 tblsp Lime juice cordial (Rose's)
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass half way with vodka, fill rest of way with Zima. Then add the lime juice (Rose's Lime Juice works best). Now stir and add the slice of lime.

drinks.name: Richie Family
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 3 cl Whiskey
  • 3 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 25 cl strong, black Coffee
  • 2 tsp Brown sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, whiskey and Bailey's. Add the coffea and the brown sugar. Blend.

drinks.name: Juicy Lucy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 1 shot Gin
  • 2 shots Blue Curacao
  • Top with Orange juice
  • And Sprite (lemonade)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix them!!!

drinks.name: Blue Kisok
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
  • Fill rest of glass Sprite or 7 up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour an half ounce of Blue Curacao into shot glass. Follow with quarter of an ounce of Vodka. (Try and use Smirnoff) One table spoon of lime juice. Then fill rest of glass with sprite.

drinks.name: Speedball
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • Gin
  • Tequila
  • A little Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: just pour the alcoholic ingridents in a shot glas and when you done that squeze a little amount of lime juice on top

drinks.name: San Diego Seabreeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Blueberry schnapps
  • 1/2 part Orange juice
  • 1/2 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 tsp Blackberry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build all ingrediants in a collins glass, cover, shake and serve

drinks.name: Russian Quallude
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 1 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 shot Creme de Cacao
  • 1 shot Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients and serve over ice. (crushed)

drinks.name: Fuck You
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Wild Turkey
  • 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Blueberry schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix each ingredient in a glass. Tilt glass 180 degrees and slam it!

drinks.name: Leche de Monja
drinks.ingredients:
• One or more whole Egg with shells
  • Lime juice or lemon-lime juice (to cover eggs)
  • Sugar to taste
  • Pisco to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place whole eggs, in shell, (organic would be preferable) in a jar. Cover with lemon/lime juice. Seal the jar and refrigerate. Leave the eggs to marinate for 2-3 weeks. The shells should become soft. Place the eggs and juice in a blender and blend until smooth. Strain to remove egg membranes. Add sugar and pisco to taste.

drinks.name: Girl Scout Cookie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing cup with ice. Shake and strain into double shot glass. Drink soon after pouring before liquors separate.

drinks.name: The Dragon
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • red Kool-Aid
  • Orange juice
  • Strawberry schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just Dump 'EM All In A Glass & Mix 'Em All Up.

drinks.name: Harry Alligator
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Everclear
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz white Tequila
  • 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 wedge Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer ingrediants in order listed above. Then squeeze lemon over layered ingrediants. Be sure to mount lemon wedge on side of glass or place in glass.

drinks.name: Lighthouse
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Kahlua
  • 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 oz 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Kahlua in shot glass then with a spoon slowly pour Irish Cream into the shot glass on top of the Kahlua then pour the 151 Rum with the Spoon slowly on top of the Irish Cream then light on fire.. Blow out Flame Before Drinking!

drinks.name: Red Snapper #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it all over ice, strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Satan's Revenge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1/3 shot Jack Daniels
  • 1/3 shot Goldschlager
  • Several drop Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: combine in sequence in shot glass, shoot!

drinks.name: Psycho Joe
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Kahlua
  • 3/4 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • Fill with Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: 1) Put all ingredients in mixing glass 2) Shake 3) Pour into coffee mug 4) Add sugar and cream if neccasary

drinks.name: The Pernod Demon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Pernod
  • 1 Lemon Wedge
  • 6 dashes Tabasco sauce
  • Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: 1) Coat the lemon wedge with sugar 2) Douse the lemon wedge with the 6 dashes of tobasco 3) Fill the shot glass with pernod To administer this shot, suck the lemon and then shoot the pernod.

drinks.name: Irish Cream Special
drinks.ingredients:
• Fill 10 cubes Ice
  • 4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in bottom of glass. Slowly pour Baliey's Irish Cream over ice Next pour in milk and then stir gently. Add more to taste. For chocoholics add Hearshy's Chocolate sauce.

drinks.name: El Presidente Cocktail #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Dark rum
  • 1 jigger red Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a cherry.

drinks.name: Golden Furnace
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Goldschlager
  • 1 splash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Goldschlagger into a shot glass. Add a splash of Tabasco sauce. Drink and run for water.

drinks.name: Sancho Panza
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz cream Sherry
  • 3/4 oz Campari
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir and serve neat. Add a cherry.

drinks.name: Freddy Kruger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Sambuca
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: make it an ample size shot!!

drinks.name: Gold Baron
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/4 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Float Goldschlager on top of Rumple and enjoy!

drinks.name: Red Baron
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/4 oz Cinnamon schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Float schnapps on top of Rumple and enjoy!

drinks.name: Golden Star
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vanilla schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 2 scoops Ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: put two scoops ice-cream in blender add liquor and blend until like a milk shake.

drinks.name: Forest Fire
drinks.ingredients:
• 4/5 shot Everclear
  • 1/5 shot Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in shot glass, it's that simple. Use more Tabasco for more fire, less for more alcohol.

drinks.name: Vodka Orange
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Absolut Vodka
  • 2 parts Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: serve with ice. fresh pressed juice tastes best.

drinks.name: Firehammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 jigger Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 splash freshly squeezed Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: combine with ice in shaker strain into cocktail glass

drinks.name: Italian Ice #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Luftwaffe
drinks.ingredients:
• Chocolate syrup
  • JÃ¤germeister
  • Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put 1/3 chocolate syrup, then 1/3 JÃ¤germeister, and then 1/3 Butterscotch of the glass.

drinks.name: Giraffe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • fill Pineapple juice
  • float Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Midori into a hurricane glass over ice, add Vodka, Pineapple juice, then float cranberry juice.

drinks.name: Concord
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Coffee liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • Float Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer ingredients in above order in a shot glass. Light Bacardi 151 Rum, and serve.

drinks.name: Lava Flow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 2 oz Strawberries
  • 1 Banana
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Coconut cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend banana, coconut cream, and pineapple juice in blender and set aside. In bottom of hurricane glass, stir together both rums and strawberries. Pour banana/coconut/pineapple mix into glass slowly. The strawberry/rum mix should creep up the sides of the glass to make a wonderful looking (and tasting) summertime cocktail!

drinks.name: Pink Gin #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz dry Gin
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add cranberry juice to gin and pour into shot glass.

drinks.name: Purple Crayon
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Chambord and Vodka over ice. Fill to top with pineapple juice. Garnish with purple grape and pineapple slice.

drinks.name: Feel The Burn
drinks.ingredients:
• Layer 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Ouzo
  • 1/2 oz Wild Turkey
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer all ingredients and light on fire to warm. Blow out flame and drink in one gulp.

drinks.name: Vanilla Vargas
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 glass Ice
  • 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 shot Crown Royal
  • 4 shots Vanilla liqueur
  • 1 can Pepsi Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the highball glass (or preferrably a 32oz glass) half way with crushed ice. Then add the shots of alcohol in this order: bacardi 151 rum, crown royal, and vanilla liqeur. Now pour one can of pepsi into the mixture. Finally, stir well with a barspoon, or any long spoon to evenly distribute the ingredients.

drinks.name: Golden Cola
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 glass Ice
  • 4 shots Goldschlager
  • 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 shot Vanilla liqueur
  • 1 can Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass(or preferably a 32 oz. glass) halfway with crushed ice. Add alcohol contents over ice. Pour coke over mixture. Mix well.

drinks.name: Full Moon Fever
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Spiced rum
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Dash Sour mix
  • Fill Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the three rums and the Midori in highball glass with ice. Add a little Sour mix for flavor and fill the rest with pineapple juice. It's a nice light green color. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

drinks.name: Hunch Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Everclear
  • 1 gal Fruit punch
  • A lot of Fruit (any kind)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put them all together and mix it with a lot of ice. For big parties use more of each and mix in a garbage can.

drinks.name: Smashing Pumpkin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Kahlua
  • 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass

drinks.name: Caribbean Smoked Torch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz Dark rum (Myers)
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Orange juice
  • Pineapple juice
  • Cranberry juice
  • Ice
  • 3/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the ingredients, except for the 151 rum in a tin glass or shaker. Steam the snifter, using the 1/2oz. of 151 lighting it, until it consumes itself. After that pour the content of the shaker in the hot snifter. It will create a really good smelling cloud of smoke, that it's what distinguish this coktail.

drinks.name: Bubble Gum
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Vodka
  • 1/4 Banana liqueur
  • 1/4 Orange juice
  • 1/4 Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in order into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Bahama Mama Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz Spiced rum
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve over ice in a tall glass

drinks.name: Bakkus
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 2 cl Malibu rum
  • 6 cl Orange juice
  • 1 cl Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake well, pour into a tall cocktail glass and add a slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Gun Barrel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-1/2 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put into mixing glass all of above. Mix well, pour into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Peppermint Patty
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 squirt Chocolate syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put a shot of peppermint schnapps in your mouth. Do not swallow. Squirt chocolate (not too much!) into your mouth. Shake head vigorously and then swallow.

drinks.name: Frogster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • Orange juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice, add the blue curacao, add the tequila and finally for that yummy green color, fill the glass with the orange juice.

drinks.name: Snowball #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Advocaat
  • Fill with 2/3 Sprite or other lime soda
  • Add a few Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take the glass and rub the edge on a lemon, then dip the rim in sugar. Drop the ice cubes into the glass, pour a 1/3 liqueur and fill it up with Sprite. Stir.

drinks.name: Blue Bay
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 2 parts Bitter lemon
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Moonlight Serenade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Orange liqueur (Bols Kontiki)
  • 2 parts Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of orange.

drinks.name: Peach Bowl
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peach liqueur (Bols Misty Peach)
  • 2 parts Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of orange.

drinks.name: Cool Coco
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Coconut liqueur (Bols Coconut Creole)
  • 2 parts Grapefruit juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with cherries.

drinks.name: Kiwi Lemon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kiwi liqueur (Bols Kibowi)
  • 2 parts Bitter lemon
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of kiwi.

drinks.name: Terminator
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: 151 first, then Rumple Minze

drinks.name: Virgin Manhattan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 cup Cranberry juice
  • 1/4 cup Orange juice
  • 1/2 tsp Maraschino cherry juice
  • 1/4 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1-2 dash Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice, strain and serve in a chilled cocktail glass, on on the rocks in an Old-fashioned glass. Granish with maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Green angel
drinks.ingredients:
• 4/3 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 4/3 cl Peachtree schnapps
  • 4/3 cl Malibu rum
  • Appx 8 cl Lemonade (lemon squash)
  • Sprite
  • Ice cubes
  • 1 drop blue Food coloring
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend Pisang Ambon, Peach Tree, Malibu and lemon squash together in a blender. Put ice cubes in the glas and pour the mix over. Fill up with Sprite, and add a drop of blue syrup. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Joel's Pet Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Triple sec
  • 1 part Bacardi Limon
  • 1 part blue Maui
  • 1 dash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in shot glass in order of appearance in ingredients list.

drinks.name: Wave Runner (a.k.a. Rave Gunner)
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 parts Cranberry juice
  • Fill with Sprite or 7-UP
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rum and cranberry juice into a tall glass. Slowly add Sprite, stopping immediately when the color changes from red to pink.

drinks.name: Urine Sample
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 1/2 oz Sambuca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour it in

drinks.name: Wooly Mitten
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 bag Cocoa powder
  • Hot Water
  • 2 parts Whipped cream (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Coaca mix in the mug fill half way with hot water - stir. Pour in Southern Comfort, peppermint schnapps and Bailey's - stir. Top off with hot water. Top with whipped cream (optional) .

drinks.name: Dr. Pepper #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Amaretto
  • 2 shots Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the shots in a 'collins' glass. Fill the rest of the glass 3/4 full with Coke. Add crushed ice.

drinks.name: The Piledriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Dark rum
  • 1/3 Vodka
  • 1/6 Coca-Cola
  • 1/6 Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 1/3 rum,1/3 vodka , and combine coca-cola and orange juice to fill glass. Add ice if you have room!

drinks.name: Spiced apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Apple brandy
  • 1/4 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shot glass pour in apple brandy first, then Goldschlager, then Captain Morgan's. Shoot!

drinks.name: Smooch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • And Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour into a tall glass over ice, shake to mix all ingredients well, garnish with a cherry or an orange slice if you so desire

drinks.name: Nuthugger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Lime juice
  • Fill with Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in hard liquors first and lime juice follows. Top with beer until full. Do not stir. Enjoy!!

drinks.name: Pink Squirrel #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Grenadine
  • 1/2 shot white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 shot Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice filled glass and shake or stir to mix and then strain.

drinks.name: Kill Me Now
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Tequila
  • 3 oz 151 proof rum
  • 3 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in hurricane glass.

drinks.name: Hot Creamy Bush
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Irish whiskey (Bushmill's)
  • 3/4 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 6 oz hot Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in glass

drinks.name: Hot Peppermint Chocolate
drinks.ingredients:
• Hot chocolate
  • Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make hot chocolate (preferably using water) according to instructions. Mix in Rumple Minze and enjoy.

drinks.name: Exotic summernight
drinks.ingredients:
• Grenadine, red
  • 3 cl Vodka
  • Orange juice
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and orange- and pineapplejuice and pour over ice in a glass. Layer a little grenadine on top. Garnish with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Walker's Revenge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Light rum
  • 1.5 oz Dark rum
  • Fill with Iced tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add rums over ice and fill glass with ice tea. Best in a tall frosty glass.

drinks.name: Booty Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Spiced rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/4 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mixing glass 1/2 full with ice. Add all ingerdients. Strain into a rocks glass.

drinks.name: Naked Navel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Keep both bottles in the freezer. Pour vodka first to the 1 oz line. Pour in the schnapps, which will form a ball in the bottom of the glass.

drinks.name: Jan's Jello Shots
drinks.ingredients:
• 0.35 oz (small boxI) Jello, any flavor
  • 1 cup boiling Water
  • 1 cup Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve jello with 1 cup boiling water, add 1 cup vodka and srir, pour into shot glasses, ice trays, or in 1 oz plastic cups found at party supply stores (they even have little lids for them), chill until firm. Each person can use a knife or their tongue to loosen the edges of the jello and then suck them down. If you use the 1 oz plastic cups and lids you can serve them by placing all of the cups in a large bowl filled with ice...they will stay cold longer, and they look really festive! * Try making an assortment using several flavors of jello!

drinks.name: Grendel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 measure Cointreau
  • 1 measure Blue Curacao
  • 1 measure White Creme de Menthe
  • 2 measures Advocaat
  • 2 measures Vodka
  • 2 measures Rum
  • 4 measures Cream
  • Fill with Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shaken with ice and put in a pint glass and topped with lemonade.

drinks.name: Sex on the Pool Table
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 1 part Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Over ice mix equal parts of each alchohol. Top with the grapefruit juice. Shake to blend.

drinks.name: Three Wise Men (vodka)
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 2/3 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 2/3 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour 2/3 of an oz. of each ingrediant into a shot glass and drink.

drinks.name: Ruby Relaxer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Peach schnapps
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Malibu rum
  • Fill glass with Pineapple juice
  • Splash in Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine shots of peach schnapps, vodka and malibu rum. Fill glass almost to top with pineapple juice and splash in cranberry juice for a touch o' color.

drinks.name: Kamakazie #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Triple sec
