  • 1 part Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake well with ice, pour strained mixture into shooter. Salute'

drinks.name: Raspberry kamikaze
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a glass and add ice ! Enjoy!!

drinks.name: Nightcap
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 dash Nutmeg
  • 6 oz Milk
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Heat milk. Add sugar. Add Kahlua. Nutmeg on top. Sleep tight.

drinks.name: Pinky
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 shot Rumple Minze
  • 1/4 shot Firewater
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Rumple Minze into glass first, add Firewater

drinks.name: Paul Raspberry
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • Milk
  • Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka in medium-sized shot glass Add a mouthful of 2% milk Add a drop or two of grenadine Ice optional.

drinks.name: Plead the 5th
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1 part Sambuca
  • 1 part Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix all on the rocks,shake,strain,and serve.

drinks.name: Passed Out Naked on the Bathroom Floor
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/4 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/4 oz Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1/4 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient into the shot glass, in this order: Rumple Minze, JÃ¤germeister, Jose Cuervo Gold Tequila, then Bacardi 151 Rum. No need to mix, it mixes fine in this order.

drinks.name: Wild Sex
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice and pour Malibu, peach schnapps and 151 into glass. After putting the right amount of liquor put your juices on top and splash of grenadine. When you have all of that done take your shaker tin, fitting it on top of the glass and give it a couple of good shakes.

drinks.name: Cazuela
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 1 dash Salt
  • 1 slice Lime
  • 1 slice Orange
  • 1 slice Grapefruit
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • Fill with Squirt
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a cazuela that is made of clay, put ice, salt, lime, orange, lemon, and grapefruit in cazuela then add granadine, and the tequila, then fill with Squirt, use a straw to stir.

drinks.name: Lifesaver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well. Serve in rocks glass

drinks.name: Voodoo Dew
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 can Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor shots into jar or glass and then poor can of dew in!! Mix well and enjoy!!!

drinks.name: Hispaniola
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Dark rum
  • 1 jigger Curacao
  • 2 splashes Sweet and sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice and a cherry. Stir.

drinks.name: Geting
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 1 cl Banana liqueur
  • Fill with Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with the ice then you take the vodka then the liquor then the ginger ale

drinks.name: Jack Daniel's Lynchburg Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Jack Daniels
  • 1 part Sweet and sour mix
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 4 parts Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice and stir. Garnish with lemon slices and cherries.

drinks.name: Lemon Splash Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 jigger Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • Juice of 1 Lemon wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Vodka, Amaretto, Tripple Sec and a 1/2 squeeze of Lemon wedge in a shaker with ice. Shake. Squeeze remaining lemon juice into Martini glass. Pour mixture into glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

drinks.name: Moonlight Drive
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: First apply a alcohol into cup. Then add juices. Shake,shake, rattle and roll. Then put into cup with ice. Add cherries and lemons.

drinks.name: Camel Hump
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 shot Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/4 shot Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Butterscotch Schnapps in a shot glass 3/4 of the way full. Fill rest of drink with Bailey's Irish Cream.

drinks.name: The Drink
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz dry Sherry
  • 3 oz dry Gin (Boodles)
  • 2-3 handfuls Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rinse glass with Sherry, discard Sherry. Shake gin over ice in separate glass to chill. Fill rinsed glass with ice, pour chilled gin over ice. Garnish with lemon twist (optional).

drinks.name: Pablo's shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Kirschwasser
  • 1/2 oz Dubonnet Rouge
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 tsp Mint syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: First, pour the scotch in a shot glass, then pour the kirsch and amaretto. Add the Dubonnet rouge very carefully trying not to mix the ingredients. Finally pour the mint. Do not mix. Drink in one shot.

drinks.name: Midnight Mint
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3/4 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 3/4 oz double Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: If available, rim cocktail (Martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder. Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well then strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Creole Scream
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl White rum
  • 2 cl Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
  • 1 cl Grenadine
  • 1 Olive, green
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the rum, grenadine, vermouth and angostura. Shake with ice. Add the olive.

drinks.name: Chocolate Martini #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 shot Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, then strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Gimlet #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Gin
  • 1 part Lime juice cordial (Rose's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass to 2/3 with ice cubes. Shake the gin and lime and pour into the glass.

drinks.name: Hawaiian Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • Southern Comfort
  • Amaretto
  • Midori melon liqueur
  • Orange juice
  • Pineapple juice
  • Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice and strain in tall shot glass.

drinks.name: Hot Nuts
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz hot Coffee
  • 1 pinch Brandy
  • tsp Rye whiskey
drinks.mixinginstructions: 1 ounce of brandy mixed with a small cup of hot coffee then add a few drops of tobasco sause

drinks.name: Tiatip
drinks.ingredients:
• Tia maria
  • Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill Tia Maria and Baileys Irish cream 20 degrees In shot glass fill half way with Tia Maria then very carefully add Bailey Irish cream on top. Do not allow them to mix. Keep them seperated. There's your shot. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Grandmom's slipper
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl Koskenkorva salmiac Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 2cl of Bailey's right in. Then pour the salmiac vodka in BUT don't let them mix into gray: there should be creamish white and also deep black visible in the drink, slightly mixed.

drinks.name: Coco Rush
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 part Orange juice
  • 1/4 part Cranberry juice
  • 1/2 part Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add OJ, Cranberry juice, and Malibu into a mixing glass and pour into the highball glass.

drinks.name: Talos Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Grand Marnier
  • 1 part Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

drinks.name: Harlem Mugger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz White rum
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 3 oz Champagne
  • Top with Cranberry juice
  • Garnish Lime wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: build over ice in order

drinks.name: Ganggreen
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Mountain Dew
  • 1 shot Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 shot Johnnie Walker red label
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take the Highball glass or anything that will hold 12 oz. of soda and pour the soda in the glass. Next take one shot of the Capt. Morgan and add it to the Dew. And finally add one shot of the Johnnie Walker red label to the mix. Stir it and enjoy.

drinks.name: Goombay Smash
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/4 oz Apricot brandy
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in highball with ice and shake. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

drinks.name: Ecto Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 package Lemon-Lime Kool-Aid mix
  • 20 oz Vodka
  • 1 Lemon, sliced
  • 1 Lime, sliced
  • 1 cup Sugar or more for taste
  • Fill with Water and ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a large (1/2 gallon) pitcher. Shake and enjoy!

drinks.name: Hurricane Leah
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Light rum
  • 1/4 oz Gin
  • 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Tequila
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 dash Cherry brandy
  • 3 oz Sour mix
  • 3 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice into hurricane or parfait glass, stir. Garnish with orange peel.

drinks.name: Boat drink
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • Splash Tonic water
  • Rim glass Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: To a glass of ice add Captain Morgan's spiced rum. Add a splash of tonic water. Rim glass with lime. Drink. Repeat.

drinks.name: Flower of nippon
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 cl Banana liqueur
  • 1 cl Cointreau
  • 4 dashes Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with ice and strained in to the cocktail glass and garnish whith a slice of lime and red cherry.

drinks.name: Tequila Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila into shot glass. Next pour in Mountain Dew. Hold your hand over the top of the glass and slam it down. The shot will change color. Take the shot.

drinks.name: Ankle Breaker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1 oz fresh Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar syrup (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Flaming Gorilla
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour into shot glass, layering ingredients, from top to bottom light on fire and extinguish after 15 seconds.

drinks.name: Buttafuoco
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz white Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 1/2 oz Cherry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz fresh Lemon juice
  • Club soda
  • Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a cocktail shaker, combine all ingredients except club soda and cherry with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice cubes and fill with club soda. Stir, then add cherry.

drinks.name: Butternut Rum Lifesaver
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3/4 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients Chill over ice Strain into shot glass

drinks.name: LuteÃ¥tdÃ¦
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Rum
  • 2 tsp Tabasco sauce
  • 2 cl Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Tequila and Tabasco together, then put it in the shot glass. Now put 1 cl of rum ontop.

drinks.name: Zinger
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 shots Peachtree schnapps
  • 4 shots Surge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would.

drinks.name: Malibu Milk Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• Fill with Milk
  • 4 oz Malibu rum
  • Add 3 tblsp Sugar
  • Add Ice to preference
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in a blender, blend till smooth, should create a small frothy head. Pour into to any glass handy, and enjoy your milkshake!

drinks.name: Demon Drop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Everclear
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the Everclear first and then the OJ so the OJ settles on the top. Then shoot it. Repeat.

drinks.name: Tornado
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Whiskey
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Coca-Cola
  • 1/2 tblsp Sugar
  • 3 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix everything except cola, sugar and ice in glass. then stir in sugar. then add ice cubes. finally, pour in cola. stir three times. drink.

drinks.name: Slow Painful Movement
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 squirt Chocolate syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the gin and the schnapps together in ice. Pour into glass Dribble the chocalte syrup in a circle on the bottom of the glass. (do not mix)

drinks.name: Memachau
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 pint Lager
  • 3/4 shot Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour lager into beer mug or pint glass: add Kahlua. Stir.

drinks.name: The G.O.A.T.
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 shot Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 shot Dark rum (Meyers)
  • 1 splash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all this together in a cup and pour into shot glasses, this obviously makes three shots. The Shots are ratios, the more the better.

drinks.name: Leaving Las Vegas
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Triple sec or EverClear
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Gin
  • Fill with Lemonade (and ice)
  • 2 tblsp Sugar to taste
  • 1 splash Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer and stir, garnish with lemon

drinks.name: Karlsson
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 3 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 3 cl Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Well and pour into glass enjoy

drinks.name: Cherry Bomb, Traditional
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Everclear
  • 6 x 8oz cans Cherries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all 6 8oz jars of cherries (drained), mixed with EVERCLEAR into sealable cannister for approx. 2 and half months, serve by the shot. To drown out flavor of everclear, put one cherry in shot glass, and fill with sprite or 7up. Take cherry and soda into mouth at same time, chew cherry, and swallow all together. Enjoy!!

drinks.name: Sweet Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • Half Fill With Sour mix
  • Fill With Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice then pour ingrediants in order then stir.

drinks.name: Lasseman's Partysaver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Ouzo
  • 5 parts Coffee
  • 1 scoop Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the black coffee with the Ouzo(until you can't feel the ouzo taste anymore) and put a little blob of whipped cream on top - Drink and enjoy...

drinks.name: Fruitopia
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Bacardi Limon
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients, Shake with Ice and serve with a straw. Garnish if desired with an Orange Slice.

drinks.name: Mad Scientist
drinks.ingredients:
• Less than 1/2 shot Blueberry schnapps
  • Less than 1/2 shot Raspberry schnapps (or wildberry schnapps)
  • Grenadine syrup
  • Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass less than 1/2 full with blueberry schnapps, add same amount of raspberry schnapps. Slowly top off with grenadine. Dribble a small amount of Bailey's on top..

drinks.name: Fairytale
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 4 cl Chocolate syrup (light chocolate preferably)
  • 2 cl crushed Strawberries
  • 3 cl crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour the vodka and the chocolate syrup together in a glass. Shake well. Then add the mixture of crushed ice and strawberries and voila'.

drinks.name: Liquid Crack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peppermint schnapps (Rumple Minze)
  • 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour one-third of Rumple Minze, JÃ¤germeister, and Goldschlager into a shot glass

drinks.name: Southern Joe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both ingredients into shot glass. Consume Repeatedly

drinks.name: Springtime
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Kurant
  • 1 cl Lime juice
  • 10 cl Cranberry juice
  • 3 cl Bitter lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor ingredients over lots of ice.Garnish with slice of lime.

drinks.name: Hillbilly Bob's Mountaindrink
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Bourbon
  • 2 cl Kahlua
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl Creme de Cacao
  • 10 cl Milk
  • 2 dashes Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients except coke.Poor over ice and top with coke for an extra creamy head. Serve with a straw on a sunny day.

drinks.name: Pine Needle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add the ingredients in the order listed.

drinks.name: Photon Torpedo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Aftershock
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Aftershock with vodka, in no particular order.

drinks.name: Submarine (conventional)
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Ginger ale
  • Fill with Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with the gin, then fill up with the tonic water. And last, add the ginger ale.

drinks.name: Submarine (nuclear)
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Ginger ale
  • Fill with Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with the gin, then fill up the glas with tonic water. And last, add the ginger ale.

drinks.name: Monkey Brain #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Apfelkorn
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • drop Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour apfelkorn in shotglas. slowly pour drops of baileys in center of shot finally add a few drops of grenadine.

drinks.name: Multiple Orgasm #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Stoli Vodka
  • Equal amount Half-and-half
  • And Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a blender and mix until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass and top with a cherry. It tastes like a chocolate shake, but with a kick!

drinks.name: Caesar
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Fill With Clamato juice
  • 3 dashes Tabasco sauce
  • 3 dashes Worcestershire sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Line rim of glass with salt & pepper. Over ice add vodka, fill with Clamato Juice then add remaining ingredients. Garnish with celery stick.

drinks.name: R.B. Winter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • Fill with Apple juice
  • 1 splash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1 oz. of Southern Comfort, 1 oz. of Amaretto, fill with Apple juice, do a short shake. While pouring the drink back in the glass add a splash of lime juice.

drinks.name: Blue Balls
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Sweet and sour
  • dash Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients. Chill with ice and strain into a shooter glass!

drinks.name: Acid Cookie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/4 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 splash Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix liquor togther. Add Cream. Shake Well. Strain & Serve

drinks.name: Black Jack WV
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • Splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all of the ingriedients together over ice,shake til very chilled and strain into two glasses.

drinks.name: Fruit Loop
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Fill with Milk
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Pour curacao over ice then fill with milk.

drinks.name: B-54
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake over ice

drinks.name: Peach Smoothie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Yukon Jack
  • 1 part Jack Daniels
  • 1 part Peachtree schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in shot glass Yukon Jack, Jack Daniels and PeachTree Schnapps last

drinks.name: Pure Pleasure
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Absolut Kurant
  • 2 cl Malibu rum
  • 1 cl Lemon juice
  • Cranberry juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all the ingridiens whith lots of ice. Stir in a Hurricane glas.

drinks.name: Jello shots
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups Vodka
  • 3 packages Jello with sugar
  • 3 cups Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Boil 3 cups of water then add jello. Mix jello and water until jello is completely disolved. Add the two cups of vodka and mix together. Pour mixture into plastic shot glasses and chill until firm. Then, eat away...

drinks.name: Jetstream
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • 4 cl Saurer apfel
  • Fill With Sprite or other lemon flavored softdrink
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the spirits with crushed ice in a shaker and pour in the cocktail glass. Fill with soda.

drinks.name: The Real Cuba Libre
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 chunk Ice, preferably crushed
  • Juice of 1 Lime
  • 8 cl Rum (Havana club)
  • 1 shot Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: sit outside on balcony, fill glass with crushed ice, sqeeze lime, hold glass up to the sky (best effect during sunset), pour rum up to horizon , add some coke to cover the sky (no overflow), stir smoothly, lean back & ENJOY! Maximum effect with bass heavy dub reggae in the background

drinks.name: Purple Heart
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot blue Maui
  • 1 shot red Maui
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both shots into same glass, add ice if want chilled, stir, and drink.

drinks.name: Cran-Ram
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Malibu rum
  • 2 or 3 parts Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Sunny delight
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Rum and Cranberry juice first. Add splash of Sunny D. May drink with crushed ice, if prefered.

drinks.name: In and Out Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 splash Dry Vermouth
  • 4 shots Gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pack Cocktail glass with ice, add a splash of dry vermouth. While glass chills, add gin in a mixer glass with ice. Throw away ice/vermouth in cocktail glass then strain in Gin.

drinks.name: Killer Kool-Aid (Rhode Island)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Absolut Vodka
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part Sloe gin
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour equal parts into a mug/glass. Add the alcohol first, then add the cranberry juice last. This drink may be mixed/stirred, but it isn't required.

drinks.name: Purple Haze Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's)
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • dash Grenadine
  • 1/4 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Cherry Bon Bon
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz White chocolate liqueur (Godet)
  • Layered on 3/4 oz Creme de Noyaux
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer 3/4 oz. of Godet on top of 3/4 oz. of Creme de Noyaux. Serve in a cordial or shot glass

drinks.name: Ken and Kirsten's top shelf Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Tequila (Sauza)
  • 1 shot Cointreau
  • 1 cup Lemonade (Newman's)
  • 1 splash Grapefruit juice
  • Juice of 3 wedges Lime
  • 1 handful Salt to coat the rim of the glass
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients and add ice. Shake well pouring ingredients into a second glass. At this point coat the rim of the first glass with salt. Repour your drink into the salted glass. Add fresh squeezed lime, kick back and enjoy!

drinks.name: Nystedt
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Absolut Vodka
  • 2 parts 7-Up or Sprite
  • 2 parts Orange juice
  • 2 parts grapefruit Tonic water
  • A little freshly squeezed Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the orange juice and the grape tonic with lots of ice in a shaker. Pour it in a glass and add the 7-Up and the Vodka. Last, add some lemon and decorate with one slice of orange and one slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Rum Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• mikey bottle Rum
  • large bottle Ginger ale
  • 355 ml frozen Fruit punch concontrate
  • 355 ml frozen Orange juice concontrate
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl and serve.

drinks.name: Pensacola Bushwacker
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Cream of coconut
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bacardi Black rum
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 4 oz Half-and-half
  • 2 cups Ice
  • Vanilla ice-cream (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Throw all the ingredients in a blender. Then blend till mixed. Ice-cream suggested for more milk shake like drink.

drinks.name: Southern Smile
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 jigger Cranberry juice
  • 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 shot Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill jigger with ice. add all ingredients. Cover, shake and pour into shot glasses.

drinks.name: The Hot Churchill
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Rum
  • some chunk Ginger root , crushed, fresh
  • 1/2 tsp Honey
  • Fill with hot Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Let Crushed Ginger sit in the 1 1/2 oz of rum for as long as possible -- overnight if you can. Add honey to glass. Top with hot water.

drinks.name: Hot Dick
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 4 oz Espresso (hot)
  • Top with Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poyr Bailey's and Grand Marnier into mug. Add espress. Serve it hot with lots of cream and sprinkle with chocolate.

drinks.name: Red Orange
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Cinzano Orancio
  • Zest Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake in jigger with ice and pour into martini glasses

drinks.name: Green Dinosaur #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 oz yellow Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients and mix well. Add ice and drink up.

drinks.name: Electric Watermellon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka (Sterling)
  • 1 part Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 splashes Triple sec
  • Fill with Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add equal Parts Vodka, Rum, and Melon in a tall cocktail glass with ice. Add a couple of splashes of triple sec (orange Liquor). Fill to the top with sweet and sour. Add a splash of 7 up and grenadine.

drinks.name: K-V-S Kaboom
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 bottle Jack Daniels
  • 1 bottle Absolut Kurant
  • 1 bottle Everclear
  • 2 gal Cranberry juice
  • Some Fruit
  • 3 bags Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients into a large punch bowl or ice chest. Slice fruit and add into mixture. More Cranberry juice may be added if you are a bunch of light-weights. Stir vigorously with a paddle.

drinks.name: Liquid Jello
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Citrus vodka
  • 6 1/2 oz Black Cherry Kool-Aid
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix kool-aid according to instructions. Fill glass with ice. Pour in citrus vodka. Add kool-aid until glass is full.

drinks.name: Exotica
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/4 oz Advocaat
  • 1/4 oz Whisky
  • 1/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 dash Triple sec, blue
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients into the shaker. Shake hard and serve in cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Honolulu Action
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Grenadine
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • top Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer ingredients in the above order, top with whipped cream, top with a sprinkle of Li Hing Powder.

drinks.name: Blood Clot #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-2 oz Cointreau
  • Some Cherry Advocaat
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Cointreau into glass. Using a spoon, drop the Cherry Advocaat in so it sits on the bottom of the glass. Making sure you have a straw handy, throw the shot back, place the glass on the nearest table and quickly cover the opening of the glass with your hand. Stick the straw between the fingers covering the glass and suck!

drinks.name: Original Sin
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cubes crushed Ice
  • 1/2 shot Triple sec
  • 1 shot plain Brandy
  • 1 shot Cherry Heering
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • Sliced Fruit (orange, lemon and lime)
  • 6 oz Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add crushed ice to snifter or gobblet. Add Triple Sec, Brandy, Cherry Heering, Grenadine and Sour Mix. Stir contents. Add sliced fruit. Top off glass with Champagne.

drinks.name: Turkeyball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Wild Turkey
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Shot-o-Happiness
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz Razzmatazz
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Add a splash of 7-up.

drinks.name: Exploding Cherry
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 splashes Fruit juice
  • 1/2 bottle Vodka
  • 5 slices Pineapple
  • 1/4 bottle Coconut liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour it all into an ice-cream pail and add more vodka if you wish.

drinks.name: Mint Russki
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz frozen Vodka
  • 6 Mint leaves, twisted or crushed
  • cube Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add crushed or twisted leaves of mint, ice cubes, then frozen vodka. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Beeraquirilla
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Beer (Bud Light)
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 3 oz strawberry Daiquiri mix
  • 3 oz Margarita mix
  • Handfull Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into a blender in this order: ice - beer - tequila - rum - daquari mix - magarita mix. Blend until frothy, then pour.

drinks.name: Nutty Irishman (without milk)
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Frangelico
  • 2 parts Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Frangelico first over a glass with ice. Then, pour the Bailey's over the top, but do not stir the drink.

drinks.name: Creamy Tan
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Kahlua
  • 3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3 oz Kahlua mudslide
  • 4 oz heavy Whipping cream
  • 1 cup Milk
  • 1/2 glass Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice and all the ingredients into a shaker and shake well. Then serve in a large glass.

drinks.name: Raging Indian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 shot Everclear
  • 1/4 shot Kahlua
  • 1/4 shot Orange juice
  • 1/4 shot Mango juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix a lot and mix in shaker. Pour shot.

drinks.name: Lady-Killer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 2 oz Passion fruit juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice in shaker, strain into a Champagne flute or Longdrink glas over some cubes of ice. Decorate with mint and cherry

drinks.name: Absolutely Cranberry Smash
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice Cocktail
  • 2 oz Ginger ale,cranberry (Seagrams)
  • Add Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients together. Serve over ice.

drinks.name: Kiss me Quick
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl finlandia Cranberry vodka
  • 2 cl Apfelkorn
  • 7 cl Schweppes Russchian
  • 8 cl Apple juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix in the glass

drinks.name: Ersh (Russian)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 inch Russian Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 1 glass Beer (Baltica original)
drinks.mixinginstructions: No special instruction. Just put some Vodka over Beer.

drinks.name: Malaria Killer
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Campari
  • Add 1/2 bottle indian Tonic water
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Campari in the glass. Add Indian Tonic Water. Stir with a spoon. Add ice if you want & a slice of Orange.

drinks.name: Canadian Hunter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Yukon Jack
  • 1 part Wild Turkey, 101 proof
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together in shot glass and 'discharge' into mouth!

drinks.name: Dew-Driver #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cubes Ice
  • 1 part Smirnoff Vodka
  • 2 parts Orange juice (tropicana pure premium)
  • 1 dash Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: The first thing to do is add the ice. 4 large cubes work well. Then add the vodka. A good way to measure is to fill it almost to the top of the ice cubes. Add the OJ until it is almost to the top of the glass and then add a little mountain dew. The more dew you add, the less vodka taste you have. (The oj also does a nice job of killing the vodka taste) . Then enjoy.

drinks.name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Sloe gin
  • 3 oz Southern Comfort
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: stir or shake ingredients & serve with ice

drinks.name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Tequila
  • 1/3 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/3 oz Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into shot glass starting with tequila, followed by J.D. and finally Southern. Shoot it.

drinks.name: Red Beard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 part Coconut rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1/2 part Grenadine
  • 1/2 part 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix on ice and serve.

drinks.name: Berlin martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Smirnoff Vodka
  • 3 dashes Schnapps
  • 1 splash Black Sambuca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a shaker filled with ice. Add 2 oz smirnoff vodka, 3 dashes of schnapps, a wee splash of black zambuca and shake well, keeping your feet firmly planted, posture perfect. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a blackberry.

drinks.name: Georgia Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill with Pineapple-orange juice (Dole)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with large ice cubes. Mix alcoholic ingredients in the glass. Fill the rest of the glass with Dole pineapple-orange juice and stir.

drinks.name: Yellow Birdie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka or light rum
  • 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • 6 oz Sprite or 7-up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka into glass over ice followed by Creme de Banana, then top it up with Sprite & stir.

drinks.name: Nazi Taco
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the ingredients together and pour into shot glasses.

drinks.name: Ru's Snap Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 tsp Candy, Pop Rocks, any flavor
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Pop Rocks Candy in bottom of shot glass. Add Cinnamon Schnapps. Stir, and shoot immediately.

drinks.name: Captain's Cream Soda
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 4 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Captain Morgan over plenty of ice in a highball glass. Top with the seven-up, stir and enjoy!

drinks.name: Fuquay Friday Night
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Absolut Kurant
  • 2 shots Sprite
  • Mix in 2 tblsp Grenadine syrup
  • And 1 shot Cherry Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Absolute can be varied to taste and alcohol tollerance. Discretion is advised. Also a dash of lime can be added for a slightly different taste.

drinks.name: Grape Nehi
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 3-4 slices Lemon or orange
  • Blend with Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Crush Ice with lemon (or orange) and alcohols in a large glass. Use a strainer and pour into a cocktail glass. Optional: add lemon wedge or salt to glass.

drinks.name: Brass Balls
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/3 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the three, and chill'em. Then pour and serve.

drinks.name: Seaside-Summerbliss
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Red wine
  • 3 parts sweet non-alcoholic Apple cider
drinks.mixinginstructions: Red wine first, then the cider.

drinks.name: Shlagerfloat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 glass Root beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put two scoops of vanilla ice-cream in your cup. Pour in a shot of Goldschlager then fill the glass with root beer. Mix with a spoon and enjoy!

drinks.name: Cookie Tosser
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 tblsp Vodka
  • 2 shots Lemon juice
  • 2 tsp Bourbon
  • 1 drop Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just throw it all together

drinks.name: Blood of Satan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Goldschlager
  • 1 part Irish whiskey (Jameson's)
  • 1 part Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer all 4 ingredients in shot glass. In this order JÃ¤germeister, Goldschlager, Jameson's and Jack Daniels.

drinks.name: Jamaican Me Crazy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • Add 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • Add 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir in a mixing glass.

drinks.name: Yucca
drinks.ingredients:
• Slice 10 Lemon
  • Slice 10 Lime
  • 3 lb Sugar
  • 1/2 gal Vodka
  • 8 lb Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the Vodka and the sugar into a container. Slice 10 lemons and 10 limes and add them to the Vodka. Mix for 10 minutes or until the sugar has dissolved.

drinks.name: Banana Colada #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 Banana
  • 1 scoop Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 tsp crushed Pineapple
  • 1 1/2 oz Pina colada mix
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine All Ingredents in a blender except for the ice and blend. Then add Ice until the drink begins to thicken then serve.

drinks.name: Sex on the Beach #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1/3 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 splash Grapefruit juice
  • 3 dashes Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: This can be on the rocks or up... but best on the rocks! Start with the Midori since it is heaviest, then the Chambord and the Absolut. Fill the glass 2/3 full with Cranberry juice, and then a splash of grapefruit for color. It should be an orangish-red color. Garnish with several cherries.

drinks.name: BlackJack Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 4 oz Lime juice (or Sour Mix)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add with Tequila, Triple Sec, and Chambord. Then add the Lime juice or sour mix. Shake. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

drinks.name: Banana Colada #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gold rum
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Coconut cream
  • 1 glass Banana, ripe
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 slice Pineapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend 4 first ingredients with 1/2 cut cracked ice at high speed in 15-25 seconds. Pour into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with cherry and pineapple slice.

drinks.name: Opera House Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tequila
  • 1 shot Gin
  • 1 shot White rum
  • 1 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 part Pineapple
  • 1 part Orange
  • 1 part Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients into a metal mixer and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Royal Flush
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all the ingredients into tumbler over ice. Strain into glass.

drinks.name: The Drink of Champions
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Crown Royal
  • Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Crown Royal into beer mug (or whatever type of glass that is available). Fill with chilled Dr. Pepper or add ice cubes before pouring. Stir gently with fork, spoon, knife, toothbrush or whatever is handy or forget to stir and wait for surprise at bottom.

drinks.name: Limona Corona
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Corona
  • 1 oz Bacardi Limon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Open the Corona. Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum. The bottle should be filled to the top. Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand. Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix. Turn the bottle rightside-up, unplug, and drink.

drinks.name: Screaming Dead Nazi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/3 Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/3 Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all in shot glass, one by one. Set aflame, blow it out, and enjoy.....

drinks.name: Pink Pysch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part fresh Lime juice
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 dash grape and apple Fruit syrup consentrate
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice.

drinks.name: Pysch Vitamin Light
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Apple juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice.

drinks.name: Good Morning To You My Love
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Orange
  • 1/2 Lime
  • 1/2 Apple
  • 1 dash Orange juice
  • 1 dash Apple juice
  • 1 dash Whipping cream or milk
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in mixer with ice. Serve in a small bowl garnished with strawberries or grapes and a straw.

drinks.name: IAS-Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Banana liqueur
  • 2 cl Aquavit linie
  • 1,5 cl Lime juice
  • 2,5 cl 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix aquavit and banana liqueur insert dash with lime fill up with 7-up Served with ice cubes strawberry

drinks.name: Puerto Rican Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Sloe gin
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • Float Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: straight mix into glass.

drinks.name: Kongepjolter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint Champagne
  • 1/2 pint Cognac
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Cognac in the mug, then mix the Champagne in.

drinks.name: Olsen Driver
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Apple juice
  • 3 cl Lime juice
  • 8 cl champagne flavored Carbonated soft drink
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • Soda water (Farris)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice.

drinks.name: Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Orange juice
  • 1 whole Egg
  • 1 cl Grenadine
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into highball glass with ice.

drinks.name: Apello
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Orange juice
  • 3 cl Grapefruit juice
  • 1 cl Apple juice
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stirr. Grnish with maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Belle Melon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and pour into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: By The Pool
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz 7-Up or sprite
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake briskley for 10 seconds and serve in a tall glass over ice.

drinks.name: Alamo Splash
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Lemon-lime soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with cracked ice and strain into collins glass.

drinks.name: Cactus Berry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Tequila
  • 1 1/4 oz Red wine
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 6 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 1 splash Lemon-lime soda
  • 1 dash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and pour into large salt-rimmed cocktail or margarita glass.

drinks.name: Hairy Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Tequila
  • 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 2-3 dashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in blender except grenadine. Pour into collins glass and float grenadine on top. Garnish with a lime slice.

drinks.name: Hot Pants
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 tblsp Grapefruit juice
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice cubes and pour into old-fashioned glass rimmed with salt.

drinks.name: La Bomba
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Gold tequila
  • 3/4 oz Cointreau
  • 1 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 dashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients except grenadine with ice 3 times ONLY. Pour into sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Add grenadine and garnish with a lime wheel.

drinks.name: Mexicana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tblsp Pineapple juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Mexican Madras
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Gold tequila
  • 1 dash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour juices and tequila into shaker 1/2 filled with ice. Shake well and strain into old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

drinks.name: Pacific Sunshine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 1 dash Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with cracked ice and pour, with ice, into chilled parfait or hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

drinks.name: Purple Gecko
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz red Curacao
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and pour into salt-rimmed cocktail or margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Purple Pancho
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 2 oz Lime juice
  • 2 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and pour into salt-rimmed cocktail or margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

drinks.name: Rosita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 oz Campari
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir in old-fashioned glass with cracked ice. Add a twist of lemon peel and serve with short straws.

drinks.name: Tequila Canyon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/8 oz Triple sec
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour first 3 ingredients over ice into collins glass and stir gently. Top with pineapple and orange juices. Garnish with a lime wheel. Serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Tequila Collins
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 2 oz Tequila
  • Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with club soda and stir. Decorate with slices of lemon and orange, and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Tequila Mockingbird
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 3/4 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • Juice of 1 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Tequila Pink
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Tequila (Straight)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Lemon
  • 1 pinch Salt
  • 1 1/2 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put salt between thumb and index finger on back of left hand. Hold shot glass of tequila in salted hand and lemon wedge in the other. Lick salt, slam the tequila, then suck lemon.

drinks.name: Tequonic
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon or Lime
  • Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila over ice cubes into old-fashioned glass. Add fruit juice, fill with tonic water, and stir.

drinks.name: Toreador
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 tblsp Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Top with a little whipped cream and sprinkle lightly with cocoa.

drinks.name: Skinny Dip
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 scoops Sherbet
  • 1 can Fresca
  • 2 shots Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a Blender Throw in: 8 scoops of sherbet, 1 can of Fresca and 2 shots of Vodka :o) Yummie Blend till desired thickness

drinks.name: Ocean Drive
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.25 oz Malibu rum
  • 0.75 oz Curacao
  • 1 count Orange juice
  • 1 count Pineapple juice
  • 1 count Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquour first over ice. Add juices cranberry last down side of glass.

drinks.name: Knacky
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 dl Apfelkorn (Berentzen)
  • 50 cl Peach juice
  • Fill with Iced tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the liquor in the glass. Then fill the juice and the ice tea.

drinks.name: Sloe Comfortable Screw #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice in a tumbler. Strain and pour.

drinks.name: Think Pink
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Rum
  • 2 cl Passoa
  • Fill with Sprite
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put incrediments in cold glass. Stir well.

drinks.name: Finnish Passion
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Finlandia Vodka
  • 2 cl Passion fruit syrup (Monin)
  • 4 cl Orange juice
  • 6 cl Sweet and sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients,pour in longdrink glass. Garnish with a boat of orange and red cherry.

drinks.name: LimLer
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 cl Apple juice
  • 8 wedges Lime
  • 2 tsp Brown sugar
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Squeeze the 8 parts of the lime and the brown sugarwith a wooden muddler, fill up with Apple Juiceand crushed Ice.

drinks.name: Lambada
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Cachaca
  • 4 cl Cream of coconut
  • 2 cl Cream
  • 10 cl Cherry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all indrigiens in a shaker on ice in poorthem on crushed ice in a fancy glass.

drinks.name: Alexander (Original)
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Creme de Cacao
  • 2 cl Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all on Ice and strain into a Cocktail Glass.

drinks.name: Panama Deluxe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Creme de Cacao
  • 2 parts Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients together, serve in a tumbler over ice.

drinks.name: Goombay Smash #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz Coconut rum
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill tall glass with ice, add all ingredients and shake well.

drinks.name: Buttery Nipple #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/2 shot Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: The Butterscotch Schnapps makes up the bottom layer. The top layer of Baileys should be added using a spoon. This is a layered shot. Delicious!!

drinks.name: Lethal Weapon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 2 shots Vodka
  • 1 can Mountain Dew
  • dash Triple sec (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all into a tall glass and serve with ice. As an option, use two cans of Mountain Dew if the drink seems too strong for you.

drinks.name: Nazi Surfer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill, shake, and strain.

drinks.name: Strawberry Smoothie
drinks.ingredients:
• 9-10 frozen Strawberries
  • 1 cup Water
  • 1/2 cup Soy milk
  • 1 tblsp Sugar
  • 3 Ice cubes
  • 1 Egg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all in blender and wizz away until thick.

drinks.name: Texas Rattlesnake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Yukon Jack
  • 1/2 part Cherry brandy
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients and Shake well. Sweet at first, with a BITE at the end...

drinks.name: Caribbean Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 scoop crushed Ice
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 3/4 oz Banana liqueur
  • 2 oz Dark rum
  • 1 splash Dark rum (Lemon Hart)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in shaker, top with grated nutmeg.

drinks.name: After sex
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 1 cl Creme de Banane
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar

drinks.name: San Francisco
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Creme de Banane
  • Grenadine
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the 'creme', to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.

drinks.name: Rum Rickey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Light rum
  • 0.5 oz Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar syrup
  • Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: 1. Fill mixing glass with ice 2. Add light rum and lime juice and sugar syrup 3. Shake 4. Strain into a collins glass filled with ice 5. Fill with club soda. 6. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

drinks.name: Far West
drinks.ingredients:
• 15 ml Brandy
  • 15 ml Advocaat
  • 15 ml Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put in a Shaker with ice, shake well, pour out in cocktail glasses and add some cinnamon powder over it.

drinks.name: Olympia-Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 40 ml Galliano
  • 30 ml Orange juice
  • 30 ml Cream
  • 1 Egg yolk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ingredients in shaker with ice, shake very well, pour out in a cocktail glass and put some fine cracked almonds over it as a decoration.

drinks.name: Pic-Walsh
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Heavy cream or vanilla ice-cream
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • dash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Swirl all ingredients in a blender.

drinks.name: Amaretto Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 scoops Chocolate ice-cream
  • 2 oz Brandy
  • 2 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed until smooth. Serve in chilled glass garnished with bittersweet chocolate shavings.

drinks.name: Crickets
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Peach brandy
  • 2 jiggers Creme de Cacao
  • 4 crushed Ice
  • Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Add enough ice-cream to make the drink thick like a malt. Serves two.

drinks.name: Rain Man
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz 151 proof rum
  • 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients together, then pour into a hurricane glass filled with ice.

drinks.name: A Day at the Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Coconut rum
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Rum, Amaretto, and Orange Juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain over ice into a highball glass. Add Grenadine and garnish with a Pineapple Wedge and a Strawberry.

drinks.name: Smooth Dog
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 shot Amaretto
  • 1/4 shot 7-Up or Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and drink

drinks.name: Gentle Ben
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka
  • 3 cl Gin
  • 3 cl Tequila
  • 1 splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together in a high glass, add some ice and a straw. Enjoy it !

drinks.name: Bellini #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Champagne
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps

drinks.name: Flaming Lamborgini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Yellow Chartreuse
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a cocktail glass, mix Kalhua, Amaretto, and Vodka. Float the Chartreusse. In a liqueur glass, put the Blue Curaco and float the Milk. Light the cocktail glass and drink quickly through a straw. When it's almost gone, pour the Blue Curaco and milk into the Cocktail glass and suck until all gone.

drinks.name: Tiffany Marshall
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 L Dark rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 L Vodka
  • 1/2 L Orange juice
  • 3 L Carbonated water
  • Add to taste Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix as punch. Add orange or lemon slices, or olives.

drinks.name: Mexican Mudslide
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 5 oz Ice-cream
  • Whipped cream
  • Chocolate syrup
  • Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix kalhua, amaretto, and ice-cream. Swirl chocolate in the glass and add whip cream on top.

drinks.name: Down Home Punch #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's)
  • 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 1 part Sour mix
  • 2 parts Orange juice
  • 1 part 7-Up or Sprite
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in pitcher with ice, Pour into glass with ice, And enjoy.

drinks.name: The Big Banana!
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rum
  • 2 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Coconut rum
  • 2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 8 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Over Ice in a 20oz Glass Pour booze in first and top with Pineapple, giving it a two layered look with the brown amaretto on bottom,. Two straws, Two cherries.

drinks.name: Banana Cream Pie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Banana liqueur
  • 1 part Creme de Cacao
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a shaker with ice then strain.

drinks.name: Polar Bear, Swedish
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • Sprite
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Absolut Vodka and Blue Curaco, fill it up with Sprite. Use lots of icecubes.

drinks.name: Sex On The Beach #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 cup Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Vodka over crushed ice, add cranberry juice, midori, chambord, and top off with pinapple, stir gently and serve.

drinks.name: Malibu Twister
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Malibu rum
  • 2 parts Tropicana (orange,straw.,pinapple)
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add rum & trister then, add cranberry jucie,stir

drinks.name: Space Odyssey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum or Myer's Rum
  • 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Pineapple juice
  • Orange juice
  • dash Grenadine
  • Cherries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.

drinks.name: Gibson
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Vermouth
  • 2 Cocktail onion
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir gin and vermouth over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cocktail onions and serve.

drinks.name: Down Home Punch #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Lemon-lime soda
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour mix
  • 1 oz Whiskey
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/3 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients. Serve with ice.

drinks.name: Urine Sample #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Galliano
  • 1/3 Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/3 Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: strain over ice. serve in shot glass

drinks.name: Tokyo Ice Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 2 oz Kiwi liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the alcohol. Add 1 oz sugarsyrup, ice, 7 up and some pieces of lemon. Stir.

drinks.name: Sex on the Beach #7
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Peach schnapps
  • 1 shot Grenadine
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • The rest Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all together and stir heavily. You will then serve cold.

drinks.name: Sperm
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Tequila
  • 5 cl Vodka
  • 1 drop Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the slammer glass with tequila and vodka and drop carefully some cream in it.

drinks.name: Pink Poontang
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Creme de Banane
  • 3/4 oz Creme de Almond
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: This drink is a shooter, so shake all ingredients with ice (in a mixing tin). Strain into a shooter glass.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1-1/2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shooter. Shake ingredients with ice (in a mixing tin). Strain into a shooter glass.

drinks.name: Klondyke
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 shot JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shot-glass pour JÃ¤germeister then Bailey's, do not blend. Drink it all at once.

drinks.name: Tropical Lifesaver #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Then add the Malibu and Midori. Then fill the remainder of the glass up with Pineapple Juice. Shake and enjoy!!

drinks.name: Scooby Snack #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing cup with ice. Strain into 7 oz. rocks glass and serve.

drinks.name: Scooby Snack #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka (Stoli)
  • 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing cup with ice. Strain into 7 oz. rocks glass and serve.

drinks.name: Watermelon shooter #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Noyaux
  • 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mixing glass 1/4 filled with ice. Mix all four ingredients then strain into rocks glass.

drinks.name: Zenmeister
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Root beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together and enjoy

drinks.name: Barrier Reef
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Cointreau
  • 1 scoop Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend.

drinks.name: Banana Boat
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 8-10 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 Banana (Sliced lengthwise)
  • Slice of 1 Pineapple (for garnish)
  • cracked Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a 12 Oz glass, place banana and ice. Combine the other ingredients in another glass and pour over the ice. Add the pineapple slice and enjoy.

drinks.name: Monkey Brain #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Apfelkorn (apple liquor)
  • Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a shot glass with Apfelkorn almost to the rim. Then, very carefully pour a little Bailey's into the glass. The two liquors don't mix at if poured correctly, and the Bailey's will sink to the bottom as a nasty looking blob, not unlike a brain.

drinks.name: Glacier Mint
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 parts Vodka
  • 3 parts White Creme de Menthe
  • Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir the ingredients together and strain into a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with mintleaves.

drinks.name: Exotic Finn
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Finlandia Vodka
  • 1 part Passion fruit syrup
  • 1 tsp Strawberry syrup
  • Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a highball glass with cracked ice. Add the first three ingredients and stir. Top up with Sprite and garnish with mint leaves, a strawberry, a twist of orange and a straw. Ole Skeiedal, from Norway, took first place in the long drinks listing of the 1993 Finlandia Vodka International Drinks Competition.

drinks.name: Avalon
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Finlandia Vodka
  • 1 part Pisang Ambon
  • 6 parts Apple juice
  • 1 1/2 part Lemon juice
  • Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a tall glass with ice. Layer the Finlandia Vodka, lemon and apple juices, Pisang Ambon, and top up with lemonade. Stir slightly and garnish with a spiralled cucumber skin and a red cherry. The cucumber provides zest and looks attractive. This drink, created by Timo Haimi, took first prize in the 1991 Finlandia Vodka Long Drink Competition.

drinks.name: B-57
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Kahlua
  • 1/3 shot Peppermint schnapps
  • 1/3 shot Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer ingredients into a shot glass in this order.

drinks.name: Electric Jello
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • Jello (Lime is preferable)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Made in large quantities usually. Mixing varies depending on personal preference. Mix Jell-O as you normally would. Replace 26oz of water with 26oz of vodka (strong). Pour mixed Jell-O and Vodka into glasses or small cups for serving. Let set in freezer (vodka requires colder temperature to set). Serve after it has set with a spoon.

drinks.name: Dark'n Dirty
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dark rum (Newfoundland Screech)
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix like ordinary drink and serve with ice.

drinks.name: Schnider
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 shots Peach schnapps
  • 1 pint Cider
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour schnapps in a pint glass, top up with cider. Drink and enjoy.

drinks.name: Snowball #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix together into a double shotglass

drinks.name: White Out
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 part Cointreau
  • 1 part Cognac
drinks.mixinginstructions: Crushed ice Build up.

drinks.name: Nuts and Berries #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix all the ingredients, and shake well.

drinks.name: Green Dinosaur #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients in ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Wild Thing #2
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1 Lemon
  • Juice of 1 Lime
  • Juice of 1 Orange
  • 1-1/2 oz Vodka or rum or tequila
  • 1 splash Rosewater
  • 4 tblsp Sugar
  • Lots Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in blender, blend until slushy. Adjust amount of ice to achieve proper consistency. Rim of glass can be salted if desired.

drinks.name: Gorilla Fart #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 shot Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just add the 2 ingredients, and shoot it.

drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 shot Wild Turkey, 101 proof
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add both ingredients to shot glass, shoot, and get drunk quick

drinks.name: Klingon Disrupter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Jim Beam
  • 1/3 oz Mezcal
  • 1/3 oz Cinnamon schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all three ingredients together. (Real Klingons drink it warm!) Shoot it!

drinks.name: Fuzzy F**ker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 2 parts Sunny delight (or other orange blend juice)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingrediants in a highball glass. Serve overice. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Irish Comfort
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: combine Southern Comfort and Blue Curacao in a high ballglass over ice. Add enough orange juice to fill the glass. The orange juice and blue Curcao will combine to form a lovely green shade!

drinks.name: Captain Creamsicle
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • Vanilla ice-cream
  • Orange Sherbet
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Captain Morgan's to blender. Add equal parts vanilla ice-cream and orange sherbert to taste (O.J. can be substitued for sherbert).

drinks.name: Welcome delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 parts Orange juice
  • 3 parts Vodka
  • 6 parts White wine
  • 6 parts Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Simple: Just put them into a bowl, and mix then together.

drinks.name: 3-Mile Long Island Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Coca-Cola
  • Sweet and sour
  • 1-2 dash Bitters
  • 1 wedge Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill 14oz glass with ice and alcohol. Fill 2/3 glass with cola and remainder with sweet & sour. Top with dash of bitters and lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Blue Nut
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into a shaker with ice and shake and strain

drinks.name: Velvet Crush
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • To taste Kool-Aid (or Crystal Light)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add gin to a glass with ice. Add Kool Aid (any flavor, although I get the impression that purples and reds are often used).

drinks.name: Jack Sprite
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Jack Daniels
  • To taste Sprite (or other lemon lime beverage)
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the 1 shot of Jack Daniels into glass followed by Sprite to taste and then 1 slice of lemon. Then stir the beverage and enjoy. Note this is a light drink, a good one to start the evening off.

drinks.name: RumRunner's Easy Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 can frozen Limeade
  • 1/2 can silver Tequila
  • 1/2 can Gold tequila
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec (or to taste)
  • 3 1/3 cans iced Water
  • 1 splash fresh Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Whisk all ingredients in pitcher. Serve over ice. If frozen Margarita required, substitute ice for water and blend.

drinks.name: RumRunner's RubyRed
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 5-6 oz Ruby red Grapefruit juice
  • Top with Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill large glass with ice Add Vodka and Ruby Red juice Top with Tonic Pour from one glass to another to mix

drinks.name: Tequila Comfort
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part Southern Comfort

drinks.name: Bambus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Red wine
  • 1 part Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the ingredients into a glass.

drinks.name: Vulcan Mind-Probe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Ouzo
  • 1/2 oz 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and sereve straight up.

drinks.name: Suicide #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Pernod / Ricard
  • 6 cl Campari
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with lots of ice. Then fill a large (35cl) glass with ice cubes. Strain into glass.

drinks.name: French Afternoon
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Kahlua
  • 2 cl Pernod
drinks.mixinginstructions: Served on ice in 'rocks-glass' May be served with a little whipped creem on top!

drinks.name: Aggravation
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Heavy cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice, then add Scotch and kahlua. Float cream on top and stir.

drinks.name: Banshee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Cream, sweet
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients with crushed ice in a mixing glass, then shake & strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Ramos Fizz #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz sweet Cream
  • 1 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 Egg white
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 2 dashes Orange juice
  • Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with cracked ice and add gin, cream, lemon juice, egg white, sugar and orange juice. Shake and strain into a chilled Collins glass, then add Club soda.

drinks.name: Zorro
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Sambuca
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl White Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: add all and pour black coffee and add whipped cream on top.

drinks.name: Orange Crush
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to tumbler-Pour as shot

drinks.name: Purple Haze #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill 12 oz glass with ice. Add alcohol and sour. Top off with 7 up.

drinks.name: Cumulus #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Drambuie
  • 1,5 cl Tia maria
  • 1 cl Cream
  • 1 Egg yolk
  • 2 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake intensily with ice. Serve in frosted glass, and sprinkle with powdered coffee or nutmeg.

drinks.name: Stinger Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl White Creme de Menthe
  • 1/2 cl Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Tabasco in the bottom of the shot. Pour Vodka and CrÃ¨me de MÃ¨nthe gently on top. Shoot!

drinks.name: Cinnamon Road
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Wild Turkey
  • 2 cl Apfelkorn
  • 2 cl Goldschlager
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Serve with a slice of dried apple.

drinks.name: Apricot adventure
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 fresh Mint sprigs
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 1,5 cl Lime juice
  • 4 cl Apricot brandy, sweet (Zwack)
  • 1 cl Vodka
  • Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Crush part of the mint together with the sugar and some Zwack. Shake the rest of the Zwack with the Lime Juice and ice and pour into the glass. Fill up with club soda and decorate with the remaining mint and perhaps some lime.

drinks.name: Snakebite #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Green Chartreuse
  • 2 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Very carefully layer the vodka on top of the green Chartreuse. Drop in the Tabasco, which should sink to the bottom. Slam it.

drinks.name: Green Dinosaur #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Gin
  • 1 shot Rum
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • Midori melon liqueur
  • Pineapple juice
  • Sour mix
  • 1 shot Tequila (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients and shake!

drinks.name: 155 Belmont
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Dark rum
  • 2 shots Light rum
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with ice. Serve in a wine glass. Garnish with carrot.

drinks.name: Hashi Bashi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Campari
  • Schweppes Russchian
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin and campari over a couple of icecubes. Fill up with russian!

drinks.name: Liquid After-Eight
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • Chocolate milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Creme de menthe in a Highball glass Fill the glass with the cold chocolate-milk.

drinks.name: Arizona Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Grenadine
  • 4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice into a tall-stemed cocktail glass, pour grenadine over ice, add enough that some settles on the bottom of the glass Add tequila, orange juice, and lime juice into shaker with ice. Shake thourghly. Garnish with a straw, lime wedge OR orange and cherry.

drinks.name: Arizona Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz white Tequila
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Creme de Noyaux
  • 4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice to tall-stemed cocktail glass. slowly pour cream de noyaux over ice until some settels on the bottom. add tequila, triple sec, lime juice, & orange juice into shaker with ice, shake thourghly. pour over ice. Garnish with straw, and lime slice or orange & cherry

drinks.name: Crimson Tide
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Maui
  • 1/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/4 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/4 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/4 oz Sprite or 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: combine all ingrediants, chill over ice, strain.

drinks.name: Cyberlady
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cognac
  • 1/2 oz Strawberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well and pour in a cocktail glass, frosted with strawberry.

drinks.name: Net surfer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cognac
  • 1 oz Bourbon
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Peach liqueur (Creme de peche)
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Strawberry syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake well and pour in a cocktail glass frosted with strawberry.

drinks.name: Old Crusty
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Wild Turkey Whiskey

drinks.name: Whiskey Manhattan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Whiskey
  • 1.5 oz Sweet Vermouth

drinks.name: Sex On The Beach #6
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 5-6 oz Orange juice
  • 1/4 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Highball glass 1/2 full ice. Add vodka and schapps. Fill to near top with OJ, amount depends on ice and glass size. Add cream last and stir. May be served up after mixing. The amount of OJ and dairy cream may be adjusted taste.

drinks.name: King Willy
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Midori melon liqueur (or Artic)
  • A few drops Green Curacao
  • 7-Up or Sprite
  • A few drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the melon liqueur and the Curacao on two cubes of ice in a highball glass. Fill up with 7 up or Sprite and pour the Grenadine in a way that will look like its shaping a stripe down the drink.

drinks.name: Olle Goop
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Vodka
  • A few drops Lime juice
  • Schweppes Russchian
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix in a highball glass.

drinks.name: Polar Bear #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 - 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 7-Up or Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just blend with ice in a highball glass.

drinks.name: Hell Mary
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Aquavit (Aalborg)
  • 1/2 oz Tequila (Pecos Heat Chilli Pebber)
  • dash Angostura bitters
  • dash Tabasco sauce
  • dash Horseradish Sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill with V-8 and shake vigorously. Add black pepper to taste and garnish with celery and lemon wedge. Serve in Collins glass filled with ice.

drinks.name: Lemon Shooters
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • Sugar
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Cover lemon slice with sugar. Shoot, then suck (on the lemon)!

drinks.name: En sÃ¥nn en
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 4 cl Sour mix (LC-mix)
  • Coca-Cola
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill longdrinks glas with ice-cubes, add vodka and sour-mix. Top with Coca-Cola, stir.

drinks.name: Dr. Pepper #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Beer
  • 4 oz Coca-Cola
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour beer into beer stein, add coke. In a shot glass mix the three other ingredients. Pour contents of shot glass into beer stein and chug it all down. Tastes just like a Dr. Pepper.

drinks.name: Polar Bear #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps or creme de menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix drinks over ice before serving in a shot glass. Tastes like a peppermint patty!

drinks.name: Dark and Stormy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gosling's Black rum
  • 8 oz Ginger beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: You can substitute any dark or spiced rum . Pour rum over ice, add ginger ale, stir.

drinks.name: Poison Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Apfelkorn (Berentzen's)
  • 1 oz Absolut Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice in shaker. Shake and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Karma Chameleon
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 oz Sprite
  • To taste Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix well. Serve over ice.

drinks.name: Dr. Pepper #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 shot Amaretto
  • 1/4 shot Gin
  • 1/2 glass Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill shot glass with amaretto and gin. Drop shot glass into half glass of beer. Then, slam. It tastes just like Dr. Pepper (the soda)!!!!

drinks.name: Watermelon Shooter #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir in an ice-filled mixing glass and strain into rocks glass.

drinks.name: Knockout Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Hawaiian Punch
  • 1 shot Tequila
  • 1 shot Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour all three together, mix well

drinks.name: 1-900-FUK-MEUP
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1/4 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/4 oz Pineapple juice
