drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice cubes. Strain into a rocks glass.

drinks.name: The Race
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 oz Mandarine Napoleon (tangerine liqueur)
  • 1 oz Apricot nectar
  • 1 dash Strawberry syrup
  • 2 dashes Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in a shaker and shake well, then serve in a cocktail glass frosted with tangerine.

drinks.name: P.S. I Love you
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 shot Grand Marnier
  • 1 splash White Creme de Menthe
  • Nutmeg
  • About 75 ml Cream, single
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Baileys, Grand Marnier, and single cream together with some ice in a shaker. Shake thoroughly, and pour into a cocktail glass. Pour a splash (about 1/3 shot) through the mixture to the bottmo of the glass. Shake nutmeg over the top of the cocktail, and Bob's your Uncle.

drinks.name: Penguino
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Light rum
  • 1 shot Cointreau or triple sec
  • 6 oz Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill collins glass with ice, add one shot light rum and one shot Cointreau or triple sec. Fill with tonic. Serve ungarnished, or with cherry.

drinks.name: Vodka Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • Schweppes Russchian
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it as a ordinary drink .

drinks.name: Vodka Bitter lemon
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • Bitter lemon

drinks.name: Malibu and Soda
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part Cola (Coke or Pepsi)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix above ingredients in cup with ice.

drinks.name: Danbooka
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Coffee
  • 1 part Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour it in and mix it.

drinks.name: Summer Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups Sugar
  • 1 cup White grape juice
  • 1 cup Lemon juice
  • 1-1 1/2 gal Iced tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make the tea and add all the stuff. Mix and enjoy.

drinks.name: Southern Blues #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Blackberry schnapps
  • 3/4 Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Schnapps and Southern Comfort together, chill, and serve cold. Tastes like Kool Aid.

drinks.name: Tropical Life Saver #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together, Tall glass...

drinks.name: Sex on the Beach #8
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Malibu rum
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • Top with Grenadine
  • 1 splash Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Coco-Rum can be substituted for Malibu Rum.

drinks.name: Buttery Nipple #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour schnapps into shot glass. Carefully add Baily's to surface. Don not mix.

drinks.name: Grainslide
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/5 Grain alcohol
  • 2/5 Irish cream
  • 2/5 Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a shot glass.

drinks.name: 110 in the shade
drinks.ingredients:
• 16 oz Lager
  • 1.5 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Drop shooter in glass. Fill with beer

drinks.name: Suicide #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 2 parts Lime liqueur
  • 2 parts Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix all ingredients together.

drinks.name: Grand Blue
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 cl Malibu rum
  • 1 1/2 cl Peach schnapps
  • 1 1/2 cl Blue Curacao
  • 3 cl Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve in an old fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Jelly Bean #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Kahlua
  • 1/2 shot Anisette
  • 1/2 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients in the above order into highball glass. Tilt glass until mixture is close to top of glass and light. Wait a few seconds, then right before shooting it, blow it out so you don't burn your face off!

drinks.name: Solaris
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 part Grenadine
  • 1 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Measure the parts so the glass is 2/3 full. The sugar teaspoonfull should be skimmed and stirred a little. .

drinks.name: Pepito Lolito
drinks.ingredients:
• Add Gin
  • With Blue Curacao
  • Then Tonic water
  • And Orange soda
  • 1 handful Ice cubes
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add gin and Curaco, more gin than curaco. Mix the soda, which should have orange flavour (eg. Fanta or something like that) and the tonic, 1/2 of each. Fill up until the bitter gin taste is gone, and the drink is all green. Be sure that all the ingredients are very cold, and add ice. To make it perfect, a slice of lemon is to be slid around the edge of the glass, and then put in the drink.

drinks.name: Green delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 6 cl Sprite light
  • 6 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix all the ingredients. It is also best served cold.

drinks.name: Tom Collins ala Olsen
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 cl Collins mix
  • 8 cl Sprite light
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix the ingredients.

drinks.name: Summertime
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 5 cl Sprite light
  • 5 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix the ingredients. It can also be served without alchohol. Just mix equal amounts of sprite light and orange juice.

drinks.name: Cool Kid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: put the shit in a hurricane glass, mix it up, and suck it down

drinks.name: Kretchma
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Soviet Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz dry Sherry
  • Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients, except lemon peel, with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over drink and drop into glass.

drinks.name: Cossack Charge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 1/2 oz Cognac
  • 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: St. Petersburg
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 1/4 tsp Orange bitters
  • 1 wedge Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and bitters into mixing glass with several ice cubes. Stir until very cold and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass. Score peel of orange wedge with tines of fork and drop into drink.

drinks.name: Black Magic
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 3/4 oz Coffee liqueur
  • Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender. Pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Siberian Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 4 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and pour into highball glass.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Navel (original)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • Orange juice to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour peach schnapps into ice filled collins glass. Fill with orange juice and stir to combine.

drinks.name: Whop Me Down Sweet Jesus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1.5-2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Medium splash Sour mix
  • Medium splash 7-Up or sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Best in large mason jar. Blue going down Blue coming up.

drinks.name: Absolut Stress #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing tin and shake with ice. Pour into a collins glass. No garnish.

drinks.name: Highball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Whiskey
  • Fill with glass Ginger ale
  • 4-5 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill a medium glass most of the way with ice, pour in 1 shot, about 1.5 ounces of whiskey, fill the rest of the way with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Killing Light
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/8 Vodka
  • 2/8 Cognac
  • 1/8 Peppermint schnapps
  • 1/8 Cointreau
  • 2/8 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Highly dangerous mix-but taste it! You'll be surprised.

drinks.name: The Tony Kelly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 glass strong Rum
  • 1/4 glass Orangina Orange soda
  • 1/4 glass Margarita mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix. Shoot.

drinks.name: Big brothers
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 cl Whisky
  • 12 cl Ginger ale
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Selfinstructing appetizer.

drinks.name: Snowshoe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Wild Turkey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour peppermint schnapps in shot glass, top with Wild Turkey, drink it up!

drinks.name: Slider
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rye whiskey
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • Top with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Rye, khalua and milk to a high ball glass, glass should be full off ice.Stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: Slam Dunk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • Mix of 2 parts Orange juice
  • And 1 part Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a rock glass,filled with ice. Add 1.5oz of Southern Comfort. For the mix, add 1 can of cranberry juice with half a can of orange concentrate into a pitcher. Use this mix to top off the drink.

drinks.name: New Orleans Salty Dog
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Coarse Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Coat the rim of a highball glass with salt. Mix Vodka and Grapefruit juice in another glass with ice and pour into glass with salted rim.

drinks.name: Orgasm #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 0.5 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 0.5 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: 1. Pour the two evenly into a 1-ounce shot glass.

drinks.name: Love Potion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Orange vodka (Stoli)
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: chill all ingredients over ice, strain into chilled shot glass, serve, enjoy

drinks.name: Prairie Fire #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Tequila
  • Tabasco sauce
  • 1 dash ground Black pepper

drinks.name: Freson
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Mountain Dew
  • 1 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients and pour over ice.

drinks.name: Detroit Red Wing
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Ginger ale / soda (Vernors Original)
  • 1-2 shot Cinnamon schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice.

drinks.name: Berry Me In The Sand
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Triple Berry Vodka (Red Tassel)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • Lots Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into glass. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Black Army
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Galliano
  • 3 cl JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gently, i'ts important to get 2 layers. Use a shot glass. You can use 2 cl of each, if 3 is to much for you.

drinks.name: Southern Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/6 cl Southern Comfort
  • 1 slice Lime
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix it! Have a slice of lime on the top. Served with lots of ice...

drinks.name: Ice Bear
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 2 parts Vodka
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and Curacao. Pour in a high glass. Fill it up with soda.

drinks.name: Gorilla
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 shot JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: none

drinks.name: Copper Camel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Bailey's to shot glass and and add Buterscotch on top.

drinks.name: Dr. Daniel
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 5 oz Dr. Pepper
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in glass. Pour in ingredients. Gently swirl to mix. Drink.

drinks.name: Doctor
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Fruit punch
  • 1 part Gin
  • 1 part Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mixit together and shake it not to hard. Pour it up in a ordinar cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Ugly
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tomato juice
  • 6 oz Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill beer glass 3/4 full of beer, slowly pour tomato juice down the side so it settles on the bottom. Shake salt in the palm of your hand. Throw salt into the glass and wait until the top foams up. Chug the drink and then scream UGLY!!

drinks.name: Bullfrog (The Party Mix)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 gal Vodka
  • 1 pint Grain alcohol
  • 2 L Ginger ale
  • 2 L Lemon-lime soda
  • 2 L Sprite
  • Juice of 2 Lemon
  • Juice of 2 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in the soda, and then add the Vodka. After mixing pour in the grain alcohol. Use a knife and cut the lemons and limes and squeeze the juice out of them. store bought lime and lemon juice can be substituted. Now you have a great party drink and should have a good night.

drinks.name: God's Great Creation
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Whiskey
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 5 tblsp Fruit punch, orange-banana (frozen)
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • Fill Pepsi Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Whiskey and Peach Schnapps over ice cubes in a High Ball Glass. Add frozen canned orange banana punch (no water). Add lemon juice and fill the rest with pepsi. Stir well and serve.

drinks.name: Texas Sweat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Grain alcohol
  • 1 dash Grenadine syrup
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Rum
  • 1 shot Gin
  • 1 shot Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all together and filter back and forth through ice to chill and mix. Not a sipping drink, shoot it.

drinks.name: Baby Eskimo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Kahlua (or Kapali)
  • 8 oz Milk
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Leave ice-cream out for about 10 minutes. Add ingredients in order, stir with chopstick (butter knife or spoon works too). Consume immediately and often. Nice and light, great for following a heavy drink.

drinks.name: Red Ox
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum (Barcardi)
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • Sweet and sour mix (Mr. & Mrs. T)
  • Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a pint glass a quarter of the way with ice, then add the rums and juice. Fill the rest of the glass with the Sweet and Sour, almost to the top, then finish it off with the grenadine. Mix and serve.

drinks.name: Tennesee Mud
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Coffee
  • 4 oz Jack Daniels
  • 4 oz Amaretto
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.

drinks.name: Midori Chan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Rum
  • 2 slices Pineapple, canned
  • 1/3 Pina colada mix
  • 1/3 Midori melon liqueur
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour it all into the blender and mix until desired consistency is achieved.

drinks.name: Snow White
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 part Sprite or 7up
  • 1/4 part Beer (Heineken)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place Sprite/7up into glass. Pour Heineken to top off. Mixture can be varied. Good summertime drink.

drinks.name: Swedish Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup strong Coffee
  • 4 cl Aquavit
  • By taste Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the coffee in an ordinary coffee cup. Add the aquavit. Add sugar by taste. Stir and have a nice evening (morning)

drinks.name: Duck's Ass
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix in tumbler with ice strain in shot glass.

drinks.name: Lombomba
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Chocolate milk
  • 1 part Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour the ingredients into a norma drink glass with a few ice-cubes. stirr.

drinks.name: Slippery Nipple #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Sambuca
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour sambuca into shot glass float Bailies on top enjoy

drinks.name: The Betty Ford
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 10 oz Sprite
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Grenadine (based on desired sweetness), followed by Absolut. Add ice and then Sprite (her preferred mixing).

drinks.name: Dead Dog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Crown Royal
  • 1 part Beer (Red Dog)
  • 3 dashes Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add in the order given and enjoy!

drinks.name: Lemonsquash a la vermouth
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Lemon juice
  • 2 cl Lime juice
  • 4 cl Vermouth
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix add shake all the ingredience except the soda water in a shaker with ice. Pour it into a collins glas, add up with sodawater. Add ice and a lemon slide.

drinks.name: Casablanca #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Orange juice
  • 3 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Advocaat
  • 1 cl Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake not too short with enough ice.

drinks.name: Breathalizer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 oz Rum (Bacardi)
drinks.mixinginstructions: just mix together

drinks.name: Nuts and Berries #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Irish cream
  • 1 shot Grand Marnier
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • To taste Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients with ice and shake. Serve with ice strained out.

drinks.name: Russian Qualude #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Irish cream
  • 3/4 shot Coffee liqueur
  • 3/4 shot Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice, shake vigorously, Strain into martini style cocktail glass. Garnish with one filbert.

drinks.name: Saint Paul
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Gin
  • 1 part White rum
  • Fill with Bitter lemon
  • 2-4 Ice cubes
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a tall glass, put a few ice cubes on top of each other. Pour the Gin and the rum in the glass, Fill the glass with bitter lemon. Leave some of the ice over the surface, so that you can pour the angostura on top of it. It should leave a rather nice track of red down the ice cubes.

drinks.name: Horny Toad
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer each part in glass first: Triple Sec second: Kahlua third: Cream

drinks.name: Banana Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz Creme de Banane
  • 2/3 oz PiÃ±a Colada
  • 2/3 oz Malibu rum
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the ingredients in a shaker and shake them with ice. Pour the drink in a highball (without the ice!) and enjoy the fresh, creamy mix.

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Campari
  • 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir over ice and pour into a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon zest.

drinks.name: Snake Piss
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Milk
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 3-4 oz Peach schnapps or crantasha
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice (crushed or cubes). Add ingredients and stir ocassionally.

drinks.name: Sweet Tart
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka (Stoli)
  • 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing cup with ice. Strain into 7 oz. old-fashioned glass and serve.

drinks.name: Naked Twister
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Tuaca
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build into a Pint Glass and cheery garnish. It's a real lady killer in San Diego.

drinks.name: DJ Shooters
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 3 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Coconut rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/3 Pineapple juice
  • 1/3 Orange juice
  • 1/3 Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: To Pitcher full of Ice, add Peach Schnapps, Rum, Vodka, Gin, and juices. Stir well. Serve.

drinks.name: Red Square
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Russian Vodka
  • 1 part White Sambuca
  • Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it together.

drinks.name: Mad Scientist #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 1 splash Soda water
  • 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix melon liqueur, sour, and soda with ice in shaker. Shake and strain into martini glass. Top with rum and ignite.

drinks.name: Juniata Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Beer
  • 1 shot Rum
  • 2 tblsp frozen Lime juice concentrate
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 1 shot rum to 12 oz beer, stir in 2 tbls lime juice concentrate.

drinks.name: Big Stick
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice in an 11 oz. glass Looks and tastes like a big stick popsicle

drinks.name: Adam Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Vodka (Bartons)
  • 1/2 can Lemonade concentrate (Minute Maid)
  • 1/2 Water
  • 10 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill blender up with ice. Fill half with Bartons Vodka. Put 10 tsp of sugar, add 1/2 can lemonade concentrate, fill to top with water. Blend for 60 seconds.

drinks.name: Harley Davidson #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Whiskey
  • 1 part Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it all togheter and stir it up.

drinks.name: Brain Tumor #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 Watermelon schnapps
  • 1/4 Bailey's irish cream
  • 3-4 drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Schnapps, Dribble Bailey's to give the look of a brain and add a few drops of grenadine to make that hemmorage look.

drinks.name: C*m in a Hot Tub
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Vodka
  • 1 part White rum
  • Several drop Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka and rum carefully but not too carefully into a glass. They have different consistencies and you want them to mix just a little. Now let several drops of Bailey's fall into the liquor.

drinks.name: Foggy Morning
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Vodka
  • Peach juice to taste
  • 1 dash Vermouth
  • 1 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve on ice.

drinks.name: Rainy Night
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Vodka
  • 4 shots Whiskey
  • Peach juice to taste
  • dash Vermouth
  • 1 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve on ice.

drinks.name: Dancing Dutchman
drinks.ingredients:
• 25 tsp Vodka
  • 5 cups Ice cubes
  • 5 cups Strawberry juice
  • 1 cup White wine
  • 1 cup Lime juice
  • 3 cups Peach juice
  • 15 tsp Scotch
  • Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix fruit juices together in one bowl, place in blender with ice cubes. When slushy mixture is complete, stir in alcohol and shake until completly mixed. Place mixture in punchbowl, and float cherries in the bowl if desired.

drinks.name: Niagara Falls
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Finlandia Vodka
  • 2 parts Mandarine Napoleon
  • 1 part Lemon juice (Sun Ripe)
  • 1/2 part Sugar syrup
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build the sugar syrup, lemon juice, Mandarine Napoleon and Finlandia Vodka. Serve in a cocktail or champagne glass with a splash of ginger ale.

drinks.name: William's Rainbow
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka
  • 1 cl Blue Curacao
  • 1 cl Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: high ball glas fill it with ice. poor vodka over the ice, then fill up with sprite. poor slowly 1cl blue curacao, after that poor 1cl grenadine. Ready to serv. The guest will now stir it and the drink will turn purple.

drinks.name: Nestle
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Absolut Peppar
  • 3 cl Midori melon liqueur

drinks.name: Red Witch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Pernod
  • 1 pint Cider
  • Blackcurrant cordial to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Pernod in a pint glass. Fill almost to the top with cider and add the blackcurrant. After that, it's up to you.

drinks.name: Lee's Drink
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part brewed Coffee
  • 1 part Tia maria
  • 1 part Frangelico
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • Whipped cream
  • Cherry (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass 1/4 with coffee, pour Tia Maria, Frangelico, & Amaretto slowly, add whipped cream on top, cherry if you want to. When drinking, stir gently if you like your coffee light. Drink from the bottom with a straw if you like it strong. Still looking for a better name, e-mail me if you think of one, or if you've heard of it with another name. imrey@aol.com

drinks.name: French Whore
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vigorously over ice and strain into a rocks glass.

drinks.name: Butcherblock
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • To fill Half-and-half or milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a large (16 oz.)glass. Shake vigorously. Garnish with grated chocolate. YUMMM!

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Stoli Vodka
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • Small dash Cranberry juice
  • Small dash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients on ice and strain into martini glass.

drinks.name: Absolut Stress #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Coconut liqueur
  • 1 1/2 oz Cranberry juice cocktail
  • 1 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix well. Garnish with Orange and Cherry. Enjoy

drinks.name: Timberwolf
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz pure Grain alcohol
  • 1 1/2 oz Creme de Noyaux
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together in a a large glass and fill remainder with Orange Juice. Serve Cold

drinks.name: Vodka Kick
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3/4 Ginger ale (Schweppes)
  • Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix it! Also add some lime.

drinks.name: Morning Milk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Milk
  • 3 tblsp Gin
  • 10 Strawberries (approx)
  • 1 Kiwi, small
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend until smooth and creamy.

drinks.name: Nutty Irishman #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 jigger Irish cream
  • 1/2 jigger Hazelnut liqueur
  • 1 cup steamed Milk
  • 1 cup Espresso (small)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Prepare a cafe-latte as normal. Add liquors acording to taste. Serve hot or over ice as a chilled coffee beverage.

drinks.name: Baso
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1/2 shot Goldschlager
  • 3/4 shot Lime juice
  • Top with Grapefruit juice
  • 1 splash Club soda
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake vigorously, strain into glass, garnish with lime.

drinks.name: Green Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Limeade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve in plastic Champagne Glasses without the plastic bottoms

drinks.name: Sangria Classic
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1/2 Orange
  • 1 bottle dry White wine
  • 2 tblsp Sugar
  • 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1/2 Orange in thin slices
  • 1 Lemon in thin slices
  • 2 cups Ice cubes
  • 1 cup Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine orange juice, wine, sugar, brandy and Cointreau. Add lemon and orange slices. Chill. To serve, add ice and club soda, stir gently.

drinks.name: Melzinho
drinks.ingredients:
• 50 ml Honey
  • 90 ml Cachaca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the two ingredients and shake it well.You may serve it pure or with ice on a small cafe glass

drinks.name: Chocolate Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Banana liqueur
  • 2 shots Creme de Cacao
  • 2 scoops Chocolate ice-cream
  • 1 oz Chocolate syrup
  • 4 oz Chocolate milk or white milk
  • 1 Whipped cream
  • 1 Cherry
  • 1 piece Banana
drinks.mixinginstructions: blend liqeuors with ice-cream, milk and syrup. pour into parfait glass, top with whipped cream and garnish with banana and cherry.

drinks.name: Brandy Alexandra
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 scoop Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 scoop Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all the ingredients in blender, garnished with cinnamon powder.

drinks.name: Shark's Bite
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Southern Comfort
  • 2 parts Cranberry juice or a fruit mixture
  • 1/2 part Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together the Southern Comfort and the Cranberry Juice and stir. then add the Lime Juice (be careful not to get too much lime). Serve cold! You can substitute lemon juice for the lime juice if needed.

drinks.name: Comfortable Screw
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 3 parts Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Southern Comfort and O.J together and serve chilled

drinks.name: Cucaracha #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/4 Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a shot-glass and fill to the above proportions. Light the drink on fire. (It helps if you move the lighter in a circular pattern around the top of the drink.) Shoot it through a straw. Be careful!

drinks.name: Maria Theresa
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 2 tblsp Cranberry juice
  • 1 1/2 tsp Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine with ice. Shake. Strain and add ice.

drinks.name: Mango Mint
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Mango nectar
  • 2 tsp White Creme de Menthe
  • 3 oz crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in a blender at low speed for 15 seconds. Strain, add ice.

drinks.name: Belfast Bomber
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Cognac
  • Fill with Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice drink with a straw.

drinks.name: Schwartzy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 6 oz Orange juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve in a tall glass

drinks.name: Napalm-Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cointreau
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Drambuie
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a shot glass and take equal amounts of the liquor. First the Kahlua, then slowly pour down the Drambuie, then the Bailey's and last the Cointreau. Try to get fine layers.

drinks.name: Bonecrusher
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 splash Sprite
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Lemon squeeze
  • 1 shot Champagne

drinks.name: Baltimore Zoo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 splash Sprite
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Lemon squeeze
  • 1 shot Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: add the liquors and grenadine. Mix. Strain. Add splash of Sprite. Add lemon squeeze. Drinker adds shot of beer.

drinks.name: Texas Sling
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.

drinks.name: Whippet
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka
  • Orange juice
  • 1 dash Raspberry cordial
drinks.mixinginstructions: Made as in a normal Vodka and Orange, with raspberry cordial added last.

drinks.name: Bull Shot #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Beef bouillon Cube
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
  • 4 oz boiling Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Disolve bullion cube in water. Mix in vodka and Tabasco. Garnish with celery.

drinks.name: Carolina
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Champagne
  • 2 oz Strega
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour strega into chilled wine glass, add champagne. Stir slightly.

drinks.name: T.K.O.
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Tequila
  • 1/3 oz Ouzo
  • 1/3 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour off the amount into a shot glass Shoot and Enjoy!

drinks.name: Red Wine Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Red wine
  • 1 part Soda water
  • 3 tblsp Powdered sugar per litre
  • Orange and/or lemon slices
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the icing sugar with the red wine, and stir well. Pour in the soda. Put in some Orange/Lemon slices. Serve immediately with a lot of ice.

drinks.name: Mansion Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo 1800)
  • 3/4 oz Grand Marnier
  • 3/4 oz Cointreau
  • 1 1/4 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix above ingredients in a shaker. Shake and serve on the rocks.

drinks.name: Candy
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Dr. Pepper
  • 1 1/4 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a glass with ice. Pour the 151. Pour the Dr. Pepper. Pour the Amaretto. Stir.

drinks.name: Peach Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients on the rocks and enjoy.

drinks.name: Flying Tiger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Galliano
  • 1 shot White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 cup Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice: add Galliano, Creme De Menthe and Vodka. Top glass off with orange juice. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Sweet Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Malibu rum
  • Orange juice
  • Strawberry juice
  • Banana syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 2 oz. of Malibu Rum into a 10 oz. glass. Then fill the rest of the glass with orange juice, strawberry juice, and a splash banana syrup.

drinks.name: Caffine attack
drinks.ingredients:
• Kahlua
  • 4 scoops coffee Ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill blender with coffee ice-cream and the amount of kahula to your desire. Blend until drinkable, pour into a beer mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

drinks.name: Concrete
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: First you drink the vodka (no swallowing), then you drink the Baileys. You mix it in the mouth and swallow.

drinks.name: TGV
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Tequila
  • 1 cl Gin (Bombay Sapphire)
  • 1 cl Vodka
  • 1 dash Blue Curacao (10 drops)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in shotglass(es). Add Curacao last, to a nice blue-green color.

drinks.name: Love Potion #9
drinks.ingredients:
• 20 oz Cherry Kool-Aid
  • 8 oz Vodka
  • 3 White rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Kool-aid into jug, add vodka and rum. add 1 pouch of Kool-aid (cherry or orange) cover and shake give to best looking girl in the room and party

drinks.name: Smurfs Up
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz blue Maui
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 8 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and Stir

drinks.name: Hot Apple Pie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tuaca
  • 6 oz Apple cider
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Tuaca and Cider in a large microwavable mug. Heat on high for 2 1/2 minutes. stirr again, and enjoy!!!

drinks.name: Melonball
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill tall glass with ice. Pour in Melon Liqueur and Vodka. Fill glass with juice. Orange juice may also be used.

drinks.name: A midsummernight dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Kirschwasser
  • 1 tsp Strawberry liqueur
  • 5 Strawberries, fresh
  • Schweppes Russchian
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the strawberrys in a blender Pour it together with the vodka,kirch and strawberry liquer over ice in a shaker. Shake well and pour in a highballglass. Fill up with the Russchian water

drinks.name: Amaretto Stone Sour #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 4 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Amaretto, OJ, and Sour in a tub over ice.

drinks.name: Midori Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec or other orange liqueur
  • 1 oz fresh Lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Moisten rim of cocktail glass with lime juice and dip in salt. Shake ingredients together, and pour into glass filled with crushed ice. Option: Mix above ingredients with one cup of ice in blender for a smooth, 'granita' type drink.

drinks.name: Black Gold
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 3/4 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour both ingredients in shot glass and enjoy!

drinks.name: Cherry Blow Pop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/3 oz Amaretto
  • 1/3 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all three ingredients into an short shaker with ice. For better taste, let it chill for a bit.

drinks.name: Gorilla Fart #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/3 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1/3 shot Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in glass, drink!

drinks.name: Jolly Green Giant
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Lime vodka
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix just like you would a screwdriver, except substitute lime vodka

drinks.name: Dirty Moma
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Kahlua
  • 1 jigger Brandy
  • 1 jigger Vodka
  • fill glass Half-and-half or milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stur.

drinks.name: Zoksel
drinks.ingredients:
• Beer
  • Root beer
  • Lemonade
  • Coca-Cola
  • 7-Up
  • Creme de Cassis
  • Lemon slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: No specific mixinginstructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass. The lemon goes with it.

drinks.name: Smurf fart
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Blueberry schnapps
  • Splash Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Bull Shot #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Beef bouillon, chilled
  • 1 dash Worcestershire sauce
  • 1 dash Salt
  • 1 dash Black pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Nazi Cola
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Rumple Minze
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine JÃ¤germeister and Rumple Minze over ice in glass. Fill to top with Cola.

drinks.name: Dirty Grasshopper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Creme de Menthe and Kahlua in a glass over ice. Add milk to fill. Garnish with whatever you'd like. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 70 ml Champagne or sparkling wine
  • 20 ml Vodka
  • 10 ml Blue Curacao
  • 1 Sugar cube
  • 1 splash Angostura bitters
  • 1 Cocktail onion
drinks.mixinginstructions: Splash a puddle of Angostura bitters into a saucer and place the sugar cube in it to soak. This will take a minute ot two. Stir the Champagne (or sparkling wine), the Vodka and the Blue Curacao together in a container and put into the fridge to chill. Place the soaked sugar cube in the bottom of the Champagne glass, pour in the mixture and add drop in the cocktail onion, which should be loose, not on a cocktail stick.

drinks.name: CoonDogg
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 1/2 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together then strain thru ice.

drinks.name: Caribbean Cruise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients, shake well and serve over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry (and an umbrella if handy).

drinks.name: Porch Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Grape schnapps
  • Fill with Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together over ice. Stir well. Enjoy

drinks.name: Vik 'n' Rum
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Iced tea, lemon flavor (Nestea)
  • 4.5 oz Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in the Rum first followed by the 12 oz of Nestea. Make sure you have stirred well. Serve Chilled!!

drinks.name: Tipsy Island
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 cup Malibu rum
  • 7 pieces frozen Strawberries
  • 2/3 cup Banana liqueur
  • 12 cubes Ice
  • 1/2 cup Pineapple juice
  • 1 Banana, ripe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Crush ice in a blender. Add frozen strawberries and banana to blender. Put on low speed and add Malibu & Banana liqueur. Pour into tall glass.

drinks.name: Toxic Antifreeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 6 oz Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a 12 ounce glass with ice, add 1 ounce of vodka, 1 ounce of triple sec and 1 ounce of midori, fill with yellow lemonade and enjoy.

drinks.name: Purple Plague
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 4 oz White wine (Zinfandel)
  • 3 splashes 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Zinfandel with Chambord and add 7-Up. Serve on ice.

drinks.name: Tanga
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Tang mix, orange
  • 1 part Absolut Vodka
  • 5 handfuls Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In blender add Orange Tang Mix, Absolut Vodka, and ice. Blend until smooth.

drinks.name: Doug's Modified Cement Mixer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 or 3 splashes Lemon juice or Lime Juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Bailey's into a shot glass about 2/3 full. Fill the rest of the shot with Lemon or Lime juice. Take the shot and Swish it around in your mouth. It feels really neat. Swallow it before it becomes solid.

drinks.name: Twisted Screw
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • Top with Tropicana (banana-strawberry)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Nothing special. Vodka, then oj, then twister. Add a splash of raspberry sparkling water if desired.

drinks.name: Harley Davidson (the company way)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Yukon Jack
  • 1/2 shot Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour alcohol into the shot glass. Occassionally mix with ice then put into a shot glass. Serve with a lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Karlsson's dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • 3 cl Absolut Vodka
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just blend and drink. It's deadly.

drinks.name: Virulent Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Yukon Jack (100 Proof)
  • 1 part Galliano
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in shot glass and stir.

drinks.name: Simpson Bronco
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sambuca
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
  • 1/4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingrediants in mixing tin with ice and strain

drinks.name: Hand-Shaken Margarita on the Rocks
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Gold tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 1/2 part Sweet and sour
  • 1-2 tblsp Lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: use large metal container with plenty of ice and a strainer. Shake well, pour through strainer into margarita glass. Serve with salt and fresh lime.

drinks.name: White Lightening
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Lemon vodka (Stoli)
  • frozen Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour it all into a blender. Vary the amount of Vodka according to how buzzed you want to be. Remember, it must have at least 2 oz. of Vodka in order to be called White Lightening.

drinks.name: Gorilla's Tit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: After mixing each ingredient in order shown, light the 151 with a match. Blow out the flames, and sip drink quickly with a straw.

drinks.name: Blonde Smoothie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 gal premium Vanilla ice-cream
  • 750 ml White wine
  • 1 medium can Fruit cocktail (light syrup, drain well)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Scoop ice-cream into a large bowl (stainless or glass, but plastic will do). Slowly pour wine into bowl and mix until smooth (but not runny, or melted). Fold in (well drained) fruit cocktail. Serve in wine glass with ice-cream scoop (add tacky paper umbrella if desired). Keep in freezer when not being served.

drinks.name: Rontini
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Mountain Dew
  • 1 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour together serve over ice

drinks.name: Monkey's Lunch
drinks.ingredients:
• Banana liqueur
  • Kahlua
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour alcohol over ice in a cocktail glass and add milk! (For a bit of a twist you could add a splash of Bailey's Irish Cream. This drink is also tasty as a 'special' coffee. Just sugar your rim, add liqour, pour coffee and add some whip.)

drinks.name: Fuzzy Asshole
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Coffee
  • 1/2 Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill coffe mug half full of coffee. Fill the other half full of Peach Schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.

drinks.name: Pit Bull on Crack #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1 oz Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all three ingredients in mixing tin with ice. Serve in a shot glass.

drinks.name: The Perfect Margarita #1
drinks.ingredients:
• crushed Ice
  • 3 wedges Lime
  • 2 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo 1800)
  • 1/2 oz Tequila (Cuervo white)
  • 1 1/4 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec (Bols)
  • 1 splash Orange Curacao (Bols)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients except the 3 lime wedges into a shaker. Squeeze 2 of the lime wedges into the shaker. SHAKE WELL! Rim outside of glass only, with lime. Salt only the outside of glass. Add fresh crushed ice to glass. Strain mixture over ice. Squeeze remaining lime wedge in glass. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Patti's Irish Bloody Mary
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • Fill Bloody mary mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rim coffee mug with celery salt, Pour Baileys over ice and fill with bloody mary mix. Garnish with pickle spear and filberts.

drinks.name: Dick-in-the-Dirt
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 shot Yukon Jack
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a tall glass on the rocks.

drinks.name: Rooster Piss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Cinnamon schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both ingredients into shot glass and enjoy!

drinks.name: Flaming Dr.
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Firewater
  • 12 oz Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both into a pint glass, mix and drink.

drinks.name: Donivan Flowers' Rocks
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Stoli Vodka
  • 4 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 4 oz Blue Label Smirnoff Vodka
  • 4 oz Skyy Vodka
  • dash Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put each of the ingredients into a punch bowl. Mix, and with a straw, SHOOT.

drinks.name: Pineappleless Pineapple Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 splash Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 3 oz 7-Up
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 4 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Southern Comfort to the first line of a 16 oz. Solo Brand plastic cup. Add splash of Bacardi 151 Rum. Add 7-Up, Orange Juice, and Coca-Cola. Swirl it around in the cup a little bit and enjoy.

drinks.name: Quick-sand
drinks.ingredients:
• 25 ml Black Sambuca
  • Add 250 ml Orange juice (with fruit pulp)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice. The juice MUST have fruit pulp!

drinks.name: Mellow Hiker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Watermelon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur (optional)
  • 1 oz Coconut rum
  • 3 oz Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine alcohol over ice and add Mountain Dew. Stir and Garnish with Melon ball if desired.

drinks.name: Navy Grog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Gold rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Dark rum (Meyer's)
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Pour alcohols. Pour juices. Shake Optional. Orange and Pineapple garnish Optional

drinks.name: Smurf
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 15 cl Orange juice
  • 7 cl Sprite
  • 2 dashes Grenadine
  • 1/2 dash Margarita mix, strawberry
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take the vodka in first, then orange juice and sprite. Then you take some dashes of grenadine and stirr it around for 20 sec. On the top of it you have a little dash of Strawb.marg.mix. Add ice cubes.

drinks.name: Root Beer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 6 oz Pepsi Cola
  • 1 splash Galliano
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a large glass with ice. Add vodka and fill glass with Pepsi (Do NOT substitute Coke). Swirl a splash of Galliano on top.

drinks.name: Jay In Your Tummy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Malibu rum
  • 1 part Sambuca
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all the above ingredients in a tin with ice.

drinks.name: Crack Pipe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1 oz Wild Turkey, 101 proof
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice, strain into glass

drinks.name: Phillips Screwdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 6 oz Sunny delight (to taste)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place 2-3 ice cubes in your choice of glass, pour 2oz vodka followed by 6oz Sunny Delight (more or less to taste). Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Extended Jail Sentence
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice (optional)
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Flash blend with ice cubes.

drinks.name: Ostrich Shit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 8 oz Coffee
  • 2 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour one oz. of Peppermint Schnapps into a cup of coffee. Then ad two tps. of sugar and slowly stir.

drinks.name: The Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Everclear
  • 1 can Lemonade
  • 4 gal Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into a five gallon pitcher, the canister of lemonade, water, everclear and mix. serve on ice.

drinks.name: Skane-i-fier
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 2 shots Whiskey
  • 1 shot Malibu rum
  • Fill with Dr. Pepper stir
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add whiskey, Malibu and Dr. Pepper Stir.

drinks.name: Peach me Tender
drinks.ingredients:
• 5/10 part Jack Daniels
  • 3/10 part Peach liqueur
  • 1/10 part Lemon liqueur
  • 1/10 part Almond syrup
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all the ingredients. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Add a twist of orange.

drinks.name: Ponderosa
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Everclear, 190 proof
  • 2 oz Orange soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Throw it all into a glass, shoot as fast as possible. Do this repeatadly until very inebriated!

drinks.name: Snakebite and Black
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint Lager
  • 1/2 pint Cider
  • A little bit of Blackcurrant squash
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put blackcurrant squash in first up to about 1cm in glass. Then add the larger and cider one after another.

drinks.name: No Pressure
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part frozen strawberry Daiquiri mix
  • 1 part PiÃ±a Colada
  • 1 splash Curacao
  • 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a hurricane glass or any tall glass: Fill glass 1/3 full of Fz. strawberry daiquiri. Layer next 1/3 of glass with Fz. Pina Colada. Add a splash of Blue Curacao on top. Insert straw and fill with 151 Rum.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Peachclari
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 4 parts Vodka
  • 5 parts Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka, then orange juice, then peach schnapps. Drink.

drinks.name: Ã–xnÃ¤s Temptation
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Banana liqueur
  • Nearly fill glass with Sprite
  • 1 splash Orange juice concentrate
  • A tiny splash Grenadine for colour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start by adding the vodka and the banan liqueur. Fill the glass with sprite or similar soft drink. Pour some conc. orange juice. Stir. Add some grenadine for that nice Tequila Sunrise effect, or don't if you think it will be to sweet. Add a slice of orange for decoration.

drinks.name: Neon Iguana
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 2 oz Malibu rum
  • 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1.5 oz Lime juice
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients together and stir

drinks.name: Fu** me like a beast
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • Top with Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients except 151, shake well with ice, pour into highball glass and top it off with Bacardi 151.

drinks.name: Zimadori Zinger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 12 oz Zima
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori. Don't stir. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Golden shower
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 measure Banana liqueur
  • 1 measure Rum
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stire Rum and Banana liqueur with ice. Add Sprite

drinks.name: Wild Peppertini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Wild Turkey
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine, chill and strain into either a shot glass or ups glass.

drinks.name: Blue Smurf Piss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/5 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/5 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/5 shot Rumple Minze
  • 1/5 shot Goldschlager
  • 1/5 shot Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour as listed.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Vodka (Skyy)
  • 1/2 shot Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix both ingredients in a shot glass. Tilt head back. Swallow.

drinks.name: Moilanen
drinks.ingredients:
• Slices of 1/2 Lemon
  • Ice
  • 1/3 Absolut Citron
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • Fill up with 2/3 Schweppes Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: First slice half a lemon in small slices. Then some ice, I prefer alot of ice in this drink. Pour the vodka in, press the rest of the lemon in the glass. Mix around and then fill up with Schweppes lemon. Mix again and you're finished. If you don't got the Schweppes lemon you can always use Fanta lemon instead, but it will be a lot sweeter.

drinks.name: Herbal flame
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 shots Hot Damn 100
  • very sweet Tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Hot Damn 100 in bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with spoon, straw, or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.

drinks.name: Lemonade Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 can Lemonade concentrate
  • 3 cups Vodka (Absolut)
  • 7-8 cans Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Follow the instructions on the can of Lemonade concentrate, but substitute the Vodka for water. Mix well and add beer.

drinks.name: Slemmig Slyna
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 2 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 cl Kiwi liqueur
  • Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and midori and kiwi with ice. Add sourmix. Shake. Fill with soda. Decorate glass with pineapple.

drinks.name: Green Apple #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 splash Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 splash Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all three together.

drinks.name: Summer Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz White rum (or dry gin)
  • 1/2 glass Fruit punch
  • 1/2 glass Ginger ale
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice cubes in the Collins glass. Then poor the white rum. Fill with the fruit punch and the ginger ale.

drinks.name: Missle Pop
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 2 1/2 oz 100 proof Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 splashes Pineapple juice
  • 3 splashes Hawaiian Punch
  • Fill with Orange juice (Sunny Delight)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice and add vodka, pineapple juice and fruit punch. Fill with orange juice.

drinks.name: Jamaican Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/6 glass Rum
  • 1/6 glass strong black Coffee
  • 1/2 glass cold Water
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir the rum, coffee and water together. Top with the whipped cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of well ground coffee and drink with a straw.

drinks.name: Hot Afternoon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Throw the shit in the shot glass and drink it down!

drinks.name: Wild Wild West
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take ink pen and stir well!

drinks.name: Strawberry Quick
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 1 oz Irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • Fill Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the contents so that the color of the drink is a pink color. Serve and enjoy

drinks.name: Ball Hooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part Peppermint schnapps
  • One glass Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a shaker with ice. Pour in equal parts liquor. Shake or swirl. Strain into shot glass(es). Serve with a short, cold glass of beer.

drinks.name: Rambo Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: keep both liquors cold and serve ina chilled shot glass if possible

drinks.name: Killer Koolade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Optional 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Vodka, Melon Liqueur and Cranberry Juice in a shaker, Fill glass with three ice cubes,strain mix into highball/zombie glass,add dash of Amaretto (Optional)

drinks.name: Simpson Solution
drinks.ingredients:
• 750 ml Vodka
  • 750 ml Peach schnapps (Dekuypers)
  • 2 gal Orange juice (Sunny Delight)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Get a sports container like the All Sport or Gatorade ones at sports events and combine three ingredients together. Put in about 4-5 pounds of cocktail ice and watch it disappear faster than water!

drinks.name: Mojito #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 handful Mint leaves
  • 3 cl Lemon juice
  • 1/8 L Jamaican Dark rum
  • 1/8 L Club soda
  • 8 drops Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda. Top it with Angostura.

drinks.name: Bumble Bee #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Barenjager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Barenjaeger on top of the JÃ¤germeister. Both liquors should be chilled.

drinks.name: Flaming Soda
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 shot Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 shot Triple sec
  • Fill with Soda water
  • Grenadine, as desired
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve over rocks if desired.

drinks.name: White Mess
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part White rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 part Creme de Cassis
  • 1 part Root beer schnapps
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part Heavy cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into a double shot glass.

drinks.name: Apricot punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 qt Apricot brandy
  • 4 fifth Champagne
  • 1 fifth Vodka
  • 4 L 7-Up
  • 1/2 gal Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingrediants into a large punch bowl. Add ice and 4 oranges that are peeled and divided.

drinks.name: Apricot Smoothie
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • Fill 1/2 glass Champagne
  • Fill 1/2 glass Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingrediants over ice. Seven-Up may be used instead of champagne to cut alcohol content if so desired.

drinks.name: B-52 #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 Tia maria
  • 1/4 Absinthe (or substitute)
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add the Bailey's irish cream, then the Tia Maria, and then carefully the Absinthe: Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw, or you have another choice: When the shot is on fire you slap it to extinguish the fire and then you drink it.

drinks.name: Unknown Warrior
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 piece Sugar
  • 3 cl Cointreau
  • 3 cl Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend vodka and cointreau in a shotglass. Set the drink on fire with a match. Put the piece of sugar on a fork and hold it over the flame from the drink and let it melt down into the glass. When the sugar has melted,use the palm of your hand to put out the flame.

drinks.name: Rok-Shasa
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 5 drops Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just throw it together.

drinks.name: Copperhead
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 6 oz Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in an ice cube-filled Collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge

drinks.name: Blue Shark
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • Several dashes of Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into chilled old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Double Jack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 shot Yukon Jack
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the two jacks in glass.

drinks.name: Skydiver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • fill Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, add SKYY vodka, add orange juice, prefeable fresh orange juice. Garnish with orange slice.

drinks.name: Black Irish
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Irish whiskey (Bushmill's Black Bush)
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • Pour Over Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients and let sit for one minute.

drinks.name: Weakness
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all four shots into a low ball glass, chill if you care.

drinks.name: Screwdriver Ã¡ la Carla
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 6 oz Orange juice
  • 3 tblsp Sugar
  • 1 Egg yolk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the orange juice with sugar and the yolk of an egg. Then pour in the vodka with some icecubes and stir. Serve well chilled.

drinks.name: Speedy Gonzales
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Irish cream (Bailey's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Bailey's and Amaretto into a shot glass, swish, and throw it back.

drinks.name: Zombie #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Lemon juice
  • 2 dashes Grenadine
  • 3/4 oz blood Orange juice
  • 3/4 oz Cherry Heering
  • 3/4 oz White rum
  • 2 oz Dark rum
  • 3/4 oz dark 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake over ice in a shaker, and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

drinks.name: Zombie #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gold rum
  • 3 tsp Lime juice
  • 1 tblsp Jamaican Rum
  • 1 tblsp White rum
  • 1 tblsp Pineapple juice
  • 1 tblsp Papaya juice
  • 1 1/2 tsp Sugar syrup
  • 1 tsp 151 proof rum
  • 1 Pineapple stick
  • Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingedients over ice, except the high-proof rum, the pineapple stick and the sugar. Strain and add ice. Garnish with pineapple and a cherry. Float the high-proof rum at top and sprinkle a litter sugar over it.

drinks.name: Purple Cow
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • Grape juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into glass

drinks.name: B-52 #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Tia maria
  • 1/3 Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill 1/3th of the glass with Tia Maria. Then pour smootly on a spoon the baileys so it flows on the Tai Maria. Then fill the glass up with Grand Marnier also with a spoon. Afterwards you see 3 layers, the middle layer looks like a after boming scene.

drinks.name: Suntan Lotion
drinks.ingredients:
• Absolut Citron
  • Malibu rum
  • Peach schnapps
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts over ice, shake, strain, and serve...SPF 30!

drinks.name: Naked Yellow Bird
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • Raspberry liqueur
  • Blue Curacao
  • Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts over ice then shake, strain, and serve.

drinks.name: Apple Cobbler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Apple schnapps
  • 1 jigger Goldschlager
  • 1 jigger Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in shot glass. Shoot!

drinks.name: Three Stages of Friendship
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/3 oz Tequila
  • 1/3 oz 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all three in a shot glass and shoot the damn thing.

drinks.name: Wet Back
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and shoot.

drinks.name: Devil's Piss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Everclear
  • Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Using a large glass of water, add lemonade concentrate to taste (Best if you make it a little stronger than usual). Add the 1.5 shots of Everclear and be sure to mix well!

drinks.name: Tossed Salad
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • Chocolate syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dip rim of shot glass in chocolate syrup. Add Kahlua and JÃ¤germeister. Place arms behind back. Drink shot using mouth only (a la 'blowjob').

drinks.name: Black Swedish Virgin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 part Blackberry schnapps (Black Haus)
  • 1/2 part Absolut Vodka
  • 1/4 part Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash 7-Up or Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix on the rocks.

drinks.name: Hot Lunch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in glass. Garnish with small pickle. Light contents of glass on fire. Tilt head back and have your buddy pour it into your mouth (very carefully). Have four more hot lunches and go to bed. You have no business going anywhere after the abuse you just gave yourself.

drinks.name: Green Apple #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Apple schnapps
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 shot 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: all ingredients but 7-up in shaker. splash 7-up in your glass, shake others till nice and cold and add to glass. Voila!

drinks.name: Hairy Buffalo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Gin
  • 1 fifth 151 proof rum
  • 1 fifth Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 fifth Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 fifth Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's)
  • Selection ofite Fruit
  • 2 cans Fruit punch
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients into a large cooler, punch bowl or garbage can (a new one). Cut larger fruit into pieces and add.

drinks.name: Scooby Snack #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 glass Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all into shaker with ice. Shake until cold. Strain into highball glass.

drinks.name: Floaty
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 part Pear soft drink
  • 1/3 part Fanta
  • 1/3 part Orange juice
  • 1 slice Cucumber
drinks.mixinginstructions: First pour in the pear soda. Then take the Fanta and the juice. Please use a cognac bowl when mixing and drinking the drink. Then attach the cucumber slice to the rim, as you would do with a lemon slice. Blend and serve instantly!!!!

drinks.name: Purple Hooter #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Vodka
  • 1/3 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just shoot the damn thing!

drinks.name: Smurf #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 cup Maui
  • 1/2 cup Sprite
  • 3 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in cup and fill it half full with sprite. Add maui filling the glass. Stir.

drinks.name: Sydney Sunrise Sunshine Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-2 tblsp Honey (rubbertree)
  • 3 cl fresh Lime juice
  • 1 Egg
  • 1-2 dl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the ingredients with a mixer.

drinks.name: Moment Brutale
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 cl Sugar
  • 5 cl Water
  • 1 Egg (with shell)
  • Lime or lemon (with skin)
  • 16 cl Gin or vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything except the liquor with ice, strain it to remove the shell and skin, blend with liquor.

drinks.name: Caipiroska
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • 8 wedges Lime
  • Sugar
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Crush sugar into the lime wedges with a spoon. Place the lime wedges in the bottom of an 8 oz. glass. Cover with crushed ice. Pour vodka to fill the glass. It's a great summer drink.

drinks.name: Love-me Tender
drinks.ingredients:
• 5/10 part Gin (Beefeater)
  • 3/10 part Fino or dry Sherry
  • 1/10 part Aperol
  • 1/10 part Peach Vodka
  • drop Apricot brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: All the ingredients in a mixing glass. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Add orange twist.

drinks.name: Malibu Jello
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 package Peach Passion Fruit Jello
  • 1 cup Water
  • 1 cup Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Boil 1 cup water and add to peach passion fruit jello until dissolved about 2 minutes. Add 1 cup Malibu rum and pour into shot glasses or 1 ounce cup found in party stores. Chill for four hours. Enjoy!!!

drinks.name: Strawberry Shortcake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 part Ice-cream
  • 1 part strawberry Daiquiri mix
  • 1 part Ice
  • Top With 1 tblsp Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all but the whipped cream until frosty. Pour in beer mug. Top with whipped cream. Enjoy.

drinks.name: El Bastardo
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Tequila
  • 3 oz Everclear
  • 4 oz Jack Daniels
  • 4 tblsp Tabasco sauce, extra hot
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all at same time into blender. After blending for approx. 30 seconds, fill beer mug 3/4 way and start a chugin'. Oh, it'll burn like hell for about 2 minutes, but once that sauce burns through your stomach lining and virtually injects the alcohol into your blood stream, put the unfinished El Bastardo down because you're gonna hit the floor.

drinks.name: Standard Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Godiva liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1 1/2 oz Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: stir & strain in a cocktail glass

drinks.name: Zambeer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Sambuca
  • Add 10 oz Root beer
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice

drinks.name: Nuclear Waste
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 2 parts Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: blend vodka, blue curacao and bailey's in a shaker. pour into glass and top up with coke.

drinks.name: Flip Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Gin
  • 2 L Mountain Dew
  • 1 qt Orange juice
  • 1/2 cup Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together in a gallon pitcher and refrigerate. Serve chilled.

drinks.name: Waldorf-Astoria Eggnog
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 Egg yolk
  • 1/2 oz Sugar syrup
  • 3/4 oz Port (Tawny)
  • 1 1/2 oz Bourbon
  • 3 1/2 oz Milk
  • 1/4 oz Cream
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over ice cubes. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

drinks.name: Scope #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place ice in a tin then pour 1/2 oz. of Midori melon liqueur and 1/2 oz. of Rumple Minze. Shake and then strain into a rocks glass.

drinks.name: Grand-Ma in a Wheelchair
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Grand Marnier
  • 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part 7-Up
  • 1 splash Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice. Shake it. Strain it. Shoot it.

drinks.name: Lemon Drop #6
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bacardi Limon
  • 1 part Lemonade or lemon Kool-Aid
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a mug half way with Bacardi, then top off with lemon Kool-Aid or lemonade.

drinks.name: Black Forest Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • Chocolate syrup
  • Cherry brandy
  • Vodka
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a blender put ice cubes, chocolate syrup, cherry brandy, vodka, and milk. Blend very well.

drinks.name: Yaps
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Yukon Jack
  • 1 part Apple schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix 1part apple schnapps with 1 part Yukon Jack and serve in shot glass.

drinks.name: Juicy Tiger
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Sour mix
  • 6 cl Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients and blend well. Add more Coca-cola if needed. Serve with a slice of lemon put a straw in and drink.

drinks.name: Cherry coke from hell
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Everclear
  • Add 5 oz Cherry liqueur
  • Fill with Pepsi Cola
  • Add Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour alcohol into glass then add Coke. Stir if necessary.

drinks.name: Malibu Smash
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • Orange juice
  • Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice and serve!

drinks.name: Headcrack
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Cognac (Hennessy)
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir well with ice and a spoon.

drinks.name: Horny Girlscout
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • 1 part Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the coffee liqueur first since it is heavier than the schnapps. Slowly add the peppermint schnapps.

drinks.name: Bluesberry Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Club soda
  • 1 shot Blueberry schnapps
  • 1 splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill cocktail chimney glass with crushed ice, fill 3/4 full with club soda, add a shot of blueberry schnapps and a splash of o.j. Can garnish with an orange peel or a blueberry.

drinks.name: Hot Spot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and tequila. Pour in Tabasco sauce until it's realy red.

drinks.name: Mule
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Smirnoff Vodka
  • Fill with Ginger beer
  • 1 dash Lime juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1 1/4 ounce of Smirnoff Vodka in glass, fill with ginger beer, add ice and squeeze lime.

drinks.name: Selena Jo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 4 cubes crushed Ice
  • 1 can Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the crushed ice in glass first then add the Captain Morgan then add the Amaretto then top off with Coke.

drinks.name: Flaming Nazi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Hot Damn
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make sure the Hot Damn and the JÃ¤germeister are both cold before serving.

drinks.name: Fruit Hippy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • Cranberry juice
  • Raspberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the liquor. Fill with juice to taste.

drinks.name: Schnapp It Up
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 1 part Wildberry schnapps
  • 1 part Absolut Vodka
  • 3 parts Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: stir all ingredients together - pour over ice - enjoy!!

drinks.name: The Frad
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Coconut rum
  • 2 parts Sprite
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Peach schnapps
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice, put in Sprite, then add Pineapple Juice, followed by the Coconut Rum and Peach Schnaps. Serve very cold.

drinks.name: Bahama Mama #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Coconut rum
  • 1/2 oz Cherry Heering
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice. Serve in a 12 oz. glass. Garnish with a cherry and 1/2 slice orange in a tooth pick.

drinks.name: Jaq'ed Up Screwdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 1 1/4 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into a large crushed iced filled cup and pour back into the collins glass. Use a plastic stirring utensil if so desired

drinks.name: Electric Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Light rum
  • 3/4 oz Tequila
  • 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 1 oz Sprite
  • Fill with Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in a pint glass, shake and serve with a lemon wedge

drinks.name: Cherry Cola
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Spiced rum
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • Fill glass with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and stir

drinks.name: Fuka
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 2 oz Orange juice (Dole)
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice (Dole)
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all contents in glass over cubed ice and mix together.

drinks.name: Dr. Pepper #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • 1/2 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 glass Beer (Domestic)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Amaretto & Bacardi in one shot glass. Fill the beer mug 1/2 way with beer. Light the Bacardi & Amaretto with a match or lighter. Drop the flaming shot glass into the beer. It immediately begins to foam up. At this point gulp it down (be careful not to swallow the shot glass!).

drinks.name: Jamaican Zombie
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Dark rum (Myers)
  • 1 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 oz fresh Lime juice
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Passion fruit juice
  • 1 or 2 tsp Powdered sugar to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a frosted zombie glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

drinks.name: Shoot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz dry Sherry
  • 1 oz Scotch
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Orange juice
  • 1/2 tsp Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything and shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Serve.

drinks.name: Russian Sarin
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Absolut Kurant
  • 2 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • Schweppes Russchian
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka and the liqueur in a (long drink) glass with one or two icecubes in it. Fill it up with Schweppes Russchian.

drinks.name: Orange Warthog
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 3 tsp Orange Kool-Aid, presweetened
  • 3 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 12 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Kool-Aid powder, Southern Comfort and Coke. Stir well (never shake)

drinks.name: Honey-Dew-Me
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Barenjager
  • 1 part Melon liqueur
  • 4 parts Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: serve as a chilled shot

drinks.name: Purple stealth
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Absolut Kurant
  • 2/3 Grape soda (Welch's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka in large soft drink tumbler first. Tastes more like carbonated Ribena than grape soda. Very powerful!

drinks.name: Brush Fire
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz Cinnamon schnapps (Hot 100)
  • 1/3 oz Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1/3 ounce tabasco sauce into a one ounce shot glass. Fill the rest of the shot glass with either HOT 100 or if you prefer you can use a regular cinnamon schnapps. Drink immediately after making. This drink will lose flavor quickly.

drinks.name: Sky Pilot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka (Skyy)
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 dash Peppermint schnapps

drinks.name: Rattlesnake Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• Yukon Jack
  • Cherry brandy
  • Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Since this is basically a shot drink, mix to your own taste

drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea (By a Long Islander)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part Rum
  • 1 part Gin
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 1/2 part Sour mix
  • 1 splash Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients together over ice in a glass. Pour into shaker and give ONE brisk shake. Pour back into glass and make sure there is a touch of fizz at the top. Garnish with lemon.

drinks.name: Japanese Slipper #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/3 Cointreau
  • 1/3 Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just Mix it and drink it slow!

drinks.name: Bit of Russiaan Honey
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients shake and pour over ice

drinks.name: Rotten Pussy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
