drinks.mixinginstructions: shake all ingredients and serve as a shooter

drinks.name: Blue Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Creme de Banane (Hiram Walker)
  • 2 oz Blue Curacao (Hiram Walker)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour creme de banana into the glass and layer blue curacao on top.

drinks.name: Radler
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Beer
  • 12 oz 7-Up or Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).

drinks.name: Earthquake #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Gin
  • 1/3 Whisky
  • 1/3 Pernod
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the ingridiens together and poor over in a cocktail-glass.

drinks.name: The Perfect Margarita #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo 1800)
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice (Tropicana)
  • 1 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 4 oz Sweet and sour mix (Lemate's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake like crazy with about 6 ice cubes. Pour into a chilled margarita glass, rimmed with lime juice and salt. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

drinks.name: Paralyzer #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Milk
  • 1 oz Coca-Cola
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Above amounts are for an 8 oz glass. Build over ice: Kahlua, then Vodka, milk, then Coke.

drinks.name: Mudslinger
drinks.ingredients:
• 750 ml Southern Comfort
  • 1 L Orange juice
  • 750 ml Pepsi Cola or Coca-cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!

drinks.name: The Finnely
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients, shake and pore over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon, lime, and orange wedge.

drinks.name: The Black Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 - 1 1/2 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Soy sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in shaker and pour over ice. Serve cold. Great on a hot day!

drinks.name: Campari Beer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Lager
  • 1 1/2 cl Campari
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a 15 oz glass. Add Campari first. Fill with beer.

drinks.name: Coco Channel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all with ice, serve in lowball over ice, or neat in a martini glass.

drinks.name: Pain, Pain, Go Away
drinks.ingredients:
• Lemon peel
  • 2 tblsp Tabasco sauce
  • 6 pint Irish whiskey (Bushmill's)
  • 4 oz Ginger ale
  • 5 splashes Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tabasco sauce in first, then whiskey and cream. Mix well.

drinks.name: Boot Blaster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White rum
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 14 oz Lemon-lime mix
  • 1/2 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Half fill a 20oz glass (preferrably in the shape of a Cowboy Boot) with ice, regular or crushed. Pour the spirits over the ice. Add lemon-lime mix leaving room at the top for the 1/2 oz of Coca-Cola to dirty the drink.

drinks.name: Bastardized Screwdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Gold rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 part Orange juice (Tropicana)
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ice, then rum, then orange juice. Mix

drinks.name: Ejhazz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 3 oz Peach juice (Dole orchard peach)
  • Ice
  • 1-3 drop Vanilla extract to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Vidka and peach juice. Fill glass with ice and add vanilla to taste. If the drink is too sweet, dilute it with water.

drinks.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 L Mountain Dew or Mello Yello
  • Cranberry juice
  • Vodka
  • Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a cooler, chill, and serve. As with most punches, it's hard to be specific about the amounts used. A general rule: pour as much of everything as tastes good, then add more vodka! To make life more interesting, throw in pieces of fruit, and add dry ice to the cooler before serving. Small plastic animals also make a nice garnish (but don't drink them)!

drinks.name: Sex with the Captain
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • Half-fill Cranberry juice
  • Half-fill Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build drink in glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Foreplay
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix both ingredients together in a tumbler with ice. Strain into a shot glass! Enjoy!

drinks.name: Extremely Drunk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/4 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all together.

drinks.name: Cool Cucumber
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Benedictine
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 piece Cucumber
  • Champagne
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put a few ice-cubes in a longdrink glass, and put a little lemon juice in it. Then cut a cucumber in two half and cut off a part. Get the seeds out and put it in the glass as well. Shake in a well cooled down bottle of champagne in and let the glass stand in the refrigerator for a while. Then it's ready to drink.

drinks.name: Tiffany's Wet and Ready
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash 151 proof rum
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Mason jar with crushed ice. Add pineapple juice and Malibu rum. Mix well. Add splash of greanadine and 151 proof rum. Garnish with cherry, pineapple, or other fruit slice.

drinks.name: David Caradine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1 part Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 part Canadian whisky (Black Velvet)
  • 1 part Heavy cream or milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in the order: cacao, menthe, whiskey, milk. Try to keep the layers separate. Float on the back of a spoon, tilt the glass and pour very gently, etc. I suggest tilting the glass. When you tilt the glass you can, when pouring the cream/milk, rotate the glass causing the cream to swirl down through the other layers which looks good. Serve in an apertif glass.

drinks.name: Purple Devil
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Cointreau
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake alcohol with ice. Strain and pour over ice in a tall glass. Add cranberry juice to fill most of the way. Add a splash of 7-up if you want it fizzy!

drinks.name: Almond Chocolate Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 8 oz Coffee (hot)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in order into coffee cup. Top with whipped creme and chocolate shcvings.

drinks.name: Tropical Teaser
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 4 oz Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place in a cold shaker with ice. Shake for one minute and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Greek Lightning
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Ouzo
  • 1/3 oz Vodka
  • 1/3 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur (Cr.de Cassis)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into mixing cup with 2 or 3 ice cubes, and chill to make shooter. Strain into shot glass or test tube...

drinks.name: Ethnic Sugar
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Cointreau
  • 4 oz Coca-Cola
  • 2 oz Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 tsp Kool-Aid
  • Surge cola
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingrediants together except for the Surge and stir. Fill the rest up with Surge and enjoy.

drinks.name: Rum Aid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 2 tblsp Grand Marnier
  • 1 ml Sour mix
  • 1 part Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Skaking Serves with ice an a Lemon

drinks.name: Southern Chase
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Galliano
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Jim Beam
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Together and Drink

drinks.name: Purple Haze #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 glass Orange juice
  • Fill with Blackberry schnapps
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Vodka and the Orange juice together, add the Blackcurrant shnapps, add ice!

drinks.name: Red Tequila
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Tequila
  • 2 cl Tabasco sauce (Red)
  • Slice of 1/2 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: This is an extended ordinary Tequila drink with a half lemon slice on the edge of the glass. Add Tabasco sauce to the drink until the colour is strongly reddish. Mix lightly.

drinks.name: Polkagris
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl White Creme de Menthe
  • 4 cl Grenadine
  • 8 cl Sprite
  • 2 pieces Cherry
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the fluids into the glass, add a couple ice cubes and (one or) two cherries. Use a thick, red and white striped straw.

drinks.name: Amaretto Stone Sour #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Sour mix
  • 2 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Tequila
  • Add splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake sour mix, tequila and amaretto with ice. Strain into highball glass. Add a splash of OJ. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

drinks.name: Rick
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Sambuca
  • 1/2 oz fresh Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: First, you must pour the Sambuca in your shot glass and then slowly pour the orange juice. You may now enjoy Rick's fruity taste!

drinks.name: FireBall Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum (Red Label)
  • 2 dashes Tabasco sauce (McIlhenny's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Schnapps, Rum and Tabasco in a Shooter Glass. Stir briefly.

drinks.name: Neopolitan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Finlandia Cranberry vodka
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1 splash Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 dash Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in glass mixer, chill and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

drinks.name: 9 1/2 Weeks
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1/2 oz Orange Curacao
  • 1 splash Strawberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in glass mixer. Chill and strain into Cocktail glass. Garnish with sliced strawberry.

drinks.name: Smooth Pink Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Sour mix
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Built Drink usually want a slight bit more sour than cranberry experiment to personal taste ganish with lemon wheel

drinks.name: Lady 52
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Irish cream
  • 1 - 1 1/2 oz Cream, fresh
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau or Grand Marnier
  • Ground Chocolate
drinks.mixinginstructions: This a kind of a Pousse Cafe. Float Irish cream over the Kahlua. Shake Cream with Cointreau. Float on the Irish cream. Garnish with choclate.

drinks.name: Fourth of July
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in Shot Glass, Banded Red/White/Blue shot is perfect for the fourth of July

drinks.name: On the Deck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 3/4 oz Dark rum (Meyers)
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 4 1/2 oz Lemonade
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: For best results mix all ingredients into a frosted Mug.

drinks.name: Jamaican Qualude
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Frangelico
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a small or regular size rocks glass.

drinks.name: Bellini Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 cubes Ice
  • 3 oz Vodka
  • 1.5 oz Peach nectar
  • 1.5 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice cubes to shaker. Add vodka. Add peach schnapps. Add peach nectar. Shake. Strain into glass. Add lemon twist.(peel)

drinks.name: Jitterbug
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 jiggers Gin
  • 1 jigger Vodka
  • 3 dashes Grenadine
  • 1 shot Lime juice
  • Around rim put 1 pinch Sugar
  • 3 dashes Sugar syrup
  • Fill to top with Soda water (seltzer)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Wet glass, dip rim in sugar. Then add Ice. Then add everything else. It's that simple!

drinks.name: Good Morning!
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Espresso
  • 1 1/2 scoop Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3 oz Tia maria
  • 2 scoops Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Vanilla Ice-Cream, Sugar, Ice, and Espresso in a blender and blend until smooth. Add Bailey's Irish Cream and Tia Maria then stir. Pour into coffee mug and serve.

drinks.name: The Fucking Shit
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 parts Cranberry juice
  • 1 part frozen Pink lemonade concentrate
  • 2 parts Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka over ice, add cranberry juice, add frozen pink lemonade concentrate, mix.

drinks.name: Mexican Flag
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Grenadine
  • 1 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Drink: Using spoon, pour shot over spoon over glass. Fill with Grenadine first, then Creme de Menthe, and last but not least Tequila. The layers form the mexican flag enjoy.

drinks.name: Mark and Coke
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 4 oz Bourbon (Makers Mark)
  • 6 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill cocktail glass to the top with clean ice. Straight pour about 4 oz of Makers Mark over ice. Add Coca-Cola to taste.

drinks.name: Mudslide #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 or 2 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 or 2 shot Tia maria
  • Fill with 1 Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just get a high-ball glass and add your 1 or 2 shot(s) of Bailey's, then your 1 or 2 shots of Tia Maria, then just simply slowly top the glass with the coca-cola. It will fizz alot so watch out! Due to the fizz a straw is a definate recommindation.

drinks.name: Shark Tank
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Vodka
  • 6 oz Lemonade
  • 3 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and lemonade in a large glass. Drop in grenadine last, but do not stir. Best served over ice, through a straw.

drinks.name: Monkey Spanker
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's)
  • 1 can Ginger ale Vernors
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour around 2-3 oz. of Whiskey into a glass, then fill the rest up with Vernors.

drinks.name: Raspberry Kamakazie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Pour into lowball or other shot glass.

drinks.name: Moranguito
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/5 Absinthe
  • 2/5 Tequila
  • 1/5 Grenadine syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.

drinks.name: Pedra (stone)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/6 Tequila
  • 1/6 Vodka
  • 1/6 Black rum
  • 1/6 Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/6 Grenadine syrup
  • 1/6 Absinthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: First put the tequila, then the vodka, then the black rum, then the Bailey's Irish Cream, then the Granadine syrup and then mix this five elements for that the drink become pink, to finish put the Absinthe with the help of a spoon. Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw, or you have another choice: When the shot is on fire you slap it to extinguish the fire and then you drink it.

drinks.name: Kryptonite kooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 3 oz Maui
  • 6 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the rum, Maui,and pineapple juice together. Add ice,and enjoy!

drinks.name: Amaretto Sweet & Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• Amaretto
  • Sweet and sour mix
  • Midori melon liqueur
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the blender with 3/4 ice. Add sweet & sour mix to the top of the ice. Add about 1' of pineapple juice, 1/2' of melon liqeur, and 1/2 to 1/4' of amaretto. Then blend the mix until it is of margaritta consistency or thinner.

drinks.name: Liquid Courage
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 pint Milk
  • 4-6 scoops vanilla or Chocolate ice-cream
  • 8-12 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 6 oz Vodka (Absolut or Smirnoff)
  • 6 oz Rum (Bacardi)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients into a blender, then liquify until it becomes a shake. Pour into the beer mugs, and you're set.

drinks.name: Agua de Valencia
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 L Cava Sparkling white wine
  • 3/4 L Orange juice
  • 1 dl Cointreau
  • 50 gr Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in a pitcher. The Cava can be very cold.

drinks.name: Psycho Citrus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • Swirl of Lime juice
  • Swirl of Grand Marnier
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • 4 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together in a Tom Collins glass the vodka, tequila, schnapps, Grand Marnier and lime juice over ice. Fill with orange juice.

drinks.name: Fucked up Float
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua (or any coffee liqueur)
  • 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Coca-Cola
  • 2 scoops Ice-cream
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together Kahlua, schnapps, vodka, ice-cream and cola until blended. Fill with milk.

drinks.name: Johnny Cat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin or vodka
  • 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • Swirl of Grenadine
  • Fill with Club soda or tonic water
  • 4 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place gin or vodka, triple sec, vermouth, grenadine and ice in shaker. Shake well and pour into glass. Fill with tonic water or club soda.

drinks.name: Green Zone
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Tequila
  • 4 oz Pisang Ambon
  • 8 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients with an ice cube into a shaker.

drinks.name: Robert says: MASS
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Vodka
  • 3 cl Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Fill with Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Vodka with Rose's Lime then stir. Fill up with Tonic Water.

drinks.name: Milk of Amnesia
drinks.ingredients:
• 4-5 oz Champagne
  • 1-2 jigger Chambord raspberry liqueur to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice cold champagne to glass, slowly add chilled Chambord untill desired raspberry flavor is achieved, give it a gentle stir to mix.

drinks.name: Jack Frost
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 tblsp Jack Daniels
  • 1 tblsp Drambuie
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1/4 cup Sweet and sour mix
  • 1/4 cup Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients over ice in a glass.

drinks.name: Born on the 4th of July
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1.5 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1.5 oz Sloe gin
  • Fill Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Collins Glass with ice Pour in Blue Curacao first Next pour in Sloe Gin but be careful, the appearance of the drink is very important. Pour gently onto the ice so as to layer it. Next fill it with cream also layering it. The result should be a blue and red drink with tendrils of white shooting through the colors.

drinks.name: Toblerone #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Frangelico
  • 3 cl Kahlua
  • 3 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 6 cl Cream, fresh
  • 1 tblsp Honey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with ice and serve in a tall glass. Garnish with chocolate flakes and optionally chocolate topping drizzled down the inside of the glass.

drinks.name: Sunburn
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 bottles Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 gal Strawberry juice
  • Juice of 1 gal Orange
  • Juice of 1 gal Banana
  • 1 fifth Grenadine (Rose's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour eveything in a big punch bowl or cooler with a big block of ice. Throw in some cherries and a half bottle of 151 for good measure. Have a good time!

drinks.name: Snake in the grass
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Cointreau
  • 2 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Vermouth
  • 2 cl Lemon juice
  • Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with lots of ice, strain into glass

drinks.name: Bigger better Blue Lagoon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 Cherry
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice in glass. Shake or stir, add cherry and if you would like an additional splash of color, add a few drops of cherry grenadine.

drinks.name: French Toast
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 Hot Damn
  • 1/3 Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients, the shot should taste like a piece of French Toast.

drinks.name: The Icelandic way
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka
  • 6 cl Lemon soda (Fanta Lemon)
  • Fill with Beer
  • And Coca-Cola, 50/50
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix a normal glass of vodka and fanta lemon, drink down to half and fill up with beer and coke.

drinks.name: Raspberry Stupid
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Zima
  • 1 oz Raspberry schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Well. Drink. Repeat until stupid.

drinks.name: Flaming Goat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Gin
  • 1/4 oz Rum
  • 1/4 oz Tequila
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • Cranberry juice
  • Ice cubes
  • Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple sec and curacao. Add sour mix. Add Curacao until it's dark purple. Fill glass with ice cubes and fload Bacardi 151 rum on top. Have the flame blown out before drinking add a straw.

drinks.name: Spring
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Gin
  • 4 cl Pisang Ambon
  • Fill whith Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix gentle, and add ice cubes. Serve whith Straw.

drinks.name: The Graveyard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tabasco sauce
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • Lemon-lime soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1 oz of Tobasco Sauce over ice. Add 1 oz. of Tequila and fill glass with lemon-lime soda. Shake or stir and serve.

drinks.name: Toblerone #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Frangelico
  • 15 ml Bailey's irish cream
  • 15 ml Kahlua
  • 75 ml Cream
  • 1 tsp Honey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend ingrediants with ice until a creamy consistancy is reached (don't add too much ice, this will make the drink too thick). Pour into a *HONEY LINED GLASS*. Garnish with chocolate flakes and an open strawberry.

drinks.name: Screwdriver (modified)
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: add orange juice first, then add vodka, and finally add apple juice and stir lightly. The pooring should do most of the stirring.

drinks.name: Roadrunner Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Peach schnapps
  • Fill with Fruit punch, berry flavour is best
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix 1 part of each type of alcohol (1 shot or less of each) in a large glass. Top off with Fruit Punch. Serve with ice.

drinks.name: Rum Runner
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 3-4 oz Orange juice
  • 3-4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 3-4 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.

drinks.name: Ginelico
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1 pinch Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir Gin and Frangelico with ice, strain into cold cocktail glass. Garnish with frshly grated nutmeg.

drinks.name: Blitz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/6 part Tequila
  • 1/6 part Triple sec
  • 1/6 part Southern Comfort
  • 1/6 part Grenadine
  • 1/6 part Lemon juice
  • 1/6 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain or with ice.

drinks.name: Orgasm a la Denmark
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir it together until it just looks like Bailey's.

drinks.name: More Orgasms
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stirr it together until it just looks like dark Bailey's.

drinks.name: Horse's Ass
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Ginger ale
  • 1/2 Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice.

drinks.name: H.D.
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Whisky
  • 8 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the whisky and Baileys Cream in a beer-glass (at least 50 cl). Fill the rest of the glass with coffee.

drinks.name: Horse Jizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Beer
  • 1/2 Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Get a big mug. Pour in one ingredient then the other.

drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea #6
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Tequila
  • 2 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Rum
  • 2 cl Cointreau
  • Iced tea
  • Lime juice
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: First, have all the ingridients cold. Mix the liquor in a glass and then add the iced tea, coca-cola and lemon. Be sure to stir or shake. Serve chilled in a big (beer?) glass.

drinks.name: Cowboy Cocksucker #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/3 Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass

drinks.name: Blow Job #3
drinks.ingredients:
• Kahlua
  • Bailey's irish cream
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Kahlua and Bailey's to shot glass, garnish with whipped cream.

drinks.name: The Evil Blue Thing
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Light rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into glass, and drop in a blue whale! The blue whale isn't really necessary, but it makes the drink more 'fun'.

drinks.name: Shark Attack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 can Lemonade (concentrate)
  • 3 cans Water
  • 1 1/2 cup Vodka (Absolut)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

drinks.name: Jack's Vanilla Coke
drinks.ingredients:
• 4-5 Ice cubes
  • 2 oz Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's)
  • 1 tsp Vanilla extract
  • 10-12 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: After pouring in your ingredients, and adding 3-5 ice cubes, according to taste. Stir the drink with a stirrer to get the Vanilla off the bottom.

drinks.name: Viscous Robert
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Angostura bitters
  • 1 dash Southern Comfort
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Bitters over rocks, and swirl in a dash of Southern Comfort. Garnish with lemon peel and and an umbrella (or the most frou-frou accoutrement you have on hand)

drinks.name: The Pink Drink
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • 1 oz Milk
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Vodka, Galliano, Cointreau, Grenadine and Milk into a cocktail shaker, shake and pour into a cocktail glass and finish off with a dollop of whipped cream on top.

drinks.name: Sid's Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Gin
  • 1 tblsp frozen Lime juice concentrate (Minute Maid)
  • Ice cubes
  • Fill with 7-Up or Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place cubes in glass, add gin, frozen lime juice, and 7-up then stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: Tripwire
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 gal high proof Vodka
  • 1 can Lemonade mix
  • Juice of 3 - 6 Lemon or limes
  • Fill with 3 1/2 - 4 gal ice cold Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: In 5 gal. jug mix thoroughly all of vodka with all of lemons, lemonade, and water, which should be previously combined. Make sure water is ice cold, if not ice or refridgeration may be required.

drinks.name: Ambijaxtrious
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 2 shots Tequila
  • 2 shots Kahlua
  • Pour in 2 oz Milk
  • Add 2 dashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour mixture into a cup filled with crushed and stir briskly.

drinks.name: Mutated Mothers Milk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Let stand for 3-5 minutes to chill. Pour into shot glass and enjoy.

drinks.name: Apple Grande
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Tequila (Cuervo Mystico)
  • 12 oz Apple cider
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill both ingredients!! Mix in a tumbler and enjoy!

drinks.name: Amer Picon Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• Fill glass with Ice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 2 1/2 oz Amer Picon
  • Fill with Soda water
  • 1 oz Brandy (float on top)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill old-fashioned glass with ice. Pour in grenadine and Amer Picon. Fill glass with soda, leaving room for brandy. Float brandy on top of drink.

drinks.name: Tequila Press
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1 Lemon
  • 1 cup Soda water
  • 1-2 shot Tequila
  • Sugar syrup to taste
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve the sugar in the boiling water and chill in the fridge. This step is best done before the party/drinking session. Put the tequila and lemon juice in the pitcher and fill with soda water and ice. Then mix sugar syrup to taste.

drinks.name: Bleeding Surgeon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Dark rum
  • 1 slice Orange
  • 1/2 glass Surge or Mountain Dew (Cold)
  • 1/2 glass Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Shot of Rum over slice of orange. Fill the remaining space in glass half way full of surge or similar drink. Finish off glass with cranberry juice. Be carefull, warm surge may foam over the glass.

drinks.name: Kansas City Ice Water
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients over ice.

drinks.name: Jen's Mountain Gin
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Lemon gin
  • Fill with Mountain Dew
  • Some Sugar
  • 1 wedge Lime
  • Lime peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rub lime peel around rim of glass. Dip glass upside-down into sugar. Mix lemon gin and Mountain Dew together. Pour into glass over ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Suicide Stop Light
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 1/2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Aftershock
  • 1 splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Line three 1 1/2 oz shot glasses up on the bar. pour each of the liquors into its own glass. Splash the orange juice into the vodka for color. Then shoot (RED YELLOW GREEN)

drinks.name: Spikey Hedgehog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Grenadine
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 dash Lime juice
  • Fill with Club soda
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass with ice and stir.

drinks.name: Epidural
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Everclear
  • 1 part Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part Coconut cream (or coconut milk)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill all ingredients well. Mix equal parts and serve in a cordial glass. Or, if you have a test tube or beaker handy, go for it!

drinks.name: Magic's Tornado
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Southern Comfort
  • 4 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3 cl Almond syrup
  • 3 cl Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 2 cl fresh Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice, decoration: just a slice of green lemon,

drinks.name: Cayman Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Pina colada mix
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Half fill a highball glass with crushed ice. Next pour in 1.5oz. of your favorite brand of Light Rum. Now pour in .5oz. of liqiud pina colada mix, and then fill to the top of the glass with pineapple juice. After stirring ingrediences, pour in .5oz. of grenadine and alow to settle on the bottom of the glass (do not stir after adding grenadine),garnish the glass with an orange wedge, and then serve 'Mon'!

drinks.name: Applejack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass, chill and strain into cocktail glass

drinks.name: Hazelnut Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Ketel One)
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: add ingredients into mixing glass, chill and strain

drinks.name: Algae
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 2 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients over ice and pour into highball glass. No garnish.

drinks.name: Island Girl
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Stoli Vodka
  • 4 oz Guava juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 dash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients. Roll.

drinks.name: Sensei on the Rocks
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • splash Jack Daniels
  • Milk
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: With ice cubes in the the glass, add the Kahlua and Malibu and stir them together. Add the splash of Jack and fill the rest up with milk. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Sweet Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 2 1/2 oz Passion fruit syrup
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 oz pureed frozen Strawberries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill blender cup with 15 ounces of small ice cubes, add rum, passion fruit syrup and sweet and sour and blend until smooth, in a hurricane glass pour the blended strawberries, then add the blended mixture, the strawberries will ooze up the sides of the glass and it will look like a beautiful sunset. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

drinks.name: Suicide The Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 11/2 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1/4 oz Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Float Tabasco a top of rum.

drinks.name: The Power of Milk
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 tsp Sugar
  • 5 cl Vodka
  • 15 cl Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir sugar and vodka together. Add milk. Serve cold with a straw.

drinks.name: Pedro Collins
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
  • 2 oz 7-Up
  • 2 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Full collins glass with ice, pour in Limon, add sweet and sour, fill with equal parts club soda and 7-up

drinks.name: Bitchin' Apple Cider
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Goldschlager
  • 3 parts Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Apple Juice to Goldschlager and Stir.

drinks.name: Apple Cider Slider
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum
  • 3/4 oz Apple schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice. Shake and strain into shooter glass.

drinks.name: Adam Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Rum (Ron Bacardi)
  • 1 part Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 part Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1/2 part Triple sec
  • Fruit
  • 1/2 glass Ice
  • Salt or sugar
  • 1-3 pint Fruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice to blender (or to glass if prefer on the rocks) then fruit, and fruite juice depending on personal prefference then add the Rum, Vodka, Tequila, and triple sec. blend till smooth, rim glass with sugar or salt and pour mixture in. garnish with lemon or lime slice.

drinks.name: Three Wise Men (on a farm)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Jack Daniels
  • 1 shot Jim Beam
  • 1 shot Yukon Jack
  • 1 shot Wild Turkey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Line up four shot glasses with a shot of each drink.

drinks.name: Royal Scandal
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Crown Royal
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add liquors and mixers into shaker with a few cubes of ice. Shake vehemently and strain out ice. Serve as a shooter.

drinks.name: Purple Motherfucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Razzmatazz
  • 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 1/2 oz 7-Up
  • 1/2 glass Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine first five ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Shake. Pour into a Collins glass and top with 7-Up.

drinks.name: Harry Denton Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Gin (Bombay Sapphire)
  • 1/2 oz Green Chartreuse
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shaken then strained into a Cocktail Glass (Garnish not specified)

drinks.name: Sizz Snot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 measures Peach schnapps (Archers)
  • 2 - 3 dashes Green Creme de Menthe (Bols)
  • Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the two measures of Schnapps into the cocktail glass. With a cocktail stick stir the liquid whilst adding the two or three dashes of Creme de Menthe. DO NOT mix to hard. Once the Creme de Menthe has started to be added, stop stirring. Finally, gently pour in the lemonade until the glass is topped up. Add maybe a cocktail cherry for decoration.

drinks.name: MVP's Strawberry Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tequila Rose, chilled
  • 1 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 shot Strawberry schnapps, chilled
drinks.mixinginstructions: Makes 3 shots.Shake ingredients with ice and strain into shot glasses. Savor the scent for a moment and SLAM

drinks.name: The 5th Element
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 3 oz Sprite
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill mug, add ice, pour Sprite and juice into mug. Then add rum and Southern Comfort. Finally add the 5th element: Everclear!

drinks.name: Jo Jo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Canadian whisky (Windsor)
  • 3 parts Mello Yello
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with a butter knife

drinks.name: Duck Fart #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • Float 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Crown in first...Then the Kahlua, and Float the Baileys on top. Then Slam!

drinks.name: Arizona Antifreeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Vodka (Fris)
  • 1/3 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Sweet and sour (Mr.& Mrs.T's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into shot glass and slam !!!!

drinks.name: Purple Elastic Thunder Fuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Splash Pineapple juice
  • Splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill, shake, and strain into shooter glass.

drinks.name: Perfect Flaming Dr. Pepper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • 1/4 shot Kahlua
  • 1/8 shot Root beer schnapps
  • 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 glass Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: In the shot glass, pour amaretto, then kahlua, then root beer schnapps. Finally float rum on top. Fill a beer mug (with something like bud or coors) half way. Light shot on fire, drop into beer mug and slam as fast as you can! By the way, the faster its slamed, the more it tastes like Dr. Pepper

drinks.name: Extreme Valentine
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 5 oz Root beer
  • 5 oz Mountain Dew
  • 1 slice Orange
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients into glass. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Dirty Oatmeal
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top

drinks.name: Venom
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 tblsp Cocoa powder
  • 2 tblsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put gin into a Malt Shaker or something close to that. Stir in the cocoa and sugar. Mix together and shake. Pour into a Champagne Glass.

drinks.name: Lay Down and Shut Up!
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Hot Damn
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 splash Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake over ice, Strain and pour.

drinks.name: Sax with T.
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Crown Royal
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • And Orange juice
  • 2 splashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice in shaker and strain.

drinks.name: Tropical Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• Pink lemonade
  • 1/2 fifth Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/4 bottle strawberry Daiquiri mix (Mrs.T's)
  • 1 splash Rum (Captain Morgan's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with 3/4 of a pitcher with pink lemonade. Then add the vodka. Mix till you can barely taste the vodka, then add the strawberry daiquiri mix, then a splash of rum. (Just a bit, do not add too much) Stir and then chill.

drinks.name: Be Sweet
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Whiskey
  • 2 cl Parfait d'Amour
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add a few ice cubes and fill the glass with ginger ale

drinks.name: Bazooka Joe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill tin with ice. Mix all three ingredients with ice. Shake and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Stormcloud
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • splash Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in shot glass. Float Bailey's in amaretto and top with 151. The Bailey's should float in the middle.

drinks.name: Velvet Presley
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Bourbon
  • Chocolate milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour bourbon over ice (optional). Add chocolate milk until creamy. The drink of Kings!

drinks.name: Gin-Dew-It
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Gin
  • 6 oz Mountain Dew
  • 1 splash Sprite
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1 shot of your favorite Gin into a highball glass half filled with ice. Add Mountain Dew till glass is almost filled, then give it a splash of Sprite. Stir well, and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: DewRunRum
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 16 parts Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use 'Green Plastic' Dixie cups 16oz. 2 Ice cubes. Place one shot of 151 into glass Pour Mountain Dew over 151 and ice.

drinks.name: Sunny Sex
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Malibu rum
  • 3 cl Orange juice
  • 1 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Firewater
  • 1 cl Red wine
drinks.mixinginstructions: First off, mix the orange juice with the malibu in a seperate glass, pour the firewater in the martini glass, the orange mix over it and when it's settled, pour the vodka slowly over the mixture. If you want you can stir now (in that case the above directions are void) - but i prefer not to. Now's the time for the red wine. It doesn't have to be anything special: I tend to use a Lambrusco because of the pearliness, also the amount of wine you use will affect the taste of the drink immensely. I use between 1/2 cl to 1 cl, not more, other wise the tatse of the wine will dominate too much. To get your optimal taste you'll just have to experiment a little back and forth.

drinks.name: Tattooed Love Goddess
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Vanilla schnapps (Dr. McGillicuddy's)
  • 1 1/2 oz Godiva liqueur
  • Fill with Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, add all liquers, top off with cream and shake well.

drinks.name: Mind over Marny
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Orange vodka (Stoli)
  • 2 parts Mango juice
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill to the top of glass with ice cubes or crushed ice. Pour two parts (to taste, of course) vodka, then add mango, orange juice. Add Club Soda to give it a fizz.

drinks.name: Pisang cold
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 part Pisang Ambon, cold
  • 2/3 part cold semi-skimmed Milk
  • 2-3 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the milk into a glass and put the Pisang ambong into it also. Shake and serve it cold with ice cubes.

drinks.name: Latin Love
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cruzan Coconut rum
  • 1 oz Cruzan Banana rum
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Coco Lopez Cream of coconut
  • 1 oz Raspberry juice
  • 1 scoop Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass rimmed with grenadine and coconut shavings.

drinks.name: Sex on the Beach #9
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 measure Malibu rum
  • 1 measure Passoa
  • 2 measures Orange juice
  • 1 dash Cream
  • A handful of crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a shaker: first put in the ice, then add the orange juice ( you should always add the fruit juices before the alcohol! ). Put both the Passoa and the Malibu in and give it a good shake. Poor in a glass and add a cube of ice. The poor a bit of cream on top of the ice cubes ( preferably using a teaspoon or so to keep the cream from mixing with the other stuff ). Put a cherry on top and voila, there's your Sex on the Beach.

drinks.name: Murder in the Forest
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 measure Pisang Ambon
  • 1 measure PiÃ±a Colada
  • 1 measure Vodka
  • 2 measures Orange juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a shaker: put in cracked ice and orange juice, then put in Vodka, Pisang Ambon and Pina Colada and give it all a good shake. Poor in glass ( if you like you can put in a cube of ice or two ). Poor a dash of grenadine in ( slowly ). Serve with cherry and straw. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Rootbeer Floatie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Root beer schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shot glass, float .5oz. lt. cream on top of .5oz. rootbeer schnapps.

drinks.name: Real Romulan Ale
drinks.ingredients:
• 375 ml Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 375 ml Everclear
  • 375 ml Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Select a bottle (preferably decorative, but not too ornate) that will hold just over 1 liter of liquid. Combine 375ml of each ingredient in the bottle. Marvel at the entrancing color and exquisite character that is The Ale. -- Put the bottle in your freezer and wait 2 hours. -- Pour a shot and hold on to your hat!

drinks.name: Kamikaze #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all 3 into a shot glass and away you go.

drinks.name: Black and Brown
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Guinness stout
  • 1/2 Root beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: CAREFULLY to avoid explosive head formation: Pour Beer glass half full of favorite rootbeer and top off with Guinness.

drinks.name: A Piece of Ass
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • Ice cubes
  • Top off with Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in glass. Pour in shots. Fill with Sour Mix.

drinks.name: Green Eyes
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Cream of coconut
  • 1 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over crushed ice and stir or can be blended.

drinks.name: Three-Legged Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Crown Royal
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain, into rocks glass.

drinks.name: The Shiwala
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum (Myer's)
  • 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Blackberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/4 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice and pour into Hurricane glass. Add a floater of Myer's dark rum for an additional KICK!

drinks.name: Sex With An Alligator
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain JÃ¤germeister, Melon, and Pineapple juice with ice and strain into rocks glass. Float Raspberry liqueur into mixture in rocks glass, like little alligator footprints.

drinks.name: Southern Dew
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 can Mountain Dew
  • 1 handful Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: basically put ice in glass, add 1 oz. southern comfort, then fill glass with mountain dew and enjoy!

drinks.name: Highlander
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Whiskey
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain, pour into collins glass with ice. Garnish with flag.

drinks.name: Avalanche
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Crown Royal
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • Fill with Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in highball glass over ice, shake well.

drinks.name: Root Beer Float #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Galliano
  • Ice cubes
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
  • Float 2 tblsp Heavy cream on top
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Galiano, Coca-Cola and ice. Float cream on top by pouring over the back of a spoon which is just touching the top of the Coke mixture.

drinks.name: Rosebud
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Citrus vodka (Smirnoff Citrus Twist)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 2 oz Grapefruit juice (pink or red)
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill collins glass with ice and add grapefruit juice Shake vodka, lime juice, and triple sec in shaker 1/2-full of ice. Strain on top of grapefruit juice

drinks.name: Golden Nipple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • Fill remainder with Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Measurements made for 1.5 oz. shot glass

drinks.name: Painter's Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Green Curacao
  • 1 tsp Pernod
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • Ice cubes
  • Fill with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Gin, Curacao, Pernod and the Juice from 1/2 Lemon into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill up with soda, stir and serve.

drinks.name: Salem Witch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Splash Lime juice
  • Splash Grenadine
  • Fill with 2/3 Sour mix
  • Fill with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a collins glass with ice, pour vodka, midori, and raspberry schnapps. Add a splash of lime juice. Fill 2/3 with sour mix and the rest with soda water (or seltzer). Stir gently, and finally top with a splash of grenadine.

drinks.name: Boom box
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 part Smirnoff Vodka
  • 1/3 part White wine
  • 1/3 part Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Vodka and White first the coffee. The coffee must still be hot

drinks.name: Spudgun
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 parts Drambuie
  • 2 parts Vodka
  • 2 parts Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix it together and hurl it down

drinks.name: Jake-Knife
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
  • Top with Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour JÃ¤germeister in shaker over ice. Fill with coke and shake til your arms are sore. Pour into glass and top with a smidgen of Bacrdi 151. If your feeling mean, feel free to light it!

drinks.name: FuzzB@ll
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 measure Peach schnapps
  • 2/3 measure Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill cup 2/3rds with Sprite, fill other 1/3 of cup with Peach Schnapps, add ice.

drinks.name: Golden Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1/4 oz Spiced rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/4 oz Wildberry schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Key Largo schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Razzmatazz
  • 1/2 part Orange juice
  • 1/2 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together and shake!!!!

drinks.name: Winegum
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • Lemon soda
  • Apricot
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Vodka with the other ingredients after taste.

drinks.name: B-52 #6
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Amaretto
  • 1 1/2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 cl Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add the Amaretto, then the Bailey's, and then carefully the Rum. Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw, or you have another choice: When the shot is on fire you slap it to extinguish the fire and then you drink it.

drinks.name: Romona Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Amaretto
  • 1/3 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients and serve in shot glass.

drinks.name: Brandon and Will's Coke Float
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream (Blue Bell)
  • 1 can Coca-Cola
  • 2 oz Bourbon, Maker's Mark
drinks.mixinginstructions: Scoop two large scoops of vanilla ice-cream into frosted beer mug. Next, add 2 ounces Maker's Mark. Then, pour in coke. Gently stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: Mosstrooper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 cup Ice
  • 1 glass Root beer
  • 1 dash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with half a glass of ice. Fill almost full with root beer and add a little 7-Up. Just stir with a straw or other convenient item. Drink before the ice melts, otherwise it tastes bitter.

drinks.name: Triplesex
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Smirnoff Vodka
  • 2 parts Triple sec
  • 3 parts Sweet and sour
  • Pineapple juice to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a glass with ice. Pour first 3 three ingredients then adjust pineapple juice to taste. Suck it down:)

drinks.name: SkyLab
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Peach liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • splash Pineapple juice
  • splash Orange juice
  • splash Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker, then strain into chilled glass.

drinks.name: Eben's Magic Juice (Orange)
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Orange soda
  • 1 part high proof Vodka
  • 1 package Orange Kool-Aid mix, unsweetened
  • Sugar to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the Vodka to orange soda and add Kool Aid mix (make sure it is the kind of Kool Aid mix with no sugar added). Pour a small amount of sugar into the mixture and stir (carefully. it IS carbonated!). Taste and add sugar if needed. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Sex on the Beach #10
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Smirnoff Vodka
  • 1 part Cointreau
  • 1 part Passoa
  • 1 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake like hell whith some ice

drinks.name: Rikkertje
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 part Safari
  • 2 parts Orange juice
  • 1 part Smirnoff Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add some ICE Put in the shaker Shake your ass off

drinks.name: Malibu Tequichi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Malibu rum
  • 2 parts Tequila
  • 3 parts Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add some ice. Twist and shake that thing. Serve at once.

drinks.name: Tequila BoomBoom
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Tequila
  • 8 drops Tabasco sauce
  • 1 part Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Throw everything in a glass. Put a towel over the glass slam it on the bar. Before the foam hits the edge off the glass you must have finished it .

drinks.name: Blow Job #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the butterscotch schnapps and Irish Cream by pouring the Irish Cream over the back of a spoon. Spray the Whipped cream on top, pile it about 1-2 inches high. This shot must be taken without using your hands. Pick up the shot glass between your lips and tilt back.

drinks.name: Gorilla Snot #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/5 oz Advocaat
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the creme de banane over the melon liqueur. Then drop the Advocaat into the middle of the creme de banane. The Advocaat should hang in the middle if poured correctly.

drinks.name: Chocolate Almond
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Amaretto
  • 1/3 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1/3 oz Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the ingredients in the order listed.

drinks.name: Chocolate Shock
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Hot chocolate
  • 1 shot Aftershock
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 1 shot of After Shock to 8 oz cup of hot chocolate and enjoy.

drinks.name: Apertif d'Absinthe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Pernod
  • 1 tsp Wormwood extract
  • 5 oz Water
  • 4 cubes Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add wormwood to shot of pernod add sugar and water serve over ice.

drinks.name: Diablo's Blood
drinks.ingredients:
• 50 ml Red wine, cold
  • 50 ml Coca-Cola, cold
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both ingredients together and mix well. Serve cold.

drinks.name: Dragon's Breath
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Firewater
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour in fire water float bacardi 151 rum on top ignite

drinks.name: Green Milkshake
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 1/2 cl Milk
  • 4 cl Green Creme de Menthe
  • 2 cl Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Grenadine on the edge of the glass and then sugar to create a red edge on the glass. Then pour all three ingredienses in a shaker and shake it well with crushed ice. Finally pour it in the glass.

drinks.name: Schnapp Pop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Wildberry schnapps
  • Club soda
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, add schnapps and fill with club soda. Turn over once to mix. Serve with straw.

drinks.name: Eliminator
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Wild Turkey (101 proof)
  • 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 6 oz Orange soda
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in tall glass. Add more orange soda if it is unpalitable

drinks.name: Flaming Lamborghini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Sambuca
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Sambuca and Kahlua into the Cocktail Glass and give the drinker a straw. Pour the Baileys and Blue Curacao into two sepsrate shot glasses either side of the cocktail glass. Set light the concotion in the cocktail glass and start to drink through the straw (this drink should be drunk in one) , as the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the Baileys and Blue Curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it's all gone!!

drinks.name: Death Wish
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in cup and stir.

drinks.name: Shandy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Beer
  • 1/2 Ginger ale or 7-up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a glass half full of beer (lighter beer works better). Fill the rest with Ginger Ale or 7-up (preference)

drinks.name: Otter Pop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz White rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1/4 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix all ingrediants into a shaker filled with ice, then strain out drink into shot glass

drinks.name: Fruit Fly
drinks.ingredients:
• Whisky
  • 1 can Fruit cocktail
  • 1 tblsp Cinnamon
  • 4 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Drain syrup from the fruit cocktail. Mix fruit, cinnamon, and ice in a blender. Add whisky to whisky according to taste. Let blend for about 2 1/2 minuets at high setting.

drinks.name: Pink Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • 5 oz Pink lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass half way with ice. Pour in 1 oz. of creme de banane and then 5 oz. of pink lemonade.

drinks.name: Golden Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Tequila
  • 1 1/2 shot Grand Marnier
  • 1 shot Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 shot Sour mix (homemade)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients hard with crushed ice. Serve over crushed ice in a lightly salted margarita glass with two cocktail straws. Garnish with a twist of lime.

drinks.name: Dolt Bolt
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Everclear
  • 1/3 shot Rumple Minze
  • 1/3 shot Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour into shot glass

drinks.name: Richie 50
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 8 oz Orange juice
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill one 16oz glass half full of vodka, add orange juice, stir, and add a cherry.

drinks.name: Lube Job
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3/4 oz Irish cream (Bailey's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: It is best to use a 'tall' shot glass. Fill it halfway with the irish cream: fill it the rest of the way with vodka and shoot it.

drinks.name: Iceberg in Radioactive water
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 6-8 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 scoop Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all drinks into glass and add ice-cream at the end.

drinks.name: Southern Peach
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Absolut Citron
drinks.mixinginstructions: add all with ice shack and strain

drinks.name: Zipperhead
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • Fill with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, Then soda on top).

drinks.name: A Gilligan's Island
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shaken, not stirred!

drinks.name: Danger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle cold Beer
  • 1 dl cold Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all the indgrediens into a glass and serve it cold.

drinks.name: Terror From the Deep
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Hot Damn
  • 4 cl Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in glass. Drink if you can.

drinks.name: Purple Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila (Hornitos)
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • 2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: You can either drink this one the rocks or frozen. Salt to taste.

drinks.name: Grapefruit Teaser
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 4 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 splash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine & stir.

drinks.name: Berrynice
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Strawberry liqueur
  • 15 ml Peach schnapps
  • 15 ml Midori melon liqueur
  • 20 ml Coconut cream
  • 10 ml Sugar syrup
  • 30 ml Cream
  • 60 ml Fruit juice of mixed berries
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake with ice garnish with with strawberry on glass,with another summer berry held on with toothpick

drinks.name: Volvo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Cointreau
  • 1 cl Grand Marnier
  • 1 cl Vodka
  • 1 cl Cognac
  • 1 cl Apricot brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in the order mentioned. You can use what ever kind of cognac, and vodka you prefer.

drinks.name: The Nog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Light rum or vodka
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Midori, triple sec, and rum into a 12 ounce highball glass filled with ice. Fill the rest of the glass with pineapple juice. Stir. Drink.

drinks.name: Kioki Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Brandy
  • Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir. Add whipped cream to the top.

drinks.name: The Pineapple Drink
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Light rum
  • 7 chunks Pineapple
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 2 oz Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rum over pineapple chunk in a tall glass. Add pineapple juice and sweet and sour. Top with Sprite. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Pure Ecstacy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Kahlua
  • 4 parts Bailey's irish cream
  • Plenty of Ice
  • 1-2 part Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a blender add the Bailey's and Kahlua do not fill past 1/3. Add enough ice to 'fill' the blender. Blend on a low speed continually adding ice until a milkshake texture is achieved. Add, the vodka, more for strong less for weak. Mix in. Serve.

drinks.name: Sake Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Sake
  • 1 glass Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: It's real easy. Drop the shot of Sake into a glass of beer and the just SLAM IT !!!!!!!!!!

drinks.name: Tiger Woods
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Lemon juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a highball with ice, add the vodka, lemon juice and cran. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

drinks.name: Umbrella Man Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 6 cl Kahlua
  • 6 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 6 cl Grand Marnier
  • 6 cl Drambuie
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Serve with straw and ice cubes, put a cocktail umbrella beside the straw in the glass.

drinks.name: Irish Mint
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Green Creme de Menthe
  • 6 parts Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the milk first and then the Irish Cream - the parts are only guesses, I tend to go by color. You want a creamy beige that has only a slight hint of alcohol. Add just enough Creme de Menthe so as to turn the drink slightly green. Stir it up and serve cold.

drinks.name: Apple Pie with A Crust
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Apple juice
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • 3 dashes Cinnamon or cloves
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix the two liquids and sprinkle in the cinnamon. Serve either cold or heated.

drinks.name: The Peg
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon (Wild Turkey)
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
  • 1 tsp fresh Lime juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice cubes in glass. Add bourbon, coke and lime juice. Garnish with slice of lime (optional)

drinks.name: Cold Fire
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1 oz Ice 101
  • Splash Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir together Milk and Schnapps, pour into highball glass, and serve

drinks.name: Flaming Moz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part white Sambuca
  • 1 part Green Chartreuse
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place a short rock (wide mouthed spirit glass) on bar. Pour the blue curacao, white sambuca and chatreuse into a brandy balloon (snifter). Place the brandy balloon horizontally, balancing on the mouth of the short rock. -- Ignite the alcohol in the brandy balloon. Rotate the brandy balloon (like a cement mixer). Pour mixture from brandy balloon to short rock while it is alight. The stream of alcohol falling between the glasses should form a waterfall of fire cascading into the short rock. (I am a poet also) Use the upside down brandy balloon to suffocate the drink in the short rock. Be sure the flames are out. -- Remove the brandy balloon and inhale the fumes. Shoot the drink. -- Hold on to the bar very tightly!

drinks.name: Cajun Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Stoli Vodka
  • 1 part Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: Garnish with jalapeno pepper.

drinks.name: Zorbatini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Stoli Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Ouzo
drinks.mixinginstructions: Prepare like a Martini. Garnish with a green olive.

drinks.name: Pear Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Stoli Vodka
  • 1 part Pear liqueur (Perle de Brillet)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Garnish with a slice of pear.

drinks.name: Black-Eyed Susan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-1/4 cup Vodka
  • 1-1/4 cup Light rum
  • 3/4 cup Triple sec
  • 1 tblsp fresh Lime juice
  • 4 cups Pineapple juice
  • 4 cups Orange juice
  • Ice ring with fruits (pineapple, lemon, grapes)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill all ingredients. Just before serving combine in a punch bowl. Unmold ice ring and float in bowl. Serve in tall glasses. Makes 10 large servings.

drinks.name: Mexican three wise men
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz Jack Daniels
  • 2/3 oz Jim Beam
  • 2/3 oz Jose Cuervo
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in any order, under any conditions, at any place. Drink.

drinks.name: Vodka Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Half-and-half
  • 2 oz Limeade concentrate
  • Ice
  • 1 pinch Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients, save nutmeg. Pour into large white wine glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Mexican Cappuccino
drinks.ingredients:
• Cappuccino
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 shot Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: In coffee mug (a large one, if you have one) pour Kahlua and Tequila into the bottom. Brew cappuccino per the instructions for your machine. Fill cup with espresso and top with the frothed milk. Enjoy

drinks.name: Killer Kool-Aid #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain, pour into collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a flag, or a flag and a pineapple wedge, if carried by your bar.

drinks.name: Gorilla Fart #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Wild Turkey
  • 1 oz Crown Royal
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and Strain, pour into rocks glass, straight up.

drinks.name: Bloated Bag of Monkey Spunk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into collins glass with ice. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Big Dumb Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3 parts Sprite
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • Blue Maui
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with ice. I like to use a standard beer glass. Add about 2 shots of vodka. Then fill the glass about 3/4th of the way with Sprite. Then add just a splash of pineapple juice. Finally, add the Blue Maui until you get a faint (almost skyblue) blue color. Stir.

drinks.name: Dewing the Captain
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 12 oz Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1oz Morgan over crushed Ice Add Mountain Dew

drinks.name: Sit On My Face Mary Jane
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Frangelico
  • 1 part Crown Royal
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all three ingredients into the shot glass and shake until mixed together

drinks.name: Snapple sensation
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Mango Madness Snapple
  • 2 parts Jack Daniels sour mash whiskey
  • 4 drops Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Snapple and whiskey in a pewter martini shaker. (preferably pewter because it keeps the drink so cold). Next step put crushed ice in very last so you do not water down the drink. Serve in a martini glass or a huricane glass with 4 lemon drops.

drinks.name: Electric Screwdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 glass Orange juice
  • 2 shots Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: dump the shots in glass then fill with oj to taste

drinks.name: Wicked Tasty Treat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cinnamon Vodka (Stoli)
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dip the rim of cocktail glass in Amaretto and then into powdered sugar. Shake all alcohol and cream with ice and strain into rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with Cinnamon stick and whipped cream (optional)

drinks.name: The Fran
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Spiced rum
  • 2 1/2 oz Yukon Jack
  • 2 dashes Pepper sauce, Frank's Orig. Red Hot
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • Add crushed Ice
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Slap it in, stir it around and take it down.

drinks.name: Witch's Clit
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 gal Lemon-lime soda (Gatorade)
  • 1/4 gal Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour out 1/4 gallon gatorade, pour in 1/4 gallon vodka. Cap and shake.

drinks.name: Easy does it
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Everclear
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Bailey's first. Pour Kahlua. Float Everlear. Bottoms up!

drinks.name: Skip And Go Naked #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 glass Beer
  • 1/2 glass Lemonade
  • 1 shot Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour beer into mug. Add lemonade. Float SoCo on top.

drinks.name: Satan's Piss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 3 dashes Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rum into shot glass. Add tabasco to the top. Serve room temperature.

drinks.name: P.M.F.
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shaker with ice, add ingreidients to taste. Don't want rum to overpower. Shake well, pour into shot glasses.

drinks.name: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass. Sip cautiously.

drinks.name: Shot-gun
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Jim Beam
  • 1 part Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Wild Turkey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

drinks.name: Bible Belt
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 wedges Lime
  • 2 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice.

drinks.name: Irish Curdling Cow
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3/4 oz Bourbon
  • 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 2-3 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Irish Cream, Vodka, and Bourbon in a glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.

drinks.name: Creamsicle #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Amaretto
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • splash Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: stir with a straw

drinks.name: Fuck in the Graveyard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Blueberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Apple schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
  • Splash of Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well, serve cold

drinks.name: Sweet Tooth
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Godiva liqueur
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

drinks.name: Downshift
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 part Fruit punch, Minute Maid
  • 1 part Sprite
  • 2 shots Tequila
  • Float Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with the Sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that, add the Minute Maid Fruit Punch, then float the 151. Rocks optional.

drinks.name: Pink Penocha
drinks.ingredients:
• 750 ml Everclear
  • 1750 ml Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1750 ml Peach schnapps
  • 1 gal Orange juice
  • 1 gal Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently

drinks.name: Angel's Tit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/4 oz Cherry liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Half-and-half
  • Top with Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into glass in order given, carefully so each layer floats on top of the previous one with mixing. Chill for 1/2 hour before serving.

drinks.name: Kosmo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1 1/2 oz Orange vodka (Stoli) or Absolut Citron
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • Till with 6 oz Cranberry juice (Ocean spray)
  • 1/3 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Juice of 1 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice in a shaker. Shake well. Served over ice - very chilled!

drinks.name: Orange Whip
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 package Cream or creamer
  • Over Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

drinks.name: Bitter lime
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Lemon gin (Seagrams)
  • 4 oz Gatorade lemon-lime
  • 2 tblsp Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 2 oz. Gin (seagrams lemon lime, best), over Ice cubes. Then pour 4 oz. of Lemon lime Gatorade. To finish pour 2 tbspn of lime juice and mix.

drinks.name: Chocolate Slam
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/8 Vodka
  • 1/8 Chocolate syrup
  • 3/4 Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add the chocolate syrup smoothly on the bottom of the glass. Then mix Vodka in followed by Coca-cola

drinks.name: Bruised Heart
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice, stir, and strain into shot glass

drinks.name: Fireball #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 3 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
  • 1 Cherry (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Schnapps, Southern Comfort, and Tabasco. Pour into cocktail glass. A cherry may be added.

drinks.name: Electric Lemonade #1
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 3/4 oz Light rum
  • 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in Collins glass filled with ice.

drinks.name: Stan's Surprise
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 1 cl Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Grape Tonic water
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pick a highball glass and add som ice. Pour 2 cl of vodka. Add 1 cl of Rose's lime juice. Fill up with equal amounts of grape tonic and orange juice. Add a straw, stir and serve.

drinks.name: Gideon's Green Dinosaur
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • Fill with Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients in collins glass with ice and stir.

drinks.name: Sit on my face
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Kahlua
  • 1/3 oz Frangelico
  • 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in order.

drinks.name: Rearbuster
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila and Kahlua into glass. Add ice. Fill with cranberry juice and stir with straw. A lemon wedge and umbrella are a nice touch.

drinks.name: A True Amaretto Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Amaretto
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • Ice
  • Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rub the rim of an old fashioned glass with lemon, and dip repeatedly into granulated sugar until it has a good 'frosted' rim. Shake a jigger of Amaretto with the juice of 1/2 a lemon. Strain into glass and add ice. Garnish with a Marachino Cherry.

drinks.name: Kool First Aid
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz light 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 tsp Tropical Kool-Aid mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Kool Aid to a double shot glass, and top with rum. Slam and shoot.

drinks.name: Tickle me Elmo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Strawberry schnapps
  • Pineapple juice
  • 2 shots Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and stir and pour over ice

drinks.name: Cookie Monster #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot blue Maui
  • Pineapple juice
  • 2 shots Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and stir and pour over ice

drinks.name: Hop, Skip, and Go Naked
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz frozen Limeade concentrate
  • 6 oz frozen Lemonade concentrate
  • 6 oz Peach schnapps
  • 6 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in blender with ice, to the consistency of a margarita.

drinks.name: Kool-Aid (Boulder style)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • 1/2 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 shot Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients on ice and strain.

drinks.name: Super Sprite
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 part Sprite
  • 1/4 part Lime vodka (Hammer)
drinks.mixinginstructions: First drink 1/4 of the Sprite and fill up the 1/2l bottle with Hammer Lime vodka and drink!

drinks.name: Tootsy Pop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 shots Peach schnapps
  • 4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour orange juice in first, then the peach schnaps. Then pour the shot of midori down the side of the glass, so that the midori forms a layer at the bottom of the glass.

drinks.name: Rumka
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it half and half and serve chilled. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Aqua
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Vodka, Bailey's and Blue Curacao with ice. Pour into glass and fill up with 7-UP.

drinks.name: Irish Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 dash Coca-Cola
  • Fill with Guinness stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the ingredients in the order listed in the recipe. Care must be taken when adding the Guinness to prevent an excess of foam. Do Not add ice.

drinks.name: Tequila and Tonic
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo)
  • Fill with Tonic water
  • Ice cubes
  • Lime wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 2 1/2 ounces Cuervo Gold over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with tonic. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Wolfsbane
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
