  • 1 1/2 oz Cherry brandy (or other flavour)
  • 1/2 oz Cream
  • 1 Egg white
  • Lemon juice
  • Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rub inside of glass with lemon juice, then sprinkle with sugar. Freeze glass to achieve a frosted affect. Shake together the other ingrediants. Pour into frosted glass and enjoy!

drinks.name: Chocolate Covered Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • Fill with Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice. Garnish with slice of banana.

drinks.name: Smooth Black Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 dash Coca-Cola
  • 1 dash Guinness stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka in glass followed by the Kahlua. Add the dash of coke (to taste) and stir. Top up the glass with guinness and serve.

drinks.name: Auburn Headbanger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in spread glass over ice. Strain and pour in shot glass. Sit down before shotting. ENJOY!!

drinks.name: Paisano
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ice Glass. Add Vodka and Frangelico just like any other drink. Fill with milk. Shake because it is a milk drink.

drinks.name: Kamikaze Version
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ice Cocktail glass. Add Vodka and mixers. Fill with sour mix and shake because of sour mix.

drinks.name: Body Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 package Sugar
  • 1 wedge Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Using a partner of the opposite sex, lick their kneck to moisten. Pour packet of sugar onto their kneck. Place wedge of lemon in their mouth with the skin pointed inward. You first lick the sugar from their kneck, then shoot the vodka, then suck the lemon from their mouth (while gently holding back of their kneck.

drinks.name: Green Froggy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 glass Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: just pour and stur

drinks.name: Mexican H'ors d'oeuvre
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tequila
  • 1 slice Jalapeno
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce or Red hot
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place the jalapeÃ±o on the bottom of a shot glass and fill the glass with tequila. Next cover the surface with Tabasco sauce or Red Hot and shoot it. Be sure to catch the jalapeno in your mouth while swallowing the rest. Chew the jalapeno separately, truly savoring the flavor, and swallow it. OlÃ©!

drinks.name: Pink Panty Pulldowns #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Vodka
  • 3 oz Lemon juice (real lemon)
  • 9 oz Cherries
  • 2 L Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a 2 gallon jug pour in 9oz of marciano cherries and the juice. Then pour in fifth of vodka over cherries and let soak for a few minutes. Then pour in lemon juice and fill jug with sprite. Pour mixture into serving container and strain out cherries. When serving drinks over ice drop cherries in.

drinks.name: Zima Blaster
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Zima
  • 3 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, then fill with Zima. Mix and enjoy.

drinks.name: Colorado Pitbull
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 3 shots Kahlua
  • 3 splashes Cream
  • 3 splashes Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker mix Spiced Rum, Kahlua, and Cream. Pur into a Mason Jar filled with ice and add a splach of Coca-Cola. Garnish with a couple of Filberts.

drinks.name: Rockin' Killer Koolaid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Sprite
  • Orange juice
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put alcohol in shaker with ice, shake. Put in hurricane glass over Grenadine to taste. Add in orange juice, pineapple juice and sprite to taste. Garnish with candied cherry.

drinks.name: Cherry Cheesecake
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 jigger Vanilla schnapps
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 3/4 jigger of Schnapps then layer cranberry juice on top. May take a few 'practice' shots to find the right amounts of each.

drinks.name: Unabomber
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 shot Gin
  • 1/4 shot Vodka
  • 1/4 shot Triple sec
  • 1/4 shot Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients, place in shot glass. Introduce to mouth.

drinks.name: Mortuary Mix
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Everclear
  • 25 oz Collins mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take pitcher. Fill pitcher with bottle of Tom Collins mix. Add everclear to 'taste' or 8 oz. if you are a stickler for recipes. Add ice. Get drunk.

drinks.name: Dirty Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 tblsp Dry Vermouth
  • 2 tblsp Olive juice (from the olive jar)
  • 2 Olive, garnish
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put an ice cube and a small amount of water in cocktail glass. Place in freezer for 2-3 minutes. Fill mixer with all ingredients including garnish. cover and shake hard 3 or 4 times. it is ok to bruise the gin on this one. Remove cocktail glass from freezer, empty, strain drink into cocktail glass add olive from mixer. Serve with a mysterious smile...

drinks.name: Jet Pilot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 2 oz Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice cubes to a mason jar glass. Pour 1 oz of each type of rum over ice. Pour 2 oz's of each juice over ice. Add 1 tsp of grenadine. Top with double shot of southern comfort. More juice could be used to mask liquor. Drink can be stirred if preffered.

drinks.name: Buccaneer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Corona
  • 1 shot Bacardi Limon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the bacardi limon into the beer stir very gently

drinks.name: Frozen Rum Runner
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/4 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • Float 1/4 oz 151 proof rum (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend at high speed until smooth. Garnish with a lime wheel and cherry. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Gin Bucket
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 L Gin (Beefeater)
  • 1 can frozen Fruit punch concentrate
  • 1 can frozen Lemonade concentrate
  • 1 can frozen Limeade concentrate
  • 1 bottle diced Cherries
drinks.mixinginstructions: For the full effect you should use a large Folgers coffee can or a metal bucket. First, fill the can half full with ice and add the gin(the whole bottle). Next, add the concentrates and cherries. Finally, shake the can until its ready to drink.

drinks.name: The Moby
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Vodka
  • 8 oz Surge
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour surge then vodka, enjoy!

drinks.name: Bushwacker #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Cream of coconut (CocoLopez)
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bacardi Black rum
  • 1 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 4 oz Milk or half and half
  • 2 cups Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in blender, blend until smooth, serves two in 12oz cups.

drinks.name: Coco's Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Gin
  • 1 cl Campari
  • 1 cl Dry Vermouth
  • 1 slice Lime
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a shaker and serve with a slice of lime

drinks.name: Miami Ice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Lemon-lime soda
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just add 'EVERYTHING' except the Peach Schnapps into the MUG, Lightly stir and then add as much ice (smallest cubes possible) you can fit in. NOTE: Leave just enough room at the top for the 1/4 oz. of Peach Schnapps.

drinks.name: Popper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Tequila
  • 1/2 shot 7-Up or Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila into shot glass. Fill the rest of glass with 7-up. Cover top of glass with hand and slam hard onto counter or bar. This causes shot to fizz, so drink quickly!

drinks.name: Electric Lemonade #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 3/4 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour mix
  • 1 splash Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill collins glass with ice pour in rum and blue curacao pour in sweet & sour mix splash cola lemon twist garnish

drinks.name: Homemade Kahlua
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 cups Sugar
  • 1 cup Corn syrup
  • 1 1/2 oz instant Coffee
  • 2 oz Vanilla extract
  • 3 cups boiling Water
  • 1 fifth Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve sugar in 2 cups of boiling water and add corn syrup. Dissolve the instant coffee in the remaining water. Pour syrup and coffee in a gallon jug. Let it cool. Add vodka and vanilla when cold. For the best result, let the mixture 'mature' for 4-5 weeks.

drinks.name: Coconut Frappe
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • 2 parts Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or blend until frothy, then pour over ice and garnish with toasted coconut.

drinks.name: Blow Job #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 1/2 cl Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer each ingredient into a Sherry Glass in order as listed. Indulge in this creamy minty flavour!

drinks.name: Orgasm #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Orange liqueur
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • Strawberry or Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice. Garnish with strawberry or cherry.

drinks.name: Multiple Orgasm #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Orange liqueur
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 3 cl Milk or cream
  • Strawberries or Cherries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice. Garnish with strawberries or cherries.

drinks.name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Orange liqueur
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 1/2 cl Galliano or cream
  • 3 cl Milk
  • Strawberries or Cherries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice. Granish with strawberries or cherries.

drinks.name: Twains Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Peach schnapps
  • 1 cl Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in order.

drinks.name: Dirty Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Orange liqueur
  • 1 part Galliano
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream or cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in order.

drinks.name: Vibrator
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in order.

drinks.name: Martian Hard On
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Creme de Cacao
  • 1 part Melon liqueur
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in order.

drinks.name: Suitor
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Drambuie
  • 1 cl Orange liqueur
  • 1 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2/3 cl Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in order.

drinks.name: Prarie Fire
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 2 tsp Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour one shot of tequila into the glass. Add Tabasco to taste

drinks.name: Screwdriver with Color
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • Orange juice
  • Kahlua
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with a shot or two (depending on your preference) of vodka in the glass. Add organge juice until its almost full. Then add a shot or two of Kahlua , just until its has a bit of color. Then some ice, and stirr

drinks.name: Purple Cow #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve in highball glass filled with ice.

drinks.name: Witch's Brew
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Yellow Chartreuse
  • 1 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Brandy, spiced
  • 1/4 tsp ground Cloves
  • 1 dash Nutmeg
  • 1 dash Allspice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all the ingrediants together and serve in a chilled glass.

drinks.name: 24k nightmare
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add over ice,shake and pour.

drinks.name: Yellow Parakeet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Banana
  • 1/2 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 counts Orange juice
  • 1 count Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill glass with ice and build drink top with splash of sour

drinks.name: Eerie Witch's Brew
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cups Cranberry juice cocktail
  • 1 cup chopped & candied Ginger
  • 3 Orange
  • 12 oz frozen Apple juice concentrate
  • 6 oz frozen Limeade concentrate
  • 2 cups seedless Grapes
  • 4 cups Water
  • 1/2 gal Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a 1 to 2 quart pan, bring 1 cup of cranberry juice and candied ginger to a boil over high heat. Boil, uncovered, about 2 minutes, set aside. With a vegetable peeler, pare peel (colored part only) from oranges: cut peel into thin 2 in long worms: or use an Oriental shredder to make long shreds. Add orange peel to cranberry mixture. Cover and chill at least 4 hours or as long as overnight. Juice oranges: put juice in a 6 to 8 quart pan or heavy bowl. Stir in cranberry-ginger mixture, the 3 cups cranberry juice, apple concentrate, limeade, grapes and water. If made ahead, cover and chill up to 2 hours. Add ginger ale and about a 1 pound piece of dry ice (DO NOT put small pieces in punch or cups): ice should smolder at least 30 minutes. Ladle into cups. Add any remaining ice when bubbling ceases.

drinks.name: Caribbean Boilermaker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Corona
  • 1 shot Light rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the rum into the beer.

drinks.name: Army special
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Vodka
  • 30 ml Gin
  • 45 ml Lime juice cordial
  • 1/2 glass crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Vodka, Gin and lime cordial into glass, and top up with crushed ice. Wait for ice to melt slightly and sip without a straw.

drinks.name: Sweetie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Kahlua
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 3 tblsp Cream, half-and-half or milk
  • Fill with Cream soda (A&W)
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour cream soda last: this gives a foam similar to that on an ice cream float.

drinks.name: Swift kick in the Ass
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 3 parts Aftershock
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just fuckin' mix it

drinks.name: Frog in a blender
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 2 shots blue Maui
  • 2 splashes Grenadine
  • 8 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend OJ, Blue Maui, and Vodka, put in glass. Splash grenadine on top, but do not stir in . Drink

drinks.name: French Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 glass Red wine
  • 1/3 glass Orangina Orange soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: It's simple just add the 2 together and you've got 'French Monkey Madness!!'

drinks.name: Black Russian #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka (Stoli)
  • 3 cl Coffee liqueur (Kaluha)
  • 15 cl Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Stoli, Kaluha into highball over ice. Top with Coke and serve.

drinks.name: Heilig
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Blueberry schnapps
  • 1/2 shot Vodka
  • splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and then blueberry schnapps into shot glass. Top off with the cranberry juice.

drinks.name: Arizona Twister
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Gold tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Cream of coconut
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • crushed Ice
  • 1 wedge Pineapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix in the shots of rum, vodka, and tequila. Add splashes of the three juices, heavy on the pineapple. Top off with grenadine. Crushed ice should already be in glass. Top off the glass with a pineapple wedge.

drinks.name: Green-eyed Bi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 shot Kiwi liqueur
  • 3/4 shot Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the 1/4 shot kiwi liqueur in to the shot glass. Then add the 3/4 shot vodka. Drop in a green gummi fish candy, and serve.

drinks.name: Lucky Lindeman
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 gal Vodka
  • 1 can Tropicana (strawberry/orange/banana)
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Empty one can of Tropicana strawberry/orange/banana into a blender and 1/4 gallon vodka. Mix well. Pour half of this into a pitcher and set aside for later use, leaving the other half in the blender. Fill the blender with ice and blend until it resembles a slurpy. Drink up and start mixing the other half.

drinks.name: Boswandeling (A walk in the woods)
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Triple sec
  • 5 dashes Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just add all ingredients and add quite a lot of Angostura and try to make sure that the Angostura is mixed through the drink.

drinks.name: Tequila Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Tequila (your choice)
  • 1/2 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: When the two ingredients are in the shot glass, take a folded paper towel and put over the top. Slam the shot glass on the table, bar, etc. Make sure the drink fizzes. Turn up and drink while its still fizzing.

drinks.name: Baby Guinness
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Kahlua, almost filling shot glass. Then, carefully pour Baileys, using wall of shot glass. This will give the 'Guinness' its 'head'.

drinks.name: Nelson special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz dry Gin (Tanqueray)
  • Fill 1/4 Cranberry juice
  • Fill with Tonic water (or club soda)
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all into any kind of glass, mix with small stick and add a slice of orange and a cherry in glass.

drinks.name: Rye & Pepper
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rye whiskey
  • 1/2 can Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1 to 2 oz. of Canadian Club or other whiskey into a glass with ice. Add 1/2 can Dr. Pepper. Stir.

drinks.name: Delilah
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin (Bombay Sapphire)
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add gin, cointrean and lemon juice to a shaker filled with ice shake hard (30 seconds) and serve up in a cocktail glass with lemon twist as garnish

drinks.name: Rum and Coke
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 8 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: For an extra kick, use Bacardi 151. If you want a lime taste, use Bacardi Limon.

drinks.name: G. T. O.
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in tin over ice. Strain into shot glasses and enjoy!!!!

drinks.name: Smurf-o-tonic
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • Fill with Tonic water
  • 1 Lime Wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the gin, blue curacao and the tonic water into a highball glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge. If you want, you can add the blue curacao after stiring the drink.

drinks.name: Jesus is Here
drinks.ingredients:
• 20 cl Schweppes Russchian
  • 19 cl Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka and then the russian. Stir gently. Drink.

drinks.name: Russian Qualude #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Coffee liqueur (Kaluha)
  • 1 oz Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • 1 oz Orange liqueur (Grand Marnier)
  • 1 oz Hazelnut liqueur (Frangelico)
  • 1 oz Vodka (Stoli)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer drink by pouring each shot slowly over the back side of a teaspoon held just above the liquid level.

drinks.name: The Italian Job
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 shots Vodka
  • 3 oz Cointreau
  • 5 oz Pineapple juice
  • Fill with Blackcurrant squash (can use orange or apple)
  • Top with fresh Cream (not needed)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Whisk with a fork, untill all mixed in. Add cream after mixing.

drinks.name: Texas Prairie Fire
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Tequila
  • Lime juice
  • 3-5 dashes Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 3/4 shot of Tequila in shot glass, top off with lime juice, splash in tabasco sauce, and shoot.

drinks.name: Citron my face
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1-1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 1 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice and strain

drinks.name: Elmer Fudpucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cans light Beer
  • 2 cans Sprite or Slice
  • 12 oz frozen Lemonade (Adams)
  • 12 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Beer, Soda, and frozen lemonade into a large pitcher. Then fill empty lemon aid container with vodka and add to mixture. Stir.

drinks.name: Peach Fuzz
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 6 oz frozen Limeade
  • 6 oz Vodka
  • 2 medium ripe Peach
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill blender 1/2 full with ice cubes. Add 6 oz. can of frozen limeade. Add 6 oz. vodka (use limeade can to measure). Add 2 ripe peaches (remove pit and slice). Whip it!

drinks.name: Geneva Convention
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Russian)
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/2 oz Everclear (190 proof)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill half a shaker with ice. Add the ingredients. Shake. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Alice in Wonderland
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 shot Grand Marnier
  • 1 shot Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix the three ingredients one to one to one

drinks.name: Flying Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Kahlua
  • 1/3 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer each ingredient starting with Kahlua, then Bailey's and finish with the Banana liqueur. If you have difficulty layering the shooter (shot) use a tea spoon held upside down and poor over slowly.

drinks.name: Blue Dog
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 5 oz Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine both while cold.

drinks.name: Columbia Gold
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Yukon Jack
  • 3/4 oz Strawberry liqueur
  • 4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend well with large scoop of ice.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Ass
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps (Peachtree)
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • Fill With Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients into a large strainer/mixer. Add a handful of ice. Shake for a few seconds. Strain into a mason jar....

drinks.name: Bushwacker #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Irish whiskey (Bushmill's)
  • 1 shot Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • 3-4 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: First place three or four ice cubes in a rock glass. The Bailey's is placed in the glass first otherwise the cream will curdle. Then the Bushmill's whiskey is added slowly and stirred until thoroughly mixed.

drinks.name: Root Canal
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 2 oz Root beer schnapps
  • Fill with Dr. Pepper or rootbeer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine 1/4 oz. peppermint schnapps with 2 oz. rootbeer schnapps. Fill with Dr.Pepper or rootbeer and stir. Garnish with a cherry over ice and serve.

drinks.name: Summer Mind Eraser
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 3 cl Peach schnapps
  • 3 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • Top with Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: First, fill the champagne flute with heaps of ice. Next, pour in your Schnapps and Midori. Now fill the flute to the top with Champagne. Let the drink settle for a minute (especially if you've been pouring behind a busy, bumpy nightclub!). Use a long bar straw to drink the shot from the bottom up (push the straw right to the bottom of the flute before starting), all at once! Very Important - Don't stop in the middle of the drink!

drinks.name: 501 Blue
drinks.ingredients:
• Blue Curacao
  • Blueberry schnapps
  • Vodka
  • Sour mix
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal amounts into a glass with ice.

drinks.name: Airhead
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour peach Schnapps into shot glass. Add chilled cranberry juice to fill.

drinks.name: Dolphin's Foam
drinks.ingredients:
• 50 ml PiÃ±a Colada
  • 50 ml Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake VERY,VERY,VERY well in a shaker with lots of ice. leave the ice in the shaker, not in the drink. can be served with a red cherry in it.

drinks.name: Coke and Drops
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 dl Coca-Cola
  • 7 drops Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a glass, pour the Coke in the glass, then you take 7 drops of lemon juice. Granish with a lemon slice on the rim of the glass.

drinks.name: Walk Me Down
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the shots, 1/2 shots for the ladies. Over ice is best.Mix well.

drinks.name: Flying Squadron
drinks.ingredients:
• 7 cubes Ice
  • 4 oz Jack Daniels
  • 12 oz Pepsi Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: First, add some ice. Then, pour in your Jack Daniels. Finally add Pepsi and slosh around to mix. Enjoy your victory drink.

drinks.name: I.V. (Italian Valium)
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz Amaretto
  • 1/3 oz Gin (Tanqueray)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix thoroughly.

drinks.name: Juicy Lucy #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Light rum
  • 1/2 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 splash Dark rum
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all above, pour over ice, and enjoy!!!

drinks.name: Separator
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Brandy or cognac
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill dbl rocks glass with ice, add brandy, Kahlua,and milk. Shake well , return to glass.

drinks.name: Ruby Tuesday
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 5 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 splashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.

drinks.name: Purple Hooter Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 dash Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass Enjoy!

drinks.name: Peppermint Pattie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz White Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill glass with ice pour creme de cacao and the creme de menthe over ice. stir and enjoy. Is best after dinner but can be enjoyed anytime.

drinks.name: Sweet Tart - Loyalist Rez
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Blue Curacao
  • 4 oz Banana liqueur
  • 2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 2/3 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/3 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix all ingrediants together in container. poor into shot glass.

drinks.name: Arctic Mouthwash
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz blue Maui
  • 5 oz Mountain Dew
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender on high until ice is finely crushed. It should be of a slushy consistency. Pour immediately and serve.

drinks.name: No Problem!
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Fruit juice of your choice
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Coconut rum
  • 3/4 oz Creme de Banane
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and pour

drinks.name: Brain Fart
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Everclear
  • 1 fifth Smirnoff red label Vodka
  • 2 L Mountain Dew
  • 2 L Surge or sundrop
  • 1 small bottle Lemon juice
  • 1 pint Rum (Bacardi)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together. Slowly and gently. Works best if ice is added to punch bowl and soda's are very cold.

drinks.name: Black Martini #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: combine in shaker. shake vigorously. strain into cocktail glass

drinks.name: Royal Bitch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Frangelico
  • 1 part Crown Royal
drinks.mixinginstructions: Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.

drinks.name: Psycho
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 cl Galliano
  • 8 cl Orange juice
  • 8 cl Pineapple juice
  • 2 cl Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into glass Decorate with slice of Orange, Pineapple and a red Cocktial cherry.

drinks.name: Purple Motherfucker #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into mixing cup 1/4 full ice. Stir then pour into shot glasses.

drinks.name: Iceberg in Radioactive water #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 shots Banana liqueur
  • 1 scoop Ice-cream
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • 1 shot Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Ice-cream last. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Lina
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Gin
  • 1/3 Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/3 Sprite
  • 2 slices Lemon
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything together in a hightumbler glass. Then drink it and get a 'ragg'! (Swedish for Pickin up babes)

drinks.name: Big Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • Fill with Apple juice
  • 1 tsp Green Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka into a collins glass over three or four ice cubes and fill with apple juice. Pour creme de menthe, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Small Bomb #2
drinks.ingredients:
• Amaretto
  • 2 shots Melon liqueur
  • 2 shots Everclear (190 proof)
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Begin by filling the glass halfway with Amaretto, add shots of melon, add shots of everclear, add rest of glass with pineapple juice, stir, then pour into glass with ice.

drinks.name: Nan's special
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Vodka
  • 30 ml 7-Up or similar drink
  • 60 ml Soda water
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • Dash of Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Vodka, 7-up & Soda in that order. Add lemon juice. Add salt gradually until the sweet taste of 7-up just disappears.

drinks.name: Wet Snatch
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 parts chopped Ice
  • 3 parts Tequila
  • 1 part Vanilla syrup
  • 2 parts Coconut milk
  • 1 part blue Raspberry juice
  • 2 parts Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add blue raspberry to ice, add vanilla, pinapple, and coconut, then blend. Add tequila, blend again. Whipped cream on top optional.

drinks.name: Purple Shroud
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 3/4 oz Sloe gin
  • 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a mixing glass, shake, add more Sloe Gin or Blue Curacao to achieve the desired hue of purple. Strain into an old fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Hairball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 glass hard Cider (Woodpecker)
  • 1/3 glass Guinness stout
  • 1 oz Irish whiskey (Bushmill's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill 1/3 of the collins glass with cider, then float the Guinness ontop, to bring the volume to 2/3 full. Pour Bushmill's in a separate shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the collins glass and slam it!

drinks.name: Duck Shit Inn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in cordial glass.

drinks.name: Citrus Coke
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bacardi Limon
  • 2 parts Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour half of coke in a glass. Then add Bacardi and top it off with the remaining coke. Stir and drink up!

drinks.name: Dakota
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bourbon (Jim Beam)
  • 1 1/2 oz Tequila (Cuervo)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in a double shot glass and enjoy.

drinks.name: Snow Blinder
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 glass Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vidka in blender and add ice crem. Blend. Top with lemonade.

drinks.name: Skylab Fallout
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Everclear
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put plenty of ice in glass pour rum and everclear first refill with ice - put your tequila, gin, vodka and your blue curraco in. put your pinapple juice in and shake serve with a lemon slice and cherry

drinks.name: Ethiopian Camel Basher
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Orange juice
  • Add 1 part Vodka
  • Add 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Grenadine will sink to the bottom of the glass. The dash should be just enough to give a thin layer. Mix thoroghly. The correct mix will give a drink which is between pink & orange in color, but exactly NOT one or the other.

drinks.name: Dirty Mexican Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Lemonade
  • 4 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add vodka to lemaonade, sprite goes in last. Stir.

drinks.name: Hot Apple Pie #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 shot Goldschlager
  • 1 dash Cinnamon (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a shot glass half full with the Bailey's and the rest of the way with the Goldschlager. Mix with toothpick. Then sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on the top and light it with a match (it may take a couple of tries to get it to stay lit). Let it burn for a few seconds and gently blow out the flame being careful not to splash the drink out of the glass. Then, drink!

drinks.name: Skull
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Coffee liqueur (kahlua)
  • 1/3 shot Irish cream (bailey's)
  • 1/3 shot Bourbon (Old Grandad)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingrediants.

drinks.name: Bend Me Over
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice if desired.

drinks.name: Apple Slut
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Sour Apple Pucker
  • 1 shot Citrus vodka
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour shots in glass and add Sprite to your taste.

drinks.name: Fulminator
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 bottle Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's green label)
  • 1 bottle Smirnoff Vodka
  • 2 bottles Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 1/2 gal fresh squeezed Orange juice
  • 1 bag Lemon
  • 1/2 kg Sugar
  • 3 bottles Cachaca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Cut lemons into wedges and mix into large container.

drinks.name: Scotty Boy
drinks.ingredients:
• Absolut Kurant
  • Fill with Sour mix
  • splash Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a lot of kurant into ice filled glass. Fill with sour mix. Shake, always shake and add a splash of soda. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Lemon Lightning
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Everclear
  • 1 part Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add equal parts of Everclear and lemon juice to a shot glass. Place the shot into the freezer for 30 minutes to completely chill it. Drink it ice cold.

drinks.name: The Party Girl
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Raspberry liqueur (Chambord)
  • 1 part Absolut Kurant
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker, mix all ingredients, shake well. Serve over ice, garnish with a lime wedge (optional)

drinks.name: The Three Wise Men
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/3 shot Goldschlager
  • 1/3 shot Peppermint schnapps (Rumple Minze)
drinks.mixinginstructions: My experience shows that pouring in any order has no bearing on the overall taste of the drink.

drinks.name: Death of a Virgin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • Orange juice
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour first three ingredients. Then pour orange juice until cup is little more than half filled. Then fill the rest of the way with 7-up and stir until well mixed.

drinks.name: Dirtiest Ernie
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 2/3 oz Everclear
  • 2/3 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the three ingredients in a shot glass and slam

drinks.name: Gangbuster Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash 7-Up
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass.

drinks.name: Pixie Stick
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin, then midori, then 7-up (to fill) over ice in a Tom Collins glass. Shake in cocktail shaker, add straw, cherry. Tastes like candy.

drinks.name: Red Lion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 part dry Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1/3 part Grand Marnier
  • 1/6 part Orange juice
  • 1/6 part Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain. Before serving, moisten the edge of the highball glass and dip in castor sugar.

drinks.name: Black Orchid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Dark rum
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve

drinks.name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/5 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/5 shot Goldschlager
  • 1/5 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/5 shot Kahlua
  • 1/5 shot Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Equal parts. All ingredients are measured equally in no particular order.

drinks.name: Bjorns Moscow Mule
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Vodka
  • 3 cl Lemon juice
  • Fill with Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix lemonjuice with vodka, fill with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Field of Green
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 glass 7-Up (optional)
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Sloe Gin and Amaretto into a glass. Fill the Glass 1/2 way with 7-up (Optional), and the other 1/2 with Orange Juice

drinks.name: Raspberry Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Raspberry vodka (Stoli)
  • 4 oz Lemon-lime soda
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinks.name: Amaretto Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 jigger Triple sec
  • 3 shots Amaretto
  • 1/2 cup Cider
  • Add 1/2 cup Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients in bartender's mixer quickly, just 5 shakes. Strain out ice, serve in glass immediately with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Crantini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Vermouth
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice
  • Ice cubes
  • Cranberries (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all the ingredients in a martini shaker with ice. Then shake,pour into martini glass and add a few cranberries to complete the drink.(Soak the cranberries in vodka first)

drinks.name: Jamaican Screw
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Malibu rum
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix rum and orange juice together (stirring) then pour over ice.

drinks.name: Sex on my face
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • splash Cranberry juice
  • splash Pineapple juice
  • splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in tall glass with ice.

drinks.name: Pumpkin Eater
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Orange Curacao (Bols)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec (Bols)
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice and ingredients into blender and blend well. Serve in a house glass and garnish with a orange wedge and cherry.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 slice Peach (fresh is best)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Vodka and Schnapps over lots of ice. Stir and pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with fresh slice of peach.

drinks.name: Apple Judy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with cracked ice. Serve without garnish in a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bleeding Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Vodka
  • 1 bottle Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 2 cans Cranberry juice (frozen or bottled)
  • 1 Pineapple
  • 1 Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Cut the pineapple into small chunks and soak them in the vodka and rum for 20-30 minutes. Add the rest of the ingredients and you're all good.

drinks.name: Love Potion #159
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into shaker with ice, shake and serve on the rocks.

drinks.name: Wet Crotch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into shaker with ice, shake and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Deep-7
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 1/2 oz Coconut rum
  • 6 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in amaretto and rum on the rocks then add 7-up. stir and serve

drinks.name: Halfway Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Blackberry schnapps (Blackhaus)
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 2 dashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine with ice. Strain. serve in hollowed out pineapple.

drinks.name: Bitches Tit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 8 oz Cream or milk
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the chamborde into a shaker, add cream or milk and shake well. Pour into an Irish Cream mug filled with ice. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Bloody Smurf
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blueberry schnapps
  • 8 oz Cranberry juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour schnapps into glass filled with ice. Add cranberry juice and stir.

drinks.name: JÃ¤germonster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 shot Grenadine
  • 5 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with plenty of ice and strain.

drinks.name: Flamming Gorrilla Titties
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the 1 oz of Kahlua and then add the 1 oz of Bacardi 151 rum to the shot glass. Place a small sipping straw in the mixture and then light on fire. The straw is so you do not burn your eyebrows off. Once lit suck the shot through the straw till empty. Tastes like chocolate milk. I have made this drink quite often at parties and it goes over very well with everyone. Try it a few times it does take a little practice to get it right.

drinks.name: Soda Cracker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 shot Frangelico
  • 1 glass Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill old fashioned glass with ice,add alcohol and enjoy!

drinks.name: Bacardi Stinger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Amaretto
  • 1/4 Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Amaretto and rum, fill with coke, and stir.

drinks.name: BearCat Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 shot Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put both in shot glass, mix, and down.

drinks.name: Dead Lizard
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • Raspberry cordial to taste
  • Coca-Cola to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka into glass. Add cordial until colour becomes light red. Add coke until definite colour change occurs. Drink.

drinks.name: Jilly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • Tonic water
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a rocks glass, pour 1 oz. vodka over ice. Fill 3/4 with tonic. Add a splash of cranberry juice, then squeeze the lime wedge in.

drinks.name: The Bozek
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 3 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/4 cup Lime juice
  • 1/2 cup Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingrediants in following order: ice, vodka, lime, and then pineapple. Stir vigurously.

drinks.name: Killer Sniff
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Sambuca
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: First, pour the Blue curacoa in the glass followed by the Sambucca. Then light this mixture. Let it burn for a few seconds and then put your hand on top of the glass (keep it on the glass) as soon as flames go out, bring the glass to your nose and sniff the alcohol. Then drink it. After this: relight the glass and sniff again. cheers!

drinks.name: Phreaker Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 fifth Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 pint Triple sec
  • 2 pint Pineapple juice
  • 1 pint Lemon juice
  • 1/2 fifth Water
  • 1 1/2 cup Sugar
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a fifth bottle half vodka, half water.Leaving enough water out to add the egg white.Shake well until egg is thoroughly mixed. Add into punch bowl with the Triple Sec,pineapple juice, and lemon juice.Add sugar. (more or less for taste).

drinks.name: Cherry Comfort
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort 100 proof
  • 4 oz Cherry Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour about 4 oz of your favorite Cherry Cola into a cup. Add about 1 shot (1 oz) of Southern Comfort 100 (or 2 depending on how your college football team is doing). Ice is optional.

drinks.name: Fruity Pebbles
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • Orange juice
  • Strawberry Daiquiri mix
  • Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the ingredients to taste in any kind of container.

drinks.name: Smartie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Grape schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put 1/2 oz. of Grape Schnapps, and 1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Brown Hen
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 tsp Angostura bitters
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, then vodka, then bitters. Stir.

drinks.name: Magic Dew
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 part blue Maui
  • 1/2 part Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix 1/2 part Blue Maui with 1/2 part Mountain Dew to taste.

drinks.name: Hilde's Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 4 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • 10-12 cl Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a blender. Fill it with ice. Pour in the ingrediences. And blend it all together. Serve in a hurricane glass with a piece of orange on the glass.

drinks.name: Blonde's Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Rum
  • 10 cl Red wine (sweet)
  • 15 cl Coca-Cola
  • Some Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in the glass. Serve cool!

drinks.name: June Bug
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Midori, Malibu Rum, and Pineapple Juice equally over ice. Add Banana liqueur if desired but it's better without it.

drinks.name: The Mad Hungarian
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • Fill with Root beer (Mug or A & W)
drinks.mixinginstructions: An easy mix of rum and root beer, on the rocks, or without. The rum is a definite 2 shot minimum, as that it blends seamlessly with the root beer. The Captains can be substituted with Malibu rum for a more island flare.

drinks.name: Rock-and-Rye Toddy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rock and rye
  • 2 dashes Angostura bitters
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • 3 oz boiling Water
  • 1 stick Cinnamon
  • grated Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rock and rye and bitters into coffee mug. Add lemon slice. Add boiling water and cinnamon stick. Stir. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg.

drinks.name: Frisky Steve
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • 3 oz Champagne
  • 6 oz Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with ice. Add vodka to prefered level. Next add wanted amount of Champagne and finish off the glass with ginger ale. Mix and drink.

drinks.name: Mir
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Jack Daniels (whiskey)
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both shots over rocks into a highball glass. Fill with coke, or soda of your choice.

drinks.name: Russian seven
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • Garnish with Lime peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a tall glass with ice add 1.5 oz of vodka, fill to top with seven-up. Garnish with lime peel.

drinks.name: Trashcan Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Fruit punch
  • 2 parts Everclear
  • 1 part Fruit
drinks.mixinginstructions: Slice the fruit. I recommend strawberries, oranges, lemons, and limes. Then mix the punch and everclear together in a a CLEAN trashcan with ice. Hawaiin punch is my preference, but you can use any sort of fruit punch. Make sure you use ice and have a blast.

drinks.name: Green K
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 4 cl White rum
  • 2 cl Black rum
  • 1 cl Creme de Cassis
  • 1 cl Blue Curacao
  • 2 cl Cointreau
  • 26 cl Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with Ice. Fill in 4 glasses. Serve with sugar crusta.

drinks.name: Southern Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice Cubes
  • 2 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 3 oz Peachtree schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill an Old Fashioned Glass half full with ice cubes. Next pour the Southern comfort in, than add the schnapps, being carefull not to mix the drinks too much.

drinks.name: ODWITS
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Mezcal
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • Dash Galliano
  • Top Up Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Tequila, vodka and southern comfort. Add a few rocks of ice and top up with fresh orange juice. Add just a dash of Galliano and stir. Serve with a large slice of lemon.

drinks.name: True Alabama Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in a bowl.

drinks.name: Monkey C*m
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/4 shot Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass about 3/4 full with Bailey's Irish Cream. Perfection is not necessary with this drink. Fill rest of way with Butterscotch Schnapps.

drinks.name: Tiki Torch
drinks.ingredients:
• Tang
  • Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass halfway with Tang. Add Vodka until you can begin to taste the Vodka. Mix drink to taste.

drinks.name: Limonaide
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bacardi Limon
  • 1 part Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a tall or short glass fill with ice. Then mix the bacardi and the lemonade in an equal 50-50 share.

drinks.name: Jogeir
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Absolut Citron
  • 1 cl Lime vodka (Hammer)
  • 1 cl Orange juice
  • 1 cl Galliano
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix lime vodka, absolut citron and juice together and put it in a shot glas, then add galliano right before serving. Shoot it.

drinks.name: Golddigger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in shot glass,and pray for the best.

drinks.name: Kahlua #6
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cups boiling Water
  • 4 cups Sugar
  • 1 Vanilla bean, whole
  • 2 oz instant Coffee
  • 1 fifth Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix 3 cups water with 4 cups sugar, bring to boil and boil for 20 minutes. Set aside, add 1 whole vanilla bean split. Let mixture cool. Add 2 oz instant coffee to 1 cup boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Set aside & cool. When above are cool (important) put into a half gallon container and add the vodka. Let age for at least 3 weeks.

drinks.name: Incredible Hulk
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour ingredients over ice in normal glass

drinks.name: Flaming Citrus Action
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bacardi Limon
  • 1 part tropical Maui
  • 2 parts Orange juice
  • 1 drop Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice in an ordinary glass

drinks.name: Electric Jam
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Sour mix
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: The instructions were given in order of adding.

drinks.name: Krypto Kami
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice. Strain into a higball glass.

drinks.name: Flatliner
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Sambuca
  • 1 shot Gold tequila
  • 3 dashes Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Sayer the tequila over sambuca Add tabasco.

drinks.name: Moninger's Madness
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Scotch
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 2 parts Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient into the glass (the bigger the better) and stir it up. You can pour it over ice, too. You can vary the cranberry juice a little bit.

drinks.name: Flying Masturbator
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 2 parts Orange juice
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka and amaretto into the cup first. Then, add OJ until the cup is about half full and add cranberry juice until the glass is about 3/4 full. Add ice to fill the cup, then shake the drink vigorously for a few seconds. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Blue Edisonian
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Campari
  • 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients into a shaker filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Emerald Isle #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 2 parts Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 parts Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir and add some ice and enjoy!

drinks.name: Sex Appeal
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz White rum
  • 1/2 oz Coconut rum
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Fill With Sour mix
  • Add Splash Lemonade
  • Garnish Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix two rums, melon, peach and blue curacao in a mixing tin with the sour mix. Pour into a collins glass with ice and add a dash of lemonade. Garnish with lemon squeeze.

drinks.name: Panty Dropper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Sloe gin
  • Fill Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill tall glass with ice: add 1 oz Kahlua: add 1 oz Sloe Gin: fill glass to top with half and half

drinks.name: Adios Mother
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz White rum
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 6 oz Sour mix
  • 6 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Hurricane glass with ice: add 1 oz Vodka: add 1 oz Gin: add 1 oz White Rum: add 1 oz Blue Curacao: Fill glass with equal parts sour mix and Seven Up: Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Strawberry Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2-2 oz Gin or vodka
  • 1 tsp Dry Vermouth
  • 1 tsp Grenadine (Rose's)
  • Sugar
  • Strawberries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rub rim of chilled martini glass with a cut strawberry. Dip rim into a bowl of sugar until evenly coated. Pour Gin/Vodka, vermouth, and grenadine into a mixing glass with plenty of ice, and stir briskly. Strain into martini glass and drop in a strawberry.

drinks.name: Flaming Cornholio
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 glass Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's)
  • 1/2 glass Orange juice
  • 1 oz Firewater
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the o.j. and J.D. in a beer mug and drop the shot glass of Firewater in it.

drinks.name: Nay-Nay Strohmeyer
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Cranberry juice
  • 3 parts Sprite
  • 2 parts Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour all three in a big container. Order is not important.

drinks.name: Rubbermeister
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Cherry Cola
  • 1 part JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the Coke in the glass first, then pour the Jager. It's as simple as that.

drinks.name: Mahwah Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Jim Beam Bourbon
  • 1/2 shot Southern Comfort
  • Fill With Iced tea
  • Add 2 Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the whiskey and SoCo in your glass. Pour in some Iced Tea of any variety. Then add the ice cubes. Adjust the dosages of alcohol if your glass differs in size or you've had a bad day.

drinks.name: Bernardete
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Peach liqueur
  • 1 shot Lime liqueur (Rivas)
  • Fill with Peach juice
  • 3-4 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour peach and lime liqueurs over 3-4 ice cubes in a tall glass. Fill with peach juice.

drinks.name: Black Samurai
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sake
  • 1/2 oz Soy sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the one oz. of Sake to a shot glass, followed by the 1/2 oz. of Soy Sauce...Let settle for 30sec...

drinks.name: Long Beach Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Light rum
  • 1 shot Gin
  • 1 shot Tequila
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • Few cube Ice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 wedge Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a tall glass, pour shots over ice and top off with cranberry juice and lemon wedge (squeeze if you like). Give the drink a little shake (if you like) and drink up!

drinks.name: Black Widow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Black Sambuca (Opal Nera)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both over ice & shake. Strain into a martini glass and add a lemon twist for garnish.

drinks.name: Rum Punch #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 tblsp Honey
  • 2 tblsp warm Water
  • Juice of 4 Lemon, large
  • 1/2 pint White rum
  • 5 tblsp Mint leaves, roughly chopped or torn
  • 1 bag Tea (Lipton)
  • 2 pint boiling Water
  • 1 pint dry Ginger ale
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve honey in warm water. Put liquid honey, lemon juice and rum together in tall jug. Add mint leaves and leave to stand while brewing tea. Pour boiling water in a jug and steeped tea bag for 5 minutes. Remove tea bag and chill tea. Pour chilled tea and dry ginger ale into rum mixture. Stir well. To serve: pour over one ice cube in each glass.

drinks.name: Apple Pie Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• Approx 2 shots Apple juice
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 can Whipped cream
  • 1 dash Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: This drink requires at least 2 people. Drinker sits in a chair, head back, mouth open. Person 2 pours the apple juice, then the vodka in the drinker's mouth (drinker must be VERY careful to keep his/her throat closed). Then person 2 sprays some in whipped cream and tops with a SMALL amount of cinnamon (too much will make drinker sneeze and possible other not-so-fun things). Drinker sits up, swishes all ingredients together and swallows.

drinks.name: H2O
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Fresca
  • 2 oz Pineapple
  • 2 oz Orange
  • 3 oz Lemonade
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in vodka, pineapple, orange, lemonade, and fresca - MIX!!

drinks.name: Pina Colada #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Malibu rum
  • 2 parts Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Cream or milk
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add some crumbled ice, mix it well and pour it into a tall glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh pineapple.

drinks.name: Boomerang Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 shot Yukon Jack
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a shot glass 1/2 way with the yukon jack. top it off with the JÃ¤germeister.

drinks.name: Long Beach Ice Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
  • Splash of 7-Up
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: garnish with fresh lime cuts.

drinks.name: Red Velvet
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Gin
  • 1 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 7 cl Sprite
  • 1 cl Lime juice
  • 1/2 cl Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build. Top with grenadine. Lime boat garnish.

drinks.name: Carl Johan
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 1 cl Lime juice (Monin)
  • Fill with 7 cl Schweppes Russchian
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix. Top with Schweppes. Garnish with lime slice.

drinks.name: Mother Pucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Sour Apple Pucker
  • 1 bottle 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in appropriate amounts in mixing container to your liking. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Bald Pussy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Melon liqueur
  • 1 shot Lime vodka
  • 1 shot Absolut Vodka
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • 1 1/2 shot Blueberry schnapps
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start at the top and venture your way to the bottom. Pour over ice and shake it on home! Pour in a highball glass and give 2 or 3 big gulps.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Blue Gobbler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 1 part Maui
  • 1 part Wild Turkey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start at top and work your way down.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Bullet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 can Beer (Coors light)
  • 2 1/2 shots Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix it and drink it!

drinks.name: Power Drill
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 splash Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill equal parts of orange juice and vodka almost to the top of a shot glass. splash some beer into the glass to fill the glass.

drinks.name: Red Baron #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Crown Royal
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake over ice, and pour!

drinks.name: Nuclear Rainbow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: In order layered over spoon.

drinks.name: Pocima
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cans Beer
  • 1 L Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 gal Orange juice
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the six beer cans, the liter of Vodka and the two gallons of orange juice along with the ice cubes in to the punch bowl. Stir, and serve cold.

drinks.name: Calimocho Torreon Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 glass Red wine
  • 1/2 glass Coca-Cola
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the highball glass with ice, then half fill it with red wine, and half fill it with coca-cola. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Booda's Black Brew
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 3/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
  • Fill with Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Hurricane Glass Fill with Ice 1oz. Malibu Rum or Parrots Bay Coocnut Rum 3/4oz. Blue Curacao 3/4oz. Chambord 1/2oz. Grenadine Fill with Cranberry Top and Shake

drinks.name: Upper Cut
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Irish whiskey
  • 4 cl Espresso
  • 4 cl Coffee
  • 4 tsp Brown sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just like an irish coffey. Wait till it has cooled a bit. Drink all in one move.

drinks.name: Lemon Twister
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Absolut Citron
  • Fill with Lemonade
  • Garnish with Lemon slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake together, stirring bruises the vodka.

drinks.name: Bram Stoker's Dracula
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Peppar
  • 1 1/2 oz Tabasco sauce
  • 1 pinch Black pepper (float on top)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together in a double shot glass (alcohol first!) then float the pepper on top.

drinks.name: Absolut Mixer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Absolut Peppar
  • 1 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake together over ice, strain into highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry.

drinks.name: Zombie #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Noyaux
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Strain ingredients into collins glass filled with ice. Top with 151-proof Rum.

drinks.name: Grumpy Old Man
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 2 oz Bourbon (Old Grand Dad)
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pack old-fashioned or rocks glass with ice. Add Old Grand Dad, add Lime Juice, top with Ginger Ale. Serve with sip stick, no garnish.

drinks.name: Grumpier Old Man
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 2 oz Bourbon (Old Grand Dad)
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pack old-fashioned or rocks glass with ice. Add Old Grand Dad (high proof bourbon, similar to Wild Turkey), add Lime Juice, top with Sour Mix. Serve with sip stick, no garnish.

drinks.name: Danini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 1 shot Lime juice cordial
  • Top with Coca-Cola
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: First two shots of Vodka, then the lime juice. Add ice. Top up the glass with Coke.

drinks.name: The Phantom
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Licor 43
  • 3 cl Absolut Vodka
  • Milk
  • Many cube Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a longdrink glass and fill it with ice. Mix Licor 43 and Absolut vodka, fill up with milk. In the summer you can mix the drink with icecream and make a very nice milkshake.

drinks.name: Milk Shake 43
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Licor 43
  • 4 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Licor 43 over ice, shake and strain into glass. Vary ingredients to taste.

drinks.name: Richards family
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 4 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl Whiskey
  • 30 cl Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a big beer-glass, pour the spirits into it, then fill it up with hot coffee.

drinks.name: Malibu Massage
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Sprite
  • 1 oz Milk
  • 1/3 oz Coconut syrup
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Pour into an old fashion glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

drinks.name: UFO
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 glass Genever
  • 2/3 glass Bitter lemon
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: You pour the Genever in a glass fill it up with bitter lemon add some ice cubes and you are ready.

drinks.name: Nummer 10
drinks.ingredients:
• Aprox 6 cl Raspberry vodka
  • 3-5 drops Kahlua
  • Fill with Schweppes Russchian
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass up to 1/3 with raspberry vodka. Scatter a few drops of KalhÃºa into the raspberry vodka and mix it. Be careful, it?s important not to get to much KalhÃºa. Fill up the glass with Schweppes Russchian and the Nummer 10Â© is complete. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Flaming Kevin
drinks.ingredients:
• 20 oz Diet Pepsi Cola
  • 1 oz Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix and stir

drinks.name: Long Iver Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/4 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/4 oz Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1/4 oz Tequila
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • Sour mix
  • Coca-Cola
  • 1 wedge Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquor over ice. Fill 3/4 full with sour mix. Shake. Top with cola and add lemmon wedge.

drinks.name: Hawiian Tidal Wave
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Rum (Malibu)
  • 1/2 oz Peachtree schnapps (Dekuyper)
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao (Dekuyper)
  • 3 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash Lemon-lime soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend Malibu, peach schnapps, blue curacao, and sweet and sour. Pour into ice filled glass. Top off with lemon-lime soda.

drinks.name: Aftershock
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Drambuie
  • 5 cl Malibu rum
  • 5 cl Cherry brandy
  • 10 cl Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the ingredients into the glass and stir.

drinks.name: Fireball #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Sambuca
  • 1 part Tequila
  • 5-10 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add 1 part tequila to the shot glass. Then add the sambuca and a few drops of tabasco sauce. Instead of tabasco sauce you can add 2 to 3 coffee beans instead (try one of each and see what you like better). Pour some sambuca all over the glass and light it on fire. Let it burn for approx. 10 to 20 seconds. You can now leave it burn and sip through straw or blow out (carefully) and take it down like a normal shot. Don't forget to eat the beans. Have fun!

drinks.name: Snakebite #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's)
  • 1 part Tequila
  • 5-10 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 1 part Jack Daniels whiskey and 1 part tequila to your shot glass. Then add a few(5 to 10) drops of tabasco sauce. Take it down like a shot.

drinks.name: Boston Burn-out
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Root beer schnapps (or liquer)
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 shot Butterscotch schnapps (or liquer)
  • 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • Top off with 4 shots Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • 4 to 6 drops Tabasco sauce (Tobasco)
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a LARGE shot glass (or small juice glass), add Rootbeer Schnapps, Amaretto, Butterscotch Schnapps and Bacardi 151 dark. Top off with Bailey's Irish Cream. Add 4 to 6 drops (or more for the daring) of Tabasco on top. Slam, do not sip!

drinks.name: The Player
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 shots Tequila
  • 1/2 glass Orange juice
  • 1/4 glass strawberry Daiquiri mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with cold, preferrably frosted beer mug. Fill with 4 shots of Tequila, and pour orange juice in. Next add strawberry daiquiri mix on top. Wait two minutes and always serve cold, with ice if necessary.

drinks.name: North Dakota Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Wild Turkey
  • 1 shot Whiskey (Black Velvet)
  • 1 shot Canadian whisky
  • 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 shot Jack Daniels
  • Fill with 1 Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a glass that this will fit in. add one at a time.

drinks.name: Matisse
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Orange vodka (Stoli)
  • Orange juice
  • Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Twist of Lime peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill glass. Shake Stoli Oranj over ice. Glaze glass with Chambord. Pour Stoli and garnish with twist of lime.

drinks.name: Captains Saddle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Root beer schnapps
  • 1 part Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix rootbeer schnaps with spiced rum and chill with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass and enjoy

drinks.name: Dirty Martini #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 splash Olive juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use mixing glass with ice pour gin and splash of olive juice from the jar or fruit tray. Shake or stir does not matter. Strain into Martini glass. Garnish with at least 3 olives.

drinks.name: Casey Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Rum
  • 12 oz Black Cherry Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and Drink. Slam and Jam.

drinks.name: Dumbfuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Aftershock
  • 1/2 oz Canadian whisky
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put in shot glass and stir

drinks.name: Pure Exstacy
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3 oz Kahlua
  • 3 oz Amaretto
  • 6 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • handful Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Blender to the top with Ice cubes. Add remaining ingredients. Blend until ice is crushed adding more until texture is that of a milkshake. Serve as many as you can, then make more.

drinks.name: Bailey's Cup of Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Coffee (black)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the hot coffee with Bailey's. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Dew
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Whiskey
  • 10 oz Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: You mix the two ingredients and you have your drink!

drinks.name: Strawberry Mojito
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 fresh Strawberries
  • 2 Mint sprigs
  • 3 wedges Lime
  • 2 cl Creme de Fraise des Bois (Cartron)
  • 5 cl Rum (Havana Club 3 year old)
  • 1 splash Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Muddle strawberries, mint, lime and Creme de Fraise des Boise hard in a shaker tin. Add Havana Club 3-year Old rum and fill shaker with ice. Shake well. Double strain (through sieve) into Collins Glass filled with cracked ice. Top with a splash of soda water and garnish with spring of mint.

drinks.name: Nickler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot cheap Brandy
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 1 tsp instant Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a tall shot glass with the cheapest brandy that you can find. Take your round slice of lemon and place it over the top of the pony glass. Pour sugar over one half of the lemon leaving the other half bare. Pour instant coffee over the other half of the lemon (next to the sugar). Fold the lemon slice in half and put in mouth biting off the rind. Chew and swallow the lemon combination and chase immediately with the brandy in the shot glass.

drinks.name: Red Headed Slut
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in shot glass. Shoot.

drinks.name: Chocolate Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1 1/4 oz Creme de Cacao
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Glass with ice. Add Creme de Banane to glass. Add Creme de Cacao to glass. Fill glass with milk.

drinks.name: Weekend On The Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Canadian whisky (Crown Royal)
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Sweet and sour mix
  • 1/4 oz Apple schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Crown Royal, apple & peach schnapps, and sweet and sour mix with ice cubes in shaker and shake till well blended. Strain into a shot glass. One serving.

drinks.name: Bavarian Alps
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blackberry schnapps (Black Haus)
  • 1 oz Chocolate liqueur
  • 1 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake together all ingrediants and serve in a frosted glass.

drinks.name: Coffee 43
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Licor 43
  • Fill with Coffee
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put liquer and coffee into mug. Pour cream gently over the coffee, don't let them mix.

drinks.name: Canadian Rum Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Lemon juice
  • 2 parts Sugar
  • 3 parts Rum
  • 4 parts Water or lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Bring water to a boil, then add sugar. stir until sugar is dissolved. remove from heat and add rum and lemon juice. Serve with Ice.

drinks.name: Sparkplug
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 shot Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Bacardi 151 in the shot glass first, then pour Rumplminze on top, do not mix.

drinks.name: Russian Shamrock
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 shot Green Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka into the shot glass and add the creme de menthe on top. Stir lightly with a swizle stick to give the shot a swirl look.

drinks.name: Golden Blizzard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 cup Eggnog
  • 2 shots Goldschlager
  • 2 shots Peppermint schnapps (100 proof)
drinks.mixinginstructions: add the shots of goldschlager and Peppermint Schnapps, then fill jar with eggnog

drinks.name: Rum Snapp
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/3 oz Kiwi-Strawberry Snapple
  • 1/3 oz Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shaken, not stirred!

drinks.name: Green Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Vodka
  • 1/2 Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix two together. Serve over ice.

drinks.name: Banana Slush Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 ripe Banana
  • 3 1/2 cups Water
  • 1 small can Orange juice
  • 1 small can frozen Lemonade
  • 1 package Tropical Punch Kool-Aid
  • 1 large can Pineapple juice
  • 2 qt Ginger ale or 7-Up
  • 1 cup Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: In blender, blend bananas and 2 cups water. Set aside. In large bowl, put remaining water, kool-aid, sugar and fruit juices (all except for the ginger ale). Freeze at least 24 hours. Take out to thaw when you will be ready to drink it in 1 to 3 hours. Pour ginger ale in and chip away until it's slushy.

drinks.name: Citrus Surprise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bacardi Limon
  • 3 parts Squirt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir in glass.

drinks.name: Canecutter
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 30 ml Dark rum (Bundaberg)
  • 30 ml Kahlua
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ice first, then add Bundaberg Rum, Kalua and fill with Coca Cola.

drinks.name: Jump Starter
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Dark rum
  • Fill with Cola (Jolt cola)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in chilled glass.

drinks.name: Crimson Death
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 30 ml Vodka
  • 30 ml Raspberry syrup (Cottees raspberry cordial prefered)
  • Fill with Cola (Jolt Cola)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka over ice, then add raspberry and fill with Jolt cola.

drinks.name: Crimson Coma
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 30 ml Vodka
  • 30 ml Raspberry syrup (Cottees raspberry cordial)
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka over ice, then add raspberry and fill with Coca Cola.

drinks.name: Gunfire
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup strong black Tea
  • 1 shot Dark rum (Bundaberg)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour one cup of strong black tea, add rum and stir.

drinks.name: Rocket Fuel #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 bottles Champagne
  • 4 L White wine
  • 1 bottle Vodka
  • 1 bottle Gin
  • 1 L Pineapple juice
  • 2 L Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all together in a 10 litre punch bowl.

drinks.name: Black Forest
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Creme de Cacao
  • 30 ml Cherry liqueur
  • 30 ml Kirschwasser
  • 30 ml Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients together and pour into glass. Add a little more cream as a floater, then add a cherry.

drinks.name: Tequila Body Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 pinch Salt
  • 1 shot Tequila
  • 1/4 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put salt on some part of somebody else's body. Hold shot glass in left hand and lemon in right hand. Lick salt, slam the tequila, then suck lemon.

drinks.name: Shrub
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 pint Orange juice
  • Juice and peel of 2-3 Lemon
  • 2 qt Rum
  • 2 lb Sugar
  • 1 qt Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Begin with gentle fruit juices. Put a little less than 1 pint orange juice and the juice of 2 or 3 lemons into a half-gallon or gallon jar. Before squeezing the lemons, peel the rinds very thinly and add them as well. -- Add 2 quarts rum. Cover and let stand for three days. -- Put 2 pounds sugar into 1 quart water and bring to boil. Add the sugared water to the rum and fruit juice, cover, and let stand for two weeks. Then strain and bottle.

drinks.name: Almond Shrub
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 qt Rum or brandy
  • 1 glass Orange juice
  • Rind of 1 Lemon
  • 1/2 - 1 lb Sugar
  • 1 glass Milk
  • 5 - 10 drops bitter Almond flavoring / essence
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put into gallon or half-gallon jar the spirits, thin lemon peel, orange juice, and sugar. Now take the essence of bitter almonds (you can use any amount you please) and add it to the glass of milk. Mix thoroughly and pour into the jar. Cover, put in a warm place (65-70 degrees fahrenheit), and keep it there until the milk has curdled. This takes from one to three hours. Then filter through filter paper and bottle. Rest it for two weeks before drinking it.

drinks.name: Rum Shrub
drinks.ingredients:
• Rind and juice of 6 Orange
  • 1 pint cold Water
  • 2 - 3 lb Sugar
  • 1 pint Orange juice
  • 2 qt Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pare 6 oranges very thinlyand put the rinds into a gallon jar. Add the juice of the fruit. Add 1 pint cold water, close the jar, and let the liquid stand for three days, stirring it now and then. train into an enamel dish, add 2 to 3 pounds sugar, and bring to a boil. Add a full pint of orange juice and strain it again. Finally, add about 2 quarts rum and bottle.

drinks.name: Boston Ice Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Vodka
  • 1 cl Gin
  • 1 cl Rum
  • 1 cl Tia maria
  • 1 cl Grand Marnier, yellow
  • Sour mix
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice. Stir. Garnish with lemon slice and a straw.

drinks.name: Picasso '1'
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Cranberry vodka
  • 2 cl Banana syrup
  • Juice of 1 Lime
  • Fill with Schweppes Russchian
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker. Fill half full with ice and shake well. Strain into collins glass with ice. Top with Schweppes Russain. Garnish with a slice of lime, a minth leave and a straw.

drinks.name: Tyson Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 bottles Mello Yello
  • 2 bottles Sprite
  • 2 qt Orange juice
  • 4 scoops Tropical Punch Kool-Aid mix
  • 1 bag Ice
  • 1 bottle Grain alcohol (Everclear)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all 8 liters of soda in cooler/bowl over 1 bag of ice. Add 2 quarts of Orage Juice. Add 1 bottle of Everclear. Add 4 big scoops of Kool-Aid (preferably Tropical Punch) Stir

drinks.name: Pick Me Up Jose
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
