  • 1/2 oz Jose Cuervo
drinks.mixinginstructions: Lay shot glass in a CLEAN ash tray right side up, and start to pour the drinks into te glass till they overflow into the ash tray. then light the liquer on fire, blow it out, take the shot from the shot glass, then drink out of the ash tray. ENJOY

drinks.name: Taco-Mancer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Espresso
  • 2 shots Peach schnapps
  • 1 can Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ingredients in jar (make sure it's a quart one!), espresso first, then schnapps, finally Dr. Pepper. Swirl, smell, enjoy!

drinks.name: Nuts & Berries
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • Top it off whith Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka and the amaretto into the glass (exact measurements are not vital here), and then cearfully top it off with the Bailey's according to your own taste. And remember that it is a shot!

drinks.name: Caribbean Blues
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-1/2 cup Vodka
  • 1/2 cup Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 cup Dry Vermouth
  • Plenty of crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingrediants gradually. Best results if poured over the crushed ice and then stirred.

drinks.name: Notre Dame Pick-Me-Up
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar or diet sugar
  • Ginger ale
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all items in glass, (you can use any size 8 oz. glass) put all items in glass and mix well with spoon.

drinks.name: Redneck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 - 1/2 part Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a mason jar 1/4 to 1/2 full with Southern Comfort, depending on how strong you want the drink. Fill the jar the rest of the way with Mountain Dew. Stir and enjoy! Add some ice if you plan on drinking this over a period of time.

drinks.name: Dirty Bastard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blackberry brandy
  • Cranberry juice
  • 1/6 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Vodka, Brandy and Cranberry. Squeeze Lime.

drinks.name: The A-Rock
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Spiced rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 part Jack Daniels
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient one at a time. Rum first, then JD, and finally SoCo.

drinks.name: Poop Shoot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 Sambuca
  • 1/3 Fruit punch (layered on top)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill your shot glass 2/3 full with sambuca. Then layer the fruit punch on top by dribbling it over a spoon.

drinks.name: Tight Snatch
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 shot Peach schnapps
  • Orange juice
  • Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Serve in ice-filled glass.

drinks.name: The Lowee
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • Fill with Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just stir it up!

drinks.name: Silver Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Vodka
  • 1 raw Egg
  • 1/2 cup Half-and-half
  • 1 tblsp Powdered sugar
  • 1/3 can Pink lemonade (or to taste)
  • Ice (Half blender full)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill blender half full with ice. Add all ingredents and mix.

drinks.name: Deer Killer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka (Absolut or better)
  • 1 pint Firewater or hot damn
  • 4 tblsp Tabasco sauce
  • 1 splash Butterscotch schnapps
  • 10 oz Wild Turkey
  • 6 oz Jack Daniels (or other premium sourmash Whiskey)
  • 30 shots JÃ¤germeister (Substitute Sambuka if you wish)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all drinks in a blender, You can add 8 cubes of ice to chill the drink and give it more of a body. Add the Hot melting butter(or the schapps right before you drink). Makes enough for at least 10 people.

drinks.name: The Chalise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 pint Fruit punch (any type will do)
  • 12 oz Lemonade concentrate
  • 1/2 gal chilled Vodka
  • Ice
  • Garnish with Lemon slices
drinks.mixinginstructions: Throw all ingredients into a blender, and blend to your hearts delight. After, pour into an iced punch bowl and drink immediately!

drinks.name: Multiple Orgasm Cajun Style
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Dark rum
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Rum cream liqueur
  • equal part Ice
  • Ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients in the blender and blend until smooth.

drinks.name: Apple and Cinnamon Joy
drinks.ingredients:
• 7/8 oz Apple schnapps (DeKuyper Apple Barrel)
  • 1/8 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour schnapps into shot glass. Dribble Goldschlager into schnapps. Stir twice.

drinks.name: Golden Coke
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Coca-Cola
  • 1 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the cola into a tumbler. Add the Goldschlager and stir gently. Consume.

drinks.name: Kamakazie #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Absolut and Cointreau over ice in glass. Squezze and drop in lime to taste.

drinks.name: Baby Aspirin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Sweet and sour mix
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Raspberry schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour equal parts into cup, mix and pour into shot glass.

drinks.name: Candy Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 glass Apple cider (Martinelli's)
  • 1 dash Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a glass of sparkling cider, and add the butterscotch schnapps to taste.

drinks.name: Jolly Rancher #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Apple schnapps (Apple Barrell)
  • 1 shot Peachtree schnapps
  • 1 cup Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix and serve chilled.

drinks.name: Star Wars
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 pint Southern Comfort
  • 1 pint Amaretto
  • 1 pint Sweet and sour mix
  • 1 pint Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts of all.

drinks.name: Dog House Dew
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Mountain Dew
  • Lemon juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka into any cup or glass. Fill with Mountain Dew. Add a few splashes of lemon juice. Add a few ice cubes (optional, but recommended). Stir. Enjoy!!

drinks.name: Esirnus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 shots Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 2 shots Midori melon liqueur (Midori)
  • Sprite (or 7UP)
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Midori and Chambord over ice in a glass and stir. Then partially fill the glass with Sprite. Stir in Vodka and add the Maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: NyQuil
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/4 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • A few Drops green Food coloring
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and serve to cure the common cold.

drinks.name: Dirty Dog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cognac (Hennessy)
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 5 crushed Ice
  • 5 oz chilled Orange juice
  • 1 oz chilled Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ingredients into a mixing cup or blender, shake, then pour into the Mason Jar. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Flaming Cocaine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Aftershock
  • 1 part 100 proof Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1 dash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill the shot glass until a frost has developed on it. All ingredients should be chilled. Add the Aftershock and several small crystals, then add the Vodka, and finally the Cranberry juice.

drinks.name: Bootlegger Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Rum
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • Sweet and sour
  • 7-Up
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Order of pour: Pint glass iced, 3/4 oz Vodka, 3/4 oz Rum, 3/4 oz Triple Sec. 1/2 fill sweet and sour, 1/2 fill seven-up, splash grenadine to get a slight pink color

drinks.name: Butterbee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/2 shot Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the butterscotch shnapps in first, then slowly, pour the baileys down the inside, so that it rests on top of the butterscotch.

drinks.name: Orgasmic Fantasy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 tsp Vanilla extract
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour first vodka, then Bailey's, then Kahlua into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Add vanilla extract. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Turbo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz PiÃ±a Colada
  • 1/2 oz Passoa
  • 1/2 oz Pisang Ambon
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Strain into ice filled glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a straw.

drinks.name: Ice bolts
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 1/2 oz Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Kahlua with tonic water with crushed ice, strain into glass with ice.

drinks.name: Sex on the Beach #12
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Cranberry juice
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in order in ordinary glass. Add cranberry and orange juice to your liking.

drinks.name: Red Hot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix, and you have a drink that tastes like a red hot.

drinks.name: King Kong
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 Banana, ripe
  • 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 tblsp 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 can Cream of coconut
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 tsp Nutmeg
  • 8 oz Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Mix for 45 seconds on medium power. Serve with a cute umbrella and straw.

drinks.name: Latin Manhattan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into ice-filled mixing glass and stir until well chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail or martini glass, add the lemon and serve.

drinks.name: Bermuda Rum Swizzle
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Rum (Gosling's Black Seal)
  • Juice of 2 Lemon or limes
  • 5 oz Pineapple juice
  • 5 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Grenadine or Bermuda Falernum
  • 6 dashes Angostura bitters
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir or shake vigorously until a frothing head appears. Strain into sour glasses. Garnish with a slice of orange or a Maraschino Cherry.

drinks.name: Tropiflipano
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Everclear
  • 56 oz Water
  • 1 package Tropical Punch Kool-Aid mix
  • 1 bottle Beer (Rolling Rock)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients into a large mixing bowl (or simmer pot whenever possible). Mix well! This drink serves 2-3 quite well.

drinks.name: Topher Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2-1/4 oz Tang mix
  • 3 oz Vodka
  • Fill with Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill bottom of glass with tang then add Vodka, Stir till most of the tang is disolved. Fill to 3/4 full with Mountain Dew, Stir again. Fill rest of way. Voilia!

drinks.name: Shotgun Lou
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 2 1/2 oz Milk or cream
  • 1 tsp Brown sugar
  • Top with Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix brandy, milk and brown sugar on ice. Top with ginger ale

drinks.name: Big Time
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Cognac
  • 3/4 oz Pernod
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a shot glass and enjoy.

drinks.name: The Drunken Elf
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 1/2 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 oz Cream
  • 2 cups Ice
  • 10 pieces Candy (cinnamon)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Thoroughly blend all ingrediants in an electric blender and serve in a frosted glass.

drinks.name: Burn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 5-6 drops Tabasco sauce
  • Salt
  • Black pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass half full of Vodka then add several drops of tabasco sauce. Add a half dash of Salt and pepper then stir.

drinks.name: Aviation
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Gin
  • 1/4 oz Maraschino liqueur
  • Juice of 1 Lemon
  • A few pinch Sugar (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill cocktail shaker with ice. Juice the lemon and add to the shaker. Add a little sugar, if desired. Pour in gin and maraschino, and shake. Serve straight up in a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Green Bomber
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Melon liqueur
  • 1 part Lime juice
  • 1 part Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 part Gin
  • 1 pint Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine melon liqueur, gin, lime juice, and sweet vermouth into a shot glass. Drop the shot into a pint of beer. Drink both the shot and the beer at the same time.

drinks.name: Betsy Clear
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Peach schnapps
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Stir. Garnish with an orange wedge. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Snapple and Schnapps
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Peach schnapps (Peachtree)
  • Fill with Pink Lemonade Snapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shaker (or glass) with crushed ice. Pour schnapps in first and top with Snapple. Shake like hell and pour into a frosted (preferably) highball glass.

drinks.name: Hawaiian Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 2 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice cubes in the glass. Shake vodka, orange juice and cranberry juice in shaker. Poor into glass. Top off with soda water. Garnish with cherry and pinapple slice (optional).

drinks.name: Funnel Cloud #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 40 oz Beer
  • 12 oz Ginger ale
  • 1/4 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/4 shot Light rum
  • 1/2 shot Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour beer, ginger ale, vodka, light rum, and ameretto in a funnel. Turn the funnel while you drink it.

drinks.name: Closed Casket
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/4 oz Firewater
  • 1/4 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 151 last and light.

drinks.name: Player's Passion
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz AlizÃ©
  • 2 oz Cognac
  • 4 oz Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: You pour the cognac in first. Next pour the AlizÃ©. Last pour in the Champagne and stir.

drinks.name: Stock Market Crash
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 shot Yukon Jack
  • 1/2 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 shot Wild Turkey
  • 1/2 shot Black rum
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ice first, next is the liquor and then the pop.

drinks.name: Red, White and Blue
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Aftershock
  • 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer. Aftershock, then Goldschlager and peppermint schnapps on top.

drinks.name: Bart Simpson
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill and serve in large shot glass

drinks.name: Shitface
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • 1 oz Sugar syrup
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add rum, grenadine, and sugar syrup in glass. Fill with orange juice. Add ice and shake, strain into glass and garnish with marachino cherry.

drinks.name: Mallis 97
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl Amaretto
  • Rest Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all! in glass with 3 ice cubes

drinks.name: This-n-That
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

drinks.name: Joe Blow
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 1 can Fresca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Vodka to Fresca in a glass.

drinks.name: Luftschlange
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl White rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 cl Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Creme de Cacao
  • 1 shot Almond syrup
  • 1 1/2 cl Coconut cream
  • 6 cl Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients. Strain.

drinks.name: Caribbean Queen
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Watermelon schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 5 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Lemonade
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with handful of ice and add ingredients. Then mix.

drinks.name: Che Guevara
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Goldschlager
  • 1 part Jose Cuervo Gold
  • 1 part JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Jose Cuervo Gold, then JÃ¤germeister. Top off with Goldschlager.

drinks.name: Jell-o Jiggler Shots
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 cup Vodka
  • 1 large box Jello
  • 2 packets unflavored Gelatin
  • 1 1/4 cup boiling Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Jell-o and unflavored gellatin in bowl. Add 1 1/4 cup of boiling water. Wait a few minutes to cool and add vodka. Pour into pan and refrigerate until solidified. Cut into squares and enjoy!

drinks.name: Blue Whale
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice and mix in a shaker

drinks.name: Jen's Red
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Absolut Citron
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Sour mix
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1 dash Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Vodka and Triple Sec simultaneously. Add sour mix, grenadine, sprite. Shake and serve

drinks.name: Wet Pussy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 2 oz Irish cream
  • 6 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the Chambord, Irish Cream, and Milk or Creamer in a shaker with ice. Shake, Strain and pour into glass.

drinks.name: The N8er T8er
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Gin
  • 12 oz Cream soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine cream soda and gin. Stir well

drinks.name: Chilton
drinks.ingredients:
• Salt
  • Ice
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Juice of 1 Lemon
  • Fill with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a salt rimmed cocktail glass with ice. Pour in vodka and add lemon juice. Fill with soda. Insert straw and stir slightly. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Chulitro
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Pisco
  • 2 Ice cubes
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
  • 1 dash Beer
  • Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: First goes Pisco, then the ice cubes, fill with coke, little bit of beer (any kind), and the lemon juice

drinks.name: Witch's Brew #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Grenadine
  • 5 cl Cointreau
  • 5 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • 5 cl Blue Curacao (Bols blue)
  • Fill Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Grenadine into glass. Mix orange, Bols Blue, Cointreau and Midori melon seperately in shaker. Pour slowly into glass disturbing grenadine as little as possible. Garnish with spray cream, cherries etc.

drinks.name: Citronade
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Lemonade
  • 3 shots Absolut Citron
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Lemonade and Citron into a Collins glass....shake or stir, add ice, and drink.

drinks.name: Mounds
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • Fill with Cream
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice add rum add creme de cacao fill with cream

drinks.name: Smith and Wesson
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Light cream
  • Pepsi Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka, kahlua, and cream into glass filled with ice, then top off with Pepsi.

drinks.name: Razberi Sunsplash
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Coconut rum
  • 3/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 2 splashes Grenadine
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • Fill Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put liquor in first than add juice and grenadine. Shake well .Garnish with a flag.

drinks.name: Rubber Chicken
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Canadian whisky (Canadian Club)
  • Fill with 1 part Limeade mix from concentrate
  • And 1 part Ginger ale
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mason jar with ice. Pour in Rye Whiskey. Then top up with a 50/50 mix of limeade and ginger ale.

drinks.name: Mark n' Club
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon (Maker's Mark)
  • Fill with Club soda
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with hard ice, pour 2 oz. of Maker's Mark over ice, fill with club soda and enjoy.

drinks.name: Bon Voyage
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Gin
  • 1 shot Tequila
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the shot of tequila and shot of gin over ice in a cocktail glass. Then mix a dash of lemon juice and dash of blue curacao over gin and tequila. Stir lightly. Best when drank with a straw.

drinks.name: Riddler's Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 13 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put 2 oz of tequila in a shot glass and then add 13 drops of Tabasco sauce. Then enjoy and be prepared to overheat !

drinks.name: Butt Naked Kiwi
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cans Mountain Dew
  • 2 shots Everclear (190 proof)
  • 24 pieces Candy, Spree
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a resealable 32. oz container with one can of Mountain dew. Add the 2 shots of everclear then the second can of Mountain Dew. Add the sprees and shake until they turn white. Strain the mixture into the serving pitcher. Keep the sprees and eat them later.

drinks.name: Harlem World Seven
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Kurant (Absolut)
  • 1/4 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 pint Prune juice
  • 1 1/2 qt Black Sambuca
  • Fill with Gin
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just drink it as soon as you mix it, and it might taste funny because of the prune juice but you should get an effect out of it.

drinks.name: Pimp Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Raspberry schnapps
  • 1 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 6 oz Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and pour over ice.

drinks.name: Strawberry Sombrero
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 2 tsp Strawberry syrup
  • 3 parts Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Khaluha to a glass then the milk and finally add the syrup and stir with a spoon.

drinks.name: Artic Red
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl finlandia Cranberry vodka
  • 4 tsp Sugar
  • 6 pieces Lime peel
  • 10 cl Soda water
  • 1 Lemon slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: First smash the limes and sugar to bottom of the glass. Then add vodka and soda. Mix the drink with a spoon. Add ice cubes and lemon.

drinks.name: Screwdriver Boricua
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Vodka (Finlandia or Absolut)
  • 1/2 Orange juice
  • 1/4 Cranberry juice (Ocean Spray)
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice.

drinks.name: The Abba
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Absolut Citron
  • 2 1/2 oz Sprite
  • Twist of Lime peel
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix absolute citron together with the sprite, and add a twist of lime, and stir. That's it.

drinks.name: Pimp Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 5 oz Orange juice (Sunny D)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour them in and stir it up.

drinks.name: Limoncillo
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 gal fresh Water
  • 2 cases lemon Crystal light
  • 1 L White rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Get a empty gallon container. Then put in the 3/4 gallons of water. Put the two cases of cristal light and add the rum. Mix and start patying!!!

drinks.name: Sour Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bourbon (Southern Comfort)
  • 1 oz Melon liqueur (Midori)
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • Fill with Sweet and sour
  • splash Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice and garnish with an orange half and a cherry. Drink can be made without lime juice for those with who prefer sweeter.

drinks.name: Submarine (Mexican)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Corona or Sol
  • 1 shot AÃ±ejo Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a Shot with the Tequila and put the shot upside down inside the Beer Mug (make sure the Tequila stays inside the shot). Fill the Beer Mug with Beer. If you like salt on the edge of the Beer Mug you can add it. Also lemon can be added depending on you.

drinks.name: Jufu Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • 1/2 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 shot Grenadine
  • 1/2 shot Lime juice
  • Mix with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Serve on the rocks.

drinks.name: Alley Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Frangelico or Hazelnut Schnapps
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Vodka (Stoli)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice and mix together. Strain into a glass and shoot it.

drinks.name: Kick me in the Jimmy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Jose Cuervo
  • 1/2 oz Firewater
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in mixing tin with ice, shake and strain.

drinks.name: Voodoo Doll
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Orange juice
  • Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake, serve with ice.

drinks.name: Short Island Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 1/2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • Ice
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients, except Coke, over ice. Fill with Coca-cola and stir.

drinks.name: My Busted Cherry
drinks.ingredients:
• Jar of Maraschino cherry
  • 1 1/2 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • Chocolate syrup (Hershey's)
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1/4 cup Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Drain cherry juice out of jar and fill with rum. Let set overnight in refridgerator. -- In blender mix six (your choice) cherries, ice cream, milk, rum, and chocolate syrup (to taste). Blend until smooth. Add more milk or ice cream as needed.

drinks.name: Crapachino
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 cup Coffee
  • 1/2 - 3/4 cup sweetened Condensed milk
  • 3-4 tblsp dark bitter Cocoa powder
  • 1-2 scoop plain Chocolate ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all the ingredients together, leaving out the chocolate ice-cream. Leave in fridge until cold. Add in the chocolate ice-cream, blend. Serve.

drinks.name: Deep Blue
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 cl Blue Curacao (Bols)
  • 2 cl Champagne
  • 1 blue Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Vodka and Blue Curacao are stirred on ice and then topped with champagne. Place a blue cocktail cherry in the bottom of the glass.

drinks.name: Black Tooth
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Canadian whisky (Crown Royal)
  • 1 splash Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a shot glass with a shot of crown royal. Add just enough Coca-Cola to give the shot a black appearance.

drinks.name: Carmel Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Apple schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts of freezer cold schnapps.

drinks.name: Dominican Goddess
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Rum (Brugal or Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz ruby red Grapefruit juice
  • lemon-lime flavored Soda water (seltzer water)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Ruby red grapefruit juice and lemon-lime vintage seltzer water. Add the rum (as much as desired) and shake.

drinks.name: Rum Runner Island Style
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dark rum (Myer's)
  • 1 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 1/4 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 1 splash Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill blender with one and a half cups of ice, add all the liqours in the blender and mix until the consistentsy has thickend. Pour into glass and add a cherry on top.

drinks.name: Sleigh Ride
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Grenadine
  • 1 shot Green Chartreuse
  • 1 shot silver Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Float the ingredients in order by pouring over the bottom of a spoon.

drinks.name: Jamaican Rum Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 cup Dark rum (Myers)
  • 1/4 cup Malibu rum
  • 2 1/2 cups Pineapple juice
  • 2 1/2 cups Orange juice
  • 1/4 cup Lime juice
  • 3 tblsp Grenadine
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together in blender or punch bowl. Pour creation over ice cubes in any type of glass.

drinks.name: Gorilla Fart #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Yukon Jack
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1oz of Yukon Jack into shot glass. Pour 1oz of Bacardi 151 into shot glass.

drinks.name: Skittle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Banana liqueur (Banana 99)
  • Watermelon-Cherry Kool-Aid
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Absolut Vodka and Banana liqueur to Collins glass. Fill glass 3/4 full with Kool-Aid. Add crushed ice, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Cookie Monster #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 tsp Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a spoon to layer the alcohol and float 151 on the top. Lite on fire, let it burn for about 5 seconds, then blow it out and suck it up through a straw.

drinks.name: Southern Raspberry Tart
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 3/4 oz Jack Daniels
  • 3/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Fill with Sour mix
  • Top with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquors, fill with sour mix and shake. Then top with 7-UP or Sprite and garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Shocking Chocolate
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cinnamon schnapps (Aftershock)
  • 1 cup Hot chocolate
drinks.mixinginstructions: Heat the hot chocolate and add the cinnamon schnapps

drinks.name: Evil Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 10 oz Iced tea (very sweet)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix well. Pour over ice.

drinks.name: Chocolate Buzz
drinks.ingredients:
• 10-12 oz Chocolate milk
  • 2 shots Kahlua
  • 2 shots Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with the chocolate milk, next stir in 2 shots of Kahula and 2 shots of Irish Cream. Serve cold.

drinks.name: Poison Milk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 shot Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in shot glass. Close your eyes and shoot it real fast.

drinks.name: Teal Squeal
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 cup Vodka
  • 1/4 cup Blue Curacao
  • 2 cups Ice
  • 1/2 cup Pineapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in blender. Blend well. Serve in highball glass. Garnish with pineapple.

drinks.name: Red Rooster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Noyaux
  • 6 oz Guava juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build drink in a collins glass.

drinks.name: Portland Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • 2 splashes Triple sec
  • 3 dashes Cinnamon
  • 3 dashes Nutmeg
  • 1/4 cup Sugar
  • Whipped cream
  • 1/2 cup Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put sugar in a plate. Put 1 splash of Triple Sec in a bowl. First dip the rim of coffee cup in the bowl of Triple Sec, then in sugar. Add 1 shot each of Rum and Kahlua, & 1 splash of Triple Sec. Light with a match (this crystalizes the sugar on rim). Add cinnamon and nutmeg. Add coffee (this should put the fire out) till cup in 3/4 full. Top with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Paris Paradise
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 2 oz Chocolate syrup (Hershey's)
  • 2 oz Bailey's irish cream (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients in a blender, mix them together, and serve in a beer pilsner.

drinks.name: Midori Hack
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice (maybe 1/2 oz)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Midori, vodka, and sweet & sour with ice. Prepare large rocks glass by juicing lime garnish into glass half filled with ice. Strain in the chilled cocktail, add splash of Pineapple Juice, enjoy.

drinks.name: X
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz Wildberry schnapps
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 splash Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in mixing glass and shake with ice. Strain into glass and shoot.

drinks.name: Kir Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 7/10 part Gin (Gordon's)
  • 2/10 part extra Dry Vermouth
  • 1/10 part Creme de Cassis
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a mixing glass full of ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with twist of lemon.

drinks.name: Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Light rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • Ice cubes
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
  • 1 wedge Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the light rum, lemon juice, and grenadine. Add the ice cubes and fill to your own taste with Cranberry juice. Add a wedge of lemon on your glass and voila! Enjoy!

drinks.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster (Zaphod's)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass, mug or whatever about 3/4 with ice. Then, add the J.D., Schnapps and Curacao. Fill up the rest of the glass with orange juice, and stir.

drinks.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients. Can be either: 1. muddled with lime -- 2. served on crushed ice but preferably in hurricane or pint glass with 5-7 regular icecubes (no need to water it down, only to make cold)

drinks.name: Millionare's Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 shot Kahlua
  • 1/2 shot Frangelico
  • 6 oz Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place Bailey's Irish Cream, Frangelico and Kahlua in Irish coffee mug and add coffee. Top with whip cream and allspice(cinnamon and nutmeg)(optional)

drinks.name: Super Qell
drinks.ingredients:
• 20 cl Vodka
  • 20 cl Whisky
  • 20 cl Dr. Pepper
  • 20 cl Chocolate milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just fill a big glass with all the ingridients

drinks.name: Blue Peach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the two in shaker with ice. Shake. Pour in shot glass.

drinks.name: Slippery Nipple #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • 1/3 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/3 oz Kahlua (Coffee)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the Irish cream in first. Then slowly pour the Kahlua down the side of the glass so it doesn't mix. Then add the Butterscoth Schnapps on top nice and slow.

drinks.name: Bisp
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Vanilla bean
  • 2 sticks Cinnamon
  • 12 whole Black pepper
  • 10 tblsp Sugar
  • 1 cup Grain alcohol (192 proof)
  • 1 bottle Red wine
  • 1 bottle Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Let sugar, water, vanilla and other spices simmer for two hours. Strain. Add wine and alcohol. Serve.

drinks.name: Maiden Head
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Cherry brandy
  • 2 oz cherry 7-Up
  • 2 oz Royal Cherry Soda Snapple
  • Top with Whipped cream
  • And 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: All sodas and alcohol should be chilled an mixed with a stirring stick before topped with whipped cream and a cherry.

drinks.name: Friday Freeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 scoops orange Sherbet
  • 1 cup Orange juice
  • 1/2 cup Vodka
  • 1/4 cup Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredents in blender at highest speed. Consistancy of the mix should be 'semi - thick:' not so thick that a spoon would stand by itself in the mix, but not as thin as juice. If the mix is too thin, add sherbet, if too thick , add equal amount of juice and alcohol. Pour into glass and place in freezer for 15 minutes.

drinks.name: Peppermint Aztec
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Chocolate milk
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 Candy cane or peppermint stick
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquids together in the order listed, then stand peppermint stick or cane inside of cup.

drinks.name: Banana Cream Pie #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Licor 43
  • 1 part Banana liqueur (99 Bananas)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Malibu Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Malibu rum
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1 splash 7-Up
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Add malibu and fill with pineapple juice. Add grenadine and splash of 7-up.

drinks.name: Pooh Bear
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's)
  • Add Cream soda (to taste)
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice.

drinks.name: White Trash
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • Add Ginger ale (to taste)
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Garnish with lime wedge. Ingredients can be varied to taste.

drinks.name: Jen's Hot Chocolate Butterscotch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Hot chocolate
  • 1 shot Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 splash Irish cream (Bailey's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add one shot of butterscotch Schnapps to the hot chocolate. Top off with Bailey's.

drinks.name: Green Monster Party Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 packages Lime Kool-Aid
  • 1 bottle Vodka
  • 1 bottle Fruit juice (any)
  • 20-25 pieces Fruit, mixed
  • 1 gal Sherbet (any flavor)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients(in any order) in a large tub, which can hold several gallons. Stir so that the Sherbert is completely dissolved. With the exception of the kool-aid and sherbert, as much or little of the other ingredients may be used.

drinks.name: Bailey's Comet #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 1/4 oz Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • 1 1/4 oz Goldschlager
  • Float Sambuca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and Strain the Butterscotch, Bailey's, and Goldschlager into a cocktail glass. Float the Sambuca, then sprinkle Cinnamon or Nutmeg into drink (Before you flame the drink). Just before presentation, flame the drink. As the Sambuca burns, the cinnamon will sparkle. A dazzling effect if the bartender or server is walking with the drink while it's burning (give the comet a tail).

drinks.name: Dreamsicle #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and Strain contents into a highball glass filled with ice. Tastes just like the popsicle

drinks.name: Imagination
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Rye whiskey
  • 8 oz Ginger ale
  • 1 tsp Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Rye whiskey into the glass. Add desired amount of ice. Fill to top with ginger ale and add a splash of lime. Stir until well mixed.

drinks.name: Harakiri shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Ouzo
  • 2 cl Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the ingreediants in a shot glass, serve with a pint of beer on the side.

drinks.name: Crockpot Mulled Cider
drinks.ingredients:
• Peel of 1/2 Orange, cut up
  • 1 6-inch Cinnamon stick, broken
  • 1 piece Ginger root , 1 inch, peeled and thinly sliced
  • 1 tsp whole Allspice
  • 8 cups Apple cider or apple juice
  • 1 cup Apple brandy (optional)
  • 1/4 cup Honey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Tie orange peel, cinnamon, ginger root, and allspice in an 8-inch square of 100-percent-cotton cheesecloth. -- Combine apple cider or juice, apple brandy (if desired), and honey in a 3 1/2-, 4-, or 5-quart crockery cooker. Add spice bag. Cover and cook on low-heat setting for 5 to 6 hours or on high-heat setting for 2 1/2 to 3 hours. Remove and discard spice bag. Ladle cider into cups. Makes 8 eight-ounce servings if you didn't use apple brandy, 9 if you did.

drinks.name: Grand Marnier
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 cup Triple sec
  • 1/3 cup Brandy
  • 1 tblsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix to disolve sugar.

drinks.name: Hot Vanilla
drinks.ingredients:
• 14 oz whole Milk
  • 2 oz Whipping cream
  • 1/2 Vanilla bean
  • 1 1/2 tsp Sugar to taste
  • Ground Cinnamon or canela for granish
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a heavy saucepan, combine the ingredients and warm over low heat. When small bubbles appear around the sides of the pan, remove it from the heat and let the mixture sit at room temperature for 15 to 20 minutes. Place the pan back on the stove and rewarm the mixture, whisking it briefly to redistribute the skin that forms on the milk's surface. Remove the vanilla bean half, scrape out the seeds with a sharp knife, and return the seeds to the milk. Pour the vanilla milk into two 8-ounce mugs and top with sprinklings of cinnamon or canela. Drink hot.

drinks.name: Cocaine Lady #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Light cream
  • 1 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Strain over ice. Float coke on top.

drinks.name: Melon Pousse Cafe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Creme de Almond
  • 1 part white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in cordial glass.

drinks.name: Moosemilk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White rum
  • 1 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 2 Strawberries, fresh
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place ingredients in blender, mix until even consistency.

drinks.name: Joan MirÃ³
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Dubonnet Rouge
  • 1 part Grand Marnier
  • 1 part Scotch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass filled with ice, stir, strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a red cherry.

drinks.name: Skier's Toddy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Hot chocolate
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • Marshmallows
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rinse out a large mug with boiling water, add steaming hot chocolate, and stir in liqueurs. Top with several marshmallows.

drinks.name: Melberry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 4 oz Raspberry juice
  • Lemon juice
  • Lime juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Midori, Chambord and raspberry juice in a shaker. Add a squeeze of lemon and lime juice. Shake. Strain into highball half filled with ice. Garnish with fresh raspberries.

drinks.name: Scrumptious Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 48 oz strong black Coffee
  • Brown sugar
  • 10 oz Brandy
  • 8 oz Dark rum
  • 8 oz White rum
  • 2 sticks Cinnamon
  • 16 oz Whipped cream
  • Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Sweeten the coffee with brown sugar to taste. Mix coffee, liquor, and orange peel in a pan. Heat gently, but do not boil. Let infuse for a couple of minutes. Pour into pre-warmed heat-resistent glasses. Float whipped cream on top. Garnish with thin strip of peel of orange and nutmeg.

drinks.name: Sunny D Screwdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Orange vodka
  • 2 L Sunny delight
  • 2 L 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour together and serve cold.

drinks.name: Buttmeister
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/4 oz Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingrediants into mixing glass, swirl and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Key Largo OJ
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Key Largo schnapps
  • 1 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice and then equal parts of Key Largo and Orange juice. Mix and enjoy

drinks.name: Purple Penis
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Sweet and sour mix
  • Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a pint glass with ice and add first three ingredients. Mix well. Fill with equal parts sweet and sour mix and cranberry juice. Stir. Fill shot glass as desired.

drinks.name: Mountaineer on Acid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in shaker. Serve chilled.

drinks.name: Bloody Sun
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Gin (Bombay Sapphire)
  • 2 cl Orange liqueur (Bols Kontiki)
  • 1 cl Cointreau
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ingrediment to shaker and shake well. Pour to the class filled with ice cubes.

drinks.name: Absolut Anti-freeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 parts Absolut Citron
  • 2 parts Sprite
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice and strain into shot glasses.

drinks.name: Green Monster #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 3 dashes green Food coloring
  • 4 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 151 rum, lime juice, and food coloring into a glass with several ice cubes. Shake, and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Echo Hemoraging Tumor
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish cream (Carolyn's)
  • 6 drops Blue Curacao
  • 8 drops Strawberry schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour irish cream in shot glass followed by the Blue Curacao and finally the strawberry schnapps.

drinks.name: Rock Lobster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Raspberry liqueur (Razzamatazz)
  • 1 shot Crown Royal
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Razzamatazz and Crown Royal. Fill with Cranberry Juice.

drinks.name: Drool
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 cup Milk
  • 2 shots Aftershock
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour aftershock into milk mix until lite pink. Drink up.

drinks.name: Embolism
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Rum and Grenadine to a glass. Fill with Coke. Ice optional.

drinks.name: C*m Scorcher
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tblsp Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 tblsp Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 tblsp Kahlua
  • 1 dash Irish cream (Carolyns)
drinks.mixinginstructions: In shot glass put butterscotch schnapps then add vodka followed by kahlua then slowly add irish cream a little extra irish cream may be used allow drink to stand and the cum to get scorched.

drinks.name: SherryBear's Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 8 oz Lemonade
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Lemonade made from frozen concentrate works best. Don't use Kool-Aid type lemonade. For a twist, also try Pink Lemonade.

drinks.name: Drainpipe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Green Curacao
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Bailey's and Curacao in a glass, stir. Add Coca-Cola slowly. No ice, serve with a straw. Blue Curacao may be used if you are out of green.

drinks.name: Wolf (Howlin')
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1/2 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • Ice cubes
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour spirits in a glass. Add some ice and fill up with Sprite. Prefered served with a blue cherry.

drinks.name: Backseat Boogie #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • Fill 1/2 Ginger ale
  • Fill 1/2 Cranberry juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Gin and Vodka over ice, followed by the cranberry juice and then the ginger ale.

drinks.name: Gorilla's Fart
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/3 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/3 shot Banana liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a separate glass with Ice, then pour it into the shot glass. Drink straight up.

drinks.name: Hornet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine over ice and add cola soda, top with lime slice.

drinks.name: Screw-Up
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 4 parts 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice cubes, add all ingredients, mix then drink!

drinks.name: Riprock
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bourbon (Jim Beam)
  • Add Ice
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shaken, not stirred.

drinks.name: Ershammar Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Gin
  • 1 1/2 cl Lime juice
  • 1 cl Grenadine
  • 1 1/2 dl Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredientes in a shaker ( with ice) and shake it !! enjoy....

drinks.name: M.V.P.
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka, midori, and malibu. Fill with pineapple juice. Stir or shake.

drinks.name: Blue Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Sambuca
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 drop Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put drop of lemon in first, then add Blue Caracoa, and Sambuca. Then slowly add vodka. Sit down, shoot back, and enjoy!

drinks.name: Tree Frog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Lime vodka
  • 1 part blue Maui
  • 2 parts Grapefruit juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, Maui, and grapefruit juice together, then pour over highball glass with ice.

drinks.name: Malibu Express
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz 7-Up
  • 5 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together. Serve on ice.

drinks.name: Purple Rain #1
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes or crushed ice
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Blue Curacao
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 splash Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add gin, fill with cranberry juice and add a splash of Blue Curacao, sour mix and soda. Shake gently, add more Curacao for correct color (should be Royal Purple).

drinks.name: Miner's Lung
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Vodka
  • Fill with Guinness stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place three shots of Vodka into a pint size beer glass, and fill the rest of the glass with Guiness

drinks.name: Choclate Banana Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Vodka (Ketel One)
  • 1 part white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 part Banana liqueur (99 Bananas)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mixing glass with ingredients, stir and pour into chilled martini glass. Add Hershey's kiss or Godiva choclate for a garnish.

drinks.name: Brain Eraser #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a sizable shot glass pour the Schlager, then Kahlua, then Vodka. Keep liquer levels seperate. Carefully slide a straw to bottom along side of the glass. Shoot from bottom thru straw. Bombs away!

drinks.name: Royal Crown Royal
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Crown Royal
  • Fill with Royal Crown Cola
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a highball glass half full with ice cubes. Pour the shot of whiskey over the cubes. Add the RC Cola and stir.

drinks.name: Rainbow Brite Blowing Sunshine Up Your Butt
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Strawberry schnapps (Clear)
  • 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
  • Top With Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a tall hurricane glass with ice. Layer ingredients by carefully and slowly adding each in order. Best garnished with a small wedge of 'unpeeled' pineapple.

drinks.name: Afganistany Whore
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Rum
  • 1 can Root beer
  • 4 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour to taste and enjoy.

drinks.name: Fruity Vodka Beverage
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Lemon vodka
  • 1 part 7-Up
  • 1 part Sunny delight
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a large glass.

drinks.name: Piss in the Snow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Smirnoff Vodka
  • 2 oz Peppermint schnapps (Avalanche, 80 proof)
  • 1 can Mountain Dew
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Let the Vodka and Avalanche chill thouroughly in the freezer. Put ice cubes in large glass, pour in Mountain dew and rest of ingredients. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Sweet Old-Fashioned
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 6 drops Angostura bitters
  • 1 1/2 oz Bourbon
  • 6 oz 7-Up
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • Maraschino cherry
  • Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquor over ice, add other ingredients. Garhish with cherry and lemon peel.

drinks.name: Silver Cloud
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 4 oz Milk
  • Ice cubes
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Amaretto, Kahlua, and Milk together. Fill with ice cubes and top with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Micheal's Downfall
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rum (Morgan's Spiced)
  • 2 splashes Grenadine
  • Fill With 1/2 Orange juice
  • And 1/2 Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take glass and add 4 ice cubes. Pour in the rum and then add grenedine, followed by equal parts orange juice and cranberry juice.

drinks.name: Cary Grant
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tia maria
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • Juice of 1 Lime
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Old-Fashioned or a Tumbler glass with ice. Squeeze juice of one lime (or less, to taste), then pour equal parts Tia Maria and Vodka. Mix well, garnish with lime wedge. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Kamakazie Razzberry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part concentrated Raspberry juice (Welch's)
  • 1 part Raspberry schnapps (Phillips)
  • 1 part Vodka (Absolut)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Welch's concentrate into a pitcher, then add vodka and finally Raspberry Schnapps. Add crushed ice and stir.

drinks.name: Jade Isle
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz blackcurrant Vodka (Stoli)
  • 4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 2 oz 7-Up
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients minus the cherry of course in shaker cup strain into huricane glass 1/2 filled with chiped ice. Garnish with cherry and long straw.

drinks.name: Monk's Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 part Creme de Banane
  • 1 part Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients and enjoy!!

drinks.name: Bumble Bee #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin (Beefeater)
  • 1 cup crushed Ice
  • 2 dashes Lemon juice
  • 2 tsp Honey
drinks.mixinginstructions: The crushed ice should be added first, followed by the honey. Stir the mixture ass you pur the gin on top, which should be realtively chilled. Add lemon juice to taste, and place a wedge over the rim.

drinks.name: Green Spider
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 shot Green Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shot of 151 first then Creme de Menthe.

drinks.name: Gator Wizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Popov)
  • 2 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3 oz Sweet and sour (Mr.& Mrs. T)
  • 1 oz Triple sec (Arrow)
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in glass, add ingredients and stir.

drinks.name: Vaginal Secretions
drinks.ingredients:
• 250 ml Southern Comfort
  • 1/8 gal Lemonade
  • 1 L Squirt
  • 2 splashes Lime juice
  • 1 pint Triple sec
  • 3 splashes Margarita mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vigorously, and enjoy until drunk.

drinks.name: Absolute HB
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Dry Vermouth
  • 4 cl Tequila
  • 3 cl 7-Up
  • 2 cl Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour everything in a beer mug and shake it. Then you simply drink it.

drinks.name: Bob Dylan
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Surge
  • 4 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 16 oz Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender, mix until smooth. Be careful surge is carbonated, it will foam up. Enjoy!!!!

drinks.name: Swamp Frog
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 gal Vodka
  • 1 L Lemon juice
  • 5 lb Sugar
  • 4 L Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in a large tub or cooler. (Sinks work well) Serve over ice.

drinks.name: Klondike
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 1/2 oz Yukon Jack
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill cocktail glass with ice, pour Baileys first, Yukon Jack next, stir and serve.

drinks.name: Liquid Cocaine #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Silver Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients into a shot glass. Shoot it all at once .

drinks.name: Nuclear Waste #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 oz Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Root beer schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • Fill with Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well and drink up!

drinks.name: Brain Eraser #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Ice 101
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients in shotglass. (Try it in a frozen shotglass.)

drinks.name: Mudslide #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 3/4 oz Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Two methods of mixing: 1) straight up on the rocks - mix the 4 ingredients and pour over ice. -- 2) Frozen - mix 4 ingredients in a blender, add ice until frostly.

drinks.name: Zoot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 6 oz 7-Up
  • 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • Lemon wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Prepare a regular Gin and 7-Up with ice cubes, and the add the Jack Daniels gently on top of the ice. Then a lemmon wedge for garnish.

drinks.name: Pat Quinn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Scotch whiskey (Cutty Sark)
  • 4 oz Orange soda (C'Plus)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the orange pop in and then pour the scotch whiskey in. Stir or shake

drinks.name: Pat Quinn Float
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Scotch whiskey (Cutty Sark)
  • 4 oz Orange soda
  • 2-3 scoops Ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the orange pop/soda into a mixing glass and then the scotch whiskey. Shake or stir. Scoop some ice cream into a short, wide glass. Pour the scotch and orange pop/soda into this glass.

drinks.name: Pat Quinn Freeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Scotch whiskey (Cutty Sark)
  • 4 oz Orange soda
  • 2-3 scoops Ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into glass. You can either serve it like that or you can also put the drink into a freezer and serve when half-frozen.

drinks.name: Malibu Seven
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the 7-up and rum together in a cup of ice.

drinks.name: Sun Of A Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Gin (Beefeater)
  • 6 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all the ingredients in a tall glass over ice.

drinks.name: Skinny Dipper
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 6 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients and serve in a tall glass over ice.

drinks.name: Green Iguana Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Tequila (Two Fingers)
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend and pour into a salted glass.

drinks.name: Pucker Sucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Sour Apple Pucker
  • 1/2 oz Coffee liqueur (Kamora)
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients and serve as a shot.

drinks.name: Suffering Bastard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 oz Ginger ale
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a glass. Stir. Drink.

drinks.name: Dying Bastard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 oz Ginger ale
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients into a glass, stir, and drink.

drinks.name: Dead Bastard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Bourbon
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 oz Ginger ale
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into glass, stir, and drink.

drinks.name: Cosmo Katie
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill cocktail glass. Pour ingrediants and ice into mixer and shake well. Serve straight up with a cherry.

drinks.name: Puckerita
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Tequila (El Tesoro)
  • 1/2 oz Sour Apple Pucker
  • dash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingedients and shake in a tall glass with ice.

drinks.name: Galliano Island Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 1 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • Fill with Grapefruit-lemon soda (Squirt)
  • Serve with Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir vigorously until it has the consistency and appearance of iced tea.

drinks.name: Norwegian Hunting Mixture Bowl
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 gal Grain alcohol
  • 5 gal Lemonade
  • 3 kg Lemon
  • 4 kg Orange
  • 3 kg Grapefruit
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill approx. 2 gallon with pure Alcohol and 5 gallon with lemonade in a big and clean mixing bowl. Add approx. 10 kg. with fresh fruits as lemon, grapefruit and oranges. Mix the items together in approx. 2 minutes with an 4 HP outboard-motor with cooling- and exhaust system modified to not interfere with the mixture. Can be served in all kind of glasses but preferably a jar called 'Norges-glass'.

drinks.name: Aviator Fuel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Lemonade
  • 1 part Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a large cup or glass 1/3 full of lemonade, and same amount of Vodka, then Sprite.

drinks.name: Brain Eraser #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blue Label Smirnoff Vodka
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour first two ingredients over ice, fill glass with club soda.

drinks.name: Pirate's Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 - 2 oz Spiced rum
  • Coca-Cola
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In mason jar filled with ice, add spiced rum. Add coca-cola to the ridge of jar. Fill with orange juice. Garnish with lemon wedge and serve.

drinks.name: Daydream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz Lemon schnapps (Lemon Tattoo)
  • 1/4 - 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 - 3/4 oz Half-and-half
  • 1/8 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker filled with ice, combine all ingredients. Shake or stir & strain into rocks glass or large shot glass.

drinks.name: Midnight Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 - 1 1/2 oz Blueberry schnapps (Berry Tattoo)
  • Lemonade
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: In collins glass filled with ice, combine the berry tattoo & lemonade. Top with a splash of 7-up. Garnish with lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Damn Good!
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps (DeKuyper Buttershots)
  • 1/4 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer carefully in cordial or shot glass. First ButterShots, then green creme de menthe & Bailey's Irish Cream on top. Lastly, drop the grenadine through the Bailey's. It will settle to the bottom creating a cool effect.

drinks.name: Kris Kringle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Creme de Almond
  • 1/2 oz Root beer schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine creme de almond & root beer schnapps in shot glass. Layer the half-and-half on the top.

drinks.name: Candy Cane
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
  • Half-and-half
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: In highball glass filled with ice, combine peppermint schnapps, white creme de cacao & grenadine. Fill glass with half-and-half. Top with 7-up. Garnish with a small candycane or filbert nuts. Great for the Holidays!

drinks.name: Slow Cooker Cider
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 sticks Cinnamon
  • 1 tsp whole Cloves
  • 1 tsp whole Allspice
  • 2 qt Apple cider
  • 1/2 cup Brown sugar, packed
  • 1 Orange, sliced
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place cinnamon, cloves and allspice in a double thickness of cheesecloth: bring up corners of cloth and tie with a string to form a bag. Place cider and brown sugar in a slow cooker: stir until sugar dissolves. Add spice bag. Place orange slices on top. Cover and cook on low for 2-5 hours. Remove spice bag before serving.

drinks.name: Dr. Peppermint
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 12 oz Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix 1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps and 12 oz. of Dr. Pepper together.

drinks.name: Salty Chihuahua
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tequila
  • Grapefruit juice
  • 1 dash Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with grapefruit juice and add a dash of salt.

drinks.name: ChoozyMothers Milk
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 gal Milk
  • 1 gal Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 gal White rum (Bacardi)
  • 5 gal Vanilla ice-cream
  • 10 oz Cinnamon powder
  • 1 fifth Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a large kettle (lobster pot), mix the Bacardi 151 Dark Rum, Bacardi White Rum, Kahlua, Milk and Vanilla Ice Cream (keep the ice cream in its form from the carton). Stir and mix in the cinnamon powder.

drinks.name: A.T.B. (Ask The Barman)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/5 Melon liqueur
  • 1/5 Grenadine
  • 1/5 Blue Curacao
  • 1/5 Amaretto
  • 1/5 Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient slowly down the side of a shot glass in order, they will settle nicely layered. Shoot.

drinks.name: Lady Godiva
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp Sugar
  • 2 dashes Triple sec
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • Brandy
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake sugar, triple sec, lime and lemon juice with ice. Strain into a highball glass. Fill with brandy.

drinks.name: Purple Rain #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Fill Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all contents (similar to a Long Island replacing the Coke for Chambord) in a highball glass and sitr gently. Add Chambord to taste. Garnish with lemon or lime twist.

drinks.name: Homemade Advocaat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 cup granulated Sugar
  • 3/4 tsp Vanilla extract
  • 1/2 tsp Lemon extract
  • 1 cup Vodka
  • 5 Egg
  • 1 Egg yolk
  • 2/3 cup evaporated Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender for 30 seconds until they are mixed well. Pour into container, cap and refrigerate. Let it age for 1 to 2 weeks to mellow. The color will intensify as it ages, reaching a more traditional light shade of yellow.

drinks.name: Beam Me Up
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jim Beam
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 6 oz Coca-Cola
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill cocktail glass with ice. Add Jim Beam Bourbon and Amaretto. Then add Coca-Cola and stir.

drinks.name: Noche de Phoof
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Crown Royal
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Melon liqueur (Midori)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in a shaker and add ingredients. Shake vigorously. Drink should be frothy on top. Pour into highball glass and garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Guinness Float
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 bottle Guinness stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the ice cream in first, then add the Guinness carefully. Wait for the head to go down then fill to top. Blend if you want a milkshake.

drinks.name: 6am Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 9 oz Mountain Dew
  • 3 oz Gin
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill high-ball glass with ice. Pour in the Mt. Dew and gin, then stir. Then add the grenadine. Do not stir in the grenadine.

drinks.name: Backseat Boogie #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 part Ginger ale
  • 1 part Cranberry juice (Ocean Spray)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour one oz of each, vodka and gin over ice in a 14 oz glass, and fill rest with ginger ale and cranberry juice. Garnish with fruit and serve.

drinks.name: Liquid Cocaine #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/4 oz Cointreau
  • 3/4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker, shake and strain.

drinks.name: Watermelon Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 16 oz seeded and blended Watermelon
  • 1/2 Lime
  • 6 oz Tequila
  • 3 oz Triple sec
  • 1 tblsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Cut up watermelon, removing seeds. Liquify in blender until you have about 16 oz. Add remaining ingredients, top with ice and blend until smooth. Taste and add sugar if watermelon is not sweet enough. This works well with sugar on the rim of the glass.

drinks.name: Jamaican Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 4 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor Vodka, Peach Schnapps, and Orange juice in glass and be sure to mix them well. Then add the Cranberry and let it sit at the top of the glass.

drinks.name: Tropicetto
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Amaretto
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 shot Heavy cream
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and pour into a hurricane glass.

drinks.name: Rob Love
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 1 cl white Curacao
  • 1 cl Sweet Vermouth (Martini Bianco)
  • 2/3 part Lemon juice
  • 1/3 part Sprite
  • 3 drops Strawberry syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the indegrients in a glass and stir. Add ice cubes.

drinks.name: Red Zalo
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 2 parts Lemon juice
  • 1 part Sprite
  • 3 drops Strawberry syrup
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add pisang and squash (lemon juice) and ice cubes in a mixer and mix it. Then add Sprite and the strawberry syrup.

drinks.name: Shit on the Grass
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/2 shot Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shot glass add Creme de Menthe on bottom of glass and then add baileys on top of creme de methe, thus making the effect as what the cocktail is called.

drinks.name: Purple Rain Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into chilled shot glass.

drinks.name: Three Musketeers
drinks.ingredients:
• Tia maria
  • Dark Creme de Cacao
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Three Sheets to The Wind
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/3 Rumple Minze
  • 1/3 Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Clueless
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 4 oz Strawberry juice
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Once the Vodka and all of the extra ingredient's are added to your glass, stir. Add ice.

drinks.name: Astral Gateway
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • 1 cl Lemon juice
  • 10 cl Ginger ale
  • Fill with Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ingredients into the glass, fill with ice.

drinks.name: Kung Fu
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl JÃ¤germeister
  • 2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • Fill with Cola
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take the ice cubes and put them in the glass. Then add JÃ¤germeister and Pisang Ambon. Then fill the glass with Cola.

drinks.name: Turby's Amaretto
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Amaretto
  • Splash Lemon juice
  • Fill with Pepsi Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: No matter what size glass used, make sure the amount of pepsi to Amaretto is at least 2 to 1. Stir the drink lightly and add ingredients to suit your personal taste.

drinks.name: Creamy Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Irish cream
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in order and stir.

drinks.name: Flaming Yager
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 glass Guinness stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: Light the JÃ¤germeister on fire and drop it in the glass of Guinness. Now pound it quick. There you go!

drinks.name: Southern Raspberry Tart
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the 4 equal parts and pour into short rocks glass.

drinks.name: Blow Job #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: First put in the Creme De Banane Then float the baileys irish cream on top Then add a small shot of cream. Give the glass a quick swirl before drinking.

drinks.name: Iceberg
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice in blender, blend, pour in frozen highball. Garnish with cinnamon stick or chocolate shavings.

drinks.name: The Celt
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Blueberry schnapps (Blueberry Tattoo)
  • 1 shot Scotch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the drink pouring the Tattoo in first as it is slightly heavier than the scotch.

drinks.name: Get Laid
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 6 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Raspberry liqueur, vodka, and pineapple juice in the mixer, shake, strain, pour into glass, then add splash of cranberry juice.

drinks.name: Mekong
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 - 3/4 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/4to1/2 oz Pina colada mix
  • dash 7-Up
  • splash Heavy cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the first ten ingredients (malibu, peach, strawberry, banana, melon, blue, orange juice, pineapple juice, pina mix, 7-up) in a shaker. Pour into a hurricane glass, then top with cream. Garnish with whatever fresh fruit you have on hand, NO limes, please for your own good. Throw some Filberts in if you feel like it.

drinks.name: Sammy Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz White rum
  • to taste Pineapple juice
  • to taste Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in a blender with ice cubes. (More ice = more froth.) Blend until smooth and frothy. Pour into glass and enjoy.

drinks.name: Mom's Apple Pie
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 2 1/2 oz Apple schnapps
  • 1 tblsp Hot Damn
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour apple schnapps over ice and float Hot Damn on top.

drinks.name: A joy of Almond
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • Float 1/2 oz Creme de Almond
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill rocks glass, start with Kahlua, layer Amaretto and Creme de almond.

drinks.name: Dutch turbo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Malibu rum
  • 1 cl PiÃ±a Colada
  • 1 cl Passoa
  • 1 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 6 cl Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix on the rocks. Pour it all over cubed ice. Put a wedge pineapple on the glass. Serve it the way they want it.

drinks.name: Juicy Volkheimer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Coconut rum

drinks.name: Schmooze
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Orange juice
  • 12 oz 7-Up
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add o.j. and 7-up. Stir. Add ice.

drinks.name: Texas Apple Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 pint Rum
  • Add 16 oz Apple juice
  • Mix in 8 oz Gatorade Mountain Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Nothing special, just mix.

drinks.name: Kamikaze Kool
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
  • Add Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a glass with ice. Simultaneously pour in the Vodka and Grand Marnier. Add lime juice. Stir with a straw and serve.

drinks.name: Shit On Grass
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 shot Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add half a shot of Midori Melon Liquer, then pour Kaluah to top it off.

drinks.name: Key Lime Pie
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Licor 43
  • 1 splash Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Milk or cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into mixing cup filled with ice, shake and strain into glass.

drinks.name: The Real Jungle-Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Everclear (190 proof)
  • 6 bags Fruit (berries, cherries, pineapple, or whatever)
  • 2 1/2 gal Fruit punch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the stuff togather in a big container. Start with everclear add juice and then fruit. Stir togather, don't eat fruit for a while let it soak up some of the everclear.

drinks.name: Shannon on the Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • Fill 1/2 Orange juice
  • Fill 1/2 Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the two alcohols and fill with orange and cranberry juice

drinks.name: Bondages' No Problem
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Rum
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Gin
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • 1/2 shot Grenadine
  • 1 cup Cranberry juice
  • 1/4 cup Orange juice
  • 1/4 cup Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing cup, cover cup with a lid and shake. Pour over ice and enjoy.

drinks.name: Jack Lemmon M.D.
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Jack Daniels
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • Fill with Dr. Pepper
  • Ice Cubes
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Jack Daniels and Lemon Juice over Ice. Top off with Dr. Pepper. Garnish with Lemon Slice. Stir.

drinks.name: Heliuva Rootbeer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 8 oz Root beer
  • Fill with Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into glass and serve.

drinks.name: Screaming Multiple Climax
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • Fill with Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Best if built in a mixing glass with ice, shaken and poured into Hurricane glass, but can be built directly in the Hurricane glass.

drinks.name: Protein Smoothie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Scotch
  • 1/3 oz Cream
  • 1/3 oz Clamato juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shoot ingredients into a shot glass. Shake it up good and swallow.

drinks.name: GTV
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Tequila
  • 2 cl Vodka
  • An optional Ice cube
drinks.mixinginstructions: The ingredients are best preserved cold for this purpose. To mix, just pour the ingredients into a glass. Add the ice cube, if you like.

drinks.name: Kalimotxo
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 cl Red wine
  • 10 cl Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Best served cold, but without ice.

drinks.name: Burning Worm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Mezcal
  • 1 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put into seperate shot glasses. Shoot the mezcal first then chase with goldschlager.

drinks.name: Snowboard
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka
  • 3 cl Eggnog
  • Fill with Soda water
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything togeather in the glass and make sure that the ice is crushed. The best is if the ice is like 'slush'. You can also serve the drink with a slice of kiwi.

drinks.name: Simple but Sweet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Apricot nectar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka in rocks glass. Half fill with apricot nectar.

drinks.name: Gravedigger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 shot Whiskey (James B. Beam)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass half and half with bacardi 151 and Jim Beam whiskey in any order you want.

drinks.name: Rocket Fuel #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/4 shot Vodka
  • 1/4 shot Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the ingrediants in the order they are listed to a shot glass. Drink. That's about it.

drinks.name: The Canadian Gulp
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Amaretto
  • 1 pint Beer
  • 2 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the amaretto into the jar. Follow it up by pouring a chilled beer (Canadian if possible). Then top it off with the Coke.

drinks.name: Shot of Hell
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Top off with Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour shot of vodka into shot glass then top off with a generous portion of Tabasco.

drinks.name: Jim's Special #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • Ice cubes
  • Fill with Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put in vodka, cherry brandy, grenadine and ice. Then fill glass with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Joe's Killer Bee
