drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Wild Turkey
  • Float 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 3 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients then top with 151 Rum.

drinks.name: Jamaican Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Jamaican Rum
  • 5 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 3 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: You must mix your drink with these amounts otherwise you'll taste an extremely bitter drink or a very disgusting puke creater. Before you pour the drink, you must put the ice cubes in the mason jar.

drinks.name: Jamaican Cabdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Orange juice
  • 4 oz Coconut rum
  • 1 - 2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in glass. Add orange juice and coconut rum. Add 1 to 2 oz. of cranberry juice, depending on your taste. Stir well.

drinks.name: Purple Hardon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cherry liqueur
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Sour mix
  • Add 1 splash Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill pilsner with ice and build. Serve in frosted glass.

drinks.name: Bloody Tampon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Tomato juice (V-8)
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Yukon Jack, tequila, and vodka (all chilled) in a cocktail glass. Add room temperature V-8 tomato juice without mixing. Strain irish cream on top and then splash with lemon juice to curdle giving drink a cotton-like texture.

drinks.name: Water Moccasin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice, strain into a shooter.

drinks.name: Harry Boy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Cointreau
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl Whiskey
  • 7 cl Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix and use ice. Served cool.

drinks.name: Glam Trash
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts chilled Cinnamon schnapps (Goldschlager)
  • 1 part Beer (Bud light)
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 3/4 glass with chilled Goldschlager then add 1/4 glass of Bud Light. Splash grenadine on top for color. Allow the beer to suspend the gold flake in the glass. Serve immediately.

drinks.name: Cosmonaut
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Tang
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 3 cubes Ice, crushed
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix really well and Serve.

drinks.name: Miss V
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Serve over ice.

drinks.name: Pixy Stick
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • Fill with Lemonade
  • 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 shot Blackberry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice to glass. Add shot of Southern Comfort. Fill glass with Lemonade. leaving enough room on top to add the shot of Blackberry Brandy.

drinks.name: Godiva Peppermint Patty
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 cup Hot chocolate
  • 1 shot Peppermint schnapps (Rumple Minze)
  • 1 shot Godiva liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1/2 cup Hot Cocoa into a Brandy Snifter. Add 1 shot of Peppermint Schnapps (Rumple Minze). Add 1 shot of Godiva. Stir. Top with Whip Cream.

drinks.name: Pooky and Chooky
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish cream
  • 1 oz Pisang Ambon
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Pour into glass without ice.

drinks.name: Russian Monster Tom Collins
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Vodka
  • 5 oz Sour mix
  • Grenadine to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and sour mix. Use more or less sour mix to taste. Mix in grenadine to taste. Serve cold, preferably over ice.

drinks.name: Horny Bull #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Tequila
  • 1/2 shot Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour and slug back.

drinks.name: Horny Bull #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Tequila
  • 1/2 shot Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour and slug back

drinks.name: Jinx
drinks.ingredients:
• 20 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 30 oz Sprite
  • 10 oz Blueberry schnapps
  • 5 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 10 oz Grape juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Bailey's, blueberry scnapps, Irish cream, and then vodka, and then add grape juice, then sprite. Stir up and have fun.

drinks.name: Navy Seal
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila (Cuervo)
  • 2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine JÃ¤germeister and Cuervo tequila together on the rocks and hold on.

drinks.name: The Marv Alberts
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with 3 oz of Bailey's Irish Creme, then add 1 oz of Southern Comfort, followed by mixing in 1 oz of Buterscotch Schnapps.

drinks.name: Peach Nehi
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Cheri Beri Pucker
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain over ice

drinks.name: Southern Comfort Kamikaze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain over ice

drinks.name: Club CubÃ
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts red Sweet Vermouth
  • 2 parts White rum
  • 1 part Maraschino liqueur
  • 1 piece Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass filled with ice, stir and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish: cherry.

drinks.name: Southern Brain Damage
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1/3 shot Tia maria
  • 2-3 drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill 2/3 shot with Southern Comfort. Add 1/3 left Tia Maria. Do not mix. Add a couple drops of grenadine for effect (or for sweetness desired).

drinks.name: Southern Beamy Brain Damage (SBBD)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1/3 shot Jim Beam
  • 1/3 shot Tia maria
  • 2-3 drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In shot glass, pour 1/3 Southern Comfort and 1/3 Jim Beam. Add 1/3 Tia Maria and let set and form. Do not mix. Add a couple drops of grenadine (or as sweet as desired).

drinks.name: Shittin' Blue
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Blueberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 drop blue Food coloring
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in this order: blueberry schnapps, blue caracoa, vodka. Carefully drop in the blue syrup. Drink down and enjoy!

drinks.name: Helluva Hurricane
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum (Meyer's)
  • 1 1/2 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 1/2 tsp Grenadine
  • 1/2 tsp Sugar
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 2 Cherries
  • 1 chunk Pineapple
  • 1 cube Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour dark rum, light rum, juices, and grenadine over ice into a pilsner/parfait glass. Add the half spoon of sugar, stir slightly, and top with high octane 151 rum and cherries/pineapple. Add the optional sugar cube & light it up!

drinks.name: Strawberry Banana Colada
drinks.ingredients:
• Fill glass with Ice cubes
  • 1 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a highball glass. Shake well. Garnish with a flag (orange and cherry).

drinks.name: Cunnilingus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • Top with Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Bailey's, Peach Schnapps and pineapple juice with ice. Pour in shot glass Top with whipped cream

drinks.name: Mind Game
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Ricard
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Ricard, Blue Curacao and 2% milk with ice

drinks.name: Ragnar #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Kurant
  • 8 cl Sprite
  • cube Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take first the vodka then fill up with ice finally add the sprite (not to much).

drinks.name: Mangan Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish cream
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi Black rum
  • 1/2 oz Myer's Dark rum
  • 11 oz Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients in order given.

drinks.name: Russian Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all three incrediants with ice, shake, and then strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Sex at my House
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Amaretto Di Saronno
  • 3/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker. Shake and strain.

drinks.name: Haacker Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 6 cubes Lime
  • 1 tblsp Sugar
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put vodka in glass, put in sugar and the crushed ice with the lime cubes and stir all until all sugar is dissolved

drinks.name: Jennifer's Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Butterscotch schnapps (Buttershots)
  • 1 part Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into shaker over ice, shake well and strain into shot glasses. Take entire shot in one swallow.

drinks.name: Fluffy Dog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix both ingredients with ice, strain into cocktail glass or serve over ice.

drinks.name: Jimmy's special
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 glass Champagne
  • 1/3 glass Cognac
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the cognac in a glass and after that, the champagne.

drinks.name: Malibu Jane
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 3 tsp Cocoa powder
  • 1 pint Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Coconut Rum. Pour in Milk. Mix in two teaspoons of cocoa powder. Add one last teaspoon of cocoa powder: called 'One to grow one.' Let stand for one minute.

drinks.name: Purple Lei
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice into a shaker. Shake, then strain into a chilled shot glass.

drinks.name: Four Horsemen #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Bourbon (Jim Beam)
  • 1/4 oz Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's)
  • 1/4 oz Scotch (Johnnie Walker Red)
  • 1/4 oz Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour straight up.

drinks.name: Boomer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend, add ice, strain.

drinks.name: Royal Butt
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps (Buttershots)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain.

drinks.name: Oatmeal Cookie with Raisins
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps (Buttershots)
  • 1/4 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/4 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend, add ice, strain into rocks glass

drinks.name: Green Jolly Rancher
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 splash Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake with ice, strain into rocks glass

drinks.name: Chocolate Covered Cheery
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • 2 shots Milk
  • Large splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into Glass

drinks.name: Cocaine Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Tia maria
  • 1/4 oz Half-and-half
  • 1 splash Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain. Serve in chilled shot glass.

drinks.name: Beam Me Up Scotty
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer.

drinks.name: Virgin Whore
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1/2 oz Apple juice
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 drops blue Food coloring
  • 2 drops red Food coloring
  • 1 oz Lime Kool-Aid
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, lime juice, kool-aid, food colorings, and cranberry juice in shot glass. Slowly add apple juice down the side of the glass to mix. Then, add tequila and enjoy!

drinks.name: Blueberry Tea #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/2 cup blueberry or black currant Tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour amaretto and grand marnier in the glass Add hot tea

drinks.name: Monte Cristo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • Fill with hot Coffee
  • Top with Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Moisten rim of glass with lemon juice: dip in sugar Pour Kahlua and Grand Marnier in glass Fill, almost to the top, with coffee Top with Whipped Cream and grated chocolate

drinks.name: Zoo Station
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Coffee liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients over ice. Strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Sailor's Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 2 parts Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir together Serve together

drinks.name: Mr. Freeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Vodka
  • Mix with 1 - 2 bag Fishermans Friend Candy (Classic)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take the bottle of Vodka, make room in it for the Fishermans friend. Mix together so that the Fishermans Friend dissolves in the vodka. Let stay for a couple of days (at least, gets better the older it is). Then pour the mix in a shotglass and drink!

drinks.name: Tea Toddy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Tea (Earl Grey or Yellow label)
  • Sugar to taste
  • 1 shot Bailey's irish cream to taste
  • 1 dash Scotch (Optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make tea as you usually do. Mix it with the sugar according to taste. Leave room in the cup for a dash of Baileys. Pour the baileys in according to taste, then, if you want, a dash of Whiskey if you want. Not too much though, as the drink won't taste good.

drinks.name: DC
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Tequila in a double shot glass, then add the baileys Slam then repeat

drinks.name: German Chocolate Cake
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/4 oz Frangelico
  • 1 splash Half-and-half
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass. Shake and strain over ice. Garnish with four squirts of canned whipped cream about 3/4 inches high at 12, 3, 6, and 9 O'Clock

drinks.name: Mexican Surfer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Malibu rum
  • 2 oz Tequila
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: First, put Malibu rum into glass. Then add Tequila and pineapple juice. Last add ice and stir.

drinks.name: Frozen Strawberry Banana Colada
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Dark rum
  • 2 oz Coconut cream
  • 2 oz Strawberries
  • 1 medium Banana
  • 8 oz crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blender until smooth. Pour. Garnish with fresh strawberry.

drinks.name: Orange Julius
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz frozen Orange juice
  • 250 ml Milk
  • 250 ml Water
  • 65 ml Sugar
  • 5 ml Vanilla extract
  • 10 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender for 30 seconds. Serve immediately.

drinks.name: Colonial Rummer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Dark rum (Myer's)
  • 1 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 oz Peach brandy
  • Fill with crushed Ice
  • 1 wedge Orange
  • 1 wedge Lime
  • 1 stem Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add crushed glass halfway up glass. Add liquor ingredients. Stir with swizzle stick. Garnish with fruit. Relax and sip.

drinks.name: Sweaty Mexican Lumber Jack
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1/4 oz Tequila
  • 3-4 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the shot glass 3/4 with Yukon Jack. Next fill the rest of the shot glass with Tequila. Last add 3 to 4 drops of tabasco sause.

drinks.name: Kori's Saturday Night Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. If it gets too thick, add some cream. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

drinks.name: Roadkill
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 shot Hot Damn
  • 1 shot Canadian whisky (Crown Royal)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all 3 ingredients into the glass and serve with a Coke back.

drinks.name: Bleeding Snatch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Hot Damn
  • 1 stick Cinnamon to stir with
  • 5 oz V-8 Tomato juice (or tabasco for the real men)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients together in highball glass stir with cinnamon stick, and enjoy your very own beeding snatch

drinks.name: Dracona
drinks.ingredients:
• 25 cl Advocaat
  • 50 cl fresh Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
  • 25 cl Sambuca
  • 25 cl Green Creme de Menthe
  • Fill with Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Adocaat and orange fruit juice straight into the glass, there will be a little curdling but dont worry. Add the ice cubes into the glass then Sambuca , slide creme de Menthe down the side. A yellow green yellow formation shouls occur, then add lemonade.

drinks.name: Gin Gin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Gin
  • 3 parts Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ginger ale over gin.

drinks.name: Whiskey Orange the Jesperian Way
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 part Johnnie Walker
  • 1/4 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix them.

drinks.name: Bayou Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/5 oz Malibu rum
  • 2/5 oz Rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 2/5 oz Amaretto
  • 2/5 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2/5 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour equal parts of all ingrediants into a shaker filled with ice. Chill, shake and strain!

drinks.name: Sip and Get Funky
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 3 oz Beer
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients and slam it.

drinks.name: Dirty Diaper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour equal parts of all ingrediants into a shaker filled with ice, and chill, shake, and strain.

drinks.name: Passout
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/5 Amaretto
  • 1/5 Licor 43
  • 1/5 Southern Comfort
  • 1/5 Triple sec
  • 1/5 Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir lightly, with or without ice

drinks.name: The Antichrist
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Everclear
  • 1/3 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/3 shot Absolut Peppar
  • 3 dashes Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each of the first 3 ingredients into a shot glass and then add the Tabasco sauce on the top.

drinks.name: Shake That Ass
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 3/4 oz Banana liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Sour mix
  • 3/4 oz Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Wildfire
drinks.ingredients:
• About 20 drops Tabasco sauce
  • 1 shot Tequila
  • 1 shot Peppermint schnapps
  • Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: You need 3 shot glasses and a beer glass (I use a schooner - 425 mL - but of course use whatever you feel necessary). Put the tabasco sauce in one shot glass. This is the firestarter. The tequila shot is the propellant which spreads the fire. The peppermint schnapps shot brings the fire under control, and finally, the beer puts out the last of the flames.

drinks.name: The Better Fuzzy Navel
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Peach schnapps
  • 5 oz Peach juice
  • 3 oz Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients together, then freeze drink until slushy (usually 2 hours) serve in highball glass, and enjoy!

drinks.name: Flaming Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/5 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka in shot glass, carefully layer rum on top. Ignite rum and serve.

drinks.name: Gila Monster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker, top with orange juice.

drinks.name: Miami Hurricane
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1 1/2 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 2 parts Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in order: Ice, vodka, juices.

drinks.name: Jagershock
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Aftershock
  • 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill the two ingredients then pour into a chilled shot glass (the order you put them in does not matter).

drinks.name: Milpsi
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 parts Pepsi Cola
  • 1 part 2% Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour milk in first then pepsi and drink before it starts to seperate.

drinks.name: Bananaball
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Banana liqueur
  • 3 cl Vodka
  • 8 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

drinks.name: Cubins Cracker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 6 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 3 - 4 cubes Ice
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry cordial
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Schnapps, Southern Comfort, Juice and Ice to Shaker. Shake briefly and pour unstrained into the collins glass. Gently pour Curacao down the side of the glass, to allow it to sink to the bottom. Then add raspberry cordial over a spoon, to allow it to float on top. Serve with straws and a slice of Orange.

drinks.name: Hot Bitch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 cl Vodka
  • 2 1/2 cl Whisky
  • 2 1/2 cl Gin
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all the alcholic measures into the glass without stirring, add the dash of tabasco and it's ready.

drinks.name: Dick Hard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • Fill with Sprite
  • Garnish with Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all three liquors then fill with Sprite. Garnish, and serve.

drinks.name: Purple Motherfucker #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Blueberry schnapps
  • Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, blue curaco, blueberry schnapps. Add cranberry juice until the solution is purple. Pour in shot glass.

drinks.name: McShake
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 4 oz Milk
  • 2 scoops Cookies n' Cream or Vanilla ice-cream
  • Chocolate syrup to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all of the ingredients in a blender. The chocolate syrup should be added to the liking of the drinker. Next blend until you have achieved desired thickness. Whipped cream and additional toppings are optional.

drinks.name: Breath Freshener
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 2 parts White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 Mint leaf (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place the mint leaf in the bottom of the glass. Add the vodka first and fill with the creme de menthe.

drinks.name: Coffee Grinder
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Kahlua
  • 3 parts Amaretto
  • 3 parts Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Scotch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into glass and stir. Shoot.

drinks.name: Etyk
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Parfait d'Amour
  • 2 dashes Grenadine
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve with ice!

drinks.name: Buzz Lightyear
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3 oz fresh Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over cracked ice filled in glass and stir briefly.

drinks.name: Lucky Stiff
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Orange Curacao
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice and stir.

drinks.name: Ice-T
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Peach schnapps
  • 1 - 2 shot Rum
  • 1/2 glass 7-Up
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or stir. Serve with ice.

drinks.name: Frisky's Surprise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 can Limeade (Minute Maid)
  • 2 cups Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1/2 handful frozen Strawberries
  • 2 oz Lime juice
  • Appx. 15 Ice cubes
  • A bit Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in blender, mix well, and enjoy.

drinks.name: Hot Brown Lizard
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Midori with cinnamon schnapps until the desired tone of brown is achieved.

drinks.name: Funky Filly
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3/4 oz Melon liqueur (Midori)
  • 3/4 oz Cherry liqueur (Wild Cherry)
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 oz Lemon-lime soda
  • 1 jigger Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients and strain over ice.

drinks.name: Shoot to the Moon
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • Ice cubes
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine (Rose's)
  • 1 splash 7-Up or Squirt
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a tall drink glass, fill it up half way with cubed ice. Add liquor. Then add cranberry juice, grenadine and soda, and mix well.

drinks.name: Sour Apple #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/4 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place ingredients in mixing cup with ice,shake strain into glass.

drinks.name: The End of the World
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Wild Turkey 101 proof
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve warm. Straight into the shot glass.

drinks.name: Chameleon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 glass Orange juice
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: All over ice. Colour should be a lovely turquoise.

drinks.name: Flaming Hurley
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 splash Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add one shot of Southern Comfort and a splash of Dr. Pepper in a shot glass.

drinks.name: The Bootlegger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Jack Daniels
  • 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 shot Sambuca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix three shots together in a glass. Pour over ice. Sit down and drink.

drinks.name: Tattooed Smurf
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blueberry schnapps (Blue Tattoo)
  • 10 oz Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Sprite over ice, add Tattoo and Stir

drinks.name: Bitch Slap
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Smirnoff Vodka (Blue label)
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Everclear
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • Fill with Lemonade
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it together over ice and drink.

drinks.name: Jim Kroener
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Jack Daniels
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Lime juice
  • 3 parts Sugar
  • 2 oz Vanilla syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the ingredients in a big ol' jar and enjoy!

drinks.name: Melon Jones
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Everclear
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and shoot.

drinks.name: Orchard Downs
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz dry Gin
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • Fill with Apple cider
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix one shot of Dry Gin (more if you like) and fill glass with Apple Cider (or Apple Juice, but the cider is really better). Add Grenadine (optional) to taste.

drinks.name: Bullshot #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Beef bouillon
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
  • 1 dash Worcestershire sauce
  • 1 dash Celery salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker or pitcher with several ice cubes and stir. Strain into glass straight up or on the rocks and garnish with a stick of celery.

drinks.name: Eroticolada
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Coconut rum (Hiram Walker)
  • 6 oz Pina colada mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend ingredients with crushed ice.

drinks.name: 40 Water
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Traditionally, this drink is created in an empty 20oz bottle of water. Fill the bottle 1/4 full of crushed ice. Add the 3 shots in any order. Add the dash of Grenadine. Fill with pineapple juice. Close the cap, and shake.

drinks.name: Melonoma
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ice, vodka and melon liquer. Strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Fruit Salad
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Sour Apple Pucker
  • 1 part Cheri Beri Pucker
  • 1 part Grape Pucker
  • 1 splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients and serve as a shot or mixed drink.

drinks.name: Axe Murderer
drinks.ingredients:
• Rum
  • Gin
  • Tequila
  • Triple sec
  • Vodka
  • Southern Comfort
  • Amaretto
  • Grenadine
  • Pineapple juice
  • Splash of 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix like a long island iced tea.

drinks.name: B-51
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 oz Kahlua
  • 1/3 oz Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: This drink is best when shaken and strained, but the proper way is to layer the drink. Kahlua is poured first, then Bailey's is next, and Frangelico is layered on top.

drinks.name: Mickey Mouse
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Tomato juice
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp Worcestershire sauce
  • 2-3 drops Tabasco sauce
  • 1 wedge Lime
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

drinks.name: Funky Cold Medina
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • Top off with Cranberry juice
  • 1 Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice and top off with cranberry juice.

drinks.name: Campari Orange
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Campari
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice in highball glass.

drinks.name: Picon Biere
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Amer Picon
  • 20 cl Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix Amer Picon and beer in a pilsner.

drinks.name: Sno-Cone
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Raspberry schnapps (or blueberry)
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, then add schnapps & 7-Up. Add Grenadine and let settle to the bottom of the glass. Carefully float the Blue Curacao over the top of the drink.

drinks.name: Tie Me To The Bedpost #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Midori Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Sweet and sour mix
  • 1/2 oz Lemon vodka
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain into sour glass.

drinks.name: Kiwi Colada
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 oz Cream of coconut
  • 2 Kiwi
  • 1/4 cup Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Whipping cream
  • 1 1/5 cup crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into blender and blend until smooth.

drinks.name: Glaucoma
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 4 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in shaker. Shake well. Strain into glass.

drinks.name: Malibu Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Malibu rum
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • 1 shot Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour malibu rum in a highball glass, and top with orange juice. Stir. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink.

drinks.name: Cancun Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Lime
  • Sugar
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Anisette
  • 1 oz Bailey's Irish cream
  • 2-3 oz Coffee
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Moisten rim of coffee mug with lime and dip rim in sugar. Pour liqueurs into mug and fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Flaming Blue Jesus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer with 151 rum on top. Light on fire - Burn for 5 seconds - Blow it out and drink.

drinks.name: Jeremiah
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/3 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1/3 oz Kahlua
  • Small handful Ice
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients except Milk in mixing glass. Add ice. Fill with milk. Shake vigourously. Pour into glass. Serve.

drinks.name: Manchurian Candidate
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 dash Soy sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: First pour vodka, then soy sauce, into the shot glass.

drinks.name: Cran-Collins
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 oz Collins mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put three cubes of ice in a glass. Pour in Vodka, Cranberry Juice, and Collins Mix. Stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: Tie Me To The Bedpost, Baby
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Midori Melon liqueur
  • 1 part Sloe gin
  • 1 part Absolut Vodka
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice in a hurricane glass.

drinks.name: Raspberry Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Irish cream
  • 1 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients with ice in mixing glass. Shake and strain.

drinks.name: Melon Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila (Juarez)
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • 2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve on the rocks or blend with ice to make a Frozen Melon Margarita.

drinks.name: Sammy Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Vanilla liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and drink

drinks.name: Vanilla Coke
drinks.ingredients:
• 1.5 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1.5 oz Vanilla liqueur
  • 1 can Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put some ice in a glass. Add Southern Comfort, add Vanilla Liqueur, fill glass with coke.

drinks.name: Peachy Comfort
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 can Ginger ale or Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass Half full of ice. Add Southern Comfort and peach schnapps. Fill glass with ginger ale. stir and serve.

drinks.name: Bonsai Pipeline
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Wild Turkey 101 proof
  • 3/4 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shot glass add Wild Turkey and melon liqeur. Float Bacardi 151 on top. Light drink, and squeeze lime in drink. Blow out and shoot.

drinks.name: Fuck Me Up
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Coffee liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice, shake and strain into shooter glass. Shoot drink!

drinks.name: Hot Butterscotch Cocoa
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Coffee liqueur
  • 5 oz Hot chocolate
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in coffee mug, top with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Cornholio's Revenge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
  • Ice cubes
  • 1 wedge Lime
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the malibu rum, banana liqueur, and cherry brandy. Add the ice and sprite. Add lime wedge and serve.

drinks.name: Five in the Morning
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 3/4 oz Rum
  • 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Tequila
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place ice in glass and pour in the five liquors. Next pour in the the orage juice and the sour mix. Finally shake and garnish with an orange slice.

drinks.name: Mazerati
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Absolut Citron
  • Cranberry juice
  • 7-Up
  • Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 3/4 oz Absolut Citron in a highball glass, balance with cranberry juice, top with 7-up, and garnish with lime.

drinks.name: Coast-Line
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • Top with Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash 7-Up
  • Garnish with Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1/2 oz. of Blue Curacao and a 1/2 oz. of vodka in a highball glass. Top with Pineapple juice and a splash of 7-up. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Purple Fantasy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • Grape soda
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1/2 oz. vodka and a 1/2 oz. rum in a highball glass. Top with grape soda. Splash 7-up on top.

drinks.name: 607 Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Rum
  • 8 oz Chocolate milk (Yoo-Hoo)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Blue-Woo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blueberry schnapps
  • Balance with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1/2 oz. vodka and a 1/2 oz. blueberry schnapps in a tall glass. Balance with cranberry juice.

drinks.name: Kahlua Madness
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Kahlua in the glass. Put vodka in the (same) glass. Put tonic in the (same) glass. Suck from the bottom up with two straws.

drinks.name: Lion Tamer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 dash Powdered sugar (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Southern Comfort and Lime Juice in the Martini Glass. Top off with a pinch of Powdered Sugar. Add One Large Ice Cube. Serve.

drinks.name: Tie Me To The Bedpost #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Green Widow
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Blue Curacao
  • 3 parts Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 2 parts of blue curacao to a cocktail glass. Pour over it 3 parts orange juice. Stir and serve cold.

drinks.name: Long Summer Night
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 1/2 oz Sweet and sour mix
  • Fill with Mountain Dew
  • 3 - 4 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice in glass, stir and serve.

drinks.name: El Nino
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 splash Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker, mix ingredients with ice and shake vigorously. Strain over ice in a Hurricane glass. Garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.

drinks.name: Wild Berry Pop-Tart
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Wild Berry Vodka
  • 1 part Smirnoff Vodka
  • 1 part Strawberry schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients into shot glass, slam it on the table and shoot it, followed promptly with a beer.

drinks.name: Oreo Cookie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 splash Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Kahlua, Creme de Cacao, and Bailey's (on top), then top with a splash of vodka.

drinks.name: 8 Seconds
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz Hot Damn
  • 1 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingrediants with ice and strain. Serve chilled.

drinks.name: 187 URge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Jack Daniels
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 6 shots Dr. Pepper
  • 1 dash Sugar
  • 1 piece Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together and stir it is good

drinks.name: Vodka Ricki
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Vodka
  • 16 oz Sprite or 7-Up
  • Squeze 3 wedges Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add 3 shots of vodka into a tall glass of ice and then add 16 oz. of sprite or 7up, then squeeze three lime wedges in to the the drink mix.

drinks.name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • Top with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Collins glass with ice. Add 2 oz. of vodka and 1 oz. triple sec. Fill glass almost to the top with pineapple juice, add Grenadine for color, and top off the glass with 7-Up or Slice. Shake or stir until the drink turns a light orange-pink color.

drinks.name: Malibu Pink Panther
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 can frozen Pink lemonade
  • 6-10 oz Malibu rum
  • Whipped cream
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a blender, crush a hand full or two of ice. Then add the frozen pink lemonade and Malibu Rum. Blend until it becomes somewhat smooth (usually less than 30 seconds). Then add the whipped cream while leaving the blender running. This will add the consistency to your drink and therefore the amount of whipped cream is to your discression. Blend until smooth and serve.

drinks.name: 357 Magnum
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1 oz Rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • Add 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and rum over ice. Add 7-up and stir. Add Amaretto (without stirring) and enjoy.

drinks.name: L.A.P.D. Nightshift
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Grenadine
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in shot glass.

drinks.name: Green Sneaker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1 splash Cream
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Southern Santa
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1 1/2 oz Coconut rum
  • Fill with Eggnog
  • Stir in Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball half full with ice. Add coconut rum. Fill with eggnog. Stir in grenadine to desired red (no more than 1 oz).

drinks.name: Smooth Sailing
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve over ice. Drizzle cherry brandy over the top of other ingredients. Garnish with lime and cherry.

drinks.name: Jim Beam's Redneck Friend
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 pint Jim Beam
  • 2 L Sunny delight
  • 2 L Fruit punch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients in bowl and mix well.

drinks.name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 2 splashes Canadian whisky (Canadian Club)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix blue curacao and melon liqueur (cold strain for best results) and top off with 2 splashes of Canadian Club Rye.

drinks.name: Mandy Sea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
  • 1/4 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix liquor and juices in mixing cup and blend. Pour over ice in collins glass top with grenadine and splash of 7-up. Garnish with a flag or two cherries.

drinks.name: Jamaican Jambaylaya
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Spiced rum
  • Fill With Fruit punch
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rum over ice. Fill to top with fruit punch.

drinks.name: Bloody Pearl Harbor
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Tomato juice (V8)
  • 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 1/2 shot Vodka (Stoli)
  • 3 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: stir well with ice. Adding a few drops of hot sauce for flavor is optional.

drinks.name: Fat Box
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingrediants in mixing glass with ice cubes. Shake and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Hershey Squirts
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Hot chocolate
  • 1 part Whiskey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make Cocoa in the traditional method, add Whiskey liberally

drinks.name: Purple Helmeted Warrior
drinks.ingredients:
• 25 ml Blue Curacao
  • 25 ml Southern Comfort
  • 25 ml Peach schnapps (Archers)
  • 25 ml White rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 dash Lime juice cordial
  • 7-Up
  • 5-6 drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all spirits in together with Rose's lime juice, then add the 7-up to taste, and finally the grenadine to traffic light.

drinks.name: Flaming Asshole
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/2 oz Rum (Overproof is best)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in this order: Grenadine, creme de menthe, banana liqueur, white rum. Light rum before serving. Server with a straw.

drinks.name: Killer Bee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Barenjager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both liquors in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Sweaty Mexican
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Beer
  • 1 1/4 oz Tequila
  • 1 splash Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mug half way with beer. Splash Rum on Tequila in shot glass, then light with match. Drop flaming shot glass in mug. Drop in a lime slice. Chug it.

drinks.name: Dark and Stormy #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gosling's Dark rum
  • 1 bottle Ginger beer
  • 1 slice Lime
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rum into glass over ice. Pour ginger beer over it. Squeeze in lime and drop slice in. Drink it down.

drinks.name: Schlag-n-nog
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Eggnog
  • 1 part Goldschlager
  • Ground Nutmeg (Optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the egg nog and Goldschlager together in a bowl. Add nutmeg if desired.

drinks.name: Depressed Goalie
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 3 1/2 oz Bourbon (Jim Beam)
  • 2 oz Pepsi Cola
  • 2 oz Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the jar with ice. Pour over the 3 1/2 oz of whiskey (Jim Beam). Then add the Pepsi and Mountain Dew. Mix if desired.

drinks.name: Aggie Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Gold tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • 6 oz Apple-cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients and stir. Best served over ice and in a clear glass.

drinks.name: Tropical Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• Crushed Ice
  • 2 shots Spiced rum
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • 2 shots Orange juice
  • 2 shots Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 shot Grenadine
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Half fill glass with crushed ice. Add rum, triple sec, orange juice, and pineapple juice. Stir. Add Grenadine and top with cherry and other fruit.

drinks.name: Pisco-rita
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz frozen Limeade concentrate
  • 6 oz Pisco
  • 3 oz Triple sec
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add limeade concentrate, Pisco, and triple sec in blender. Add ice until blender is full. Blend on high speed adding water until blender is full while blending. Serve in margarita glass rimmed with salt if desired.

drinks.name: Green Ocean
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 2 cl Sour mix
  • 2 cl Passion fruit juice
  • 10 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend quickly and serve.

drinks.name: Westwood Ice Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila (Cuervo Especial)
  • 1 oz Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1 oz Light rum (Bacaradi)
  • 1 oz Cinnamon schnapps Goldschlager)
  • 3 splashes Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli Vanil)
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a Beer mug full of ice, pour in the tequila, gin, light rum and stir. Now Stir in the cinnamon schnapps, then stir in the vanilla vodka. Finally splash the high proof rum on top

drinks.name: Santa Monica Pier
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz AlizÃ©
  • 2 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a tall glass with ice, pour the Alize and Triple Sec, stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cinnamon schnapps (Goldschlagger)
  • 2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli Vanil)
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a moderlately sized glass (about 8 to 12 oz or so) pour in finely crushed ice, followed by the cinnamon schnapps and vanilla vodka.

drinks.name: 49er Gold Rush
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Cinnamon schnapps (Goldschlager)
  • 1/2 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in tequila, and cinnamon schnapps in a shot glass (chilled, to your advantage).

drinks.name: Wild Wendy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1/2 oz Coconut rum (Parrot Bay)
  • 1 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient in a shaker. Shake well. Serve over ice.

drinks.name: Afterlanche
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Aftershock
  • 1 oz Avalanche Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer liquors in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Uncle Sam
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Aftershock
  • 1/3 oz Avalanche Peppermint schnapps
  • 1/3 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour three liquors in a shot glass. Better if chilled, prettier if layered.

drinks.name: Rieber Red Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Tequila
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 4 oz strawberry Margarita mix
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a blender, put in ice, Strawberry Margarita Mix, Tequila, and triple sec, blend, and serve in a chilled glass or mug, with a straw.

drinks.name: Gayley Avenue Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 3 oz Sweet and sour
  • 3 oz Strawberry Margarita mix
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a blender, pour in ice first, then the sweet and sour mix, followed by the Strawberry Margarita Mix, followed by the tequila and triple sec. Blend until you have a nice mix, pour into chilled glass or mug, top with the cherry.

drinks.name: 3rd Street Promanade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • 1/3 oz Gin
  • 1/3 oz Triple sec
  • 1/3 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Cinnamon schnapps (Goldschlager)
  • 6 oz pulp-free Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a blender, put in ice, orange juice, vodka, cinnamon schnapps, gin, tequila, and triple sec. Blend well, pour in a tall chilled glass. Sip through a straw.

drinks.name: Jim Morrison
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Jim Beam
  • 1/2 oz Wild Turkey
  • 1/2 oz Seagram 7
drinks.mixinginstructions: In chilled double-shot glass (or any chilled glass big enough to hold 2 shots) mix in the Jack D, Jim B, Seagram 7, and Wild Turkey.

drinks.name: Death From Above
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 3 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a freezingly chilled glass pour in Bacardi 151 and Gin. Now light the drink on fire (Be careful!) After a few seconds of burning the drink, pour in the coke.

drinks.name: Klingon Blood Wine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 2 dashes Tabasco sauce
  • Fill with Cranberry juice (Ocean Spray)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with ice filled beer mug. Add tabasco first. Shake twice, a bad blend is terrible!

drinks.name: Ice Cappuccino
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Espresso
  • 1 tblsp instant Coffee (Nescafe Classic)
  • 2 oz Milk
  • 1 oz Vanilla syrup (Monin vanilla)
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Caramel
  • 2 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients with 2 scoops of ice. Pour into Poco grande glass.

drinks.name: Insomniac
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Espresso
  • 1 tblsp instant Coffee (Nescafe)
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1/2 oz Tia maria
  • 2 oz Milk
  • 2 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients with 2 scoops of ice. Pour into Poco grande glass.

drinks.name: Dark Indulgence
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tia maria
  • 3 oz Coca-Cola
  • 1 scoop Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients. Pour into Poco grande glass.

drinks.name: Cyber Smoke
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Lemon vodka (Stoli)
  • 3 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients and pour into champagne flute. Add a small piece of edible dry ice.

drinks.name: Forbidden Smoke
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Passion fruit juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients and pour into cocktail glass. Add a piece of edilbe dry ice.

drinks.name: 360 degress
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Grape juice
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour two of each ingredients in a shot glass then use a coaster to put one shot glass over the top of one another.

drinks.name: Diva
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Passion fruit juice
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 tblsp Maraschino cherry juice
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour and build in a tall glass or collins glass. Fill with 7-up. Garnish with cherry and lime.

drinks.name: Bananas and Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur (99 bananas)
drinks.mixinginstructions: stir until ingredients are mixed well.

drinks.name: Flaming Fruit Trees
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: light on fire for five seconds blow out and suck through a straw.

drinks.name: Absolutely Fruity
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Banana liqueur (99 banana)
  • 1/2 oz Watermelon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix banana and watermelon liqueur in shot glass top with vodka.

drinks.name: Fiery Blue Mustang
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients and light on fire. Blow out flame, saddle up, and enjoy the ride!

drinks.name: Chocolate Covered Cherry Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: add in the order written and mix then add the grenadine

drinks.name: Indian Summer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Amaretto
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all together and take all at once as a shot.

drinks.name: Dr. Kevorkian
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • Fill with Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir well and enjoy!

drinks.name: Blonde Bombshell
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups crushed Ice
  • 5 shots Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 can frozen Lemonade concentrate
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice, rum, and frozen lemonade concentrate to a blender. Blend at high speed. Pour into a margarita glass.

drinks.name: Lennart
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Pear brandy
  • 2 cl Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Fill with Sprite
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour pear brandy and lime juice over ice in glass. Fill with sprite.

drinks.name: Schnappster
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Watermelon schnapps
  • 12 oz Squirt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together and have a good time.

drinks.name: Orange Surfboard
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Orange vodka (Stoli)
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • 1 splash of Cranberry juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all alocohol in a tall glass with ice. Fill with orange juice and a splash of cranberry juice. Shake to mix and serve.

drinks.name: Lime Vodka Collins
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Lime vodka
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • Fill with Club soda
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass 3/4 ths full with cubed ice. Add Vodka, Lemon Juice, Sugar and top off glass with Club Soda.

drinks.name: Flaming Anus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sambuca
  • 1 oz Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Coffee brandy
  • 1 dash Grape juice
  • 1 tblsp Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in mug. Let stand until room temperature. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Cherry Bomb #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • Fill with unsweetened Cherry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add 1 1/2 oz. of vodka. Fill with unsweetened cherry juice.

drinks.name: Door County Cherry Cheesecake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vanilla schnapps (Dr. McGillicuddy's)
  • 1 oz unsweetened Cherry juice
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into shot glasses. (Optional garnish of Whipped cream and a Teddy-Graham on top.) Yields 3 or 4 shots depending on shot glass size and ice melt.

drinks.name: Smirnoff Snapple Spikage
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 - 1 oz 100 proof Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • Fill with Kiwi Strawberry or Grapeade Snapple
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add half of glass with ice cubes. Add Vodka. Fill with Snapple. Mix and serve.

drinks.name: Kordulas Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Champagne
  • 1 cube Sugar
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in the ingredients - Then put a dash of Angostura on the cube - put it in the champagne by using a tong.

drinks.name: Naked Girl Scout
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Godiva liqueur
  • 1 part Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and serve.

drinks.name: Little Black Devil
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 1/2 oz Dark rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into shot glass. Serve.

drinks.name: The Other Half
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a spoon to layer tripple sec, amaretto, and the rum. Turn off the lights, light the rum on fire to warm up the rim of glass, carefully blow out the flame, and enjoy.

drinks.name: Yellow Motherfuckers
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Gin
  • Fill with Mountain Dew
  • 1 - 2 can frozen Lemonade
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: It is best to use a large cooler with a spout. The amount of Vodka and Gin you use depends on the size of your cooler. Add the ingredients to your prefered taste.

drinks.name: Russian Candy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 shot Peach schnapps
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot with vodka then peach schnapps. Add a dash of grenadine (do not stir). Allow grenadine to settle at the bottom of the glass. Shoot.

drinks.name: The Ringo
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Coca-Cola
  • 2 oz Sloe gin
  • 2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 4 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice and add ingrediants in order listed.

drinks.name: Ebola
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Tequila
  • 6 oz Vodka
  • 6 oz Dark rum
  • 6 oz Gin
  • 12 oz sweetened Pineapple juice
  • 6 oz Whiskey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together in pitcher and to add a cooler edge throw in some crushed ice and a touch of cinammon.

drinks.name: Atomic Watermelon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in glass over ice and enjoy!

drinks.name: Snow Cap Columbian Monk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 scoop Vanilla ice-cream
  • Fill with strong Coffee
  • 2 1/2 oz Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 2 1/2 oz. frangelico into a tall glass and fill with strong coffee. Top with a scoop of ice-cream.

drinks.name: KoolShock
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Aftershock
  • 1 1/2 oz Cherry Kool-Aid
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place a few ice cubes into the glass, add the Aftershock, then the Kool-Aid. Stir to mix. Enjoy

drinks.name: Bacci Ball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Amaretto
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve with ice and stir.

drinks.name: Hot Nun
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1 tblsp Honey
  • 3 sticks Cloves
  • Lemon peel
  • Fill with hot Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Frangelico into glass, then honey, next lemon peel and cloves and fill snifter with hot water.

drinks.name: Captain's and Creme
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Captain Morgan's Spiced rum
  • 3 oz Cream soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Captain Morgan's over ice, and add cream soda.

drinks.name: Dive Bomber
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Amaretto
  • 2/3 oz Root beer schnapps
  • Fill with Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass with 1/3 oz Amaretto and 2/3 oz root beer schnapps, next drop shot glass into mug of beer and drink before it fizzes over the mug.

drinks.name: Evil Tongue
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker over ice. Shake ans strain.

drinks.name: Igloo Sue
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1 shot Grenadine (Rose's)
  • 3 cups crushed Ice or snow
  • 2 cups Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice or snow. Pour in lemonade. Add Vodka. Splash in grenadine (it should seep to the bottom).

drinks.name: Aperol Schuhmann
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Lemon juice
  • 2 cl Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 4 cl Orange juice
  • 4 cl Aperol
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Serve in a longdrink glass.

drinks.name: Zombie #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 2 cl Orange juice
  • 2 cl Cherry Heering
  • 2 cl White rum (Bacardi)
  • 6 cl Bacardi Black rum
  • 2 cl 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mixed in a shaker on ice. Serve in a Tumbler on crushed ice

drinks.name: Hiroshima Bomber
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2-3 drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill your shot glass 3/4 way full with Triple Sec. Then carefully layer the Bailey's on top of the Triple Sec. Finaly add some drops of Grenadine into the center of the shot. If done correctly it will look like an atomic mushroom cloud when the drop his the bottom of the shot glass

drinks.name: Captain Crunch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tequila Rose
  • 1 part Vanilla schnapps
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Cream
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice, shake and strain into a rocks glass.

drinks.name: Tea-riffic
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Triple sec
  • 6 oz sweet Tea
  • 5 cubes Ice cubes
  • 2 wedges Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in the 6 oz. of triple sec to the sweet tea and add the juice of 2 lemon wedges to it. Leave lemon wedges in drink then add 5 ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Winter Tropic
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 1/2 oz strawberry Margarita mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the shot of vodka first. Then add the juices simultaneously.

drinks.name: Carman's Dance
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 1/2 oz strawberry Margarita mix
  • Fill with Orange juice without pulp
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Vodka and gin simultaneously. Add strawberry and cranberry together. Fill the rest with orange juice.

drinks.name: Blow Blue Bubbles
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blueberry schnapps
  • Fill with Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour blueberry schnapps into champagne flute. Fill with champagne.

drinks.name: Shark's Mai Tai
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Dark rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 part Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 3 parts Sour mix (Rose's)
  • 2 shots Grenadine (Rose's)
  • 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 3 parts Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingedients in a blender except for the 151 rum. Pour into a cocktail glass with ice to about 1 inch below the rim. Add the shot of 151 but do not mix. Let settle for about 1 minute before serving.

drinks.name: Siberian Dutchman
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Chocolate mint liqueur (VanderMint)
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 splash Cream
  • 1 glass Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients, and pour over ice into highball glass

drinks.name: Rocky Mountain Motherfucker #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 2 splashes Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice, strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: April's Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sour Apple Pucker
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • Fill with Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour apple pucker into glass, add granadine, then fill glass with lemonade. Can be served on ice.

drinks.name: Polish Professor
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Vodka
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz 7-Up
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an old fashioned glass filled with ice, add the Vodka, followed by the Pineapple juice, and last, the 7-Up. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Neuralizer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Whiskey
  • 3 oz Sour mix
  • 3 oz Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients into highball glass, add ice if desired.

drinks.name: Salt and Pepper Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/8 oz Vermouth
  • 2 oz Absolut Peppar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine vermouth and Absolut in mixing glass over ice and stir. Strain into a cocktail glass with a salted rim.

drinks.name: Wrightsville Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 parts Orange juice
  • 2 parts Rum
  • 2 parts Tequila
  • 1 part Lime juice
  • 1 part Grenadine
  • A few drops Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pout all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into large white wine glasses half-filled with crushed ice.

drinks.name: Malibu Pop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Malibu Rum and Blue Curacao shake, then add juices.Serve over ice in highball glass.

drinks.name: Peach Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 25 L Sparkling white wine (Pinot)
  • 2 L Peach liqueur
  • 2 L Brandy
  • 2 kg Sugar
  • chopped Strawberries
  • chopped Peach
  • 1 handful Cloves
drinks.mixinginstructions: Get a big bowl (40 litres) and put everything in. Mix until all the sugar is dissolved, then let it rest for not less than 12 hours. Before drinking you can add some more sugar or brandy depending on your taste.

drinks.name: Tropical Peach Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Malibu rum
  • 2 oz Peach Vodka
  • 2 oz Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Red Rudolph
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Orange Curacao
  • 3/4 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 6 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve hot. Top with whipped cream, garnish with a tall cinnamon stick

drinks.name: Snowflake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Pear liqueur
  • 3 oz Milk
  • Crushed Ice
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend Pear Liqueur, Milk and Ice Add 7-up to taste

drinks.name: Jello Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Malibu rum
  • 1 cup hot Water
  • 1 package watermelon Jello
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix hot water and jello. Add rum. Pour into 2 ounce cups. Serve after the jello has set.

drinks.name: Lava
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Firewater
  • 3 oz Everclear
  • 2 tblsp Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all three ingredients to shotglass and consume.

drinks.name: Aperol '86
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Aperol
  • 2 cl Cointreau
  • 2 cl Dry Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with strawberry.

drinks.name: Shaft
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Aperol
  • 3 cl Gin
  • Fill with Sparkling white wine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Apoerol and gin over ice in a highball glass. Stir. Fill with sparkling white wine.

drinks.name: Ortensia
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl red Sweet Vermouth
  • 2 cl Aperol
  • 3 cl Scotch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Leprechaun's Gold
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Goldschlager
  • 1/2 shot Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour half a shot of Irish Cream in a shot glass and then fill remaining part with Goldschlager.

drinks.name: Lawn Boy
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 handfuls Ice cubes
  • 6 shots Vodka
  • 1 handful Mint leaves
  • Fill with Limeade
  • Sugar to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the ice in a blender, pour the vodka over it, toss in the mint, and fill with limeade. Blend until smooth, adding sugar little by little until it's just right. More vodka may be added during blending as well.

drinks.name: Lewie
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 oz Amaretto di Saranno
  • 8 oz Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the pilsner glass with Ice. Add rum, amaretto and orange juice. Shake. Top with a splash of grenadine.

drinks.name: Thunder and Lighting
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in shaker and serve.

drinks.name: Screaming Nazi #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 - 1 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 - 1 1/2 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix it up.

drinks.name: Screaming Epsilon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Orange juice
  • 1/2 cup Water
  • 1/2 cup Vodka
  • 1 Egg white or 2 tblsp Frothee
  • 3/4 tsp Vanilla extract
  • 1/4 cup Sugar
  • 1 cup Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a blender set on high speed for 15-30 seconds.

drinks.name: Green Summer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Coconut rum
  • 12 oz Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take an ordinary glass, and put in the two shots of coconut rum. Malibu or Coco Ribe will work nicely. Then pour in Mountain Dew. Make sure the Dew is chilled, or at least cold, and serve stirred, not shaken or strained. Adjust ingredient quantities to taste.

drinks.name: C-MOB
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Whisky
  • 2 Ice cubes
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Two ice cubes , 2oz of crown, 1 shot of vodka, and fill the rest with coca cola

drinks.name: Bleacher Creature
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour butterscotch over rum. Do not stir.

drinks.name: Asthma Attack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Everclear
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Razzmatazz
  • 1 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake.

drinks.name: Generation X
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Jim Beam
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 bottle Zima
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquors in first then add Zima.

drinks.name: Donkey Semmen
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • 2 oz Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put 4 ice cubes in shaker. Add ingredients. shake well and serve in a margarita glass. Garnish with lime.

drinks.name: Naked Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 3/4 oz Vanilla schnapps (Thrilla Vanilla)
  • 3/4 oz Swiss Mocha Cream liqueur
  • Half-and-half
  • Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill cocktail mixer with ice. Add the vanilla schnapps, Swiss Mocha Cream Liquor & a few ounces of half-and-half. Stir or shake and strain into ice filled highball glass. Top it off with a splash of coca-cola. Garnish with filbert nuts or cherries & serve!

drinks.name: Mullens Mai Tai
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz AÃ±ejo rum
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 tsp Orgeat syrup
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in an empty shaker. Shake vigorously then pour contents into a tall cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, a wedge of pineapple or a cherry (or all three).

drinks.name: Mistletoe
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Creme de Almond
  • 3/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Swiss Mocha Cream liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
  • Half-and-half
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: In highball glass filled with ice, comibine creme de almond, white creme de cacao, swiss mocha cream & grenadine. Fill glass with half-and-half. Top with coca-cola. Garnish with filbert nuts or cherries.

drinks.name: Vicious Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Absolut Citron
  • 2 dashes Maraschino cherry juice
  • 2 splashes Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir gently and sip slowly.

drinks.name: Quick's Killaritas
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 cup Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 2/3 cup Triple sec
  • 1 - 1/3 cup Tequila (cheap)
  • 12 oz frozen Limeade
  • 6 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredient together in a pitcher then serve on the rocks.

drinks.name: Smoothie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Crown Royal
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 splash Triple sec
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 splash 7-Up
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all of the ingredients over ice and strain into a 4 oz. shooter glass.

drinks.name: A Fuzzy Thing
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • Fill with Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour alcohol first, then add the juice. A little sour mix is needed, but not enough to overpower the juice. Shake before serving, and make sure there isn't too much ice in the drink.

drinks.name: Funky Chicken
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1/2 shot Wild Turkey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in shot glass. Serve.

drinks.name: Italian Screw
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cubes Ice
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Galliano
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 3 ice cubes or 2-3 oz. crushed ice to highball glass. Add 1 1/2 oz. Vodka. Add 1 oz. Galliano. Fill with pulpless orange juice.

drinks.name: Naked Surfer
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1/2 glass Vodka
  • 1 jigger Grenadine
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill beer mug with ice. Then pour in vodka until it is half-filled. Add approximately a shot of grenadine. Then fill glass with orange juice and stir.

drinks.name: Laura's Surprise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Banana
  • 5 - 6 Strawberries
  • 1/2 can crushed Pineapple
  • 1 cup crushed Ice
  • 1 Cherry
  • 1 - 2 shot Rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 slice of Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add banana, strawberry, pinapple, ice, and captain morgan, into blender, and mix into slush. Pour into glass, top with cherry and orange slice on side.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Orange juice
  • 1 part Banana liqueur (99 Bananas)
  • 1 part Peach schnapps (Peachtree)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all parts together in a glass, or pitcher, depending on the amount of people you wish to serve.

drinks.name: Fluxuation Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Banana liqueur (99 Bananas)
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 can Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Mountain dew and banana liqueur into a glass, Stir. Slowly add the Blue Curacao so it takes on a type of swirling effect due to the bubbles, this is as fun too look at as it is tasty to drink.

drinks.name: Bull Breaker
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Jack Daniels
  • 1 shot Tequila
  • Water
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a large glass, add ice, add JD, add tequila, add water, then insert straw and serve.

drinks.name: Rooster Tail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Jose Cuervo
  • 1 shot Orange juice
  • 1 shot Tomato juice
  • 1 dash Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Lick hand and put a dash of salt on hand, then lick salt and drink Cuervo first, then orange juice, then tomatoe juice.

drinks.name: Dick Wells
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 shot Crown Royal
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass 2/3 full with Bailey's and then top it off with Crown Royal.

drinks.name: Betonimylly
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: FÃ­rst you take Vodka but don't swallow it and then you take Cream in you mouth and mix then in your mouth and swallow.

drinks.name: Quagmyre
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Canadian whisky (Canadian Club)
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's Irish cream
  • 2 oz Chocolate milk
  • 1 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 1/2 oz Soda water (Perrier)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients as shown in any order. Shake until drink becomes clear.

drinks.name: Green Cookie Monster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/4 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Rum or vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients in shot glass in order listed.

drinks.name: Dutchie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cherry brandy (Bols)
  • 1 oz Creme de Banane (Bols)
  • 1 oz Apricot brandy (Bols)
  • 1 oz Advocaat (Bols)
  • Milk
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour creme de banane, apricot brandy and cherry brandy into the beer mug. Drop in a few ice cubes, and fill mug 3/4 with milk. Slowly pour the ounce of advocaat over the top of the milk covering the surface. Now watch as the advocaat drips around the ice and through the milk. This affect is best when the advocaat has been chilled.

drinks.name: Jack the Ripper
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 3/4 oz Butterscotch schnapps (Buttershots)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Level ice to top in shaker, pour Crown Royal and Buttershots. Shake. Strain into brandy snifter.

drinks.name: Cough Syrup
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Blue Curacao
  • 1/3 Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/3 Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Clara
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Beer (draught is preferred)
  • 1 part 7-Up
  • 3 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: The beer is first. The 7-Up is second. The ice is last, but it is only needed if the other ingredients aren't cold.

drinks.name: Flaming Rasta
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Grenadine
  • 1 part Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: If you can use a tall shot glass you will also need a straw and a lighter. When the drink is poured make sure your 151 is on top. then get your starw like it so it is wet light the drink (run the lighter over top or a match). Put your starw in a drink it fast.

drinks.name: Fire on Ice
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • Fill with pear or apple Cider
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka in a highball glass. Fill balance of glass with cider, stir, and serve. Add ice cubes if you like.

drinks.name: Tweetie Bird
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients in mixer with ice and shake. Strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: A Sunny Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Triple sec
  • 3 shots Lemon vodka
  • 1 shot Club soda
  • Lemon
  • Fill with Sunny delight
drinks.mixinginstructions: Using shot glasses in a cannery style Mason jar, pour the vodka and the triple sec together. Then sqeeze the lemon lightly, and place it on the rim. Fill the glass with Sunny Delight, then add a shot of Club Soda.

drinks.name: Electric Lemonade #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients except 7-up in a shaker filled with ice. Pour into a hurricane glass. Top with 7-up. Garnish with lemon slice.

drinks.name: Blue Moon Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin (Bombay Sapphire)
  • 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

drinks.name: Vodka Sonic
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 Club soda
  • 1/2 Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka over ice. Add 1/2 club soda and 1/2 tonic to taste. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

drinks.name: Royal Peach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice and pour into shot glass

drinks.name: Fernet con Coca
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Fernet Branca
  • 2 parts Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put some ice in a cocktail glass. Pour the Fernet and then fill with coke. No mixing required.

drinks.name: Two-by-Four
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Whisky (Upper Ten)
  • 2 cl Southern Comfort
  • 3 drops Angostura bitters
