  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: First put the ice in the glass. Then pore the whiskey and the Southern Comfort into the glass. Drip with the Angostora. Stir it together.

drinks.name: Flash Gordon
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl dry Gin (Gordon's)
  • 5 cl Bitter lemon (Shweppes)
  • 5 cl Sprite
  • Ice cubes
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything into a glass, add ice and lime on top.

drinks.name: Rocha-Gil
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Green Chartreuse
  • 1 cl Fernet Branca
  • 1 cl Brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour straight in glass.

drinks.name: Manhattan Dry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Canadian whisky
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
  • Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and granish with a lemon peel.

drinks.name: Manhattan Sweet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Canadian whisky
  • 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
  • Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir well in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and granish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Volcano
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Raspberry liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • Champagne
  • Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liqueurs into a champagne flute. Fill with ice-cold champagne. Twist orange peel over drink.

drinks.name: Carlitos
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Soda water
  • 2 1/2 oz Grape juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice in a tall glass. Stir.

drinks.name: Gingerbread Man #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/3 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the ingredients with ice in a shaker and pour in glass.

drinks.name: Period in a Pitcher
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 can Fruit punch
  • 1 can pink Grapefruit juice (Ocean Spray)
  • 1 can Orange juice (Ocean Spray)
  • 6 shots Rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • Fill with crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the three cans (Punch, Pink Grapefruit Juice, and Orange Juice) in a pitcher. Add six shots of Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum. Add crushed ice to fill pitcher. Keep chilled in refrigerator.

drinks.name: Sexual Harrasement
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 3/4 oz Orange juice
  • 3/4 oz Pineapple juice (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin with ice. Shake and strain.

drinks.name: Chris Crush
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Sweet Vermouth (Martini Bianco)
  • 1 part Gin
  • 1/2 part Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients except soda with lots of ice in a shaker. Fill a highball glass with crushed ice and add the mixed ingredients. Fill up with soda.

drinks.name: Black Tartan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Scotch (Johnnie Walker Black)
  • 1 part Irish whiskey
  • 1 part Drambuie
  • 1 1/2 part Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Straight: Float all ingredients. -- On the Rocks: Shake with ice and strain over ice

drinks.name: Fuzzyberry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients together and top with ice

drinks.name: Pond water
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 bottle Beer
  • 1/2 can Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1/2 bottle beer into mug. Fill rest with 1/2 can of Coke.

drinks.name: Little Brother
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 scoop Ice-cream
  • 1 tsp Vanilla extract
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all the ingredients in blender. If preferred add an ice cube. Mix thoroughly. Pour into glass.

drinks.name: Mountain Sex
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Mountain Dew
  • 1 part Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Mountain Dew in glass then add Triple Sec and stir.

drinks.name: Cassis Screwdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cassis
  • 1 splash Lemon juice or lime juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Ice
  • 1 wedge Lemon or lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka, orange juice, and lemon/lime juice into a shaker half-filled with ice. Shake. Strain into a collins glass with several ice cubes. Add a splash of creme de cassis and of grenadine. Garnish with a lemon/lime wedge and a straw.

drinks.name: Pumpkin Pie (Trafford Style)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1/2 part Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • Sprinkle Cinnamon on top
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add bailey's and kahlua together in shaker and shake. Pour into shot glasses and add required amount of bacardi to each and then sprinkle with cinnamon. Light on fire. Slam!

drinks.name: Flaming Spanish Fly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • Rich black Coffee
  • Whipped cream
  • Coarse Sugar
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Moisten rim of glass with cherry juice or water. Dip rim into coarse sugar to coat heavily. Pour tequila and coffee liquor into glass. Gently float 151 proof rum on top. Carefully ignite rum and swirl glass to lightly melt sugar with flame. Immediately pour in coffee to extinguish flames and fill cup. Top with whipped cream and cherry.

drinks.name: Sprawling Dubinsky
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Johnnie Walker red label
  • 1 part Johnnie Walker black label
  • 1 part Absolut Citron
  • 1 dash Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: First, add one part of Johnnie Walker Red. Next add one part Johnnie Walker Black, followed by another part of Absolut Citron. Finally, throw in a touch of amaretto, for flavor.

drinks.name: Brent's Tequila Head Slam
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1/3 oz Grenadine (Rose's)
  • 1/3 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build the three ingredients in a shot glass in the order listed. Fold a paper bar napkin and place firmly over the top. Slam the shot glass on the table, bar, etc. Make sure the drink fizzes. Turn the drink up and 'Slam It Into Your Head' before the fizzing subsides or try to be the first to re-slam the empty shot glass to the bar in a 'Group Head Slam'.

drinks.name: Mongolian Motherfucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Absolut Vodka
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Melon liqueur
  • 1 part Creme de Banane
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 splash Sprite
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingriedients over ice. shake and enjoy

drinks.name: Pink Flamingo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 3/4 glass Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
  • 1 dash Sloe gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients, shake and serve in tall glass.

drinks.name: The Lucky Stud
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Metaxa
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
drinks.mixinginstructions: These ingredients can be mixed in a glass with ice before you put into a shot glass, or poured right into the shot glass.

drinks.name: Velvet Tongue
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 1/2 oz Canadian whisky (Canadian Club)
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Southern Comfort, Canadian Club and fill with ginger ale over ice to a highball glass.

drinks.name: Red Drink
drinks.ingredients:
• 16 oz frozen Strawberries
  • 2 ripe Banana
  • 6 oz Rum
  • 2 oz Banana liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Thaw strawberries. Put all in blender, top with ice and blend until smooth.

drinks.name: Tiger Tail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tia maria
  • 1 part Grand Marnier
  • 1 part Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in shot glass.

drinks.name: Sex on the Beach Bettsy Style
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
  • Top with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in a Highball glass. Stir until mixture is pink. Add a bit of cranberry juice if you want to make it Bettsy Style.

drinks.name: French 75 (Cognac)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Cognac
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 6 oz Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine cognac, sugar and lemon juice in shaker. Add ice and shake till chilled. Pour into champagne flute. Pour champagne over cognac concotion. Garnish with lemon curl.

drinks.name: Heavy 'G'
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 7-Up or Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredientsa in a mug or glass with a salted rim like a Margarita, fill with ice and 7-up or Sprite.

drinks.name: Amaretto Alexander
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 shot Creme de Cacao
  • Fill with Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine liquers in shaker along with cream and ice. Shake and strain into a brandy snifter. Garnish with a sprinkle of nutmeg.

drinks.name: Cherry Over The Edge
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 4 oz Vodka
  • 10 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with chrushed ice.

drinks.name: Nuclear Ice Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • Fill with Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add all of the ingredients. Top with 7-up.

drinks.name: Cryonic Shock
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Blue Curacao
  • 1 shot Whisky (Stock 84)
  • 1 shot White rum
  • 1 shot Metaxa
  • 2 shots Ouzo (Ouzo #12)
  • Juice of 1 Lemon
  • Juice of 1 Lime
  • Add 8 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Blue Curacao, Whisky, Rum, Brandy, Ouzo, Lemon and Lime juices in a blender. Pulse mixture for 2-3 seconds. Add the 8 ice cubes. Pulse for about 20-30 seconds or until desired consistency of ice is achieved.

drinks.name: Crispy Crunch
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Metaxa
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain into shot glasses.

drinks.name: Purple Haze #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Root beer schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Milk
  • 1/2 oz Grape soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the Amaretto and root beer schnapps, then slowly add the milk. Next add the grape soda to change the color of the milk to purple.

drinks.name: Electric Popsicle
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Melon liqueur (Midori)
  • 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both the melon liqueur and blue curacao in the collins glass and fill with 7-up. Place the slice of lime on the top of the glass.

drinks.name: Virgin Pussy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Watermelon schnapps
  • 1 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 pinch Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour in both of the schnapps and add the pinch of sugar.

drinks.name: The Milky Way
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Root beer schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the root beer schnapps first in the shot glass then add the irish cream and then the Goldschlager on top.

drinks.name: Cookies 'n' Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Creme de Cacao
  • 1 1/2 shot Vanilla schnapps
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the creme de cacao and vanilla schnapps and then fill with milk.

drinks.name: Sugar High
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur (Midori)
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 2 oz Watermelon schnapps
  • 2 tsp Sugar
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all of the liquors first in no particular order, then mix the sugar in until it's all dissolved then fill with 7-up.

drinks.name: 5-Ball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Triple sec
  • 2-3 packages Orange Kool-Aid
  • Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make Kool-Aid as normal, except add double the amount of sugar. After Kool-Aid is made add Triple sec. Serve Chilled.

drinks.name: Tropical Itching
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl White rum
  • 2 cl Dark rum
  • 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Grand Marnier
  • 1 cl Lemon juice
  • 12 cl Mango juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange, a cherry and a sprig of mint.

drinks.name: Kir
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz dry White wine
  • 1 tblsp Creme de Cassis
  • 2-3 Ice cubes
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in a large wineglass. Twist the lemon peel to release the oil and drop it into the glass.

drinks.name: Vermouth Cassis #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Creme de Cassis
  • 2-3 Ice cubes
  • Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vermouth and crÃ¨me de cassis into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes and fill with club soda.

drinks.name: Pink California Sunshine
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz chilled pink Champagne
  • 4 oz chilled Orange juice
  • 1 dash Creme de Cassis
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the champagne into a cocktail glass. Add the orange juice and creme de cassis.

drinks.name: Summer Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 bottles dry White wine
  • 1 1/2 cup Creme de Cassis
  • 12 slices Orange, halved
  • 1 pint Strawberries
  • Ice block
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put a block of ice in a punch bowl. Pour in wine and creme de cassis, and stir. Float orange slices and strawberries on top. Serve in 4-ounce punch glasses.

drinks.name: Strawberry Kir Royale
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups halved Strawberries
  • 1 tblsp Sugar
  • 1/2 cup chilled Champagne
  • 1 tsp Creme de Cassis
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix strawberries and sugar in a bowl and let stand for 5-10 minutes. Stir occasionally. Divide into two white wine glasses, add champagne and creme de cassis.

drinks.name: El Diablo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 3/4 oz Creme de Cassis
  • 1 Lime wedge
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir tequila and creme de cassis over ice in a chilled collins glass. Fill with ginger ale, squeeze lime wedge over drink and drop it into the glass.

drinks.name: Campton Place Cafe Sonia
drinks.ingredients:
• Heavy cream, chilled
  • Vanilla extract
  • 3/4 oz Metaxa 7-Star
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Tia maria
  • Hot black Coffee
  • Sugar (if desired)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Lightly beat cream with few drops vanilla. Reserve. To warmed 7-oz. mug, add Metaxa, amaretto, and Tia Maria. Pour in coffee. Taste for sweetness: add sugar if desired. Top with beaten cream.

drinks.name: Rum Sazerac
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cube Sugar
  • 1-2 dash Angostura bitters
  • 2 oz White rum
  • 1-2 dash Pernod
  • Water
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Soak sugar cube in Angostura bitters. Crush it with a pestle in an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes, pour in rum, add a few dashed of Pernod and fill with water.

drinks.name: Perroquet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Pernod
  • 1 dash Mint syrup
  • Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with cold water and stir well.

drinks.name: Colibri
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 3/4 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz White rum
  • 3/4 oz Dark rum
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice in a shaker. Strain oover crushed ice in a highball glass.

drinks.name: Yellow Parrot
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Yellow Chartreuse
  • 3/4 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1/4 oz Anisette
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Ladies Sidecar
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Easter Bunny
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 tsp Chocolate syrup
  • 1 tsp Cherry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake creme de cacao and vodka with ice. Strain over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Float chocolate syrup and cherry brandy.

drinks.name: Sweet Tarts
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Orange soda
  • 1 part Grape soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all into Shot glass. Slam the shot glass down as to mix up the ingrediants and give it a fizz. Then just drink it down and enjoy.

drinks.name: Pixie Stix
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • Ice
  • Fill with Sweet and sour mix
  • 1 splash Sprite
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
  • Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour SoCo and Amaretto over ice in a highball glass. Fill with sweet and sour mix and top off with a splash of sprite. Float grenadine on top. Garnish with maraschino cherries.

drinks.name: Hollywood
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 1 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 splash Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix all ingrediants in a shaker and then strain.

drinks.name: Green Motherfucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Green Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Nutty Irish Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• Black Coffee
  • 1 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 shot Frangelico (or hazelnut liquer)
  • 1 squirt Chocolate syrup
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mug 2/3 full with coffee. Add liquers, chocolate syrup, and stir. Top it off with a mound of whipped cream, sprinkle it with cinnamon or nutmeg if desired.

drinks.name: BFD (Bad F****** Drink)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 splash Everclear
  • Fill with Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass half full with ice. Add vodka, triple sec, & Everclear. Top off with grapefruit juice.

drinks.name: Flaming Blue
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Anisette
  • 1/2 oz Vermouth
  • 1 splash Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix into a shot glass, and splash the Bacardi on the very top. Be careful not to mix it into the rest of the drink. Then carefully light the rum on fire with a match. Blow out the flame and drink it fast before the rim gets too hot.

drinks.name: Falling star
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz white Sambuca
  • Fill with Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour white sambuca into shot glass as if you were pouring a normal shot only filling 3/4 of the shot glass. Slowly pour a little Jack Daniels on top almost dripping it into glass. This will cause the Jack to slowly fall to the bottom of the glass, giving the appearance of a 'Falling Star'.

drinks.name: B-53 #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1 oz Vodka (Stolichnaya)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer each ingredient in the order listed.

drinks.name: Stanley Steamer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Coffee liqueur (Tia Maria)
  • 1/2 oz Irish cream (Carolan's)
  • 1/2 oz Cognac (Remy)
  • 12 oz Coffee
  • Whipped cream
  • 1 dash Orange liqueur (Grand Mariner)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a warm beer mug with handle. Put in the liquor. Fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream dashing a little Orange liqueur on top. Serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Shark Bite #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum (Myers)
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 3/4 oz Grenadine
  • 3 oz Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Myers's rum, Orange Juice, Sour Mix, and Ice in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into Hurricane Glass, and add Grenadine. Serve with a straw, but do not stir before serving.

drinks.name: Kurant Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Absolut Kurant
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Absolut Kurant in a glass and fill up with sprite and ice

drinks.name: Sweet Tits
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all the ingredients into a shaker over ice. Shake gently and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Cotton Candy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • Fill with Mountain Dew
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Butterscotch Schanapps and Mountain Dew to ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Tropical Hooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/3 oz 7-Up or Sprite
  • 1/3 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1/3 oz Watermelon schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and pour into shotglass.

drinks.name: Vixen
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 shots Frangelico
  • 1/2 shot Grenadine
  • 1/2 shot Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add Grenadine and Frangelico and shake till frothy. Strain into chilled Martini glass. Slowly add the Kahlua and garnish with cherry or Hershey's Kiss.

drinks.name: Gorilla Sweat
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 6 oz Water
  • 1 tsp Butter
  • 3 pieces Cloves
  • 1 stick Cinnamon
  • 1 pinch Salt (Optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients (except cinnamon stick) and heat gently until butter is melted. Garnish with cinnamon stick.

drinks.name: Irish Whip
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Pernod
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 part 7-Up
  • 1 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a pint glass, fill with one part 7-Up and one part orange juice, stir and add a few ice cubes.

drinks.name: Iguana #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Vodka
  • 1/3 oz Tequila
  • 1/3 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and tequila over ice in shaker. Add Kahlua. Shake and pour into shot glass.

drinks.name: Pineapple Bomber
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add amaretto and Southern Comfort. Fill rest of glass (at least 1/3 of volume) with pineapple juice.

drinks.name: Stubbly Beaver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Irish cream
  • Almost 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 3 or 4 Ice cubes (or crushed ice)
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add each ingredient over ice and stir. Garnish with a Hersheys Kiss attached to a toothpick, with a butterscotch lifesaver on top.

drinks.name: Big Daddy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Fill with Water
  • Twist of Lime peel
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice & stir

drinks.name: Hurricane, New Orleans Style
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White rum
  • 1 oz Jamaican Rum
  • 1 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 3 oz Orange juice with pulp
  • 3 oz unsweetened Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients, mix well (shake or stir). Pour over crushed ice in Hurricane glass. Best enjoyed through small straw. Garnish with fruit wedge if desired.

drinks.name: Sweet Tommy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Blueberry schnapps
  • 2 oz Sprite or 7-Up
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 count Cherry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake schnapps, vodka and cranberry juice. Pour into hurricane glass filled with ice. Add Sprite/7-Up, and pour 1 count cherry juice on the top. Garnish with 3 cherries.

drinks.name: Talbot's Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts white Godiva liqueur
  • 2 parts Bailey's irish cream
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Godiva and the Bailey's in a blender. Add ice to desired thickness. Blend well.

drinks.name: Belize Rum Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Light rum
  • 1 shot Dark rum
  • 1 shot Orange liqueur
  • 1 shot Sour mix
  • 1 shot Cream of coconut
  • 2 splashes Grenadine
  • Top with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill tall glass with ice, add first 5 ingredients then top off with pineapple juice. Shake thoroughly. Add a dash or two of grenadine, stir gently and then listen to the sound of the warm Carribean breezes flowing through the palm trees.

drinks.name: Fruity Screaming Fuzzy Navel
drinks.ingredients:
• 64 oz Orange juice
  • 8 oz Peach schnapps
  • 8 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 4 bottles strawberry Daiquiri mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Orange juice and Peach schnapps in a punch bowl. Add the vodka. Pour the bottles of strawberry daiquiri in after. Stir a little. Serve.

drinks.name: Screaming Purple Jesus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Everclear
  • 4 parts Grape Purple Kool-Aid
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together and serve over ice

drinks.name: Milwaukee Stop Light
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Aftershock
  • 1 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 shot Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: All you need to do is line em' up, and toss em' in!

drinks.name: Sandbar Sleeper
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 5 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 5 cl Kahlua
  • 5 cl Frangelico
  • 10 cl Milk (2%)
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shaker with ice, add ingredients, chill, strain

drinks.name: Hot Toddy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tblsp Honey
  • 3/4 glass Tea
  • 2 shots Brandy
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Brew tea and fill tall glass 3/4 full. Mix in honey. Mix in Brandy shots. Add lemon slice and enjoy.

drinks.name: Hot Scotch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 8 oz Hot chocolate
  • whipped Cream (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Buttershots Schnapps into an 8 oz. mug and fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Rum Punch #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Rum (Bacardi)
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • 2 tblsp Grenadine
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir or Shake. Grenadine can be adjusted for your own taste.

drinks.name: Villa Park
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Bourbon
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix bourbon, orange juice and pineapple juice in mixer. Shake well. Pour into highball glass with ice.

drinks.name: Jungle Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 1/2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 1 1/2 cl Gin
  • 1 cl Apricot brandy
  • 1 cl Lemon juice
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything except orange juice Shake well and add with Orange Juice Enjoy

drinks.name: Cool Hot Damn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Hot Damn
  • 1 shot Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a shot each (in different glasses). Down Hot Damn, chase with Schnapps.

drinks.name: The Real Windex
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Parfait d'Amour
  • Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vodka and liqueur with ice, strain into chilled glass, garnish with orange peel

drinks.name: Vampire Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Coconut rum (Coco Ribe)
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Bacardi Limon or Spiced rum
  • 8 oz Orange juice
  • 3 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Empty all three shots into glass. Fill with Orange Juice and add ice to chill. If possible, combine ingredients in tall shaker and strain ice.

drinks.name: Rolling Green Elixer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Peach Vodka
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Everclear
  • 9 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker, strain ice cubes.

drinks.name: Legspreader #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 1/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 6 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 splashes 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients on ice and stir.

drinks.name: Green Quencher
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 shot Lime juice
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 shot Sweet and sour
  • 10 oz Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: In tall glass, mix Midori, lime juice, sweet and sour, and vodka. Top off with tonic water and stir well.

drinks.name: Depth Charge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Pernod
  • 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Tia maria
  • 1 bottle Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Lemonade
  • Fill With Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Vodka, Pernod, Malibu & Tia Maria into a one pint beer glass, add the lemonade and pineapple juice, and top up with coke.

drinks.name: The Big-V
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Try to layer in shot glass.

drinks.name: Grapeschlager
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Goldschlager
  • 3 parts Grape soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Goldschlager over ice, then add the Grape Soda. Stir slightly, and enjoy.

drinks.name: Asphalt
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Brandy (Eau de vie)
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour brandy over ice the glass. Fill with Coke. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Snake Venom
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint Lager
  • 1/2 pint Cider
  • 1 shot Pernod or Sambucca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the ingredients in a tall pint glass and let it swim.

drinks.name: Out of Africa
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 2 1/2 oz Safari
  • Juice of 1 Orange
  • 4 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • Juice of 1/2 Grapefruit
  • 2 dashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cocktail cherry.

drinks.name: Anti Freeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 package Hot chocolate mix
  • 1 1/4 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 6 oz boiling Water
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the hot chocolate mix into a 9 ounce glass mug. Add the schnapps and boiling water. Stir Well. Top with a swirl of whipped cream. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry and a peppermint stick.

drinks.name: Oil Slick
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 shot Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix both ingredients together in a shaker and serve in a chilled shot glass.

drinks.name: Parappa the Drunk Rappa
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 can Cherry Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour shots over ice, add coke and strain into glass

drinks.name: Satan's Spawn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Firewater
  • 3-4 dashes Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the Tabasco first, then the Firewater

drinks.name: Chi Phi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: This is a shot. Just combine the 2 ingredients and enjoy

drinks.name: Bailey's Shake #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-1/2 cup Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1/4 cup Chocolate syrup
  • 3/4 cup Milk
  • Bailey's irish cream to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into blender. Puree for several seconds, or until smooth. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

drinks.name: Axelrod's Sweet Concoction
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 2/3 oz Amaretto
  • 1 2/3 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 4 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve iced, stirred, not shaken

drinks.name: Cinnamon Stick
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Goldschlager
  • 1 cup Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour one shot of Goldshlager into glass. Measure 1 cup of apple juice and pour into glass with Goldschlager. Mix and drink!

drinks.name: Banana Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka (Banff)
  • 1 shot Banana liqueur
  • 250 ml Orange juice
  • 50 ml Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass and stir well. Much better if mixed with a blender, but a stir stick will do.

drinks.name: Shark's Nipple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 part Captain Morgan Spiced rum
  • 1/4 part Mountain Dew
  • 1/2 part Cranberry juice
  • 3 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rum in over the ice, fill approximately to halfway with Mt. Dew, fill with cranberry juice, then mix again.

drinks.name: M&M
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour straight up into shot glass.

drinks.name: Attitude Adjustment
drinks.ingredients:
• Bailey's irish cream
  • Root beer schnapps
  • Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer.

drinks.name: Milky Way Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vanilla vodka
  • 2 oz Chocolate liqueur
  • 1 oz Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients, mix, serve without ice.

drinks.name: Si Kami Ki
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix vodka and cinnamon schnapps in cocktail glass, add corbonated water, serve with ice

drinks.name: Kinky Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 cl Amaretto
  • 2 cl Kahlua
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour all into a higball glass. For the real funky look you can add some strawberries or even have some vanilla icecream in it

drinks.name: Supersonic Sunshine
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Malibu rum
  • 2 cl Vodka
  • Fill with Chocolate milk
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put everything in a big glass. Garnish with a slice of orange on the edge of the glass.

drinks.name: Surgedriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Surge
  • 2 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients and pour into highball glass over ice

drinks.name: The Nomad
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Lemonade
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Fresca
  • dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, lemonade and fresca and serve over ice, add dash of grenadine

drinks.name: Broken Down Golf Cart #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place amaretto, melon liqueur, cranberry juice, and ice in a shaker. Then strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Occhi Blu
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 parts Gin
  • 3 parts White wine
  • 1 part Apple brandy
  • dash Frangelico
  • dash Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingridients in a mixing glass. Serve in a cocktail glass. garnish with a lemon twist.

drinks.name: After Eight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Kahlua
  • 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 oz White Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in a shot glass

drinks.name: Adios Motherfucker #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in a shot glass

drinks.name: Loopy Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 2 wedges Lemon, squeezed
  • 3 packages granulated Sugar
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • And Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass (preferably a pint glass) with ice. Add 2 oz. Absolut Citron. Squeeze two lemon wedges and add three packages of sugar. Fill remainder of glass with 7-Up and sweet and sour mix.

drinks.name: Alaska
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Yellow Chartreuse
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Srtrain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bannister
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Applejack
  • 1 tblsp Pernod
  • 1/2 tblsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Ster well. Strain into a cocktail glass

drinks.name: Red Dwarf
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 measures White rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/3 measure Lemon juice
  • 2 measures Orange juice
  • 1 measure Peach schnapps (Archers)
  • 1/3 measure Creme de Cassis
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix rum, lemon juice, orange juice and peach schnapps together with plenty of ice in a shaker. Pour in to a chilled glass. Then pour the Creme de Cassis in to the glass allowing the red liquor to form a layer at the bottom of the glass. Garnish with cherries, orange or lemon to taste

drinks.name: High Voltage
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 parts Tequila
  • 3 parts Peach liqueur
  • 1 part Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Serve in a chilled glass.

drinks.name: Purple Rain #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 scoop Ice-cream
  • Top up with Sprite or 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the 1st 4 ingredients. Strain it to a cocktail glass. Top up with Sprite/7-up.

drinks.name: Blue Chili
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz White rum
  • Ice
  • 1 dash Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the first 5 ingredient in a shaker. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail class. Add a dash of sprite. Garnish with cherry and lemon reel.

drinks.name: Purple Love
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Whipped cream
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz White rum
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Sprite
  • 2 dashes Grenadine
  • Ice
  • Melted plain Chocolate to decorate
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the first 9 ingredient into a cocktail shaker. Shake well for about 25 seconds. Strain the cocktail into a high-ball glass. The piece of melted chocolate is for garnish purposes. -- How to use the melted chocolate: First spread the melted chocolate evenly over a plastic board and leave it to cool and harden.Using a sharp knife, draw the blade across the chocolate to create curls. Add the curls to the top of the cocktail and serve.

drinks.name: Singapore Sling #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • Top with Club soda
  • Garnish with Maraschino cherry
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Gin, Cherry brandy, Pineapple juice, grenadine into the collin glass. Stir well. top up with club soda and garnish with the cherry.

drinks.name: Frozen Blue Daiquiri
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz White rum
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1/3 cup Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all the ingredient into a blender. Blend at medium speed for about 20 seconds. pour into a old-fashioned glass

drinks.name: Cherry Lover
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1 oz Cherry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Maraschino liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • Ice
  • Top the drink with Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the first 5 ingredient into a cocktail shaker. Shake well for 20 seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass. Top with club Soda.

drinks.name: Blue Ice Mountain
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 3 oz Perrier Carbonated water
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • Top with Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the first three ingredient into a high-ball glass. Stir well. Top with club soda

drinks.name: Afterbirth
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Raspberry schnapps
  • 1 part Grenadine
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix schnapps and grenadine. Add Bailey's last. Wait until the Bailey's curdles then shoot .

drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl White rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 cl Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 2 cl Apricot brandy
  • Fill with Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the spirits over some ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill it up with Ginger Ale. Place a slice of lime in the drink and serve.

drinks.name: Raging Bull
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 cl Kahlua
  • 2 1/2 cl Sambuca
  • 1 cl Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in listed order.

drinks.name: Tropical Binalada
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • Ice
  • Top up with Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine first 5 ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour the content unstrain into a collin glass and top up with club soda.

drinks.name: Hurricane flint
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 tblsp Passion fruit syrup
  • 2 tsp Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

drinks.name: Venezia
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 parts Gin
  • 3 parts Peach liqueur
  • 3 parts Dry Vermouth
  • drop Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange zest.

drinks.name: Orange Surprise
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Peachtree schnapps
  • 2 cl Vodka
  • 4-6 cl Sour mix
  • Fill with Fanta
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the peachtree, vodka and sour mix in a shaker and shake it. Pour this into a higball glass fille with icecubes. Fill up with Orange Fanta and garnish it with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Bloody Chicken
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Wild Turkey
  • 1/2 oz Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 drop Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Wild Turkey into shot glass. Fill the rest up with the Tequila. Finally, add the drop of Tabasco Sauce.

drinks.name: Gulyuz
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 3 cl Safari
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put everything in a shaker which is half-filled with cracked ice and shake for 1 minute. Strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bailey's Shake #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 10 cl Milk
  • 3/4 dl Ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put it all in a blender. Blend until smooth. Serve.

drinks.name: Leah's Last Hope
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 6 oz Chocolate milk ( Yoo-Hoo works best)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Ice, Mix And Enjoy!

drinks.name: Chambord sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with ice. Serve up or on the rocks.

drinks.name: Purple Haze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with ice in a mixing glass and strain into shotglass.

drinks.name: Purple Passion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1 splash Grape juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Toxic Waste
drinks.ingredients:
• Vodka
  • Midori melon liqueur
  • Yukon Jack
  • Sour mix
  • Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain.

drinks.name: Death in the afternoon
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz well chilled Champagne
  • 1 oz Pernod
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Pernod into the champagne flute and top off with the champagne.

drinks.name: Orange Safari
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Safari
  • 3 parts Orange juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice in highball glass. Stir.

drinks.name: Galway Gray
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • Fresh Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients, except for the cream, together. Pour into cocktail glass and float cream on top. Sprinkle some grated orange peel on top.

drinks.name: ZaZa
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Dubonnet Rouge
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a dash of angostura bitters into the bottom of the glass. Add gin and Dubonnet. Stir.

drinks.name: Pimm's Cup
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Pimm's No. 1
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • 1 slice Cucumber
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a highball glass add Pimm's No. 1 and twist of lemon. Fill with 7-up. Garnish with cucumber slice.

drinks.name: North Mymms Mirage
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Pimm's No. 1
  • 1/4 pint Blackcurrant squash
  • 2 shots Gin
  • 1/2 pint Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the black current and the lemonade together. Add the gin and Pimms together stirring well but do not shake. Garnish with fruit pieces. Mix a batch and serve liberally.

drinks.name: Bitter Pill
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Smirnoff Vodka
  • 2 oz Jack Daniels
  • Lemon
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix JD & vodka together, add dash of lemon juice and top up glass with coke!

drinks.name: Black Russian #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • Ice cubes
  • Squeeze of fresh Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir briefly or until spoon disentegrates.

drinks.name: Hurts You Right Here!
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Aftershock
  • 1 shot Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together in double shot glass. Shoot!

drinks.name: Well Greased Dwarf
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 2/3 oz Sambuca
  • 2/3 oz Irish cream (Bailey's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the ingrediants in the order they are listed in a pony glass. The Sambuca should be chilled first to layer more easily.

drinks.name: Ludvika Walker
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Kurant
  • 5 cl Apple cider
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix and add some ice.

drinks.name: Kim Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • Fill with Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice in sling glass. Serve.

drinks.name: Southern Death Cult
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Wild Turkey
  • 3 oz Coca-Cola
  • 3 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in a highball glass and the add the liquors. Top the glass off with Coke and 7-up and a lemon twist. Stir.

drinks.name: Pearl Harbour Revisited
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Scotch
  • 1-2 part Cola
  • 3 splashes Vanilla extract
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just make a scotch and coke to your own specification and add a splash of vanilla essence - it really does add a new twist!

drinks.name: Red Vodkatini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 measures Vodka
  • 1 measure Vermouth
  • 1 dash Creme de Cassis
  • 1 scoop Crushed Ice
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, vermouth, and creme de cassis. Pour over crushed ice, and garnish with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Pimm's Rangoon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Pimm's No. 1
  • Ginger ale
  • Lemon peel
  • Cucumber peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Pimm's over ice in a large highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and garnish with lemon and cucumber peel.

drinks.name: Pimm's Royal
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Pimm's No. 1
  • Champagne
  • Lemon peel
  • Cucumber peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Pimm's over ice in a large highball glass. Fill with champagne and garnish with lemon and cucumber peel.

drinks.name: Cheat's Pimm's
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Gin
  • 2 parts red Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 part Orange Curacao
  • Fill with 7-Up or ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix. Pour into tall glass. Add ice-cold 7-Up or ginger ale. Garnish with one slice each of orange, lemon and cucumber. Serve.

drinks.name: Mocha Mudslide Milkshake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup fat-free Milk
  • 2/3 cup sliced ripe Banana
  • 2 tblsp Sugar
  • 1 tsp instant Coffee granules
  • 1/4 cup vanilla low-fat Yoghurt or frozen yoghurt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place first 4 ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Freeze in blender container for 1 hour or until slightly frozen. Loosen frozen mixture from the sides of blender container, add yoghurt and blend until smooth. Garnish with banana slices. Serve immediately.

drinks.name: Iced Lemonade Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 cups Tea
  • 3/4 cup Sugar
  • 6 oz frozen Lemonade (pink or regular)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a big bowl and mix the sugar and lemonade together. Pour the tea over the top while it is still boiling. That way the sugar and lemonade mix properly. Let it cool before serving.

drinks.name: Orange Bitters
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 lb dried bitter Orange peel (Seville)
  • 1 pinch Cardamom
  • 1 pinch caraway or Anise
  • 1 pinch Coriander seeds
  • 2 cups Grain alcohol
  • boiling Water
  • 4 tblsp Caramel coloring
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chop the orange peel finely and mix it with the herbs and alcohol. Let it stand for 15-20 days in a sealed jar, agitating it every day. Pour off spirits through a cloth, and seal again. Put the strained off seeds and peel in a saucepan, crush it, cover with boiling water and simmer for 5 minutes. Pour into another jar, cover and let stand for 2 days. Strain this off and add it to the spirits. Add caramel coloring, filter again and let it rest until it settles perfectly clear.

drinks.name: Devastating Body Rocker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Blackberry brandy
  • 1 part Gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in shot glass.

drinks.name: Liquid Desert
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Water
  • 2 oz Mello Yello
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Midori, water, Mello yello and vodka. Stir. Serve over the rocks.

drinks.name: Very Berry Tonic
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Fill with Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Add the vodka & the chambord. Fill with tonic water. Garnish with a couple of fresh raspberries.

drinks.name: Banana Split
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Banana liqueur
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • Half-and-half to taste
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • Cherries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and shake. Serve over ice. Garnish with cherries.

drinks.name: Erin's Sweater
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Blue Curacao
  • 2 parts White chocolate liqueur
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake.

drinks.name: Joey F's Grape Ape
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 part Raspberry liqueur (Chambord)
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake two parts Vodka with one part of raspberry liqueur and one part Cranberry Juice. Chill and serve as shots.

drinks.name: Grand Gold Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Margarita mix (Jose Cuervo)
  • 6 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo 1800)
  • 3 oz Grand Marnier
  • 3 oz Cointreau
  • 1 bottle Corona
  • Fill blender with Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the the margarita mix, tequila, Cointreau, Grand Marnier, and beer into the blender. For frozen margaritas, fill the blender with ice cubes and blend until the ice is crushed. (For margaritas on the rocks, use less ice and blend until the ingredients are thoroughly mixed.) The beer will create a frothy texture for the margarita. Dip the rim of the margarita glass in lime juice and then salt the rim with margarita salt.

drinks.name: Cowboy Killer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Tequila
  • 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • Fill with Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila, Bailey's Irish Creme, and butterscotch schnapps into glass add ice and Half-and-Half. Pour into shaker, shake to mix and pour back into glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Lara's Russian Qualude
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the three liquors over ice, then top with vodka. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Electric Fuzzy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 2 parts Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine. Add ice. Stir.

drinks.name: Blue Heaven
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Amaretto
  • 2 cl Rum
  • 4 cl Blue Curacao
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • 1 slice Pineapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the blue curacao in the glass. Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake amaretto, rum, and pineapple juice. Pour it in the glass and stir. Garnish with pineapple slice.

drinks.name: Squirrel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 3 drops Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Just Peachy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Peach schnapps
  • 1 part sweetened Iced tea
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together the Peach schnapps and the Iced Tea and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Dirty Irish Whiskey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Irish whiskey (Jameson's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a mixing cup with ice and shake. Pour through a strainer, and drink

drinks.name: The Red and Black
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer with grenadine on top.

drinks.name: Yellow Sock
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Ogre Drink
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 3 oz Malibu rum
  • 4 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingred. in a bleander and blend untill smooth. Pour into a beer mug and enjoy

drinks.name: Tootsie Roll Float
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Root beer schnapps
  • 1 part Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all over ice, mix and strain off ice..

drinks.name: Merete
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Galliano
  • 2 cl Passoa
  • 2 cl Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass, add the cherry, and serve.

drinks.name: Light Green Panties
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • drop Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the vodka, green menthe, and Baileys over ice in a mixing tin. Strain into a sherry glass. Carefully pour a tiny bit of Grenadine down the inside of the glass.

drinks.name: Seadoo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the vodka to a tall glass with lots of ice.Throw in a splash or two of cranberry juice and then fill with the soda.

drinks.name: Spooky Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 dashes Blue Curacao
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir together with ice.

drinks.name: Green Meanie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Sour Apple Pucker
  • 1 can Lemon-lime soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill bottom with shot of Pucker and fill with soda.

drinks.name: Nutz 'n Berries
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Lemon vodka
  • 1 part Frangelico
  • 2 parts Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix like most shots: Chill in a mixing tin and strain in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Gumby Dammit
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Fill with Apple cider
drinks.mixinginstructions: Half-fill a pint beer mug with ice cubes. Add vodka and Midori. Fill with cider. Sip.

drinks.name: Black Fog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 can Guinness stout
  • 1 shot Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Chambord in to a mug of Guinness. Swirl slightly to mix.

drinks.name: Sexoholic
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 drops Tabasco sauce
  • 4 cl Drambuie
drinks.mixinginstructions: First 5 droplets tabasco sauce in the shot glass. Make sure the inside are covered with sauce. Top it up with drambuie.

drinks.name: Captain with a Skirt
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Captain Morgan Rum
  • 2 oz White wine
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
  • 1 slice of Lime
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Captain Morgan and white wine in a glass. Add Coke and ice. Garnish with a slice of lime.

drinks.name: Scurvy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the banana liqueur into a glass. Add vodka and last the orange juice to taste.

drinks.name: Fruit Pastille
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 measure Gin
  • 1/2 measure Dry Vermouth
  • 3 dashes Blue Curacao
  • 3 dashes Grenadine
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place ice cubes into the glass. Pour over measure of Gin, followed by the dry Vermouth. Then fill up to desired level with Orange Juice. Gently pour in dashes of Blue Curacao so that about 2/3rds of the orange goes green. Then pour in the dashes of Grenadine so the bottom of the drink turns red. Serve with straw.

drinks.name: Circus Peanut Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Tequila
  • 2 oz Pisang Ambon
  • 1 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix well in a blender with ice and serve in a highball glass that has been rimmed with jimmies. Garnish with a day-glo orange circus peanut.

drinks.name: Jagnog
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Eggnog
  • 1 part JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in punchbowl or make individual drinks.

drinks.name: Nutty Ginger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • Ginger ale (Pure spring)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the amaretto and frangelico in the glass. Fill with ginger ale. Add a few ice cubes.

drinks.name: Caribbean
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 8 oz Fruit juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • crushed Ice our cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill glass with ice add rum and triple sec add juice and stir

drinks.name: Wadliegh
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Rum
  • 1 shot Whiskey
  • 12 oz Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients over Ice.

drinks.name: Tully's Nuts & Berries
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Razzmatazz
  • 1/2 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into chiller and pour into shot glass.

drinks.name: Mocha Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Vodka (Stoli)
  • 1/2 oz Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass

drinks.name: Whisky Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Canadian whisky (Canadian Club)
  • 1 1/2 oz Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in cocktail glass with chipped ice.

drinks.name: Champagne & Mango
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 part Champagne
  • 1/2 part Mango juice
  • 1 Mango cubed
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Champagne and Mango juice together, add cubed Mango and ice.

drinks.name: Blonde Moment
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/3 oz Grenadine
  • 1 1/2 oz Sweet and sour mix
  • 1 splash Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over Ice and garnish with a cherry

drinks.name: Triple Sec Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Orange juice
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: First Fill glass 3/4 full with Orange Juice. Next add 1/4 Triple Sec. Finaly add Grenadine and mix thoroughly! Garnish with a slice of Orange.

drinks.name: Serena
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/5 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/5 cl Strawberry vodka
  • 1/5 cl Dry Vermouth (Martini)
  • 1/10 cl Pineapple juice
  • 1/10 cl Blue Curacao
  • 5 drops Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: First of all put in the mixing glass absolut vodka then strawberry vodka, dry vermouth, pineapple juice, blue curacao and lemon juice. Now shake with ice and fill up the glass.

drinks.name: Double Intention
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 4 oz Half-and-half
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all the ingredients apart from the Grenadine. Pour that on top of the drink when its in the glass.

drinks.name: Sinlet
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Gin
  • 6 cl Tequila
  • 6 cl Lime juice cordial
  • Ice cubes
  • Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the ingredients with a great deal of ice and garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Bee
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka (Finlandia)
  • 2 cl Banana liqueur
  • Fill with Ginger ale
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add couple of ice cubes to a highball glass. Measure vodka and banana liqueur. Fill with ginger ale, and stirr couple of times. Garnish with a red cherry. Add a straw and serve.

drinks.name: Fong Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Malibu rum
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Malibu. Add pineapple juixce. Stir.

drinks.name: Dreamsicle #3
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 4 oz Vanilla schnapps
  • 3 oz Orange juice without pulp
  • 1/2 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add schnapps, then orange juice and at last milk. Stir like a mofo until mixed.

drinks.name: Spice and Ice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Absolut Citron
  • 1/4 Goldschlager
  • 1/2 Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all three on the rocks.

drinks.name: Florida Rum Runner
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1.2 oz Lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in blender until ice is crushed into slushy form. Serve while frozen.

drinks.name: Patel's Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Absolut Citron
  • 2 shots Peach schnapps
  • 3 parts Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 2 dashes Lemon juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour shots out in glass. Add cranberry, pineapple and lemon juice, and fill the rest of the glass with ice.

drinks.name: Seizure
drinks.ingredients:
• Crushed Ice
  • 4 shots Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3 shots Peach schnapps
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
  • 3 oz Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put crushed ice in glass. Pour in ingredients. Mix through a couple times and serve.

drinks.name: Pink Pillow
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Vodka
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 5 oz Sweet and sour
  • 5 oz Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Vodka in first and add Grenadine till it is nice and pink. Then add equal parts of Sour Mix and Ginger Ale until the glass is full.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Comfort
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Rum or vodka
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill with 4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Carefully pour the rum or vodka, then other ingredients. Stir.

drinks.name: Captains Pie
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Ginger ale
  • 3 oz Apple-cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Captain Morgan's Spiced rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the ginger ale and the cranapple juice togther and then add the rum.

drinks.name: Piedra Putamadre
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila (Herradura reposado)
  • 1/2 oz Fernet Branca
  • 1/2 oz Anisette (Cadenas)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients

drinks.name: Watermelon Slice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill hurricane glass with ice. Add grenadine, then vodka, rum, gin and triple sec. Fill with half OJ and half cranberry juice. Float with Midori. Drink should be pesented as is but stirred before drinking.

drinks.name: Three Wise Men (go hunting)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Jim Beam
  • 1/2 oz Johnnie Walker
  • 1/2 oz Wild Turkey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in that order.

drinks.name: Attitude Adjustment #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Gin
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Sour mix
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredents into a mixing tin with ice, and strain into glass.

drinks.name: All Jacked up
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/3 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/3 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill in a mixing tin and pour.

drinks.name: Dreamsicle #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vanilla schnapps (Dr. McGillicuddy's)
  • 2 parts Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the schnapps into the orange juice and stir.

drinks.name: Spooge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing tin, shake like a wild man, and strain into a martini glass.

drinks.name: Nadal furia
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Grenadine
  • 1 part Pisco
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all wiht pasion

drinks.name: Glow-Worm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • Float 1 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order. Do not mix! Float Blue Curacao on top.

drinks.name: Blue Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/4 part 7-Up
  • 1/4 part Sour mix
  • 1/2 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice and serve.

drinks.name: Chilly Willy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • Orange juice
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into shaker. Fill with orange and pineapple juice. shake well.

drinks.name: BMW
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Whisky
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just follow the name... ...BMW

drinks.name: Springbok
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1/4 oz Amarula Cream
  • 1 dash Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the Amarula gently onto the Creme de menthe and then add a thin layer of cream.

drinks.name: Pearl Diver #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Fill with Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients shake and strain over ice

drinks.name: EDO Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Stoli)
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao (Bols)
  • 1 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of melon and a green cocktail cherry.

drinks.name: Born to be Wild
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 2 cl Tequila
  • 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • Fill with Sprite
  • 2 dashes Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass 3/4 full with ice cubes. Add the Tequila, Vodka, Pisang Ambon, Sprite and lime. Stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cocktail cerry.

drinks.name: Elephant Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 - 4 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 cup Milk
  • 2 shots Amarula Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend on high until smooth. Pour into a tall glass.

drinks.name: Caramel Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sour Apple Pucker
  • 3/4 oz Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill in shaker.

drinks.name: Russchian Comfort
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Southern Comfort
  • Ice
  • Fill With Schweppes Russchian
  • 1 splash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in the glass, pour the SoCo in, fill with Schweppes Russchian and add a splash of lime.

drinks.name: Green Puma
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 2 cl Whiskey
  • 2 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it all together in the glass.

drinks.name: Cadalac Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila (Sauza)
  • 3/4 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1 1/4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 wedge Lime
  • Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine first 3 ingredient into a shaker with ice. Shake well. Pour into a salt-rimmed margarita glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Bocci Ball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • Fill with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake amaretto and orange juice first then top with soda.

drinks.name: Carbomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 13-14 oz Guinness stout
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Whiskey (Jameson's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the Bailey's and Whiskey in a shot glass. Drop shot glass into beer. Should be finished immediately.

drinks.name: Rum Coke Float
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 scoops rum flavored Ice-cream
  • 1 shot Rum
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place two scoops of rum flavored ice-cream in a hurricane glass, add rum and fill with Coke. Garnish with a cerry and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Ginger Spice
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Spiced rum
  • Fill with Ginger ale
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour spiced rum over ice in highball glass. Fill with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Bionic Beaver
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Sloe gin
  • 2 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Grenadine
  • 12 oz Beer (Busch)
  • 7-Up
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put a little crushed ice in the bottom of the pitcher, then the beer, and then the shots. Then top off the pitcher with equal amounts of Orange Juice and 7-Up. Stir.

drinks.name: Black Cherry
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Raspberry liqueur (Chambord)
  • 3/4 oz Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • 3/4 oz Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • 3/4 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3/4 oz Half-and-half
  • 1 splash Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add ingredients, shake, and serve. Top with a cherry.

drinks.name: South African Smoothie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amarula Cream
  • 1 small Banana
  • Chocolate ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients on high until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and garnish with chocolate shavings and a cherry.

drinks.name: Organ Grinder
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Whiskey
  • 1 tblsp white Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Cream of coconut
  • crushed Ice
  • Coconut shavings
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend. Pour over crushed ice. Sprinke coconut shavings on top.

drinks.name: Tropical Nat
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 3 parts Orange juice
  • 2 parts Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 3 parts Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rum and vodka over ice, and add juices one by one, letting the juices swirl together, rather than mix. Garnish with a slice of lime, orange, or pineapple.

drinks.name: The Nick
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in a shaker and shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Inverted Pyramid Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-1/4 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1-1/4 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1 splash Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled Martini glass and garnish with a orange twist.

drinks.name: Pink Clyt
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1/2 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 oz Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake drink in a regular shaker. Garnish with a cherry. The drink should have that soft glowing quality characteristic of the triple sec.

drinks.name: Simon Sez Seazar
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1 Lime
  • 2 dashes Salt
  • 2 dashes Black pepper
  • 2 dashes Celery salt
  • 2 dashes Cayenne pepper
  • 3 dashes Tabasco sauce
  • 3 dashes Worcestershire sauce
  • 2 1/2 oz Absolut Peppar
  • 6 to 8 oz Mott's Clamato juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve in a hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a celery stalk.

drinks.name: Sucker punch
drinks.ingredients:
• crushed Ice
  • 2 shots Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 shots Peach schnapps
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 oz Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put crushed ice in glass about a quarter of the way up. Pour in vodka, peach schnapps and the three juices (apple, orange, and cranberry.) Stir through a couple of times.

drinks.name: Pink Fix
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Lemon juice
  • 3/4 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into shaker 1/2 full of ice. Shake vigorously. Pour into lowball glass. Garnish to taste.

drinks.name: Sharpshooter #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Ouzo
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 6 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour and stir.

drinks.name: Dan's Dewberry Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 dash Vermouth
  • 1 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker cup. Add ice last. Stir ingredients (do not shake unless asked to). Strain into a chilled martini glass and serve.

drinks.name: Butter Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 oz Milk
  • 1 oz crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix butterscotch shnapps with Bailey's irish cream then pour milk over the mixture. Add crushed ice.

drinks.name: Red Rasputin
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 1 shot Grenadine
  • 1 can Pepsi Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir, add ice, and enjoy.

drinks.name: Apple Jack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • Fill ith Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients in a mixing glass. Serve on the rocks in cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Brain Destroyer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 dash Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the Bailey's, Kahlua, and Amaretto together in the shot glass. Then add a dash of Bacardi 151.

drinks.name: Black Bitch
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Black Sambuca
  • 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Bailey's irish cream over black sambuca. Top with bacardi 151 rum.

drinks.name: Monte-Sano
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Dark rum (Myers Special Dark)
  • 1 part Rum (Mount Gay Barbados Eclipse)
  • 1 splash Bitters
  • 1 part Club soda
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • crushed Ice
  • 1 pinch Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients together and stir in sugar, pour over ice. Drink up.

drinks.name: Nutty Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 oz Hazelnut liqueur
  • 1 oz Coconut rum
  • 1 oz Spiced rum
  • 3 1/2 oz Milk
  • 5 oz Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain over ice.

drinks.name: Flaming Jesus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Float 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Vodka, lime juice, and grenadine into shot glass. Then layer 151 on top from the back of a spoon. Light the 151 and shoot it while lit if you dare. If you are worried about shooting a lit drink, just blow out the flame and then shoot the drink.

drinks.name: G Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Goldschlager
  • 1/2 shot 100 proof Absolut Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill both ingredients by placing the bottles in the freezer for at least 1 hour. You should also chill the shot glasses you will be using the same way. Pour both ingredients into a chilled shot glass and enjoy.

drinks.name: Riedinger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix rum, Midori, and lime juice in highball glass with crushed ice. Fill glass to top with cola. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Nudge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • Fill Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put alcohol in mug first, fill with coffee. This allows sufficient mixing of ingredients.

drinks.name: Voodoo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 2 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

drinks.name: The Jolly Rancher
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Roll Me Over
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Vanilla schnapps
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the ingredients to a glass with ice in the order they are listed.

drinks.name: Kavorkien
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bacardi Spiced rum
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi Black rum
  • 1/2 oz Coconut rum (Parrot Bay)
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Noyaux
  • 3/4 oz Orange juice
  • 3/4 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients into a mixing tin with ice. Shake and strain. Can be served over ice or up.

drinks.name: The MacAttack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Fill 1/2 Grape juice
  • Fill 1/2 Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker with ice, add all ingredients. Shake so that all parts mix together. Serve on ice.

drinks.name: Chocolate Raspberry Brownie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • 1 shot Raspberry liqueur (Chambord)
  • 2 shots Cream
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour in the liqueurs and then top with cream. Garnish with chocolate shavings on the top.

drinks.name: End of the Road
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Frangelico
  • 4 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 4 cl Whipping cream
  • 3 Nuts
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all the ingridiants in the shaker (except the nuts), add ice, and shake well. Pour in the glass, and add the nuts on-top.

drinks.name: Baseball Pleasure
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • 1 jigger Whiskey
  • 1 jigger Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Begin by making a standard Screwdriver (OJ and Vodka) and then add the Whiskey and the Amaretto. Mix and serve.

drinks.name: Zhivago's Revenge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Peppar
  • 3 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add in this order: Cinnamon Schnapps, Absolut Pepper, Tabasco

drinks.name: Turlock Bulldog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 6 oz Root beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Kahlua and Bailey's in glass. Fill with rootbeer.

drinks.name: YIP!
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Jose Cuervo Tequila
  • 3 oz Club soda
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with Tequila, then club soda, then squeze a slice of lemon, toss in and add one ice cube, stir, drink, enjoy.

drinks.name: Bloody Brit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Campari
  • 1 oz Gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour together in an old-fashioned glass. Stir as required.

drinks.name: Hudson
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour together and stir as required.

drinks.name: Red Rock
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3/4 shot Wildberry schnapps
  • 1 can Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and schnapps in the bottom of a glass. Add ice and Dr. Pepper.

drinks.name: Lassi - Sweet #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 scoop Ice
  • 2 scoops Yoghurt
  • 1 splash Lemon juice
  • 8 handfuls Sugar
  • 3 pinches Salt
  • 1 dash Rosewater
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix them all together in a blender. The measurements are not precise because you oughtta just throw everything in to taste. This is mainly here to help out those, like myself, who tried making the Sweet Lassi with the other Sweet Lassi recipe, and found out that it was pretty bad - watery, not sweet, et cetera. Ice is the key.

drinks.name: Tachyon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Pernod
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • Dash Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir over ice. Either strain in a cocktail glass or on the rocks in a highball glass. Serve with curl of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Tennessee Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Jack Daniels
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Sweet and sour
  • 2 parts Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients and poor over ice in a mason jar

drinks.name: USD Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Malibu rum
  • 5 parts Mountain Dew
  • 2 dashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: This drink can be made with ice, but it looks a lot better without it. I recommend just using chilled soda. Add rum first, then soda, then a few dashes of grenadine. Don't stir.

drinks.name: Lunch Box #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Beer
  • 2 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • Drop in 1 shot Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the beer and OJ in a mug, drop the shot of Amaretto in, and down it.

drinks.name: Mocha Maria
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tia maria
  • 2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Half fill a shaker with ice. Add ingredients, shake, and pour over ice.

drinks.name: Shiny Nail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Cinzano Orancio
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with ice. Pour into glass.

drinks.name: Capital Punishment
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bourbon (Jim Beam)
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour. Shoot.

drinks.name: Sazerac #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 45 ml Bourbon (Rebel Yell)
  • 3.5 ml Pernod
  • 2 ml Angostura bitters
  • 3 ml Peychaud bitters
  • Twist of Lemon peel
  • 15 ml Sugar syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a spare glass, mix the bourbon, the sugar syrup, and the two kinds of bitters. Make a twist of lemon peel by peeling it from a lemon with a sharp vegetable peeler. Rub firmly around the rim of a well-iced Old Fashioned glass. Put the Pernod in the glass and swirl it around to coat the bottom. Add the contents of the other glass along with one ice cube. Serve.
