drinks.name: Fubar Kool-Aid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in shaker over cracked ice, pour into highball glass with ice and enjoy.

drinks.name: Peaches and Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps (Peachtree)
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Kahlua and peach schnapps, fill rest with milk. Shake.

drinks.name: Atheist's Best
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 parts extra dry Champagne
  • 2 parts Vodka
  • 1 part Cherry juice
  • 1 part Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take two glasses. Fill one with champagne and mix the other glass with the specified amounts of the other ingredients. Mix the contents of both glasses. You end up with two glasses of the drink

drinks.name: Rummple
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Coconut rum
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi Limon
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients, including ice, and pour into glass.

drinks.name: Cindy's Cycle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 part Tequila
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 parts Sweet and sour
  • 1 1/2 part Grenadine
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Tequila, Melon Liqueur, Sweet and Sour, and Grenadine. Blend with Ice. Serve in glass.

drinks.name: Soapy Tits
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Rumple Minze
  • 1 shot Goldschlager
  • 1 shot Aftershock
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Goldshlager, Rumple Minze and Aftershock into mug. Fill with sprite.

drinks.name: Duck Fuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 parts Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1 part Vodka (Stoli)
  • Fill with Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Find a large shot glass (1 1/2 - 2 oz. is appropriate). Fill 80% of the way with Tanqueray gin. Fill another 15% with Stoli or Absolut vodka. Fill to the rim with cheap 'Ice' beer (best results with Busch Ice).

drinks.name: Green Whale
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 splash Vodka
  • Fill with 1/3 part Pineapple juice
  • Fill with 2/3 part Orange juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in a shaker and shake well.

drinks.name: Skid Marks
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 tblsp Chocolate syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Chocolate syrup at bottom of shot glass Add Kahlua and stir with a small spoon Enjoy!

drinks.name: Is That a Banana in Your Pocket
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 2 parts Whiskey
  • 1 part Banana liqueur
  • 2 parts Sweet and sour
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Collins glass with ice. Mix ingredients and top off glass with 7-up. Stir and enjoy!

drinks.name: Limelon
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 3 oz Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all liquids then fill with ice. Finally cap with powdered sugar.

drinks.name: I Love Rosa
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Pepsi Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put into glass. Stir.

drinks.name: Hologram
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Banana liqueur
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: place ingredients into shaker with ice. shake and strain into shot glass

drinks.name: Atlas
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Vodka (Senator's Club)
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in shaker with ice. Strain and serve!

drinks.name: Watermelon Shooter #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in any order into a sifting glass filled with ice. Shake for 5 seconds and pour the chilled contents into your cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Thunder Quake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cherry brandy
  • 1 part Cognac
  • Fill with white Cider
drinks.mixinginstructions: Swill the Congac around the glass then add the cider and float the brandy over the top.

drinks.name: 351 Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Coca-Cola
  • 1 part Gin (Gordon's)
  • 2 splashes Kronenbourg Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Gordon's Gin and Kronenbourg beer (it MUST be Kronenbourg) into a coffee cup or a glass. Add Coca-Cola until it acquires the right taste.

drinks.name: Malibu Screw
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add chilled orange juice to the vodka and Malibu. Ice is optional.

drinks.name: Thorazine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all three ingredients in order to a shot glass. Best served with top layer on fire. (For effect only)

drinks.name: Sex in the Shower
drinks.ingredients:
• Fill Shaker with Ice
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and Strain into Champagne Flute.

drinks.name: Limon Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bacardi Limon
  • Fill with Sunny delight
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add one shot Bacardi Limon, fill with Sunny Delight or orange juice

drinks.name: T2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Tequila
  • 3 cl Tabasco sauce
  • 1 pinch Black pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the ingredients in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Jack-Hammer II
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into shot glass and slam it.

drinks.name: Hop, Skip, and Go Naked #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bag Ice
  • 1 can Limeade
  • 1 can Lemonade
  • 2 L Sprite
  • 1/2 gal Vodka
  • 1 case Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: First dump in bag of ice. Next add the cans of limeade and lemonade. Now add 2 liter bottle of sprite. Next add 1/2 gallon of vodka. Then add 20-24 cans of beer.

drinks.name: Sex in the Red Zone
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Sloe gin
  • Fill with Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put vodka and sloe gin into glass. Add lemonade.

drinks.name: Kelly's Buttery Nipple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the three together in a big glass and pour into shot glasses. Top each shot off with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Golden Comfort
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Goldschlager
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix, then pour into shot glass

drinks.name: Pink Heart
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Milk or cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: In rocks glass filled with ice, add 1/2 shot of Chambord and 1/2 shot of Creme De Cacao. Fill with cream or milk.

drinks.name: Romulan Ale #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cuervo Tequila
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 6 dashes Tabasco sauce
  • Fill with chilled Zima
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to mug, Zima last. Pour once hard into shaker, gently back into mug. Use more tabasco if less sweetness is desired.

drinks.name: Dreaming in Antalya
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Dark rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 cl Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 cl Cointreau
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a mixing glass with ice cubes and pour into chilled cocktail glass

drinks.name: Minttini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Vodka
  • 1 part White Creme de Menthe
  • 1/2 part Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with cubed ice, then pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a mint leaf.

drinks.name: Retribution
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Firewater
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Swimming Pool
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl White rum
  • 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • 1 cl Amaretto
  • 2 cl Cream
  • 2 cl Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients with some ice in a shaker. Strain into a glass over some ice.

drinks.name: Peppermint Crisp
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend the creme de menthe and the kahlua together, then top up the rest of the glass with ice cold milk. Also nice with ice cubes.

drinks.name: Spicy Buttery Nipple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Hot Damn
  • 1/3 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Hot Damn and Butterscotch Schnapps in shot glass first, then carefully add the irish cream without mixing.

drinks.name: Zimaretto
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Amaretto
  • 12 oz Zima
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour about 2 ounces of Amaretto into a 16 oz. glass and fill with Zima.

drinks.name: April Rain
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice cordial
  • 1/2 oz Vermouth
  • Lime peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Vodka, Vermouth and lime cordial into shaker over ice. Shake with care not to bruise. Strain into chilled cocktail (martini) glass. Garnish with lime peel (zest).

drinks.name: Mojo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 qt Light rum
  • 1 qt Dark rum
  • 1 pint Cherry brandy
  • 6 cans light Beer
  • 5 cans 7-Up
  • 4 qt Pineapple juice
  • 2+ bags Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in large container. Keep stirred.

drinks.name: Valentine
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake banana liqueur, vodka, and cranberry juice with ice and strain into a red wine glass.

drinks.name: Royal Caribbean Fuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Crown Royal
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients in shaker over ice. shake well and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Attitude
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Lemon vodka
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir. Garnish with a lemon & lime slice.

drinks.name: Glaciermeister
drinks.ingredients:
• 2-3 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 shot Milk
  • 1 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in blender by adding the ice cream first, followed by the milk, then the JÃ¤germeister. Blend until smooth.

drinks.name: Kahlua and Iced Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 scoops Chocolate ice-cream
  • 2 shots Milk
  • 2 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a blender by adding the ice cream first, followed by the milk, then add the Kahlua. Blend until smooth.

drinks.name: Hennyville Slugger
drinks.ingredients:
• 5-7 oz Cognac (Hennessy)
  • 3-4 oz Lemon-lime soda (Sprite)
  • Juice of 1/2 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill hiball glass with 5-7 ounces of cognac. Next, fill remainder of glass with lemon-lime soda. Finally, squeeze 1/2 of medium size lemon and garnish with 1/4 inch lemon wedges.

drinks.name: Affirmative Action
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Vodka
  • 1 part Cognac
  • 1 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill glass about 1/4 with chilled orange juice. add vodka at a 2:1 ratio with cognac and add to highball glass with orange juice. optional squeeze of lemon.

drinks.name: Ironlung
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Yukon Jack
  • Float 3 drops Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • Top with Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a 1oz. shot of Yukon Jack. Top with a small float of Bacardi 151 rum. Add a small topping of whipped cream.

drinks.name: Red Lobster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain.

drinks.name: Green Hell #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Blue Curacao
  • 1 shot Gin
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Rum
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • 1 shot white Tequila
  • 3 parts Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker. Fill with ice and add orange juice. Pour into hurricane glass and serve.

drinks.name: Carmel Candy Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 cup Apple schnapps (Pucker Sour Apple)
  • 1/2 cup Butterscotch schnapps (Buttershots)
  • 2 tblsp Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: All ingrediants should be freezer cold. Pour equal parts of the schnapps and stir in the triple sec.

drinks.name: Southern Bubbles
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: No mixing required.

drinks.name: Good 'n Plenty
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Sambuca
  • 1 splash Soda water
  • Fill with Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Cocktail can be served on the rocks or blended until smooth.

drinks.name: American Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Kahlua
  • 1/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1/4 oz Frangelico
  • 1/4 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill with ice. Strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Cognac Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Egg yolk
  • 1/2 oz Sugar syrup
  • 3/4 oz Cream
  • 1 3/4 oz Cognac
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well all ingredients in a shaker. Strain into cocktail glass and grate some nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Block and Fall
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Cognac
  • 3/4 oz Cointreau
  • 3/4 oz Calvados
  • 1/2 oz Pernod
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Woot's Butter Cream Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with cream and pour the schnapps on top.

drinks.name: Greek Tycoon
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin (Tanqueray Malacca)
  • 1 oz Metaxa
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add the Tanqueray 'Malacca' Gin, then the Metaxa Brandy to finish. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Pajama Jackhammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz pineapple Guava juice
  • 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients and serve with shaved ice.

drinks.name: Cry Baby Blues
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 1/2 oz strawberry Guava juice
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve with Shaved Ice.

drinks.name: Traffic Light
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Grenadine
  • 1/3 shot Galliano
  • 1/3 shot Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Grenadine, Galliano, and Midori.

drinks.name: Quick Fuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 cl Kahlua
  • 1 cl Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into shot glass, Baileys first and Midori last.

drinks.name: Malibu Dew
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 jigger Malibu rum
  • Fill with Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix slightly and serve.

drinks.name: Robicheaux
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bourbon
  • 1 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 splash Cherry juice
  • Ice
  • Fill with Cola
  • Garnish with Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill tall glass with crushed ice. Add bourbon, Rose's lime juice, and cherry juice. Fill with cola. Stir gently and garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Red Frog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Crown Royal
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into glass with light ice, can also be served as a shooter

drinks.name: Raspberry Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 46 oz pink Grapefruit juice
  • 12 oz Raspberry juice
  • 1 qt raspberry Sherbet
  • 2 L Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour pink grapefruit juice and ginger ale into punch bowl. Pour raspberry juice or 12 oz frozen raspberries into punch bowl (if using frozen raspberries, be sure to stir to un-thaw after adding to punch bowl). Add sherbet into punch and stir until majority of it is melted.

drinks.name: Cocoboodo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 oz Drambuie
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice chips.

drinks.name: Crystal Virgin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Yukon Jack
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 2 1/4 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill with ice & strain into shot glasses. Add Cranberry Juice to taste. Tastes just like fruit punch.

drinks.name: Baked Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 pint Cider (Hornsby's Draft)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the liqueur into the glass first, then add the Cider. Serve cold.

drinks.name: Green Apple Cider
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 pint Cider (Hornsby's Draft)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the Cider to the liqueur. Serve Cold

drinks.name: Black Bird Cider
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Blackberry schnapps
  • 1 pint Cider (Hornsby's Draft)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the Cider to the liqueur. Serve Cold

drinks.name: The Bionic Drink
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Vodka
  • Fill with Grapefruit juice or soda
  • Juice of 1/4 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: First pour the Vodka then fill up with the Grapefruit soda or juice. Then add the lemon juice.

drinks.name: Martian Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 oz Gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Gin and Midori in Shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a martini glass. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Tainted Heart
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Aftershock
  • 1/2 shot Chocolate liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glasses half full with Aftershock. Tip glass to the side and slowly pour chocolate liqueur down the side. This is a layered shot.

drinks.name: Poison Ivy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Aftershock
  • 1/2 shot Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour chilled ingredients into a shot glass. Can be made layered or mixed. If layered pour the Aftershock in first, then slowly layer the Kahlua on top.

drinks.name: Amaretto Paradise
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice. Shake and serve.

drinks.name: '57 Chevy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve.

drinks.name: Fat Cat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mixing cup 1/4 full of ice. Add all three ingredents. Shake and strain into a shot glass. It can also be served on the rocks.

drinks.name: Pimp & Hoe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Everclear
  • 1 shot Cointreau
  • 6 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 shot Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the liquor first, then the OJ and then the lemon juice. Stir the drink a little bit and then drink.

drinks.name: Orange Demon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 glass Orange juice
  • 2 oz Everclear
  • 2 oz Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the OJ first, then mix in the Everclear and the Cointreau.

drinks.name: Mudslide #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Godiva liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine over Ice. Stir.

drinks.name: Frooty Biznitch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Skyy Vodka
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in all ingredients in a shaker, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.

drinks.name: Cooter Cork
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry liqueur (Chambord)
  • 1/4 oz Aftershock
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Kurant
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer ingredients in a tall shot glass: Grenadine, Chambord, Aftershock and Absolut Kurant. Drink should have varying layers of red.

drinks.name: Tini Rita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/4 oz Cointreau
  • 1/4 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1 splash Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 splash Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill martini glass with ice and water. Fill cocktail shaker with ice, vodka, Cointreau, Grand Marnier, lime juice, and sour mix. Shake vigorously until shaker is frosty. Empty martini glass and rim with salt and sugar mix. Pour contents into glass and garnish with lime wedge. Serve.

drinks.name: Boardwalk Breeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain ingredients into a Hurricane or large glass.

drinks.name: Belinda's Fuzzy Melon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Top with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and Strain into Highball Glass

drinks.name: Elmo
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz Vodka
  • Sour mix
  • Top with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and Strain or Roll. No Garnish.

drinks.name: Peach Tequila
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila (Casa Noble)
  • 4 oz Peach juice
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into collins glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir and drop lime slice into drink.

drinks.name: Cowboy's Comet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Canadian whisky (Canadian Club)
  • 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Cola
  • 1 splash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rye whiskey over ice, then add cola, southern comfort, and lime.

drinks.name: Smoothe Operator
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 can 7-Up
  • Ice
  • Fruit (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients, except 7-Up, in blender. Divide into 2 jars. Top with 7-Up, stir well.

drinks.name: Loch Ness Monster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in order shown, Midori, Bailey's, Jager.

drinks.name: Pink Lemonade #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Sour mix
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 dash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice, vodka, sour mix, cranberry and lime juice. Shake and serve with a garnish of lemon

drinks.name: Fruitloops
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients and serve over ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry

drinks.name: Red Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • 1 dash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients, Stir and serve over ice.

drinks.name: D.R.F.O.
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Ouzo
  • 1 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 4 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass half filled with ice. Stir, and strain into an chilled old-fasioned glass over ice cubes.

drinks.name: Emerald Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/8 oz Green Chartreuse
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with cracked ice in a shaker and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a lemon zest over the drink and float the zest on top.

drinks.name: Emerald Vodka Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/8 oz Green Chartreuse
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with cracked ice in a shaker and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a lemon zest over the drink and float the zest on top.

drinks.name: Mango Bellini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Mango juice
  • 2 parts Champagne
  • 1 slice of Mango
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill champagne flute one-third full with mango juice. Top with champagne. Stir gently and garnish with a slice of mango.

drinks.name: Cerebral Hemorage
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the Strawberry Schnapps into a double shot or other small glass (this can all be performed in a single glass), then add the Bailey's. It will lump together (Bailey's, that is) to look like a brain in a red fluid (SS). Finally, add Grenadine until it 'oozes' from the brain, and you're set.

drinks.name: Brown Eye Opener
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Everclear
  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all five together then chill.

drinks.name: Martian Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 oz Gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Gin and Midori in Shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a martini glass. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Tainted Heart
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Aftershock
  • 1/2 shot Chocolate liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glasses half full with Aftershock. Tip glass to the side and slowly pour chocolate liqueur down the side. This is a layered shot.

drinks.name: Poison Ivy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Aftershock
  • 1/2 shot Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour chilled ingredients into a shot glass. Can be made layered or mixed. If layered pour the Aftershock in first, then slowly layer the Kahlua on top.

drinks.name: Amaretto Paradise
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice. Shake and serve.

drinks.name: '57 Chevy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve.

drinks.name: Fat Cat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mixing cup 1/4 full of ice. Add all three ingredents. Shake and strain into a shot glass. It can also be served on the rocks.

drinks.name: Pimp & Hoe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Everclear
  • 1 shot Cointreau
  • 6 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 shot Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the liquor first, then the OJ and then the lemon juice. Stir the drink a little bit and then drink.

drinks.name: Orange Demon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 glass Orange juice
  • 2 oz Everclear
  • 2 oz Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the OJ first, then mix in the Everclear and the Cointreau.

drinks.name: Mudslide #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Godiva liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine over Ice. Stir.

drinks.name: Frooty Biznitch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Skyy Vodka
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in all ingredients in a shaker, strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.

drinks.name: Cooter Cork
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry liqueur (Chambord)
  • 1/4 oz Aftershock
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Kurant
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer ingredients in a tall shot glass: Grenadine, Chambord, Aftershock and Absolut Kurant. Drink should have varying layers of red.

drinks.name: Tini Rita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/4 oz Cointreau
  • 1/4 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1 splash Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 splash Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill martini glass with ice and water. Fill cocktail shaker with ice, vodka, Cointreau, Grand Marnier, lime juice, and sour mix. Shake vigorously until shaker is frosty. Empty martini glass and rim with salt and sugar mix. Pour contents into glass and garnish with lime wedge. Serve.

drinks.name: Boardwalk Breeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain ingredients into a Hurricane or large glass.

drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 splash Lime juice

  • Top with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and Strain into Highball Glass

drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Everclear
  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all five together then chill.

drinks.name: Pentecostal
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bourbon
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 6 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Bourbon, Vodka, then 7-Up in Wiskey Sour glass and stir.

drinks.name: TangazÃ©
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Tang
  • 2 oz AlizÃ©
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka with Alize and Tang. Stir then serve with shaved ice.

drinks.name: Jen's Creamy Sighs
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • Float Grand Marnier
  • Coffee
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: In Irish Coffee mug, combine Amaretto and Bailey's. Fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream. Float Grand Marnier over whipped cream. After Serving, consumer may stir for a full flavor combination.

drinks.name: Ultimate Blue Frozen Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 cup Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredient into a blender, over the ice, in order listed. Blend on 'high' for a few seconds until drink has a consistancy a bit icier than a slurpee. Take lime wedge and run it over the edges of the margarita glass, then, upturned, place the wetted rims into course salt. Pour the now ready margarita into the now salted glasses and serve.

drinks.name: Turkey Trot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups Cranberry juice
  • 2 cups 7-Up
  • 1 cup Wild Turkey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with a stirrer in a pitcher then pour over ice into glasses. A Thanksgiving tradition for the truly disfunctional family!

drinks.name: Rumple Shock
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1 oz Aftershock
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add the Aftershock then poor the Rumple Minze ontop and let the good times roll.

drinks.name: Electric Storm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/3 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/3 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all 4 ingredients into a shot glass and slam it.

drinks.name: Horny Bull #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Tequila
  • 1/3 shot White rum
  • 1/3 shot Vodka (Smirnoff)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour into shot glass,or test tube and down it!

drinks.name: Irish Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish Mist
  • 1 splash Green Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Irish Mist into shot glass. Add a splash of Creme de Menthe (green).

drinks.name: Scooley Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Triple Sec and Peachtree into glass. Add Sour mix and Sprite. Stir gently and enjoy.

drinks.name: Ultimate June Bug
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients and pour over ice.

drinks.name: Chocolate Cow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Chocolate liqueur
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • Cream to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Cucacaracha
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 part Vodka
  • 1/3 part Kahlua
  • 1/3 part Tequila
  • Top with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Using a jigger glass (3oz shot glass) mix 1/3 of each part then top with club soda. Cover and shake lightly.

drinks.name: The Real June Bug
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Fresca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Fresca over the SoCo.

drinks.name: Acapulco Zombie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Tequila
  • 1 shot Rum
  • 1 dash White Creme de Menthe
  • Orange juice
  • Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the alcohol in first, then finish off the glass with the two juices. Also, remember, just a little Creme de Menthe, not too much!

drinks.name: Nasty Bitch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill the tequila and the Cointreau and serve in a shot glass straight up.

drinks.name: Los Cabos Clout
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Banana
  • 1/2 Mango
  • 1/4 Papaya
  • 2 handfuls Ice
  • 8 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz White rum
  • 3 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in a bender and blend for 10 seconds.Pour into glass.Do not strain!

drinks.name: Aqualung
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Kahlua
  • 2 shots Espresso
  • 1 shot Chocolate syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Brew espresso, mix in shots of kaluha and syrup

drinks.name: Storm Trooper
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Coconut rum
  • 6 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingrediants together.

drinks.name: The Chocolate Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • 1/2 oz Chocolate liqueur (Godiva)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into chilled martini glass.

drinks.name: Stoner On Acid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz AlizÃ©
  • 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Malibu Rum and AlizÃ© on ice. Strain into glass. Stir in JÃ¤germeister.

drinks.name: Original Terminator
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1 1/2 oz Black Sambuca (Romana)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Spin shot glass in some ice to cool for a few seconds. Half-fill glass with Rumple Minze first, then top off with black sambuca.

drinks.name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fucker #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Tequila
  • 1/3 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/3 oz Southern Comfort
  • 6 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into shot glass starting with Tequila, followed by J.D., then by Southern. Top with drops of Tabasco, and shoot.

drinks.name: Feel This
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Next add Absolut, Sloe gin, Pineapple juice, Southern Comfort, and last Midori. Last add pineapple and cherry garnish.

drinks.name: Beam Scream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Aftershock
  • 1 shot Jim Beam
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix shots in 3-4oz glass, stir, then drain it.

drinks.name: Magnum
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Goldschlager
  • 1 part Jack Daniels
  • 1 part Fruit punch
  • 1 splash Tequila
  • 1 part Rum
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 3 cups Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all of the ingredients in a blender, add ice and blend.

drinks.name: Italian Stallion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Tuaca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place the ingredients in the order mentioned in the receipe, in a 2oz. shot glass and just shoot it!

drinks.name: Bolduc On The Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in glass. Serve on the rocks (optional).

drinks.name: Purple Peril
drinks.ingredients:
• 25 ml Vodka
  • 25 ml Pernod
  • 2 dashes Blackcurrant squash
  • Fill with Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build into a tall ice filled glass, vodka, Pernod, dash of blackcurrant cordial, top up with lemonade

drinks.name: Almond Joy #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Cream
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mixing glass with ice, add Malibu, amaretto, creme de cacao, and cream. Shake, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

drinks.name: Rusty Mist
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Drambuie
  • 1 oz Irish Mist
  • 2 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place ice cubes in glass, pour in about one ounce of Drambuie and one ounce of Irish Mist.

drinks.name: Vermont Maple Blaster
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rum
  • 2 oz Maple syrup
  • 2 oz Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, add vodka and add Vermont maple syrup.

drinks.name: Sonoma
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Vodka
  • 5 oz Mountain Dew
  • 2 oz Grape juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Neon-Geek
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bourbon (Jim Beam)
  • 1/2 oz Mountain Dew
  • 1 oz Cinnamon schnapps (Firewater)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all three ingredients in a mixing glass, along with 1 cup crushed ice. Strain into margirita glass and serve immediately!

drinks.name: K.G.B. #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Kahlua
  • 1/3 shot Galliano
  • 1/3 shot Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient in shot glass floating each time. Make sure Galliano is on top.

drinks.name: After Dark
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Licor 43
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer, in order.

drinks.name: 8th Birthday
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Pour into a martini glass.

drinks.name: American Flag
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Grenadine
  • 1/3 Creme de Cacao
  • 1/3 Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: When properly prepared this shot will look red, white and blue. First poor in 1/3 grenadine. Then the White Cream de cacao should be poured in over a bar spoon. Finally the Blue curacao can be poured in the same way.

drinks.name: Passion Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Passoa
  • 2 cl Peachtree schnapps
  • 2 cl Bacardi Limon
  • 8 cl Grapefruit juice
  • 2 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingridients with ice, strain into ice filled highball glass, add some nice fresh fruit on the rim of the glass.

drinks.name: Mafia's Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Amaretto, Southern Comfort, and Sour Mix into glass. Stir well.

drinks.name: Oil Spill
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 shot Goldschlager
  • 1/4 shot JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer JÃ¤germeister on top of the Goldschlager.

drinks.name: Nitro
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Sambuca
  • 1/3 Goldschlager
  • 1/3 Brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all 3 ingredients in a shot glass. (no order)

drinks.name: French Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Grand Marnier
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice, chill and strain in a Martini glass or cocktail class. You may also add sugar to the rim if you like.

drinks.name: Cuban Crime of Passion (CCP)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 part Light rum (Captain Morgan's or Bacardi)
  • 1 part Coconut rum (Coco Ribe or Parrot Bay)
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all the ingredients into a mixer glass, shake violently, and then pour the mixture into a 12 oz. glass with ice.

drinks.name: Fruit Loop #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice cubes. Strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: South Padre Island
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sour mix
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order listed above. Allow Cranberry to float. Do not stir this drink. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Sweet Italian Bastard
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Vodka
  • 2 parts Gin
  • 1 part Vermouth
  • 1 tblsp Sugar
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Simply mix all the ingredients together in a cocktail mixer full of ice cubes. Shake well, strain and serve. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Small Sand
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 cl Strawberry juice
  • 8 cl Sour mix
  • Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the 4 first ingredients with ice. Fill with lemonade. Garnish with carambole and strawberry on the edge of glass.

drinks.name: Lime Lizard
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Vodka first, then mix in the rest. Count to three and drink!

drinks.name: Pepe's Flame of Love Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 2-3 drops Sherry (La Ina)
  • 2 Orange peels
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: As explained from the great bartender Pepe Ruiz of Beverly Hills Chasen's Restauraunt: 'You swirl a few drops of La Ina Sherry in a chilled stem glass and pour it out. Than squeeze a strip of Orange peel into the glass and flambe' it with a with match. Throw away the peel. Now fill the glass with Ice to chill again, then throw that out. Add vodka, than flambe' another orange peel around the rim. Now throw out the second burnt peel. Then just stir it gently. And drink, drink.'

drinks.name: Sweaty Belly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • Orange juice
  • Cranberry juice
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: This is a 'built' drink, meaning it gets made directly into the glass, no mixing glass or shaker is needed. Put the cubes in first, then the amaretto, then half fill with OJ and half fill with Cran. juice.

drinks.name: Butt Fucks
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Amaretto
  • 4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Yukon Jack
  • 2 oz Lime juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake for approximately 1 minute, till really cold. Pour into shot glasses. Makes approximately 16 shots.

drinks.name: Cookie Dough
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 5 pinches Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Amaretto above Bailey's Irish Cream, then add various pinches of Cinnamon. Serve once cinnamon clumps begin to settle into the liquor.

drinks.name: Whitney
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 part Red wine (Blush)
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients chilled for better flavor. Avoid ice cubes to prevent watered down taste. Mix rum first (must be a white rum), add a dark type of wine (blush or red is fine), and finally a touch of lemon juice. Get ready to have fun!

drinks.name: Kermit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 cl Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 1/2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 1 1/2 cl Blue Curacao
  • 1 1/2 cl Banana liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice and shake. Top up with orange juice.

drinks.name: Mother Moo
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 4 cl Licor 43
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put a couple of ice cubes in the glass ad the Licor 43 and fill up with milk. If you don't have Licor 43 use a vanilla liqueur with a splash of orange. Since this drink separates itself you need to add a stiring pin so the guest can have something to mix the drink with.

drinks.name: Midori Sour #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Sweet and sour
  • Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a Highball glass, add Midori, fill to 3/4 with sweet and sour, finish by filling to brim with Sprite. Stir.

drinks.name: Maryville Sweet
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour soouthern comfort and lime juice over ice, stir, enjoy

drinks.name: Caribbean Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Melon liqueur
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the melon and malibu together. Slowly pour the cranberry juice on top untill it fills half the remaining space. The orange juice is then floated on top.

drinks.name: Sweet Burning Eruption
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Triple sec
  • 1/2 shot Butterscotch schnapps
  • Irish cream
  • 4 drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour half shot of Triple Sec into shot glass. Add half shot of butterscotch schnapps. Float irish cream gently on top until you have a thin layer. Drip grenadine onto irish cream layer to produce 'eruption' effect.

drinks.name: Amaretto Sunrise Crush
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Orange juice
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1/2 shot Grenadine
  • 1/2 cup Ice cubes
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend orange juice, amaretto, grenadine and ice cubes in blender until smooth. Pour into glass and add lemon juice.

drinks.name: Rebel Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 3 oz Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all 3 well and serve over ice cubes- enjoy!

drinks.name: Carnegie Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 can Orange juice
  • 3 oz Tomato juice
  • Add 4 Strawberries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Everything goes in a blender. Mix in tomato juice, orange juice, and strawberries together. Add vodka and tequila.

drinks.name: Nitro Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Blended whiskey
  • Orange juice
  • Cranberry juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice, combine vodka, whiskey, and juices. The amount of orange and cranberry juice should be about equal. Strain into a collins glass nearly filled with ice. Add a dash of grenadine.

drinks.name: Scarlett O'Hara
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all three ingredients in a glass with ice. Stir and enjoy!

drinks.name: Greven
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Citron
  • 8 cl Passoa
  • 1 cl Blue Curacao
  • 12 cl Orange juice
  • 2 dashes Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka, passoa and orange juice over ice in the glass. Add the blue curacao and the lime. Do not stir.

drinks.name: Tropical Orgasm #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Triple sec
  • 2 parts Malibu rum
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients. Shake and pour into glass with ice.

drinks.name: Purple VW
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill two thirds of a shot glass with Blue Curacao, fill with Grenadine and stir rapidly

drinks.name: The Rollercoaster
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Amaretto
  • 3 parts Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into glass with ice and shake vigourously.

drinks.name: Irish Gold
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix half an ounce of Goldshlager with half an ounce of Bailey's Irish Cream in a regular shot glass and stir.

drinks.name: Russian Bloody Mary
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 1 part Tomato juice (salted)
  • 2 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka into glass, the carefully add the tomato juice so that it falls to the bottom of the glass. Last, add a couple of drops of tabasco sauce.

drinks.name: Pio's Beating Stick
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients in order, JD first, then pineapple juice, and finally the orange juice. Don't sip, shoot the whole shot at once.

drinks.name: The Jaw
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Grenadine
  • 3 oz Spiced rum
  • 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 12 oz Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix them all together.

drinks.name: Shazam Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Apple schnapps
  • 1 shot Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to shaker. Shake to chill. Strain out ice and pour into glass.

drinks.name: Pineapple Monyca
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 4 oz Triple sec
  • 4 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill With Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just stir it a little!

drinks.name: Banana Tropical
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Banana
  • 125 gr Yoghurt
  • 2 dl Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in a blender and blend for 3 minutes. If the mix isn't liquid enough (depends on the banana), add another shot of pineapple juice. Decorate with a piece of the banana and a piece of a pineapple.

drinks.name: Green Cow #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 2 cl Milk
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Kahlua Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 shot Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all of the ingredients well.

drinks.name: Lolita
drinks.ingredients:
• 20 ml Tequila
  • 10 ml Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Honey
  • 2 dashes Angostura bitters
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass and add one or two ice cubes.

drinks.name: Safari Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Cointreau
  • 30 ml Midori melon liqueur
  • 140 ml Orange juice
  • 6 drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Cointreau and Midori Melon Liqueur to stirring glass and top up with orange juice. Stir threee or four times rapidly and pour drink into cocktail glass. Add grenadine one drop at a time and garnish with tropical fruits.

drinks.name: Peach Passion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • Pink lemonade
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mixer/glass half full of ice. Pour liquor in next (highest proof first). Pour pink lemonade in next. Stir and pour into highball glass.

drinks.name: Tsunami #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz White rum (Bacardi)
  • Mountain Dew
  • 1 slice Kiwi
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place kiwi slice in the bottom of the glass. Add alcohols. Fill with Mountain Dew

drinks.name: Crooked Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot 100 proof Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 shot Irish whiskey (Jameson's)
  • Orange juice
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill beer mug with ice. Add all ingredients and stir.

drinks.name: Almost Heaven
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-1/4 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in a collins glass over ice.

drinks.name: Irish Lady
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3 oz Champagne
  • 1 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a near full glass of champagne, add Midori and orange juice.

drinks.name: Purple Problem Solver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Apple schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • Grenadine
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill hurricane glass with ice. Add vodka, rum, midori, curacao, schnapps, and sweet and sour. Fill with pineapple juice and add grenadine to turn it purple.

drinks.name: Fruit of the Loom
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1/4 oz Coconut rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Windy Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1/2 cup Milk
  • 1/2 cup Orange juice
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth. Makes 2 servings.

drinks.name: Bourbon Slush
drinks.ingredients:
• 7 cups Water
  • 3 cups Bourbon
  • 12 oz frozen Lemonade
  • 6 oz frozen Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 cup Sugar
  • 2 cups strong Tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients a day ahead and place in freezer. When ready to serve, take out of freezer and put desired amount in blender for a second or put in a bowl and mix till it is semi-liquified. Serve in old fashioned glasses.

drinks.name: Siberian Slider
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz White rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix equal parts into a tumber filled with cracked ice. Stir liberally and sip slowly.

drinks.name: Baby Doll
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy (Courvoisier)
  • 1 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • Ice cubes
  • Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir liquors and juice over ice gently. Sugar rim of chilled cocktail glass and strain.

drinks.name: 44D
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Peach schnapps
  • 1/3 shot Kahlua
  • 1/3 shot Vodka (Skyy)
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each into shot glass and top with Grenadine.

drinks.name: Cement Kicker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 shot Lime juice
  • 1/2 shot 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill one shot glass with Bailey's. Fill second shot glass with Lime and 151. To Drink: Pour Bailey's into mouth, do not swallow. Pour Lime and 151 into mouth. Shake head back and fourth, the shot will turn solid.

drinks.name: Windjammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto Di Sarrono
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir first three ingredients together and pour over ice. Top with a marischino cherry.

drinks.name: Limelight
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 splash Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir well with ice cubes and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Fruit Sensation
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Orange liqueur
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice add all the ingredients- mix well add straw and garnish if required.

drinks.name: Dong
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3/4 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill and strain together into shot glass

drinks.name: Quikster's Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bacardi Limon
  • Orange juice
  • Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start off by totally filling hurricane glass with ice. Next pour rum. Fill glass with equally parts orange juice and pineapple juice. Top with grenadine.

drinks.name: Red nail
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka
  • 3 cl Campari
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the vodka and the Campari in a cocktailglass. Put in 4 ordinary icecubes. Let the drink 'rest' seven minutes before served.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Melonberry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • 6 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice

drinks.name: Leah's Last Hope #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 6 oz Chocolate milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Ice, Mix, and Enjoy.

drinks.name: The Miki
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Campari
  • 1 part Soda water
  • 1 part Grapefruit juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the ice on the glass first and then pour the Campari. The grapefruit juice is next. The soda is the last ingredient to add. Stir only once.

drinks.name: Strawberry Zima
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Zima
  • 4 tblsp Strawberry syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Zima in any glass in which it fits, add strawberry syrup and stir.

drinks.name: Kahlodster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each shot in cup filled with ice. Shake three times and serve.

drinks.name: Liquid Sword
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Razzmatazz
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix liquors in tall glass with ice, fill with Orange Juice

drinks.name: Shamrock #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Irish whiskey (Jameson's)
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients in a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Bogomip
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Sake
  • 1 part Coconut milk
  • 5 parts Pink lemonade (or to taste)
  • Ice (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour sake and coconut milk into the glass. Fill with pink lemonade. Fill the glass with ice first if desired.

drinks.name: Lani
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Passoa
  • 45 ml Grapefruit juice
  • Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Passoa and grapefruit juice into a glass over ice cubes and fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Stockholm '75'
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 2 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 4 oz Champagne (chilled)
  • 1 Orange twist
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the vodka, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a cocktail glass. Top with Champagne and garnish with an organce twist.

drinks.name: Orange Flamingo
drinks.ingredients:
• 4/5 Orange soda
  • 2 tblsp Whipped cream
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: First fill glass 4/5 of the way up with orange soda. Then add your grenadine. Finally add the whipped cream to the top.

drinks.name: The Naked Lady
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Light rum
  • 1/4 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 splash Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a tall glass and serve over ice.

drinks.name: The Irresistible Manhattan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Canadian whisky
  • 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 dash Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the ingredients in a small pitcher and add 1 tsp of juice from your jar of maraschino cherries. Pour over crushed ice and garnish with a maraschino cherry or slice of orange.

drinks.name: P.S.U. Victory Dance
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Vanilla liqueur
  • 1 oz Coconut rum (Coco Ribe)
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 3 oz Club soda
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together in blender. Fill beer mug with cracked ice and pour contents of blender into mug. For a Frozen Victory Dance, just add cracked ice to blender when mixing until drink appears to be slushey. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Fuzzy Irishman
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 part Raspberry liqueur
  • 1/3 part Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/3 part Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Raspberry first, Butterscotch next and Irish cream last. Need not be layered but pour in order given. Top 'O the Mornin' to you!

drinks.name: Tequila Gimlet
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/4 oz Lime juice cordial (Rose's)
  • 2 oz white Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Franziska
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Milk
  • 3/4 oz Cream
  • 3/4 oz maracuja Passion fruit juice
  • 1/4 oz Mango syrup
  • 1 tblsp Honey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Heat and stir until the honey is dissolved.

drinks.name: Cranberry Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients into blender with ice. Blend until smooth.

drinks.name: Electric Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 5 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredigents in glass then shake vigourisly

drinks.name: Slime
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well, and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: The Swamp Water
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka (Stoli)
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice, shake and strain!

drinks.name: Watermelon Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • Pineapple juice
  • Add 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice. Strain and pour into shot glass.

drinks.name: Frenchie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cognac
  • 1 part Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail or rocks glass and stir.

drinks.name: Mexican Rose
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz Tequila
  • 1/3 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 1 1/2 oz Milk
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake & strain into glass or blend.

drinks.name: Belgian Brownie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Genever or gin
  • 1/2 oz Cognac or brandy
  • 1 oz Chocolate liqueur
  • Fill with Heavy cream
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the gin, cognac and chocolate liqueur over the ice cubes. Fill with heavy cream. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Mint Chocolate
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/4 oz Kahlua
  • 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in shot glass

drinks.name: Grand Mimosa
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • Champagne
  • 1 splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Grand Marnier into a Champagne Flute. Fill almost to the top with Champagne and top off with fresh Orange Juice.

drinks.name: '57 Chevy #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1/3 shot Grand Marnier
  • 1/3 shot Amaretto
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Butterball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/2 shot Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Amaretto first and then layer Butterscotch schnapps on top, don't mix. Add whipped cream if desired.

drinks.name: Tropical Lust
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, add gin and vodka. Almost fill with pineapple juice, then add SoCo and melon liqueur. The drink can also be made frozen by adding 1 1/2 scoops of ice and blending.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Screw Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a double shot glass half full of vodka. Pour the peach schnapps into the next quarter. Pour the triple sec in the reamaining quarter. Stir and shoot.

drinks.name: Southern Salutation
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • Top off with Lemonade
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 2 oz. of Sothern Comfort and 1 oz. of Peach Schnapps to a highball glass. Next add ice and top off with lemonade.

drinks.name: Frisky
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 part Whisky
  • 1/2 part Fresca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Fresca and the whisky and drink fast.

drinks.name: Fig
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: shake well, pour into shot glass.

drinks.name: Drunk Watermelon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Vodka
  • 1 whole Watermelon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Cut a hole in the top of the watermelon and pour all of the vodka in the watermelon. Put the watermelon (hole upwards) in the fridge for one day before eating.

drinks.name: Venus on the Rocks
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3 oz Club soda
  • 5 Ice cubes
  • Twist of Lime peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: The finished drink should be the golden color of perfectly tanned skin. Use this as a guide and don't get hung up on volume measurements.

drinks.name: Nina's Special
drinks.ingredients:
• Gin
  • Grand Marnier
  • Pineapple juice
  • Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the ingredients together for an even blending.

drinks.name: Widow Maker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass half full with ice. Add first three ingredients into glass and shake to mix them together. Add the 2 drops of grenadine for the red hourglass on the bottom of the Widow Maker spider.

drinks.name: Celebration
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 parts Gold rum
  • 1 part Brandy
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Lemon juice
  • 5 drops Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a cocktail shaker add ingredients and fill with ice. Shake with gusto for half a minute, and pour/strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel, or lime peel if you use fresh lime juice.

drinks.name: Irish Dawg
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 1/2 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put vodka in first. then add the Baley's and cream. lightly stir and serve.

drinks.name: Special K
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a hurricane glass. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

drinks.name: Banderas
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tomato juice
  • 1 shot white Tequila
  • 1 shot Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Align the shot glasses in the following order: Tomato (red), Tequila (white) and Lemon (green), resembling the Mexican Flag. Quickly gulp one after another: Tomato, Tequila and finally finish with the Lemon.

drinks.name: Orange Mule
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • Fill with Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add into glass over ice and mix well. Garnish with slice of lemon.

drinks.name: China White
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake, strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Perfect Manhattan
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blended whiskey
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 Maraschino cherry (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Swirl with ice to chill and pour.

drinks.name: Moose Piss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 qt Vodka
  • 1 qt Light rum
  • 1 qt Dark rum
  • 1 qt Whiskey
  • 1 qt Peach schnapps
  • 1 gal Sprite (or similar soda)
  • 1 gal Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Get a clean five gallon pail and mix all the ingredients together with a ladle. Serve with or without a little ice.

drinks.name: Jim's Nuts
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jim Beam
  • 1 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Equal parts Jim Beam and Amaretto over rocks. Stir.

drinks.name: Stevie Wonder
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Coffee liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in the order given and enjoy

drinks.name: Voodoo Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot White rum
  • 2 oz Grenadine
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 1 shot of white rum and 1 shot of Vodka too a tall glass. Tilt the glass and add 1-2 ounces of Grenadine while pouring down the inside of the glass. Fill with cold orange juice

drinks.name: Hairy Armpit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Ouzo
  • Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place three ice cubes in glass. Pour in ouzo and fill with fresh grapefruit juice. Stir well and serve.

drinks.name: Apple Blossom
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 2 oz Apple juice
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass nearly filled with ice. Stir. Strain into an old fassion glass over ice. Garnish with fruit.

drinks.name: Pine Cone
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Southern Comfort
  • 1 jigger Amaretto
  • 1 glass Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a tall glass, on the rocks, add Southern Comfort and Amaretto. Fill glass with Pineapple juice. Stir.

drinks.name: Adam's Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Galliano
  • Fill with Apple juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the ingredients in a tall glass.

drinks.name: Kiss From Rudy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1 splash Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour alchol first, add juices, then grenadine and cream, garnish with cherry or pineaple wedge.

drinks.name: Red Devil
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add ice, then mix in the alcohols, then the juice and grenadine. Shake when all ingredients are mixed. Serve in a 10-12 oz. glass.

drinks.name: Mutual Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a pint glass half-filled with ice cubes. Alternately pour to another glass 3 or 4 times until chilled.

drinks.name: Lanette
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 4 cubes Ice
  • 2 splashes Cranberry juice
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka, ice, and cranberry juice. Fill with OJ.

drinks.name: Caribbean Ice Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Gin
  • 1 part Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 part Gold tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 part Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 part Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all of the ingredients together and serve over ice. Garnish with an orange.

drinks.name: Burnso Tropical
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill high ball glass with ice cubes. Add one ounce each of vodka and peach schnapps. Then add 3 oz of pineapple juice and 1 oz of cranberry juice. Shake and serve.

drinks.name: Thunder Peel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Surge
  • 2 shots Absolut Citron
  • 1 part strawberry Daiquiri mix
  • 2 parts Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake it all chill and serve

drinks.name: The Captains Silver Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Captain Morgan's Silver Rum
  • 1 1/2 shot Parrot Bay Coconut rum
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice: Capt. Morgan Silver - Parrot Bay - orange juice - cranberry juice.

drinks.name: Grog #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cans Beer
  • 4 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour beer, vodka, and orange juice in pitcher. Stir well.

drinks.name: Aladdin Sane
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau (or Triple Sec)
  • 1/4 cup Fruit punch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker 3/4 filled with ice. Shake, allow to chill for 5 minutes, re-shake, and pour into a martini glass.

drinks.name: Spanish Coffee #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Cognac
  • 4 oz strong Espresso
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix congac, kaluha, and espresso in a parfait glass and stir gently. Top with whipped cream. Serve.

drinks.name: White Lady 1910
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 jiggers Gin
  • 1 jigger Cointreau
  • 1 jigger Lemon juice
  • 1/2 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vigourously with plenty of ice

drinks.name: Seelbach Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz good quality Champagne
  • 1 - 1/2 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 7 dashes Peychaud bitters
  • 7 dashes Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add bourbon, bitters, and triple sec first. Fill rest of glass with champagne. Depending on the size up your flute, you might need to put less bourbon in. Garnish with orange twist.

drinks.name: Crystal Cranberry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Canadian whisky (Crown Royal)
  • 1/4 oz Gin
  • 1/4 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass half full with ice and add the vodka.Put in the cranberry and orange juice next, then float the other liquors. Add grenadine to color, mix and garnish with a straw and a lemon.

drinks.name: Charro Negro
drinks.ingredients:
• Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 oz Tequila (Herradura blanco)
  • 4 cubes Ice
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
  • Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rub rim of glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Put 4 ice cubes into the glass, add Tequila and juice of half a lemon. Add some more salt if you like and fill the glass with Coca-COla. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Lui Lui
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Peachtree schnapps
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice. Strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Espresso Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz cold Espresso
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass. It should be somewhat frothy.

drinks.name: Anton's Ecto Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/4 oz Sour mix
  • 1/4 oz Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice and shake vigorously.

drinks.name: Purple People Eater
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 1 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice and shake vigorously.

drinks.name: Ruby Slipper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Whiskey
  • Grenadine
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass 3/4 full of whiskey and then top off the shot with Grenadine. Fill any large glass with 7-up. Drop the shot glass into the 7-up and then chug the ehtire mixture.

drinks.name: Surfer On Acid #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 2 oz Pineapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients, shake with ice, strain.

drinks.name: Sex on the Brain
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps (Arrow)
  • 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Layer Pineapple juice
  • Layer Orange juice
  • Float 1 tblsp Sloe gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, insert a straw and then add the first three ingredients (Vodka, Midori, Schnapps) then layer the juices using a barspoon to get a separation of alcohol and mixers. Leave a little room at top of glass to float the Sloe gin on top. Garnish with a cherry and orange wedge. The drink should look like a Stop Light. Green at the bottom, yellow in the middle and red on top.

drinks.name: Pine-Sol Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Dark rum
  • 3/4 oz Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass nearly filled with ice. Stir, and strain into a shot glass

drinks.name: Jose Flame-O
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Jose Cuervo
  • 1/2 oz Firewater
drinks.mixinginstructions: First put Tequila in shot glass, then add Firewater

drinks.name: Nipple on Fire
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Firewater
  • 1/3 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/3 oz Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: First put in ButterScotch, then Firewater, and float the Irish Cream

drinks.name: Holy Water
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • Fill with Tonic water
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine alcohol in a rocks glass over ice. Fill with tonic water, then add only a dash of Grenadine. Be sure the drink is served with the tonic still bubbling.

drinks.name: Catfish
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve it chilled up.

drinks.name: The Gold, The Bad, and The Ugly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • Fill with Milk
  • 1 1/2 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: When you're filling with milk, make sure you leave enough room for the Goldschlager. Pour the Goldschlager over the back of a spoon.

drinks.name: Southern Blast
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3/4 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Fruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour it all in a glass. Stir it if you really feel the need to. I usually just pour in the alcohol and let the fruit juice do the mixing for me. For the best results, try and use that Minute Maid Fruit Punch. That stuff works very well. I advise against using any sort of 'all-citrus' fruit juice, even OJ.

drinks.name: Black Hole
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Black Sambuca
  • Fill with Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass 2/3 with ice, add Sambuca and fill with soda.

drinks.name: R-Float
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Root beer schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz 7-Up
  • 1 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients in a frosted mug over ice and stir.

drinks.name: Summer Dreams
drinks.ingredients:
• 60 ml Midori melon liqueur
  • 45 ml Orange juice
  • 45 ml Lemon juice or lemon sqaush
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients together with ice in shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass Garnish with lemon and pinapple pieces

drinks.name: Norling Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Bacardi Limon
  • 3 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • Fill 1/2 glass crushed Ice
  • 1 part 7-Up
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Midori and Bacardi Limon in a highball glass and fill 1/2 the glass with cruched ice. Fill with in 1 part 7-up and 1 part cranberry juice.

drinks.name: Class Act
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Advocaat
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 splash Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a shker of ice, shake, then strain into a rocks glass full of ice. Drinker will have to constantly mix the drink in his glass as the Advocaat will settle.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Faser
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 bottles Vodka
  • 1 bottle Peach schnapps
  • 4 cans Beer (Bud Lite)
  • 1 qt Water
  • 1 package Orange Tang
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients in a huge bowl or an empty water bottle that holds several gallons. Stir or shake until mixed and serve either on ice or as a shot.

drinks.name: Citrus Smack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • Fill with Grapefruit juice
  • 2 slices Orange
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add rum, triple sec, and sour mix. Fill remainder of glass with grapefruit juice. Stir and garnish with orange and lemon wedges.

drinks.name: Steamboat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Whipped cream
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredience, strain into glass, and enjoy!

drinks.name: Novebuche
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 parts Campari
  • 5 parts Grapefruit juice or orange juice
  • 1 part Gin
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Angry Chameleon
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 tsp Cherry Kool-Aid
  • 2 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 6 oz Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Disolve kool-Aid in rum. Add Mountain Dew.

drinks.name: Misty Loch
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Drambuie
  • 3 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 dashes Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the 3 first ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake, strain into a brandy snifter and add the 2 little dashes of Kahlua.

drinks.name: Mage's Fire
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Vodka
  • 1 part Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
