drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with the vodka in a bottle. Mix in the schnapps, then add the curacao. Mix well. This mixture should be chilled at least 24 hours before serving, and is best served cold.

drinks.name: Frozen Grasshopper
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 3/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 2 cups Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 Oreo cookie (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all three ingredients together in a blender and blend until drink has the consistency of a good milk shake.

drinks.name: San Juan Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a highball glass with ice Add rum and dry vermouth Fill with pineapple juice and serve

drinks.name: The Texas Mudslide
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Crown Royal
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in a shaker and pour all three ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously and then strain into a glass. This is intended to be more like a shot than a sipping drink.

drinks.name: Arkansas Razorback
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Rum
  • 1/2 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • 1/2 shot Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all together in a mixing tin with ice, Shake to a froth, and strain off the ice into the glass.

drinks.name: Gooseberry Jam
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 6 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take all of the above ingredients, place in a cocktail shaker or blender with plenty of crushed ice. mix untill slightly frothy, then pour into a tall glass and enjoy.

drinks.name: Green Tree Frog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 2 parts Sprite
  • 3 parts Lemonade
  • Fresh sliced Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together first three ingredients and then slice fresh limes and place in drink, then allow to sit for at least one hour. This drink is to be made in a large quantity, so the limes may 'take effect.'

drinks.name: Cristianne
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz White wine
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Blue Curacao in a champagne flute, followed by Vodka and White Wine. Then pour Grenadine. Don't shake it!

drinks.name: Sunny Mexico
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Galliano
  • 1/2 shot Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Simple! Fill half the shot with (white) tequila and top it up with Galliano

drinks.name: Viagra Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/3 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend, add ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Pink Passion
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Passoa
  • 1 part Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build drink in a higball glass as listed. Use lots of ice cubes. Garnish with lime wedges.

drinks.name: Sweet Passoa
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 2 cl Passoa
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • And Orange juice
  • 2 cl Schweppes Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill half of the glass with ice and stir.

drinks.name: Banshee Berry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Creme de Banane
  • 1 part Strawberry schnapps
  • 1 part Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour each of the three ingredients into a shot glass. Stir.

drinks.name: Razzleberry
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Razzmatazz
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice and serve.

drinks.name: Southern Comfort Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Can be made 'up' or 'on the rocks' Prepare sour glass. Add Southern Comfort and sour mix to mixing glass. Shake well (8-10 times) and strain into glass providing lots of foam. Add flag or butterfly (orange and cherry on a pick) as garnish.

drinks.name: Santorini Sundown
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Scotch
  • 3 cl Cognac
  • 3 cl Port
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain the drink into a well chilled margarita glass. Garnish with a red cherry.

drinks.name: Firecracker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Wild Turkey
  • 4 dashes Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the shot glass close to the top with Wild Turkey and add 4 dashes of tabasco sauce.

drinks.name: San Diego Silver Bullet
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 oz Sambuca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the ingredients over ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass and serve. Down it in one.

drinks.name: Wu Wu
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka over ice. Add equal amounts of orange and cranberry juices and serve.

drinks.name: Jersey Shore Cherry Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 1/4 oz Sour mix
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • Fill with Sprite
  • Top with Grenadine or cherry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add sugar, vodka, and sour mix over ice and shake. Then fill with sprite/7up. Top with grenadne or cherry juice. Garnish with cherry and lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Nasty Pablo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a pint glass filled with ice. First add the vodka, then the blackberry brandy. Fill with orange juice and top with blue curacao.

drinks.name: Colorado Cider
drinks.ingredients:
• Splash Apple juice
  • 1/2 oz Apple schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Brandy (Korbel)
  • 1/2 oz Cinnamon schnapps (Fire Water)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in small snifter. Sip slowly or take as a shot.

drinks.name: Blue Blazer #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Irish whiskey
  • 1 part Lemon juice
  • 1 part light Honey
  • 2-3 parts Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a saucepan and heat until the honey has completely dissolved. Pour in Old-fashioned glasses with a spoon in it (to prevent the glass from breaking if the drink is too hot).

drinks.name: Gloom Raiser
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Gin
  • 3/4 part Dry Vermouth
  • 2 dashes Pernod
  • 2 dashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with ice. Strain in a cocktail glass. Decorate with a maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Green Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Green Chartreuse
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Chartreuse and Sour Mix on top of ice in Collins glass. Fill with coca-cola and, if you like, garnish with lemon or lime slice.

drinks.name: Chartreuse and Tonic
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz green or Yellow Chartreuse
  • 5 oz Tonic water
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: In glass filled with ice, mix Chartreuse and Tonic water. Garnish with lime slice.

drinks.name: Papaya Milk Splash
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 - 2 cup ripe Papaya
  • 1/2 cup Milk
  • 1/4 cup Sugar
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make sure to clean out the seeds and deskin the papaya. Put the papaya along with all other ingredients in a blender, mix at medium to high speed for about one to two minutes. Serve immediately.

drinks.name: Long Slow Comfortable Screw Against the Wall
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Sloe gin
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 shot Galliano
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a glass.

drinks.name: Kahlua Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 1/2 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Kahlua and lemon juice, add sugar and enjoy.

drinks.name: The Kristy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Amaretto
  • 1 shot Everclear
  • 4 oz Ginger ale (Canada dry)
  • 8 oz Pineapple juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all together in a glass and stir. May put ice cubes in after mixed, or put in blender to make frozen drink.

drinks.name: The Kristy #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Amaretto
  • 1 shot Vodka (smirnoff)
  • 2 shots Strawberry schnapps
  • 4 oz Ginger ale (canada dry)
  • 8 oz Pineapple juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in glass. Add ice. If frozen drink is preferred, use more ice and mix in blender.

drinks.name: Full Moon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Tilt snifter and pour amaretto. While still tilting snifter, pour Grand Marnier. Gently 'roll' snifter in the tilted position, set upright, and enjoy sipping!

drinks.name: Drunk on Christmas
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 oz Irish whiskey (Tullamore Dew)
  • 1 oz Apple schnapps
  • 4 oz Sweet and sour
  • Ice cubes
  • Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and shake Irish whiskey, Midori, and Apple Schnapps with ice. Fill whiskey sour glass with ice. Strain mixture over ice in glass. Fill with sweet and sour. Garnish with several free floating Maraschino cherries

drinks.name: PiÃ±a Rita
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 tblsp Triple sec
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake over ice. Serve in sugar rimmed glass with shaved ice in it . Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple slice.

drinks.name: Sailor Venus
drinks.ingredients:
• 120 ml White wine
  • 15 ml Galliano
  • 30 ml White rum
  • 20 ml Lemon juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain to pousse cafe glass. Garnish with a peel of lemon.

drinks.name: Sailor Moon
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml White rum
  • 30 ml Charleston Follies
  • Lemon juice
  • Ice
  • Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake white rum, Charleston Follies and lemon juice with ice. Strain over ice in an old fashioned glass. Fill glass with champagne. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Sailor Mercury
drinks.ingredients:
• 45 ml Aquavit
  • 30 ml Parfait d'Amour
  • Lemon juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a brandy snifter.

drinks.name: Ramos Fizz #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Cream
  • 1/2 oz fresh Lemon juice
  • 1/2 oz fresh Lime juice
  • 2 drops Orange-flower water
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 1/2 cup cracked Ice
  • Cold Club soda
  • Orange slice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients except soda and orange slice in a blender until smooth. Pour into a chilled glass and garnish with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Ramos Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin (Old Tom)
  • 2 tblsp Cream
  • 1/2 oz fresh Lemon juice
  • 1/2 oz fresh Lime juice
  • 1 fresh Egg white
  • 1/4 oz Club soda
  • 1 tblsp Powdered sugar
  • 3-4 drops Orange-flower water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the ingredients except club soda to a chilled mixer and shake for at least one minute. Strain into a thin goblet and top off with chilled club soda, to taste.

drinks.name: Fruit A la la
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 Cherries
  • 6 Strawberries
  • 6 Raspberries
  • 1/2 cup 7-Up
  • 1 Peach without pit
  • 12 Grapes
  • 1 Banana
  • 100 ml Vodka (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all together in blender, and blend until smooth.

drinks.name: Moose Fart
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 part Crown Royal
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add with ice in a blender, and blend to a thick consistency.

drinks.name: Milky Nooky
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peppermint schnapps (Rumple Minze)
  • 1 part Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • 1 part JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve

drinks.name: Homecoming
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 1/4 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill rocks glass with ice, add Amaretto and Baileys and serve with a stirrer.

drinks.name: Greasy Swede
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Ouzo
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 tblsp Cinnamon schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together and serve - Do not chill or add ice.

drinks.name: The Classic
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cognac
  • 1/4 part Lemon juice (Fresh)
  • 1/4 part Maraschino liqueur
  • 1 part Orange Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain in a cooled cocktail glass. Decorate with a maraschino cherry on a stick.

drinks.name: Zool
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1 oz. of Peach Schnapps in the shot glass first. Then pour 1 oz. of Absolut Vodka on top. Last pour Amaretto on top of Vodka until the Vodka changes in to a light brown.

drinks.name: Delta Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Cointreau
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with ice. Strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Swamp Water #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or blend with ice, strain into an ice-filled rocks glass.

drinks.name: Oklahoma Tropical Twister
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cans Cream of coconut (Coco Lopez)
  • 64 oz Pineapple juice (Del Monte)
  • 6 cups Orange juice (Sunkist)
  • 1/4 cup Grenadine
  • 1 1/2 oz Captain Morgan's Spiced rum
  • Orange wedge
  • Pineapple wedge
  • Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place both cans of Cream of Coconut (unopened) in hot water for 10 minutes. Then pour the Pineapple Juice, Orange Juice, Cream of Coconut, and Grenadine in a large punch bowl. Stir for 3 minutes to ensure proper mixture. You can add the liqour in with the mix or add it to each drink as it is poured. 1.5 oz per 12 oz drink. By leaving out the Spiced Rum the kids can drink this as well. It is a great NAB drink. Serve over crushed ice. Place the Pineapple Wedge, Orange Wedge, and the Cherry on a tooth pick and drop in drink. For a Oklahoma Frozen Twister place all the ingredients in a blender with a 12 oz cup of ice and blend til smooth. Then add garnish.

drinks.name: Kahlua Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• Kahlua
  • 1 dash Creme de Noyaux
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with crushed ice. Fill half the glass with Kahlua. Add a dash of Creme de Noyaux. Top with Cream.

drinks.name: White Splash
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part PiÃ±a Colada
  • 3 parts Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the cola slowly to the Pina Colada.

drinks.name: Green Thing
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Coconut rum
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well till it is a cream color and is frothing.

drinks.name: The Green Wave
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Chill and strain into glass. Serve immediately.

drinks.name: Liberty Blue Champagne
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Grand Marnier
  • 1 dash Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake first 4 ingredients over ice and strain in sugar rimed champagne flute. Fill with champagne.

drinks.name: London Fog
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/4 oz Pernod
  • Shaved Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Gin and Pernod with cracked ice. Strain into a red wine glass packed with shaved ice.

drinks.name: Quick Fox
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer each ingredients onto one another

drinks.name: Rugmuncher
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Root beer schnapps
  • 1 oz Irish cream (Baileys's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake both ingredients over ice. Strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: The Velvet Kilt
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill cocktail glass and pour ingredients into mixer. Shake until cold and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry or small butterscotch candy.

drinks.name: Chocalate Covered Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Godiva liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Vanilla schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill cocktail glass. Mix Vodka, Godiva, and Vanilla Schnapps. Stir, do not shake. Place single cherry with stem in chilled cocktail glass. Strain over cherry.

drinks.name: Quantum Theory
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Strega
  • 1/4 oz Grand Marnier
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • Fill with Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Rum, Strega, and Grand Marnier into collins glass. Add Pineapple and Sweet and Sour until full. Garnish with a Lemon Cherry Flag.

drinks.name: Mystery Date
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 2 drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice. Strain. Garnish with 1/4 of a strawberry.

drinks.name: Lewinsky
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour together in shot glass and serve. Very easy to do.

drinks.name: Tiger Paw
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Citrus vodka
  • 2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tblsp Sugar
  • Ice
  • Fill with Orange soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add vodka, lemon juice, ice, and sugar in a mixing glass and shake. Pour into a cup and add orange soda. Stir.

drinks.name: Hawaii Five-O
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients on top of ice in the highball glass.

drinks.name: Blue in the Face
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz White rum
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 3 oz Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass half full with ice. Add liquors. Add sugar and tonic to taste. Stir.

drinks.name: Pisang Pistace
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Amaretto
  • 2 parts Cream
  • 3 parts Pisang Ambon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with 5-6 icecubes and serve in a cocktailglass with 2 icecubes.

drinks.name: Desiree
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Creme de Cassis
  • 1 oz Stoli Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve on the rocks. Optional garnish: lemon or lime twist.

drinks.name: Lady L
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White rum
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 splash Cherry syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with 4 oz. 7-Up and a splash of pineapple juice. Pour into tall glass over crushed ice. Color top with a splash of cherry syrup, add cherry for garnish.

drinks.name: Black Fruit Tree
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Blackberry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to glass with ice and stir.

drinks.name: Braindead
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Sour mix
  • 2 cl Triple sec
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the shaker half with ice cubes, and add the incredients. Shake well. Serve in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Warm and Fuzzy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Triple sec
  • 1/3 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/3 oz Cherry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour southern comfort, triple sec, and then cherry brandy

drinks.name: Bag of Filth
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Pernod
  • 30 ml Tia maria
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Pour pernod and Tia Maria into glass. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker and give shaker a rapid 3 second shake. Pour contents back into glass.

drinks.name: Bob's Special Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 L Raspberry juice
  • 1 L Vodka (Absolut)
  • 20 Cherries
  • 6 oz Banana liqueur
  • 6 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 L Lemonade
  • 20 slices Orange
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add them all together in any order you wish, just make sure you stir it all together well.

drinks.name: Slapshot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Dark rum (Myers)
  • 1 shot Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • 1 shot Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • Fill with Coffee
  • Top with Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir well before adding whipped cream.

drinks.name: Flori's Hot Tub Heaven
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 3 oz Irish cream
  • Fill with 3 oz Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Please add in order from light to heavy finishing with coffee. No mixing required.

drinks.name: Buttered Toffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 3 oz Half-and-half
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour amaretto, irish cream, and Kahlua over ice cubes. Add half-and-half, and stir well.

drinks.name: Porky Bone
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Maple syrup
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Aftershock
  • 2 1/2 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Let all the maple syrup collect at the bottom of the glass, then lightly mix the other ingredients over it. A few ice cubes can be added when it's done.

drinks.name: Fire And Ice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Firewater
  • 1/2 shot Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the Rumple Minze on top of the Firewater (as best as possible)

drinks.name: D-Roy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 tsp Sugar
  • 4 wedges Lime, squeezed
  • 4 jiggers Bacardi Limon
  • Fill with Lemonade
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put sugar in glass. Squeeze limes into glass. Stir slightly. Add rum. Add lemonade. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Super Allez
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 parts Minute maid Fruit punch
  • 2 parts Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 2 parts Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Begin by pouring in the fruit punch. Then add the gin. Next, pour the orange juice in followed by the Sprite.

drinks.name: Santa Maria
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's Original)
  • 1 oz Gold tequila
  • 1 dash Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients except orange in shaker with ice. Shake gently, and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange slice.

drinks.name: Alien Urine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Coconut rum
  • 1 part Sweet and sour
  • 1 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: This drink is ideally made in a 16 ounce glass, but can also be made in a Collins glass. The drink is served on the rocks. Add the Midori, Malibo, and Schnaps. Add juices. Shake in a tin. Garnish with either two cherries or with a kiwi wheel.

drinks.name: Slushy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz White rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Razzmatazz
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix drink with crushed ice or blend with 2 1/2 scoops of ice. For added enjoyment stick a straw in the middle and drink for a slushy rush.

drinks.name: Log Cabin
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Canadian whisky
  • 1 tblsp Cream
  • 1 tblsp Orange juice
  • Fill with Orange soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients but the soda with ice. Strain into highball glass. Fill the glass to the top with the orange soda.

drinks.name: Dirty Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Irish cream
  • 1 oz Dark rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Cognac
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in order listed. Do not stir. Serve in Brandy Snifter.

drinks.name: Barbie Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain.

drinks.name: Applecake
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Licor 43
  • 2 cl Apfelkorn
  • 2 cl Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well and use it as a shot

drinks.name: Italian Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Amaretto
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Club soda
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a tall glass with crushed ice. Pour the Amaretto over the ice then slowly add the orange juice and top with club soda to form layers. Add a dash of grenadine and garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

drinks.name: Cherry Spitfire
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 oz Tequila
  • 2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • Grenadine
  • Top with 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients and top with 151. If too strong add 7-UP or Sprite.

drinks.name: Curtain Call
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add equal parts of Jack Daniels, Midori, and JÃ¤germeister into a shot glass. Prechill the alcohol if so desired.

drinks.name: Deerslayer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Whiskey (Windsor)
  • 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Add the JÃ¤germeister and Windsor, stir, then fill the glass with the 7-Up and give it a small stir.

drinks.name: Mundo Fine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Canadian whisky
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 1/2 oz Cream
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or mix all ingredients, and pour over ice cubes into a collins glass, (or any glass large enough,) Garnish with an orange slice, a lemon slice, and a cherry if so desired.

drinks.name: Black River Boogie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Raspberry schnapps
  • 2 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a glass and mix well

drinks.name: Shattered Dreams
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blueberry schnapps
  • 1 splash 7-Up
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 6 oz Grape juice
  • 1 oz Vodka (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients except the 7-Up and pour over ice into the glass. Add a splash of 7-up and stir carefully: don't kill the carbonation.

drinks.name: Michelada Regular
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila (Casa Noble Crystal)
  • Juice of 2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp grain Salt
  • Corona, Sol or Dos Equis
  • 4 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add lemon juice to the ice cubes in beer mug. Add salt and stir to blend. Add tequila and stir to blend. Fill with Corona, Sol or Dos Equis.

drinks.name: Tequila Colagallo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila (Casa Noble Aged)
  • 8 oz Coca-Cola
  • Juice of 2 Lemon
  • 3 pinches Salt
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour lemon juice into glass. Add ice cubes. Add salt. Pour tequila and stir to blend. Fill with Coke

drinks.name: Double Omega
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 4 cl Gin
  • 4 cl White rum
  • 4 cl Tequila
  • 4 cl white Curacao
  • 4 cl Lime juice
  • 26 cl Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the alcohol, then lime. Cola on the top.

drinks.name: Maple Lake Irish Shock
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Aftershock
  • 2 shots Cinnamon schnapps (Hot 100)
  • 2 cups Apple cider
  • 1 shot Sour Apple Pucker
  • 1 stick Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Bring Hot 100, apple cider, Aftershock to a boil then add Cinnamon sticks stirring frequently. Add apple slices and then let cool for 2 min and add puckers. Serve.

drinks.name: Black Christmas
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Black Sambuca
  • 6 oz Eggnog
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix 1-1/2 ounces of Black Sambuca into a glass filled with 6 ounces of Eggnog, Stir.

drinks.name: Apple Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 part Sour Apple schnapps (Pucker)
  • 1 part Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor all ingredients into a shaker. Shake well and strain into a Martini glass.

drinks.name: Cajun Comforter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Bourbon (Old Grandad)
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Sothern Comfort and Bourbon over rocks in a 12-ounce glass. Add a dash of tobasco, or any non-habeÃ±ero pepper sauce (dont go overboard). To really impress, garnish with a jumbo shrimp.

drinks.name: Hoo Doo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Vodka (Finlandia)
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 splash Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 splash Sprite or 7-up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Southern Comfort, Finlandia, orange juice, and lime juice over ice. Top with splash of Schnapps and Sprite.

drinks.name: Rocky Mountain Bumpsucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 splash Dry Vermouth (Noilly Prat)
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Southern Comfort over rocks in a short glass. Fill with ginger ale. Top with splash of dry vermouth.

drinks.name: Scarlett Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Summer Sucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 bottle Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 cup Grenadine
  • 2 cans 7-Up Or Club Soda
  • 1 Watermelon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Cut a small, circular hole in the watermelon. Save the piece cut out. Turn the watermelon with the hole facing the ground so any juices drip out. Mix the vodka, grenadine and 7-Up in a seperate bowl. Slowly pour the mix into the watermelon (use a funnel if you have one). If you put the liquid too fast into the watermelon, it wont absorb properly. Pop the piece you cut out back into the hole. Shake the melon. Throw it in the fridge for an afternoon. When the family is over, cut slices out of the watermelon and enjoy.

drinks.name: 77 Sunset Strip
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka (Finlandia)
  • 1/2 oz Gin (Tanqueray)
  • 1/2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec (Bandolero)
  • 1 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • Top with 1 splash Sprite or 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, gin, rum, triple sec, pineapple juice and grenadine together in a highball glass over ice. Top it with a splash of Sprite. Garnish with a strawberry and an orange slice.

drinks.name: Godiva Polar Bear
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Godiva liqueur
  • 1 part Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour equal parts Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur and Peppermint Schnapps. Serve on the rocks.

drinks.name: Snowshot
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 scoop lemon Sherbet
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 cube Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Throw all ingredients into blender. Add sugar to taste, sweet lemons dont need more than one cube. Blend until the consistancy resembles a daiquiri.

drinks.name: Bot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 dash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: The easy way to make this drink is to add all listed ingredients with ice into shaker and strain into glass. However, the really slick way is much more impressive: Add cranberry juice, lime juice, tripple sec and only one ounce vodka into shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Then, mix 1 once orange juice with one ounce vodka in a seperate glass. Fill a turkey baister with the vodka/OJ mix, and slowly inject it into the cranberry glass on the bottom. This produces a sort of reverse-layering effect, and also ensures both cranberry and OJ will have the same amount of vodka.

drinks.name: Bittersweet Jack
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Jack Daniels (Gentleman Jack)
  • 1/4 oz Apricot liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Orange Curacao
  • 2 dashes Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

drinks.name: International Jack
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Jack Daniels (Gentleman Jack)
  • 1/4 oz Dry Shack Sherry
  • 2 dashes Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

drinks.name: Southern Sparkler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 1/4 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 1/4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 1/4 oz Carbonated water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients. Shake and strain into cocktail glass, or serve on the rocks into an ordinary glass. Garnish with a flag (confederate).

drinks.name: Southern Suicide
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Jack Daniels
  • 3/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/4 oz 7-Up
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients on the rocks.

drinks.name: Bad Habit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in a shot glass, vodka first.

drinks.name: Lucky Seven
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz 151 proof rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • 1 splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the seven liquors, straight, in a tall glass. Top it with three splashes of cranberry, lime, and orange juices.

drinks.name: Sweaty Irish Whiskey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Irish whiskey (Jameson's)
  • 1/2 oz Cinnamon schnapps (Hot Damn)
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour whiskey and cinnamon schnapps into shot glass. Add dash of tobasco.

drinks.name: Almond Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sambuca
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Sambuca first, then Amaretto.

drinks.name: Bairn
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 2 dashes Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice and shake. Strain into an old fashioned glass on the rocks.

drinks.name: Harbor Lights
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/2 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 splash Yukon Jack
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 1/2 shot bailey's irish cream to 1/2 shot butterscotch schnapps, then float yukon jack on top. Ignite the yukon jack and sip quickly through a straw.

drinks.name: Goldschlager Lemondrop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 2 oz Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice, serve straight up.

drinks.name: Mad Hatter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Lemonade
  • 1 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain, straight up.

drinks.name: The Jersey Cherry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bacardi Rum
  • 1 oz Cherry brandy
  • Fill with Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice in a rocks glass. Granish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Pegu
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 2 dashes Angostura bitters
  • Cracked Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

drinks.name: Jasmine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/4 oz Cointreau
  • 1/4 oz Campari
  • 3/4 oz Lemon juice
  • Cracked Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Black Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 shot Sloe gin (CreamyHead)
  • 1/4 shot Blue Curacao
  • 1/4 shot Peach schnapps
  • 1/4 shot Vodka (Absolut)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour, stir, and enjoy.

drinks.name: SigTau Scorpion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Rum
  • 1 jigger Creme de Almond
  • 2 jiggers Gin
  • 6 oz Pineapple juice
  • 8 oz Orange juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix ingredients, stir, and add ice to bring level to top of glass

drinks.name: Red Royal Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Crown Royal
  • 1 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass with half Amarreto and then the rest with Crown Royal. This will make one shot.

drinks.name: Blue Caboose
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 oz Whiskey
  • 1/3 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each measure in to the shot glass(Do not mix!!!) and enjoy.

drinks.name: Bavorak
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Fernet Branca
  • Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with tonic, pour Fernet over spoon at the and add a straw.

drinks.name: The Fat Albert
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Chocolate mint liqueur
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 tblsp Maple syrup
  • Chocolate milk
  • Crushed Ice
  • Whipped cream (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a blender mix the Chocolate Milk, Ice, and Maple Syrup for about 5 seconds. Then add the Chocolate liquior and Kahlua and blend for another 2 seconds. Pour and top with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Strawgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Strawberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Simple Enough. Mix the Irish Cream and the Strawberry Liqueur in a shot glass, stirring or shaking it.

drinks.name: Toocan Sam
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 3/4 oz Coconut rum (Parrot bay)
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • Lace with Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: in a shaker half filled with ice, add first 5 ingredients. shake well. strain into hurricane glass filled with ice. lace with grenadine.

drinks.name: Patriotic Blow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Sloe gin
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer

drinks.name: Stained Blue Dress
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 drops Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer

drinks.name: Lewd Lewinsky
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer

drinks.name: Harvest Moon
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour first 4 ingredients over ice, slowly add grenadine as you stir.

drinks.name: Purple Yummy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao (Bols)
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps (De Kuyper)
  • 1 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 oz Vodka (Ketel One)
  • 1 oz Grenadine (Rose's)
  • 3 oz Sprite or 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in cocktail shaker with ice cubes to chill. Strain into glass, adorn with cherries.

drinks.name: Beautiful
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cognac (Hennessy)
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient into the snifter and serve.

drinks.name: China White #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 shot Creme de Cacao
  • 1/4 shot Irish cream
  • Sprinkle with Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer creme de cacao on bottom, followed by the Irish Cream. Lastly, sprinkle cinnamon over top.

drinks.name: Frizzy Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 bottles Everclear
  • 1 bottle Vodka
  • 1 bottle Whiskey
  • 5 gal Fruit punch
  • 1 bag Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all of the ingredients in a trash can or large cooler. Stir until completely mixed.

drinks.name: Soylent Green
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Vodka
  • 6 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • 4 cl Cream
  • 1 cl Lemon juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice, strain over ice in a medium sized hurricaneglass.

drinks.name: Absolut Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • Ice
  • Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix alcohol, sweet and sour. Add Ice and top off with Sprite.

drinks.name: Bloody Passion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cognac (Hennessy)
  • 1 part Red Passion AlizÃ©
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build.

drinks.name: Southern Fruity Passion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add first the Southern Comfort. Then add the Triple Sec. Finish the shot with some Grenadine. Tip your head back and enjoy this smoothest shot in the south.

drinks.name: Canada Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all liquid ingrediens with ice and strain over ice cubes. Serve with straw.

drinks.name: Russian Iceberg
drinks.ingredients:
• Fill with Ice Cubes
  • 1 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill tumbler with ice. Lean to 45 degree angle and pour creme de menthe down the side of the glass to fill bottom. Repeat pour with Rumple Minze and Vodka. Do not stir. The intent is to make layers with the liquors (so that it looks like an iceberg.) Stick a straw in the middle of the drink and drink the whole drink at once through the straw.

drinks.name: Washington Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Crown Royal
  • 1 oz Sour Apple Pucker
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled shot glass.

drinks.name: Lava Lamp
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 6 oz Apple juice
  • 3 ml Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice. Grenadine first, then Absolute Citron, fill to top with Apple Juice.

drinks.name: Celebration #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cognac
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Light rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vigorously over ice, pour into cocktail glass and garnish with either lemon or orange peel.

drinks.name: The Double Team
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the rum first, then the Amaretto. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Generic Kamikaze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Lime juice
  • Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Vodka and lime juice over ice. Fill with Sprite.

drinks.name: Three Day Weekend
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Grenadine or cherry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with plenty of ice. Add JÃ¤germeister and rum first. Top off with pineapple juice and grenadine. Shake well.

drinks.name: Red Eisentrout
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 oz Gin (Bombay)
  • 1/2 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • Fill glass with Surge
  • Top off with Cherry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquors into glass over ice. Fill with surge soda and top off with cherry juice. Shake and enjoy! Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Thumb Press
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz 151 proof rum
  • 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Tilt in Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the vodka, 151, and Midori forming a nice green shooter. Then tilt in some grenadine to give it some red flare at the bottom -- burn it down!

drinks.name: After Party
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups Vodka
  • 4 cups Pineapple juice
  • 4 cups Cranberry juice
  • 64 oz Ginger ale
  • 2 cups Sugar
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients! More or less vodka and sugar can be used. Mix to your taste!

drinks.name: Woo Woo #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Coconut rum
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Moana Sands
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • Coconut syrup
  • Orange juice
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Chambord and Peach schnapps over crushed ice in a collins glass. Fill up to half with coconut syrup and fill the other half with orange juice and stir. After a few minutes the juice and syrup separate from the alchohol and it looks like sand but tastes MUCH better. Garnish with paper umbrella through a marachino cherry and orange wedge.

drinks.name: Electric Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Moisten rim of cocktail glass with lime wedge, and salt rim of glass. In a shaker half filled with ice, combine tequila, blue curacao, and rose's lime juice. Shake well. Strain into glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Royal Flush #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Crown Royal
  • 1 part Peachtree schnapps
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together the Crown and Peachtree schnapps, then add the juices. Mix and sling it back!

drinks.name: Donna Reed
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 cup Ice
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice
  • 4 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start by crushing the ice in a blender. Add the cranberry juice (more or less to taste) and sour mix, blend a few more seconds. Add the Vodka and blend again. If done properly, this drink should be frothy for a bit, and then separate as it sits. Serve in cocktail or margarita glasses. It won't hurt to put it in the freezer for a short time (enough to slush it some).

drinks.name: Pamoyo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Gin
  • 1 part Sprite
  • 1 part Grape juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a large container, mix the same amount of Gin, Sprite, and Grape Juice. Mix well and cool. Serve in shot glasses.

drinks.name: Monk on Coke
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cubes Ice
  • 1 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients in glass, stir, and enjoy.

drinks.name: Big Unit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Gold tequila
  • 1 tblsp Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: With tequila already in glass, pour Blue Curacao down the side so that it underlays the tequila. Do not mix!

drinks.name: Pinglan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Pisang Ambon
  • 3 parts Milk
  • 1 handful crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake milk, Bailey's irish cream and Pisang ambon. Pour it into a cocktailglass filled with crushed ice, and enjoy!

drinks.name: Thug Passion #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part AlizÃ©
  • 1 part Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and enjoy.

drinks.name: Texas Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 2 oz Rum
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Bourbon
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a 1 gallon pitcher with ice. Add all the ingredients except the coca-cola. Stir, then add the coca-cola and stir again. Pour into your favorite glass with ice and enjoy.

drinks.name: G4
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Irish Cream on top of Amaretto.

drinks.name: White Bull
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Tequila
  • 3/4 oz Kahlua
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ice into glass, add tequila and kahlua, fill with cream, shake and serve.

drinks.name: Thug Passion #1
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part AlizÃ©
  • 1 part Cognac (Cristal)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour one on top of the other!

drinks.name: Mexican Mountie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 part Yukon Jack
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each part into a Old-fashioned glass over ice. Top with a wedge of Lime.

drinks.name: Bonfire
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer this drink! Grenadine first, Amaretto next, and 151 on top. Light the 151 and let it warm for about 3 seconds. Blow (lightly) to put the flame out and take the shot.

drinks.name: Zimartini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 bottle Zima
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour together over 2-3 icecubes and serve

drinks.name: 57 T-Bird with Hawaiian License Plates
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in cocktail mixer, shake well, pour over ice.

drinks.name: Astoria
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice: strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with twist of orange or lemon.

drinks.name: White Witch
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Tuaca
  • 3/4 oz Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake & strain

drinks.name: Sloe Comfortable Screw Against The Wall With Satin Pillows The Hard Way
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1/2 oz Whiskey
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice.

drinks.name: 220 BTU
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Sour Apple Pucker
  • 1 oz Blue Maui
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake over ice and strain into shot glass. Enjoy!

drinks.name: 81 Camaro
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Vanilla ice-cream
  • 4 oz Vodka (Popov)
  • 2 oz Pepsi Cola
  • 2 oz Orange soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend.

drinks.name: Flaming Blow Job
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Jack Daniels
  • 2 gal Everclear
  • 1 qt Chocolate milk
  • 5 cans Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into large punchbowl. Spray all 5 cans of whipped Cream on top of the bowl-set on fire and let burn. After the flames go out, serve in mason jars.

drinks.name: Tom and Jerry
drinks.ingredients:
• 24 Egg
  • 2 lb Powdered sugar
  • 2 tsp Cinnamon
  • 1/2 tsp Nutmeg
  • 1/2 oz Vanilla extract
  • 1/2 jigger Rum
  • 1/2 jigger Brandy
  • 1/2 cup boiling hot Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Beat egg whites stiff with electric beator, Add sugar gradually, add cinnamon, nutmeg and vanille, add in half of the eggs yolks blend until smooth. In Large mug fill with 1/2 batter 2 shots of 60% rum and 40% brandy (mixture) balance with boiling hot water. Stir well and sprinkle with nutmeg.

drinks.name: Patton Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 splash Dry Vermouth
  • 2 Cocktail onion
  • 2 Olive
  • 1 dash Olive juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix gin, vermouth and olive juice in cocktail shaker with ice. shake, then immediately remove from ice into cocktail glass. garnish with onions and olives alternating on a toothpick.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Navel #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Peachtree schnapps
  • 1/2 shot Vodka
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Orange juice last, stir, and enjoy!

drinks.name: Golden Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Galliano
  • 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 3 oz Orange juice (without pulp)
  • 3 oz Light cream
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vigorously until creamy in a shaker filled one third full of ice cubes. Strain into a champagne flute. Or use a blender and blend until creamy, pour into hurricane glass and garnish with slice of orange.

drinks.name: The Two
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Cherry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just simply pour into a shot glass or any glass of small size will work. Pour the ingredients in any order that you wish.

drinks.name: Lesbian Lover
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Zima
  • 1 1/2 oz Coconut rum (Parrot bay/Malibu)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Zima into a frozen pilsner. Add shot of coconut rum and enjoy.

drinks.name: Snowplow
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Hot chocolate
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 dash Cinnamon
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix hot chocolate to taste, add booze, top with whipped cream and sprinkle with cinnamon.

drinks.name: Metromelt
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Hot chocolate
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • Whipped cream
  • 1 dash Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix hot chocolate to taste in a large enough mug to accommodate booze. Add booze, top with whipped cream, sprinkle with cinnamon, enjoy.

drinks.name: Pink Beaner
drinks.ingredients:
• Crushed Ice
  • 3 oz el Tesoro Tequila
  • 8 oz Pineapple-coconut juice or nectar (Kern's)
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill 3/4 glass with crushed ice. Add tequila, juice/nectar and grenadine. Stir until pink.

drinks.name: Gin Balalajka
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Gin
  • 4 cl Orange juice
  • Fill with Schweppes Russchian
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the gim and juice and fill up with russian. The gin and juice may be shaken for better taste.

drinks.name: Black and Blue Shark
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingrediants into a small glass shot and enjoy.

drinks.name: Topaz
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Scotch
  • 1 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 tblsp Galliano
drinks.mixinginstructions: Cobine ingredients in a shaker 2/3 filled with ice. Shake well, and then strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Dreamy Winter Night
drinks.ingredients:
• Hot chocolate
  • Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Amarretto to Hot Chocolate to your taste.

drinks.name: Dreamy Winter Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Irish cream
  • 6 oz Hot chocolate
  • Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Irish Cram to the Hot Chocolate and add Amaretto to your taste. Stir.

drinks.name: Dreamy Winter
drinks.ingredients:
• Irish cream
  • Hot chocolate
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Irish Cream to Hot Chocolate to your taste.

drinks.name: Dreamy Chocolate Winter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish cream
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • Amaretto
  • 6 oz Hot chocolate
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Kahlua and Irish Cream to Hot Chocolate. Then add Amaretto to your taste. Stir.

drinks.name: Orlando Amethyst
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Gin and Chambord Raspberry Liqueur together and stir. Next, pour in the pineapple juice. Shake well. Pour over ice. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Kristi GreenEye
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in a shaker and shake well. Pour over ice.

drinks.name: Tongue Tangler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 3 oz Heavy cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Bailey's Irish Cream and Brandy into glass. Add Heavy Cream. Stir well and serve.

drinks.name: Beer Top
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 oz Beer
  • 2 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with Beer and top it off with some 7-up. You can add more or less 7-up to suit your taste. If you make it 50/50 it is known as a Shandy. Great on a hot Summer day or the night after a lot of drinking.

drinks.name: Girl Scout Thin Mint Cookie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Hot chocolate
  • 1 oz White Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a Mug with Hot Chocolate, add a shot of Creme de menthe, Stir in and enjoy.

drinks.name: Flat Tire
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 part Black Sambuca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake tequila and Sambuca over ice. Strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Wild Squirrel Sex
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Stoli Lemon vodka
  • 1 shot Stoli Strawberry vodka
  • 1 shot Stoli Orange vodka
  • 1 shot Stoli Raspberry vodka
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • Fill 1/2 Sour mix
  • Fill 1/2 Cranberry juice
  • Top with Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill 16oz. cup with ice. Add shots, sour mix, and cranberry juice. Top with splash of grenadine.

drinks.name: Fruit Tingles
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Jamaican Rum
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • 100 ml Lemonade
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place ice cubes in shaker , add all oter ingredients and shake. Pour into shot glasses to drink

drinks.name: Blue Meanie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Blue Curacao, Vodka and Sour mix in a shaker with ice, shake and strain into a shot glass. Could also be made on the rocks.

drinks.name: Irish Flag
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Green Creme de Menthe
  • 2 parts Irish cream
  • 1 part Brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer: creme de menthe, irish cream and brandy

drinks.name: Double Gold
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Goldschlager
  • 3/4 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Keep goldschlager in freezer. Mix in jigger shot glass. Shot it down and enjoy.

drinks.name: Lava Lamp #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 shot Kahlua
  • 1/4 shot Strawberry liqueur
  • 1/4 shot Frangelico
  • 1/4 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 - 3 drops Advocaat
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shot glass, pour Kahlua, strawberry liqueur and Frangelico. Then float Bailey's Irish Cream on top of the other spirits and dribble 2-3 drops of Advocaat on top.

drinks.name: Foreplay on the Neutral Ground
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 12 oz Pineapple juice
  • 12 oz Cranberry juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glasses with ice. Mix Absolut, Midori, pineapple juice and cranberry juice in a decanter. Pour over ice and serve. Makes Several.

drinks.name: Red Eye a la Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Lager
  • 6 oz Tomato juice
  • 1 Egg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour refrigerated tomato juice into large frosted mug. Over tomato juice, pour cold beer. Do not stir. Crack egg, drop contents into mug. Do not stir. Discard eggshell. Serve.

drinks.name: White Jamaican
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Meyers Dark rum
  • 3/4 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 4 oz Milk
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a Collins glass with ice and pour in with all ingredients. Speed shake and serve.

drinks.name: Trojan Horse
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint Guinness stout
  • 1/2 pint Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix coke and guinness in a pint glass.

drinks.name: Guinness Shandy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint Guinness stout
  • 1/2 pint Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix lemonade with Guinness in a pint glass.

drinks.name: Mint Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 8 oz Iced tea
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Creme de Menthe over ice and add Iced Tea to taste. Homemade Iced Tea is best, but Nestea and Lipton work just fine.

drinks.name: Astropop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Grenadine
  • 1/3 Amaretto
  • 1/3 Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer all three liqours into shot glass.

drinks.name: Southern Ireland
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together and shoot or double amount and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Pink Gin Tonic
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 5 oz Tonic water
  • 1 splash Campari
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with Campari to add more colour and taste. Garnish with the lime wedge.

drinks.name: Passoa Recovery
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Passoa
  • 2 cl Lemon juice
  • Fill with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass.

drinks.name: Fuzzless Navel
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Peach nectar
  • 6 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour peach nectar and orange juice into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Vampire's Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz dry Gin
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 tblsp Tequila
  • 1 pinch Salt
  • 2 oz Tomato juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain over ice in an old fashined glass.

drinks.name: PMS Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz 151 proof rum
  • Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a martini glass.

drinks.name: Fox Trot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 2-3 dashes Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Blue Fox Trot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 2-3 dashes Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Cranberry Bomber
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 tblsp Grenadine
  • 1 tsp Honey
  • Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice and fill with cola. Stir and add honey. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Evil Princess
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Grenadine
  • 2 oz White grape juice
  • 1 oz Apple juice
  • 1 tblsp Vanilla syrup
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice. Stir and garnish with a lime slice.

drinks.name: Time of the month
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Sloe gin
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the ingredients in a big old fashion. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Gin
  • 1 shot Peach schnapps
  • 1 shot Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 shot Light rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all 5 shots in a chilled glass. CHUG!

drinks.name: Water your melon
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Mountain Dew
  • 2 shots Watermelon schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Mt. Dew in any kind of ordinary glass. Then, add the Watermelon Schnapps and stir.

drinks.name: Jack your melon
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Mountain Dew
  • 2 shots Watermelon schnapps
  • 1 shot Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Mt. Dew in any kind of ordinary glass. Then, pour the shots of Watermelon Schnapps and Jack Daniels in the glass and stir.

drinks.name: The Cherry Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Cherry
  • 2 tsp Absolut Vodka
  • 1 tsp Cinnamon schnapps (Goldschlager)
  • 1 tsp Light rum (Bacardi)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the cherry into the shot glass. Add the cinnamon Schnapps (be careful it is real strong). Then add the Rum and top of with the vodka. More vodka can be used. Slam it

drinks.name: Back Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients over ice

drinks.name: Fruit Lush
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bacardi Light rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 1/2 oz Wildberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 2 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • Fill With Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in order, stir, enjoy.

drinks.name: Transmission Overhaul
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Mountain Dew
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1/2 part Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the ingredients in a large container. Shake or Stir Well. Server Chilled or over Ice. This will sneak up on you :)

drinks.name: Wedding Anniversary
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka
  • 3 cl Galliano
  • 1 1/2 cl Campari
  • 12 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Gator Piss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Fill with Sweet and sour
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Midori and Rum over ice, and top off with sweet and sour mix.

drinks.name: King of Poland
drinks.ingredients:
• 100 ml Vodka (Luksosowa)
  • 25 ml Lemon juice
  • 25 ml Scotch (Johnnie Walker)
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: First the scotch goes in, then the lemon juice, then the crushed ice, then topped off with the vodka.

drinks.name: The Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Apple schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice in shaker cup, strain and shoot,

drinks.name: Tumbleweed
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Cream
  • 2 oz Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine over ice in a blender. Mix until smooth and frothy. Serve immediately.

drinks.name: Drum Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1/2 oz Dark rum
  • 1/2 oz Gold tequila
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 3 oz Fresh Orange juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 2 drops Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ingredients in a blender with 2-3 ice cubes. Blend for aprox. 10 seconds. Serve in a highball glass with 2-3 ice cubes. Decorate with an orange slice and two maraschino cherries.

drinks.name: Start Me Up
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 cl Tequila
  • 1 cl Absolut Kurant
  • 1 cl Dark rum (Bacardi)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything in a container (bottle, glass etc.), then it is ready for consumtion...

drinks.name: Anestesia
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Passoa
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • Shake with Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice for 10 seconds. Serve it in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

drinks.name: Wookie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 tblsp Heavy cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Schnapps and Amaretto and float cream into mixture.

drinks.name: Blue Motorcycle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Fill with Sour mix
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice in a collins glass. Fill with sour mix and add a splash of 7-Up.

drinks.name: Purple Russian Gonzo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Vodka (Stoli)
  • 1 oz 7-Up
  • 3 dashes Grenadine
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put everything in a shaker and give it a whirl. Once shaker is well chilled, strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Little Green Frog
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 qt Lemon-lime mix
  • 8 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 6 oz Banana liqueur
  • 6 oz Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Prepare Lemon-Lime mix in a large pitcher or punch bowl and add the other ingredients and pour over ice.

drinks.name: Dead Little Green Frog
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 qt Lemon-lime mix
  • 8 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 6 oz Malibu rum
  • 6 oz Banana liqueur
  • Cherry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Lemon-Lime mix in a large pitcher or punch bowl and add the other ingredients and pour over ice, top each drink off with 1/2 oz of Cherry liqueur.

drinks.name: The Sheedy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Peach schnapps
  • 1/3 JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/3 Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add, grab glass shoot back.

drinks.name: Lucky Lemon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 can 7-Up
  • 1 bottle Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingrediants into a glass, stir and enjoy!

drinks.name: Raw Sewage
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Blue Curacao
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 3-4 Ice
  • Fill Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together, shake, and serve.

drinks.name: Dirty Bloody Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Inferno or Pepper Pot)
  • 1 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 2 oz Clamato juice
  • 1 tblsp Olive juice
  • 2 Olive
  • 2 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients into a shaker, except olives, and shake until shaker is frosted. Pour into cocktail glass, add olives and serve.

drinks.name: California Gold Rush
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz 7-Up or Sprite
  • 2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 1/2 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 7-up into a glass. Add vodka and Goldschlager. Stir to mix gold flakes evenly through the drink. Serve in a clear glass without ice.

drinks.name: Blue Bomber
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz 7-Up
  • 1 oz Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer first 2 ingredients in shot glass. Set aside. Pour 7-Up and soda water in a foot glass, then drop the shot glass in the foot glass and drink.

drinks.name: Karla's Creation (KC)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 count Apple schnapps (Sour Apple Pucker)
  • 1 count Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1 count Sour mix
  • Add Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill metal shaker with ice. Add liquor and sour mix. Shake, strain, and serve.

drinks.name: Snake Bite Black (UK)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint Lager
  • 1/2 pint Cider
  • 2 splashes Blackcurrant cordial
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 1/2 pint Lager, and 1/2 pint Cider into a pint glass, then add Black Currant until drink is purple in color.

drinks.name: Arkansas Buttermilk
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 qt Pineapple juice
  • 3 qt Orange juice
  • 3 qt Grapefruit juice
  • 1 pint Lemon juice
  • 1 pint Grenadine
  • 1 fifth Vodka
  • 1 fifth Jack Daniels
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients one at a time, preferably in a 'new' plastic gas can that has been cleaned and serve from gas can

drinks.name: Muff Diver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Irish cream
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the alcohol in a shaker with ice, strain into a shot glass. Place shot glass into a wide-mouth rocks glass or similar container, fill rest of glass with whipped cream and add cherry (optional).

drinks.name: Spice Cake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Irish cream
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Cinnamon schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice, strain, and serve in shot glass.

drinks.name: Big Pine Puss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 splash Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make shot in mixing glass with ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Tootsie Pop
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Grenadine
  • 5 oz Amaretto
  • 3 oz Lemon juice
  • 2 drops Chocolate syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer grenadine, amaretto, and lemon juice, then stir. Add 2 drops of chocolate syrup, let sink, and serve.

drinks.name: Irish Pride
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 3 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer and mix.

drinks.name: Spear Chugger
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 parts Vodka
  • 2 parts Ice
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Lemon juice
  • To taste Vinegar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Simply add in order vodka, ice, orange juice, lemon, and vinegar. Ice can be crushed.

drinks.name: AJ's Bubbling Brew
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 12 oz Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Carefully pour the Rum, Tequila, Southern Comfort, and Peppermint Schnapps into the glass, light on fire, and quickly add the beer. After adding the beer, stir the mixture and watch it bubble forth.

drinks.name: Dragon's Blood
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Club soda
  • 3 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 4 oz Aftershock
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a twelve ounce glass, mix all ingredients and serve.

drinks.name: Cricket
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chocolate mint liqueur
  • 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Cream or milk
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker filled with ice, combine ingredients and shake well, strain into old fashioned glass

drinks.name: Yummy Bidnis
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Passion fruit juice
  • Top with Cranberry juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in highball glass and stir

drinks.name: Blue Motorcycle #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • Fill with Sprite or 7-up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, add the ingrediants, shake and serve.

drinks.name: The Perfect Ten
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Bacardi Limon
  • 2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • Lemon juice
  • Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add the alcohol, then the rest is 50/50 of the lemon juice and the sprite. Don't put any ice in it!!!

drinks.name: White Dove
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 2 cups Ice-cream
  • Chocolate syrup (optional)
  • Whipped cream (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Amaretto and Cream de Coke into a blender cup with the ice cream. Blend til smooth like a shake. Line the inside of snifter glass with chocolate syrup. Pour drink into cup and top with wipped cream. Add cherry to top.

drinks.name: Japaneese slipper
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Cointreau
  • 2 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with lot's of ice. Pour into cocktailglass.

drinks.name: Purple Lobster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Canadian whisky (Crown Royal)
  • 1 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 2 splashes Cranberry juice
  • 3 splashes 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shaker with ice, add all ingredients, strain into a rocks/shooter glass.

drinks.name: White Carnation
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • Soda water
  • Splash of Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir and pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with orange slice.

drinks.name: Champibble
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Mad Dog 20/20 (any flavor)
  • 6 oz cheap Champagne
  • 2 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir or shake well.

drinks.name: Jo Jo Original
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Dark rum (Meyers)
  • 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • 5 cubes Ice
  • Fill with Cola
  • 1 splash 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill old fashioned glass with ice. Add Dark Rum and Amaretto. Fill with Coke. Add splash of High Proof Rum to taste.

drinks.name: Leap Year
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/4 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange twist.

drinks.name: Nicky Finn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Pernod
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon twist.

drinks.name: Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 tblsp Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp superfine Sugar
  • 1 cup Water
  • 3-4 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine lemon juice and sugar. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Add water and stir. Serve in a tall glass with ice.

drinks.name: Forza FCK
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Coconut milk
  • 6 cl Vodka
  • 4 cl Tequila
  • 5 cl White Creme de Menthe
  • 4 cl Banana liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the tequila, vodka, banana liqueur and coconut milk together. Shake it well together with crushed ice, and put it in an glass. Last, pour the creme de menthe into the glass so that it sink to bottom of the glass.

drinks.name: Liberace
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Kahlua
  • 1/3 shot Milk
  • 1/3 shot Bacardi 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in the Kahlua. Layer the milk on top of it. Then float the Bacardi 151 on top of the milk. Light the top of the shot. Let it burn for about 10 seconds, blow it out and shoot it.

drinks.name: The Kuoyamuli
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Bailey's irish cream
  • 4 shots Espresso
  • 1 shot Milk
  • 8 cubes Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients swiftly with a spork in either a irish coffee mug, or cappuchino mug. Serve hot/warm.

drinks.name: Thames Water
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 bottles (small 'Britvic' size) Orange juice
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Orange Juice in first. Top up with Cola, the fizzier, the better. Stir.

drinks.name: Grappa Gimlet
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Gin
  • 2 parts Lime juice cordial (Rose's)
  • 1 part Grappa
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and pour over ice-cubes.

drinks.name: Torombolo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Chocolate milk
  • 1 part Licor 43
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the chocolate milk in the big glass, and add the Licor 43 and mix will. Serve it very cold.

drinks.name: Haywire
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bacardi Limon
  • 3-5 parts cherry 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve over ice. Regular 7-up and Amaretto can be used if cherry 7-Up is not available. Garnish with orange slice and cherry. Serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Will Willy Wander
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 shot Rock and rye
  • 1 shot Creme de Fraise (Jacquin's)
  • 2 shots Amaretto
  • 3 shots Sour mix
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In shaker, add Southern Comfort, Rock and Rye, Creme de Fraise, Amaretto and Sour Mix. Fill with orange juice. Pour into shot glasses.

drinks.name: Caramilk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/4 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/4 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients (in order) into a shot glass, then it's bottoms up!

drinks.name: Irish Cream #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 qt Half-and-half
  • 1 cup Whiskey
  • 1 can sweetened Condensed milk
  • 2 x-large Egg
  • 1 tblsp Chocolate syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put everything in a blender and mix. Makes about three small mason jars.

drinks.name: Cable Car
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Captain Morgan's Rum
  • 3/4 oz Orange Curacao
  • 1 1/4 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Shake. Strain into a chilled, sugar and cinnomon rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange spiral twist.

drinks.name: Fria Cafe Italiano
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli Vanil)
  • 1/2 oz Godiva liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Sambuca
  • 1 oz chilled Espresso
  • 1 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with ground espresso.

drinks.name: Hard Eight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Haitian Dark rum (Barbancourt)
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 2 dashes Peychaud bitters
  • Fill with Ginger beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add rum, lime juice and bitters to an ice-filled Collins glass. Fill with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wheel and a lemon spiral.

drinks.name: Blue Moon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Gin (Tanqueray Malacca)
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 1/2 oz fresh Sweet and sour mix
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

drinks.name: Champagne Celebration
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1/2 oz Presidente Brandy
  • 1 cube Sugar
  • Peychaud bitters
  • 4 oz Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Cointreau, Brandy and Sugar cube aturated with Peychaud bitters to champagne flute. Fill with your favorite champagne. Garnish with an orange twist.

drinks.name: Cielo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 3/4 oz Creme de Cassis
  • 2 dashes Peychaud bitters
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in an ice-filled collins glass. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

drinks.name: Sex in the Desert
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila (Herradura)
  • 1 oz Triple sec (Bandolero)
  • 1 oz Cherry juice
  • 1/2 oz Margarita mix
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve on the rocks.

drinks.name: Sex on Ice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Razzmatazz
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 2 Strawberries
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 1/4 oz Cheri Beri Pucker
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with crushed ice and blend until the drink has reached the desired consistency. Pour unstrained into cocktail glass and garnish with whiped cream and a cherry.

drinks.name: Electric Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1/2 oz Orange Curacao
  • 4 oz Lemonade
  • 1 tblsp pureed Strawberries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Serve in a hurricane glass and garnish with a lemon wheel.

drinks.name: Flamingo Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Bacardi Rum
  • 5/8 oz Meyers Rum
  • 1/4 oz Bacardi 151 proof rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Garnish with and orange slice and a lemon wheel.

drinks.name: Funky Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rum (Mt.Gay)
  • 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • 5/8 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 3 oz Coconut milk
  • 1 Banana
  • Coconut flakes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with ice until smooth. Pour into a Hurricane Glass and garnish with coconut flakes.

drinks.name: Good Fortune
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Absolut Citron
  • 3/4 oz AlizÃ©
  • 6 oz Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

drinks.name: Hurlyburly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Absolut Citron
  • 5/8 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
