drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with dried cranberries.

drinks.name: Indigo Blues
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo)
  • 5/8 oz Triple sec
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain this drink into and ice-filled Hurricane glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a lime wheel.

drinks.name: Italian Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Campari
  • 1/4 oz Limoncello
  • 3/4 oz Orange juice
  • 3/4 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain this drink into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon spiral.

drinks.name: Joy Ride
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Absolut Citron
  • 3/4 oz Campari
  • 3 oz Sweet and sour
  • 2 wedges Lemon
  • 1 tblsp Sugar
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Muddle lemon and sugar in a mixing glass. Add ice, Absolut Citron, Campari and Sweet and Sour. Shake well and dump into a Hurricane glass. Spritz with soda.

drinks.name: Jamaican Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Captain Morgan's Rum
  • 1/2 oz Meyers Rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain this drink into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Float Meyers rum and Garnish with a Pineapple/Orange/Cherry pinwheel.

drinks.name: Jockey's Choice Manhattan
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Makers Mark Bourbon
  • 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 2 dashes Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Manhattan Bella
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Bourbon (Knob Creek)
  • 3/8 oz Dubonnet Rouge
  • 3/8 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 2 dashes Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a brandied cherry.

drinks.name: Pink Limon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into a chilled, sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

drinks.name: Palmetto
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Bacardi silver Rum
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 1/4 oz Meyers Rum
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Float Meyers Rum on top and garnish with a pineapple spear.

drinks.name: Sunsplash
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Orange vodka (Stoli Ohranj)
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a lemon twist.

drinks.name: Third Rail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bacardi AÃ±ejo rum
  • 3/4 oz Orange Curacao
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into a chilled, sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

drinks.name: Golden Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz Sour Apple Pucker
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the two ingredients in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Thug Heaven
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz AlizÃ©
  • 2 oz Skyy Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill cocktail glass with ice and mix the two ingredients.

drinks.name: Fruit Salad Daiquiri
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz Pina colada mix
  • Strawberries
  • Watermelon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill blender 1/2 to 3/4 with ice and add strawberries, pieces of watermelon, and slices of star fruit. Last add rum and mix. Blend until smooth and garnish with a slice of star fruit and an umbrella.

drinks.name: Moo Moo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 5 oz Cream
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both liquors into glass with ice. Add cream and shake well. Serve with large straw.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Balls
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Absolut Citron
  • 1 part Bacardi Limon
  • 1 part Peach schnapps
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix alcoholic ingredients one part each - and add 7-up. Eight shots of each requires a 2L bottle of 7-up.

drinks.name: Nikki Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 shot Butterscotch schnapps
  • Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ssing a coffee mug, pour Bailey's and butterscotch into mug. Fill with coffee and stir.

drinks.name: The Dash
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 Ice cubes
  • 1 shot Advocaat
  • 1 shot Creme de Fraise
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pop a couple of ice cubes in the glass. Pour the advocaat slowly over the ice. Then wait for a moment before adding the creme de fraise. Serve it as soon as it's poured as it starts to curdle.

drinks.name: Jimtini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Ketel One)
  • 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and serve up in a chilled cocktail glass with a cocoa rim.

drinks.name: FU2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer from top to bottom....

drinks.name: Brimstone
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Noyaux
  • 1 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice.

drinks.name: Crazy Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 2 oz strawberry Daiquiri mix
  • 2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: combine all ingredients in a blender or Island Oasis machine. Blend and serve in a hurricane. Top with whip cream and garnish with a strawberry and orange.

drinks.name: Cokahlualicious
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Coconut liqueur
  • Ice
  • 1 pinch Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the kahlua and coconut liqueur, poor over crushed ice, and sprinkle a pinch of cinnamon on the top. Voila! You can also put this in a blender if you so desire.

drinks.name: Pearl Necklace
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila Rose
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts tequila rose and bailey's in shot glass, shoot! Also try chilled.

drinks.name: Sunset (Night Club)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Watermelon schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Splash of Grenadine to flavor, chill/strain shot or can be a drink over ice.

drinks.name: Carabinieri
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Tequila
  • 2 cl Galliano
  • 2 cl Lime juice
  • 8 cl Orange juice
  • 1 Egg yolk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice, serve in high glass half filled with ice.

drinks.name: Rhino
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Kahlua
  • 2 cl Amarula Cream
  • 2 cl Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the three ingredients in that order.

drinks.name: Granny Apple Blossom
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Apple schnapps
  • 1 1/2 oz Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1/4 oz Daiquiri mix
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix apple schnapps, tequila, daiquiri mix in a collins glass filled with ice. Fill to top with 7-up.

drinks.name: Toasted Fisherman
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Crown Royal
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 shot Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients over ice stir and serve with a cherry

drinks.name: Scurvy #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Scotch
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the ingredients in a shot glass.

drinks.name: 8 iron
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/3 oz Ouzo
  • 1/3 oz Banana liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour equal parts of each in the the shot glass

drinks.name: TLA
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 splash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in a shot glass with the tequila on the bottom, amaretto in the middle, and a splash of lime juice on top.

drinks.name: Mexican Iceberg
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 1/2 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Tequila and the Yukon Jack together with ice in a large tumbler glass. Add the Triple Sec and then add the lime juice to taste. You can garnish with slice of lime of lemon.

drinks.name: Cerebellum
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
  • 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass 3/4 full with vodka. Add the grenadine for color. Finally pour in a little Bailey's. The bailey's will sit in the drink and look like a brain, stem and all.

drinks.name: Mogadon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • 1 splash Fruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes then add 1oz of Absolut Citron. Fill with 7-Up then splash with fruit juice. Stir.

drinks.name: Strawberry Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Orange juice
  • 3/4 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/4 oz Brandy
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients (except ice) in the order shown. Stir well. Add ice cubes and serve.

drinks.name: Just Shoot Me
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Jim Beam
  • 1/3 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/3 oz Johnnie Walker
  • 1/3 oz Jose Cuervo
  • 1/3 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/3 oz 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice and then pour into a shooter glass

drinks.name: Panther Sweat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 6 oz Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the ingredients together with crushed ice. Strain into glass. Good with crushed salt on the rim of the glass.

drinks.name: Feliz Natal
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Port
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 2 parts Creme de Cacao
  • 1 part Cherry brandy
  • 1/2 part Brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients together in the glass with a couple of ice cubes and enjoy!

drinks.name: Mountain Dang
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Mountain Dew
  • 1 part Tang
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass 3/4ths full of Mountain Dew -- No fuller as it will fizz a lot! -- Add Tang to taste. Ice is completely optional

drinks.name: Pink Floyd
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Amaretto
  • 1 jigger Southern Comfort
  • Orange juice
  • Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Amaretto and Southern Comfort into shaker over ice. Top off glass with equal parts OJ and pinapple juice. Add one splash of grenadine. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Papa Doble
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot White rum
  • 1 shot Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1 shot Grapefruit juice
  • Ice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake rum, grapefruit juice, and lime juice with ice and pour or strain into glass. Add a splash of grenedine.

drinks.name: Seaweed
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ingredients can be mixed in any order over ice.

drinks.name: Thal on the rocks
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl dry Gin (Gordon's)
  • 1 cl Creme de Cassis
  • 4 cl Vodka (Absolut or Finlandia)
  • Fill with 1 part Bitter lemon
  • Fill with 1 part Tonic water
  • 1 dash Lime juice
  • 3 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take the highball, put in 3 to 4 ice cubes, add 1 cl of creme de cassis (not cooled), then 4 cl of preferably Absolut Vodka along with 2 cl of Gordon's Dry. Fill in the glass with equal parts of bitter lemon and tonic water, pour and squeeze in one fourth of a lime. Garnish with a pair of cherrys, one in, one outside the glass.

drinks.name: Hot Jose
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Hot Damn
  • 1/2 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and enjoy.

drinks.name: Rocky Mountain Bear Fucker #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 oz Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's)
  • 2/3 oz Tequila
  • 2/3 oz 151 proof rum (Bacardi)
drinks.mixinginstructions: This drink should be shaken lightly and strained into a 2oz shot glass.

drinks.name: Molotov Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Float 1 splash 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a shot of vokda (preferably Russian), float the 151, light, blow out, and take the shot down.

drinks.name: Tequila Bay Breeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila Rose
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/4 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend.

drinks.name: Wet Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Amaretto
  • 1/3 Sweet and sour
  • 1/3 Watermelon schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the 3 ingredients in the order listed in a shot glass. It is also good over ice in a highball glass.

drinks.name: Jack-Off
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 can Coca-Cola
  • 2 shots Iced tea
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in one shot of Jack Daniel's on ice, more if you like your drinks strong. Then pour about a half of a can of Coca-Cola on top, leaving room for the iced tea. Finally, fill to the top with very strong iced tea (try three times the amount of powder).

drinks.name: Suddenly Daylight
drinks.ingredients:
• Iced tea
  • Triple sec
  • Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Iced Tea in glass first, then top with the Sweet and Sour, and then add Triple Sec to taste. Stir once and serve.

drinks.name: Cucci
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 4 oz Crystal light
  • 1 dash Cointreau
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice to glass, drizzle Southern Comfort over the ice. Add lemonade, orange juice and a dash of Cointreau and mix.

drinks.name: Extra Fuzzy Navel
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Peach schnapps
  • 3 shots Peach brandy
  • 1 1/2 shot Triple sec
  • 1 shot Peach brandy (Optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Peach Brandy, Peach Schnapps, and Triple Sec in highball. Fill with Orange Juice and Ice to taste.

drinks.name: Brooklyn Zoo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Razzmatazz
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1-2 oz Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Mix rum vodka, and gin. Add splash of pinepple juice, Razzmatazz, and sourmix. Drinker or assistant pours beer.

drinks.name: Branded Nipple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Goldschlager
  • 1 dash 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Float each ingredient over the previous, set on fire, and shoot it!

drinks.name: PB&J
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake and strain into shot glass. Serve.

drinks.name: Sigma Nu Ball Buster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Tequila
  • 2 bottles Surge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill both then mix together!! Can be served over ice or in smaller doses. Experiment, have fun, let us know what you come up with!

drinks.name: Baywatch
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 4 cl Galliano
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the vodka, the galliano and the juice in a shaker. Then add ice and finally put cream on top. A little bit of chocolate makes it look really great. Should be served in a hurricane glass with a straw.

drinks.name: Gumball Hummer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Razzmatazz
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine equal parts over ice in cocktail shaker. Shake, strain, serve!!

drinks.name: Calypso
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Dark rum
  • 2 cl Coffee liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour directly in the shot glass and mix the ingridients. No need to chill. Serve.

drinks.name: Tree Smacker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 pint Peach schnapps
  • 1 pint Apple schnapps
  • 1 pint Rum
  • 1/2 cup Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 cup Orange juice
  • 1/2 cup Sweet and sour
  • Grenadine
  • 1 splash 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add liqurs, then add juices. Color red with grenidene. Float the 151.

drinks.name: Dr Jack
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Yukon Jack
  • Fill with Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in glass over ice.

drinks.name: Penthouse
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 cl Tequila
  • 2 1/2 cl Bacardi Limon
  • 4 dashes Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients in the glas. Shoot it down. Have a limewedge afterwards.

drinks.name: Kickstand
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Amaretto and Sothern Comfort, layer Kahlua and Irish cream.

drinks.name: Baileyfloat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 10 oz Root beer
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill glass with ice..add Bailey's and root beer. Stir. Serve in frosted beer mug

drinks.name: Purple Wind
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 5 parts Sake
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Chambord into shot glass. Warm sake on stove then pour into chambord. Drink immediately.

drinks.name: Tropical Passion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 1 part Rum
  • 1 part Sloe gin
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass(es).

drinks.name: Slow Comfortable Screw on a Dogbox
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in mason jar, add ice and enjoy.

drinks.name: Snow Snake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 4 oz Half-and-half
  • Fill with Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Larger Glass can be used if more cream or milk is needed to soften the impact of the drink.

drinks.name: Sweet Casa Noble
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cubes Ice
  • 2 oz Casa Noble Gold tequila
  • 1 part Peach juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: In Collins glass put ice, pour the tequila and fill with peach juice, finish with a splash of grenadine and a slice of lime.

drinks.name: Razberi Kicker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Raspberry vodka (Stoli)
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Sprite
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Stolichnaya Razberi vodka, cranberry juice, a splash of Sprite. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

drinks.name: Peach Tea Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 9 oz Iced tea
  • 3 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and serve on the rocks.

drinks.name: Geisha
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Crown Royal
  • 2 parts Midori melon liqueur
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix first two ingredients: fill with pineapple juice.

drinks.name: Canadian Zombie
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl White rum
  • 3 cl Dark rum
  • 2 cl 151 proof rum
  • 1 cl Green Curacao
  • 1 cl Grenadine
  • Orange juice
  • Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Collins glass halfway up with ice. Add white and dark rum. Fill up with half orange- half lemonjuice. Pour grenadine and curacao along rim of glass. Top with 151 proof rum.

drinks.name: The BV
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Tomato juice
  • 6-7 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice first, then vodka, OJ and tomato juice. Give a light stir. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Ooo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Orange soda
  • 1 part Orange vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve over ice.

drinks.name: The Wedge
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Malibu rum
  • 6 oz Cranberry juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Stir.

drinks.name: The Lynchmob
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 3 oz Orange soda
  • 3 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in the sweet and sour, then the amaretto and then Orange soda, and stir

drinks.name: Phi Psycho Psycho
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Sloe gin
  • 1 part Tropical fruit schnapps
  • 3 parts Sunny delight
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in large punch bowl to your liking.

drinks.name: Wile E Coyote
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Dark rum
  • 3/4 oz Banana liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a tall glass

drinks.name: Oxymoron
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 shot Lemon juice
  • 1 tblsp Honey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Keep the Vodka and Juice at room temperature. Mix them in the glass, and then add the honey. The honey will sink to the bottom. Swirl the drink more or less to vary the amount of honey dissolved.

drinks.name: Sex On The Beach - Jersey Style
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Peach schnapps
  • 1 cup Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 cup Rum
  • 1 cup Raspberry liqueur
  • 1 1/2 qt Pineapple juice
  • 1 1/2 qt Cranberry juice
  • 1 bag Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Makes 1 gallon of punch -- mix all 4 liquers in 1 parts and fill rest with pineapple and cranberry juice

drinks.name: Coo Coo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3 oz Pina colada mix
  • 3 oz Sour mix
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a blender, combine ingredients with ice and enjoy!

drinks.name: Barbarian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 glass Root beer (A&W)
  • 1 shot Blackberry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour root beer into mug. Add a shot of Blackberry Brandy.

drinks.name: Eenytini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz 7-Up or Sprite
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour blue curacao, gin and 7-Up into a shaker tin filled with ice. Swirl until tin is frosty. Pour into Martini (Cocktail) Glass. Repeat with the cranberry juice and add to glass so that an electric-purple colour is achieved. Garnish with a cherry on a sparkler stick.

drinks.name: Longaberger Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cranberry vodka
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in collins glass filled with ice.

drinks.name: Four Fine Friends
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Jose Cuervo
  • 1/4 oz Jim Beam
  • 1/4 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/4 oz Johnnie Walker
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together in a shot glass and slam it down.

drinks.name: Lorraine's Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 3 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 5 frozen Strawberries
  • 1/2 cup crushed Pineapple
  • 1/2 cup Apricot nectar
  • 1 tblsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add everything to a blender with 6-10 ice cubes and blend until it is thick and frosty. Pour into a frozen margarita glass.

drinks.name: Georgia Peach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • Top with Orange juice
  • Top with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build on ice.

drinks.name: Comfort Dry Manhattan
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Southern Comfort
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth (Noilly Prat)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine vermouth, Southern Comfort, and ice in a glass and stir well. strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: The King Of Denmark
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Sambuca
  • 1 cl Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix the two things together and serve. It is possible, but not necessary, to set the drink on fire as it is usually done with Sambuca. In any case don't add any ice.

drinks.name: Letitia's Penisbutter Cup
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 2 oz Frangelico
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients, pour over ice, and enjoy.

drinks.name: Titia's Tushie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 2 oz Amaretto
  • Milk
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a hurricane glass, and shake

drinks.name: Fridays Frozen Mudslide
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 8 cubes Ice
  • 1 1/2 oz Cream
  • 1 scoop Vanilla ice-cream (HÃ¤agen-Dazs)
  • 2 scoops Chocolate ice-cream (HÃ¤agen-Dazs)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Begin by crushing the 8 ice cubes in a blender. When ice is finely crushed, add the remaining ingredients and blend for 45 seconds on blender's highest setting. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

drinks.name: Bottlecap
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 2 1/2 oz Melon liqueur (Midori)
  • 2 1/2 oz Root beer schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients. May be served on the rocks or chilled and strained as a shot.

drinks.name: Phoenix Paradise
drinks.ingredients:
• 25 ml Vodka (Vladivar or Smirnoff)
  • 50 ml Cranberry juice
  • 50 ml Mango juice
  • 50 ml Orange juice
  • 4 cubes Ice
  • 2 tblsp Ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all of the ingredients into a blender and blend for about 20 - 30 seconds. Then pour into a hi-ball glass or a Gibralter 14 oz glass.

drinks.name: Eagle Eye
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3 cl Passoa
  • 1/2 part Orange juice
  • 1/2 part Cranberry juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass.

drinks.name: Monaco
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 splash Grenadine
  • 2/3 glass Beer
  • 1/3 glass 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with the grenadine, then beer, then 7up. Stir well on the rocks, and you're good to go.

drinks.name: Caribbean Bliss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Tequila
  • 4 parts Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use chilled orange juice, but no ice.

drinks.name: Brittle Fracture
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Root beer schnapps
  • 9 oz Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in no particular order. Serve over ice.

drinks.name: Chocolate Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Coconut rum (Malibu or Parrot Bay)
  • Fill with Chocolate milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Equal amounts of Kahlua and coconut run in a common 12oz glass. Fill the glass with chocolate milk.

drinks.name: Carolina Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (or more to taste)
  • 4-6 oz sweet Iced tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add alcohol and stir lightly. Pour in iced tea. Stir a few more times and enjoy!

drinks.name: Black Lodge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Triple sec
  • 1/2 shot Malibu rum
  • 1/2 shot Citrus vodka
  • 1 splash Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Coca-Cola
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with glass 2/3 filled with ice cubes. Add Triple Sec, Malibu, and Citrus Vodka. Add splash of Rose's lime juice. Fill glass with cola. Stir.

drinks.name: Yukon Dew Me
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Yukon Jack
  • 8 oz Mountain Dew
  • Fill Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix and drink.

drinks.name: Campari Milkshake
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 1/2 cl Milk
  • 12 1/2 cl Orange juice
  • 2 cl Campari
  • 3 Ice Cubes
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour cold milk in a pot. Slowly add orange juice. Finally add campari. Stir really well. Put ice cubes in glass and pour in milk-shake. Garnish with slice of orange. Serve with straw.

drinks.name: Disco Ball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together over ice, strain into glass.

drinks.name: Dublin Driver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish Mist
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Irish Mist and Orange Juice over rocks. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Fruit Tingle #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Blue Curacao
  • 30 ml Vodka
  • Lemonade
  • 1 dash Raspberry cordial
  • 3 - 4 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Blue Curacao and Vodka over the ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade and at the same time add the dash of cordial. Be sure not to go overboard with the cordial otherwise it overpowers the fruit tingle effect.

drinks.name: Centipede
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Orange vodka (Stoli Ohranj)
  • 1 1/2 oz RedRum
  • 4 oz Grapefruit-lemon soda (Squirt)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine vodka and rum in cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into old-fashioned glass with ice. Top off with grapefruit soda and stir gently.

drinks.name: The Whole Maryann
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish cream
  • 1 oz Coffee liqueur
  • 1 oz Tequila Rose
  • Fill with Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: layer over ice, Taste before serving

drinks.name: Platinum Grand Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Margarita mix
  • 1 1/4 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo 1800)
  • 1/4 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/4 oz Cointreau
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1/4 oz Irish Mist
  • 1/4 oz fresh Lime juice
  • 5 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Salt the rim of your margarita glass and add freshly squeezed lime juice to your glass. Add margarita mix, tequila, grand marnier, cointreau, triple sec, irish mist, and 5 ice cubes in a shaker. Shake vigorously until thoroughly mixed and cold. Pour into margarita glass and garnish with a lime wheel. Adding a maraschino cherry is an interesting touch.

drinks.name: Sour Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Everclear
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice and pour into glass.

drinks.name: Tinyee's Orange Smoothie
drinks.ingredients:
• Crushed Ice
  • 1/2 cup Cointreau
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 cubed Mango
  • 5 sliced Strawberries
  • 1 can Lemon-lime soda
  • 2 cups Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put crushed ice into blender, about 2 cups. Add Cointreau. Add fruits, lemon juice and orange juice. Blend. With machine on, pour one half of the soda and reserve for serving. Once blended, pour into glass three-quarters of the way and add remaining soda.

drinks.name: Mirage
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Melon vodka
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 oz Strawberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and stir in chilled glasses. Garnish with a strawberry.

drinks.name: Arizona PowWow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Hot Damn
  • 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part Light rum
  • 1 dash Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the three alcohols together and pour into shot glasses leaving enough room to add a little club soda.

drinks.name: Sunset Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Whiskey
  • 3 oz Sour mix
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix whiskey and sour mix and pour over ice-filled whiskeysour glass. Slowly add grenadine which will sink to the bottom of the glass. Garnish with orange slices and cherries.

drinks.name: Sex on an Arizona Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Absolut Vodka
  • 2 shots Peach schnapps
  • 1 dash Grapefruit juice
  • 1 dash Lime juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients and add some ice.

drinks.name: Caribbean Breeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz SKYY Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients except juice with ice and pour into collins glass. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with pineapple wedge and a cherry.

drinks.name: Apocolypse
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 1/2 oz oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Bourbon (Old Grandad)
  • 1 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 3/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Hot chocolate
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine alcohol in a coffee mug. Fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Magic Woman
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1 oz Gin
  • Fill with Sprite
  • 1 splash Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingridients and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Snakebite Jack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint Cider
  • 1 dash Blackcurrant cordial
  • 1 shot Jack Daniels
  • Top up with Lager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a pint glass half way with cider, add a dash of blackcurrant cordial, top it up with lager, drink it down a bit (or pour it off) and add a shot of Jack Daniels.

drinks.name: Kenny
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Peach Vodka
  • 3 cl Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the peach vodka with the sprite and some ice cubes.

drinks.name: Perfect Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• Crushed Ice
  • 2 cl White rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 cl Peach schnapps (Peachtree)
  • Sprite
  • Strawberries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the crushed ice in the glass. Add spirits and top with Sprite. Gently place one half strawberry underneath the layer of crushed ice. Serve.

drinks.name: Telegraph
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz RedRum
  • 3/4 oz Vodka (Stoli)
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker with ice, combine rum and vodka. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled almost to the top with ice. Top off with ginger ale and stir gently.

drinks.name: Amor de Cosmos
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Canadian whisky (Canadian Club)
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Ginger ale (Canada Dry)
  • 1 splash Club soda
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake rye, grenadine and cranberry juice with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Add a splash each of ginger ale and club soda. Add a maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Soviet Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Lemon vodka (Stoli Limonnaya)
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 3 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka, triple sec and lime juice over ice. Fill to top with club soda. Stir.

drinks.name: Absolut Royal Fuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill in tumbler, shake, and serve up in a rocks glass.

drinks.name: Apple Jolly Rancher
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sour Apple Pucker
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 11 splashes Sweet and sour
  • 1 dash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill in tumbler, shake. Serve up in rocks glass.

drinks.name: Barney on Acid
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Alligator Piss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/3 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/3 oz Amaretto
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake, strain into glass

drinks.name: Green Beret
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 shot green Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour both ingredients into a shaker, over ice. Shake well. Pour into shot glass.

drinks.name: Tweaked
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • Fill glass with Root beer
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass 3/4 way full with ice, add Vodka and Southern Comfort, then fill to the top with Root Beer, stir then drink.

drinks.name: Twin Sisters
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Spiced rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 dash Coca-Cola
  • 1 dash Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Stubborn Italian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Sambuca
  • 1 splash Galliano
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour one shot Sambuca, add a splash of Galliano on top. Light on fire and drink it.

drinks.name: Ladder
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 2 cl Creme de Banane
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour it in your glass

drinks.name: Dallas Stars
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Toronto Maple Leafs
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in shot glass.

drinks.name: Wayne's World
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Sambuca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the shot glass about 2/3rd's full of Jager, and then top it off with the Sambuca.

drinks.name: Lager & Lime
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Lager
  • 2 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the beer in first, then add the lime juice. Because the lime juice is heavier than the beer, don't let it sit for a long time. For best results, use 'bar lime' (out of the nozzle) instead of real lime juice.

drinks.name: Toro
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Spiced rum
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into an ice filled shaker and shake. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Slaughtering the Slothman
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Grand Marnier
  • 4 oz Orange Curacao
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the Grand Marnier, orange Curacao, freshly squeezed lemon juice and a dash of grenadine with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Rye & Ginger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rye whiskey
  • Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together.

drinks.name: China Village Mai Tai
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dark rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice (Tropicana)
  • 1 oz canned Pineapple juice
  • 1/4 oz alcoholic Grenadine cordial (24 proof)
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a metal shaker add a fair amount of ice cubes. Add dark rum and light rum, then grenadine, orange juice, and pineapple juice. Finally add Triple Sec and shake vigoursly. Pour in a thick tall ribbed glass. Top with a cherry or a dash of Triple Sec.

drinks.name: Tiger Jack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Grenadine
  • 2 shots Jack Daniels
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a measure (depending on sweetness required 1/2 to 1 shot is average) of grenadine into a tall, cool glass. In a cocktail shaker, add ice, 2 shots of Jack, 1 shot of Triple Sec then top up with enough orange juice to fill the glass. Give it a good shake and pour slowly into the glass.

drinks.name: Hot Summer Breeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Habanero)
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice and mix all together.

drinks.name: Sever St. Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1 can Sprite
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a Collins glass most of the way with ice. Pour in the Yukon Jack. Fill with Sprite. Stir.

drinks.name: Candied Sever St. Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 can Sprite
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Collins glass most of the way with ice. Add Yukon Jack and Midori. Fill with Sprite. Stir.

drinks.name: Screwed Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Banana liqueur
  • 1 shot Peachtree schnapps
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in highball glass, about 1/2 full, then pour in the banana liqueur and the Peach Schnapps. Fill with orange juice. Stir.

drinks.name: Spicy Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Vermouth
  • 15 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the Gin and Vermouth with ice in a shaker. Pour into a large Martini glass. Pour the tabasco into the finished drink. Stir very lightly.

drinks.name: Coffee Coolata
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups cold Coffee
  • 6 tsp Sugar
  • 1/2 cup Milk
  • 6 Ice cubes
  • 1 oz Kahlua (Optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix coffee, sugar, and milk in a blender and add more of either to taste, then add the ice and crush it until no large chunks are present. Add the Kahlua, and mix if you'd like that.

drinks.name: Penalty Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/3 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all 3 into shot glass and mix.

drinks.name: Mint Condition
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz Bourbon (Jim Beam)
  • 1 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with ice, and pour the ingredients into the glass, stirring with a straw.

drinks.name: All Puckered Out
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Sour Apple Pucker
  • 1 can Ginger ale
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice and a shot of pucker to the highball glass. Fill with ginger ale. Squeeze a wedge of lime and toss it in the glass. Stir.

drinks.name: Bent Bum
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 part Orange juice
  • 1/2 part Grapefruit juice
  • 1 splash Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Collins Glass with a heaping of ice. Pour in Vodka, Gin, 1/2 of remaining glass with O.J., then rest with Grapefruit. Skake, don't stir. Then add a healthy splah of Coca-cola.

drinks.name: Shot of Respect
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part 151 proof rum
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the tequila and 151 proof rum in a shot glass.Then pour in the tabasco.

drinks.name: Coconut Cream Pie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vanilla schnapps
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 3 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients into a shaker with ice shake & strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Barracuda
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 part Southern Comfort
  • 1/3 part Triple sec
  • 1/3 part Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the liquor in the shot glass equally

drinks.name: Paddy's Caffeine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tia maria
  • 1 pint Guinness stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make sure you put in Tia Maria first (Before Guinness has settled and before you 'head' it) as otherwise you will mess-up a perfectly well-settled pint

drinks.name: Purple Mexican
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all 3 ingredients into mixing glass with ice. Shake and strain into highball glass. Drink like a shooter

drinks.name: P.D.C.
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 ml Green Creme de Menthe
  • 10 ml Black Sambuca
  • 10 ml Green Chartreuse
  • 5 ml Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with Creme de Menthe, then layer in order, with Baileys last.

drinks.name: Liquid Valium
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Crown Royal
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • Orange juice
  • Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Glass with Ice, pour liquers, then pour to fill with equal parts Orange and cranberry juice. Shake and serve with Orange and cherry garnish.

drinks.name: Mountain Fuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 can Mountain Dew
  • 5 shots Aftershock
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a beer mug.

drinks.name: Pierced Nipple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sambuca
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice, strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Jamaican Ten Speed
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Half-and-half
  • 1/4 oz Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain over ice.

drinks.name: Jamaican Sunset #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1-1/2 oz Jamaican Coconut rum
  • Orange juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the vodka and the coconut rum. Fill with Orange Juice and add a splash of Grenadine. Shake or stir.

drinks.name: Crazy Janie
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Orange vodka
  • Grapefruit juice
  • 1 splash Sprite or Champagne
  • Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ice into a deep stem glass and pour in Orange vodka. Fill with grapefruit juice, and add a splash of Sprite or Champagne. Stir gently and then comes the 'crazy part'. Spin the glass and drizzle a few drops of grenadine into the drink to make a spiral effect. Garnish with a slice of lemon on the rim of the glass.

drinks.name: Tuaca Nutter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tuaca
  • 1 oz Frangelico
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in cocktail shaker with ice. Serve on the rocks. Garnish with chocolate shavings & chopped roast nuts.

drinks.name: Mother
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • Top off with Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Gin, Vodka, Grenadine, Sour Mix together in shaker and pour into a collins glass with ice. Try to fill to about 1/2 to 3/4 quarters full with the liquor mix. Then top with beer to personal flavor.

drinks.name: Alternate Root
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Root beer schnapps
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 glass Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Schnapps and juice in glass of ice. Place in blender. Blend until smooth. Serve in chilled glass.

drinks.name: Less Than Jake on The Rocks
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot chilled Espresso
  • 3 oz Rum (Myers)
  • 2 oz Chocolate syrup (Hersheys)
  • Fill with Milk (1% or Skim)
drinks.mixinginstructions: just put one on top of the other in order shown... then stir

drinks.name: The Dukes Of Hazzard Tonic
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz dry Gin
  • 4 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve.

drinks.name: Creamy Snatch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Butterscotch schnapps (Buttershots)
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 2 parts Half-and-half
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass 1/2 with ice. Pour in the Buttershots first, followed slowly by the Kahlua until you're halfway up the glass. (You can allow yourself to be a little more generous with the Buttershots than with the Kahlua). Pour in the half-and-half last, and stir until mixed completely. Serve cold.

drinks.name: Deidru
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy (Korbel)
  • Fill with Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Brandy to glass and fill with Lemonade. Add ice if desired. Stir.

drinks.name: Satin Sheet
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Brandy
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 glass Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine first four ingredients in a mixing glass, stir, and pour into a collins glass half filled with ice cubes. For those with a sweet tooth, use a sugar frosted rim.

drinks.name: Kokopa
drinks.ingredients:
• 15 ml Kahlua
  • 15 ml Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer. Peppermint schnapps first, then the kahlua on top.

drinks.name: A Southern Screw
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 6 oz Orange juice (Sunny D)
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice, stir and serve.

drinks.name: Zipper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/4 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/4 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and stir to chill. Strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Dr. Raspberry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 2 parts Dr. Pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Dr. Pepper into glass and add chambord. Stir to mix, and serve chilled.

drinks.name: Bittersweet with a twist
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 10 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all liquid ingrediants to mason jar and add ice to taste. Stir well and add slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Madeleine
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Passoa
  • 1 cl Gin
  • 1 cl Coconut liqueur
  • 12 cl Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with 4 ice cubes. And enjoy that drink.

drinks.name: Keoke Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Brandy (Christian Bros)
  • 4 oz Coffee
  • Top with Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix alcohols, add coffee, top with whipped cream, Enjoy. Good on a cold winters night!

drinks.name: The Hurtado
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rumple Minze
  • 2 oz Sambuca
  • 1/2 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 3 oz Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in glass with a lot of ice, shake well and serve.

drinks.name: Dizzy Damage
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Rumple Minze
  • 1 part Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill ingrediants in mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

drinks.name: Tropical Kermit Piss
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Midori melon liqueur
  • 30 ml Cointreau
  • 15 ml Malibu rum
  • Fill with Pineapple soda or lemon soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour into a glass and add the softdrink and ice.

drinks.name: Indiana Jones
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Tequila
  • 1/2 shot Whisky
  • 1 shot Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the Whisky and Tequila together, one shot worth combined, then add the same amount of Champagne/Sparkling Wine. Put your hand or a beer mat over the glass, slam it down onto table and then down it in one.

drinks.name: Limon and Ginger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Bacardi Limon
  • 1 part Ginger ale (Canada Dry)
drinks.mixinginstructions: This drink will taste best neat if both the Limon and the ginger ale are chilled, but will also work fine on the rocks.

drinks.name: C3PO
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 dash Cointreau
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients in mixer. Garnish with 2 orange slices to give impression of C3PO's eyes.

drinks.name: Whippersnapper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 cup Rum
  • 1/2 cup Fresca
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Rum, Fresca, and 1 or 2 ice cubes.

drinks.name: Beth's Own
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Whiskey
  • 2 parts Gin
  • 1 part Bacardi Limon
  • 4 parts Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix alcohol first, then add cola.

drinks.name: Carribean Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Orange juice
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 5 ml Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and Add Ice

drinks.name: Ironman
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Seagram 7
  • 3 oz Vodka
  • Fill with Soda water
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Seagrem 7 and vodka. Stir. Add a few ice cubes, fill with soda and stir gently.

drinks.name: Genuine Singapore Sling
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Cherry brandy
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1/4 oz Cointreau
  • 1/4 oz Benedictine
  • 1/3 oz Grenadine
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a shaker, fill with ice and shake until the shaker is well frosted. Strain into a tall glass and garnish with a slice of pineapple and cherry.

drinks.name: Purple Nipple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice and shake well. Strain into shot glass and enjoy!

drinks.name: Californian Hurricane
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cups Dark rum
  • 2 cups Light rum
  • 1 cup Triple sec
  • 46 oz Pineapple juice
  • 32 oz Orange juice
  • 6 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: You can mix in either a punch bowl, or a pitcher. Mix all ingredients (alcohol first) together, then add only enough grenadine to turn it red. Add ice and serve in a highball glass.

drinks.name: Dr. Shocker
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Dr. Pepper
  • 1 oz Aftershock
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor Dr. Pepper into glass, add Aftershock. Stir once.

drinks.name: Tanyahtoo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Cream
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with ice.

drinks.name: Pat
drinks.ingredients:
• Fill Glass with Ice
  • 1 part 7-Up or Sprite
  • 1 part Ginger ale
  • 1 part Soda water
  • 1 part Sour mix
  • 1 part Tonic water
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour over ice and stir with a straw.

drinks.name: The Eclipse
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Vodka
  • 5 cl Cranberry juice
  • 2 1/2 cl Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just shake it well with ice and strain.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Screw
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 4-6 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass half with ice, add vodka, peach Schnapps, and then orange juice. Stir.

drinks.name: PB&J #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Frangelico 1st. Then add the grenadine.

drinks.name: Carbomb #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Whiskey
  • 1/2 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 pint Guinness stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine (proportions of 50/50) Bailiey's Irish Cream and irish wiskey into one shot glass. Drop the shot into a mug of guinness and chugg until empty.

drinks.name: Zimamazing
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Rum
  • 2 oz Tequila
  • 4 oz Triple sec
  • 4 oz Sour mix
  • 1 bottle Zima
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the first six ingredients without ice until frothy. Fill glass with ice and pour Zima and the contents of the shaker in a one-to-one ratio. Stir and serve. Makes about four drinks.

drinks.name: Martinet
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 - 3 oz Gin
  • 1 - 1 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 dash Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker full of ice. Stir or shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Queen Soda
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • Fill With Cream soda
  • 3-4 Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just stir

drinks.name: Eyes Wide Shut
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place ice in shaker and add all ingredients. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

drinks.name: Candy Bar
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Cream
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend Kahlua, creme de cacao, and Frangelico. Add cream. Serve with ice cubes in highball glass.

drinks.name: Cherry Lifesaver Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Bouzo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1 oz Ouzo
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in the bourbon, then pour in the ouzo.

drinks.name: Blonde Ron
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 4 oz 7-Up
  • Ice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just fill ice, then pour rum, 7up, and slash of pineapple.

drinks.name: Double Pucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Apple schnapps
  • 1 oz Watermelon schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ounce in same shot glass. Slam or sip and enjoy.

drinks.name: Waborita
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 2 oz Cointreau
  • 2 oz Lime juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker over ice combine the ingridients, and then pour into a salt rimmed martini glass and garnish with a slice of lime.

drinks.name: Irish Monk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Frangelico
  • 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • Hot chocolate
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liqueurs into a irish coffe cup. Fill with good quality hot chocolate. Add plenty of whipped cream.

drinks.name: Picon Whiskey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bourbon
  • 1 oz Amer Picon
  • 1 dash Sugar syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange twist.

drinks.name: Riley
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rum (Mt. Gay Barbados Eclipse)
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 dash Creme de Cassis
  • 1 dash Raspberry syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake first six ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Ass a dash of raspberry syrup. Garnish with a lime squeeze.

drinks.name: XYZ
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 3/4 oz Cointreau
  • 3/4 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

drinks.name: Sir Knight
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Cognac
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1/2 oz Yellow Chartreuse
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

drinks.name: Saurian Brandy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 cup grated Orange rind
  • 1 pint 100 proof Vodka
  • 1 cup Sugar
  • 2/3 cup grade 'A' Maple syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put orange rind in a half-pint jar with 1/4 cup vodka. Seal it and shake occasionally. Let it steep overnight. -- Pour sugar and 1 2/3 cups vodka into a 28 ounce bottle. Seal it and shake until all the sugar is dissolved, then add the maple syrup. -- Filter the orange extract through a fine handkerchief or coffee filter until it becomes clear. -- Add a tablespoon of the final extract to the vodka syrup mixture and mix well. If your orange peels are much more or less aromatic than average, adjust the quantity so that you have enough to hide the maple flavor, without having enough to make the liqueur bitter or recognizably orange flavored.

drinks.name: Mulled Madeira
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cups Madeira
  • 6 tblsp Honey
  • 2 tblsp Lemon juice
  • 8 3x1/2 inch Orange peel strips
  • 6 whole Cloves
  • 1 stick Cinnamon, broken in half
  • 1/2 cup Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine first 6 ingredients in a large saucepan and bring almost to simmer over medium heat. Reduce heat and cook for 10 minutes (do not simmer). Add Cointreau and stir until hot. Serve warm in heat proof glasses or mugs, leaving peel and spices in pan.

drinks.name: Lemonade #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 tblsp fresh Lemon juice
  • 1 1/2 tblsp fresh Lime juice
  • 2 tblsp superfine Sugar
  • 2 cups cold Water
  • 6 - 8 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour lemon and lime juice into a pitcher and add sugar. Stir until the sugar is dissolved. Add water and ice cubes. Stir.

drinks.name: Rock and Rye Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Rock and rye
  • 1/2 oz fresh Lime juice
  • Lemon soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vodka, Rock and Rye, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a ice filled collins glass. Top with lemon soda and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lime.

drinks.name: Italian Limoncello
drinks.ingredients:
• Zest of 15 fresh Lemon
  • 2 fifth 100 proof Vodka
  • 4 cups Sugar
  • 5 cups Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Wash the lemons with a vegetable brush and hot water to remove any reside of pesticides or wax. Carefully zest the lemons with a zester or vegetable peeler so there is no white pith on the peel. -- In a 1-gallon glass jar, add one fifth vodka and the lemon zest. Cover the jar and let sit at room temperature for at least 10 days, and up to 40 days in a cool dark place. -- In a large saucepan, combine the sugar and water and cook until thickened, appx. 5 to 7 minutes. Let the syrup cool before adding it to the limoncello mixture. Add the additional fifth of vodka. Allow to rest for another 10 to 40 days. -- After the rest period, strain and bottle, discarding the lemon zest. Keep in the freezer until ready to serve.

drinks.name: Lemon Lift
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Limoncello
  • 1/2 oz Grappa
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve chilled straight or on the rocks.

drinks.name: Sorrento CafÃ©
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Limoncello
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
  • Coffee
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Limoncello and Grand Marinier into coffee cup or glass. Fill with coffee and top with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Lemon Highlander
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Limoncello
  • 1 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 oz Drambuie
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into scotch glass over ice. Stir. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Pink Cello
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Limoncello
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into a tall glass over ice. Fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with wedge of lemon.

drinks.name: Lady Cello
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Limoncello
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
  • Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and pour into a sugar and Limoncello rimmed highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Cokello
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Limoncello
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • Coca-Cola
  • 1 wedge Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into tall glass over ice, fill with Coca-Cola and add a wedge of lemon.

drinks.name: Bloody Biker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 5 oz hot and spicy V8 juice
  • 1/4 tsp Worcestershire sauce (L&P)
  • 1/4 tsp Melinda's Habanero Pepper sauce
  • Juice of 1 wedge Lime
  • 1/4 tsp Olive juice (Mario)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake until well blended. Pour over ice in an old fashion glass.

drinks.name: V's With Sauce
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Vodka
  • 3/4 regular V8 juice
  • 2 tsp Worcestershire sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour V8 into glass. Add Vodka and stir. Add Worcestershire sauce and stir. Drink!

drinks.name: Real Pisser
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Tequila
  • 1/2 shot Mountain Dew
  • Sugar
  • Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In shot glass, pour 1/2 shot of Tequila, then 1/2 shot of Mountain Dew. Next, lick back of hand & sprinkle Sugar lightly onto it. Have Cherry ready on fork, laying on table. Lastly: lick sugar on hand, cover drink & slam on table, drink it fast, & eat cherry.

drinks.name: Caucasian
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 1/2 oz Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • Half-and-half
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes. Add desired amount of Half-and-Half (usually 1 oz. to 3 oz.)

drinks.name: Club Tropix
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 shot Triple sec
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part 7-Up
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1 piece Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Hurricane with ice, add malibu and blue curacao, and a splash triple sec. Fill remaining room with equal parts of pineapple juice and 7-up. Add a dash of grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and an umbrella.

drinks.name: Bloody Mary Jolly style
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 glass hot and spicy V8 juice
  • 1/2 glass Clamato juice
  • 1 pinch Horseradish
  • 1 dash Worcestershire sauce
  • 1 dash Tabasco sauce
  • 1 tsp Olive juice
  • 1 pinch Celery salt
  • 1 pinch Black pepper
  • 1 shot Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add together in a glass, and stir. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge, chunk of cheese and an olive.

drinks.name: Rainbow Brew
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 splashes Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour slowly in the order shown.

drinks.name: Kentucky Wildcat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1/2 oz Jim Beam
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • 2 oz Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix drink just like a Long Island iced tea. Lemon to garnish

drinks.name: Neon Voodoo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Apple juice
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 3 parts Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the vodka, apple juice, and mountain dew in a blender with about 6-8 ice cubes. Blend on high for about 10 seconds. Feel free to add more vodka if you want to get messed up really fast.

drinks.name: Presidential Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz El Presidente Brandy
  • 1 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1 1/2 oz Tequila (Hornitos)
  • Juice of 1 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredent into a large glass. Add ice and let sit while preparing drinking glass. Rim glass with lime and salt. Fill glass with ice and add a lime slice (for looks). Carefully pour contents of large glass into salted glass (careful not to disturb salt).

drinks.name: Blue Thrill
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Blue Curacao
  • 1 shot Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill one shot glass with the Blue Curacao. Fill another shot glass with the lemon juice, and serve. To drink, first put lemon shot in mouth, then put curacao shot in mouth, swish around then swallow. Remember, yellow before blue!!

drinks.name: Apple Pie Shot #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Irish Mist
  • 1/4 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Frangelico
  • 1/4 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients in order listed into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Avocado Daiquiri
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 medium Avocado
  • 3/4 oz fresh Lime juice
  • 1 cup crushed Ice
  • 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Crush ice in blender. Add rum, lime juice, and 1/4 medium avocado in blender. Blend until thoroughly mixed and smooth. Pour into glass and garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Winter Parker
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz Irish Mist
  • 1/2 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Maraschino cherry juice
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • Ice cubes
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients in a shaker. Shake with ice and strain into glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinks.name: Blue Light Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Apple schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake.

drinks.name: LÃ¤chler
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Southern Comfort
  • 2 cl Lemon juice
  • 6 cl Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Southern Comfort, then Lemon, Cola last

drinks.name: Bloody Coochie
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • 1 shot Sour mix
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 4 oz Fruit punch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass half full of ice Pour in vodka, triple sec, sour mix, OJ, and fruit punch Stir, or shake

drinks.name: Choad
drinks.ingredients:
• 15 ml Green Chartreuse
  • 15 ml Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient into shot glass. Do not attempt to layer drink, as this is pointless. Mix.

drinks.name: Cockroach
drinks.ingredients:
• 15 ml Kahlua
  • 15 ml Drambuie
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both ingredients into shot glass and mix. Sing a verse of La Cucaracha, or sing la-la-la-la-laaa lots. Bonus points if you can sing it in Spanish. Continue until you can no longer sing la-la-la-la-laaaaa.

drinks.name: Reality Twist
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass mostly full of Amaretto, then carefully pour Blue Curacao into the middle of the shot glass to create the blue 'twist' down the middle. Looks very cool if done right.

drinks.name: Guillotine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 3/4 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • Bailey's irish cream
  • Aftershock
drinks.mixinginstructions: Very easy. Fill shot glass about 4/5 of the way with Butterscotch schnapps. Float a layer of Bailey's Irish Cream on schnapps. Float a layer of Aftershock on the Bailey's.

drinks.name: Royal Peaches and Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1 1/2 oz Heavy cream
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream (Haagen Dazs)
  • 1 cup Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in blender. Blend until smooth and no chunks of ice are present. Pour into Mason Jar and garnish with a fresh slice of peach, if desired.

drinks.name: Cioccolato e cocco
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Milk
  • 3/4 oz Coconut rum
  • 3/4 oz Cream of coconut
  • 3/4 oz Heavy cream
  • 3/4 oz Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients thoroughly and pour in glass.

drinks.name: Roffsing
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Passoa
  • 4 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 splashes Lime juice
  • Carbonated Pear soft drink
  • Whipped cream
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill half a glass with ice cubes, add Passoa, vodka, lime and pear soft drink. Stir and top with cream. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Cinnamon Caramel Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Goldschlager
  • 1/2 glass chilled Apple cider
  • 1 shot Caramel liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour shot of Goldschlager in a cocktail glass, fill with 1/2 glass of chilled apple cider, add 1 shot of caramel liqeuer. Stir to mix.

drinks.name: Taste of Winter
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Citron
  • 1 cl Cherry Heering
  • 1 cl Galliano
  • Fill with Schweppes Russchian
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in in the glass. Plenty of ice cubes

drinks.name: Holy Doodle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Rum
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 4 parts Fresca
  • 2 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Creamsicle #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vanilla liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 1 pinch Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice, give it a few good shakes and strain into a cocktail glass with a sugar rim. More potent than the original. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Kameleon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/3 oz Pimm's No. 1
drinks.mixinginstructions: Firstly, build ingredients in the order given in a collins glass over ice. Layer the Pimms on top.

drinks.name: Multi-coloured Smurf
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Blueberry schnapps
  • 2 shots Apricot liqueur
  • 2 shots Vodka
  • 2 shots Mango syrup
  • 1 shot Orange juice
  • cube Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: First shake the orange juice, vodka, and Mango Syrup with the ice in a shaker. Float the apricot liquer, and blueberry schnapps in cocktail glass. Then float the shaken vodka and juices.

drinks.name: Side Kick
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Gin
  • 1 cl Cointreau
  • 1 cl Creme de Cacao
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients with lot's of ice.

drinks.name: FlÃ¼gel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cranberry vodka
  • 1 part Red Bull
  • 1 cube Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients. Pour over a single cube of ice in a small glass. Drink like a shot and throw the ice away!

drinks.name: Swamp Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Everclear
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Blue Curacao
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a normal glass, add everclear and then vodka. Nearly fill with orange juice, and then add blue curacao until the entire drink turns a nice shade of green.

drinks.name: Negroni - Zimbabwe Style
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Campari
  • 2 cl Gin
  • 1 cl red Sweet Vermouth (Martini Rosso)
  • Juice of 1/2 Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Coat rim of glass with sugar. Pour over plenty of ice.

drinks.name: Linfield's Spare Part Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 gal Vodka
  • 1/2 fifth Light rum
  • 3 gal Fruit punch
  • 1 L 7-Up
  • 1/2 gal Orange juice
  • 1/2 fifth Amaretto
  • 1/2 fifth Peach schnapps
  • Fill with Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Select a large container (at least 5 gallons) that can dispense the drink. Simply mix at will, add the ice on top, and go.

drinks.name: John Daly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • Fill half Lemonade
  • Fill half Iced tea
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Add absolute citron and triple sec. Fill glass with half lemonade/half iced tea. Garnish with lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Y2K shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 2 parts Yukon Jack
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chilled glass

drinks.name: Southern Harmony
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Jack Daniels
  • 3/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash 7-Up
  • 1 wedge Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: build over ice and serve with a smile

drinks.name: Kumoniwannalaya
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all three liquiors together, shake till mixed, then pour into cocktail galss.

drinks.name: Maurizio's Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 chopped Lime
  • 1 tsp cane Sugar
  • 1 tsp Ginger
  • 1/4 glass crushed Ice
  • 1/2 glass fresh Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chop the Lime, stir in with Cane Sugar and Ginger. Add the Crushed Ice and fill up with Apple Juice. Enjoy!

drinks.name: Chambrite
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 splash Vodka
  • Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Chambord and vodka into glass. Fill with sprite.

drinks.name: Raspberry Truffle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add liquers to glass. Fill with milk.

drinks.name: Red Eyed Hell
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz hot and spicy V8 juice
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together and serve.

drinks.name: A Goodnight Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Champagne
  • 1 splash Campari
  • 1 cube Sugar
  • 1 drop Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put one drop of Angostura Bitter on sugar cube and drop in flute. Add champagne and splash of Campari.

drinks.name: Coffee Nudge
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 3/4 oz Coffee liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Brandy
  • 6-8 oz hot Coffee
  • Top with Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all with coffee and top with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Yellow Bellied Sap Sucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Tonic water
  • 1/2 shot Lime juice
  • 3 drops Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put in the Lime Juice then add three drops of angostrua bitters. Shake it up, and add the tonic.

drinks.name: Jackbull
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Jack Daniels
  • 3 parts Red Bull
  • 2-3 drops Lime juice
  • 3 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the ingrediants together and serve in the glass with the ice.

drinks.name: Doucet devil
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/4 oz Creme de Banane
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put amaretto first, then the southern comfort and top this with the creme de banane.

drinks.name: Shellshock
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Beer
  • 6 oz Clamato juice
  • 1 pinch Salt
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
  • 1 pinch Black pepper
  • 1 oz Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour clamato juice over salt, pepper and lemon. Then add beer slowly as it will fizz up.

drinks.name: Blue Bohemian
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Becherovka
  • 3 parts Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 5 parts Orange juice
  • Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Garnish with an orange twist and a cherry.

drinks.name: Strawberry Starburst
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 2 oz Watermelon schnapps
  • 8 oz Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add schnapps and lemonade. Shake or stir. Garnish with a sugared strawberry if desired.

drinks.name: Tom's Rum Runner
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 3/4 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 3/4 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • Fill Ice
  • Float 1 oz Dark rum (Myer's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all liquids except dark rum into glass. Fill with ice and stir. Float dark rum on top and stir gently.

drinks.name: Absolut Tooch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill with ice and strain into shot glasses.

drinks.name: Clousseau
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Kahlua
  • 20 cl Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and kahlua in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Passionate Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice, strain into glass. Garnish with flag.

drinks.name: Abe's Tropical Night in Hell
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Vodka
  • 2 parts Banana liqueur
  • 2 parts Godiva liqueur
  • 1 part Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together and stir. Add ice. Then enjoy your night in Hell!

drinks.name: Dudley's Damnation
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 bottles Zima
  • 6 L Sprite
  • 2 cans Limeade
  • 1/2 gal Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a Good size cooler, any with a drain plug will do, and pour in a 12 pack of Zima. Then pour in your 6 liters of sprite along with the 2 cans of limeade. Then pour the 1/2 gallon of vodka in with the rest of it. Stir until the limeade has dissolved totaly, and there you go. Makes roughly 5 gallons.

drinks.name: Unicorn
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Brandy
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 1 dash Cointreau
  • 1 dash Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 parts Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake & strain into martini glass or champagne cup. Garnish with red straws & tacky plastic animals (preferably horses or mermaids) Add parasols & slice of orange if available.

drinks.name: Pouce Coupe Puddle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/4 oz White Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in order into shot glass.

drinks.name: Jealous Queen
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 dash Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together in glass.

drinks.name: Dungeon Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 5 oz Kool-Aid
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 Cherries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Fruit Punch Flavored Kool-Aid with schnapps, vodka, and orange juice. Once stirred, garnish with cherries.

drinks.name: Green Gulf
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 cl Gin
  • 20 cl Malibu rum
  • 10 cl Lemon juice
  • 2 dashes Green Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Add creme de mente.

drinks.name: Dog Biscuit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Root beer schnapps
  • 1 oz 7-Up
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients on the rocks. Stir.

drinks.name: The Postman
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 oz 151 proof rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill, shake, and pour over ice!

drinks.name: Berry Buster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Absolut Kurant
  • 1/2 shot Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 2 shots Cranberry juice
  • 3 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake vigorously for 20 sec. Strain and serve with one fresh ice cube.

drinks.name: Keith Jackson
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 1 part Sweet and sour
  • 1 part Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix, Chill, Strain, and Shoot!

drinks.name: Captain's Spiced Cider
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 10 oz Apple cider
  • Ice (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour (over ice is best, but not necessary) spiced rum into glass, fill with apple cider, stir.

drinks.name: Electric Marcucci
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Whiskey
  • 6 oz Sprite
  • 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in this order. The blue curacao self-mixing with the Sprite helps for show. Also not so keen in anything other than a clear container of course.

drinks.name: Milk Tooth
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Jack Daniels
  • 1/4 shot Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 shot Blackcurrant cordial
