  • 2 shots Sweet and sour
  • 1 shot Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in a shaker with cubed ice. Pour in Jack Daniels, Creme de Cacao, Blackcurrant and the sweet and sour. Shake well and strain into iced collins glass. Pour over the pineapple juice and then place shaker over glass and shake hard once up and down. Remove shaker and enjoy the froth on top!

drinks.name: Soul Taker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the the parts together and stir briefly.

drinks.name: Croc Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Parfait d'Amour
  • Sprite
  • Fresh Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors, fill nearly with Sprite and top off with lime juice.

drinks.name: Liquid Nitrogen
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Sambuca
  • 1 shot Ouzo
  • 4 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put equal measures of ingredients in a glass with ice. Stir if preferred

drinks.name: Pascal
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 ml Midori melon liqueur
  • 3 ml Licor 43
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour licor 43 and Midori in a glass and fill with milk and ice

drinks.name: Teresa's Dream Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Tequila Rose
  • Milk
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In shacker mix Kahlua, Tequila Rose, ice and milk. Shake and pour into frosted beer mug.

drinks.name: Brain Damage
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 1/2 part dry Gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all the ingredients over an ice-cube and stirr gently

drinks.name: Salty Balls
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • Fill with Grapefruit juice
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 pinch Salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Salt the rim of a Collins glass. Fill with ice, pour vodka along with the OJ. Fill the rest of the glass with grapefruit juice, and float midori melon liqueur on top.

drinks.name: Cafe' Joy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the three liquors and then add the coffee. Top with whip cream and toasted coconut.

drinks.name: Tubboocki
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Galliano
  • 1/2 oz Sambuca
  • 1/2 oz Wild Turkey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour and serve.

drinks.name: Smurf on the Rag
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Top with Whipped cream and
  • 4 or 5 drops Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Peach Schnaps and Blue Curacao in a shot glass and top with whipped cream and four or five drops of grenadine.

drinks.name: Canteloupe Dizzy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 pint Club soda
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour club soda into a parfait glass with ice. Pour vodka, melon liquer, and peach schnapps into a shaker and shake well. Strain into the club soda and stir. Garnish with cherry/orange/pineapple.

drinks.name: Pillow Mint
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Irish whiskey
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 splash Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the whiskey fist, then Kahlua. Finally, add a splash of the mint for flavor. Stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: Apricot Brandy Sour
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour apricot brandy. Add lemon juice. Fill in with orange juice and add ice cubes. Shake.

drinks.name: Blue Ed
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill 16oz glass with Ice. Add liquor. Fill with sour.

drinks.name: Alien Nipple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Butterscotch first, layer Irish cream on top, and pour in melon liqueur.

drinks.name: Italian Nut
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Raspberry Swirl
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 2 cups Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 jigger Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, amaretto and ice cream in blender. Pour into glass, and gently pour in jigger of chambord, being careful to swirl the chambord with straw or stirring stick to produce the desired effect.

drinks.name: Italian Stinger
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Brandy
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Old-fashioned glass with ice. Add Brandy and Galliano. Stir and garnish with wedge of lime.

drinks.name: Mountain Cider High
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Apple cider
  • 1 part Mountain Dew
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add the Vodka, then the cider and finaly add the Mountain Dew to taste.

drinks.name: Stinky Weasel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Tequila
  • 1/3 shot 151 proof rum
  • 1/3 shot Lemon juice
  • 2 dashes Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put Tequila into shot glass. Add 151 rum and Lemon Juice. Add sugar and stir slightly.

drinks.name: T-52
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Tequila Rose
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Green Alien
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 cl Lemon juice
  • 2 cl Lime juice cordial
  • Sprite
  • Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake midori, lemon juice and lime juice with ice, pour in a highball glass filled with ice. Fill up with sprite and soda according your taste. Garnish with lime wedge, add straw.

drinks.name: Alabama Slammer #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Sloe gin
  • Orange juice to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with a few ice cubes and pour into shot glasses.

drinks.name: Girlie Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 splash Dry Vermouth
  • 4 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz chilled Champagne
  • 1 dash Maraschino liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Coat the inside of a chilled cocktail glass with dry vermouth. In a mixing glass filled half way with crushed ice, combine vodka, champagne and maraschino liqueur. Stir and strain into the cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive and a maraschino cherry on a cocktail skewer.

drinks.name: Amarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Amaretto
  • 6 oz Margarita mix
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Amaretto and margarita mix over ice. Stir well and serve.

drinks.name: Patagonian Black Bush
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Genever
  • 1 tsp Fernet Branca
  • 1 dash Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour genever add Fernet Branca. Add a dash of sour mix.

drinks.name: Gangreen
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice. Strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Irish Highball
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Irish whiskey (Jameson's)
  • 4 oz Ginger ale (Canada Dry)
  • 2 chunks Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour whiskey over ice. Fill with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Summer Fling
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Blue Curacao and Bailey's in a shot glass over crushed ice. Mix to drink.

drinks.name: Green Coconut
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • Sour mix
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in shaker with ice and pour over ice.

drinks.name: Green Eyed Blonde
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer carefully in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Beach Bum
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Bacardi Limon
  • 1 part Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into a glass with ice. Stir.

drinks.name: Yoda
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Sour mix
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 parts Sour Apple Pucker
  • 1 splash Vodka
  • 1/2 handful Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Sour Mix and Blue Curacao together in a shaker, or if you don't have a shaker, two identical glasses will work if you are careful. Use more or less Blue Curacao depending on how green your Sour mix was to begin with. Once those are mixed into a nice green color, add the Midori and then the Pucker. Finally add the splash of Vodka, and mix a couple more times, then pour over ice.

drinks.name: Jackson 5
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Rum
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 dash Sour mix
  • Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the shots of Rum, Vodka, Amaretto over ice, add a dash of Sour Mix, then fill the rest with Cranberry Juice.

drinks.name: Watermelon Crawl #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Half fill glass with ice cubes. Add liquor and fill with Mountain Dew.

drinks.name: Kinda Tasty
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 4 parts Apple cider
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put in highball glass with ice and stir.

drinks.name: Army Green
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Goldschlager
  • 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into a shot glass. A chaser may be needed.

drinks.name: Bye Bye Bahamas
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz RedRum
  • 6 oz Hawaiian Punch
  • 1 dash Banana liqueur (99 Bananas)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add rum and punch. Stir. Float banana liqueur. Garnish with pineapple, orange slice and maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Red Hurricane
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice in glass. Stir.

drinks.name: Betty Paige
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz sweet or dry Vermouth
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 tsp Cherry liqueur
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the gin and vermouth like you would a normal martini. Pour into cocktail glass and add cherry liqueur. Garnish with cherry.

drinks.name: The Big Robowski
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Jack Daniels
  • 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 shot Goldschlager
  • 1 shot Dark rum (Appleton)
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 can Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Throw the five shots into a glass, and add the coke or pepsi. Some ice may be necessary.

drinks.name: Slammin' Sammy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • Apple-cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add amaretto and triple sec to ice-filled glass. Pour in orange juice and top off with apple-cranberry juice to taste. Stir.

drinks.name: Pink Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tequila Rose
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1/2 shot Vodka
  • Milk or cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquor in a glass with ice. Fill with milk or cream. Shake.

drinks.name: Nagel Nectar
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Butterscotch schnapps
  • 3 shots Milk
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine butterscotch schnapps and milk in glass of ice.

drinks.name: The Colombian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Kahlua
  • 1/3 oz Amaretto
  • 1/3 oz Cognac (Hennessy)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in a shot glass, or just pour straight into glass.

drinks.name: Alpine Sprite
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 12 oz Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour and stir. Add ice if desired.

drinks.name: The Bartman
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Rum
  • 12 oz Mountain Dew
  • 1 - 2 shot Blue Maui
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add rum and Mountain Dew to glass. Then add enough Maui to make the drink bright green.

drinks.name: The Jumpin' Black Jack
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 2 oz Blackberry brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, pour in both liquors, a quick stir, serve it up.

drinks.name: The Dangerous Dave
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Tequila
  • 8 oz Cream of coconut
  • 8 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Tequila, Cream of Coconut and Pineapple Juice in a blender. A quick blast to blend ingredients. Fill blender to top with ice. Blend on high speed until it's like a slurpy. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge.

drinks.name: Strawberry Stripper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 5 oz Orange juice
  • 1 drop Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass half full of ice. Add Schnapps and Juice. Add the Cream and stir.

drinks.name: Grapes of Wrath
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 oz Grape juice
  • 1 oz Coca-Cola
  • 1 splash of Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill collins glass with ice. Pour blue curacao and vodka into glass. Fill 3/4 of the glass with 1/2 cranberry juice and 1/2 grape juice. Then fill the rest of the glass with coke. Add a splash of pineapple at the top and then shake thourghly.

drinks.name: Blue Dragon
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and blue curacao with crushed ice, shake or stir, and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with orange slice and cherries.

drinks.name: Meiner
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Gin
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • 1 slice Orange
  • 20 ml Campari
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin and fill with orange juice, leaving room for the Campari. Stir a little bit. Add a slice of orange, then pour the Campari gently on the slice.

drinks.name: Voodoo Lady
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Cognac
  • 1/2 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour triple sec, cognac, and lemon juice over ice. Shake and strain. Pour into cocktail glass. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Slugger's Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot 151 proof rum
  • 12 oz Rock and rye
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Rock & Rye into a glass with ice. While the Rock & Rye is still fizzing, quickly add the 151 proof rum. Stir thouroughly before drinking. (Heavy concentrations of 151 have been known to cause a few sore throats.) Enjoy!!!

drinks.name: Gailwarning
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 6 cl Sprite
  • 1 cl Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka over ice in a collins glass. Add Sprite and top with lemon juice. Garnish with a lemon slice.

drinks.name: Chambord Kamikaze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 handful Ice
  • 1/4 wedge Lime
  • 1 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/4 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Muddle lime in a shaker. Add ice and all other ingredients. Shake vigorously. Strain into a glass.

drinks.name: Vesper #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin (Beefeater)
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 1/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 Lemon twist
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Gin, Vodka, and Vermouth over crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake gently until ice cold. Strain mixture over a martini glass. Run outside of lemon twist around the inside of the martini glass.

drinks.name: Mandarin Crush
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • Orange soda (Orange Crush)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice, add Absolut Mandarin, then fill with Orange Crush or some other orange soda.

drinks.name: Sabra
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 3/4 oz Godiva liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill together in the shaker and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Scotch Toddy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Scotch
  • 1 tblsp Honey, to taste
  • 1 bag Tea
  • Boiling hot Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a standard coffee mug put the scotch, honey and tea bag. Pour boiling hot water to fill mug. Steep for about one or two minutes. Then remove and dispose of tea bag.

drinks.name: Irish Cream, Home Made #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 Egg
  • 1 can sweetened Condensed milk (Eagle Brand)
  • 1 pint Whipping cream
  • 2 tblsp Chocolate syrup (Hersheys)
  • 2 drops Coconut syrup / extract
  • 1 cup Vodka
  • 1/2 cup Brandy or bourbon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until well stirred. Great in your favorite drink recipes or straight as a dessert. Drink contents within two weeks. Some ingredients are perishable. Store in an airtight container so you can shake it before each use. The chocolate settles at the bottom.

drinks.name: Crushed Orange
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Cointreau, sweetened lime juice, and Absolut Mandarin vodka over 8 ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. If available, garnish with a slice of fresh orange on glass rim. Serve immediately while it is still extremely cold.

drinks.name: Flying Squirrel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gold tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 dash Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass 1/3 full with crushed ice. Pour tequila and triple sec over ice. Add sour mix and lime juice. Fill the rest with orange juice.

drinks.name: Flying Teetsie Fly
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • Fill With Tonic water
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass 1/3 full with ice. Pour gin and triple sec over ice. Add sour mix. Pour to top with tonic water. Mix lightly.

drinks.name: Half & Half
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Harp Lager
  • 1 part Guinness stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a pint glass half full with Harp. Slowly fill the remainder of the glass with Guiness, pouring slowly over the back side of a spoon. It should layer nicely.

drinks.name: Slippery Eggs
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Eggnog (non-alcoholic)
  • 2 shots Bailey's irish cream (or Carolyans)
  • 2 shots Butterscotch schnapps
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingrediants well so the drink is the original color of the eggnog.

drinks.name: Liquid Rocher
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 3/4 oz Frangelico
  • 1 dash Vanilla liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to a cordial glass. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Strawberry Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 Strawberries
  • 3/4 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Dark rum (Bacardi 8)
  • 3/4 oz Cream
  • 3/4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 4 Ice cubes
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients to a blender. Blend for 1 minute or until drink is smooth. Pour into glass and serve immediately.

drinks.name: Florida Pina Colada
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 3/4 oz Coconut rum
  • 3/4 oz Dark rum
  • 2 splashes Orange juice
  • 3/4 oz Cream
  • 2 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend 1 minute or until smooth. Serve immediately.

drinks.name: Trogg's Nog
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • Fill with Eggnog
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquor over ice, fill with eggnog, and stir.

drinks.name: Mojambo Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 300 ml Vodka
  • 75 ml Coconut rum
  • 5 L Pineapple juice
  • 1 gal Sunny delight
  • 1 gal Fruit punch
  • 2 L White grape juice
  • 12 Apple
  • 12 Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all in a big tub. Chill with bags of ice. Add sugar to taste if desired.

drinks.name: B-69
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients to shaker with cubed ice, stir till shaker frosts, strain into rocks glass.

drinks.name: Brian Sinnott Family Punch - Leaded
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 package Cherry Kool-Aid
  • 1 package Strawberry Kool-Aid
  • 6 oz frozen Orange juice
  • 6 oz frozen Lemonade
  • 2 qt Water
  • 2 cups Sugar
  • 2 qt Ice
  • 1 1/2 cup Vodka
  • 1 1/2 cup White rum
  • 2 L Ginger ale
  • 1 bottle Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Kool-Aid, juice, lemonaid, sugar, and water. Add booze and ice cubes and let cool. Add champange and ginger ale before serving. Adjust punch to party mood with more vodka.

drinks.name: Brian Sinnott Family Punch - Unleaded
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 package Cherry Kool-Aid
  • 1 package Strawberry Kool-Aid
  • 6 oz frozen Orange juice
  • 6 oz frozen Lemonade
  • 2 cups Sugar
  • 2 qt Water
  • 2 qt Ice cubes
  • 2 L Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Kool-Aid, juice, lemonaid, sugar, and water. Add ice cubes and let cool. Add ginger ale before serving.

drinks.name: Vaughn Purple Haze
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Razzmatazz
  • Fill Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add vodka, and Razzmatazz liquor. Fill rest of glass with cranberry juice. Mix it!

drinks.name: Dirk Diggler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • Fill Root beer (Thomas Kemper)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add JÃ¤germeister, and fill rest of glass with Thomas Kemper Root beer. Mix and enjoy!

drinks.name: Hakkespett
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Cointreau
  • 5 cl Green Chartreuse
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Cointreau and Chartreuse in the glass. Ignite with a match, lick the palm of your hand and cover the glass with it. Shake it a little bit after the glass has fastened itself. Remove your hand slowly while inhaling the air inside, shot the entire contents, put two fingers in your mouth, inhale sharply and deeply, and then try to say: 'Hakkespett!' (In English: 'Woodpecker!') Good luck!

drinks.name: Conga Line
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Mandarine Napoleon
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto di Saranno
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane (Bols)
  • 1 oz Half-and-half
  • 1 dash Grenadine (Tavern)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake.

drinks.name: Orange Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Mandarine Napoleon
  • 1/2 oz Truffles Chocolate liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles.

drinks.name: La Cafe
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Coffee Vodka (Stolichnya)
  • 3/4 oz Royale Chocolate liqueur (Marie Brizard)
  • 3/4 oz Half-and-half
  • 1/4 oz Sugar syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

drinks.name: Czech Collaborator
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/2 oz Becherovka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix both liquors well, and pour into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Strawberry Blonde
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Vodka (Absolut)
  • 60 ml Cherry brandy (Seagrams)
  • Fill with Cola
  • Top with 1 dash Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir gently with a swizzle stick before serving.

drinks.name: Chill Out Shock (C.O.S)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Butterscotch schnapps (Buttershots)
  • 1 part hot Espresso
drinks.mixinginstructions: First pour the chilled schnapps and than carefully layer the hot espresso on top of it. Insert a straw into the glass and place it on the connection point between the two layers and drink it from there.

drinks.name: Red Melon
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Watermelon schnapps
  • 2 cl Peach schnapps
  • 2 cl Vodka
  • 10 cl Sprite
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ppour vodka, melon and peach schnapps over ice. Top with the sprite, stir well, add 1 dash of the grenadine and serve. Garnish with a slice of lemon (or lime), or a piece of melon.

drinks.name: Sweet Solution
drinks.ingredients:
• 5-10 cubes Ice
  • 1-2 shot Tequila
  • Fill with raspberry Lemonade
  • 3-6 tblsp frozen Orange juice concentrate
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a tall glass or cup with ice cubes, about 1/3 of the way full. Add the shots of tequila, adding more or less depending on the size of the cup. Then fill up most of the cup with raspberry lemonade, and add the frozen orange juice concentrate. Mix it well with a spoon until everything is well blended.

drinks.name: Rip Griffin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Peppermint schnapps
  • Orange juice
  • 1 Cherry
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in glass, add peppermint schapps, fill with orange juice, stir, add cherry.

drinks.name: Whistling Gypsy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tia maria
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Vodka (Stolichnaya)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Tia Maria, Bailey's Irish Cream, Vodka (Stolichnaya) in that order in a doubleshot glass(3oz).

drinks.name: Sweet Surrender
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Peach brandy
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start by rubbing an orange slice over the top of your champagne flute and dip it in sugar. Then, shake the peach brandy and orange juice with ice and strain. Pour into the sugar rimmed flute and fill with chilled champagne.

drinks.name: Baltic Murder Mystery
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Creme de Cassis
  • 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and creme de cassis in cocktail glass and fill with 7-up. If it is too sweet, try soda water. A slice of lemon compliments the drink quite nicely.

drinks.name: Jack Voigt
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1/4 shot Amaretto
  • 1/4 shot Creme de Banane
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put in any order in shot glass, preferably Captain first.

drinks.name: Tequila Twilight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tequila
  • 2 parts Cranberry juice
  • 1 shot Grape juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass 1/3 full of tequila and then the rest with the cranberry juice, leaving enough room for the shot of grape juice.

drinks.name: PatatÃºs
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 jigger Amaretto
  • 1/2 jigger Curacao
  • 2 jiggers AÃ±ejo rum
  • 6 oz Orange juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend Amaretto, Rum and Curacao then pour in a glass with ice. Add orange juice, then splash with grenadine.

drinks.name: Beakers Blue
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 1 splash Sprite
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice cubes, stir, and garnish with cheery.

drinks.name: Irish Cup O' Joe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Chocolate syrup or to taste
  • Fill with Coffee
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Baileys and chocolate syrup in coffee mug. Fill with hot coffee, stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: Duke's Nightmare
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 2 oz Jose Cuervo
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice and pour into shot glasses. The colder the shot the smoother it goes down. A dash of 7-up or sprite may be added to extend the shot for more than three.

drinks.name: Lemonade Lush
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Lemon juice
  • 1 part Sweet and sour
  • 1 part Tequila
  • 1 part Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in a glass filled with ice and enjoy.

drinks.name: Hyper-Active Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Caramel
  • 1 shot Apple schnapps
  • 2 shots Espresso
  • 1 shot steamed Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: In Irish coffee mug pour chilled caramel, then slowly pour one shot of chilled apple shnapps over caramel. Slowly add steamed milk, pour espresso through steamed milk exceedingly slowly, top with whip cream or foam. It should come out to be a 4 layer happily alcoholic Latte.

drinks.name: Crooked Golf Cart
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 parts Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 splash Rum
  • 2 slices Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass to top with ice. Pour Cranberry juice to about the halfway point. Then, pour in amaretto and continue to fill glass to top with cranberry juice. Throw a splash of rum in at the top and stir lightly. Make sure and drink over the lime, it adds an awesome flavor!

drinks.name: Creamy Crispy Crunch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Frangelico
  • 4 oz Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice (drink should be a bit foamy). Pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Green Beaver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: layer in a shotglass.

drinks.name: Cinco de Rob-o
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 8 oz Ginger ale
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with a pint glass filled 3/4 with ice. Add the tequila, triple sec, and sweet and sour. The glass should be about 1/2 full. Add the ginger ale, and stir well.

drinks.name: Fox Poison
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • 2 cl Lime juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Begin with Vodka, then Blue Curacao. After that, add the Lime liqueur. Mix in the Grenadine. Stir gently. Fill up with Sprite and put in some ice cubes.

drinks.name: Black Rose Bacardi
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 shot Bacardi Blanco Rum
  • 2 shots Coca-Cola
  • 2 shots Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or stir, pour it into a cocktail glass, add some crushed ice and serve.

drinks.name: Passoa Sweet Dreams
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Passoa
  • 1 oz 151 proof rum (Don Q)
  • 1 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake.

drinks.name: Cran-Razz
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Orange vodka
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place ice cubes in glass. Add cranberry juice, then orange vodka.

drinks.name: Irish Griep
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add blue curacao and sour mix. Top off with cola. Stir until a greenish/blue mixture is obtained.

drinks.name: Chocolate Valentine
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • 3/4 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Cherry juice
  • 1 splash Cream
  • 1 splash Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Captain Climer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Spiced rum
  • 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • Fill with Root beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir well.

drinks.name: Mussolini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Goldschlager
  • 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Sambuca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and pour into shot glass(es).

drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Sambuca
  • 1 part Jack Daniels
  • 1 part Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add each ingredient one by one to shot glass, and enjoy!

drinks.name: Raspberry Trouffle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, add Amaretto, and balance with Cream. Shake. Serve with Straw. Garnish with Cherry

drinks.name: Southern Frost
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 oz Ginger ale
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together over ice.

drinks.name: Flyin' Hawaiian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 oz Sprite
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Midori, rum, and pineapple juice into shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into glass over ice. Pour in Sprite and stir lightly.

drinks.name: Seattle Smog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 shot Peachtree schnapps
  • 1 shot Blue Curacao
  • 2/3 Cranberry juice
  • 1/3 Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour shots into mason jar filled with ice. Fill 2/3 of remaining with cranberry juice and top with orange juice. Stir.

drinks.name: Irish Cactus
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Irish cream
  • 1 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Irish Cream and Tequila over ice and stir.

drinks.name: Hawaiian Volcano
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Sloe gin
  • 2 oz Grand Marnier
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glasses.

drinks.name: Nicolalas
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Absolut Mandrin
  • 2 cl Passoa
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Absolut Mandrin with Passoa in a highball glass. Put ice in the glass and fill it up with orange juice

drinks.name: Mexican Cherry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Cherry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Winter Breeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Vanilla schnapps
  • 1 oz Irish cream (Ryan's)
  • Fill with Milk (1% or 2%)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the three shots of liquor, Vanilla Schnapps, Creme de Cacao, and Irish Creme, into the mug. Fill the rest of the glass with milk. Stir the milk and liquors in the glass and serve.

drinks.name: The Graduate
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake over ice, strain.

drinks.name: Ash Blonde
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Lillet
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1 splash Sweet Vermouth
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake lillet and cointreau with ice. Strain into cocktail glass. Add splash of vermouth for color.

drinks.name: Nolan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the three ingredients, and mix gently.

drinks.name: Santa Fe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Tequila (Cuervo or Sauza)
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a highball or tall glass full of ice, pour a full shot of your favorite Tequila. Fill the glass almost to the top with 7-Up Add Triple Sec, and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Rum Runner #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 7/8 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 7/8 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Black rum
  • 1/2 oz 151 proof rum
  • 5/8 oz Grenadine
  • 1 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Freeze in blender and serve in 12 Oz. glass.

drinks.name: Captain Morgan's Steamy Applecolada Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Apple cider
  • 1/2 oz Captain Morgan's Spiced rum
  • 1/2 oz Coconut rum (Parrot Bay)
  • 1/2 oz Sour Apple Pucker
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with hot or steamed apple cider. Add equal parts apple schnapps, spiced rum and coconut rum. Stir.

drinks.name: Watercolour
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 2 oz Raspberry schnapps
  • Fill with to taste Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix liquors together and add pineapple juice. Garnish with a cherry or a chunk of pineapple.

drinks.name: Mean Green Machine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 oz Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice and strain into glass.

drinks.name: The Original Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 0.7 oz Cointreau
  • 0.35 oz Lemon juice
  • 1.4 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish: lime or lemon slice

drinks.name: Black Cactus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila (Sauza)
  • 1 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 1 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Tequila and blackberry brandy together. Add club soda. Drink like a shooter.

drinks.name: Black Wolf
drinks.ingredients:
• 15 ml Black Sambuca
  • 15 ml Green Chartreuse
  • 4 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add chartreuse first and then sambuca. Top with tabasco.

drinks.name: Jack Rose
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Applejack
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with crushed ice and strain.

drinks.name: Nalgaa
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Campari
  • 2 tblsp Cherry liqueur
  • Fill with 7-Up or Sprite
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Get a glass with 4 ice cubes, pour cherry liqueur into the glass, followed by the Campari. Add 7-Up and serve.

drinks.name: Junior Mint
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz White Creme de Menthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients with ice, shake, and strain into old fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Sunshine Smile
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • Fill with Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Vodka and Orange Juice. Top glass with Champagne. Garnish with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Cinnamon Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Goldschlager
  • 4 parts vanilla Cream soda (A&W)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Lemon Celebration
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 3 oz Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake gently with ice (the Champangne will fizz). Strain into a martini glass.

drinks.name: Chocolate-Mint Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, then pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with chocolate stick and mint sprig.

drinks.name: Georgia Peach Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • Fill with Sweet and sour
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill collins glass with ice, add Vodka, Gin, and Rum. Fill with Sweet and Sour. Pour Peach Schnapps on top.

drinks.name: Christmas Pudding
drinks.ingredients:
• 100 ml Southern Comfort
  • 100 ml Drambuie
  • 500 ml Guinness stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a 6 2/3 Paris Goblet add Southern Comfort and then Drambuie. Top up with Draught Guinness

drinks.name: Blue Knickers
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Blue Curacao
  • 1 shot Galliano
  • Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the Vodka, Blue Curacao, Galliano and pineapple juice in a shaker. Pour into glass and add a layer of cream to the top. Serve with a straw and an orange wedge. Drink is to be sipped through the straw.

drinks.name: Rugburn
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Irish cream
  • 4 cl Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • 4 cl Irish whiskey (Bushmill's)
  • cracked or crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir or shake ingredients together: serve with ice in old-fashioned glass or strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: The Dark Side
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz 151 proof rum (Bacardi)
  • 3/4 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 3/4 oz Kahlua
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • Chocolate syrup (to taste)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in mixer, pour into highball glass. Optional - Frost glass with chocolate syrup before pouring.

drinks.name: Charmer
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Scotch
  • 1 1/2 cl Blue Curacao
  • 1 dash Dry Vermouth (Martini)
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with crushed ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Rod on the Rocks
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 cup Peach schnapps (Archers)
  • 1/2 cup Apple cider (Redds)
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour peach schnapps over ice. Fill with apple cider. Stir lightly.

drinks.name: Jagerbeer Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 bottle Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the beer into a glass, then drop the shot of JÃ¤germeister into it (shot glass optional)

drinks.name: Golden Delicious
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup sparkling Apple cider
  • 1 shot Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour sparkling apple cider into a glass. Pour the shot of Goldschlager. Stir.

drinks.name: Mike's Chocolate Pudding
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish cream
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 3 oz Coca-Cola
  • 2 splashes Half-and-half
  • 1 shot Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: First add ice to 3/4 full. Add Kahlua and Irish Cream. Then add coke. Add cream. Stir together. Top off with small shot of whip cream.

drinks.name: Mike's Eggnog Wonderful
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1/4 oz Kahlua
  • 5 oz Eggnog
  • 1 shot Whipped cream
  • 2 pinches Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Eggnog in glass. Stir in Amaretto. Float Kahlua on top. Add small shot of whipped cream, then sprinkle nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Nuts 'n Holly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Drambuie
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Frangelico
  • 1 part Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over Ice in mixing glass, shake and serve straight up.

drinks.name: Vampire
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker over ice. Serve as shots in a highball (rocks) glass.

drinks.name: Rythym & Blues
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Blueberry schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Creeping Death
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 shots Vodka
  • 8 shots extra Dry Vermouth (Martini)
  • 1 pinch Salt
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well.

drinks.name: Dignified Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cubes Ice
  • 2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 4 oz Iced tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use Citron or other Citrus flavored vodka. Mix in highball glass and enjoy.

drinks.name: Daylon's Bedtime
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli Vanil)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 1/2 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vanilla vodka into ice filled glass. Add Triple Sec. Add Soda to taste. Mix with straw.

drinks.name: Frisky Witch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Black Sambuca
  • 1 part Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into glass, stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: Irish Float
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 glass Coca-Cola
  • 1 shot Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Float irish cream on top of the cola.

drinks.name: Kahlua Twist
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Tequila
  • Fill with Chocolate milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Tequila, and Kahlua. Fill the rest with chocolate milk. Stir well.

drinks.name: Northern Europe Mongrel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 splash Beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer vodka and irish cream in a shot glass. Pour beer to fill.

drinks.name: Midori Jello Shots
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 large boxes lime Jello
  • 1 packet unflavored Gelatin (Knox)
  • 1 fifth Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 cup Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Warm the bottle of Midori so that it is hot to the touch, by first loosening the cap half way, then set the entire bottle in a saucepan half full of water on high heat. Meanwhile, bring 1 cup of water to a rolling boil then stir in the Jello and Gelatin until dissolved. Stir in hot Midori. Pour mixture into a flat bottom pan and slice into cubes when cooled, or place in small cups.

drinks.name: Five Star General
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just put all of them in a shot glass, and put it down.

drinks.name: Kona Village Mai Tai
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 cup Pineapple juice
  • 6 tblsp Sweet and sour
  • 3 tblsp Light rum
  • 3 tblsp Gold rum
  • 3 tblsp Orange Curacao
  • 2 tblsp Dark rum
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix first 6 ingredients in pitcher. Fill glasses with ice. Pour rum mixture over. Garnish with pineapple wedges, if desired.

drinks.name: Southern Hospitality
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Southern Comfort
  • 2 cups Apple cider
  • 2 sticks Cinnamon
  • 1 tblsp Vanilla extract
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients into a sauce pan. Warm mixture on stove, until all flavors have steeped together (about 5 min.). Do not let it boil! Remove cinnamon sticks. Serve while still hot.

drinks.name: Carolina Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 4 oz Cream of coconut
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 Peach in chunks
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
  • 1/2 tblsp Sugar
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with two cups of ice, until all chunks of peach and ice are gone.

drinks.name: 3rd Wheel
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts AlizÃ©
  • 1 part Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill with ice and pour in glass

drinks.name: The Head
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place ice in glass to rim. Add alcohol followed by cranberry juice, stir and serve.

drinks.name: Tropical Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Amaretto into a chilled glass, then add Malibu Rum. Stir and serve. The ingredients should be will chilled before use.

drinks.name: Johnny K8
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Gin
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • Tonic water
  • 1/2 shot Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour first 3 ingredients in shaker and shake. Pour over ice and top up with tonic. Then layer with blue curacao.

drinks.name: Mistolin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 part Vodka
  • 3 parts Orange juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass half-way with ice. Pour the Vodka, add the orange juice and finally pour the cranberry juice. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Chocolate Martini #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli Vanil)
  • 1 oz Godiva liqueur
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vanilla vodka and chocolate liqueur in shaker filled with ice. Strain into either wine glass or martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: 5 Pm
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Dark rum
  • 1 cl Cointreau
  • Fill with hot Tea
  • 2 drops Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rum and Cointreau into tea cup, fill with English hot tea and top with milk.

drinks.name: African Lullaby
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Amarula Cream
  • 1 cl Coconut milk
  • 8 cl Milk
  • 2 dashes Nutmeg
  • 1 cup Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in blender with one cup crushed ice. Pour into glass and garnish with red Cherry.

drinks.name: Spic
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 2 oz Sprite
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in all ingredients then mix completely so that the drink turns a red color. Add more Grenadine for a sweeter, thicker taste.

drinks.name: Dell Boy
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Jack Daniels
  • 2 cl Cointreau
  • 2 cl Sweet and sour
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients except Sprite. Pour into Highball glass over ice cubes and fill with Sprite. Garnish with red Cherry and Lime wheel.

drinks.name: Ultra-Marine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Blue Curacao
  • Top up Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Blue curacao then top up with Champagne and garnish with a grape or strawberry.

drinks.name: Blavod Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Blavod vodka
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice and strain into martini glass. Add cherry.

drinks.name: Russian Cream
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • 1 oz Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and kahlua into old-fashioned glass over ice. Stir. Add irish cream and light cream.

drinks.name: The Mummy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 tblsp Lemon juice
  • Fill with Club soda
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, triple sec, and lemon juice in an old fashioned glass half filled with ice. Top off with club soda. Stir.

drinks.name: Daiquiri #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Light rum
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ingrediants should be shaken over shaved ice then strained into an Old Fashioned glass with ice.

drinks.name: Neon Nightmare
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 3 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients into mixing tin full of ice. Shake vigorously and strain into glass. Garnish with an Orange flag.

drinks.name: Cruz Azul (Blue Cross)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Rumple Minze
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Orange Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 4-6 oz Orange juice
  • 1 splash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine tequila, triple sec, and orange juice over ice, and stir. Top it off with a splash of lime juice or sour mix.

drinks.name: Nerds
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put a few ice cubes in the highball glass, add Midori and Blue Curacao then fill up the rest of the glass with lemonade.

drinks.name: Super Smoothy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 Banana
  • 2 cups Strawberries
  • 2 large chunks Pineapple
  • 4 cups Ice
  • 2 shots Spiced rum (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chunk up the two bananas and put them in the bottom of a blender. Place the two large wedges of pineapple, strawberries and ice on top. Add rum if desired. Puree until smooth (a little water or fruit juice might be required). Pour into glass and serve immediately.

drinks.name: Toby's Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish whiskey (Jameson's)
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 4 oz Coffee
  • 1 tblsp Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Jameson and Kahlua into a coffe mug, top off with hot fresh brewed coffee, finish with a tablespoon of fresh whipped cream.

drinks.name: Butterballs
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/2 shot Coffee liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a double shot glass. Pour the Butterscotch Schnapps first, then the coffee liqueur.

drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Tonic water
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • 2 cubes Ice
  • 1 slice Pineapple
  • Fill With Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine blue curacao, vodka, tonic water, and splash of lime juice. Stir. Fill with sprite. Stir. Add pineapple slice and ice cubes.

drinks.name: Red Hot Lover
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 2 shots Peach schnapps
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 75 ml Strawberry juice
  • 75 ml Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients for couple of seconds. Pour into ice filled hurricane glass.

drinks.name: Creamy Grasshopper
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 3/4 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend until smooth. Drink should have a thick, shake-like consistency.

drinks.name: Ginger Swing
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blue Curacao (Bols)
  • Fill with Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour curacao over ice in a highball glass, then fill the rest of the way up with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Pierced Navel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 6 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice, stir.

drinks.name: The Sweating Monk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Sour mix
  • 1/4 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 splash Vermouth
  • 1 splash Amaretto or grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake it, pour it over ice, and serve.

drinks.name: The Valentine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/3 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Godiva liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in all ingredients and stir

drinks.name: Lennart #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Pear brandy (Poire au cognac)
  • Fill with Ginger ale
  • Ice cubes
  • 1 slice Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour pear brandy over ice in glass. Fill with ginger ale. Add a slice f lime.

drinks.name: The Berserker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 glass Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour shot of Amaretto into glass and fill with pineapple juice. Mixing is optional.

drinks.name: Electric Smurf
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • Sprite
  • Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put three ice cubes in glass then add Malibu and Blue Curacao. Fill glass half with sprite half with Pineapple Juice. Stir and Serve.

drinks.name: The Bianca Pop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Coconut rum
  • 1 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour coconut rum first then add amaretto.

drinks.name: Campesina
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 2 tsp Sugar
  • 1 Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Cut the the lime into 8 wedges and place in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with granulated white sugar and crush together. Fill with crushed ice, add tequila. Serve with two small straws.

drinks.name: Greenland
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • 1 cl Amaretto
  • 2 dashes Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake over ice, strain into a highball glass. Top with fresh orange juice. Garnish with orange, cherry, mint leaf and straws.

drinks.name: Cable Guide
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Mango juice
  • 2 parts Fresca
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a pitcher or individually: Pour 1 part vodka, 1 part mango juice, and top with 2 parts Fresca. Pour over ice in a tall/large glass.

drinks.name: Mexican Killer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Gold tequila
  • 1/2 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 1 splash Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve chilled.

drinks.name: Penguin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 oz Lemon-lime mix
  • Fill with Sprite
  • Float 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Built, lots of ice!

drinks.name: Frozen Girl Scout
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 splash Milk
  • 1 1/2 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 3 scoops Chocolate ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend. Add more or less milk to get a shake consistancy.

drinks.name: LeFreak
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Butterscotch schnapps (Buttershots)
  • 1 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • Milk or Half-and-Half
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill 1/2 glass with ice, add both liquors. Fill glass with milk or half-and-half.

drinks.name: Candy Apple #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • Fill with Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Amaretto and Butterscotch in a glass with ice. Fill with apple juice.

drinks.name: Homewrecker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 oz Tequila
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients together and pour over cracked ice

drinks.name: Orange Bliss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Orange vodka (Stoli)
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
  • 3 1/2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into old-fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Troutie
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 - 2 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka first, add grapefruit juice, and fill with about 6 ounces of 7-up or Sprite.

drinks.name: Sugar Kick
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
  • 1 tblsp Triple sec syrup (Monin)
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice, shake well. serve with cherry, lemon (dipped in sugar), and straw.

drinks.name: American Pie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/3 Sweet and sour
  • 2/3 7-Up
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour grenadine in glass. Add straw and ice carefully. Fill 1/3 of glass with sweet and sour. Add Vodka. Fill glass almost to the rim with 7-up. Add Blue Curacao. Do not stir.

drinks.name: Frangeilico Float
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Ice-cream
  • 1 1/4 oz Frangelico
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/4 cup Milk
  • 1 oz Chocolate syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve in a highball glass and garnish with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Buttery Nipple with a Cherry Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 tsp Cherry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer Bailey's on top of Butterscotch. Then you take the cherry liqueur along with a cherry and place the cherry on top of the spoon, while pouring the cherry liquer into the shot.

drinks.name: Strawberry Fields
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz pureed Strawberries (fresh)
  • 3 oz Gold rum
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend strawberries into 4 oz puree, add 2 oz of rum (and some sugar if you want to) and blend for a couple of second. Pour into sugar rimmed glass. Mix the orange juice and 1 oz of rum, and gently layer on top in glass.

drinks.name: Kahlua Butterball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • Butterscotch schnapps
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with Kahlua, add Butherscotch Schnapps to taste, fill glass with milk

drinks.name: Green Ferrit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 pint Cider
  • 1 shot Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: 3/4 fill the pint glass with cider. Add the Blue Curacao and fill the glass with cider.

drinks.name: El Floridita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 dash white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

drinks.name: Hemingway Daiquiri
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/4 oz Maraschino liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Lime juice
  • 1/4 oz Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: White Russian #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Vodka
  • 1 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Cream or milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve over ice cubes.

drinks.name: Blueberry Daiquiri
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Blueberry schnapps or liqueur
  • 1 cl White rum
  • 1 cl Lime juice
  • 2 cl Sugar syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with crushed ice.

drinks.name: Masala Chai #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 cup Water
  • 1 stick Cinnamon (about 1')
  • 8 pods Cardamom
  • 8 whole Cloves
  • 2/3 cup Milk
  • Sugar to taste
  • 3 tsp Tea leaves
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put water in a saucepan. Add the cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves and bring to a boil. Cover, turn heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the milk and sugar and bring to simmer again. Throw in the tea leaves, cover, and turn off the heat. After 2 minutes, strain the tea into two cups and serve immediately.

drinks.name: Fish House Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 36 oz Dark rum
  • 24 oz Lemon juice
  • 25 oz Brandy
  • 4 oz Peach brandy
  • 3/4 lb superfine Sugar
  • 40 oz Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve sugar in some of the water. Add juice and the rest of the water, and stir. Add liquor 2-3 hours before serving, and refridgerate. Serve in a punch bowl with ice.

drinks.name: Frisco
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rye whiskey
  • 1/4 oz Benedictine
  • 3/4 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

drinks.name: Maiden's Prayer #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Light rum
  • 3/4 oz Cointreau
  • 3/4 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with crushed ice and strain into a chilled wine or cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

drinks.name: Milk Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Bourbon
  • 3 oz Milk
  • 1/2 tsp Dark rum
  • 1 tblsp Sugar syrup
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake liquor and milk with cracked ice and strain into a chilled highball glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top

drinks.name: Petit Zinc
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry or a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Picon Limon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amer Picon
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cassis
  • 1/2 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Fill with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir Amer Picon, creme de cassis and lime juice with cracked ice and strain into a large chilled wine glass (should hold 16 ounces). Fill with soda water and garnish with a twist of lemon.

drinks.name: Far East
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Shochu
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part fresh Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain in Old-fashion glasses. Serve on the rocks with a Cocktail cherry on a stick and two straws. Decorate with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Skinhead Paramedic
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Irish whiskey
  • 1 oz Shochu
  • 1 oz Cognac
  • Fill with Lemon-lime soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients in a collins glass. Do not stir. Garnish with a lime wedge or an ear of baby corn.

drinks.name: The Drink Without a Name
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Cointreau
  • 1/8 oz Yellow Chartreuse
  • Twist of Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with cracked ice ans strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.

drinks.name: Duncan MacLeod
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Shochu
  • 2 shots Scotch
  • 3 tblsp Sugar
  • Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the alcohols in a Beer mug, and add the coke to fill. Mix gently, serve cold.

drinks.name: Boku's Blend
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 package Orange-Pineapple Kool-Aid
  • 8 oz lemon Shochu
  • 4 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 - 2 cup Sugar
  • 3 cups Ice
  • 6 oz Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in the blender and blend until slushy. Serve very cold.

drinks.name: Blackula
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blavod vodka
  • 6 oz Longbranch Bloody mary mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Blavod Vodka in hurricane glass with ice. Pour in Bloody Mary mix. Add jalepeno pickle for spicy taste

drinks.name: Y2K Shot #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix shot over ice in a mixing glass. Strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Lusty Lisa
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 2 parts Peach schnapps
  • 2 parts Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together in a shaker and pour!

drinks.name: Hunter Mountain
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3/4 oz Frangelico
  • 2 oz Vodka (Absolute or Belvedere)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Bailey's and Frangelico over ice and stir. Then add vodka and stir again. Then serve.

drinks.name: Shag by the shore
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • Float Blavod vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build the midori and orange into the collins glass, filled with ice, then pour peach schnapps and cranberry into mixing tin and shake with ice. Strain into glass so it floats above orange & midori. Float Blavod vodka on top.

drinks.name: Chocolate Covered Cherries
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer carefully using the back of a spoon. Grenadine first, then Kahlua and then Bailey's.

drinks.name: Lime Chu-Hai
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Shochu
  • 1 oz Lime juice cordial
  • Fill with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the shochu and lime cordial over ice. Stir, and fill the glass with soda water.

drinks.name: A Dixon Thing
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Sloe Gin and Amaretto in glass.

drinks.name: Crackhouse
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Blackberry schnapps (Blackhaus)
  • 1/2 shot Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put both ingredients in a shaker and shake over ice.

drinks.name: Chambord Royale
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 dash Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Should be shaked over ice. Garnished with a lemon. More pineapple than cranberry juice.

drinks.name: Apricot Breeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 3 oz Apricot nectar (Kerns)
  • Fill with Tonic water
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill hurricane glass with ice. Add Vodka and apricot nectar to glass then fill with tonic. Stir.

drinks.name: Schwimmer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Sambuca
  • 1/4 oz Kahlua
  • 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/8 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/8 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together in mixer, chill, then serve in shot glass

drinks.name: Splurge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 glass Surge
  • 1/2 shot Lemon juice
  • 1-2 tblsp Sugar
  • 1-2 shot Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with glass of soda then add other ingredients and stir.

drinks.name: Big Booty Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Milk
  • 1/2 tsp Vanilla extract
  • 3/4 cup Chocolate ice-cream
  • 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend.

drinks.name: Green Voodoo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 splash Triple sec
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
  • 1 shot Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients and ice to mixing tin. Shake 3 to 5 times and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Banana Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli Vanil)
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • Ice
  • Fill with Half-and-half or heavy cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Cocktail glass with ice. Shake Stoli Vanil, Creme de Banane, and half & half. Pour over ice.

drinks.name: Bird of Paradise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingrediants, stir, and serve.

drinks.name: Coconut Pie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • Fill with very cold Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve with or without ice.

drinks.name: Haus Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Blackberry schnapps
  • 1/3 glass Cranberry juice
  • Fill with Grape juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ice is optional, but the drink is preferrably served cold. Garnish with Cherry.

drinks.name: The Usual
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Ketel One Vodka
  • 1 part Vya Sweet Vermouth
  • 2 cubes Ice
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Guapo
drinks.ingredients:
• 5-6 oz Coffee
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 2 splashes Butterscotch schnapps (Buttershots)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill coffee mug 3/4 full, add Irish cream, Kahlua and then Butterscotch Schnapps.

drinks.name: Homemade Southern Comfort
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 lb Peach
  • 1 cup Sugar
  • 4 strips Lemon peel
  • 2 cups Bourbon or brandy
drinks.mixinginstructions: Peel, pit and slice peaches. Place in saucepan. Add sugar, stir well to combine. Warm over low heat until sugar is well dissolved and peaches are juicy. Place mixture into aging container. Add lemon peels and alcohol, stirring to combine. Cover container and put in a cool, dark place (or refrigerate if necessary). Stand for 1 week, stirring occasionally. Strain and filter: press out liquid from peaches with the back of a wooden spoon. Strain again. Ready for cooking now, ready for drinking in another month.

drinks.name: Mandarine Summertime
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Mandarine Napoleon
  • 2 cl dry Gin
  • Orange juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 2 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Mandarine Napoleon and gin. Fill with orange juice and add a touch of grenadine. Add ice cubes and garnish with a slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Mandarine Passion
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Mandarine Napoleon
  • 2 cl dry Gin
  • Passion fruit juice
  • 2 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Mandarine Napoleon and gin. Fill with passion fruit juice. Add ice cubes and garnish with a slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Napotonic
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Mandarine Napoleon
  • Fill with Schweppes Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Mandarine Napoleon and fill with tonic. Add some ice cubes and garnish with orange peels.

drinks.name: Imperial Moka
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts strong, ice cold Coffee
  • 2 parts Mandarine Napoleon
  • 1 part Cognac
  • 1 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake

drinks.name: Midori Mimosa
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Sweet and sour
  • 4 oz Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Midori and sweet&sour. Add champagne.

drinks.name: Delicias de la Habana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Peach nectar
  • 1/2 oz Coconut cream
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix blue curacao with rum and ice. pour it into a glass and add the rest of the ingredients slowly. Granish with a pice of peach, a cherry and a piece of celery.

drinks.name: Crocodile Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 2/3 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice and mix well. Garnish with a lime wheel and a straw.

drinks.name: Orange Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 4 cl Cinzano Orancio
  • 5-6 cl Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and Orancio, add Sprite and garnish with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Tropical Heat
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Cinzano Orancio
  • 1 dash Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange spiral.

drinks.name: Orancio Royal
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Cinzano Orancio
  • Brut Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Orancio into a champagne flute and fill with Brut Champagne. Garnish with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Black and Blue
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Blavod vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in order.

drinks.name: Asphalt Road
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Lime juice cordial
  • 1 shot Irish cream
  • 1 shot Blavod vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and shoot straight away.

drinks.name: Ario Bomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blavod vodka
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • Fill Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice in glass. Garnish with 3 cherries.

drinks.name: Dirty Mop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Blavod vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Passoa
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice.

drinks.name: Bellini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 medium ripe Peach, peeled and pureed
  • 4-6 oz Italian dry Sparkling white wine or Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour peach puree into glass and slowly add champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with a peach slice.

drinks.name: Bombay Bellini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 splash Mango puree
  • 4-6 oz Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour mango puree into glass and slowly add champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with a mango slice.

drinks.name: Hummingbird #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Rum cream liqueur
  • 1 oz Tia maria
  • 1 oz Milk
  • 1/2 oz Strawberry syrup
  • 1/2 Banana
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend.

drinks.name: RumBubble
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 dash Aftershock
  • 4 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix alcohol over glass of ice. Stir. Add Club soda and stir gently. Serve.

drinks.name: Tahitian Treat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice
  • Fill with Sprite
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add liquor, juice, and then Sprite.

drinks.name: The Seminole
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Goldschlager
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: First pour Goldschlager into a shot glass, then add grenadine.

drinks.name: Amaretto Stone Sweet
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Amaretto (Blanks)
  • 2 oz Cherry syrup
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 4 oz 7-Up
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with ice.

drinks.name: Kurant Collins
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Powdered sugar
  • 3 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Absolut Kurant, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda.

drinks.name: Tampico
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1 1/2 oz Campari
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • Fill with Tonic water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into glass and fill with tonic wafer. Garnish with an orange slice or peel.

drinks.name: Pink Ranger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Coconut rum
  • 1/2 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker, chill, then serve in shot glass

drinks.name: After Eighteen
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • Fill with Chocolate milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Kahlua and Creme de Menthe, then fill the rest of the glass with chocolate milk.

drinks.name: Absolute Heaven
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • Fill Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients and shake over ice.

drinks.name: Swervin Mervin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Rum
  • 1/4 oz Gin
  • 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Orange juice
  • Pineapple juice
  • Grenadine
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix rum, gin, triple sec,v odka, and midori. Fill with equal parts pineapple and orange juice, top with grenadine. Shake well and serve on ice. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag.

drinks.name: Flaming Ale
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • Fill with Ginger ale
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice, pour in vodka, midori and triple-sec. Fill to top with ginger ale and spoon in (do not mix) grenadine.

drinks.name: Wonder Woman
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill hurricane glass with ice. Add ingredients in order listed. Don't stir! Should have three layers; green, orange, and red. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Montana Tornado
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 shots Vodka
  • 5 shots Jack Daniels
  • 5 shots Gin
  • 5 shots Tequila
  • 5 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into mason jar. Stir.

drinks.name: The Equator
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz White rum
  • Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer ingredients in the exact order. Grenadine should sit on top for a little bit before sliding down the inside of the shot glass.

drinks.name: Fluorescent Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1 shot Cointreau
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • Top with Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into gass half filled with ice. Stir well.

drinks.name: The Army John
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 12 oz Orange juice
  • 1 splash Triple sec
  • 1 wedge Lime
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Southern Comfort, orange juice and triple sec into the shaker. Squeeze in lime and toss in wedge. Shake vigorously and strain into highball glass over cubed ice.

drinks.name: Tropical Lullaby
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3/4 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 3/4 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Could be garnished with a piece of pineapple.

drinks.name: Kentucky Hot Tub
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Jim Beam
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 3-6 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker and strain into a shot glass. Voila!

drinks.name: Hot Scott
drinks.ingredients:
• 15 ml Cinnamon schnapps
  • 15 ml Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour together to ensure a good mix.

drinks.name: Pink Fizzy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Watermelon schnapps (Pucker)
  • 1 part Sprite or 7-up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Watermelon Pucker over ice half way. Fill to top with Sprite or 7-Up. Stir.

drinks.name: Italian Surfer
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 2 parts Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into ice filled glass. Stir to mix.

drinks.name: Hybris
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Cointreau
  • 3 cl Apricot brandy
  • Grapefruit juice
  • Sprite
  • Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in a highball glass, on ice. Decorate with lime.

drinks.name: Nutty Belgian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White chocolate liqueur (Godet)
  • 1 oz Frangelico
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Serve over ice.

drinks.name: Double Chocolate
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz White chocolate liqueur (Godet)
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • Cocoa powder
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add both ingredients to shot glass (don't layer). Sprinkle cocoa on top (optional).

drinks.name: Arctic Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Finlandia)
  • Fill with 3 oz Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill vodka over ice if it's not in your freezer. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and fill with champagne.

drinks.name: Long Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 3/4 oz Tequila
  • 1 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1 3/4 oz Rum
  • 1 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 1 3/4 oz Gin
  • Fill with Sour mix
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix as a Long Island Ice Tea

drinks.name: French Cosmopolitan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/4 oz Lime juice
  • 1 drop Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the first 5 ingredients, excluding Grenadine, into a shaker, then shake well and strain into a chilled large martini glass. Last, slowly pour a drop of Grenadine into middle of glass and let it fall to bottom and color the stem red. Garnish with Lime Wheel or a Lemon Twist.

drinks.name: Jager Vacation
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz JÃ¤germeister (ice cold)
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Pina colada mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all three in a shaker or blender, mix with ice.

drinks.name: Four Twenty
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Vodka
  • 1 part Sprite
  • 1 part White wine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in glass.

drinks.name: Mudskipper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz dry Gin
  • 10 oz Ginger ale
  • 1 splash Chocolate syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin and ginger ale over ice in a collins glass. Add chocolate syrup and let settle in the bottom. Stir very lightly. Drink should appear dark brown on the bottom and gradate to clear on top.

drinks.name: Liquid Bubble Gum
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Peach schnapps
  • 6 oz Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all ingredients in glass

drinks.name: Pumpkin pie (tavern style)
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Kahlua
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Goldschlager
  • Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: After adding the Goldschlager, set on fire. Sprinkle cinnamon on the flame to 'cook' and for dramatic effect. Blow out and serve.

drinks.name: Irish Pirate
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 part Irish Mist
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Southern Bound Meteor
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Cherry without stem
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • Float 1 splash 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a large shot glass. Remove stem from cherry and drop in glass. Pour in Southern Comfort and Goldschlager. Carefully float in a splash of 151 Rum. With a cigarette lighter ignite 151 Rum on fire and serve. Put out fire before drinking.

drinks.name: A Little Green Man From Mars
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 mint green Maraschino cherry without stem
  • 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
