drinks.mixinginstructions: Use a large shot glass. Remove stem from one Mint Green Maraschino Cherry and drop in glass. Pour JÃ¤germeister and Rumple Minze.

drinks.name: Buried Under An Avalanche
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 small Ice cube
  • 1/2 oz Ouzo
  • 1/2 oz Rumple Minze
drinks.mixinginstructions: In shot glass, drop in one small ice cube. Pour in Ouzo and then Rumple Minze.

drinks.name: Equity's Darling
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the ingredients in the glass and mix it up!

drinks.name: Sweet Candy Apple
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 2 splashes Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice (except for the grenadine). Pour grenadine on top.

drinks.name: The Admiral's Passion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Passoa
  • 1 part Sprite
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 3 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the Passoa first, mix the Sprite & juice separately. Add 3 cubes of ice to top it off. Serve cold.

drinks.name: Black and Blue #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blackberry schnapps
  • 2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 oz Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Gently shake ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Warsaw Waffle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Maple syrup
  • 3 parts Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour both ingredients into shot glass. Stir until syrup is dissolved.

drinks.name: Liquid Snickers
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Irish cream
  • 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1/2 oz Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Creme de cacao, Irish cream and Frangelico liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Top with light cream, stir and serve.

drinks.name: Straight Jacket
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Aftershock
  • 1 shot Passoa
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Aftershock then Passoa. Fill with orange juice and ice to taste.

drinks.name: Up all night
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 can Red Bull
  • 1 shot JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Red Bull into a Collins Glass. Pour a shot of JÃ¤germeister into a shot glass. When ready to drink, drop the shot into the collins glass and drink.

drinks.name: Devil's Advocate
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Bacardi Limon
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz Sour mix
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker mix all ingredients. Pour over ice.

drinks.name: Raspberry Long Island Ice Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 1/2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice into a shaker. Shake 3-4 times. Pour into glass and garnish (optional) with a Lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Sneaky Wesley
drinks.ingredients:
• 2/3 shot Kahlua
  • 1/3 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 shot Triple sec
  • Fill with Chocolate milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all and mix well.

drinks.name: Butter Nut Scotch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Scotch
  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

drinks.name: Scottalian
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients except the Grenadine. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice if you like. Drop the Grenadine into the center and serve.

drinks.name: Tirade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Spiced rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Takes a 2 oz shot glass. First put in the triple sec, then tequila, last the spiced rum.

drinks.name: Pineapple Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Light rum
  • 2 shots Pineapple juice
  • 1 shot Lemon juice
  • 1/2 shot Grenadine
  • Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add rum, pineapple juice, grenadine and lemon juice, and then fill the rest of the glass, or to your taste,with club soda. Serve with ice.

drinks.name: Fluffy Duck
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Advocaat
  • 1 part Creme de Cacao
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: 1/4 fill the glass with crushed ice, making sure you glass is cold so the ice does not melt too much. Pour the Creme de Cacao over the ice, followed by the Advocaat. Slowly add the soda, but be careful, it can fizz up over the glass. Stir.

drinks.name: Monk's Butt
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Frangelico
  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/4 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • Milk (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Frangelico, Butterscotch Schnapps, and Creme de Cacao over ice. Add milk (or cream) if desired, and stir.

drinks.name: Johnny on the beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 6 cl Orange juice
  • 6 cl Bitter lemon
  • Ice cubes
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice. garnish with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Monkey La La
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 4 oz Half-and-half
  • 1 scoop Ice-cream
  • 2 oz Cream of coconut
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend until smooth and frothy.

drinks.name: Russian Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • 4 oz Sour mix
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, triple sec, and sour mix in shaker with ice. Strain into chilled glass. Add a dash of grenadine to the top and swirl slightly. Optional garnish of cherry and orange slice.

drinks.name: Ultimate Mudslide
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Vodka
  • 30 ml Kahlua
  • 30 ml Bailey's irish cream
  • 60 ml Cream
  • 60 ml Milk
  • 1 Banana
  • 3 cubes Ice
  • Grated Chocolate
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place all ingredients, except grated chocolate, in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into glass and sprinkle with grated chocolate

drinks.name: Fire Fly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka and grapefruit juice into a glass with ice. Add grenadine and stir.

drinks.name: Monkey in a tree
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/8 oz Grenadine
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • Float 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix rum, creme de banane, grenadine and pineapple juice. Float Midori on top. Blended and served up is great too.

drinks.name: The Event Horizon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 scoop mint chocolate chip Ice-cream
  • 1 shot Peppermint schnapps
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend using a high speed blender.

drinks.name: My Johnson is Ten Inches Long
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Razzmatazz
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1/4 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into shooter glass, (best if made in large amounts)

drinks.name: Sloughdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Blavod vodka
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with ice. Add 2 shots of Blavod black vodka. Fill the rest of the glass with orange juice. Sprinkle shredded orange peel on top.

drinks.name: Whiting Sunset
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 6 oz Orange juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka, tequila and orange juioce. Finally, add a dash of grenadine.

drinks.name: Breath Stealer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part 151 proof rum
  • 2 parts Yukon Jack
  • 2 parts Green Chartreuse
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add chartreuse and Yukon Jack to 151.

drinks.name: Sid Vicious
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Whiskey
  • 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 dash Bitters
  • 1 dash Worcestershire sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour whiskey, gin, vermouth over ice and stir. Strain into an old-fashioned glass, add bitters and worcestershire sauce. Garnish with poppy seeds.

drinks.name: Roxy Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Absolut Citron
  • 1 shot Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 shot Sour mix
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Give one good shake, add lemon slice and cherry, and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Orange Crisis
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 oz Cream
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients in shaker with ice and pour as shots. Shots should have a creamy orange color.

drinks.name: White Ape
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Hot chocolate
  • 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 pinch ground Cinnamon
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make hot chocolate, add Bailey's and ground cinnimon. Float whipped cream on top.

drinks.name: Screaming Blue Viking
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Yukon Jack
  • 1 part Rumple Minze
  • 1 splash Blue Curacao (for color)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine liquors in a shaker of ice and shake. Strain into shot glasses. Partakers must scream 'Valhalla!!' before doing the shot. Can also be served on the rocks in a large goblet for the brave warrior.

drinks.name: S.O.B.
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Cognac
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • Lemon slice
  • Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Drink this just like a shot of tequila. Mix the cognac and cointreau together in the shot glass. Lick between your thumb and forefinger and sprinkle sugar on it. Then lick the sugar, drink the shot, and suck on the lemon wedge when you're done.

drinks.name: Blister
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1/4 oz Wild Turkey (101 proof)
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into glass.

drinks.name: Under Current
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 1/4 oz Sugar syrup
  • 1 splash Sprite
  • 1/4 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything except Chambord in a mixing tin, and pour into glass. Layer Chambord on top with a spoon.

drinks.name: Vernal Equinox
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Port
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill old fashion glass with ice. Add all ingredients and stir.

drinks.name: Autumnal Equinox
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Port
  • 1 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Old Fashioned Glass with ice. Pour ingredients into glass and stir.

drinks.name: Shamrock Juice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 can Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an Hurricane Glass filled with Ice pour equal amounts of all liquors. Top off with Orange Juice. Garnish with a slice of an Orange and a couple of cherries.

drinks.name: The Emily Weir
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Apple schnapps
  • 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 1 part Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 4 parts Lemonade
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Whack the liquid ingredients in a glass and give it a stir, then add the ice.

drinks.name: Johanna
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 splash Lime juice cordial
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and top it with some icecubes.

drinks.name: The Sabino Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3 - 4 oz Orange juice
  • 2 tsp Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Midori, Malibu, Schnapps, and orange juice into a shaker filled halfway with ice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass and add the grenadine. Garnish with orange wedges and cherries as seen fit.

drinks.name: Gingervitas
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Absolut Citron
  • 1 shot Dry Vermouth
  • 3 shots Ginger ale
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the shaker with ice. Pour one shot of Vodka and one shot of Vermouth. Shake and pour into the glass. Then pour the ginger ale into the glass. Very refreshing.

drinks.name: Chocolate Honeybee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Godiva liqueur
  • 1/2 shot Barenjager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Barenjaeger in a shot glass and top with Godiva.

drinks.name: Vanilla Creamsicle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vanilla schnapps
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • 1 shot Creme de Cacao
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all liquers to a glass. Pour in cold milk and stir. Serve immediately.

drinks.name: Simple Charm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 cl Cognac (Meukow V.S.)
  • 1 1/2 cl Kahlua
  • 1 1/2 cl Amaretto (di Saranno)
  • 1 cl fresh Cream
  • Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir liquors and strain in to cocktail-glass. Float cream gently on top. Garnish with cinnamon powder.

drinks.name: Island Jack
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Banana liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 2 oz Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients, except cola, in a mixing tin. Pour over ice and then top with cola.

drinks.name: Green Creeper
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice.

drinks.name: Tequila Screwdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tequila
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a shot of Tequila in glass, and fill with orange juice. Stir.

drinks.name: A Little Dinghy
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Parrot Bay Coconut rum
  • 2 shots Malibu rum
  • Fill with 1 part Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the shots into a glass of ice. Then fill the glass with equal parts orange juice, cranberry juice, and pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge, an orange slice, and an umbrella.

drinks.name: Alex Chi-Chi
drinks.ingredients:
• 45 ml Vodka
  • 15 ml Cointreau
  • 30 ml Cream of coconut
  • 60 ml Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake in an ice filled shaker. Strain and serve.

drinks.name: Alebrije
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz white Tequila
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: First mix some orange juice and pinapple juice in equal parts, and color it with some grenadine (as sweet as you want). This is 'conga mix'. Fill the glass with ice, add the five licours and mix them, fill the glass with some conga mix and enjoy.

drinks.name: Acapulco Twister
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • Juice of 1 Lemon
  • 1 pinch Salt
  • 1 pinch Black pepper
  • 3 drops Tabasco sauce
  • 1/2 oz Clamato juice
  • 1 1/2 Bacardi Limon
  • 4 oz Corona
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the lemon, tabasco sauce, clamato juice, salt and pepper. Fill the glass with some ice, add the rum and fill with Corona beer.

drinks.name: Acapulcos malibu
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 2 oz Malibu rum
  • 3 oz Mango juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with ice. Add rum and mango juice. Stir.

drinks.name: Cheshire Cat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain into glass over ice.

drinks.name: Lake George Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1/2 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 oz Gin (Beefeater)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • Fill with Pepsi Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all except cola. Pour into glass and fill with Pepsi.

drinks.name: Aggie Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 scoops Ice-cream
  • 1 cup whole Milk
  • 2 sliced frozen Banana
  • 1 handful Ice (optional)
  • 2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend ice cream, milk, and frozen bananas until smooth. Add Schnapps, blend, and pour.

drinks.name: Ball Of Fun
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 L Bacardi Limon
  • 1 L Triple sec
  • 1 L Absolut Citron
  • 2 L Fruit punch
  • 5 lb Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients in bowl and stir.

drinks.name: Yuppidoo
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish cream
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Galliano
  • 1 oz Vanilla liqueur
  • 1 dash Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all on Ice and strain into a Highballs Glass.

drinks.name: Dea Lea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1 oz Coconut liqueur
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Vanilla liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all on Ice and strain into a Cocktail Glass. Serve on the rocks

drinks.name: Hummingbird
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 Banana
  • 1 oz Coconut cream
  • 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Tia maria
  • 1 oz Strawberries
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth.

drinks.name: Freddie's Naughty Neopolitan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Kahlua
  • 1/3 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/3 oz Tequila Rose (or Baja Rosa Tequila)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in a shot glass. First Kahlua, then white creme de cacao, and finally Baja Rosa Tequila.

drinks.name: George & Ginger
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz George Dickel
  • 2 oz Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour George Dickel over ice into a tall glass. Add Ginger Ale, and stir.

drinks.name: Poire Fantastic
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Pear liqueur (Poire au Cognac)
  • 10 cl Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a Highball glass, pour in the Poire au Cognac. Add Sprite. Put in some ice if you want.

drinks.name: Irish Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Irish whiskey
  • 1 tsp Brown sugar (Demerara)
  • 6 oz hot Coffee
  • Heavy cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine whiskey, sugar and coffee in mug and stir to dissolve. Float cold cream gently on top. Do not mix.

drinks.name: Sweet Dreams
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 glass Hot chocolate
  • 2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 handful Marshmallows
  • 1 swirl Whipped cream
  • Sprinkle Cinnamon or nutmeg
  • Chocolate shavings
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make hot chocolate, add malibu rum and stir. Top with marshmallows and whipped cream. Sprinkle cinnamon or nutmeg on top and garnish with chocolate shavings.

drinks.name: Nord-Norsk Depresjon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Cointreau
  • 1 cl Aquavit
  • 2 cl Gin
  • 1 dash Lime juice
  • Top with Sprite or 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice and stir.

drinks.name: Royal Bill
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Pear liqueur (Poire William)
  • Fill with Champagne
  • 1/2 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour chilled Poire William in to champagne flute, add Champagne to top. Garnish with half an orange slice.

drinks.name: Summit County Suicide
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tequila (Optional)
  • 1 part Orange juice (Sunny D)
  • 1 part Tennessee whiskey (JD or Dickle)
  • 1 part Sprite
  • 1 part Cactus Juice liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Love Game
drinks.ingredients:
• Crushed Ice
  • 3/9 Batida de Coco
  • 2/9 Passoa
  • 1/9 Grenadine
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add batida de coco and then slowly add the Passoa. Now add the grenadine slowly, so is goes under the batida. You should get three layers: red, white, red. ok? Serve orange juice, but let the customer mix it, because the colors will mix.

drinks.name: Southwest Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Cranberry juice
  • 2 parts Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Cactus Juice liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the juices first, then top off with the liqueur.

drinks.name: Romulan Ale #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot blue Maui
  • 1 shot Cactus Juice liqueur
  • 1 shot Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Pink Pitch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 4 cl Licor 43
  • 6 cl Milk
  • 1/2 cl Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix on low speed. Serve in chilled glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Nurse
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 cl Absolut Vodka
  • 5 cl Licor 43
  • 2 - 3 Ice cubes
  • Fill with Root beer
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in glass. Stir. Serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Pearl Necklace #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • Rum cream liqueur (Tortuga)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour butterscotch schnapps into a shot glass then add Kahlua. Use a dropper to add rum cream drop by drop on the outside edge of the shot to form a ring or 'Pearl Necklace.'

drinks.name: Red Horn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot RedRum
  • 1 pint Cider (Hornsby's Draft)
drinks.mixinginstructions: RedRum can either be mixed with the cider, or floated on top. Serve cold.

drinks.name: Magic Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 oz Mango juice
  • 1 oz Papaya juice
  • 1 oz Guava juice
  • 4 oz Vodka (Absolut)
drinks.mixinginstructions: fill glass with ice add ingredients then shake

drinks.name: Flageln
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 part Cherry vodka
  • 3/4 part Red Bull
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka into the glass first, then pour the Red Bull slowly into it. Add ice.

drinks.name: Tropical Pear Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Pear liqueur
  • 1 oz RedRum
  • 1/2 oz Apple brandy
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 4 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour first four ingredients over ice in shaker. Shake until chilled, and well blended. Pour into glass, and add 7-up. Stir to mix.

drinks.name: The Lindy
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Surge
  • 2 shots JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the 2 shots of JÃ¤germeister in the bottom of a tall beer mug and pour in the surge.

drinks.name: Cherry Bomber
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Cherry vodka
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Sloe gin
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 2 parts Sweet and sour
  • 4 parts 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all parts together and serve cold!

drinks.name: Chocolate Orgasm
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 shot Cherry vodka
  • 2 shots chilled Espresso
  • 4-6 oz Chocolate milk (Hershey's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Glitch
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 1/2 glass Mango juice
  • 1 shot Lemon juice
  • 2 shots Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in order listed. The blue splash at the end makes the drink aquamarine colored, which is lovely.

drinks.name: Jaguar
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 3 parts Sprite
  • 1 part Banana syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in highball glass. Ice is optional.

drinks.name: Suburban Warhead
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Aftershock
  • 3 oz Tequila
  • 2 oz Corona
  • 1 can frozen Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the Vodka, Tequila, Aftershock, Beer, and Lemonade in a blender. Blend until a smooth frothy substance is achieved. Fill beer mug with drink and prepared to be hit with a Suburban Warhead

drinks.name: Italian Soda
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vanilla vodka
  • Dill with Ginger ale
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka over ice and fill with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Tijuana Carbomb
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Cuervo Gold rum
  • 1 bottle Corona
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour bottle of corona in a pint glass. Wait for it to settle. Then drop in shot of cuervo, and chug it down.

drinks.name: Screaming Chocolate Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 3 counts Banana syrup
  • 3 squirts Chocolate syrup
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well and pour over ice, top with cherry or chocolate sprinkles.

drinks.name: Cloudy Day
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Cuervo Gold tequila
  • 1 bottle Corona
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Drink the neck of the bottle of Corona. Fill in with tequila and then add lime wedge. Turn bottle over to mix the ingredients, making sure to keep your thumb on the opening, as not to spill.

drinks.name: Sexy Blue Eyed Boy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Rum cream liqueur
  • 1 scoop Ice-cream
  • 2 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients into blender, blend until smooth.

drinks.name: Batman
drinks.ingredients:
• 33 cl Battery
  • 4 cl dry Gin (Gordon's)
  • 10 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all. Serve cold.

drinks.name: Big Bad Voodoo Kooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz RedRum
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 2 shots Orange juice
  • 2 shots Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Sling Malibu, RedRum and Midori in a highball glass filled with ice. Top off with Orange, pineapple juices and a splash of soda. Mix it up with your swizzle stick and Go Daddy-O!

drinks.name: Blue Whip
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Orange vodka (Stoli Oranj)
  • 1 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
  • Fill 1/2 glass Orange juice
  • Fill 1/2 glass Sprite or 7-Up
  • Ice cubes
  • 3 slices Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vodka, curacao and o.j. with ice. Top off with Sprite or 7-Up. Garnish with fanned slices of orange floating on top and a straw.

drinks.name: Oasis
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Melon vodka (Artic)
  • 4 cl Malibu rum
  • 3 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 7 cl Lemon juice
  • 1 splash Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve over ice.

drinks.name: Cranberry Tart
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts ice cold Cranberry vodka (Finlandia)
  • 3 parts blood Orange juice
  • Lots of Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ice cold cranberry vodka, add ice (the more the better). Top with orange juice and stir gently.

drinks.name: Double Brit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tanqueray Gin
  • 1 oz Single malt Scotch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient into a double shot glass, they will mix by themselves. Shoot.

drinks.name: Kansas City Ice Water #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Raspberry vodka (Stoli)
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin and vodka over ice. Fill with 7-Up. Garnish with lime.

drinks.name: Dr. Dye's Revenge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Orange vodka
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 3-4 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 1/2 oz Ginger ale
  • 2-3 splashes Sour mix
  • 1 1/2 splash Orange juice
  • 1-2 dash Orange bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients over ice in this order: Liquors, cranberry juice, ginger ale, aour mix, orange juice, and bitters. Cover and shake well. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Dickel & Dew
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1 part George Dickel
  • 2 parts Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take a large glass and fill with ice. Add 1 part George Dickel Tennessee Whiskey to 2 parts of Mountain Dew.

drinks.name: South Beach Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Orange vodka
  • 2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 3/4 oz Cointreau
  • 3/4 oz Lime juice
  • Ice
  • Twist of Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into large martini glass. Garnish with twist of orange peel.

drinks.name: Prickly Pear
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz chilled Cactus Juice liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Cuervo Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour cold Cactus Juice schnapps into chilled shot glass. Float Cuervo on top.

drinks.name: Headhunter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Lime juice
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 3 oz Coconut milk
  • 1 oz Papaya juice (optional)
  • 3 shots 151 proof rum
  • 4 shots Spiced rum (Morgans)
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 4 oz Beer or ale (not light)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix liquors (except beer) in a tall tumbler. Stir in the juices, and shake with ice. Slowly add the beer and stir to blend. Serve in a tall glass or a 1/2 coconut shell with the meat intact.

drinks.name: Madonna
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Cherry vodka
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Tangerine Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 50 ml Mandarine Napoleon
  • 25 ml Tia maria
  • 50 ml fresh Cream
  • 5 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Decorate with coffee beans and hearts cut from the rind of a tangerine.

drinks.name: Evil Corona
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 bottle Corona
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour (drink) the first 2 oz. of corona, and add 2 oz. of Absolut Citron. Cap top of bottle and turn upside down for about 5 seconds. Serve with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: From Russia with Love
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Raspberry vodka (Stoli)
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • Top 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice.

drinks.name: Vesper
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz dry Gin (Gordon's)
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Kina Lillet
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with lots of ice until it is extremely cold, then pour and add a large slice of lemon peel.

drinks.name: Beach Sunday
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Peach Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and raspberry liqueur over ice. Add cranberry juice, and the freshly squeezed lime juice. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Caribbean Milk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Batida de Coco
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • 2 parts Milk
  • 1 tblsp Vanilla syrup
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the milk with the Vanilla, add to the shaker the other ingredients and shake well.

drinks.name: Little Beer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Licor 43
  • Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 43 in shot glass. Layer cream slowly on top so that it resembles the 'head' on a beer.

drinks.name: Raspberry Sex
drinks.ingredients:

  • 1/3 oz Cranberry juice

drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine vodka and cranberry juice over ice in a shaker. Shake well and strain into shot glass. Top with a splash of 7-Up and serve.

drinks.name: Sweet Summer
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Raspberry vodka (Stoli)

drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, pour in raspberry vodka, fill almost to the top with ginger ale, add a splash of cranberry juice (for pinkish color) and squeeze the lemon. Taste best if shaken.

drinks.name: Ginny's Slammin' Goddess

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquors over ice. Mix orange juice and grapefruit juice exactly 50/50 in a separate container. Add juice mix to liquors and stir well.

drinks.name: Ginny's Slammin' Goddess #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Raspberry schnapps
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps

  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur

  • And 1 part ruby red Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquors over ice. Mix orange juice and grapefruit juice exactly 50/50 in a separate container. Fill glass with juice mix and stir well.

drinks.name: Mexican Hillbilly

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour mug of Corona then drop in shot of Jack Daniels.

drinks.name: Chocolate Raspberry Martini

drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill vodka and creme de cacoa. Pour into chilled glass. Garnish with chocolate kiss and fresh raspberry.

drinks.name: Hairy Jerry
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 2 1/2 oz Dark rum (Meyers)
  • Fill with Papaya juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add dark rum. Fill to top with Papaya Juice.

drinks.name: Blue Marlin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz RedRum
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Fill with 1 part Sweet and sour
  • And 1 part Orange juice
  • Ice Cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice - The consumer of this drink should mix it before drinking.

drinks.name: Pimp
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 handful Ice
  • 2 cl JÃ¤germeister
  • Fill with Battery
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass half-full of ice, add JÃ¤germeister, and fill up with Battery.

drinks.name: Smoked Martini
drinks.ingredients:

  • 1 part Vodka (Absolut)

drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in large pitcher with ice, let stand for a few minutes to chill, then pour into glasses sans ice and add lemon to suit.

drinks.name: The Vibrator
drinks.ingredients:

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquors into ice filled glass. Top off with cranberry and orange juice. Shake. Garnish with two cherries.

drinks.name: Mandarin Delight
drinks.ingredients:

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Absolut Mandarin in a glass over ice. Fill with tonic water. Squeeze and drop the wedge of lime or orange into the drink. Stir.

drinks.name: Becky's Bomber
drinks.ingredients:

  • 1 1/2 oz Raspberry vodka (Stoli)

  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodkas and fill with cranberrry juice.

drinks.name: Adios Motherfucker #3

drinks.name: Jungle Juice #3

• 2 oz Rum

drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor liqour equally into a shot glass. Give it a quick swirl and top with a cherry.

drinks.name: Stoli Around the World

drinks.name: Nightboat to Brasil

drinks.name: Jens Special

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Bacardi LimÃ³n into the glass, then the sprite and the Red Bull. Stir to mix.

drinks.name: Nightboat to Recife

drinks.name: Walk the Plank

drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the vodka and the grape juice first in any order and then fill with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Colorado Coolaid
drinks.ingredients:

  • 1 oz Southern Comfort

  • 1 oz Amaretto

drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with 1 skoop of ice then pour into highball glass

drinks.name: Cherry Godet
drinks.ingredients:

drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Godet to shot class, pour cherry brandy in the center and let it mix itself around.

drinks.name: Adios Motherfucker (A.M.F.)

  • 1/2 oz Gin

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients except the 7-Up into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Top with 7-Up and stir gently.

drinks.name: Strawberry Dream #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Strawberry vodka (Stoli)
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto

drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vodka and amaretto. Fill with 7-Up.

drinks.name: Blue Eye
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 1 part Battery
  • 1 part Sweet and sour

drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with ice and build ordinary with vodka, Battery, Sweet & Sour and Blue curacao at the end.

drinks.name: S2C3

• 4 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 7 oz Ginger ale

  • 1 splash Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into glass and serve.

drinks.name: Stoned
drinks.ingredients:

  • 6 cl Lemon-lime mix

drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill higeball glass with ice. Pour in JÃ¤germeister and pear liqueur. Top with lemon mix and 'Battery' energy drink. Garnish with a lemon slice.

drinks.name: Raw Sewage #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz RedRum
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice.

drinks.name: Lyndy
drinks.ingredients:
• 50 ml Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 - 2 cup Cranberry juice (to taste)
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and serve.

drinks.name: The Ricky Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Peppar
  • 1 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 splash Cointreau
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 dash Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice until frothy. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with a jalepeno stuffed olive.

drinks.name: BMW #2
drinks.ingredients:

  • 1/3 oz Malibu rum

drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Tap that Ass
drinks.ingredients:

  • 1 oz red AlizÃ©
  • 1 oz yellow AlizÃ©

  • Top with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the hurricane glass with ice. Pour the Hennessy, Red Alize, and Yellow Alize. Splash in some Cranberry Juice and top it off with soda. For garnish you can add a slice of pineapple and cherries.

drinks.name: Flaming Giraffe
drinks.ingredients:

  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 oz 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Kahlua first into a double shot glass. Add one ounce of butterscotch schnapps. Float 151 proof rum on top and set on fire. Blow out before drinking.

drinks.name: Cactus Juice
drinks.ingredients:

  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • Fill with Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Glass with ice. Pour ingredients in order.

drinks.ingredients:

drinks.name: Summer Splash

drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together in shaker, pour into glass over ice. Lime juice can be added to taste. Makes 2 drinks.

drinks.name: Absolutly Screwed
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Mandrin
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix OJ and Mandrin then enjoy

drinks.name: Razzberi Kazi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Raspberry vodka (Stoli)
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Pour into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Stoli Fruit Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1/2 oz Stoli Orange vodka

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients together in ice filled glass. Shake and pour back into glass.

drinks.name: Green Weenie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Corona
  • Fill bottle with Margarita mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Take swig of Corona, then fill bottle the rest of the way with Margarita Mix.

drinks.name: The Twister

drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the lemon, tabasco sauce, clamato juice, salt and pepper, fill the glass with some ice, add the rum and fill with some Corona beer.

drinks.name: James D

drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients. Stir

drinks.name: Liqiud Mintaero

drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Creme de Cacoa, Creme de Menthe, Midori, Kahlua and Ice into a shaker. Give a small shake, then add milk and shake well to foam up milk.

drinks.name: Amenie Mama

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into shot glass. Stir.

drinks.name: Mexican Clit

  • 1/2 shot Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass half full with tequila. Fill to the top with lemon juice. This shit goes quick, so enjoy.

drinks.name: Superjuice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka

drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or mix the vodka, gin, and orange juice. Pour over ice. Add tonic water and lime juice, stir slightly.

drinks.name: Melon Tonic

drinks.name: 915 Special

drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain into highball. Garnish with slice of pineapple.

drinks.name: Midnight Oil
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in the shot glass. Ingredients should not be chilled.

drinks.name: Malibu Snapper

drinks.name: Poontang
drinks.ingredients:

  • 1 shot Triple sec

drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Vodka and Triple sec first. Add Tang (and water if powdered Tang).

drinks.name: Kryptonite

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient into a shot glass and layer 151 proof rum on top.

drinks.name: BLT
drinks.ingredients:
• 1-1/2 oz Bacardi Limon
  • Fill with Iced tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Limon. Fill with Iced tea. Add lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Blue Monkey
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Coconut rum
  • 1 1/2 part Orange juice
  • 1/2 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in hurricane glass with crushed ice. Stir or mix gently.

drinks.name: Carolina Kamikaze
drinks.ingredients:

  • 1 oz Triple sec

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Strain into highball glass. Add more or less blue curacao - you're trying to achieve a Carolina Blue color.

drinks.name: The Lady in Red

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass. Let stand for 30 seconds and slam it back.

drinks.ingredients:

  • 1 part Orange juice

drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake one part o.j. and one part vodka together. Pour over ice and add one part Mountain Dew, then stir slightly.

drinks.name: Dead Grasshopper
drinks.ingredients:

drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake creme de menthe, creme de cacao and milk with ice. Pour into glass and add a dash of Aftershock. Do not stir.

drinks.name: Pink Elephant
drinks.ingredients:

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour grenadine into snifter and swirl around so it coats most of the glass surface. Dump out. Add gin.

drinks.name: Italian Soda #2
drinks.ingredients:

drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour chambord into bottom of glass. Top with soda water. Do not stir. Serve with straw.

drinks.name: Brain Candy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz AlizÃ©
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 1 splash Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake alcohols and juices. Add to glass with ice. Pour grenadine and ginger ale on top. Garnish with cherry and orange wheel.

drinks.name: Cabana Club
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Rum
  • 1/2 part Coconut cream
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with crushed ice.

drinks.name: Irish Hammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Jack Daniels
  • 1 part Irish Mist
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Fontainebleau Sidecar
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Bourbon
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 tsp Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix or shake all ingredients, except Grand Marnier, with cracked ice in a shaker. Pour or strain into large chilled wine glass or snifter. Float Grand Marnier on top.

drinks.name: Almond Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Dark rum
  • 2 oz Coconut cream
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2-1/3 oz Banana
  • 2-3 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all except ice for 10-15 seconds. Add the ice cubes and blend for another 10 seconds to break up the ice cubes slightly. Serve in a Poco Grande or Hurricane glass garnished with a slice of orange and a Marichino cherry.

drinks.name: Blue Kamikaze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • Fill with Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the Vodka, Blue Curacao, and Lime Juice in a glass with ice. Shake well, then pour through a strainer into a normal glass with ice in it. Makes 1 drink.

drinks.name: Astroturf
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Green Creme de Menthe
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 6 oz Milk
  • 3 tsp Chocolate syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix creme de menthe, creme de cacao and milk in glass. When ready to serve, squirt in chocolate syrup and mix until it turns a grass-like green/brown color.

drinks.name: Sneeky Sucker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Cherry vodka
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • Juice of 1 small Lemon
  • 6 oz Pink lemonade
  • 4 oz Strawberry juice
  • Sugar to taste
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together with lots of ice.

drinks.name: Goldfish
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz plain or Citrus vodka (Citron/Oranj)
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 wedges Mandarin (canned)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix peach schnapps with vodka. Add mandarin oranges.

drinks.name: Mexican's Revenge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Tequila
  • 1 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Pour on ice. Garnish with straws and a slice of lemon.

drinks.name: Gingersnap
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Frangelico
  • 1 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • Ice Cubes
  • Fill with Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Kahlua, Bailey's irish cream, Frangelico, and JÃ¤germeister in ice-filled shaker, and strain contents into ice-filled highball glass. Fill with cola.

drinks.name: Sex on Daytona Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3 splashes Grenadine
  • 1/4 oz Heavy cream
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend ingredients by shaking well.

drinks.name: Fjellfinn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Lakka
  • 2 parts Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the two ingredients. Garnish with a birch leaf.

drinks.name: Placenta
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Wildberry schnapps
  • 1 splash Tequila Rose
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill most of the shot glass with schnapps. Top it off with the Tequila Rose. Wait about 30 seconds for the Tequila Rose to curdle (thus the name). Slam it!

drinks.name: Mandarin Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 3/4 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and splash juices in shaker with ice. Shake vigorously so when poured, a thin layer of ice crystals is visible. Strain into cocktail glass and garnish with orange slice.

drinks.name: Sour Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 1/2 oz Cheri Beri Pucker
  • 1/2 oz Grape Pucker
  • 1/4 oz Sugar syrup
  • 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • 1 splash Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients into a mixing tin. Stir over ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Cocktail glass should be sugar rimmed and garnished with a lemon.

drinks.name: Afterburner #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Stoli)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1 splash Grapefruit juice
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: The Brett Schroeder
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Lemon juice
  • 2 tsp Sugar
  • 1 oz Watermelon liqueur
  • Orange soda (Orangina)
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake, then add Orangina and ice cubes.

drinks.name: Goats Milk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Vodka
  • 1 fifth Watermelon schnapps
  • 1 fifth Peachtree schnapps
  • 1 gal watermelon Kool-Aid
  • 2 L Sprite
  • 10 tblsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients and stir.

drinks.name: Marianne
drinks.ingredients:
• 10-12 oz frozen Strawberries
  • 10-12 oz frozen Raspberries
  • 11 oz Apple juice
  • Champagne
  • Whipped cream (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend strawberries, raspberries and apple juice until it is slushy. Fill each champagne flute half way with fruit mix. Fill the remaining flute with champagne, and stir until champagne and fruit mix are mixed. Top off with whipped cream (optional).

drinks.name: Matt's Tropical Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build on the rocks and stir with a straw.

drinks.name: Coral Reef
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Citrus vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 3/4 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka, tequila, and blue Curacao over ice and shake Slowly add sour mix until drink is a bright turquois. Remix and serve.

drinks.name: Tampon String
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Cherry liqueur
  • Top with Whipped cream
  • Cherry (Ontop)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the vodka and cherry liquer then put whip cream on top and a cherry on that when taking the shot engulf the whole thing and after you swallow pull the stem of the cherry out.

drinks.name: The Kruzewski
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Sprite
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Orange soda (Orangina)
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put a couple ice cubes in the mug then add juices and mix a great morning drink.

drinks.name: The Cherry Magician
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Light rum
  • 2 parts Gin
  • 2 parts Vodka
  • 2 parts Triple sec
  • 1 part Peachtree schnapps
  • Cherry Kool-Aid mix
  • Fill with Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: This is to make one quart. Follow the directions on the package to determine the appropriate amount of Kool-Aid mix. Mix all of the ingredients in a bowl/pitcher without ice. Serve in a glass with ice.

drinks.name: Guinness Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 12 oz Guinness stout
  • 1/2 cup sweetened Condensed milk (regular or skim)
  • 1/16 tsp (or less) Cinnamon
  • 1/16 tsp (or less) Nutmeg
  • unsweetened Cocoa powder (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Gently pour a well-chilled Guinness into a small mixing bowl or glass that will hold all of the liquid ingredients. Add the sweetened condensed milk, spices, and cocoa (if it's wanted). Stir or whisk well, and pour the mixture into a pint-sized beer mug or pub glass. Makes 1 drink.

drinks.name: Working Man's Zinfandel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tequila
  • 1 shot Scotch
  • 1/2 shot Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1/2 shot Peach schnapps
  • 1 can Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add shots of liquor to the glass. Fill with Sprite.

drinks.name: Caribbean Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients over ice. Pour into glass.

drinks.name: Donkey Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Orange juice
  • 2 parts Ginger ale
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/4 part Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a punchbowl and float orange slices on top.

drinks.name: Sweedish Blow Job
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 dash Whipped cream
  • 1/2 oz Cream soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients in order. Pour the cream soda to make the whipped cream spurt.

drinks.name: Waverunner
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 2 tblsp Sugar
  • 2 wedges Lemon
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • Top with 4 oz Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except for the Champagne) with ice. Strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Top with champagne. Squeze and drop another wedge of lemon into the drink (the other two should still be in the tin).

drinks.name: Hawaiian Volcano #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 3/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into an ice-filled Highball glass.

drinks.name: No Regrets
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Gold tequila
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in the Irish Cream first. Then add the gold tequila. Shoot down and feel the warmth.

drinks.name: Sex on the Grass
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all except orange juice with ice. Pour into a hiball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice.

drinks.name: Hurricane Laura
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dark rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 oz Passion fruit juice
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Orange juice with pulp
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir and pour in shot glasses.

drinks.name: The Cornell
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Kettle One)
  • 1/2 oz Watermelon schnapps (Pucker)
  • 1/2 oz Sour mix
  • Fill with Ice
  • 1 splash Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a Highball glass add Vodka, Watermelon Pucker, and sour mix. Fill the rest of the glass with ice and shake well. Finish with a splash of club soda.

drinks.name: Verno
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Harp Lager
  • 1 part Spiced rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour as is.

drinks.name: Baduizm
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Rum (Havanna Club Silver Dry)
  • 1/4 oz Limoncello (Luxardo)
  • 1/2 oz Condensed milk (Nestle)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with grated chocolate.

drinks.name: Louie Louie
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Tia maria
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Creme de Spooge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Beer
  • 1 part Cream soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix half a beer with half of a cream soda.

drinks.name: 78 Camaro
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Yukon Jack
  • 3/4 oz Rum (Captian Morgan's)
  • 3/4 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • Top with Champagne
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add liquor and pineapple juice. Shake and serve in glass. Top with champagne.

drinks.name: Tropical Hibiscus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 bottle Champagne
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all ingredients in a iced punch bowl. Serve cold.

drinks.name: The Green Mile
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Melon liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/4 oz Cointreau
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve in a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Cossak
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 shot Godiva liqueur
  • 2 cups Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add liqueur after filling glass with preferred amount of milk. Vodka can be excluded for a milder drink.

drinks.name: Peekaboo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Absolut Kurant
  • 1 glass Orange juice with pulp
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Absolut Kurant and fill with orange juice.

drinks.name: Spanish Fly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 part Coca-Cola
  • 1 part Cherry liqueur
  • 1 part Vanilla schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in glass and stir. Serve cold.

drinks.name: Under Kurant
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Kurant
  • 1 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the Absolut Kurant, blue curacao, and pineapple juice with ice. Pour into a shot or low-ball glass, be sure and leave a bit of room to spare. Add just enough Chambord to color the bottom of the glass.

drinks.name: Mindfuck
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 2 oz Cactus Juice liqueur
  • Fill with Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just mix over ice in the glass.

drinks.name: Cranberry Frog
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.

drinks.name: Cranberry Toad
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • Vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.

drinks.name: Cranberry Newt
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake vigourously. Serve.

drinks.name: Chihuahua
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • Fill with Grapefruit juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tequila over ice. Fill with grapefruit juice.

drinks.name: Red Death #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Blackberry brandy
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix up and serve in a highball glass with ice.

drinks.name: Fury
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Spiced rum
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 2 parts Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a whiskey glass with ice, add equal parts vodka and spiced rum, a splash of sour mix, then top off with orange juice.

drinks.name: Sour Pussy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice.

drinks.name: Blueberry Kami
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blueberry schnapps
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
  • 1 dash Cream (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake in shaker with ice. Pour the shots.

drinks.name: Enchantress
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Amaretto
  • 1 part Creme de Cacao
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine alcoholic ingredients in glass over ice. Fill to top with milk, add splash of grenadine. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Peach Harpoon
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Sunny delight
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Tequila
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 1/2 glass Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir everything together in a glass of ice.

drinks.name: Canadian Manhattan
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Canadian whisky
  • 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well and pour over ice or 'up' in a martini glass. Garnish with cherry.

drinks.name: Pink Flamingo #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Vanilla schnapps
  • 3 splashes Grenadine
  • A few splashes Orange juice (to taste)
  • Crushed Ice
  • Fill with Cream
  • 2 Cherries
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice and vanilla schnapps and grenadine. Add the a splashes of orange juice and fill with the cream. Garnish with 2 cherries.

drinks.name: Formula 420
drinks.ingredients:
• A few Ice cubes
  • 2 oz Seagram 7
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice in order listed. Stir lightly.

drinks.name: Seven Veils
drinks.ingredients:
• A few Ice cubes
  • 2 oz Seagram 7
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice. Stir lightly.

drinks.name: Cibola
drinks.ingredients:
• A few Ice cubes
  • 2 oz Seagram 7
  • 1 oz Goldschlager
  • Fill With 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice. Stir lightly.

drinks.name: Black Unicorn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 part Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in kahlua, then butterscotch schnapps. Layer Irish cream on top.

drinks.name: Redhead's Nipple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vanilla schnapps
  • 1 oz Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in vanilla schnapps, layer Irish cream on top.

drinks.name: Cockteaser
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into chilled shot glass.

drinks.name: EKG
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Godiva liqueur
  • 1 part Kahlua
  • Small Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill any type glass 1/2 - 3/4 with ice. Add equal amounts of Chocolate Liqueur and Kahlua - enough to cover the ice.

drinks.name: Mansion Mind Eraser
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Rum
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice cubes. Pour all the ingredients in order and fill with 7-Up. Drink with two straws like a shot.

drinks.name: Bat Bite
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 2 shots Spiced rum
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice. Stir.

drinks.name: Cherry Screwdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Cherry vodka
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Sweet Pea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 glass Coconut rum
  • 1/2 glass Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Simply pour them together.

drinks.name: Cinco de Mayo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz aÃ±ejo or white Tequila
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • 1 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with lots of ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with fresh lime wedge if desired.

drinks.name: Golden Cadillac with White-Walled Tires
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli Vanil)
  • 1 1/2 oz White chocolate liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 1 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 oz Cream
  • 1 splash Sugar syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all of the ingredients in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a large chilled champagne flute. Garnish with shaved dark chocolate.

drinks.name: Olive in an Olive
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 part Gold tequila
  • 1/2 part red Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 dash Blue Curacao
  • 1 green Olive
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Tequila, Red Sweet Vermouth and Blue Curacao over very cold ice in a shaker. Shake. Strain into glass and drop in olive. The drink should be the appx. colour of the olive.

drinks.name: Kalabreeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1/3 oz Apricot brandy
  • 1/3 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into a shot glass, and shoot.

drinks.name: Wa-Hoo-Wa
drinks.ingredients:
• Orange juice
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine vodka and curacao in glass over ice. Fill with orange juice. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Glicktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp Sugar syrup
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • 1 splash Ginger ale or club soda
  • 1 1/2 oz Bourbon (Makers Mark)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with ice and add more ginger ale (or club soda) to taste. Stir well.

drinks.name: Tropical Clarkson
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 1/2 oz Hot chocolate
  • 1 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Prepare the hot chocolate and add the Kahlua. Top with whipped cream or marshmallows.

drinks.name: Warm Woolly Sheep
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Scotch
  • 1 1/2 shot Drambuie
  • Fill with warm Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Scotch and Drambuie, top with warm milk.

drinks.name: An Irish Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3/4 oz Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • hot Coffee
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Baileys and Kahlua into Irish coffee glass, fill glass with hot coffee and top with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Fruit Basket
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Creme de Banane
  • 2 parts Coconut rum (Parrot Bay)
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 part Blackberry brandy
  • 3 parts Orange juice
  • 2 parts Pineapple juice
  • Fill with Apple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix appropriate amounts in a pitcher or bowl. Pour into glass filled with ice. Garnish with the fruit of your choice.

drinks.name: The Hollywood
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3/4 oz Razzmatazz
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix with ice and strain into ice filled highball glass.

drinks.name: Gold Record
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gold tequila
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

drinks.name: Dixieland Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Whiskey
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • Fill with Iced tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

drinks.name: T-Bone's Cough Syrup
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Hot Damn
  • Almost 3/4 oz Grape soda
  • 1-2 splash Maraschino cherry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Hot Damn, then add grape soda and then top off with cherry juice. Garnish with a cherry if you can avoid choking on it.

drinks.name: Cafe Seattle
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 3/4 shot Absolut Vodka
  • 1 oz Chocolate syrup (Hershey's)
  • Coffee
  • Whipping cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Measure Irish cream and Vodka into coffee mug. Add Hershey's chocolate syrup. Fill will coffee and top with Whipping cream.

drinks.name: F-69
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/5 oz Dark rum
  • 1/5 oz Kahlua
  • 1/5 oz Amaretto
  • 2/5 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill ingredients before hand. Carefully layer the ingredients in order: Rum, Kahlua, Amaretto, Bailey's.

drinks.name: Mr G
drinks.ingredients:
• 2-3 cl Licor 43
  • 2-3 cl Vodka
  • 4-5 cl Grenadine
  • Fill with Milk
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice.

drinks.name: Chocolate Orange
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with ice, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

drinks.name: Chocolate Cake Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Absolut Citron
  • 1/2 shot Frangelico
  • 1 wedge Lemon (sugar-coated)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts Absolut Citron and Frangelico into a shot glass. Drink the shot, and follow it immediately by sucking on a sugar-coated lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Long Kiss Goodnight Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • 1 oz Vodka (Stoli)
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao (Bols)
  • shaved white Chocolate
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Freeze a martini glass and it in shaved chocolate to rim. In a shaker put ice, Stoli vanilla, Stoli vodka, and white creme de cacao. Shake lightly and pour into martini glass. Garnish with chocolate kiss.

drinks.name: Bermuda Triangle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Rum (Gosling's Black Seal)
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ingredients over ice, stir gently and garnish with a fresh orange slice.

drinks.name: Island Tide
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots AÃ±ejo rum
  • 1 shot Bacardi Limon
  • Fill with Peach juice
  • 1 - 2 splash Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all ingredients into a Collins Glass and stir. Ice is optional. Also add 3 mandarin orange slices, and 2 peach slices to the drink. Sink them to the bottom. You may also garnish the glass with a lemon slice, peach slice or mandarin orange slice.

drinks.name: Fruity Pebble
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1 part Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Makes a dope shooter or pour over rocks.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Pusser
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 pint Rum (Pussers)
  • 12 oz Orange juice
  • 12 oz Grape soda (NeHi)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together in a pitcher. Pour into hurricane glass.

drinks.name: Godiva Chocolate Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Godiva liqueur
  • 1 1/2 shot Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 shot Vodka
  • 2 1/2 shots Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker with ice, shake and pour into chilled cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Georgia Pie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • Fill with Pineapple
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Pour into a tall glass. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

drinks.name: Red Mosquito
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Hot Damn
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine vodka and hot damn in shot glass, stir and shoot.

drinks.name: Flying Moose
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/6 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/6 oz Rum
  • 1/6 oz Vodka
  • 1/3 oz Sprite
  • 1/6 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Poor liquors into the highball glass, balance with sprite and top with grenadine.

drinks.name: Italian Sunrise #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Galliano
  • 2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 cup Cream
  • Orange juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend until slushy, pour & enjoy!

drinks.name: Mean Green Love Making Machine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Orange juice
  • 1 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ingredients in shaker, shake, pour over ice.

drinks.name: Mountain Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 3 oz Mountain Dew
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Serve over crushed ice.

drinks.name: Cranberry Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 dashes Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Vodka, then cranberry juice, then orange juice, then top with grenadine

drinks.name: Vodka Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 5 oz Orange juice
  • 1 shot Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Vodka, orange juice, then top with grenadine

drinks.name: Bayou Backwater
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 6 oz Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Southern Comfort and lemonade into a 12 oz glass. Stir. Add ice if desired.

drinks.name: Mandarin Metropolitan
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice cordial
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a wedge of mandarin orange on the side.

drinks.name: Mandarin Split
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 1 part Sprite
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake once.

drinks.name: Deep South
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Dark rum
  • 1 tblsp Molasses
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • 2 dashes Cherry syrup
  • Garnish with Pineapple wedge
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix pineapple juice and molasses well, either shake or blend, stirring won't work. Pour into glass and drop rum on top but do not stir in. Splash on cherry syrup and garnish with a pineapple wedge or pineapple chunks. Serve slightly cooler than room temp, or over ice.

drinks.name: Bull Rider
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 2 splashes JÃ¤germeister
  • Fill with Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients well and enjoy!

drinks.name: Midori 2000
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Coconut rum
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Top with Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice and garnish with Pineapple wedge, 3 Pineapple leaves, 2 Cherries

drinks.name: Heartbreaker's Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka (Finlandia)
  • 2 cl Passoa
  • Fill with 1 part Pineapple juice
  • Fill with 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 Orange
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka into a blender. Add passoa, orange juice and pineapple juice. Add crushed ice and flesh of an orange. Blend well.

drinks.name: Groader
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 3 tblsp Chocolate syrup (Hershey's)
  • 2 1/2 parts White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 part Water (if desired)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients in order.

drinks.name: Wynonna's Strawberry Delight
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Sloe gin
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz strawberry Daiquiri mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with a straw.

drinks.name: Almond Joy Dark
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Dark Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Noyaux
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquors over ice. Fill with pineapple. Add grenadine to color. Shake. Garnish with pineapple flag.

drinks.name: Knoxville Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Vodka
  • 1/2 shot Peach schnapps
  • 7 oz Lemonade
  • 2 splashes Ginger ale
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mason jar 3/4 full of large ice cubes. Add peach schnapps and vodka. Add lemonade and ginger ale. Garnish with a slice of orange and two straws.

drinks.name: Peach May Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 2 tblsp Apple juice
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • And 7-Up
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: All mixed together. No special ways to mix.

drinks.name: Pink Cotton Candy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • Fill with Pink lemonade
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice and stir.

drinks.name: California Iced Tea
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or roll. Garnish with an orange slice.

drinks.name: Blue Skies
drinks.ingredients:
• 35 ml Cointreau
  • crushed Ice
  • 35 ml Blue Curacao (Bols)
  • Fill with Lemonade (Finches White)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Simply follow the order above, pouring directly into the glass. Garnish with a slice of orange on the glass.

drinks.name: Mexican stand-off
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cl Vodka (Finlandia)
  • 2 cl white Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 cl Passoa
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in the above order.

drinks.name: Midnight Flight to Malibu
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build with ice. Can be shaken, or left layered.

drinks.name: Sweet Satisfaction
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish cream
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 oz Coconut rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice and combine ingredients, stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: Deep Valley
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Gin (Beefeater)
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • 1 cl Lemon juice
  • 4 cl Pineapple juice
  • 5 cl Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Starting by the gin and the blue curacao and finishing by the soda, mix directly into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a long lemon twist, a cherry and mint leaves.

drinks.name: The Game
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball with ice, add rum and fill with cranberry, top off with triple sec.

drinks.name: Shrewsbury Slammer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Apple cider
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir each ingredient in a mixing tin, then strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Summer Sky
drinks.ingredients:
• Crushed Ice
  • 2 shots Gin
  • 1 shot Triple sec
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Add gin and triple sec, and fill with pineapple juice. Add a splash of grenadine on top.

drinks.name: Green Poison
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Green Chartreuse
  • 3 oz Gin
  • 1 splash Lemon juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into a shaker and shake well. Serve in a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Pink Millenium
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Absolut Citron
  • 2 cl Cranberry juice
  • 1 cl Sugar syrup
  • Fill with Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, cranberry juice and sugar syrup. Pour into a champagne coupe or flute. Fill with champagne or a dry sparkling wine.

drinks.name: Absolut 600
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 cl frozen Orange juice
  • 1/2 fresh Peach
  • Raspberries
  • 2-3 drops Grenadine
  • 1 tsp Lime juice
  • Appx. 2 tblsp Vanilla syrup
  • 3 cl Absolut Mandrin
  • Fill with Champagne
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chop the peach and put into a blender. Blend together with the frozen orangejuice and a few raspberries. Add a few drops grenadine, the limejuice and the vanilla syrup. Blend until it's smooth. Pour the absolut mandarin into a highball glass. Fill the glass to half with the mix from the blender and fill with champagne or a dry sparkling wine. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Raspberry Release
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Ginger ale
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients in snifter and stir.

drinks.name: Kick yer Ass Sas
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 oz Sarsaparilla (Ol' Bob Miller's)
  • 2 shots JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour shots and soda over ice in mason jar or antique glass and experience a taste of the old west.

drinks.name: Blue Lady
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 2 parts Dry Vermouth
  • 1 part Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Half fill martini glass with crushed ice, pour in alcohol and stir.

drinks.name: Hurricane #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz 151 proof rum (optoinal)
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • Grapefruit juice
  • Pineapple juice
  • Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin, rum(s), amaretto, and triple sec into a tall hurricane-style glass with ice. Add equal amounts of grapefruit juice and pineapple juice until almost full. Top with grenadine to taste.

drinks.name: White Tornado
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Sambuca
  • 1/4 oz Tequila Rose
drinks.mixinginstructions: The trick to getting the look of the Tornado is to pour the Tequila Rose slowly on the side of the shooter glass on top of the Sambuca.

drinks.name: Bootzilla
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1/2 oz Coconut rum
  • 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add liquors. Fill with Pineapple juice. Shake. Garnish with Orange slice. Serve.

drinks.name: Dressed Up Pina Colada
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Light rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 3 tblsp Coconut milk
  • 3 tblsp crushed Pineapple
  • Whipped cream
  • Chocolate syrup
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make a zig-zag pattern of chocolate syrup on the inside of the glass while turning the glass. Blend rum, coconut milk and pineapple, with 2 cups of crushed ice, on high for a few seconds, until all large chunks of ice are gone. Pour into glass. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Watermelon
drinks.ingredients:
• 375 ml Peach schnapps
  • 1 whole Watermelon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Cut a hole into one end of the watermelon and pour the peach schnapps into it. Put the watermelon into the refrigerator for at least 6 hours. -- Or cut the watermelon into small pieces and place them into a dish. Pour the peach schnapps over the watermelon evenly and refrigerate for a few hours.

drinks.name: My Wasted Generation
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Coconut rum
  • 1/2 oz Goldschlager
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice.

drinks.name: Buzzby
drinks.ingredients:
• 50 ml Vodka
  • 50 ml Peach schnapps
  • 50 ml White rum
  • 100 ml Lemonade
  • 75 ml Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingrediants in highball with ice, and stir. Lime garnish optional.

drinks.name: Zadarade
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Sour mix
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Lemon-lime soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice cubes. Add Absolut Mandrin, triple sec, and sour mix. Add a splash of cranberry juice, and pineapple. Shake, and top with a splash of lemon-lime soda.

drinks.name: Red Rattlesnake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • 1/2 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 shot Triple sec
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 1 splash 7-Up
  • 1 shot Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice. Shake.

drinks.name: Vodka Passion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 part Passion fruit syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix both liquids over ice and strain into shot glass.

drinks.name: Tropic Heat
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 2 shots Passion fruit syrup
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • 1 chunk Pineapple
  • 1 piece Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice and shake. Pour into a glass, garnish with fruit.

drinks.name: Rusty Screw
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Scotch
  • 1/2 tsp Grand Marnier
  • 1 Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine Scotch and Grand Marnier in snifter. Twist lemon peel into mixture. Sip and enjoy.

drinks.name: Crowbar
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients and strain over ice.

drinks.name: Greek Sex On The Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Vodka
  • 1 1/2 part Bacardi Limon
  • 2 parts Grenadine
  • 2 1/2 parts Orange juice
  • 1 part Gold tequila
  • 1 part Southern Comfort
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put all ingredients in together, and shake. Serve in a glass filled up to 2/3 with ice.

drinks.name: ATP
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 1 part Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Southern Comfort into a shot glass, then add the amaretto. Stir.

drinks.name: Italian Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • 1/2 oz Tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into glass. Stir. Add ice cubes.

drinks.name: Cubano
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part fresh Lime juice
  • 1 1/2 part Cointreau
  • 3 parts Jamaican Gold rum
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a shaker with ice, pour in ingredients, shake well and pour.

drinks.name: Cloud 9
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Frangelico
  • 3 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Chocolate syrup
  • 4 cups Coffee
  • 1 cup Milk
  • 10 cubes Ice
  • 2 tblsp Sugar
  • Top with Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients except whipped cream in a blener untill ice is well chopped. Pour in coffee mug and top with generous portion of whipped cream.

drinks.name: Tropical Titty Twister
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Banana liqueur
  • 1/2 shot Coconut rum (Parrot bay, Malibu)
  • 1 splash Orange vodka (Stoli Ohranj)
  • 1 splash Raspberry vodka (Stoli Razberi)
  • 1/2 shot Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Soda water
  • 1 1/2 shot Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in glass then shake.

drinks.name: The Reservoir Dog
drinks.ingredients:
