• 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix JÃ¤germeister and Irish cream over ice cubes and strain. Pour into cordial glass and serve.

drinks.name: Midori Sun
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Gin (Beefeater)
  • 3 cl Midori melon liqueur
  • 15 cl Orange juice
  • 15 cl Pineapple juice
  • 2 dashes Lemon-lime mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice and stir up! Garnish with a lime/cherry and a orange.

drinks.name: Swedish pinkie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 handful Ice
  • 3 cl Absolut Kurant
  • 6 cl Cranberry juice
  • 6 cl Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put everything in a mixer and mix thoroughly. Pour into a champagne coupe.

drinks.name: Chiquita
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Vodka
  • 2 parts Creme de Banane
  • 12 parts Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put lots of ice in your shaker. Then pour first the vodka, then the 'creme' and last the milk over the ice. Shake well. Pour into shot glasses. Makes several shots.

drinks.name: The Rising Skirt
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 1/2 oz Orange vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1/4 oz Cointreau
  • 1/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1/4 oz Raspberry liqueur
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker and shake well. Pour in a sour glass with ice and top with an orange slice.

drinks.name: Mandarin Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • 3/4 oz Grenadine
  • Twist of Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Absolut Mandarin, peach schnapps, pineapple & orange juice in a shaker with ice. Pour into collins glass fill with 7-up and stir. Add grenadine so that it sinks to bottom and garnish with a twist of lime.

drinks.name: Jeannie's Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz 7-Up
  • 2 shots Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Sloe gin
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a hurricane glass (or a long drink glass), pour orange juice, pineapple juice and 7-Up. Add Malibu rum and stir gently. Slowly add as a top off the sloe gin, so the red color slowly mixes down through the rest of the drink.

drinks.name: Black Feather
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 parts Brandy
  • 2 parts Dry Vermouth
  • 1 part Cointreau
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an Orange Twist.

drinks.name: Safe Sex on the Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Cranberry juice
  • 3 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 2 oz Peach nectar
  • Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice in a chilled glass and stir. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Orange 43
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Licor 43
  • 3 parts Orange juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice and stir to mix.

drinks.name: Spanish Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Licor 43
  • 2 parts hot Coffee
  • Whipped cream
  • Ground Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Licor 43 and coffee into a irish coffee cup. Float whipped cream and sprinkle a little cinnamon on top.

drinks.name: Leprechaun
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Irish whiskey
  • Tonic water
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour whiskey over ice in a chilled glass. Top with tonic water and stir gently. Drop in lemon twist.

drinks.name: Dancing Leprechaun
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Irish whiskey
  • 3/4 oz Drambuie
  • 3/4 oz Lemon juice
  • Ginger ale
  • Twist of Lemon peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain into glass with ice cubes. Add a twist of lemon.

drinks.name: Akis Special
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Light rum
  • 1 1/2 cl Banana liqueur
  • 2 cl Lemon juice
  • Fill with Sprite
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice in highball glass. Fill with Sprite and stir.

drinks.name: Coco Cabana
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Batida de Coco
  • 2 cl White rum
  • 8 cl Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into ice filled highball glass. Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple piece.

drinks.name: Batida de Coco
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cachaca
  • 2 parts Coconut cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend well and add crushed ice.

drinks.name: Red Hope
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 cl Gin (Beefeater)
  • 1 cl Creme de Banane (Bols)
  • 1/2 cl Apricot liqueur (Marie Brizard Apry)
  • 10 cl sweetened Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Strawberry syrup (Monin)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend. Pour into collins glass half filled with crushed ice.

drinks.name: Petite Fleur
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Grapefruit juice
  • 2 parts Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 part Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain.

drinks.name: Whisky Melba
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Scotch (Upper Ten)
  • 12 cl dry Ginger ale
  • 3-4 drops Angostura bitters
  • 1 piece fresh Ginger
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Muddle a small pice of fresh ginger in the glass. Fill glass with ice, add whisky and ginger ale. Drop in a strip of lemon peel and stir gently.

drinks.name: Call of the Snowfields (Lumikenttien Kutsu)
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Lapponia Lakka
  • 2 cl Parfait d'Amour
  • 2 cl Cream
  • 2 cl Pineapple juice
  • Sprinkle grated Nutmeg on top
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with ice and pour into cocktail glass. Sprinkle grated nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Finlandia Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Finladia Vodka
  • 2 cl Lapponia Lakka
  • Coffee
  • Float double Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and Lapponia Lakka into an irish coffee cup. Fill with hot coffee and float fresh cream or whipped cream on top.

drinks.name: Royal Temptation
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 parts Amaretto (Di Saronno)
  • 3 parts Kahlua
  • 2 parts Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part fresh double Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend. Serve in cocktail glass rimmed with white and brown chocolate flakes.

drinks.name: Violetta
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Anis liqueur
  • 1 part Parfait d'Amour
  • 2 parts Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • Fill with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Garnish with a slice of orange, fresh mint leaves and a cherry. Serve with straws.

drinks.name: Festrus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1 part Grand Marnier
  • 1 part Cinzano Bitters
  • 1 Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir in mixing glass. Pour into cocktail glass and add a squeeze of orange peel.

drinks.name: Green Hope
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Vodka (Cossack)
  • 1/2 cl Green Curacao (Bols)
  • 1/2 cl Creme de Banane (Bols)
  • 1/2 cl Grapefruit juice
  • 1 1/2 cl Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Garnish with red and red cherries.

drinks.name: Magic Star
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts white Creme de Cacao
  • 3 parts Pisang Ambon
  • 2 parts Kiwi liqueur
  • 2 parts Cream
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Garnish with powdered chocolate and a star made of crystalized fruit.

drinks.name: Ramcooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz White rum (Bacardi)
  • 1/2 oz Galliano
  • 2 oz Lime juice
  • Crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all the ingredients into a 10 oz glass, fill with crushed ice and shake. Garnish with a red cherry and a slice of lime.

drinks.name: Rheingold
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 parts Gin (Gordon's)
  • 3 parts Cointreau
  • 1 part Dry Vermouth (Martini)
  • 1 part Campari
  • Twist of Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir in a mixing glass. Add a twist of orange.

drinks.name: Juicy Guiness Premier
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Blue Curacao
  • 1 shot Taboo
  • 1 shot Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/2 pint Guinness stout
  • Fill With Carling Premier Lager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in the shots of Blue Curacao, Taboo and Vodka. Then add the Guiness to the spirits up to 3cm below the rim of the pint glass. Allow the Guiness to settle before adding the Carling Premier. Allow to settle again before consuming.

drinks.name: Buttsex
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz strong and black Coffee or espresso
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1/3 oz Lemon juice
  • Fill with Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with the coffee, preferably espresso. Add in the vodka, triple sec and lemon juice (lime juice can be used instead) and stir. Top with the whipped cream.

drinks.name: Flaming Lemon Drop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Absolut Citron
  • 1 splash Galliano
  • 1/2 slice Lemon
  • 1/4 tsp Sugar
  • 1/4 tsp 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Absolut Citron into shot glass and top off with a splash of Galliano. Place one half lemon slice flat on the rim of the shot glass, put some sugar on the slice and soak the sugar with 151 proof rum. -- Just before drinking, ignite the sugar. Blow the flame out when the it seems to caramelize the sugar. Lick the sugar off the lemon slice, down the vodka mixture, then either suck the juices or bite the pulp of the lemon.

drinks.name: GrÃ¼ngeist
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Vodka Danska citrus
  • 1 jigger Gin Bombay
  • 1/2 jigger Green Creme de Menthe
  • Will with Grapefruit-lemon soda (Squirt)
  • And Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in a blender. Pour in a hurricane glass that has been frosted with sugar. Add a twist of lemon.

drinks.name: Jumanji
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1 oz Taboo
  • 1/2 oz Port
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all liqueurs and juice in shaker, add ice and shake well. Pour into a large cocktail glass and garnish with fresh fruit.

drinks.name: Bruja Mexicana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 part Strega
  • 1/2 part Tequila (Agavero)
  • Fill with Soda water
  • Sugar syrup
  • Crushed Ice
  • Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix strega and tequila in a blender the crushed ice. Moist the rim of the glass with lemon and decorate with sugar. Add a little sugar syrup. Pour in and fill with soda.

drinks.name: Sir Francis
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Raspberry vodka (Stoli)
  • 1/2 oz Peach Vodka (Stoli)
  • 1/2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • 4 oz Lemonade
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: First, pour all 3 vodkas over ice in highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with grenadine, shake & serve.

drinks.name: Emerald Eye
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Gin
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add each ingredient to the shot glass. Color should be a bright emerald green.

drinks.name: Sex with the bartender
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Coconut rum
  • 1/2 shot Triple sec
  • 1/2 shot Lime juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • Lemon
  • Lime
  • 1 splash Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix rum, triple sec, lime juice, grenadine and 7-up. Garnish with lemon and lime, then splash irish cream down the middle.

drinks.name: Undertow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 shot Raspberry schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour schnapps, then curacao into the glass. Do not mix.

drinks.name: Curious Comfort
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Southern Comfort
  • 2 parts Blue Curacao
  • 3 parts Pineapple juice
  • 1 handful Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Blue Curacao, Southern Comfort, and half of the pineapple juice over ice and shake. Add remainder of pineapple juice to taste.

drinks.name: Iced Velvet
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 oz Canadian whisky (Black Velvet)
  • Fill with Iced tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Highball glass with ice. Pour 1 oz. Black Velvet Canadian Whisky over ice. Fill up glass with Iced Tea. Stir with a straw.

drinks.name: Champagne Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Champagne
  • 1 part Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix and serve.

drinks.name: Blindside
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1 oz Strawberry syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a large glass pour strawberry syrup, orange juice, and grapefruit juice, finally, add vodka.

drinks.name: Raggae Sunsplash
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 splashes Strawberry syrup
  • 2 dashes green coconut Food coloring
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin and pineapple juice in a shaker and shake well. Pour into the glass over ice. Add the strawberry syrup. Use a straw to add a little bit of the food coloring in the froth.

drinks.name: Resaca Water
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Rum
  • 1 oz Watermelon liqueur
  • 5 oz Pineapple juice
  • 3 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place the vodka, rum and watermelon liqueur with ice in a shaker. Add the pineapple and orange juice and shake. Pour in a hurricane glass with ice in it. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

drinks.name: The Crown Cherry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1 oz Cherry brandy
  • 1/2 oz Cherry vodka
  • 1 can Cherry Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all together in glass with ice.

drinks.name: CA area 151
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz 151 proof rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 oz Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill cup with ice. Add equal parts of all ingredients. Stir. Serve immediately.

drinks.name: Ball and Chain
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Rumple Minze
  • 1 part Goldschlager
  • 1 splash JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: In shot glass, mix 1 part Gold with 1 part Rump, add a splash of Jager over the top. Manly shot with a tasty surprise.

drinks.name: Ski Shooter
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • 2 oz Amaretto (DeSerrano)
  • 3-5 oz Sweet and sour (Mr.&Mrs. T)
  • 4 Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in a shaker, then the vodka, followed by the amaretto and the sweet and sour. Cover and shake like crazy. Pour into shot glasses.

drinks.name: Skipper's Ripper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 splash Grenadine
  • 1 can Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add rum, whiskey, and grenadine to glass. Fill the rest of the way with Coke. Stir once to mix.

drinks.name: Jamaican Bum
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 shot Banana liqueur
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • 1 shot Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour shots into glass over ice, fill with 7-up, add cream and stir. Garnish with any fruit or cherry.

drinks.name: San Patricio
drinks.ingredients:
• Coffee
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill mug 3/4 full with coffee. Add Kahlua, Bailey's and cream. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Breast Milk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz White chocolate liqueur (Godiva)
  • 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/3 oz Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 oz Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in tin with crushed ice. Shake, strain, and serve.

drinks.name: Tie Me To The Bedpost (Hawaiian)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Coconut rum (Parrot Bay)
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into an over-sized martini glass. There should be a slight amount of foam from the 7-up.

drinks.name: Cina Polada
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz 151 proof rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 oz Banana liqueur (99 Bananas)
  • 3 oz Pina colada mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend with 2 cups of ice until smooth. Pour into hurricane glass and garnish with pineapple wedge and banana slice.

drinks.name: Blue Screw
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, pour Mandrin and Blue in, then fill it with OJ. Simple.

drinks.name: Spritsor
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Canadian whisky
  • Fill with Sprite
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add ice, then whisky, fill with soda. Stir and enjoy.

drinks.name: California Rattle Snake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 splash 7-Up
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts of Southern Comfort, Malibu Rum, an Amerretto in a mixing tin over ice. Add a splash or sour mix, grenadine, and 7-up. Shake well. Can be served over ice or as a shot.

drinks.name: Gorilla Milk #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 3/4 oz Amaretto
  • 3/4 oz Banana liqueur (99 bananas)
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir or shake. Ice cream can be used instead of milk and blended in a blender.

drinks.name: C*m Shot (B-Street Bar)
drinks.ingredients:
• Small pinch of Salt
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • Top with Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Sprinkle grains of salt in bottom of shot glass. Pour equal parts of peach schnapps and irish cream. Top with whipped cream. Drink is to be consumed with 'no hands' (glass picked up with the mouth and slammed back in one 'swallow.') Creamy with just a hint of salt to cut the sweetness.

drinks.name: Temptress
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/4 oz Grenadine
  • Fill with Ginger ale
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Toss some ice cubes into a glass. Pour in a shot of grenadine and a shot of vodka. Fill with gingerale or Sprite and enjoy.

drinks.name: Jack & Ginger
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 10 oz Ginger ale
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Jack Daniels then add ginger ale. Stir.

drinks.name: Bullvodka
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 4 shots Red Bull
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 2 shots of Vodka in glass. Fill with cold Red Bull. Add 2 ice cubes (optional).

drinks.name: Blue Diamond
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 shot Avalanche Peppermint schnapps
  • 3/4 shot Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 3/4 shots of each into old fashioned glass.

drinks.name: Jacobs Haze
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl JÃ¤germeister
  • 2 cl Absolut Kurant
  • 1 can Red Bull
  • 1 slice Kiwi
  • 3 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka, JÃ¤germeister and Red Bull in a glass. Add ice and a slice of kiwi.

drinks.name: Georgia Peach #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a 10 oz highball filled with ice, add Southern Comfort, peach schnapps and fill with orange juice. Mix. Top with a dash of grenadine. Garnish with cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Martina Mandarina
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Absolut Mandrin
  • 2 parts tangerine Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Grand Marnier
  • 1 Orange peel curl
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour juice, vodka and a splash of Grand Marnier in a shaker. Add ice, shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a orange curl.

drinks.name: Cinn's Stop Light
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Grenadine
  • 1/3 oz Irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer each ingredient on top of each other. Melon first, then grenadine, then baileys. Use back of tablespoon to layer evenly.

drinks.name: Beer Breezer
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 12 oz Beer (Special Brew)
  • 2 dashes Tabasco sauce
  • 1 pinch Celery salt
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add freezer chilled vodka to frosted glass, add tabasco and celery salt, top up with very cold very strong lager.

drinks.name: Nappy Dugout
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over 2 cubes of ice. Stir.

drinks.name: Murray's Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan)
  • 1 oz Absolut Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Absolut Citron
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice cubes in glass. Pour rum, vodka, and citron vodka into glass. Fill with 7-up. Mix.

drinks.name: Battering Ram
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Tequila
  • Fill with Battery
  • 1 splash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and tequila in a highball glass, fill up with ice cold Battery and add a dash of lime. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Mocha Frappe
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cups chilled Coffee
  • 4 tblsp instant Chocolate milk (Nesquick/Ovaltine)
  • 1 1/2 cup Milk
  • 1/2 cup Whipped cream (cool whip)
  • 4 scoops Vanilla or Chocolate ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour chilled coffe, milk, and instant chocolate milk powder into blender. Mix together. Add Whipped cream and Ice Cream, and Blend together at 'Frappe' setting. Pour into mug.

drinks.name: Parrot Perch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Coconut rum (Parrot Bay)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec (Bols)
  • 1 sliced Banana
  • 3 oz fresh Orange juice
  • 1 oz Banana syrup (Island Oasis)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put liquor, juice, and syrup in blender. Add the sliced banana and ice. Blend for 45 seconds or until smooth.

drinks.name: Raging Bull #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz Tequila
  • Fill with Red Bull
  • 1 splash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a highball glass half full with ice cubes. Add vodka and tequila, fill up with Red Bull. Add a dash of lime juice.

drinks.name: Avocado Milkshake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 L Milk
  • 2-3 Avocado, halved and peeled
  • 1/2 cup Sugar or honey to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend on medium for 3 to 5 minutes.

drinks.name: Golden Sip
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Lakka
  • 2 cl Gin
  • Fill with Schweppes Russchian
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over lots of ice.

drinks.name: Forgive Me
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl White rum
  • 1 cl Lakka
  • 1 cl White Creme de Menthe
  • 2 cl Orange juice
  • 2 cl Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with ice and strain to cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Grandma's Swingin' Eggnog
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 Egg yolk
  • 1/2 cup white, granulated Sugar
  • 2 cups Milk
  • 2 cups Light rum
  • 2 cups Whipping cream
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Beat yolks until light. Add sugar and mix well. Add milk and rum. Mix well, then chill for at least 3 hours. One hour before serving, whip cream and stir into chilled mixture. Return to refrigerator for an hour. Serve in punch cups and dust with nutmeg. Serves 20.

drinks.name: Naughty Angel
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz White chocolate liqueur (Godet)
  • 1 oz 151 proof rum Bacardi
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Colorado Rattlesnake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz chilled Tequila
  • 1 1/2 oz Tomato juice
  • 1-4 dash Tabasco sauce
  • 1-4 dash Black pepper
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour chilled Tequila in shot glass and put to the side. Pour Tomato Juice in a second shot glass and dash pepper and Tabasco in the Tomato Juice. Shoot Tequila and chase with tomato juice shot.

drinks.name: Fall of Rome
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Dry Vermouth
  • 1 part Brandy
  • 1 dash Sherry
  • 1 dash Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: pour vermouth and brandy into glass, add lime and fill with orange juice, and stir. Splash brandy on top, and serve with straw.

drinks.name: Cubano Coffee
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 cl White rum (Bacardi)
  • 10 cl white Creme de Cacao (Bols)
  • 30 cl hot Coffee
  • 3 tsp Sugar
  • 20 cl double Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Warm up rum, creme cacao, sugar and coffee. Float the double fresh cream floating on top. Optionally sprinkle some grated chocolate on top of the cream.

drinks.name: Jumper Cable
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Rum
  • Jolt Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour rum over ice, fill with Jolt, and stir.

drinks.name: Emerald City
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Malibu rum
  • 4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 4 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into an ice filled hurricane glass.

drinks.name: Banana JABS
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Banana liqueur
  • 1 shot Malibu rum
  • 4 oz Mountain Dew (or to taste)
  • 1 handful Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Banana Liqueur into a Highball glass over ice. Add Malibu Rum and top with Mountain Dew.

drinks.name: Sour Mix
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Sugar
  • 2 cups Water
  • 2 cups fresh Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Dissolve sugar in water and add lemon juice. Refrigerate. Optionally you can add a little egg white (will make drinks foamy).

drinks.name: Aztec Gold
drinks.ingredients:
• 35 ml Gold tequila
  • 15 ml Creme de Banane
  • 15 ml Amaretto
  • 15 ml Galliano
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ice a shaker and add ingredients. Shake vigourously for 12- 15 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel on the rim.

drinks.name: Forest Funk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps (Archers)
  • Grapefruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Moisten the rim of the Collins glass with a lime wedge and coat the rim with granulated sugar. Ice the glass and build the vodka and peach schnapps. Top with grapefruit juice.

drinks.name: Creamy Comfort
drinks.ingredients:
• 35 ml Southern Comfort
  • Fill with Cream soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice.

drinks.name: Thorny Mexican
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 part Tequila Rose
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add Tequila Rose and follow with tequila.

drinks.name: Key West Lemonade
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Vodka
  • 2 shots Sweet and sour
  • 1 dash Sprite
  • 1 dash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix vodka and sweet and sour proportionally in any size batch, then add sprite or 7-up and cranberry accordingly, a dash each per serving. Directions are for single, regular bar size serving.

drinks.name: Charlie's Angel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Mezcal
  • 1 shot Grand Marnier
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Grapefruit juice
  • Half Fill Glass Ice cubes
  • Float 1 part Soda water on top
drinks.mixinginstructions: Half fill glass with ice. Pour all ingredients into the beaker of a cocktail shaker apart from the soda. Mix gently. Pour into glass. Take one fresh lime wedge, squeeze and drop in. Add soda to top. Serve with stirrer and straw.

drinks.name: Cat's Eye
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin (Bombay Sapphire)
  • 3/4 oz Green Chartreuse
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake gin, chartreuse, and vermouth in cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist orange peel and drop into cocktail.

drinks.name: Chumbawumba
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint Cider (Strongbow)
  • 1/2 pint Lager (Stella)
  • 1 shot Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1 shot Scotch (Bells)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a basic snake bite of half cider and lager in a pint glass. Then add to the top a shot of whiskey and vodka. Stir and then drink.

drinks.name: Mind Eraser #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3-4 cubes Ice
  • 1/2 shot Kahlua
  • 1/2 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Sprite to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place ice cubes in a small, narrow glass. Add the Kahlua, then the vodka and finally the Sprite.

drinks.name: Chocolate Cake #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Vodka
  • 1/4 oz Frangelico
  • 1 slice Lime
  • Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour 3/4 oz of vodka and 1/4 oz frangelico into a shot glass. Cover the slice of lime with powdered sugar. Bite on the lime with powdered sugar on it and hold the juice in your mouth. Then take the shot while the lime juice is still in your mouth. You now have a chocolate cake shot.

drinks.name: Shakes 'Party To Go'
drinks.ingredients:
• 10 oz Mango juice (Fresh Samantha)
  • 3 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Drink the first 6oz of a Fresh Samantha and then discretely add the triple sec and vodka. Then shake baby!

drinks.name: Lumberjack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Ouzo
  • 1/3 Sambuca
  • 1/3 Tequila
  • 1 splash Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into shot glass, no particular order. Add small dash of hot sauce.

drinks.name: Cosmoquila
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Casa Noble Gold tequila (or Crystal)
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • 1/2 oz Lime juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingrediants with ice and strain.

drinks.name: Casa Noble Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Casa Noble Tequila Reposado
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1 oz fresh Lime juice
  • Few cube Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingrediants over ice and stir.

drinks.name: Applejack (Jack Daniel's original recipe)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Jack Daniels
  • 2 parts Apple schnapps
  • 1 part Sweet and sour
  • 1 part Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in glass on the rocks.

drinks.name: The Fuzzy Magnum
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 1 wedge Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients (except lemon wedge) into shaker. Fill glass with ice and pour until about 1/4 inch remains in glass and squeeze lemon wedge into drink then drop lemon wedge in (for color and flavor).

drinks.name: J's Tropical Orgasm (JTO)
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1/3 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 1/3 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 splash Strawberry liqueur
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Orange juice
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1 piece Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients in shaker with ice. Coat the rim of the glass with sugar, strain shaker contents over ice and add the cherry.

drinks.name: Cloudberry Dream
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Lakka
  • 1 cl Aquavit
  • 1 dash Lime juice
  • 2 dl Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with crushed ice. Stir and garnish with cranberries.

drinks.name: Black Cow #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Half-and-half
  • 3 oz Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice. Stir lightly. Tastes like the treat known as a Black Cow, which is vanilla ice cream and root beer.

drinks.name: Hawaiian Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Rum
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice, (grenadine last), and stir.

drinks.name: Bloody Shame
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz V8 juice
  • 2-3 drops Tabasco sauce
  • 1 pinch Salt
  • 1 pinch Black pepper
  • 1 stick Celery
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour V8 into glass, add Tabasco and stir with celery stalk. Sprinkle on salt and pepper. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Blue Cosmopolitan
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Grapefruit juice
  • 1/2 oz Sugar syrup
  • Sugar
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Frost the rim of a chilled cocktail glass with sugar. Stir absolut citron, blue curacao, grapefruit juice, and sugar syrup in a mixing glass with ice to prevent cloudiness. Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Neopolitan martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • 1 oz Orange vodka (Stoli)
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • 1/2 oz Parfait d'Amour
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • 1 Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a mixing glass with ice, pour stoli vanil, stoli oranj, grand marnier, parfait d'amour and lime juice. Stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel

drinks.name: Stiletto Manhattan
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 dash Orange bitters
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add 1/2 oz dry vermouth in a chilled cocktail glass, and roll the vermouth around the glass and throw away the excess. In a mixing glass with ice, pour crown royal, amaretto, and orange bitters and stir. Strain into cocktail glass, and garnish with orange peel and maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Absinthe Minded Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Gin (Bombay Sapphire)
  • 1/2 oz Absinthe (Mari Maryans Absenta)
  • 1/2 oz Grand Marnier
  • Dry Vermouth
  • 1 Orange peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Properly chill 1 cocktail glass. In mixing glass with ice, pour gin and absinthe, and stir. In your cocktail glass, roll 1/2 oz of dry vermouth and throw away the excess. Strain other ingredients into cocktail glass and float 1/2 oz of grand marnier over top. Garnish with orange peel.

drinks.name: Tequilini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 1/2 oz Casa Noble Gold tequila (or Crystal)
  • A few drop Dry Vermouth
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients with ice strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Diablo
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Casa Noble Tequila Reposado
  • 1/4 oz Creme de Cassis
  • 1/2 oz fresh Lime juice
  • Ginger ale
  • 1 wedge Lime
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put ice in glass, pour Casa Noble Reposado Tequila, Creme de cassis, fresh lime juice and fill with ginger ale, stir. Pud wedge of lime on top.

drinks.name: Acid Rain
drinks.ingredients:
• 13 oz Snapple Rain
  • 7 oz Bacardi Limon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Drink about a third of the bottle of Snapple Rain, and then fill it back up with bacardi. Put the cap back on and shake it up.

drinks.name: Black Cow #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Milk
  • 1 part Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Coke into glass of milk

drinks.name: Jon Lee Hooker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Spiced rum
  • 1/2 shot Triple sec
  • 1/2 shot Peach schnapps
  • 1 splash Strawberry syrup
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix liquor and syrup with some ice, add 7-up and enjoy.

drinks.name: Long Island Milkshake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Rum
  • 1 shot Gin
  • 1/2 shot Tequila
  • 1/2 shot Triple sec
  • 4 oz shaved or crushed Ice
  • 2 oz Cream or half-and-half
  • 4 cubes Sugar
  • 1 shot Creme de Cacao
  • 1-2 drop Vanilla extract (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a large blender cup, add ice, sugar cubes, creme de cacao, vanilla extract (optional), and the cream or Half & Half. Mix for no more than 5-10 seconds. Then add the alcoholic beverages in no particular order, then hit the 'frappe' or 'whip' button on the blender for 15-20 seconds, or until you can see that all the ingredients are well-blended, but before you over-blend and start the ice melting too fast. Serve in a tall pre-chilled Tom Collins or similar tall iced-tea glass. No garnish required, serve with a large-diameter straw.

drinks.name: Mamacita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Passoa
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • Guava syrup
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
  • 1 chunk Pineapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a hurricane glass with ice add malibu rum, passoa, and cointreau. Fill the balance with guava syrup and shake well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and pineapple.

drinks.name: Grinch #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • Fill half with 7-Up
  • Fill half with Sweet and sour
  • Float 1 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with ice and put the first 4 acohols in, the put the sweet and sour and 7-up a little more 7-up than Sweet and Sour. Then float the Blue on top. If done right it should go from green to yellow to blue.

drinks.name: Monet Carribean Frost
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 1/2 shot Coconut rum (Captain Morgan Parrot Bay)
  • 1/2 shot Dark rum (Cruzan)
  • 3/4 shot Vanilla syrup (Torani)
  • 1 splash Cola (Pepsi)
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill snifter with ice, add rums and vanilla. Then splash with cola and then fill rest of glass with orange juice. Pour mixture in blender and half blend so it isn't too thick. Pour back into brandy snifter and serve.

drinks.name: Cocoa Chanel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Cognac
  • 1/2 oz White chocolate liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 1/2 oz Coconut milk
  • 1 Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Creative Native
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 1/2 oz Heavy cream
  • cracked Ice
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all liquid ingredients in blender and set on frappe till the drink is the consistancy of a smoothie. You can serve this in a frosty hurricane glass and top off with whipped cream as desired.

drinks.name: Chicks Dig It
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • Half fill Cranberry juice
  • Fill Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice filled glass shake enjoy! the chicks will dig it. can also be served up in a martini glass

drinks.name: Gorilla Smile
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 Banana
  • 3 oz Strawberries
  • 2 oz Fruit punch
  • 2 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine all in a blender with a 8-12 oz of ice, blend. Barnish with a banana slice speared through an umbrella.

drinks.name: Hot Georgia Peach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Hot Damn
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill and pour in shot glass. Serve.

drinks.name: Royal Laundry
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Blackcurrant cordial
  • 1/4 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in cocktail shaker of ice. Let sit till icy cold. Serve in a martini glass.

drinks.name: Chuck Wagon
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz ice cold JÃ¤germeister
  • 2 drops Tabasco sauce
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour jager into shot glass, add drops of tabasco and slam.

drinks.name: Chocolate Cake
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • 1 part Frangelico
  • 1 part Creme de Cacao
  • 1 part Coconut liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka then all other ingredients. Stir.

drinks.name: Viking Blood
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Aquavit
  • 2 cl Tia maria
  • Fill with Sprite or 7-Up
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Aquavit and Tia Maria over ice, fill with Sprite/7-Up and stir.

drinks.name: Coffee Crisp
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Irish cream
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add four ingredients and shake well, pour into old-fashioned glass. Do not use ice.

drinks.name: Grinch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Banana liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredents pour over ice chill, shake, strain and serve.

drinks.name: Scrumdriver
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 1/2 oz Orange juice (Tropicana)
  • 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 4 dashes Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the vodka and orange juice in a chilled highball glass over ice. Add several dashes of lime juice at your discretion.

drinks.name: Candy Corn
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Licor 43
  • 1 part Orange Curacao
  • 1 part Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Carefully layer on top of each other to resemble the halloween candy. First the Licor 43, then the orange curacao, then finally the cream.

drinks.name: Candy Corn #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot 100 proof Vodka
  • 1/4 shot Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash concentrated Orange juice
  • 1 splash Club soda
  • 1 dash Rose's Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with the vodka, 100 proof is important, then sweet and sour, etc. right in order. It naturally sets up a base for the grenadine to float through. The grenadine dash should top off the shot glass and filter down, leaving no grenadine on top. Tapping the shot while steadying the top of the glass helps this.

drinks.name: Charlie's Angel #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz White Creme de Menthe
  • double Cream
  • 1 oz Spiced rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the white creme de menth in the highball glass and fill with the double cream to an inch from the top and stir well. Next carefully float the spiced rum on the top. Drink from the bottom with a straw.

drinks.name: White Rabbit
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • 3 oz Vanilla schnapps (Dr. McGillicuddy's)
  • 1 oz Milk
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with ice, add in the vodka, vanilla liqueur, and milk shake and surve.

drinks.name: Purple Nasty
drinks.ingredients:
• Blackcurrant squash
  • 1/3 part Lager (Carling)
  • 2/3 part Cider (Strongbow)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the blackcurrant squash undiluted into the pint glass, usually 1-2 cm up the glass will do depending on how blackcurrenty you want it. Then fill up to the 2/3 rds mark with cider, finishing off with larger.

drinks.name: Four Roses Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 jiggers Four Roses Bourbon
  • 2 jiggers Dry Vermouth
  • 1/2 jigger White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 dash Angostura bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well in cracked ice, strain into cocktail glasses, serve with twist of lemon peel. Serves four.

drinks.name: St. Clement's
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Orange juice (Britvic)
  • 4 oz Bitter lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the two ingredients into a shaker with cracked ice, and serve in a highball glass over whole ice cubes with a twist of lemon and a twist of orange.

drinks.name: Ahhhhhh....
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients over ice into a glass, sit back and enjoy.

drinks.name: Irish Cream BTB
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 cup Whiskey
  • 1/3 cup Rum
  • 1 pint Whipping cream
  • 1 can sweetened Condensed milk
  • 2 Egg
  • 1 tblsp Chocolate syrup
  • 1 tsp Vanilla extract
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly, except for the whipping cream. You can use a mixer (recomended) or by hand. After all the ingredients are mixed well you will add the whipping cream, mix lightly, do not overmix.

drinks.name: Mind Eraser #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 oz 7-Up
  • 2 splashes Butterscotch schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill cup with ice, layer each ingredient starting with Kalhua, then Vodka, then butterscotch schnapps, then 7-up.

drinks.name: Jack Rogers
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • Cola
  • 1 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Jack Daniels over ice in a tall (collins) glass. Fill with coke. Lace with grenadine to taste. Garnish with a cherry (optional).

drinks.name: White Russian #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • Light cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour pour vanilla vodka and kalhua over ice. Top off with light cream and enjoy.

drinks.name: Coffee Crisp Shot
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/8 oz Kahlua
  • 1/4 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/8 oz Frangelico
  • 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour first three in order, layer Bailey's on top.

drinks.name: Fidel Castro
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Dark rum (Havana Club)
  • Juice of 1/2 Lime
  • Fill with Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with ice. Add the rum and lime juice. Fill with ginger ale.

drinks.name: Ski Slope
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 2 oz Sloe gin
  • Sour mix
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in any order, serve in glass with ice.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Logic
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Vodka
  • 2 shots Triple sec
  • 2 shots Peachtree schnapps
  • 10 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all of it into a shaker with ice, shake and pour.

drinks.name: K-Dawg's Apple Pie
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Amaretto
  • Fill with Apple juice
  • 1 tblsp Cinnamon schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a cup, pour in the Amaretto. Then add the tablespoon of Cinnamon Schnapps. Fill cup with Apple Juice and stir. Served warm.

drinks.name: Southern Pride
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the Southern Comfort into shot glass, then put in the Peach Schnapps. Bottoms up!

drinks.name: Silverado
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Campari
  • 1 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Stir and serve.

drinks.name: Tiger's Milk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Dark rum
  • 1 oz Brandy
  • 4 oz Milk
  • 2 tsp Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients in a shaker half filled with ice. Strain ingredients into an old-fashioned glass of ice.

drinks.name: Massacre
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 1/2 oz Campari
  • 4 oz Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in a highball glass of ice. Stir well and serve.

drinks.name: Buzzard's Breath
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Coffee liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a shaker half filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: D.P.R.
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • Add Cranberry juice
  • Top off 1 splash Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill collins or tall glass with ice. Add 1 ounce of vodka and .5 ounces of triple sec. Fill with cranberry juice leaving about an inch of space for a splash of club soda. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass and place one thin straw into the glass.

drinks.name: General Lee
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Club soda
  • 1/4 tsp Anisette
  • 1/2 tsp Sugar
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • Fill with Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the lime juice, club soda, and sugar into a collins glass. Stir, then add ice cubes, Anisette, and gin. Stir again. Fill drink with ginger ale. Stir well and serve.

drinks.name: Aqueduct
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 tsp Curacao
  • 1 tsp Apricot brandy
  • 1 tblsp Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half filled with ice, shake ingredients vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.

drinks.name: Citronella Cooler
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Lemon vodka
  • 2 oz Lemonade
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into a highball glass half filled with ice and stir well. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

drinks.name: Virgin Sex On The Beach
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Orange juice
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Peach nectar
  • 1 tblsp Grenadine
  • 1 wedge Pineapple
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts orange juice and cranberry juice. Mix in the nectar, and pour over ice. Pour in the grenadine last so it will sink. Garnish with pineapple.

drinks.name: Yellow Cake
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • 1/3 oz Triple sec
  • 1/3 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

drinks.name: St. Squiggle's Divorce
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 glass Coca-Cola
  • 2 drops Jolt Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour the glass 9/10's Coca-Cola, and add 1/10 Jolt Cola, and guzzle.

drinks.name: Dirty Bong Water
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Spiced rum
  • 1 oz Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients in a glass with ice. Mix and enjoy

drinks.name: Liquid Cocaine #6
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 shot Yukon Jack
  • 1/2 shot Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • 1/2 cup Orange juice
  • 1/2 cup Guava juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix the alcohol in an 8-12oz glass. Cover and shake for about 3 seconds. Mix the juices together in a glass of your choice, (add ice for character), and pour in alcohol. Serve chilled.

drinks.name: Loose Caboose
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
  • 3 oz Lemonade
  • 1 tsp Grenadine
  • 1 piece Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker half filled with ice, combine all ingredients and shake well. Strain into collins glass full of ice. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

drinks.name: Liquid Ecstasy
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Bacardi Limon
  • 15 ml Midori melon liqueur
  • 15 ml Blue Curacao
  • 15 ml Lemon juice
  • 90 ml Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build Bacardi, Midori, Blue Curacao, Lemon Juice and Pineapple Juice in that order over ice in a highball glass. Alternativly ingreadiants can also be placed in a shaker and shaken and strained into a martini glass. Add a slice of lemon to the highball glass or add a slice to the rim of the martini glass, add two straws and serve...

drinks.name: Cherry Popper
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Strawberry schnapps
  • Fill with 7-Up
  • Drop in 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pop cherry into strawberry schnapps / 7-up mix.

drinks.name: Alaskan Pipeline
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot Yukon Jack
  • 1/2 shot Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts Yukon Jack and amaretto in a tumbler with ice and shake. Serve in shot glasses.

drinks.name: Cliffhanger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Kahlua
  • 1/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/4 oz Brandy
  • Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: mix the kahlua, brandy, and irish creme and garnish with whipped creme. chill

drinks.name: Kursk
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • Battery
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and curacao in a glass filled with ice. Fill it up with Battery.

drinks.name: Texas T
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 bottle Gold tequila
  • 1/2 gal sweet Tea
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make tea add tequila, and shake.

drinks.name: London Fog #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/4 oz Absinthe (Deva)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Frappe in a highball glass.

drinks.name: Absinthe Flip
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Absinthe (Deva)
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 2 tsp Lemon juice
  • 1 Egg
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients well with ice. Strain into a prechilled Delmonico glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

drinks.name: Absinthe Curacao Frappe
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absinthe (Deva)
  • 1/2 oz Curacao
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • 2 tsp Orange juice
  • 1 slice Orange
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients and pour over crushed ice in a deep-saucer champagne glass. Add orange slice.

drinks.name: Absinthe Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1/8 tsp Absinthe
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir well with ice. Strain into a prechilled cocktail glass. Very pleasant with an onion stuffed olive. Some bartenders pour a soucon of Absinthe into the glass, swirl it around and then add the martini.

drinks.name: Ladies Cocktail #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Calvert Extra Whiskey
  • 2 dashes Absinthe
  • 3 dashes Anisette
  • 1 dash Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir well with ice. Strain into glass. Serve with piece of pineapple on top.

drinks.name: Absinthe Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Absinthe (Deva)
  • 3 dashes Benedictine
  • 2 dashes Bitters
  • 1 oz Water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with cracked ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Absinthe Suissesse
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absinthe (Deva)
  • 2-3 drops Anisette
  • 2-3 drops Orange-flower water
  • 1 tsp White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 Egg white
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Earthquake Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Bourbon
  • 3/4 oz Absinthe (Deva)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a Collins glass.

drinks.name: Sazerac Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tsp Sugar
  • 1 1/2 oz Rye whiskey
  • 1 dash Absinthe (Deva)
  • 2 dashes Peychaud bitters
  • 2 dashes Angostura bitters
  • 1 Lemon peel
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill an Old Fashioned glass by filling with crushed ice. In another glass mix the sugar with the bitters dissolving the sugar. Add some ice, stirring to chill. In the Old Fashioned glass remove the ice and pour in the absinthe coating the entire glass. Remove the excess absinthe. Add the Rye Whiskey and bitters/sugar mixture. Add the Lemon Twist.

drinks.name: T N T Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Cognac
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1-2 dash Bitters
  • 1 Absinthe (Deva)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Sea Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absinthe (Deva)
  • 1 half Lemon juice
  • 1 tsp Sugar
  • 1 Egg white
  • Seltzer or Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with seltzer.

drinks.name: Liquid Cocaine #7
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 3/4 glass Champagne (Riccadona Asti)
  • Fill with Red Bull
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it all together in a champagne flute and drink away!!

drinks.name: Fuzzy Logic #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 1 1/2 part Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients together and mix vigorously. Pour into glass and enjoy!

drinks.name: Virgin Mary
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Tomato juice
  • 1 dash Lemon juice
  • 1/2 tsp Worcestershire sauce
  • 2-3 drops Tabasco sauce
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

drinks.name: Lara Croft
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Jim Beam
  • 2 cl White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 cl Sirup of roses
  • 1 dash Triple sec
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Serve in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Nipple
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1 1/2 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 1 dash Triple sec
  • 2/3 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all liquids over ice and shake. Pour into high ball and garnish with either an orange wheel or a cherry. Can also be made frozen.

drinks.name: Hawaiian Punch #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in hurricane (or collins glass) and stir.

drinks.name: Tokyo Rose
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka (Grey Goose)
  • 1 part Sake
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: Dirty Bong Water #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 splash Sour mix
  • 1 splash Pineapple juice
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend, chill, and serve in 2-3 shot glasses.

drinks.name: Screaming Banana
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Banana liqueur (99 Bananas)
  • Add 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake or mix with a straw.

drinks.name: Screwed Driver
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • Fill with Lemonade
  • 1 dash Cranberry juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka. Fill with lemonade and add a dash of cranberry juice.

drinks.name: Kiddie Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 20 cl Lemon-lime soda (7-up or Sprite)
  • 3 cl Grenadine syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in a highball glass. Add 7-up or Sprite over ice and sprinkle grenadine syrup over it. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

drinks.name: Limoncello
drinks.ingredients:
• 7 Lemon
  • 1 L Grain alcohol
  • 1 L Water
  • 700 gr Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Soak skin of 7 lemons in alcohol for 2 days. Strain. Boil water and sugar and chill. Mix with alcohol. Store in the fridge.

drinks.name: Jamaican Ass-Kicker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz 151 proof rum (Bacardi)
  • 6 oz chilled Jolt Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in the rum. Top with cola.

drinks.name: Almond Casa Noble
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Casa Noble Tequila Reposado
  • 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients in mixing glass with ice, except almond, then strain into a cocktail glass. Drop lime in glass.

drinks.name: Green Casa Noble
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Casa Noble Gold tequila
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 twist Lime peel
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake ingredients in mixing glass with ice, except lime twist, then strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lime twist.

drinks.name: Presticles Spectacles Wallet and Watch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1 oz Brandy (E&J)
  • 1 oz Scotch (Scoresby)
  • 1 oz Peppermint schnapps (Phillips)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add all four ingredients into a small cup over ice

drinks.name: Black Cow
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 10 oz Root beer
  • 1 tblsp Chocolate syrup
  • Whipped cream
  • Maraschino cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour root beer over ice cream and chocolate syrup in a large tumbler glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry. Serve with a straw and a long spoon.

drinks.name: Dr. Debbie
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Barenjager
  • 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Squeeze in the lemon slice and shoot it!

drinks.name: Frozen Vanilla Honey Bee
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • 2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 oz Barenjager
  • Add 5 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in blender at blend setting.

drinks.name: Nut and Honey
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Barenjager
  • 3/4 oz Frangelico
  • 2 oz Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine and chill.

drinks.name: Carrot Cake #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Peach schnapps
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass to 1/3 with Peach Scnapps, then with 1/3 Bailey's Irish cream and float Glodschlager on top.

drinks.name: Paralyzer #3
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 oz Coca-Cola
  • Ice
  • Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an 8 oz. glass mix Kalhua, Vodka, Rum, and Coke over ice. Fill rest of glass with Milk and stir.

drinks.name: Millennium Knockout
drinks.ingredients:
• 50 ml Vodka
  • 25 ml Galliano
  • 25 ml Brandy
  • 75 ml fresh Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a cocktail shaker, add some ice, either 4 cubes or equivalent crushed. Add Galliano, brandy and vodka. Top up with orange juice. Shake and serve in a highball glass with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Texas Tumbleweed
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Creme de Cacao
  • Add Half-and-half to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend until smooth.

drinks.name: Dirty Ocean
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 part Malibu rum
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Blue Curacao
  • 1 part Pineapple juice
  • 1 part Sweet and sour
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Collins glass with ice, add ingredients and mix. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

drinks.name: French Russchian
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Anisette
  • 3 cubes Ice
  • Fill with Schweppes Russchian
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put the ice cubes in the glass, pour the Anisette in, fill with Schweppes Russchian

drinks.name: Chocolate Otis
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 part 151 proof rum (Bacardi)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add from darkest to lightest (Kahlua, Irish Creme, Bacardi 151). For a delightful twist, ignite the 151 for a Flaming Otis.

drinks.name: Zooom!
drinks.ingredients:
• Layer 1/3 oz Sugar syrup
  • 1/3 oz Grenadine
  • 1/3 oz Kahlua
  • 1/3 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/3 oz Galliano
  • 1/3 oz Bailey's irish cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer the six ingredients in order. Be very careful not to let the baileys and grenadine mix.

drinks.name: Peach Daiquiri
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Light rum
  • 2 shots Peach schnapps
  • 4 oz Peach nectar
  • 3 cups frozen Peach slices
  • 2 cups crushed Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend Ice until throughly crushed. Add Rum, Peach Nectar, and Schapps. Lightly blend until mixed well. Add Frozen Peaches. Blend until slushy. Enjoy

drinks.name: Tropical Tease
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/4 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 1/4 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 3/4 oz Banana liqueur
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour direectly into a Hurricane glass with ice. Shake, do not stir. Garnish with a lime wheel.

drinks.name: Sicilian Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Frangelico
  • 1 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 shot Amaretto
  • 1 shot Kahlua
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, then pour in all alcohol and milk and stir. If desired, garnish with whipped cream.

drinks.name: Brass Funky
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 parts Mickey's Malt liquor
  • 1 part Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour orange juice into Mickey's malt liquor.

drinks.name: Pam's Root Beer Float
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 2 shots Irish cream
  • Fill with Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the glass with ice, add 2 shots Irish Cream and fill with cola. Mix gently, it will be very foamy!

drinks.name: Slim Shady
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 Scotch
  • 3/4 Guinness stout
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in Scotch first, then the Guinness.

drinks.name: Back-up Goalie
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 L Mountain Dew
  • 1 fifth Southern Comfort
  • 1 fifth blue Maui
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour together in a single container. Pour in to individual glasses. Just make sure the container is big enough for all the ingrediants.

drinks.name: Bushwacker #5
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 4 oz Coconut cream
  • 4 oz Half-and-half
  • 2 cups Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend until smooth.

drinks.name: Aussie Riviter
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka (Stolichnaya)
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 4 oz Guava juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all four ingredients and strain into cocktail glass. Dash of lime is optional. Recipe can be doubled if needed.

drinks.name: Irish Twist
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 shot Bailey's irish cream
  • 2 Ice cubes
  • 1/4 shot Irish Mist
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Bailey's in glass. Add 2 cubes of ice. Add Irish Mist.

drinks.name: Pineapple Cocktail #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 small Pineapple
  • 2 oz Vodka
  • 2 tblsp Honey
drinks.mixinginstructions: Get a small pineapple, wash it, cut the top. Using a knife get some of the pulp of the pineapple. In a blender mix the pulp, vodka (best if it is left in the freezer), some ice and the honey. Pour the drink inside the pineapple again (without the ice) and put the top back again, do a small hole in the top and serve with a straw.

drinks.name: Carjacker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Cognac (Hennessey)
  • 12 oz Malt liquor
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill shot glass of Hennessey and then drop it into a pint of malt liquor.

drinks.name: Ghetto Hell
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Vodka (Aristocrat)
  • 20 oz Malt liquor (Colt 45)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka in mason jar, add malt liquor.

drinks.name: Holy Blue
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • Fill with Tonic water
  • 1 dash Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine alcohol in a rocks glass over ice. Fill with tonic water, then add only a dash of Blue Curacao. Be sure the drink is served with the tonic still bubbling.

drinks.name: Lick-Her-Itch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Sambuca
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in a mixing glass with a little ice, Start with Sambuca, add vodka, and then cranberry juice. Shake and Strain into a rocks/shooter glass with no ice. Garnish with a single cherry.

drinks.name: Black Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Gold tequila
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 splash Lime juice
  • Fill with Sour mix
  • And Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well and pour into a salt-rimmed glass. Garnish with lime and rosary: invoke curse of choice.

drinks.name: Long Sigh
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cognac (VSOP)
  • 1 part Chambord raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour equal measures of Chambord and Cognac into snifter. Swirl to mix. Microwave for 20-30 seconds - if it begins to bubble, stop heating!

drinks.name: Berry Patch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Strawberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 7-Up or Sprite
  • Half-and-half
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine the schnapps and creme de cacao in a Collins glass. Then fill the glass almost to the top with 7-up or Sprite, and top with half-and-half. Swirl with a straw before serving to give it a cloudy or milky appearance.

drinks.name: Sour Cow
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Kentucky Bourbon (Jim Beam)
  • Fill with cold Chocolate milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour bourbon, fill rest of glass with cold chocolate milk. Drink it like a shot and enjoy.

drinks.name: Prince
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl white Tequila
  • 2 cl Licor 43
  • 3 cl Coconut cream
  • 2 cl Cream
  • Fill with Passion fruit juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend ingredients with crushed ice. Garnish the drink with coconut flakes, half a passion fruit and mint leaves.

drinks.name: Flaming Confederate
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1/2 oz Godiva liqueur
  • 1 dash 151 proof rum (Bacardi)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Start with dash of grenadine. Layer godiva Liqueur, then float 151 proof rum. Light rum on fire. Blow out shot, then drink.

drinks.name: Chewybubu
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 Blue Curacao
  • 1/3 Ice 101
  • 1/3 JÃ¤germeister
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour blue curacao into bottom third of shot glass, then, carefully pour the Ice 101 using an upside down spoon. Finally, fill remainder with JÃ¤germeister the same way.

drinks.name: JEE Sweet
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Gin
  • 3/4 oz Apricot brandy
  • 3/4 oz Cointreau
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker and serve in a chilled martini glass.

drinks.name: Natalie Nosedive
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 bottle Absolut Citron
  • 1 qt Pink lemonade
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Crush the ice cubes and fill the pitcher half way. Then pour in the vodka and the pink lemonade. Continue to pour in either the vodka or lemonade until you can barely taste the vodka. Stir.

drinks.name: Berry Breeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Chambord raspberry liqueur
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Kahlua
  • Top with Cream
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add 1 oz. each of Chambord, Kahlua, and Baileys. Top with cream. Short Shake.

drinks.name: Dillinger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 8 oz Milk
  • 1 tsp Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and triple sec in glass, and pour milk into glass, then sprinkle cinnamon on top.

drinks.name: Blonde on Ice
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/2 oz Peppermint schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • Fill Cream
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add creme de banane, followed by peppermint schnapps and vodka. Fill with cream. Short shake.

drinks.name: A Smile
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Creme de Cassis
  • 6 oz Orange juice
  • 6 oz double strength Lemonade
  • 1 oz Grenadine
  • 1 scoop Whipped cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: With three ice cubes put vodka, light rum, cassis, orange juice, and frozen lemonade made at double strength into a shaker. Shake well. Place half the grenadine in the bottom of each white wine glass, pour in shaken mixture till withine inch of rim. With a large spoon drop whipped cream carefully in glass. Take small spoon spread to all the edges and to look nice. Serve. Makes two glasses.

drinks.name: Star Burst
drinks.ingredients:
• 30 ml Strawberry liqueur
  • 30 ml Banana liqueur
  • 15 ml Peach schnapps
  • 1-2 scoop Ice-cream
  • 1 dash Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything in the blender.

drinks.name: Peach Kazi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • 1 splash Lemon juice
  • 1 dash Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine ingredients with ice, shake and pour into a shot glass.

drinks.name: Sloe Gin Fizz
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Sloe gin (DeKuyper)
  • 1 tsp Lemon juice
  • Ice cubes
  • Fill with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour sloe gin and lemon juice over ice in glass. Fill with soda. Garnish with cucumber stick or lemon peel.

drinks.name: Another Hot Day in Fresno
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz Sweet and sour
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in glass with ice. Fill with 7-Up. Stir.

drinks.name: Mexican Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 3/4 oz Dry Vermouth
  • 1 slice Jalapeno
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake tequila and vermouth with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass, add pepper slice.

drinks.name: Limon Skyy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 2 oz Vodka (Skyy)
  • Ice
  • 1 slice Lemon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add vodka, rum, and ice together in a shaker and shake well. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and add twist of lemon. Serve immediately after pouring.

drinks.name: Mandrin Sprite
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Absolut Mandrin
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Absolut Mandrin into Collins glass and fill with Sprite. Stir gently.

drinks.name: Fragile Baby
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Coffee
  • 2 oz Frangelico
  • 2 oz Kahlua
  • Whipped cream
  • Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix liquor ingredients, then add coffee to fill. Top off with whip cream and a cherry. Serve right away.

drinks.name: Gold Coast
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Tequila
  • 1 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Cherry juice
  • 3/4 oz Lemon juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and pour into chilled cocktail or martini glass.

drinks.name: Cream in da Panties
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 1/2 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1/4 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 1/4 oz Amaretto
  • 1 splash Cream
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker half filled with ice, shake and then strain into shotglass

drinks.name: Terri's Tropical Passion
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Passoa
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1/2 oz Apricot brandy
  • Fill 7-Up
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into collins glass. Garnish with Cherries.

drinks.name: Monique
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 handful Strawberries
  • 6 cl Milk
  • 6 cl Orange juice
  • 4 cl Tequila
  • Fill up with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mash the strawberries, fill up with milk, orange juice and tequila. Mix it and fill up with the soda and some ice, decorate with a strawberry.

drinks.name: Yin-Yang
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz White chocolate liqueur (Godet)
  • 1/2 oz Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer white chocolate liqueur over coffee liqueur. Enjoy.

drinks.name: Orange Drop
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 3/4 oz Sugar syrup
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1 splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: In mixing tin add liquors and simple syrup, splash oj, shake, and strain.

drinks.name: Get Jenny
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 2 oz Sweet and sour
  • 6 oz Beer
  • Fill with Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin, sweet and sour mix, and beer to a beer mug. Add ice and stir lightly.

drinks.name: Metropolis
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 oz Vodka (Vox)
  • 2 oz Blue Curacao (Dekyper)
  • 1 oz Razzmatazz
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry vodka (Finlandia)
drinks.mixinginstructions: In a shaker, combine Vodka and blue curacao. Chill until cloudy. Pour into martini glass. Tilt glass and pour in raspberry schnapps (will sink to the bottom). Float cranberry vodka on top. This will give you levels of color: red - blue - purple.

drinks.name: Sweet Treat
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Tia maria
  • 1 part Galliano
  • Fill with Coca-Cola
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Tia Maria and Galliano over ice, and fill to taste with Coca Cola

drinks.name: Spiked Cherry
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Gin
  • 1 1/2 oz Cherry juice
  • 6 oz 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake gin and cherry juce. Fill with 7-up and ice.

drinks.name: Cadillac Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 3 oz Sweet and sour
  • 3/4 oz Triple sec
  • 3/4 oz Lime juice
  • Float Grand Marnier
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake tequila, triple sec, sour mix, and lime juice with ice. Pour over ice in salt-rimmed margarita glass. Float Grand Marnier on top. Garnish with slice of lime if desired.

drinks.name: Auger
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 4 oz Orange juice
  • 1/2 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a Collin's glass about 3/4 full with ice cubes. Add all other ingredients, stir well, and enjoy.

drinks.name: Powdered Chocolate Donut
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 shot white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 pinch Powdered sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour equal parts of malibu rum and creme de cacao into a shot glass. Sprinkle the top lightly with powdered sugar.

drinks.name: Crase
drinks.ingredients:
• 25 ml Bacardi Limon
  • 12 1/2 ml Raspberry liqueur (Chambord)
  • 12 1/2 ml Cointreau
  • Fill with Apple juice
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake hard and fast, strain over ice.

drinks.name: The Incredible Hulk #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 2 parts Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour vodka and midori over ice in a highball glass. Add pineapple juice. Top off with a splash of 7-up.

drinks.name: Liquid Love
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Amaretto
  • 2 parts Pineapple juice
  • 2 parts Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill high ball glass with ice. Pour vodka and amaretto into glass in equal parts. Then add two parts sour and pineapple juice.

drinks.name: Geeba
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Absolut Citron
  • 1 part Orange juice
  • 2 parts Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour OJ over ice. Add Midori and Absolut. Shake by flipping. Add Sprite. Garnish with orange slice.

drinks.name: Sunding Over the top
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Bacardi Limon
  • 5 cl 7-Up
  • 3 cl Sour mix
  • 2 cl Schweppes Russchian
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the bacardi then the 7-up, sour mix and finally the russchian on top. Use a lot of ice.

drinks.name: Pimm's Cup New Orleans Style
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Pimm's No. 1
  • 1 shot Lemonade
  • Top with 7-Up or ginger ale
  • 1 slice Cucumber
drinks.mixinginstructions: In an ice filled collins glass, add Pimm's and lemonade. Top with 7-up or ginger ale. Garnish with cucuber slice.

drinks.name: Cointreauceptive
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Cointreau
  • 2 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: There are several ways to mix this drink. Pour the Bailey's over the ice and float the cointreau, or just mix it together. It usually needs a stir no matter.

drinks.name: Corfu Lule
drinks.ingredients:
• 6 cl Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 5 cl Sour mix
  • 4 cl Orange juice
  • 3 cl Sprite
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Ice first, then the vodka, sour mix, almost as much orange juice and some sprite on the top.

drinks.name: Rudy
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Raspberry schnapps
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 splash Sweet and sour
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill Collins glass with ice and pour all ingredients in order and shake. Pour into same glass. Serve with lemon wedge and large straw.

drinks.name: Puff's Magick Dragon
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 packages Grape Kool-Aid
  • 2 cups Ice
  • 1 bottle Club soda
  • 1/2 bottle Hot Damn
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingreedients in a punch bowl or large pitcher. Stir and add more liquid if needed.

drinks.name: Fruit Sangria
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 L Red wine
  • 2 oz Triple sec
  • 4 oz Brandy
  • Juice of 1 Orange
  • Juice of 1 Lemon
  • 1 Peach
  • 10-20 Cherries
  • 1 bottle Club soda
  • 6 oz Sugar syrup
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pit cherries and soak in 2 oz. of the brandy. Slice peach and soak in the other 2 oz. of the brandy and all of the triple sec. Juice the lemon and orange into a pitcher and add the sugar syrup. Add the cherry and peach mixtures, and the red wine. Chill. To serve, fill a red wine glasses about 1/3 full with ice and add the alcohol/fruit mixture. Top with club soda to taste.

drinks.name: White Mistress
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice cubes
  • 1/2 shot Creme de Banane
  • 1/2 shot Malibu rum
  • 1 shot Creme de Cacao
  • 1 shot Tia maria
  • 3 oz chilled Hot chocolate
  • 1 slice Banana
drinks.mixinginstructions: Half fill glass with ice. Pour liqueurs into beaker, half full with ice. Pour in chilled hot chocolate. Shake gently. Strain into glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh banana dusted with chocolate powder.

drinks.name: Lost Cause
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cubes Ice
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Gin
  • 1 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 4 oz Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Malibu, gin, and lime juice over ice. Stir in club soda.

drinks.name: Sister S.
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 cl Milk (2.7-3.8% )
  • 2 cl Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 cl Kahlua
  • 1/2 tsp Amaretto
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice, but not to hard - with passion & tenderness.

drinks.name: Blue Bahama
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Rum (Captan Morgans)
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Triple sec (De Kuyper)
  • 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 oz Blue Curacao
  • 2 shots Sour mix
  • 1 splash 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix gin, rum, vodka, tequila, triple sec, Midori, blue curacao and sour mix together. shake well and pour into Hurricane glass. Then add a splash of 7-up to the top and serve.

drinks.name: Sand In Your Crack
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/4 oz Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 6 oz Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve.

drinks.name: Bluuzberry Shake
drinks.ingredients:
• 4-5 scoops Vanilla ice-cream
  • 3 oz Blueberry schnapps (DeKuyper)
  • 3 oz Grape juice (Welch)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend ingredients in blender until thoroughly mixed. Add more ice cream if too thin. Garnish with blueberries and strawberry.

drinks.name: Scottish Jersey
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Scotch
  • 1/2 cup strong Hot chocolate
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour first the scotch and then the cocoa over a lot of ice in a huge glass. The cocoa is going to melt 5-6 ice cubes, and it is always nice to have some left :)

drinks.name: Turbulence
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in amaretto and southern comfort. Add 7-up and ice as desired.

drinks.name: Dutch Flag
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/3 oz PiÃ±a Colada
  • 1/3 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer. Blue curacao first, then pina colada and last grenadine on top.

drinks.name: The Dire
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Rum (Captain Morgan)
  • 4 oz Tonic water
  • 1 splash Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Tonic Water and Rum equally over ice, and add a splash of orange juice and a lime.

drinks.name: Hawaiian Redneck
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Black rum (Bacardi)
  • 2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 6 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Grenadine to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine rum, Southern Comfort, and pineapple juice in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into old fashioned glass. Add grenadine, just enough to give the classic 'sunrise' effect. Stir before drinking.

drinks.name: Copper Cocktail
drinks.ingredients:
