• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 1/2 oz Campari
  • 1/2 oz Green Chartreuse
  • 1 splash Angostura bitters
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake rum, chartreuse, campari, and bitters in ice filled cocktail shaker. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Sqeeze lime and drop into drink.

drinks.name: Bearsicle
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Barenjager
  • 1 oz Peppermint schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix over ice. Serve.

drinks.name: White Parrot
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Coconut rum (Parrot Bay)
  • 6 oz Heavy cream
  • 1 tsp Sugar (optional)
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all ingredients and shake well.

drinks.name: Power Russian
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 shots Vodka (Absolut)
  • 3 shots Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • 1 tblsp Sugar
  • 1 dash Chocolate syrup (Hershey's)
  • 3-4 cubes Ice
  • 1 1/5 cup Milk
  • 2 shots Butterscotch schnapps (Buttershots)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix everything, but the ice in a blender, for about 30 seconds. Then you can either add the ice, and blend again, or simply pour the drink over the ice.

drinks.name: Vampyre Brew
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 2 splashes Pineapple juice
  • 2 splashes Orange juice
  • 2 splashes Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill glass with ice, add all ingredients, stir well.

drinks.name: Coffee Dreamer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 tblsp instant Coffee (Nescafe)
  • 2 tblsp Sugar
  • 1/2 cup Milk
  • 4 cubes Ice
  • 1/2 cup Irish cream (Bailey's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients and strain over a large ice cube in a Red Wine glass.

drinks.name: Leap Frog
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot blue Maui
  • 1 shot Watermelon schnapps (Pucker)
  • 5 splashes Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Over ice, add vodka, watermelon schnapps, blue maui,and o.j. Do not stir. Garnish with cherry and slice of orange.

drinks.name: Lazy Haze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Peach schnapps
  • 1 shot Apple schnapps (Pucker)
  • 3 parts Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Over ice, add peach schnapps, apple schapps, and orange juice to fill glass. Garnish with apple chunk and orange wedge.

drinks.name: The Green Monster
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 pint Cider
  • 1/2 pint Lager
  • 1 shot Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 shot Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: This is to be made up in a pint glass. Make up your basic snake bite, add the spirits, stir well, it goes bright green!

drinks.name: Exotic Pimms
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 glass Pimm's No. 1
  • 1/3 glass Lemonade
  • 1/4 glass Passion fruit juice
  • 1 dash Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Add the lemonade to the Pimms, then the passion fruit juice and finally a dash of ccranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, a slice of lime, cubes of cucumber and apple and a few mint leaves.

drinks.name: Classic Pimms
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 glass Pimm's No. 1
  • 3/4 glass Lemonade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir, and add a slice of lemon and a few mint leaves.

drinks.name: Scandanavian Sun
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Absolut Citron
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 1/4 oz Cointreau
  • 1 oz Orange juice (fresh)
  • 1/2 oz Soda water
  • 1 splash Lemon juice (fresh)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Chill ingredients in a mixing tin over cracked ice. Stir gently and strain into cocktail or martini glass. Garnish with orange spiral.

drinks.name: Blue Russian Kiss
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Champagne
  • 1 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 shot Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix Champagne, chilled Vodka, and blue curacao in glass. Over ice if desired.

drinks.name: Raspberry Southside
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Bacardi Limon
  • 1 oz Raspberry schnapps
  • 3 oz Sugar syrup
  • 1 oz Lime juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingredients and pour over ice. You can garnish with mint leaves but I never do.

drinks.name: Absolut Symphony
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Absolut Citron
  • 2 cl Strawberry liqueur (Liviko)
  • 4 cl Lemon juice
  • 1 cl Grenadine
  • 12 cl Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake. Pour into glass and add Sprite. Garnish with a strawberry.

drinks.name: Lime Bomber
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 fifth Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1/2 gal lime Sherbet
  • 2 L Lemon-lime soda (Storm or Sprite)
  • Ice (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill blender with sherbet. Pour in 1 part vodka and 2 parts lime soda until blender is full. Mix well. For colder drinks add ice when putting ice cream in.

drinks.name: Kentucky Shitkicker
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Jack Daniels
  • 1/2 oz Crown Royal
  • 1/2 oz Wild Turkey
  • 1/2 oz Jim Beam
  • 1 splash Coca-Cola
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix ingredients together and splash coke. Drink is strong, but very flavorful.

drinks.name: Ladies Man
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Galliano
  • 2 cl Cognac (Courvoisier)
  • 2 cl Cream
  • 1 cl Strawberry syrup
  • 1 Egg yolk
  • 1 slice Kiwi (garnish)
  • Sprinkle with Chocolate
drinks.mixinginstructions: Blend all the ingredients together and pour into glass. Garnish with a slice of kiwifruit and sprinkle the top with chocolate.

drinks.name: Latana
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz White wine
  • 3 oz Sprite
  • 2 oz Raspberry liqueur
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a pint glass half way with white wine. Then pour in sprite. Fill shot glass with raspberry liqueur and drop shot glass into pint glass.

drinks.name: Detroit Diesel
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Yellow Chartreuse
  • 1 shot JÃ¤germeister
  • Fill with Ginger ale
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour, and stir gently.

drinks.name: Mt. Fujiyama
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 oz Mountain Dew
  • 4 oz Sake
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill an 8 Oz glass with Mt. Dew and warm sake. serve either chilled or warm.

drinks.name: Great Green Monster
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 L Squirt
  • 1 fifth Lime vodka
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix together and serve in a pitcher with ice.

drinks.name: Blue Neptune
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz orange or Lemon vodka
  • 1 splash Blue Curacao
  • Juice of 1/2 Lemon
  • Superfine Sugar
  • 1 Lemon peel
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a shaker with vodka, blue curacao, lemon juice, and ice. Shake well. Strain into sugar-rimmed martini glass. Garnish with lemon peel.

drinks.name: Nut Case
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Light rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Amaretto
  • 1 1/2 oz Frangelico
  • 3/4 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice. Strain into old-fashioned glass on the rocks.

drinks.name: Sugared Rose
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Cranberry vodka (Finlandia)
  • 1 splash Lemon juice
  • 1 splash Cranberry juice
  • Rim glass with Sugar
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain cranberry vodka into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Add a splash of lemon juice and cranberry juice. For decoration, insert a stirrer through a slice of lemon to bridge over the glass.

drinks.name: A Better Melonball
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Midori melon liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 5 oz Sprite or 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pack glass with ice. Pour the Midori in first, then add the Peach Schnapps. Fill the rest of the glass with Sprite or 7-up.

drinks.name: Slow Screw up against a Red Wall
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot RedRum
  • 1/2 shot Galliano
  • 1/2 shot Sloe gin
  • 6 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour shots over ice into shaker, add orange juice. Mix and pour into glass.

drinks.name: Nham Zoom
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Vodka (Smirnoff)
  • 1 shot Brandy
  • Top up of Orange juice
  • 1 tsp Blackcurrant cordial (Ribena)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a shot of vodka and a shot of brandy into a straight glass. Fill nearly to the top with orange juice. Then take a teaspoon of blackcurrant cordial and gently dribble it onto the surface of the drink so it slowly sinks down to make a lovely pattern. Add a straw, so the drinkee can create swirls if desired.

drinks.name: A 243
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 2 cl Licor 43
  • 2 cl Blue Curacao
  • 3 dl Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka, the licor 43 and the blue curacao in a glass and stir. Fill up with soda and some ice cubes.

drinks.name: Banana Splat
drinks.ingredients:
• 2-1/2 oz Banana liqueur
  • dash Chocolate liqueur (Godiva)
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 3 oz Milk
  • 1 splash Malibu rum
  • Whipped cream
  • 1 dash Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: In blender, mix banana liquer, rum, chocolate liquer, creme de cacao and milk with ice and blend until smooth. Pour into either red wine glass or rocks glass, top with a dollop of whipped cream, sprinkle of nutmeg and a cherry on top. Use a VERY light touch with the Malibu.

drinks.name: Strawberry Soak
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cups Strawberries
  • 1/2 cup Sugar
  • 750 ml AlizÃ©
drinks.mixinginstructions: Sprinkle sugar over diced strawberries, and toss by hand in a bowl. Pour Alize over strawberries, and let soak for 15 min. to a half an hour. Strain mixture well, and store in Alize bottle for later use. Will yeild more than a bottle, so have another empty bottle ready in reserve.

drinks.name: Anime Freak
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Tropico Rum
  • 1 shot Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Cranberry juice
  • 1 part 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Tropico, Midori, Cranberry Juice, and 7-Up on the rocks. Serve in a glass with no ice.

drinks.name: Incredible Hulk #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 1/2 part Triple sec
  • 1 splash Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: For one shot, just mix right in the shot glass. For a larger amount, use a shaker with the same proportions.

drinks.name: Listerine
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part White Creme de Menthe
  • 1 part Coconut rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in a shot glass.

drinks.name: The Great Hercules
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Bacardi Limon
  • 2 cl Passoa
  • 1 cl Lime juice
  • 8 cl Passion fruit juice
  • 4 cl Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake all ingridients but the Sprite. Pour into a highball glass and top with the Sprite.

drinks.name: Fuzzy Buccaneer
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3 oz Orange juice
  • 1 1/2 oz Rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix 1 part rum, 1 part peach schnapps, and 2 parts O. J. and shake. Pour over crushed ice. Also makes a great frozen drink when blended like a frozen daiquiri

drinks.name: Blazing Fire
drinks.ingredients:
• Ice
  • 1 part Vodka
  • 1 part Gin
  • 1 part Light rum
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • Pineapple juice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: In mixing glass, pour in equal parts vodka, gin, rum, and triple sec. Add pineapple juice and a hearty dash of grenadine for color. Shake and strain over ice, garnish with orange and cherry spear. It should come out a bright, fiery orange color.

drinks.name: Captain's Treasure
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Spiced rum (Cpt. Morgan)
  • 1 oz Goldschlager
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in shot glass, make sure you have some gold flakes in it.

drinks.name: Nuclear Mantis
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 - 6 parts Cranberry juice
  • 1 part Spiced rum (Cpt. Morgan)
  • 1 part Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir in a collins glass.

drinks.name: Mellow Tennessee
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Jack Daniels
  • 15 cl Ginger ale
  • 5 cl Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour Jack Daniels into highball glass. Add ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale and finish off by topping it with orange juice.

drinks.name: Blue Suede Shoes
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1/2 oz Creme de Banane
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice. Shake and strain.

drinks.name: Disco LemOnade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Bacardi Limon
  • Fill With Lemonade
  • Top with 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the Collins glass with ice, then add in the sloe gin, Bacardi Limon and triple sec. Fill with Lemonade and shake. Top the drink with a circle of blue curacao, stir and garnish with a lemon wheel.

drinks.name: Red Haus
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Blackberry schnapps (Black Haus)
  • 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the highball glass with ice, then add the Black Haus and sloe gin. Fill with cranberry juice, shake and serve with a cherry garnish.

drinks.name: Mind Meld
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 1/2 oz Triple sec
  • 1/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • Fill with 7-Up
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill the hurricane glass with ice, then add the blue curacao, triple sec and peach schnapps. Fill with 7-up and garnish with an orange wheel.

drinks.name: Eye of Swamp
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Whiskey
  • 2 cl Lakka
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in highball with lots of ice. Fill with Sprite.

drinks.name: Good & Plenty
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Anisette
  • 3/4 oz Kahlua
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour anisette, then Kahlua in a shot glass.

drinks.name: Tootsie Roll #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Kahlua
  • 3 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour over ice.

drinks.name: Frozen Strawberry Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 8 oz Strawberries in sugar sauce
  • 4 oz Sweet and sour
  • 2 oz Tequila
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put about 8 ounces of crushable ice cubes in a blender with blades that are capable of crushing ice. Add 8 oz of frozen (but thawed) strawberries in sugar sauce. (Available in the frozen foods section of your grocery store). Add sweet and sour mix and tequila. (Triple sec is not needed due to sweetness in strawberry sauce). Blend until desired consistency is obtained. Pour in large clear glass and garnish with a strawberry if available and a straw.

drinks.name: Vulva
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 parts Key Largo schnapps
  • 2 parts Rum
  • 1 part Triple sec
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Over rocks, combine schnapps, rum, and triple sec in Collins glass. Fill with orange juice and shake. Serve.

drinks.name: Cotton Candy #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 1/2 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 splash Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a shaker with ice and add the ingredients. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail (martini) glass.

drinks.name: L.A. Riot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Kahlua
  • 1 part Bailey's irish cream
  • 2-3 drops Green Chartreuse
  • 1 pinch Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill half a shot glass with Kahlua, and pour on Baileys in a separate layer, nearly to the top of the glass. Add a small amount of green chartreuse to float on the top. Light the drink on fire and sprinkle over cinnamon. Drink through a straw while still on fire.

drinks.name: Tequilaville
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Tequila
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and pour over ice

drinks.name: Wife Beater
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 part Tuaca
  • 1/2 part Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1 splash Sour mix
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine in shaker. Shake untill cloudy. Pour.

drinks.name: Cherry Garden
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 shot Light rum
  • 1 shot white Creme de Cacao
  • 1 1/2 shot Cherry brandy
  • Cream
  • 2/3 glass crushed Ice
  • 1 dash Grenadine
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all spirits into cocktail shaker and add cream. Gently mix. Fill glass 2/3 with ice. Pour contents of shaker into glass over the ice. Gently dash grenadine into glass. Garnish with speared cherry.

drinks.name: Cherry Candycane
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Southern Comfort
  • 1 shot Crown Royal
  • 1 shot Vodka
  • 1 shot Peppermint schnapps (Rumple Minze)
  • 1/2 shot Amaretto
  • 1/2 shot 151 proof rum
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • Fill with Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into glass and mix thoroughly

drinks.name: I go to Purdue
drinks.ingredients:
• 5/8 oz Aftershock
  • 4/8 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/8 oz 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: First pour the aftershock and then the vodka then pour the bacardi down the back side of a spoon to finish the shot.

drinks.name: Hubbabubba
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part JÃ¤germeister
  • 1 part Battery
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix in the glass.

drinks.name: Yah Yah
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Amaretto
  • 1 oz Coconut rum (Parrot Bay)
  • 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 splash 151 proof rum
  • Fill with Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the alcohol (except 151 proof rum) and ice first, then fill with orange juice. Top off with 151 proof rum. Optional, garnish with orange wedge, cherry and pineapple chunk.

drinks.name: CT
drinks.ingredients:
• 5 cl Cognac
  • Fill with Tonic water
  • 1 slice Lemon
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a long-drink glass with ice cubes. Add cognac and fill with tonic water. Put half a slice of lemon in the glass.

drinks.name: Strawberry Blond
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Irish cream
  • 1/2 oz white Creme de Cacao
  • 1/2 oz Strawberry liqueur (Baja Rosa)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer in the order given: Irish Cream, Creme de Cacao, Strawberry Liqueur.

drinks.name: Man In A Man Suit
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 L Fruit juice
  • 10 cl Vodka (Absolut)
  • 10 cl Whisky
  • 15 cl Southern Comfort
  • 5 cl 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the fruit juice and add it to the bowl (make sure it is pure fruit juice), mix in the vodka, whisky and southern comfort. Carefully float the 151 proof rum on the top, light it, but snuff it out before it all burns off. Several people drink it from the bottom with a straw at the same time.

drinks.name: French 76
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Citrus vodka (Ketel 1)
  • 1/4 oz fresh Lemon juice
  • 1/4 oz Cointreau
  • 1/4 oz Sugar syrup
  • 1 drop Orange-flower water
  • Fill with Champagne (Sumaroca)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake the first five ingredients with plenty of ice. Strain into a frozen cocktail glass, fill to the brim with champagne and add a long twist of fresh orange peel

drinks.name: Senorita Margarita
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Tequila
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Rose's sweetened lime juice
  • 2 oz Sour mix
  • 2 oz Orange juice
  • Salt (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix tequila, triple sec, lime juice, sour mix, and orange juice. Strain into margarita glass with a salted rim, over ice. Garnish with a lime.

drinks.name: Serial Killer
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Malibu rum
  • 1 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 1 oz Light rum
  • 2 1/2 oz Orange juice
  • 2 1/2 oz Pineapple juice
  • 3/4 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix liquor, juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into ice filled highball glass.

drinks.name: Hawaiian Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Coconut rum (Parrot Bay)
  • 1/2 oz Absolut Mandrin
  • 7 oz Pineapple juice (Dole)
  • 1 splash Grenadine (Rose's)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour in rum, then vodka follow with Pineapple juice. Drop in grenadine last - let settle for a sunrise effect.

drinks.name: Faust
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1/3 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 1/3 oz 151 proof rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Use chilled liquor. Pour the JÃ¤germeister in first, then add Yukon Jack, and finally add 151 Rum.

drinks.name: Jamestown Kool-Aid
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • 3 oz Yukon Jack
  • 3 oz 151 proof rum
  • 1 qt Kool-Aid
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make the kool-aid as usual, then mix in the JÃ¤germeister, Yukon Jack, and 151 rum in this order. Chill for two hours, serve.

drinks.name: Risk
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 oz Aftershock
  • 1/3 oz Yukon Jack
  • 1/3 oz Orange juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix all three chilled in this order: Aftershock, Orange Juice, and Yukon Jack

drinks.name: Sackville Surprise
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz White rum
  • 1 oz Maple syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Rum first, syrup second. Mix well in shot glass.

drinks.name: Two Turtles
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Canadian whisky
  • 1/2 oz Blackberry schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Cointreau
  • 1 Cherry
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

drinks.name: Satin Sheets
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Kahlua
  • 1 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 oz Chocolate liqueur (Godiva)
  • Ice
  • Fill with Milk
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine kahlua, Irish cream, and chocolate liqueur over ice. Add milk to fill the glass.

drinks.name: Tea Toddy #2
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 cup Tea (Earl Grey or Yellow Label)
  • 1/2 cup Bailey's irish cream
  • 1 splash Whisky
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make some tea, put it in the cup, half full. Fill up with Baileys to taste. Add a splash of Whisky (optional) to taste

drinks.name: Sperm Whale
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Southern Comfort
  • 1 oz Peach schnapps
  • 1 oz Malibu rum
  • Appx. 1 oz Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Over ice pour Southern Comfort, Peach Schnapps and Malibu Rum. Top off with Pineapple Juice. Shake and pour into glass.

drinks.name: Sloppy Joe
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 oz Orange juice
  • 3 oz Cranberry juice
  • 3 oz Sprite
  • 4 oz Spiced rum (Capt. Morgan)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour cranberry and orange juice in cup, then add the sprite. Last, add the rum.

drinks.name: Trailer Wench
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 jigger Midori melon liqueur
  • 1 jigger Vodka
  • 1 jigger 151 proof rum
  • Fill with Grape juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient as listed.

drinks.name: Absolute Chainsaw
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1 oz Wild Turkey
  • 1/2 oz JÃ¤germeister
  • Fill with Beer (Budweiser)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour each ingredient as listed.

drinks.name: LaPaglia's Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/4 oz Vodka (Absolut)
  • 1/4 oz Gold tequila (Cuervo)
  • 1/4 oz Rum (Cpt. Morgan)
  • 1/4 oz Triple sec
  • 1/2 oz Grenadine
  • 1/2 cup Orange juice
  • 1/2 cup Pineapple juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake everything and serve on the rocks

drinks.name: Cheesecake
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Bailey's irish cream
  • 3/4 oz Pineapple juice
  • 1/4 oz Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix equal parts of irish cream and pineapple juice in mixing tin filled with ice. Don't shake, just stir lightly. Pour genadine in glass and layer mixture on top.

drinks.name: Green Label
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Pisang Ambon
  • 2 cl Vodka
  • Fill with Sour mix
  • 1 splash Sprite
  • Ice cubes
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build in an ice filled glass. Serve. Great as a frozen drink.

drinks.name: Brass Skunky
drinks.ingredients:
• 40 oz Malt liquor
  • 3 oz Rum
  • 15 oz Orange juice
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix it all together. Serve cold, but not with ice.

drinks.name: Crap Schnapps
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Cinnamon schnapps
  • 1 part Root beer schnapps
  • 1 part Apple schnapps
  • 1 part Peach schnapps
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients over ice and strain

drinks.name: Bluetail Fly
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Gin
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • 3 oz Sweet and sour
  • Fill with Soda water
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour all ingredients in shaker over ice. Shake well and pour in 12 oz. collins glass.

drinks.name: Fuzznutts
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Peach schnapps
  • 3/4 oz Frangelico
drinks.mixinginstructions: Just pour equally in shot glass

drinks.name: Bulldozer
drinks.ingredients:
• 16 oz Malt liquor (Schlitz)
  • 2 oz 151 proof rum (Lemon Hart Demerara)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour a full pint of the malt liquor into a chilled 20 ounce mug or stein, then dump a healthy 2 ounce shot of 151 rum right into the middle of it.

drinks.name: Crazy Maker
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Southern Comfort (100 proof)
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • Juice of 1 wedge Lime
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix southern comfort and cranberry juice in a glass. Layer orange juice on the top. Squeeze lime over the top of the drink.

drinks.name: Invisible Parrot
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 shot Coconut rum (Parrot Bay)
  • Fill with Sprite
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir.

drinks.name: Sunrise
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Apricot liqueur
  • 2 cl Orange juice
  • Fill with Ginger ale or Sprite
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix liqueur, vodka and orange juice in a highball glass. Add some ice and fill the glass with ginger ale (or Sprite if you don't have ginger ale). Decorate with a slice of orange.

drinks.name: Pirate's Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Spiced rum (Captain Morgan's)
  • 8 oz Hawaiian Punch
drinks.mixinginstructions: Combine over ice in a highball glass and stir.

drinks.name: Participle
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Kiwi liqueur
  • 2 cl Vodka
  • 4 cl Orange juice
  • Sprite
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix liqueur, juice and vodka in a highball glass. Add ice and fill the glass with sprite. You can decorate the drink with a slice of orange, lemon or kiwi if you want.

drinks.name: Baroness
drinks.ingredients:
• 7 cl Pear juice
  • 1/2 cl Lemon juice
  • A little Cinnamon
drinks.mixinginstructions: Mix juices and cinnamon with ice. Strain to a cocktail glass. Serve cold.

drinks.name: Power Sangria
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Sweet Vermouth (Martini Rosso)
  • 2 parts Red wine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Fill a wine glass with 1/3 chilled vermouth and 2/3 red wine.

drinks.name: Chocolate Martini #4
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao
  • 2 oz Vanilla vodka (Stoli)
  • Frost glass with Cocoa powder
  • Twist of Orange peel
  • 5 - 6 cubes Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour the vodka and creme de cacao into a shaker with the ice cubes. Rub a slice of orange peel around the rim of the cocktail glass and dip the cocktail glass into the cocoa powder. Strain the liquid into the Cocktail glass. Garnish with the orange peel.

drinks.name: Okapi
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/2 oz Vodka
  • 1/2 oz Southern Comfort
  • 4 oz Cranberry juice
  • 5 cubes Ice
  • 1 wedge Lime
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir all of the ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with a wedge of lime.

drinks.name: Packerita
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 pieces Ice
  • 1 oz Tequila (Jose Cuervo)
  • 1 oz Triple sec
  • Fill with Pineapple juice
  • 1 splash Blue Curacao
  • 1 slice Lime (optional)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Place four ice cubes in a glass. Add tequila and triple sec. Fill almost to top with pineapple juice, and add a splash of Blue Curacao. Squeeze lime wedge over drink (optional). Mix thoroughly and enjoy immensely.

drinks.name: Moulin Rouge
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Sloe gin
  • 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth
  • 2 dashes Angostura bitters
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.

drinks.name: Drunk-N-ade
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Coconut rum
  • 1 part Light rum (Bacardi)
  • 1 part Midori melon liqueur
  • 3 parts Gatorade
drinks.mixinginstructions: Put everything into a shaker. Toss in ice and shake (shaking is easier than stirring). Pour contents into whatever glassware you have.

drinks.name: Jungle Boogie Punch
drinks.ingredients:
• Crushed Brown sugar
  • Peel of 1 Orange
  • Water
  • 1 fifth Light rum (Havana Club)
  • 1 fifth Dark rum (Havana Club)
  • 1 L Pineapple juice
  • 1 L Mango juice
  • 1 L Orange juice
  • Juice of 2-3 Lime
  • Chunks of Pineapple
  • Chunks of Mango
  • Chunks of Orange
  • Grated Nutmeg
drinks.mixinginstructions: Make a sugar syrup by boiling brown sugar, water and orange peel for 30 minutes, then allow it to cool. Stir it together with the other ingredients in a large bowl. Garnish with chunks of pineapple, mango and orange, and sprinkle with freshly grated nutmeg before serving.

drinks.name: Hawaiian Sugar Plantation
drinks.ingredients:
• 1/3 shot Butterscotch schnapps
  • 1/3 shot Amaretto
  • 1/3 shot Coconut rum
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass.

drinks.name: Brioni
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 part Campari
  • 1 part Sweet Vermouth
  • 1 part Dry Vermouth
  • 1 slice Orange
  • 5 parts Club soda
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour liquor over ice cubes in a Collins glass. Fill with club soda, stir to mix, and add orange slice for garnish.

drinks.name: Shore Breeze
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Light rum
  • 3 oz Pineapple juice
  • 2 oz Cranberry juice
  • 2 dashes Angostura bitters
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Build over ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

drinks.name: Southampton
drinks.ingredients:
• Tonic water
  • Squeeze of Lime
  • 3 dashes Angostura bitters
  • Ice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour tonic water over ice in a highball glass. Add a squeeze of lime and Angostura bitters. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wheel.

drinks.name: Moon Pie
drinks.ingredients:
• 3/4 oz Coffee liqueur (Kahlua)
  • 3/4 oz Irish cream (Bailey's)
  • 1/2 oz Banana liqueur (DeKuyper)
drinks.mixinginstructions: Layer. Coffee liqueur first, banana liqueur on top.

drinks.name: Blue Wave
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Hpnotiq
  • 2 oz White wine
  • 1 oz Orange juice
  • 1 splash Ginger ale
  • 1 slice green Apple
  • Green Grapes
  • 1 slice Orange
  • 1 slice Kiwi
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake Hpnotiq, white wine, OJ and ginger ale with ice. Pour into a large red wine glass. Garnish with sliced green apples, green grapes, orange slice and kiwi slices.

drinks.name: The Blue Fin
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Hpnotiq
  • 1 oz Absolut Citron
  • 3 oz White cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

drinks.name: Blue Goose
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Hpnotiq
  • 1 oz Vodka (Grey Goose)
  • Fresh Lime juice
  • 1 shot Orgeat syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into a chilled sugar-rimmed cocktail glass. Grnish with an orange twist.

drinks.name: White Cosmopolitan
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 oz Citrus vodka
  • 4 oz White cranberry juice (Ocean Spray)
  • 1 oz fresh Lime juice
  • 1 oz Sugar syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: Ibsen
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 shots Aquavit (Norwegian)
  • 3/4 shot fresh Lime juice
  • 3/4 shot Orgeat syrup
  • 1/2 Egg white
  • 2 dashes Bitters
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice, then strain into ice filled whisky glass. Garnish with a pinch of ground cinnamon sprinkled on top.

drinks.name: Fraise de Champagne
drinks.ingredients:
• 3 1/2 oz Champagne
  • 3/4 oz Creme de Fraise des Bois (Marie Brizard)
  • 1/2 oz Cognac
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour into a coupette glass/champagne saucer.

drinks.name: Cranberry Apple Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 1/2 oz Cranberry vodka (Finlandia)
  • 3/4 oz Sour apple liqueur
  • 1/2 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

drinks.name: Washington Apple Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Crown Royal
  • 1 oz Sour apple liqueur
  • 1 oz Cranberry juice
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake and serve up in a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar and cinnamon.

drinks.name: Gotland Summer Night
drinks.ingredients:
• 4 cl Gin
  • 2 cl Cointreau
  • Fill with Orange juice
  • 1 cl Grenadine
drinks.mixinginstructions: Pour gin, Cointreau and orange juice over ice. Gently pour grenadine along the inside of the glass so it sinks to the bottom.

drinks.name: Jameson St. Patrick's Day
drinks.ingredients:
• 1 oz Jameson Irish whiskey
  • 1/2 oz Peachtree schnapps
  • 1/2 oz Blue Curacao
  • Orange juice to taste
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange spiral.

drinks.name: Sour Apple Martini
drinks.ingredients:
• 2 cl Sour apple liqueur
  • 2 cl Vodka
  • 2 cl Lime juice
  • 2 cl Sugar syrup
drinks.mixinginstructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of apple.
